column2: Gittaabooda rooproobanga Yeesu Gristo, balleanda Dawdi, balleanda Abrahaamu.
Abrahaamu gwajiilu Isakka, Isakka gwajiilu Yakkobo, Yakkobo gwajiilu Yuuda ea oorjooga ghaamwat.
Yuuda gwajiilu Bereesi ea Seera nea ghaamwat ea Damaari, Bereesi gwajiilu Hesroon. Hesroon gwajiilu Araamu,
Araamu gwajiilu Aminadabu, Aminadabu gwajiilu Nashooni, Nashooni gwajiilu Salmoon,
Salmoon gwajiilu Boas nea ghaamwat ea Rahaabu, Boas gwajiilu Obeedi nea ghaamwat ea Rutti, Obeedi gwajiilu Yeese,
Nea Yeese gwajiilu sugoochcheanda was Dawdi. Dawdi gwajiilu Sulemaani nea gheamatta ea gatmooda Uriya gil,
Sulemaani gwajiilu Rehoboamu, Rehoboamu gwajiilu Abiya, Abiya gwajiilu Asa,
Asa gwajiilu Yehoshafatti, Yehoshafatti gwajiilu Yoraam, Yoraam gwajiilu Usiya,
Usiya gwajiilu Yottam, Yottam gwajiilu Ahaasi, Ahaasi gwajiilu Hesekiya,
Hesekiya gwajiilu Manaase, Manaase gwajiilu Amooni, Amooni gwajiilu Yosiya,
Yosiya gwajiilu Yekoniya ea oorjooga ghaamwat, nii damanda ghayi abeeda siipaleaga fuga Yahuudi gaweay ng'eanyiida Baabiloon gil.
Ing'atta gibaleakta buuneeda weay Baabiloon gwajiilu Yekoniya Shaltieli, Shaltieli gwajiilu Serubabeeli,
Serubabeeli gwajiilu Abihuudi, Abihuudi gwajiilu Eliyakkiimu, Eliyakkiimu gwajiilu Asoori,
Asoori gwajiilu Sadokki, Sadokki gwajiilu Akkimu, Akkimu gwajiilu Eliyuudi,
Eliyuudi gwajiilu Eliyasaari, Eliyasaari gwajiilu Mattani, Mattani gwajiilu Yakkobo,
Yakkobo gwajiilu Yoseefu siyeeda Mariya was gheamatta Yeesuuyda suguura Gristo.

Asi jeachcheenga sean ng'eada Abraahamu ea ghwahitta Dawdi ea damanang'wan, ghang'eada Dawdi ea ghwahitta gibaleaktida bea Babilooniin jeachcheenga ea damana ang'wan, nea gidang'eada gibaleaktida bea Babilooniin ea ghwahitta Gristo jeachcheenga ea damana ang'wan.
Jeatta siji Yeesu Gristo ghayi gwasnu. Mariyaayda was ghaamwat damanda duu gonnyearra Yoseefu, damanda mii ghabeawa heedean geadaah nea gweayiideat aba uurda Gurorooda Ghaydit;
iiduw Yoseefooda was siyeadaannyi aba gideaba niny siida doabiwaat gil ea magassa gideaba gayghoabwaspwas hean gagasa gwanung'usa heeda nea ghoahudaada.

Iiduw nea gudugoottemsheesa ng'asheanji ghwahidu headaannyi Malaykajeanda Ng'uttamiida aba jeeda girgweatka ak gwayeeshsha, “Yoseefu, balleanda Dawdi, adibeali ea nung'waada gheenda Mariya ghoaw gatmoadang'u, aba gideaba gweayumeani iittaannyiin ghwanyas aba uurda Gurorooda Ghaydit.
Gaygwaji balleanda ak gayguureewana ghawungaaschi Yeesu, aba gideaba niny gaygwalealu buuneadaannyi aba jeeda riing'eega nyaawa.”
Ghwahitu ng'asheesu seanin goomajeek ng'asheanda Ng'uttamiida rukuna ghuutta sibaneeda nea gwayi:
“Ng'ulla gaygagweayiit huda miyeasat
ak gaygwaji balleanda,
ak gajeeguura gheawungaaschi Imanuweeli”
(nea gideaba, Aseetta sindeayeewi).
Ing'atta nea ghang'eada Yoseefu ruweanga gwasinda baloolda girrukusiinda malaykajeanda Ng'uttamiida; ak ghwaat gatmoadannyi,
ea mawa heeda ea gwaji balleanda; ak gaguura gheawungaaschi Yeesu.
Damanda sijiila Yeesu aba Betleheemooda Yudeeya, damanda waseewa Herode sugoochcheanda. Ng'ulla, ghwahidu Yerusaleemu weaghoodiga leabu heeda ghayeawa nea gwayi,
“Gwanda yeenu jeepta siji was sugoochcheanda Yahuudi? Aba gideaba geadeaksi ming'weandaannyi heeda ghayeawa, ak geapkannyi eaghadoawana.”
Iiy sugoochcheanda siyi Heroode ng'asheesu, gwahirbaban sea Yerusaleemossean.
Gaguursa ashoohoodiga hees sean ea ng'oorshoodiga buuneeda ak ghoanyaash heeda jea eejiilsa Gristo.
Geeyeeshsha, “Yeeda Betlehemooda Yudeeya aba gideaba gidaghayi ng'waarda sibaneeda,
‘Nea ang'iing'i, Ea Betlehemooda ng'eanyiida Yuuda,
ang'iing'i muwosi mwanang'eawa eara hay sugoodiga ng'eanyiida Yuuda;
aba gideaba headaang'u gaygwarinna sugoochcheanda,
jea ghoahaghwa buneedeanyu was Israeeli.’”
Gaguursa Heroode aba makcheameeda weaghoodigiga ak ghoanyash damanda daaha ming'weandideani;
ak goojeakta Betleheemu nea gwayeeshsha, “Aweayeena ak ghoonnyaashti muuchchi iitta jeepta, ama oanyaschi gooyeannean iitta, abeeda gaydawa eara aniini daghadoawan.”
Hean iiy ng'asheega sugoochcheanda ghwang'waay naweeda; asi ng'ulla, miing'weandida sideaksa heeda ghayeawan, goosheedeawa ea gawa ghaminaadawa deascheeda mida jeepta.
Idaah fukka ming'weandida gang'weela ng'weellooda haw muuchchi.

Weay gah ghwadaa jeepta ea Mariyaayda was ghaamwat ak goobeedeay ak ghaghadoawan. Ng'atta, goottin shageeniga nyaawa ak ghoadaw haleanjeeda miyas, was lagheanga meengmeeng'i ea hideeni ng'andit ea bureatta.
Iiduw nea sireekusa aba jeeda girgweatka eamabiiksiina Heroode, ghwala nawa nuut ak gaweay ng'eang'da nyaawa.

Ing'atta nea nuweay fukka, ng'ulla ghwahidu heeda Yoseefu Malaykajeanda Ng'uttamiida aba jeeda girgweatka ak gwayeeshsha, “Ng'eada ak giyaadi jeepta ea ghaamwat, amng'awsiina Misri, ak gooppiidi hoowa ea darukuneey, aba gideaba gagasa Herode gwanuus jeepta.”
Ghang'eat ak ghwaat jeepta sea ghaamwat eawa, ak gawa Misri,
goobiida hoowa ea ghami Herode. Nii gajeenung' gwasa ng'asheandida ghayi rugu Ng'uttamiida aba ghuutta sibaneeda, “Geaguursi balleandeanyu ghoana Misri.”

Hean jeeng'u Herode gideaba nimulsa fukka was weaghoodigean, ghwanyareas muuchchi, hean goojeakta buuneeda gwanuuseada diibiga sean was ballojiga aba Betleheemu ea geamida jeedeaba ng'eanyiitta bea gweannyew iyyeenya, ea gea hing'adawa, nea abeeda ea nisikteawa damanda rukusa weaghoodiga.
Ak gwasa ng'asheanda ghayi rugu sibaneeda suguura Jeremiya nea gwayi:
“Siyiiy ghuutta siida aba Rama,
shookka ea heareega raanya,
Raheeli gooyyeawda diibigaaschi;
Nea mwamwasa eara hawdeayda,
aba gideaba mudugwanda.”
Ing'atta miyeeda Heroode, hean gabussa Yoseefu Malaykajeanda Ng'uttamiida aba jeeda girgweatka aba Misri,
Ak gwayeeshsha, “Ng'eada, aada jeepta ea ghaamwat, ak gibiikti ng'eanyiida Israeeli, aba gideaba fuga ghayi gaseadayyi laknooda eaweega jeepta nimeewa.”
Ghangeat ak ghwaat jeepta ea ghaamwat ak gabikta ng'eanyiida Israeeli.

Iimuchchu nea ghwayiiy gideaba Akkelao niimbal ng'eanyiida Yudeeya ghoang'ng'waay hoorgeeda ghwaan was Heroode, hean ghoawal gawa hoowa, amaduw nea sireekusa aba jeeda giirgweatka hean ghwayam geaw ak gawa ng'eanyiida Galilaaya.
Gawa ak goobiida mujiineeda suguura Nasareetti, ak abeeda gwasa ng'asheanda ghayi rukuta sibanga, “Gajeeguura Nasarayajeanda.”
Askwearjoojikka ghwahidu Yohaaneeda Abattiisachchi, ak gwarukkwiida ng'asheega Aseetta aba dareapcheeda Yudeeya, nea gwayeenniisa;
“Aduukkuunana, aba gideaba sugoochcheandumeeda humng'eeda nineekkiit.”
Aba gideaba nii dea ghayi rugu sibaneeda suguura Isaaya gil nea gwayi,
“Ghuutta siida nyearra dareapcheeda
Asna naweeda Ng'uttamiida
Olleappa naweadinngaaschi.”
Nea abeeda Yohaana gookkweali eaghwada sisna buudeega ngamiya nea gwarattiisa manandaannyi ghealooda; hamittaannyi ea deashamga gil ea maleeda ghamiilalga.
Ak gaweesa Yerusaleemu, ea ng'eanyiida Yuudeeyeeda sean, ea daroorakka sean bea murdajeega Yordan,
ak geeppattiisan aba jeedeenda Yordan nea ghamwas gideaba nisin ring'eega.
Hean nea ghwadaa Farisayajeega saang'a ea Sadukayajeega nea ghapka headaannyi goobattiisan, gwayeeshsha, “Ee dayeega udang'usheega! Gwareekuseeng'wa ng'eaha ea amng'awana nyarasta jea ghwahidu?
Asi ajiila haghweega miisa duukkuunooda,
nea adootteemsheesi geat aba jeesingeagwa gideaba, ‘Geandeawi ghweanda nea Abrahaamu,’ aba gideaba geayeeshshiineegwa, Aseetta ghoammu gagatkat lagheang'su ghoaw diibiga Abrahaamu.
Nea joommooda asiyiin guumsheakka geediga, ak geetta maji haghwega miyaas gajealach ak geejaksa jeeda beasta.
Geabattisananeegwa beega aba dukkuunooda, nea dea jea ghwaduupnaan geash gaburdeawean uurda, nea mammisean eara sareenda geakkaaschi; niny gaygoobattiisananeegwa Gurorooda Ghaydit ea beasta.
Niny gidaannyi alleeliida gwanda geattindaannyi, ak gaygoobuus muuchchi bugharjeandaannyi, ak gooweamsa nganoadaannyi gijigooda, nea looyda gayghaghwarda aba beesta maygamis.”
Damandida ghwaan Yeesu nea gwaleabu Galilaaya ea ghwahitta Jordaani heeda Yohaana, eebaattiisan.
Hean gagasa Yohaana ghaheawa nea gwayeeshsha, “Geagasayi aniini gideaba gajabaattiisan ak giwuni ang'iing'i heedeanyu?”
Ghwasha Yeesu nea gwayeeshsha, “Mwasa ghamneawa; aba gideaba nii gidamiisindaneasa gil sinooda ng'asheega sean doabiiw.” Ak ghamwas Yohaana.
Ng'atta giibaattiisanda Yeesu, nea gwascheeng'na jeeda beega; hean ng'ulla ghwajaada humng'eeda ak ghwadaa Gurorooda Aseetta nea gwashubeanda gharibajeanda, ak goobissa uhuudaannyi;
deagheatta, ghwanya ghuutta nyaasha humng'eeda nea gwayi, “Nii Balleandeanyu abwariinyi, ahoosanani.”
Ng'atta ghwaat Yeesu Gurooorooda ea ghoahiitta dareapcheeda ak gwasimsim meang'nyeandeenda.
Goluulda geaw eawooji haradam, eawa ea askweari, amaduw huydeanda ghwayeachchih.
Ghwahidu headaannyi gichchea gwasimsim ak gwayeeshsha, Iiwosa Balleanda Aseetta giyami lagheangsu ghoaw mukkatte.
Ghwasha nea gwayeeshsha, “Geang'war gideaba,
‘Siida mwoammu goobiideewa ng'eanyiida mukkatte akghwahit,
geaghus ng'asheanda rinna ghuutta Aseetta.’”
Ng'atta ghwaat Meang'nyeandeenda mujiineeda Ghaydit ak goodiing'da uhuuda gheeda Sibatta Aseetta heeda geaw
ak gwayeeshsha, “Iiwosi Balleanda Aseetta, gijaksi geaw ng'eanyi; aba gideaba geang'waar,
‘Gaygoojeagu malaykajeagaaschi aba badaydaang'u;
ak gayghwadeabwaneey geattinga nyaawa
amwalasa geashtaang'u lagheaneeda.’”
Gwayeeshsha Yeesu, “Geang'waar gichcha gideaba, ‘Adisimsimi Ng'uttamiida was Aseettang'u.’”
Ng'atta ghwaat gichcha Meang'nyeandeenda ak goodiing'da uhuuda giijeeda geaw muuchchi, ak goohiimsa daroorakka sean bea muunda ng'eanyiida ea miyeanoadaannyi,
gwayeeshsha, “Haleanjeeni seaniin gaydagoonnyi iibeadi ak gighadoawannyaan.”
Hean gwayeeshsha Yeesu, “Ng'amwana hiji Shattaani! aba gideaba geang'war, ‘Ghadoawana Ng'uttamiida was Aseattaang'u ak gibwadi niny nea gaba geaw.’”
Hean ghwanung'wa heeda Meang'nyeandeenda ak ghapka malaykajeega ak gagadiyeesa.
Hean nea ghwayiiy gideaba Yohaana gwanda ghealooniga, gawa Galilaaya;
ghabeawa Nasareetti ak gawa goobiida Gapernaumu mida ghuutta basooda, mida ng'eanyiida Sablon ea Naftaali,
ak abeeda gwasa ng'asheanda ghayi rugu sibaneeda suguura Isaaya nea gwayi;
“Ng'eanyiida Sablon ea ng'eanyiida Naftaali,
Naweeda gal basooda, gigheawda Jordaani,
Galilaayeeda Eemoojiga.
Fukka ghayi abiitta jeeda misaneedean
nidaah weeshinda haw,
Nea gea ghayi abiitta ng'eanyiida ea jirooneeda miyeeda,
ea niibwaay weeshinda.”
Ghang'eada damandida ghoang'eat Yeesu rukkwiideayeayda ng'asheega Aseetta nea gwayi, “Adukkuunana aba gideaba sugoochcheandumeeda humng'eeda nineekkiit.”

Damanda neayeewa aba ghuutta basooda Galilaaya, ghwadaa oorju iyyeenya bea ghaamwadagi, nea Simoneeda suguura Betro gil ea oorjeeda ghaamwat suguura Andereya, nea ghoabuutta gheareedanga nyaawa jeeda basooda; aba gideaba fuga leallu ghweayeega.
Gwayeeshsha, “Ayeanni geeshteanyu ak gaydanung' ahuuwa fuga jea gwaleallu buuneeda.”
Deagheatta gwanung'sa heeda gheareedanga nyaawa ak ghwaat geeshta.

Gawa mwadi ak ghwadaa oorju iyyeenya bea ghaamwadagi, suuk Yokkobo balleanda Sebedaayo ea Yohaana oorjeeda ghaamwat, nea gwanda jeeda maleambooda sea Sebedayooyda was ghweanda nyaawa nea gwasin gheareedanga nyaawa, ak gaguursa.
Deagheatta gwanung'usa heeda maleambooda ea ghweanda nyaawa ak ghwaat geeshta.

Gwaneayeewa jeeda ng'eanyiida sean bea Galilaaya, nea goonealshi aba jeeda ghoorajeega nyaawa siinnealshachcheewa, nea gwarukkwiida giijasta miy bea sugoochcheandumeeda, nea ghoahaap geeyoonung'weakka sean ea sawanaduutka mideawa buuneeda.

Gageawiit iittannyi aba ng'eanyiisean bea Sirya, geeyeassa fuga sean miyeani, bearji heeluutka geeyoonung'weakka ea gea mideawa sawanaduutka, ea gea bearji meangeenda, ea gea ahiili, ea gea abittu damealga, ak ghoahaap.
Ghwaat geashtannyi emeetuw leabu ng'eanyiida Galilaaya ea Dekapoli ea Yerusaleemu ea Yudeeya ea gigheawda Jordaani.
Idaah emeetuw, gwading'da giijeeda, hean nea gopteada gaweay headaannyi giinealangaschi.
Ghoang'eat ghuutta giinealshoodaannyi nea gwayi:
“Ghang'wana fuga barbari guroruunat,
aba gideaba sugoochcheandumeeda humng'eeda daanyaawa.
Ghang'wana fuga guttu heareega,
aba gideaba gayghwanyas hawdeayda.
Ghang'wana fuga ng'eeni,
aba gideaba gaygoombal ng'eanyiida.
Ghang'wana fuga bearji jalooda ea muwooshta gassooda doobiiwnatta,
aba gideaba gajeellang'u.
Ghang'wana fuga mideawa baydeayda,
aba gideaba eara saawa gajeabwayda.
Ghang'wana fuga mideawa guroruunatka miyaas,
aba gideaba gayghwahitta Aseetta.
Ghang'wana fuga aduptooschi suurja,
aba gideaba fiisu gajeeguura diibiga Aseetta
Ghang'wana fuga sisawana aba doobiiwnatta,
aba gideaba sugoochcheandumeeda humng'eeda daanyaawa.
“Ghoang'wani agooga iyang'eawweegwa buuneeda nea geesawaneegwa nea geerukuna badahuukkeagwa ng'asheega munyas sean aba ng'uyyeega appadaydeanyu.
Ahoosana nea goong'weelayi, aba gideaba gimeardeeng'wa ahaw aba humng'eeda, nii gidaghayi bay gwasawanda buuneeda sibanga ashooynaneegwa.”
“Agooga goowoschi balang'da ng'eanyiida; ama balang'da iimudugwasamu gil, gajeahindaan iijeagwasamu gil? Mudugwarachchi gil geaghus eahiisa jarooda ak ghoallaplaap buuneeda.
Agooga goowoschi weeshinda ng'eanyiida. Mujiineeda sideeksa uhuuda heayeeda mwoammu afunyaat.
Eara buuneeda meayeetta gheabong'nyeanda ak geedukuteawa dahuuda iissa ghwayiin uhuuda ghamarda ak ghoabwaay buuneessean mida jeeda gheeda.
Asi eara weeshindeang'wa gagasa ghoabwaay buuneessean, amaduw nea ghwadaa gadiyoojigeagwa miyaas ghoaghambiit Ghweandeang'wa mida humng'eeda.”
“Adoaghannyi gili awunnyi dayam deaweeda ghana sibanga; mwawuni dayam ghawunyi danung' gwasa.
Aba huumwa geayeeshshineegwa; eara ghang'atta humng'eeda ea ng'eanyiida, ghanyeamanda eara hiji mwanang', ghana roobadeanagi mwanang', muuchchi bea deaweeda majeegeanda ea gwasa ng'asheega sean.

Asi siida wasean jea ghwalach diigheanjagi mwanang'eawa sean, aba jeedeaba diigheannyeeksu ak ghoannaaldunu buuneeda, gajeeguura dea mwanang' muuchchi aba jeeda sugoochcheandumeeda humng'eeda; amaduw siitta jea gwasin nea ghoanaal suurjeeniin, nii gajeeguura dea haw aba jeeda sugoochcheandumeeda humng'eeda.
Aba gideaba geayeeshshiineegwa, doobiiwnatteang'wa iimaburdeawana dea ng'oorshoodiga ea dea Farisayajeega, majaghannyi aweayeena jeeda sugoochcheandumeeda humng'eeda.”
“Ghayi noayiinyi nea geerukusa fugeaba garayi gideaba, ‘Adinuusi siida; siida nuus siida gammiisa girgweaksiinda.’

Ak aniini geayeeshshineegwa, siida wassean jea gwanyareeksa oorjeeda ghaamwat gamiisa giirgweaksiinda; ama dea ang'eawi oorjeeda ghaamwaat gamiisa eatta madeeda gweargwa, ama dea eeshsha oorjeeda ghaamwat, ‘Guwosi leekghteanda!’ Gammiisa beasta maloonghajeega.
Asi iyeadu haleanjeeda isabi geadi bea ghadoweeda badayda heeda wagiida ama deagheatta giipkaadi gideaba gwanda gidinndeayeesi oorjeeda geamadu,
nung'usiina haleanjeedaang'u isabi geadi bea ghadoweeda badayda altaari ak guwi ghannyi aduupcheena sea oorjeeda geamadu, ama ng'atta gibiigu ak giidaydi haleanjeedaang'u isabi geadi bea ghadoweeda.

Bay adupcheewana geaw siida ahaaktaneey, damanda duuandeawana naweeda nea goondaageat heeda ogaleewi gheeda girgweageeda, ammasa gayghwaannyi siida ahaaktaneey heeda siida laja girgweaguutka, ak ghwayiinnyi ada geattinga furiischoochcheanda ak gwajakseey ghealooniga;
Aba huumwa geayeeshshineey, mayrinnana jeeni ea eaghus aniidayda heelajeanda huydean.”
“Ghayi noayiinyi nea geeyi, ‘Adiiduw goomealuulli!’
Ak ghamneawa geayeeshshineegwa siida jea gang'ulla gatmooda seechmeeda nigeawiit gamealuul aba jeadaannyi.

Asi iissa iinung' ghaang'daang'u bea geattinda dugwa adiinya, giloatti ak gijakti gwasheagiit; aba gideaba aamiy ghwashoadeeweey dameallanjagi ak ea meejaksiina saseadaang'u sean jeeda maloonghajeega.
Ama nung' geattindaang'u bea dugwa adiinya, gilaji ak gijakti asheagiidana geaw; aba gideaba ghang'wana ghwashoadeweey dameallanjagi ak ea mejaksiina saseadang'u sean jeeda maloonghajeega.”
“Ghayi surgu gichcha gideaba, ‘Siida iinung'usa heeda gatmoadaannyi ea dadawa barawajeanda nung'ooda.’
Ak aniini geayeeshshineegwa siida wassean nung' gatmoadaannyi, nea mwanung'wa aba gideaba gamealuuli, gayghwanung' gamealuul; ak siida jea ghaghi gatmooda sinung' earada gamealuuli.”
“Gichcha ea noayiinyi nea geeyeeshsha fugeaba garayi, ‘Adiiduw giyaagi habeawooda ng'uyyeega, ak giihiidi habeawajeegaagu aba heeda Ng'uttamiida.’
Ak aniini geayeeshshineegwa, adiiduw ghoayaaji habeawooda eara gili mwanang', earaba humng'eeda aba gideaba horgeeda sugoochcheandumeeda Aseetta gil,
ghana earaba ng'eanyiida, aba gideaba horgeeda iina geashangaaschi, ghana earaba Yerusaleemu, aba gideaba mujiineeda sugoochcheanda hawi.
Adiiduw giyeaksi habeawooda eara uhuudaang'u, aba gideaba mimmusi yamwa budeanjagi nung' gaweeshiit ghana gwattuudu.
Nea ng'asheegeagwa ghoanung' ghoaw ‘Eah’ ghana ‘Manda.’ Gili wassean nyoah ghwanaawda gwaleabu heedeaba diitta muyiin.”
“Ghayi noayiinyi nea geergu gideaba, ‘Gheang'da ea gheang'da, ea geeshadeeda ea geeshadeeda.’
Ak aniini geayeeshshineegwa, adigali geaw siida muy. Siida iilas madang'daang'u bea geattinda dugwa, giidawi eara meatkweeda niirja.
Nea siida jea ghoahaaktaneey ak gageanda shatteadang'u, ginung'usi eara hang'daang'u;
siida idiing'seey beatta neekki adeayeewana niba iyyeenya.
Adawa dea musnyi, dea gasa ghoalaajaneey gida ea adifuursi muwuutta.”
“Ghayi noayiinyi nea geeyi, ‘Bwariinya gischeewoochchaandaang'u ak gisti weajoochchaandaang'u.’
Ak geayeeshshineegwa, abwariinya weajoodigeagwa amoasha ghawooda appadahuukka fuga sawaneegwa.
Abeeda gajahuuwa balloojiga Ghweandeang'wa mida humng'eeda; aba gideaba niny iissa daknoadaannyi gooboong'sa fuga munyas ea gea miyaas, ak gooroobassa roopta fuga doobiiweadi ea gea mii doobiiweadi.
Aba gideaba iyoabwariinyi gea bwariinyeagwa agooga, gajanyasa anagiimwaar? Neada eara fuga ang'ng'oonyi gwaadi saawa ea masinniidunu?
Ghana iyokkeattoscheewi oorjooga giyeang'wa akghwahit goosinnyi naaha meaji ghwanaawda? Neada eara fuga Emoojiga ea masinniidunu?
Awosa hidaat awuurjeewana gidahidaatta Ghweandeang'wa mida humng'eeda.”
“Ashageada adiidu goosinnyi alooheedeang'wa aba madeeda buuneeda nea goobaysiini ghwadaheagwa saawa, aba gideaba iyosinindunu ea mwajanyasa giimearda aba heeda Ghweandeang'wa mida humng'eeda.

Asi ang'iing'i iidaydi haleanjeeda iiweadi fuga barbari adidiing'u geaw ak gisindi gidasinniida fuga ammiitu geat aba jeesinga ghorajeega siinnealshachcheewa ea ghuusiga naweadinga, gagwarsa buuneeda. Aba huumwa, geeyeeshshineegwa suuh ninyas gimearda nyaawa.
Asi ang'iing'i iidaydi haleanjeeda iiweadi fuga barbari eara geattindaang'u ghaadaam adaghwanal gisiin geattindaang'u bea dugwa.
Haleanjeedaang'u iiweadi fuga barbari adaydaawana makcheameeda, ak Ghweandaang'u deaha makcheamuutka gay gooheanneey.”

“Asi iyoamwaashchi Aseetta, ea adoowurjeewi fugiga ammiittu geadiin; saawa ghabwariiy ghamwaash Aseetta nea ghaminaada aba jeesinga ghorajeega siinnealshachcheewa ea ghuusiga naweadinga, ghwadaa buuneeda. Aba huumwa, geayeeshshineegwa, nigeawiit ghwanyas gimearda nyaawa.

Nea ang'iing'i iimwaashi Aseetta, guwi jeeda ghooriidaang'u hoowa bea gahiin ak giradi gidaghuut ak gimwaashi Aseetta aba heeda Ghweandaang'u mida makcheameeda; ama abeeda Ghweandaang'u deaha makcheamuutka gaygooheanneey.
Agooga iyoamwaashchi Aseetta ea adoochuurayi awuurjeewana fuga emoojiga; saawa ghaghay gili jea gooleeysiit aba ng'asheega nyaawa saang'a.
Asi adoowuurjeewi saawa, aba gideaba Ghweandeang'wa ghwanal gidoogasayi nea miyoomsa.
Asi amwaashtunu Aseetta:
Ghweandeanya mida humng'eeda,
Ghaawungaagu eakghambiida.
Sugoochcheandumeadaang'u nung' ghwahidu,
Gidigasayi gagasa eesin,
aba hiji bea ng'eanyidean gawuurji gissisinniida aba hoowa bea humng'edean.
Goaneasa Askweareeni daghwardeanya;
Samseasa siileenigaasa,
gawuurji gidasisammisiindi fuga mideawa siileenigaasa.
Adigealleasa jeeda simsimda,
ak gighuhaneasa gitta muyiin.
Aba gideaba iyoosammiisi gidinyeannyeekka buuneeda, eara Ghweandeang'wa mida humng'eeda gaygwasamseegwa agooga;
ama moosammisiini gidinyeannyeekka bunneeda, eara Ghweandeang'wa maygwasamseegwa gidinyeannyeekkeagwa.”

“Gichcha iyoolluuldi geat, ea adoowuurjeewi fuga ammittu geat, saawa iissa gookkaroomnyi gheamamuunatka nyaawa ghoahiimu geat ghwadaa buuneeda gideaba niluudi geaw. Aba gideaba geayeeshshineegwa suuh ninyas giimearda nyaawa.
Asi iluuldi geaw, giyeashi uhuudaang'u ak gihuuni gheamamdaang'u,
amwanala buuneeda gideaba giluuldi geaw ak ghwanal Ghweandaang'u mida makcheameeda. Abeeda Ghweandaang'u ammu ghwadaa makcheameeda gayghoamwaarnyi.”
“Adootiiwsi gheaseedeang'wa badayda ng'eannyida ammu ghwaak muguyga ea girgweatka nea ghapka mareanghooga ak gwanyarja ak gwajagwadiin,
asi ootiiwa gheaseedeang'wa aba humng'eeda heeda mwoammu ghwaak muguyga ea girgweatka, ghana gwanyarja mareanghooga ak gwajagwat.
Aba gideaba heeda mida gheaseadaang'u heeda jea gwanda guroroadaang'u.”
“Gheabong'nyeanda saseeda gheang'da gil. Ama majeek gheang'daang'u, abeeda eara saseadaang'u sean gajea eesh;
ama miimajeek gheang'daang'u, abeeda eara saseadaang'u sean gaygwanda jeeda misaneeda. Abeeda weeshindida mida jeadang'uun imisana, ada misaneani gajea mii misaneeda!”

“Manda siida ammu gagadiyeesa fiisu hees iyyeenya. Aba gideaba gayghwasit agi nea ghabwariiy niirja, ghana ghoang'ngwaay geat sea nii ak gafool niirja. Majoammuusa agadiyesiina Aseetta ea baruureega.”

“Aba sareani geayeeshshineegwa, adoodeawiissi eaweegeagwa, aba gichchea ayaaga ghana gichchea aleaha, ghana gichchea ookwealsiina sasanuukeagwa. Heappi eaweega mwang'ala hamitta, nea saseeda amwang'ala hangweakka?
Ang'ulla dariidakka mida humng'eeda: mahissiida nea malachcha booga gabiissa ea meaweamsiina gijigoonga, eara saawa ghoarear Ghweandeang'wa mida humng'eeda. Heappi agooga! Moang'ali saawa?
Ng'eaha gil aba jeedeang'wa ammu goodeawiit geaw ak ghoahaat geawundaannyi eara ea geattinagi gil?
Ama hang'weakka ghoanung' goodeawideegwa nea naha? Oopkaada deakghweeda mida dareabeetta, gida heettiiideayda; ea masinna gadiyeeda nea mamanmanna;
ak geayeeshshineegwa, eara Sulemaani aba jeeda miyeenoadaannyi sean miyeekwa muuchchi ea gawuurji deakghweanagi aba jeedeaba suh.
Asi iinung' Aseetta gookwealsheattunu nyeega mida dareabeetta, mida askwareani ammuchchu ea niyaak beasta, heappi maygookwealshooweegwa muuchchi agooga ea fuga mwanang' masawi?.
Asi adoodeawiichchi nea gooyeennyi, ‘Gajeayaaga naaha?’ ghana ‘Gajealeaha naaha?’ ghana ‘Gajeekkweala naha?’
Aba gideaba haleanjeeni gagaseadayi fuga emoojiga; aba gideaba Ghweandeang'wa bea humng'eeda ghwanal gideaba googasayi suuseaniin.
Anyoo ghannyi oshsheeda agassa sugoochcheandumeadaannyi ea doobiiwnattaannyi, ak abeeda gajeehheaneegwa haleanjeeni seaniin gajea geagwa.
Asi adoodeawiissi ng'asheegeaba numuji, aba gideaba numuji gaygwadeawiissa geaw. Giliwas eaweechcha ghoahiit deawiitmeadaannyi.”
“Adoorgweakkiisi buuneeda gajiiduw eara agooga geergweakseegwa.
Aba gideaba gidoorgweakkisiindi buuneeda, abeeda gajeergweaksiinduneegwa agooga, ak gidoottenniidi agooga eara agooga gajeetteeneegwa.
Anda ak ging'weersi hararooyeanda mida gheang'da oorjeeda geamadu, nea ming'weersiini geetta mida gheang'daang'u ang'iing'i?
Ghana gajammusa eshshiindaan oorjeeda geamadu, ‘Nung'u dageanu hararooyeanda mida ghang'daang'u,’ nea ghana gwanda jeeda gheang'daang'u ang'iing'i geetta?
Ea siida ammiittu geaw, nyoo ghannyi asheeda geanda geetta mida jeeda gheang'daang'u, ak abeeda gajammuusa geanni hararooyeanda mida gheang'da oorjeeda geamadu.
Adoattawji gudajeega haleanjeeda ghaydidi, ghana ahisana ukkurumajeega booshkeagwa ak ghwadattas, gajiiduw gwayamseegwa geat ak ghwageagwa.”
“Amusa, ak gajeegooneegwa, agassa ak gajanyasa, aguurdeawana dooshta ak gajeejeasseegwa.
Aba gideaba siida nyoo gamusiischi gajeattaw, ama siida gasiischi gayghwanyas, nea siida guurdeawa dooshta gajeejeassa.
Heappi gajea ng'eaha aba jeedeang'wa, jea gamus balleandaannyi mukkatte, ak ghwoadaw lagheaneeda?
Ghana iimus ghweayeanda, jea ghwoadaw ichchibooda?
Abeeda iyoanalli agoogeeda munyas gideaba gajoattawa diibigeagwa haleanjeeda miyaas, ea mayghwaraanya muuchchi Ghweandeang'wa mida humng'eeda ak ghoadaw gea miyaas fukka ikkaaschi musiini!
Haleanjeeda sean ogasayi gideaba gaygwasinneegwa buuneeda, eara agooga asissiina saawa, aba gideaba nii ng'asheanda was deaweeda ea sibanga.”
“Aweayeena ghoah nea goosku gidaghuutta mwariis; aba gideaba gidaghuut aabwara nea naweeda aabwara dea jea gahutteawweegwa ak asaang'a fuga jea gwasik gidaghudeani.
Gidaghuut amwariis nea naweeda amwariis dea jea gagal ghuhooda, ak gajea ng'ay fuga jea ghwadaah.”
“Ashageada sibanga ng'uyyeega fuga iissa ghapka heedeang'wa nea niikwa eagweega gisilga, nea aba jih ea suyeekka ng'weani.
Gajanala aba haghweega nyaawa. Buuneeda ghoammu gabinna haghweega sabiibu geetta halaghweenga ghana haghweega shaboogheechcheanda heeda ng'eamga?”
“Gwasunu eara geetta miy gwajiila haghweega miyaas, nea geetta muy gwajiila haghweega munyas.
Geetta miy mwoammu gwaji haghweega munyas, nea geetta muy amwoammu gwaji haghweega miyaas.
Gili nyoo ea geetta iimaji haghweega miyaas gajealach ak geejaksa jeeda beasta.
Asi gajanalana haghweega nyaawa.”
“Mii giliwas sih ennisean, ‘Ng'uttamiida, Ng'uttamiida,’ jea gawa jeeda sugoochcheandumeeda humng'eeda, geaghus siida sin gidagasa Bwaabwa mida humng'eeda.

Eaweettida gaygwayeeshshinean fuga saang'a; ‘Ng'uttamiida, Ng'uttamiida, miyearamoorana aba ghawungaagu, nea aba ghawungaagu geerruutti meangeenda, ak geesinnyi haleanjeeda saang'a deamdeameadi aba ghawungaagu?’
Abeeda gaydayeeshsha saawa, ‘Aniini moang'wa danaleagwa eara hay, ang'amwana heedeanyu, agoogeeda sina ng'asheega munyas.’
“Asi siida wassean nyoo ghwayiiy ng'asheegeasu ak gwasin, gajeegala weaghoochcheanda fughareeda, deeksa gheannyi uhuuda harearacheanda;
Ghwaroabwan roopta, ak ghwahidu guldeayda, ghwahidu jeammeda ak ghwalas gheedida, ak ea mwoabeada, aba gideaba sindeettannyi geedeeksa uhuuda harearachcheanda.
Ama siida was sean iiy ng'asheesu ikkeasuun ak ea masna, gajeegala siida dasha, ghayi deeksa gheannyi uhuuda iseaskweanda;
ghwaroabwan, ak ghwahidu guldeayda, ghwahidu jeammeeda ak ghwalas gheedida, ak ghoabeada; ak gibeedeaydaannyi aahaw.”
Iiduw nea nihiit Yeesu ng'asheesu, ghahamng'eanyi emeeda aba ginealshoadannyi,
aba gideaba goonealsheatta siida mideawa gheambalmeeda, nea mawuurji eara ng'oorshoodiga nyaawa.
Iiduw nea ghwararang'aana giijeeda, ghwaat geeshta emeetuw;
hean ghwahidu siida bearji udamusuura ak gwatkuyi aba madeadaannyi ak gwayeeshsha, “Ng'uttamiida iigasayi gimmuusi amminnaan.”
Ghoahakta geadi ak ghawaasa nea gwayeeshsha, “Geagasayi; miinni.” Deagheatta ghahaabwa udamusuura.

“Adaaha, adiiduw giruksi sih gil; ng'eada una, ak gihimsi geaw ashoohoochcheanda, ak giidaydi haleanjeeda sisappa geadi bea ghadoweeda gawuurji gida ghayi rukuteayda Muusa, ak abeeda ghwanal buuneeda.”
Iimuchchu nea gawa Yeesu jeeda mujiineeda Gapernaumu, gawa headaannyi shirikkarajeanda haw bea Ruumi,
ak gamearmearani nea gwayeeshsha, “Ng'uttamiida soomjeandeanyu gwalil aba ghoah goobittu damealga nea gwasawana muuchchi.”
Gwayeeshsha niny, “Gaydoan dahaap.”
Gwayeeshsha shirikkarajeandida hawiin, “Ng'uttamiida aniini mammisean gideaba gaynyuunyi jeedeaba gheenyu; ang'iing'i rukuni ng'asheanda akghwahit, ak gayghahaap soomjeandeanyu.

Aba gideaba eara aniini geewoschi siida ghayi mida hing'eadayda gheambalmeeda, mida hing'eadaydeanyu shirikkara, ama eayeeshshi nii, ‘Una,’ gawa, ghana nii ‘Beenni,’ ghwaan, ak eara soomjeandeanyu iyeayeeshshi ‘Sina gili,’ gwasin.”
Iiy Yeesu ng'asheesu, ghahamng'eanyi ak gwayeeshsha fukwachchi aat geeshta, “Aba huumwa geayeeshshineegwa, miidadaah aba jeeda ng'eanyiida Israeeli siida mideawa masaweega uurji nih.

Asi geayeeshshineegwa, gayghapka fuga saang'a jea gwaleabu heeda ghayeawa ea heeda biyeara ak gaygoobiitpiit ak gweagiischi sea Abrahaamu, ea Isakka, ea Yakkobo aba jeeda sugoochcheandumeeda humng'eeda,
amaduw balloojiga sugoochcheandumeeda gajeehisa jeeda misaneeda jarooda; heeda jeagwanda shookka ea giwirrooda geeshatka.”
Ng'atta gwayeeshsha Yeesu shirikkarajeandida hawin, “Una; ak gagasa ghoaw gitta imwasiin.” Ghahaap soomjeandaannyi bea gadiyeeda aba damandida.
Iiduw nea gawa Yeesu jeeda gheeh Betro, ghwadaa gheamatta agweaji Betro nea gwalil aba badayda bulaliida nea gabearji sheagheeda;
ghawaasa Yeesu geattindaannyi, ak goosha sheagheeda, ak ghang'eat gagadiyeesa.
Iiduw nea niiw shing'ada geeyeassa fuga saang'a bearji meangeenda; gooruutta meangeenda aba ng'asheanda, ak ghoahaap buuneessean miyeani.
Nii abeeda gayghoahiit ng'asheanda ghayi rugu sibaneeda suguura Isaaya nea gwayi, “Ghwasar niny munyasnachcheakkaasa ak gageanda miyeannyeakkaasa.”
Hean ghwadaa Yeesu emeetuw nea gwaneaweesa, ghwanung' ghoaghaaw ginealanga.
Gaweesa Ng'orshoochcheanjagi ak gwayeeshsha, “Ginealshoochcheanda, gaydeadu geashtaang'u heechea una sean.”
Gwayeeshsha Yeesu, “Fureayoonga gwandeawa shoomeanga, dariidakka gwandeawa ghoorajeega; nea Balleanda Siida ea mandeawana heechea ghwayiin uhuudannyi.”
Gwayeeshsha nuut aba jeeda giinealangaaschi, “Ng'uttamiida, goonean beatta ghannyi dawa dabuy Bwaabwa.”
Ak gwayeeshsha Yeesu, “Eanni geeshteanyu, nung'waada fuga nimeewa gabuy muscheekka nyaawa.”
Hean nea gwading'da maleambooda gamaseaw giinealangaaschi.
Deagheatta, ghwahidu siilakghta ng'waan bea basooda, ak gooyuuk maleambooda laweajajeega; nea abeeda gwalil.
Gaweay heeda giinealangaaschi ak ghwaheat nea geeyeeshsha, “Ng'uttamiida laalneasa sishsheali.”
Gwayeeshsha Yeesu, “Anda nung'udeagwa muuwda, Ea fuga mwanang' masawi.” Ghang'eat ak gwareekusa jeammeeda ea basooda ak ghahawuda basooda ea gwayi saw.
Ghahamng'eanyi buuneeda nea gwayi, “Siisi siidurjiini, awal gheang'da basooda ea jeammeedean?”

Iiduw nea nuwa gigheawda mida ng'eanyiida Gadarene gwaroonnyi fii iyyeenya bearji meangeenda, nea gwaleabu heeda subunnyiisa buuneeda. Fiisu abeeda ea ng'weani ea eeyi bwak ea ghoawal buuneeda sigoodeaba naweetta.
Ng'ulla Goojuur nea gwayeena, “Geendeayeesi naaha sea ang'iing'i, Ea Balleanda Aseetta? Guwuni sawaneasa nea miighwahidu damandeanya?”
Abeeda gwanda hawannyeanda ukkurmajeega nea sheagi nea ghoajeada.
Gamus meangiga bea endean nea gwayeeshsha, “Iiruuttaneasa ginung'waadi eeweaya eappitta jeedeaba hawandida bea ukkurmajeegean.”
Gwayeeshsha, “Aweayeena;” Gwaritteawa fukka. Gaweay ak ghoabitta jeeda ukkurmajeega; ak ghoabuuttaawa geat rakghraghooneeda ak gwajaksa geat basooda ak goosha sean.
Ghwahal geat haghweadoodiga ak gaweay mujiini ak ghoadaarda iitteaba ng'asheesu seaniin sea iitteaba fukka bearji meangeendean.
Hean gaweay Buneassean bea mujiineetteani roonyeeda Yeesu, geeyi bwak amadaah geemus gideaba ng'amwana ng'eanyiideanya.
Gwading'da maleambooda ak ghoaghawa basooda ak ghwahitta mujiineeda nyaawa.

Hean geeyeassa siida abittu damealga nea geeyeanna badayda bulaliida, hean daa Yeesu masaweega nyaawa, gwayeeshsha siitta abittu damealgean, “Nung' gahoosan guroroodaang'u Balleandeanyu; sisamsa riing'eegaagu.”
Hean gwayi ng'oorshoodiga mwaatkwa aba jeesinga nyaawa, “Siisi goong'eawi Aseetta.”
Gwajeeng'u Yeesu gidabaloolda saawa aba jeesinga nyaawa, ak gwayeeshsha, “Ghwasaan anda goobalooli ng'asheega munyas aba jeesingeagwa?
Awussus anneeda gideaba geeyi, ‘Sisamseey riing'eegaagu,’ ghana eeyi, ‘Ng'eada ak guwi?’

Geagasayi anala gideaba, Balleanda Siida gwandeawa gheambalmeeda aba badayda ng'eanyiida jea gwasamsiina ring'eega;” ak gwayeeshsha siitta abittu damealgean, “Ng'eada, sareana muundaang'u ak guwi ghoah.”
Ghang'eat siidida ak gawa gheannyi.
Daa emeeda siidida ghang'ut muuwda ak ghoaghaambiit Aseetta ghayi adaw buuneeda gheambalmeeda sunuun.
Damanda ng'attaawa Yeesu aba hoowa ghwadaa siisi suguura Mattayo nea gwanda jeeda ghoriida sing'ng'oonnya gwaadi; gwayeeshsha, “Eanni geeshteanyu.” Ghang'eat ak ghwaat geeshta.
Iiduw nea goopteada aba ghoah damanda agiischooda, deagheatta ghwahidu Fuga saang'a ang'ng'oonyi gwaadi, ea fuga riing'eega ama hidu goobiitpiit sea Yeesu ea ginealshoodigaaschi.
Daa Farisayajeega, gwayeeshsha giinealangaaschi, “Anda giinealshoochcheandeang'wa goombuuchchi fuga ang'ng'oonyi gwaadi ea fuga riing'eega?”
Iiy niny gwayeeshsha, “Fuga majeekcheewi magaseadayyi bwanamwaganga, geaghus fuga miyeani.

Asi aweayeena ak ghoanaali geat ng'asheesu, ‘Geagasayi baydeayda nea mii haleanjeeda sisappa geadi bea ghadoweeda.’ Aba gideaba mwaawuni daguursa fuga doobiiweadi, ghawunnyi daguursa gea mideawa riing'eega.”
Hean gaweay heeda Yeesu Giinealanga Yohaana ak gwayeeshsha, “Ghwasaan anda aseasa ea Farisaayajeega geeradayi jalooda, nea giinealangaagu ea maratta jalooda?”

Ghwasha Yeesu nea gwayeeshsha, “Fuga suguursa nyeangiida ghoammu gaguuttu heareega nea gwandeawa siida geeshi? Gwanda askwearjoojiga jea ghwahidu jea egeandeawa siida geeshshi jeennyaawa, aba damani gayghwarat jalooda.
Manda siida jea ghawaasa weasteesh hang'da waas. Aba gideaba weasteesh gayghabwaash hang'dida waasiin ak abeeda gayghoahaada seawadeeda.

Eara buuneeda mayiinna difaayeeda miighwaheas jeeda ghadeatka woosi; iisihindunu gaygwanyara ghadeatka, ak gaweay difaayeeda, ak gameewa ghadeatka; buuneeda gwayiina difaayeeda miighwaheas jeeda ghadeatka eashish ak gabaseayu sean.”

Damandida rukuna ng'asheesuun, ghwahidu siisi haw bea emeeda Yahuudi ak gwatkuyi aba madeadaannyi ak gwayeeshsha, “Nimi hudeanyu ghamneawa. Beenni eweaya iina geattindaagu uhuudaannyi ak gaygwaduudu.”
Ghang'eat Yeesu ea giinealangaaschi ak ghwaat geeshta.
Ng'atta ghwaan Gatmoonagi beardooschi miyeanda areami foojeanda gweannyeew damaniiyyeenya gweadu geeshta ak ghawaasa weeleeda hang'daannyi;
aba gideaba gwayi aba jeadaannyi, “Iyaawaaschi weeleeda hang'daannyi gaydahaap.”
Ghwasach ghaat Yeesu ak ghwadaa ak gwayeeshsha, “Hudeanyu hoosana nihapnyi masaweega imwaschaan.” Ghahaap gatmoodida aba damandida.
Ng'atta gawa Yeesu jeedeaba gheetta bea sugoochcheandean. Hean ghwadaa emeeda saang'a mida gea ayyeawda nea gaguttu heareega,
gwayeeshsha, “Ang'amwana hiji, aba gideaba huda miighami gabeachchi ruweanga.” Geebarra rear.
Iiduw nea siing'ng'aamwa buuneeda hoowa, gawa Yeesu jeeda ghoriida ak ghoang'ng'waay geattinda huda ama ng'atta ghang'eat.
Gageawiit iitteaba ng'asheanji aba jeedeaba ng'eanyiitta seaniin.
Ghabeawa Yeesu hoowa nea damandida beawaan, ghwaat geeshta fii iyyeenya ng'oawwi, nea goojuur nea gwayeeshsha, “Balleanda Dawdi eaniyean bwaydaneasa.”
Weah Yeesu jeeda gheeda gamaseaw fugiga assiyyeenya ng'oawwin ak ghoanyash gideaba “Ghoamwaschi gideaba ghammuuschi dahabeagwa?” Ghwasha saawa nea gwayeeshsha, “Geamwaschi Ng'uttamiida.”
Hean ghawaas gheanyanga nyaawa nea gwayeeshsha, “Aba gitteenna masaweegeagwa gagasa anyasa.”
Ghwajaada gheanyanga nyaawa. Ama ng'atta gwareekusa Yeesu nea ghoang'waniit, nea gwayeeshsha “Adiiduw goorukwsi eara sih ng'asheanji.”
Ghang'eatng'eat Saawa gaweay ak ghoabwaash iitta Yeesu fugeaba ng'eanyiitta seaniin.
Ak gwayeeshsha, “Aweayeena” Hean gwaritteaysa ak gaweay jeeda ukkurmajeega.
Hean siirruutta meangeenda gabalool siidida. Ghaham ng'eanyi eemeeda nea gwayi, “Ng'asheanda sunu miyeadaaha aba jeeda ng'eanyiida Israeeli.”
Nea Farisayajeega saawa gwayeena, “Gooruutta meangeenda aba uurda dea haweewa meangeenda.”

Gwaneayeewa Yeesu jeeda mujiinajeega sean ea gharang'weakka nea goonealshi aba jeesinga ghoorajeega nyaawa siinnealshachcheewa ikkaanyaawa nea gwarukkwiida Giijasta miy bea sugoochcheandumeeda, nea ghoahaap geeyoonung'weakka sean ea gili nyoo ea sawanadeeda.
Hean daa emeetuw nea gabadageat ghabwayda aba jeedaannyi aba gideaba ghwadaa gwatemban gawuurji gisilga nyaah jeagischoochchean.
Ghwalamda ak gwayeeshsha giinealangaaschi, “Booga asaang'a, ak eang'ay fuga gadiyeeda;
asi amwoasha Ng'uttamiida bea booga goojeagu fuga gadiyeeda ghapka ghwalachchi boagaaschi.”
Gaguursa giinealangaaschi attamaniyyeenya, ak ghoadaw gheambalmeeda jea gooruutteawa meangeenda munyas nea ghoahaap geeyoonung'weakka ea sawanaduutka sean.
Gheawungeaba giijasoodusu attamaniyyeenyean ea suhu, dea madeeda Simoneeda suguura Betrohi ea oorjeeda ghaamwat suguura Andereya, ea Yakkobo balleanda Sebedaayo ea Yohaana oorjeeda ghaamwat.
Filippo ea Bartolomaayo, Domaso ea Mattayooyda ghayi ang'ng'oonyi gwaadi, ea Yakkobo balleanda Alfaayo, ea Dadaayo.
Simoneeda Ganaani ea Yudaayda Iskariyootte ghayi laabwadaw Yeesu.
Goojeakta Yeesu giijasoodigiga attamaniyyeenyean ak ghoadaw giijasta nea gwayeeshsha, “Adooweeyi jeeda daroorakka Emoojiga, ghana jeeda mujiineeda wassean bea Samariya.
Ghang'wana ghoang'ng'waanyi naweeda aweayeena heeda gisilga roodeadi bea Israeeli.
Aba jeeda neayeedeang'wa arukkwiida gideaba, ‘Sugoochcheandumeeda humng'eeda nineekkiit.’
Oahaabwa fuga miyeani, ak goottuudu fuga nimeewa, nea ghoammidu fuga bearji udamusuura, nea goorruutti meangeenda. Geegooneegwa mwadaagha, oattayda mwadaagha.
Adoayadi jeesinga shageenigeawa lappiya ghana lagheanga meeng'meeng'i sisinna lappiya wassean, ghana heelajeega,
ghana shageeda naweeda, ghana hang'deaba iyyeenya, ghana geekka ghana bileang'ida. Aba gideaba siida gadiyeeda gammiisa nyasitta daghwardaannyi.
Iyoweayi jeeda mujiineeda wassean ghana gharang'da, googasayi siida deaptaneagwa biissa adoabiiwaat ak gooppiidi gheannyi ea abeawana hoowa.
Iyooweayi jeeda gheeda gookkeachcheewi fuga bea gheeda.
Nea gheetta iimiisa hoyyooydeang'wa, abeeda danyasa hooyyooydeang'wa. Ama deappa ea mammisiina abeeda hooyyooydeang'wa gaygabiikseegwa agooga.
Nea siida iimwadeataneegwa ghana ghaheawa gooleeysiit ng'asheegeagwa, iyooritteawi gheetta ghana mujiineedida, ghoalalakti birjeanda mida geeshangeagwa.
Aba huumwa geayeeshsheegwa eaweetta girgweaksiinda gajeawussus ng'eanyiida Sodooma ea Gomoora gamilikghteaysa ghorjooda eaweetta girgweaksiinda ea ghang'al mujiineetta.”
“Asi Aniini geajeakteaydaneegwa gisilga jeeda suyeekka; asi andeawana weaghumeeda ea awuurjeewana ichchibooda, nea goong'eeniitti ghariibajeanda.
Ashageada Buuneeda aba gideaba gayghwaadeagwa gheeda siirgweachcha nea ghabwareagwa aba jeesinga gealga nyaawa siinnealshachcheewa.
Gajeayadeagwa madeeda sugoodiga ea dea fuga ahaaghwa ng'eanyiida appadaydeanyu, ak goomuwiisi Giijasta miy saawa ea fuga Emoojiga.
Asi isiyaadeagwa adootteemsheesi gichchea arukuta aba gideaba damandida gajeegooneegwa gichchea arukuta.
Aba gideaba mii agooga gil fuga jea gabalool, gaygabalool Gurorooda Ghweandeang'wa aba jeesingeagwa.
Siida gayghwalabadaw oorjeeda ghaamwat enuus, ak ghwalabadaw ghweanda jeaptaannyi, nea gwayamsa geat diibiga ghweaniga nyaawa ea gheamadiga nyaawa ak ghabwar gameewa.
Nea gayghwasteagwa buuneassean aba gheawungeasu. Nea siichchea ghamilikghta ea gammudean abeeda ea siichea eelealu.
Ighabwaseagwa buuneeda aba mujiineani, goomng'awsi mujiineannuut. Aba huumwa geayeeshshineegwa majaduulni mujiinajeega ng'eanyiida Israeeli nea miighwahidu Balleanda Siida.
Giinealaneeda mwoammu ghang'al giinealshoochchaandaannyi; nea eara soomjeanda ea mwoammu ghang'al siida haw adaw gadiyeeda.

Ghwahit iwuurji giinealaneeda sea giinealshoochcheandaannyi, ak gawuurji somjeanda sea siidaannyi haw bea gadiyeeda. Abeeda iisuguura siida bea gheeda Beelsebuuli, heappi abeeda ea maygwasissa ng'asheega munyas muuchchi fuga mida jeedeaba gheannyi.”
“Asi adoawwalli saawa aba gideaba ng'asheanda funyaat gajeajaat, nea gitta funyaadiin gajeattahaach.
Ng'asheanda earukuneegwa aba jeeda misaneeda, oorukuta aba eeshpwara; nea ng'asheanda oayiinyi meang'shooda, arukkwiida aba uhuuda gheeda.
Adoawwalli fuga ammu gwanuus saseeda ak amwoammu gwanuus gurorooda; ghang'wana giiwali siitta ammu gwanuus saseeda ak gwajaksa gurorooda jeeda maloonghajeega.
Heappi udabwaraadaji iyyeenya meesheahhideawana heelajeanjagi? Eara akkalealla mwoammu goobissa ng'eanyi nea mwamwasa Ghweandeang'wa.
Nea agooga eara buudeega iheengeagwa ea siyiida sean.
Adoabealli, agooga; ghoang'alli udabwaraadajeega saang'a.”
Siida mwasan aba madeeda buuneeda, abeeda earanini gaydamwas niny aba madeeda Bwaabwa mida humng'eeda;
nea siida wassean jea ghaheawanaan aba madeeda buuneeda, eara aniini gaydaheawa niny aba madeeda Bwaabwa mida humng'eeda.
“Adiiduw ghoaghannyi gili eayeadu hoyyoo jeeda ng'eanyiida; meayeanni hoyyoo geayeadu ng'uchcheeda.
Aba gideaba ghawunnyi deang'uuchchi siida ea ghwaan, ea huda ea ghaamwat, ea gatmooda ea ghamasiyeeda;
weajoodiga siida fuga gheannyaawa.
Siida bwariiy ghwaan ea ghaamwat ea ghwalabwanaan hoowa siisi mammisean; siida bwariiy balleanda ghana huda ea ghwalabwanaana hoowa, siisi mammisean;
nea dea mwasara behiidannyi ak gweada geeshteanyu ea mammisean.
Siida agaba aweagaaschi gaygahutteawi, nea siida hutteawi aweagaschi appadaydeanyu gaygwalealu.”
“Siida deaptaneegwa ghwadeaptanaan aniini, nea siida deaptanaan, ghwadeapta siida ghayi ajeaknean.
Siitteapta sibaneeda aba gideaba sibaneeda gil, gayghwanyas giimearda sibaneeda. Dea deapta siida doabiiwaat aba gideaba ea doabiiwaat eara niny gayghwanyas giimearda doobiiwnatta.
Siida wassean jea ghoadaw siiyagi aba jeedeaba fiisu manang'iin beega garbappi aba gideaba giinealaneeda, aba huumwa geayeeshshineegwa eara niny mayghwaroat giimeardaannyi.”
Iing'atta gidawda adadaw Yeesu giinealangaaschi attamaniyyeenya iittaannyi, ghabeawa hoowa ak gawa goonealshi aba jeeda mujiinajeega nyaawa nea gwarukkwiida Giijasta miy.
Iiduw nea ghwayiiy Yohaaneeda Abaattiisachchi iitta gissina Yeesu nea gwanda ghealooniga, hean goojeakta giinealangaaschi ghoanyaash
nea gwayeeshsha, “Assang'iingi guwosi siida ghayi jea ghwahidu ghana jea eefurda nuut?”
Ghwasha Yeesu ak gwayeeshsha saawa, “Aweayeena ak goorukusi Yohaana iitta ng'asheega oayiinyi ea gea oadaayi:
fuga ng'oawwi ghoang'wearda, fuga badeeda gaweelweel, gea bearji udamusuura geammidu, gea miinyi gwayiing'shi, fuga meewa gwaduuttu nea fuga barbari geerukusa Giijasta Miy.
Nea ghang'wana siida mwasta gil appadaydeanyu.”
Ngeatng'eat gabiikta, gwarukusa Yeesu emeeda ghwanyawa badageat iitta Yohaana, “Gooweayi adaaha naaha aba dareapcheeda? Nyeeshtooda ayuuk jeammeeda?
Abeeda gooweayi adaaha naaha? Siida akkwa hang'weakka oormajeega? Ng'ulla fuga akkweali hang'weakka oormajeega goobiitta gealga sugoodiga.
Abeeda ghwasaan andagooritti? Gooweayi adaaha naaha? Sibaneeda? Eah, geayeeshshiineegwa eara daahaweewa sibaneeda.
Nii siida sung'oorsa ng'asheesuun gil,
‘Ng'ulla aniini geajeagu giijasoochcheandeanyu
madeeda gheanyangaang'u,
jea gwasinneey naweadang'u aba madeadaang'u.’

Aba huumwa geayeeshshineegwa, manda siida wassean aba gea jii gadeemga dea haweewa Yohaaneeda Abattiisachchi eara siitta siyi amwanang'eawa sean aba jeeda sugoochcheandumeeda humng'eedean ahaweewa niny.
Ghang'eada askwearjoojiga Yohaaneeda Abattiisachchi ea gagul ghamneawa sugoochcheandumeeda humng'eeda subwasay, nea fuga bwasay gageanda aba uurda.
Aba gideaba ghang'eada sibanga ea deaweeda gwaramoorani eaghwahitta damanda Yohaana;
nea iyoagasayi amwasa niny ea Eliyayda jea ghwaani.
Siida mideawa iidiga ea dayiing'shi!
Asi gaydagala naaha seaygeani? Gawuurji diibiga mida naada, guuriisa suurja nea gwayeenniisa,
‘Geang'waschi, ak ea mwoang'wasi; geeyyeawdi, ak ea mooyyeawdani.’
Aba gideaba ghwahidu Yohaana ak ea meagiischi nea mwali gil, ak gwayi, ‘Gwandeawa meangeenda;’

ghwahidu Balleanda Siida ak gweagiischi nea gwaleeshi, ak gwayi, ‘Ng'ulla, nii aadeaw nea boogideati, nea gwaduupchi fuga ang'ng'oonyi gwaadi ea fuga riing'eega!’ Amaduw weaghumeeda ea nidaajiit aba sinaweagaaschi.”
Iimuchchu goojuursa mujiinajeegiga ghayi sissa niny ng'asheega deamdeameadi ak ea madukkuunana riing'eega nyawaan.

“Eamuy deang'wa Gurasiini! Eamuy deang'wa Betsayda! Aba gideaba ng'asheakka ghayi deamdeameadi sisissa jeadeang'wean, inyeada ghayi geasissa mujiineada Diro ea Sidooni, gajeenigeawiit gwadukkuuna ng'asheaga munyas ak ghwayeashta deareada nea gookkwa guniyajeaga.
Asi geayeeshshineagwa, gajeawussus gideaba gayghamilikghta ghoorjooda nyaawa Diro ea Sidooni ea ghwalaabwaneegwa hoowa.

Eara angiing'i Gapernaumu, gajeettiing'neey ea gula humng'eeda? Gajeahing'neayi ea una jeeda maloonghajeega. Aba gideaba inyeada ghayi ng'asheaga deamdeameadi sisin aba ng'eang'deang'wa geesissa mujiineeda Sodooma, gwachchi mujiineetta gajeagudugwanda ea gagul ghamneawa.
Ak gaydayeeshshineegwa, eaweetta girgweaksinda gaynyasa ang'iing'i ghorjooda haw adaraam dea Sodooma.”

Aba damandida gwayi Yeesu, “Geabadiischoweey ea Bwaabwa was Ng'uttamiida humng'eeda ea ng'eanyiida, aba gideaba gufnyi ng'asheesu fuga weaghoodi ea fuga mideawa fughareenga akkihiimsi diibiga manang'i;
ea Bwaabwa nii gweagu gideaba gidubwariiydi, ang'iing'i gil.
Nugoonan Bwaabwa haleanjeessean. Manda siida nal Balleanda geaghus Ghweanda, ghana siida nal Bwaabwa geaghus Balleanda ghana siida wassean gasa Balleanda goohiimsa.
Apkaani heedeanyu oagasean agoogeeda deawiit nea ghabwanyeagwa sareenda, ak gaydeafuufeegwa.
Aghasana geat jookkeedeanyu, ak ghoanalanaan ng'asheega; aba gideaba aniini geewoschi ng'eeni nea geayeadayi geaw ng'eanyi aba guroroodeanyu, ak abeeda gajanyasa hoseaneega aba jeesingeagwa.”
“Aba gideaba jookkeedeanyu ea bumbun nea sareendeanyu aassas!”
Damandida gwasik Yeesu jeeda madameega eaweetta sabatto. Iiduw ghwayeachchi giinealangaaschi, ak gwahirjeaweada muschoonga ak ghwaak.
Daa Farisayajeega gissin giinealanga gwarukusa Yeesu gideaba, “Ang'wearda, giinealangaagu gwasin ng'asheanda mammisiina sinooda eaweetta Sabatto.”
Gwayeeshsha saawa, “Heappi miyoassoamwana gidaghayi sin Dawdi sea fuga mideawa damanda yeada jih:
gidabeada jeeda gheeda Aseetta ak ghwaak mukkatteeyda gihiimnooda, nea mammiisiina gideaba gayghwaak niny ghana fuga mideawa geaghus ghwaak ashoohoodiga?
Ghana miyoassoamwana aba jeeda deaweeda gideaba gili was askwearjeanda sabatto issa ghwadattas ashoohoodiga diineeda Yahuudi deaweeda aba jeeda gheeda sibatta Aseetta ak ea moawa gidinnyeanda?
Asi geayeeshshineegwa hiji gwanda siida haweawa eara gheeda sibatta Aseetta.
Ama inyeeda gajanala iitteaba ng'asheesu, ‘Geagasayi baydeayda mii haleanjeeda sisappa geadi bea ghadooweeda,’ gwachchi majoopparanna fuga manda gidamuy nisin.
Aba gideaba Balleanda Siida niny Ng'uttamiida Sabattohi.”
Ghabeawa hoowa ak gawa jeeda ghoriida nyaawa sinealshachcheewa.
Nea abeeda gwanda hoowa siida aptu geattinda. Geannyaash nea geeyeeshsha, “Ghwahidi gideaba gajeahhaap siida eaweetta Sabatto?” Geannyaash ng'asheanji nea geegasa gichchea eahaaktayda.
Gwayeeshsha saawa, “Aba jeedeang'wa gajea ng'eaha jea gang'adeesa gisillandannyi jeeda shoomanda eaweetta Sabatto jea ea maygwalealu?
Siida ghang'al gisilleanda niba hada! Ada abeeda ghwahit siinooda ng'asheega miyaas eaweeda Sabatto.”
Ng'atta gwayeeshsha siidida, “Adoabiiwa gattindaang'u.” Ghoadoobiiw, ak ghahaap ea gawuurji geattinda niirja.
Iiduw gwaritta Farisayajeega jarooda ak ghwadawdaaw gichchea gwanuusta.
Geeyi bwak ama jeeng'u Yeesu ng'asheanji ghabeawa hoowa. Ghwaat geashta fuga saang'a ak ghoahaap fuga miyeani sean,
ghaheawa nea gwayeeshsha adoorukusi sih iitteanyu.
Abeeda gwasa gida ghayi rugu sibaneeda suguura Isaaya nea gwayi:
“Ng'ulla siideanyu bea gadiyeeda aloachchi,
abwariinyi nea iissa ghwanung'u gahoosan jeedeanyu.
Gaydayiin guroroodeanyu badaydaannyi,
nea gaygwarukkwiida girgweageedeanyu aba jeeda Emoojiga.
Maygwasheang'a ng'asheega ghana goojuuri,
nea eara ghuuttannyi ghanyea majeeyiing'sa naweadinga;
ghanyea maygwahirja muudayeanda ng'arng'ar,
nea eara weasta aroasan ea maygwanuus,
bwak ea eaghus eanisin girgweageeda jea goombaliischi.
Nea gheawungaaschi gayghwarar Emoojiga.”
Hean Geeyeassa siisi ng'oaw bissea manda ghuutta bearji meangeenda; ghoahaap ak ghoang'wearda nea gabalool.
Ghahamng'eanyi Buuneessean nea gwayi, “Siisi mii balleanda Dawdihi?”
Iiy Farisayajeega ng'asheesu gwayi, “Siisi ghahoan meangeenda aba gideaba gwandeawa uurda Belsebuuli, meang'nyeandida bea eenda hawiin.”

Gwajeeng'u gidabaloola saawa aba jeesinga nyaawa ak gwayeeshsha, “Sugoochcheandumeeda wassean iibearshi ea maygamajeegiit, ghana eara mujiini ghana gheeda wassean iidardaawaat, gheawi ea mayghamiinaada.
Shattaani iihoan Shattaani, abeeda gang'uchi geaw. Abeeda sugoochcheandumeadannyi gayghaminadaydaan?
Aniini iyearuutteawi meangeenda uurda Belsebuuli, heappi! Abeeda balloojiigeagwa saawa gooruuttideawa naaha? Aba gideaba saawa fuga jea goorgweakseegwa agooga.
Ama ghamneawa earutteawi meangeenda uurda Gurorooda Aseetta, abeeda ghoanalli gideaba nihidu heedeang'wa Sugoochcheandumeeda Aseetta.
Gayghoammustaan siida gideaba gayghabwasay gheeda siida mideawa uurda ak ghoawreat halanjeadannyi, nea mighannyi gwarada siitta mideawa uurdean? Ak abeeda gayghoammu ghoareat halanjeadannyi.
Siida manda meatkwedeanyu niifuurnean muwuutta, nea siida wassean mabwadana geat sea aniini ghoadaarda.
Aba sareani geayeeshshineegwa, buuneeda gajeesamsa ring'eega nyaawa sean ea ging'weakka nyaawa sean, dukku fuga ang'eawi Gurorooda Ghaydit rukuna badayda ng'asheega munyas mayghwanyas samsiinda.

Amaduw gichcha siida jea gwarukuna ng'asheanda muy badayda Balleanda Siida gajeesamsa, dukku siitta jea gwargu ng'asheanda muy badayda Gurorooda Ghaydidiin, ea majeesamsa aba jeedeaba ng'eanyiini, ghana earaba ng'eanyiitta jea ghwahiiduunu.
“Asna geetta ghammiidu ak ghamiyasiit eara haghweagaaschi, ghana anung'u gamunyiit geetta ak gamunyasiidi eara haghweagaaschi aba gideaba geetta geenalla haghweagaaschi.
Ea dayeega udang'usheega! Gajoammuustaan rukunooda ng'asheega miyaas nea goowoschi munyas? Aba gideaba siida iissa gwargu ng'asheega nyiit guroroadaannyiin.
Siida miy aba jeeda gheaseadaannyi miy iissa gwargu ng'asheega miyaas, nea siida muy aba jeeda gheaseadaannyi muy iissa gwargu ng'asheega munyas.
Asi geayeeshshineegwa, eawetta girgweaksiinda gaygaba siisi rugu ng'asheanda marachchi gil ghayi nyoo ea nurgu;
aba gideaba aba ng'asheagaagu gajeegoonnyi doabiwnatta, ak aba ng'asheegaagu gajeergweakseay.”
Ak gwayeeshsha Ng'oorshoodiga ea Farisayajeega, “Giinealshoochcheanda geegasayi eadaaha gwadeagooda aba headaang'u.”
Ghwasha nea gwayeeshsha, “Seaygeeda munyas biissa gamealuuli ak ea mwajeattaw gwadeagooda; geaghus gwadeagooda ghayi bea sibaneeda suguura Yoona.
Gawuurji gida abiideatta Yoona jeeda ghweayeanda haw eawooji samwagu eawa ea askweari nii gichchea gawuurji Balleanda Siida gaygoobiida jeessigeeda eawooji samwagu eawa ea askweari.

Gayghamiinaada fuga Ninaawi eaweeda girgweaksiinda ak gaygoorgweaksa seaygeani aba gideaba gwandeawa gidinyeanda. Aba gideaba fuga Ninaawi ghayi saawa gwadukkuuna ring'eeda aba ng'asheega rukkwiida Yoona, nea aba hiji gwanda siida haweawa Yoona.

Gayghwahidu gatmooda ahaaghwa Wiilooda Ng'eanyiida Biyeara eaweetta jea eergweaksiina seaygeani, ak gaygoorgweaksa aba gideaba gwandeawa fiisu gidinyeanda. Aba gideaba niny gwasimna deasheagi ak ghwaan gooleeysiit weaghumeeda Sulemaani, nea ging'ulayi gwanda hiji siida haweawa Sulemaani.”
“Meang'nyeandeenda muy iritteawa siida iissa gwaneayeewa ng'eannyiida manda beega, nea gagasa heechchea gafuufa ak amwanyasa.
Amaduw gwayeeshsha geaw, Gaydabiikta gheenyu heetta earinni, biigu ghwahitta nea sippuus ak ea sisissin nea manda jeeda sih.

Ghang'eat gawa ak gweadu meangeenda suuk ispwa, munyas ea ghwalabwa hoowa niny, ak ghapka sean ghamway jeedeaba siisi; amaduw gamunyiit seareedeaba siitta ea ghwalaabwa hoowa dea ghayi bea mwadi. Nii gichchea gawuurji gil aba seaygeeni ghamneawa munyasiin.”
Damanda duu gabaloola sea buuneeda, hea ghwahidu ghaamwat sea oorjooga ghaamwat ak ghaminaada aba gidaghuut nea gagasa goobalool.
Ghwalamda Siyagi ak gwayeeshsha, “Ng'ulla gwanda geamadu ea oorjooga geamadu jarooda ghaminaada nea gagasa goobaloolnyi.”
Ghwasha nea gwayeeshsha siitta adaw iittean, “Iyya ng'eaha, ama oorjooga giyeanya geabeang'a?”
Ng'atta ghamiin giinealangaaschi nea gwayeeshsha, “Ng'ulla iyya ea oorjooga giyyeanya!
Aba gideaba siida wassean nyoo gwasin gitta bwariiy Bwaabwa mida humng'eedean, siisi abeeda oorjeeda giyyeanya gil, ea huda giyyeanya, ea iyya.”
Eaweettida gwaritteawa Yeesu ghoaha ak gawa goobideada aba ghuutta basooda.
Gabassa geat emeetuw, ak geey bwak ea gwading'da maleambooda; ak goobideada nea ghaminaada emeeda aba ghuutta basooda.
Gwarukusa buuneeda ng'asheega saang'a nea gagalla geat nea gwayeeshsha, “Ghayi gawa sih histeada.
Damani histeawean gwanda gea abitpissa jeennaweeda, ghwahidu dariidakka ak ghwaak.
Suurja goobitpissa badahuukka harearatka, heeda manda sigeeda saang'a, deagheatta gwardu iiduw ea manda sigeeda ang'ng'waay hawunga,
iiduw nea gwadagu daknooda ghoaseal beasta daknooda; ak ghwasis aba gideaba manda hawunga.
Suuk goobitpissa jeeda halaghweenga, rudu halaghweenga ghaminghis.
Suuk goobitpissa heeda mida sigeeda miyaas, gwardu ak gwaji akkalealla bughala, gwaji niirja laadam, gwaji niirja diktam ea damanamughuush.
Siida mideawa iidiga, ea dayiing'shi.”
Ghapka headaannyi Giinealanga ak gwayeeshsha, “Ghwasaan andagibalooli saawa nea gigalli geat ng'asheega?”
Ghwasha nea gwayeeshsha saawa, “Agooga sugooneegwa nalooda makcheameeda sugoochcheandumeeda humng'eeda, nea saawa ea miyeattaw.
Aba gideaba siida wassean mideawa gil gajeeheassa ea ghwanaawda, nea siitta mandeawana giliin, eara giitta mideawean gajearreat.
Nii gideabaysiini gibaloolda nyaawa nea geagalli geat ng'asheegeani, aba gideaba saawa iyang'wearda ea mwadaaha, ghoaleaydiit ak amwayiinya nea mwanala.
Aba heannyaawa gwasa ng'asheanda rugu sibaneeda siyi Isaaya nea gwayi:
‘Iing'da gajayiinya, ak ea mwajanala,
ging'weerdeayda gajoang'ng'wearda, ak ea mwajadaaha.
Aba gideaba guroruunatkeaba fiisu nidurmaniidi,
nea iidiga nyaawa ea mayiingshi muuchchi,
ak ea niiluulan gheanyanga nyaawa,
adaghwadaah aba gheanyanga nyaawa,
ak ghwayiiy aba iidiga nyaawa,
ak gwajeeng'u aba guroruunatka nyaawa,
ak gwayamsean geat ak ghaahaapchi.’
Ghoang'wani agooga aba gideaba gheanyangeagwa ghoang'wearda nea iidigeagwa gwayiing'shi.

Aba huumwa geayeeshshineegwa sibanga saang'a ea fuga doobiiweadi ghayi gagaseadayi deakteaba ng'asheesu ghamneawa oadayiin, ak ea mwadaaha, nea ghwayiiy ng'asheesu ghamneawa oayinyiin ak ea mwayiinya.
“Asi agooga oalleaydiit gideagali siida wea histeayda.
Siida wassean iiy ng'asheanda sugoochcheandumeeda ak ea mwanala, ghwahidu giitta muyiin ak ghoasealda gidida sihisa guroroadaannyiin.
Nea dea sihisa jeeda harearatkean ea siitta iiy ng'asheandideaniin gil ama deagheatta ghoang'ng'waay nea gang'weela.
Amaduw ea mandeawana hawunga aba jeadaannyi iissa ghoang'ng'waay ng'asheandida gilinuwaas, ama hidu sawanadeeda ghana gapnu ghabasta appadaydeaba ng'asheenji gabay ghoabeada.
Nea dea abissa jeeda geediga halaghweenga, ea siitta iiy ng'asheanda amaduw aba geawunda gheang'da barureega badayda ng'eanyiida, ghaminighis ak ea mudugwaji haghweega.
Nea dea sihisa heeda sigeeda miyasiin ea siitta iiy ng'asheandideaniin ak gwajeeng'uuni; nii dea jih haghweega, gwaji akkalealla bughala, akwaji nii laadam, akwaji nii diktam ea damanamughuush.”
Gwarukuta gichcha galeega nea gwayeeshsha, “Sugoochcheandumeeda humng'eeda gawuurji siida weah gwahista histeanga miyaas aba jeeda madamnyeandannyi.
Iiduw nea nilil buuneeda, ghwahidu weajoochcheanda ak gwahisa morookka dang'adiga ngano ak ghang'eat gawa.
Rudu nngano nea ghamwanmwan nea gwaji geadaah gaguuyi sea moorookka.
Gaweay soomjooga ak gwayeeshsha siitta bea madamnyeandean, ‘Ea Siida mureeda, mwaghannyi ghayi gihisti mmbeeyooda miyaas aba jeeda madamnyandang'u? Amaduw gwarinna yeenu moorookka?’
Gwayeeshsha niny, ‘Nii gwasin weajoochcheanda.’ Ghoanyaash soomjooga nea gwayeeshsha niny, ‘Gigasayi eweaya eammughuusha?’
Gwayeeshsha, ‘Manda; iyoammughuushchi morookka gajiiduw ghoaloachchi eara nngano.

Anung'waada gwaheettu sean ea ghwahitta damanda lajiitta; damandida gaydayeeshsha fukka jea ghwalajiin, oshsheeda oammughuusha morookka ak ghoarachchi gharmuchcheekka ak geaghwarda, nea nngano goowweamsi gijigoodeanyu.’”
Gwarukta gichcha galeega nea gwayeesha, “Sugoochcheandumeeda humng'eeda gawuurji sea ghajiileandageetta suguura haradaali ghayi geanu siida akwahisa jeeda madamnyandaannyi;
gabiissa amwanang'eawa ghajilga sean amaduw nea gwardu gwaheedu ak geadaah nea niiw geetta haw, ghwahidu dariidakka ak gwadeeksa ghoorajeega nyaawa damealgaaschi.”
Gwarukusa saawa gichcha galeega, “Sugoochcheandumeeda humng'eeda geegala sea hamiiraayda geanu gatmooda, ak googuuyi sea dearangspa gweeraji samwagu ak geeyi bwak ea ghaghuut geaw sean.”
Suh seaniin goobaloola Yeesu emeetuw aba galeega nea moang'ng'wa gwarukuta ng'ashaan nea manda gidagala.
Abeeda ghoaw huumwa ng'asheanda ghayi rugu sibaneeda nea gwayi:
“Gaydajaat ghuutteanyu aba galeega,
gaydargu gea funyaat ghang'eada deasubwada sindeetta ng'eanyiida.”
Iiduw gwaheelli emeetuw ak gawa ghoah. Gamaseaw Giinealangaaschi ak gwayeeshsha “Goona ganeega ng'asheanda gwachchi igali geat sea morookka madamnyeandean.”
Gwayeeshsha, “Siida hista histeanga miyaas Balleanda Siida;
madamnyeandida ea ng'eanyiida gil, histeanga miyas balloojiga sugoochcheandumeeda; nea morookkiga ea balloojigeaba diitta muyiini.
Nea weajoochcheandida histean ea meang'nyeandeenda, nea lajitta ea mudeanooda ng'eanyiida, nea fuga lach ea malaykajeega.
Asi gitta simmugurriida morookka ak geang'uda beastean, ea gichchea gawuurji mudeanooda ng'eanyiida.
Balleanda Siida gaygoojeagu malaykajeagaaschi, ak ghoawaam aba jeeda sugoochcheandumeadaannyi haleanjeessean eadu ringeeda ea fuga sean sina ng'asheega munyas.
Ak geehisa jeeda duwayda beasta; ak gooyyeawda fuga nyaawa aba hoowa nea goowiiri geeshatka aba sawanadeeda.
Abeeda geadoobiiweadi gayghoameang'daayda Aseetta aba jeeda sugoochcheandumeeda Bwaabwa nyaawa. Siida mideawa iidiga ea dayiinya.

“Gichcha sugoochcheandumeeda humng'eeda gawuurji gheaseeda funyaat aba jeeda madamnyeanda, ama daa siida ghafuy; aba ng'weeloadaannyi gawa ak ghwashaayda haleanjeedaannyi sean mideawa ak ghwasha madamnyeandida.
“Gichcha sugoochcheandumeeda humng'eeda gawuurji sea siida sheahiida haleanjeeda gasa boshcheanda miy,
geeyi bwak ama daa boshchanjagi mideawa sheayeeda haw, gawa ak ghwashaayda haleanjeedaannyi sean ak ghwasha.
“Gichcha sugoochcheandumeeda humng'eeda gawuurji sea gheareedanga siippuutta jeeda basooda, ak ghoang'ng'waay heeluutka sean bea ghweayeega;
geeyi bwak ama nyiit, goongiiru buuneeda ea ghwahidu ghuutta basooda ak ghaghwal ghweayeega miyaas ak ghwayiin jeesinga dabiitta nyaawa nea gea munyas gwahista.
Nii gichchea gawuurji gil eaweetta muudeanooda ng'eanyiida aba gideaba eaweettida gayghwahidu malaykajeega ak gooheelli fuga munyas ea gea doobiiweadi,
ak gwahisa fuga munyas jeeda duwayda beasta; abeeda gaygwanda buuneeda nea giwiirda geeshatka.”
“Heappi nojeeng'u ng'asheesu seaniin?” Ghwalamda Saawa ak gwayeeshsha, “Eah.”

Ng'atta gwayeeshsha saawa, “Asi gilinyoo ea ng'oorshoochcheanda gil was giinealaneeda sugoochcheandumeeda humng'eeda, gawuurji sea siida mideawa gheeda geanu aba jeeda gheaseadaannyi haleanjeeda eashish ea gea woosi.”
Iiduw nea ghoahiit Yeesu galeegiga ghang'eat gawa,

gawa ng'eang'da nyaawa hitta hoowa goonealshi aba jeeda ghooriida nyaawa siinnealshachcheewa, ak goonealshi ea ghahamng'eanyi buuneeda nea gwayi, “Siisi ghwanyasa yeenu weaghumeeni ea ng'asheesu deamdeameadiin?
Neada siisi ea mii balleandeaba siitta sina behajeegeani? Neada ghaamwat ea megureewana Mariya? Nea oorjooga ghaamwat ea mii Yakkobo gil ea Yoseefu ea Simon ea Yuudahi?
Ama eara haweega ghaamwat sean ea meendeawanani aba hiji? Abeeda ghwanyasa yeenu siisi ng'asheesu seaniin?”
Deagheatta geenyareesi aba ng'asheagaaschi. Hean gwayeeshsha Yeesu saawa, “Sibaneeda majaghanyi ea meattawa mureeda, geaghus ea meattawa aba ng'eanyidaannyi ea gheannyaawa.”
Ea mudugwasissa hoowa deamdeamang'su saang'a aba gideaba mandeawana masaweega.
Aba damandida ghwayiiy sugoochcheanda suguura Heroode geawunda iitta Yeesu;
Hean gwayeeshsha soomjoogaaschi, “Siisi gajea Yohaaneeda Abattiisachchi gil, nuduunna miyeeda; ak ghoaw ghamneawa uuri sina ng'asheesuun.”
Aba gideaba Heroode ghayi ghoang'ng'waay Yohaana ak gwajaksa ghealooniga, appadayda Herodiyaayda ghayi was gatmooda oorjeeda ghaamwat suguura Filippo;
nea gweagu ng'asheanda ghayi rukusa Yohaana nea gwayeeshsha, “Mwadoabiiwa gideaba gaymideawana gatmooda oorjeeda giyeang'wa.”
Gagasa gwanuus Yohaana amaduw ghoawal buuneeda aba gideaba ghwanal buuneessean gideaba Yohaana sibaneeda.
Muchchu gagul damanda ghwelmeeda eaweetta ghayi sijiila Heroode, ghang'was hudeaba Heroodeya aba madeeda rabasta, ak geeyi bwak ea gahoosan Heroode,
ak gwaheelleesa nea gweaksa habeawooda nea gwayeeshsha gaydagoonnyi gidawasean ing'allaan.
Aba damandida gagwarsa ghamwat ak gwayeeshsha, “Goonean uhuuda Yohaaneeda Abattiisachchi iina jeeda harakta.”
Gagiisan Sugoochcheanda; amaduw nea ghoapkaat habeawooda ghwanyawa akk ea gheanyanga rabasta ghwanung' eattaw;
goojeakta siida gawa ghealooni ak ghwalach gheatta Yohaana.
Geeyeanna uhuudannyi jeeda harakta ak geattaw hudida, ak ghwaat niny heeda ghamwat.
Ghwahidu giinealangaaschi ak gageanda musta ak gabuy; ama ng'atta gaweay ghoadaw Yeesu iitta.
Ng'atta iing'da iiy Yeesu ng'asheesu, ghabeawa hoowa nea ghwaat maleambooda ak gawa heeda manda sih. Nyas iitta emeetuw ghabeawa geeshanga gamaseaw niny nea ghabeawa mujiinajeega nyaawa.
Hitta Yeesu ghuutta basooda ghwadaa emeetuw ak gwasamsa amaduw ghoahaap geeyoong'ng'weakka nyaawa.
Iiduw nea niiw shing'ada, gaweay heeda Giinealangaaschi ak gwayeeshsha, “Hiji sindiin heeda manda sihi, adawa eemeeda beatta gaweay gharang'weakka gwasheaysa geat gichchaghwaak.”
Gwayeeshsha Yeesu “Manda gichchea ghwaat, oattawa agooga gichchaghwaak.”
Geeyeeshsha niny, “Geendeawi aba hiji mukkattaji muut ea ghweayi iyyeenya.”
Gwayeeshsha, “Ayeanni heedeanyu.”

Gwayeeshsha anung' goobiitpiit emeeda aba heeda mida nyeega; ng'atta gageanu mukkattajeekka ammudiin ea ghweayeekka assiyyeenyean ak gang'ula humng'eeda, ak gang'ushsha, ng'atta ghabwanajaada mukkattajeegiga ak ghoadaw giinealangaaschi, amahit ghoadaw giinealanga emeeda.
Gweagiischi sean ea gwalang'u. Ghoawaam gheaptanga ak ghwannyiit soscheew damaniyyeenya.
Moonneeda fuga siing'ng'aatta ea sagalamnyooji muut headiga, nea meeyiitta gadeemga ea diibiga.
Iiduw ghwanung' goosheeda giinealangaaschi gaweay gigheawda basooda nea ghoaghaawa maleambooda, nea gahuydean niny aba gideaba migwaheelli sea emeeda.
Hean heelli emeeda gwading'da giijeeda heeda funyaat ghamwaash Aseetta. Iiduw ghoaw shing'ada nea gaba geaw aba hoowa,
nea aba damani maleambooda gwachchi ea nihitta bugusta basooda, nea goodeawiit laweajajeega aba gideaba gwaroonnyi jeammeeda.
Huuw gheatta beashatta gawa nea ghabeawa badayda beega nea gaweesa.
Daa giinealanga nea ghabeawa badayda beega, ghabeal nea gwayi, “Nii maloonghajeanda!” Googuul aba muuwda.
Deagheatta gwayeeshsha saawa, “Oappida ng'eanyi adoabealli siida aniini.”
Ghwasha Betro nea gwayeeshsha, “Ng'uttamiida iyang'ing'i gil ginung' doan headaang'u nea ghabeawi badayda beega.”
Gwayeeshsha, “Beenni.” Ng'atta ghwararang'aada Betro aba jeeda maleambooda ak gawa appadayda beega nea gagal heeda Yeesu;
hean daa jeammeeda, ghabeal ak gwalik beega, ak googuul nea gwayeeshsha, “Ng'uttamiida lealnean.”
Deagheatta ghoahaakta Yeesu geattindaannyi ak ghoang'ng'waay nea gwayeeshsha, “Ea siida mwanang' masawi, ghwasaan anda gibeali?”
Ding'da duwaawi maleambooda ghahawda jeammeeda.
Hean ghaghadoawan fukka sean mida jeeda maleamboodean nea gwayeeshsha, “Aba huumwa ang'iing'i guwosi Balleanda Aseetta.”
Ghoaghaawa basooda ak ghwahitta ng'eanyiida Genasaretti.
Jeeng'u fugeaba hoowa, ghoadayda iitta aba daroorakkiga neekkeewean. Geeyeassa fuga sean miyeani,
geemearmearani niny eawaas earea wileeda hang'daannyi gil akghwahit; nea fukka sean waas weeleadaannyiin geahhaap.
Hean gaweesa Farisayajeega ea ng'oorshoodiga nea gwaleabu Yerusaleemu ak ghapka heeda Yeesu ak ghoannyash,
“Ghwasaan anda giinealangaagu maduuppa ng'asheega siing'ng'wanyaana fugeaba garayi bea ghaheanya? Iissa gweagiischi nea meahuuna geattinga.”
Ghwasha nea gwayeeshsha, “Anda eara agooga iissa goofoolli diigheanda Aseetta aba ng'asheegeagwa oang'ng'waannyi?
Gwayi Aseetta; ‘Sissiina mureeda gweanu ea geamadu,’ nea ‘Siida ang'eawi ghwaan ghana ghaamwat ea deenuusa.’
Ak gooyeennyi agooga, ‘Siida iiyyeeshsha ghwaan ghana ghaamwat, gitta gwachchi jea dagoonnyi, naadawji Aseetta.’
Asi aba seareeda ghaheang'wa, noanung' ghoaw ng'asheanda Aseetta gidamwadaagha.
Ea fuga ammittu geat! Nidoabiiw ng'asheanda ghayi ramoaran sibaneeda suguura Isaaya appadahuukkeagwa nea gwayi,
‘Fiisu iissa gwasinnean mureeda aba ghuusiga,
nea guroruunatka nyaawa ea sheageewean;
saawa gagadoowannean mwadaagha,
nea ghoanaal giinealshooda was ng'asheega buuneeda.’”
Gaguursa emeeda bwat geat ak gwayeeshsha, “Oalleaydiit ak ghoanalli:
manda gichchea gwasik ghuut ak ghang'uda siida ririnnyeanda, geaghus gidarinna ghuutta, nii dea jea ghang'uda siida ririnnyeanda.”
Ng'atta gaweay heeda giinealangaaschi ak gwayeeshsha, “Heappi ginali gideaba gwachchi Farisayajeega iyiiy ng'asheandida gwanyareesi?”
Ghwasha nea gwayeeshsha, “Gilinyoo ea histeannyeanda gil iimahista Bwaabwa bea humng'eeda gajealoatta.
Anung'waada saawa, suu fuga adoobiiwshi ng'oawwi. Nea siida ng'oaw iyadoabiiw siida ng'oaw, gayghoabitta duwaawi jeeda shoomanda.”
Ng'atta gwayeeshsha Betro niny, “Ng'achcha iidigaasa aba galeesu.”
Gwayeeshsha, “Eara agooga mandaneegwa fughareenga?
Miianala eara ghamneawa gideaba gidanyoo gwasik ghuutta siida iissa ghang'atta gawa jeeda, amaduw gwaritta jarooda?
Amaduukku ng'asheega rittuuna ghuutta gwaleappu gurorooda, amaduw ghang'uda siida ririnnyeanda.
Aba gideaba jeeda gurorooda gwarittuuna gittemshajeega munyas, nuusta siida, mealuleega, hiseadayeandumeeda, mareanghumeeda, muuwunooda ng'uyeega, ea beeshta siida.
Ng'asheesu seaniin geang'utta siida ririnnyeanda; duukku gideaba geeyeagiischi nea mehhuuna geattinga mwoammu ghang'uda siida ririnnyeanda.”
Ghabeawa Yeesu hoowa ak gawa meatkwajeega Diro ea Sidooni.
Hean ghwahidu headannyi gatmoomba fuga Ganaayo bea ng'eanyiitta goojuur muuchchi, nea gwayeeshsha, “Bwaydanaan, Ng'uttamiida, Balleanda Dawdi, gabearji hudeanyu meangeenda.”
Ea marukusiina eara ng'ashaan. Ng'atta ghwahidu heeda giinealangaaschi ak gamus niny nea gwayeeshsha, “Nung'waada gawa, aba gideaba goojuurra geeshteanya.”
Ghwasha nea gwayeeshsha, “Meechcheaksean buuneessean geechcheaksean gisilga roodeadi bea gheeh Israeeli.”
Ghwahidu gatmoota ak gwatkuy aba madeadaannyi ak gwayeeshsha, “Ee Ng'uttamiida weadaan.”
Ghwasha nea gwayeeshsha, “Miimiy gideaba geegeanu hamitta diibiga ak geejaksa gudajeega.”
Gwayeeshsha, “Huumwa gil, Ng'uttamiida, eara gudajeega iissa ghwaak lajanga abitpinna heeda agiischeewa ghweanda nyaawa.”
Hean gwayeeshsha Yeesu, “Ea Gatmooda, ang'iing'i masaweagaagu aahaw! Gagasa nyasa gitta igasayiin.” Ghahaap hudannyi aba geeshangiga.
Ghabeawa Yeesu hoowa ak gawa ghuutta basooda Galilaaya, ak gwading'da giijeeda ak goopteada.
Gaweay heeda emeetuw nea geeyeassa fuga badoojiga, ea fuga manda geeshanga, ea fuga ng'oawwi, ea fuga manda ghuusiga, ea suuk gasaang'a ak geayiin madeadaannyi ak ghoahaap.
Ghaham ng'eanyi emeeda idaah nea gabalool fuga manda ghuusiga nea gamajeegiidi fuga badoojiga, nea gawelwel fuga manda geeshanga, nea ghoang'wearda fuga ng'oawwi, ak ghoaghambiit Aseetta Israeeli.

Gaguursa Yeesu giinealangaaschi ak gwayeeshsha, “Geasamsi emeani aba gideaba neandeawi eawooji samwagu nea mandeawana gilak; mwabwariinyi gideaba gaydasiksa gaweay nea mwaaga gil, gajiiduw goohiil aba naweeda.”
Gwayeeshsha giinealangaaschi, “Aba hiji geendi dareapcheeda gajeanyasana yeenu hamitta jea goolang'u emeeda saang'a deenu?”
Ghoanyash Yeesu gideaba, “Goondeawi mukkattaji hada?” Gwayeeshsha, “Ispwa ea ghweayeesu ng'ayi manang'i.”
Ng'atta ghwanung' goobiitpiit emeeda aba ng'eanyi,
gageanu mukkattajeekka as ispwaan ea ghweayeekka, ak ghamwaash ghawooda ak ghabwanajaada ak ghoadaw giinealanga, ak ghoadaw giinealanga emeeda.
Gweagiischi sean ea gwalang'u, ng'atta ghoawaam gheaptanga ak ghwannyiit soscheew ispwa.
Nea fuga gwachchi agiischi ea sagalamnyooji ang'wan headiga akghwahit nea meeyiitta gadeemga ea diibiiga.
Iiduw gwaheelli emeeda ak gwading'da maleambooda ak gawa meatkweeda Magadaani.
Gaweay heeda Farisayajeega ea Sadukkayajeega ak gwasimsim nea gamus gideaba, eadaaha gwadeagooda leabu humng'eeda.
Ghwasha nea gwayeeshsha saawa, “Iissa ihitta shing'ada gooyeennyi, ‘Jeammeeda numuji gajaamiy aba gideaba humng'eeda ea areara.’

Iighar gayeew iissa gooyeennyi, ‘Askwareani gaygwaduksa, aba gideaba humng'eeda ea areara nea ghwang' eabeal.’ Ghoammuschi anala damannyoojiga iyoong'ulayi humng'eeda, nea mwoammuusi anala gwadeagwajeega damannyoonyiga.
Seaygeeda munyas mealuuleadi ak gagasa gwadeagooda, ak ea mwajeattaw geaghus gwadeagooda ghayi bea Yoona.” Ng'atta ghwanung'wa heeda ak ghang'eat gawa.
Gaweay giinealanga ea ghwahitta gigheawda, nea nuroossa eaditta mukkattajeega.
Gwayeeshsha Yeesu, “Ang'ulla nea gooshageachchi geat aba hamiiraayda Farisayajeega ea dea Sadukkayajeega.”
Gwasheang'nyi saawa nea gabwa geat, nea gwayi, “Miyeeyeanna mukkattajeega.”
Gwajeeng'u Yeesu gidabaloola saawa ak gwayeeshsha, “Ghwasaan anda agooga goosheang'nyi sea fuga manang'i masawi, aba gideaba moondeawani mukkattajeega?
Miiyanala eara ghamneewa? Mwoapkaadi eara mukkattajeekka ammut aba fukka as sagalamnyooji muudiin, ak goowweamsi gheaptanga sooscheew hada?
Ghana mukkattajeekka assispwa silakkiisa fukka assagalamaji ang'ng'waaniin, heappi ghoawwaamnyi soscheew hada nyiit gheaptanga?
Gayghoawattaan amwoapkaadi gideaba meabaloolani ng'asheega mukkattajeega? Asi ashageada geat aba hamiiraayda Farisayajeega ea Sadukkayajeega.”
Gwajeeng'u gideaba gwachchi mabaloolana gideaba mayeeshshiinu ashageada geat aba hamiira, gabaloola ginealshooda Farisayajeega ea Sadukkayajeega.
Muchchu nea gawa Yeesu ng'eanyiida Gaysariyeeda Filippi, ghoanyaash giinealangaaschi nea gwayeeshsha, “Buuneeda gwayeena Balleanda Siida ng'eaha?”
Geyeeshsha, “Buuneeda mwaatkwa gwayeena Yohaaneeda Abattiisachchi, suurja gwayeena Eliya, suurja gwayeena Yeremiya ghaneah siyagi gil aba jeeda sibanga.”
Gwayeeshsha, “Ama agooga gooyeenayi aniini geewoschi ng'eaha?”
Ghwasha Simoneeda was Betro nea gwayeeshsha, “Ang'iing'i guwosi Gristo, Balleanda Aseetta majeek.”
Ghwasha Yeesu nea gwayeeshsha niny, “Ging'wani ang'iing'i, Simoneeda Bar-Yoona! Aba gideaba ng'asheanji moadaajiida saseeda ea foojeanda nii ghoahiimneey Bwaabwa mida humng'eeda.
Ak geayeeshshineey, ang'iing'i guwosi Betro, ak badaydeaba laghaneani gaydadeeksa ganisedeanyu, ak eara uurda miyeeda ea mayghoammu ghwajoar.

Ak aniini gaydagoonnyi gichchea attinana sugoochcheandumeeda humng'eeda, ak gidiradi aba hiji bea muunda ng'eanyiidean abeeda gajeasirat aba hoowa bea humng'eedean, ak gidawassean iittini aba hiji bea muunda ng'eanyiidean abeeda gajeettin aba hoowa bea humng'eedean.”
Iing'atta ghaweada muuchchi giinealangaaschi eamarukusiina siida wassean gideaba niny Gristoohi.

Ghang'eada damandida gwaruksa Yeesu giinealangaaschi gideaba gammiissa beatta jea gawa Yerusaleemu, ak aba hoowa gayghwanyas sawanadeeda haw aba heeda gweargwa ea ashoohoodiga hees ea ng'oorshoodiga, ak geenuus, ama eaweetteaba samwagu gwaduudu.
Ghwaat Betro ea gameaji gwadilda ak goojuursa nea gwayeeshsha, “Mwayiinya Aseetta, Ng'uttamiida! Ng'asheesu mayghwanyasnyi.”
Gwayamsa geaw ak gwayeeshsha, Betro, “Una badaydeanyu shattaani! Adirussean; aba gideaba mindani meatkweeda Aseetta, gindi dea buuneeda.”
Damandida gwayeeshsha Yeesu giinealangaaschi, “Siida wassean iigasa gweadu geeshteanyu ea dafoola geaw ak ghwasar behiidaannyi ak gweadu geeshteanyu.
Aba gideaba siida gasa ghoaghu aweagaaschi gaygahutteawi, nea siida hutteawi aweagaaschi appadaydeanyu, gayghwadaah.
Ama siida gaygwaloosa naaha iinyas halanjeassean bea muunda ng'eanyiida, amaduw gahutteawi aweagaaschi? Ghana siida gayghoadayda naaha ak ghoaghiisa aweagaaschi?
Aba gideaba Balleanda Siida gayghoana gigheambiitta Ghwaan nea goodeana malaykajeega ak abeeda gayghoadaw gilinyoo asihi gidageattindaannyi aba sinaweagaaschi.
Aba huumwa geayeeshshineegwa, gwanda hiji bea jeedeang'wean fuga maygameewa, ea eaghus anidaah Balleanda Siida nea ghwaana jeeda sugoochcheandumeadaannyi.”
Iing'atta eawooji lah ghwaat Yeesu Betro ea Yakkobo ea oorjeeda ghaamwat suguura Yohaana, ak goodeayi uhuuda giijeeda heeda geaw.
Ghwayamwa ormeadaannyi aba madeannyaawa, ghameang'meang' gheamamdaannyi ea gawuurji aseetta, nea gaweriidi hang'weakkaschi ea ghawaar weeshinda.
Hean gwardu Muusa ea Eliya, ak gabalool sea niny.

Ng'atta gwayeeshsha Betro Yeesu, “Ng'uttamiida aamiy gideaba aseasa gajeeppiidana hiji; iigasayi gaydasin aba hiji udahabeaschooji samwagu, akkalealla daang'u gil annirja gaba Muusa, aniirja gaba Eliya.”
Damani duu gabalolean deagheatta ghwahidu shamoghooda eesh ak gwadukta, ak ghwanyaasha ghuutta jeeda shamoghooda nea gwayi, “Nii Balleandeanyu abwariinyi ahoosanani, olleeysiina iit niny.”
Iiy giinealanga ng'asheesu goobeedeayi ak ghabwada jeesinga ng'eanyi, nea ghabeal muuchchi.
Gawa Yeesu ak ghawaas aba geattindaannyi nea gwayeeshsha, “Ang'eatng'eada, nea adoabealli.”
Gatgat gheanyanga nyaawa, ea mwadaaha sih geaghus Yeesu nea gaba geaw.
Iiduw nea ghwararang'aana giijeeda, gwayeeshsha Yeesu, “Adiiduw goorukusi eara sih iitteaba ng'asheesu oadayiin ea eaghus ea niduunna Balleanda Siida jeeda miyeeda.”
Ak ghoanyash Giinealanga, “Anda gwayi ng'oorshoodiga geaghus ghannyi goosheeda ghwaan Eliya?”
Ghwasha nea gwayeeshsha, “Eliya gaygoosheeda ghwaan, ak gwasissin halanjeassean;
ak geayeeshshineegwa, Eliya nigeawiit ghwaan ak ea meanala, ak geesma halanjeassean gasa saawa. Gwasnu eara Balleanda Siida gaygawa ak gajeesawan aba geattinga nyaawa.”
Ghwanal giinealanga gideaba gabaloola ng'asheega Yohaaneeda Abattiisachchi.
Iiduw nea ghwahitta heeda emeeda, gawa Siyagi headaannyi, ak gwatkuy aba madeadaannyi ak gwayeeshsha,
“Ng'uttamiida, eaniyean bwayda balleandeanyu, aba gideaba goohiili, nea iissa gwasawana muuchchi; niny imisean gang'adeesa jeeda beasta, ghana galannya jeeda beega.
Muchchu geayeadu heeda gineelangaagu ak ghwaraay ghoahaap.”
Ghwalamda Yeesu nea gwayeeshsha, “Ea seaygeeda mandeawana masaweega biissa ea roodeadi, gajeendeaydooscheena ea ghoaw eeju? Agooga gaydamilikkiidaneegwa ea ghoaw eeju? Ayeanni heedeanyu”
Ng'atta goojuursa Yeesu niny, ak gwaritteaysa meangeenda, ak ghahaap balleanda aba geeshangiga.
Iiduw ghoahudaada Giinealanga ea gaweay heeda Yeesu, ak gwayeeshsha, “Anda aseasa gearaannyi erruutta?”

Gwayeeshsha Yeesu, “Gwasin gheashooyda masaweegeagwa. Geayeeshshineegwa aba huumwa, inyeeda goondeawi masaweega deenna ghajilleanda haradaali, gajoammusa ayeeshshiina giijeeni, ‘Loadadawana hiji ak guwi hoowa,’ ak gaygawa, ak ghannyi ea manda ng'asheanda hang'waay mwajoammuusa sinooda.
‘Loadadawana hiji ak guwi hoowa,’ ak gaygawa, ak ghannyi ea manda ng'asheanda hang'waay mwajoammuusa sinooda.”
Damanda mideayeewa sean aba Galilaaya gwayeeshsha Yeesu saawa, “Balleanda Siida gaygawa ak geayiin geattinga buuneeda,
ak gaygwanuus, ama eaweetteaba samwagu gaygwaduudu.” Hean gagiisan giinealanga muuchchi.
Hitta Gapernaumu, gaweay heeda Betro Fuga ang'ng'oonyi gwaadeeda mwahitta shekkeeli ak gwayeeshsha, “Heappi! Giinealshoochcheandeang'wa goodayyiida gwaadi?”

Gwayeeshsha, “Eah goodayyiida.” Iiduw nea nihitta ghoah, goosheeda Yeesu ghoanyaash niny nea gwayeeshsha, “Simon, iing'ulayi ang'iing'i gawuurjiin? Sugoodiga muunda ng'eanyiida goong'ng'oonyi gujaweeda ghana gwaadi aba hichpa ana fih? Aba heeda balloojiga nyaawa ghana hichpa fih suuk?”
Eeshsha, “Hichpa fii suuk.” Gwayeeshsha Yeesu niny, “Asi iisunu abeeda gaygoobal geat balloojiga.

Ama abeeda iimajeannyareasa, guwi jeeda basooda ak giibuutti sidageeda ghwaraja ghaang' siing'ng'oonnya ghweayeega ak gigeanu ghweayeanda madeeda jea eang'ng'waay ak giijaadi ghuutta, ak gaynyasana shekkeli; gigeanu ak giidawi heedeanyu ea headaang'u.”
Damandida gaweay Giinealanga heeda Yeesu ak ghoanyaash gideaba “Siida haweewa sean ng'eaha aba jeeda sugoochcheandumeeda humng'eeda?”
Gaguursa niny jeepta ak ghwanung'u ghaminaada aba dageascheeda nyaawa,
ak gwayi, “Aba huumwa geayeeshshineegwa, imwoayami geat ea awuurjeewana diibiga, ea majaghannyi aweayeena jeeda sugoochcheandumeeda humng'eeda.
Siida wassean aatgeaw ngeanyi ea gawuurji jeebi, siisi siida haw gil aba jeeda sugoochcheandumeeda humng'eeda.
Nea siida wassean jea ghamwas jeabwagi uurji nii aba gheawungeasu, abeeda ghamwasan aniini.”
“Siida wassean jea ghwanung' gwasin ring'eeda jeabwagi aba jeedeaba diibisu manang'i mwasaniin, ghang'wana gwachchi geerassa gheatta lagheaneeda haw bea ng'ealdeayda ak geejaksa bugusta basooda.
Eamuy daang'u ng'eanyiida aba simsimda eattu ring'eeda! Aba gideaba simsimda gammiisa hinnooda, abeeda eamuy dea siida jea ghwanung' ghwahidu simsimda!

Iinung' geattindaang'u adiinya ghanea geashtaang'u, laja ak gijakti asheagiidana geaw; ghang'wana ginyasi eaweega nea gibea badeeda, mwasamwa gideaba gindeawi geattin iyyeenya ea geeshan iyyeenya ak geejakseey jeeda beasta manda mudeanooda.

Ama nung' gheang'daang'u sina ring'eeda giloatti, ak gijakti asheagiidana geaw; ghang'wana gideaba ginyasi eaweega nea gibea ghaang'agi, mwasamwa gideaba gindeawi gheanyan iyyeenya, ak geejakseey jeeda beasta maloonghajeega.”
Ang'ulla! Adiiduw goofoolli earagi aba jeedeaba suu manang'iin, asi geayeeshshineegwa aba humng'eeda malaykajeega nyaawa iissa gang'ula galeegasean gheamamda Bwaabwa mida humng'eeda. [
Aba gideaba Balleanda Siida ghwoan gwalealu gidaghayi roat.]
Heappi gawurjiin? Siida imideawa gisil bughala, ak ghwaroat agi, maygwanung'usa heeda giikka asseedam ea damwashshageashiin uhuuda gijeeda ak gawa gagasa diitta gwachchi roadiini?
Amaduw nea ghwanyas, aba huumwa geayeeshshineegwa, gaygang'weeliisa nii muuchchi ea ghwalaabwa hoowa giikka asseedam ea damwashshageash maroottean.
Aso nii mii gidagassida Ghweandeang'wa mida humng'eeda gideaba gayghwaroat jeabwagi aba jeedeaba suu manang'iin.
“Iyadiiyseey oorjeeda giyeang'wa, guweesi ak gireekusi nea goobeayi geat. Iimwas gooleeyseey iitta abeeda ea ninyasi oorjeeda giyeang'wa.

Ama heawa gooleeyseey iit gideayeawi siyagi ghaneah fii iyyeenya sea ang'iing'i, aba gideaba ng'asheanda wassean iirugu ammadeeda mushoodi assiyyeenya ghanea samwagu abeeda ng'asheega gaygamajeekcheewiidi.
Ama mealeysiniit saawa, abeeda girukusi ganiisa; ama mealeysiiniit ganiisa, abeeda ginung' ghoaw aba headaang'u siida Emoojiga ea dea ang'ng'waannyi gwaadi.”

“Aba huumwa, geayeeshshineegwa, gida wassean oarachchi aba hiji bea ng'eanyiidean abeeda gajeasirat aba hoowa bea humng'eedean, nea gidoottinnyi aba hiji bea ng'eanyiidean gajeasiittin aba hoowa bea humng'eedean.
Geayeeshshineegwa gichcha, aba jeedeang'wa ineajeesa fii iyyeenya ng'ashaan aba hiji bea badayda ng'eanyiidean ak ghamwaash Aseetta, gayghoadaw Bwaabwa mida humng'eeda.
Aba gideaba heeda wassean roonnyeesa fii iyyeenya ghana samwagu aba gheawungeasu, abeeda earaniini gaydanda jeannyaawa.”
Iiduw gawa Betro heeda ak ghoanyaash nea gwayeeshsha, “Ng'uttamiida, heappi oorjeeda giyeanya iyadiiysean gaydasamsa niba hada? Niba ispwa?”
Gwayeeshsha Yeesu niny, “Meayeeshshineey niba ispwa, eara laadam ea damanamughuush niba ispwa.
Aba dascheani sugoochcheandumeeda humng'eeda gawuurji sea sugoochchanjagi gasa gwayiida haleanjeeda sea soomjoogaaschi.”
“Hean ang'eat ittooda haleanjeeda, deagheatta geeyeadu headannyi siisi mideewa sileemba lappiyeeda suguura dalantaji sagalamnyooji damanamughuush;

siisi abeeda mandeawana eara gichchea ghoadaydawa sileetta; iiduw gwayeeshsha siitta haw was sugoochcheandean, ashaayda niny ea gatmoadaannyi ea diibigaaschi ea halanjeadannyi sean mideawa, ak geattaydaawa sileetta.
Ghwalamda Soomjeandida ak gwatkuy aba madeadannyi ak gwayeeshsha, ‘Ng'uttamiida, aaniyean nyoo ghannyi riyeeng'da ak gaydawalu sileadaang'u sean.’
Iiduw ghabwayda sugoochcheanda soomjeandida ak gwasamsa sileetta.

Gawa soomjeandida ak gwaroonnyi sea siyagi was soomjeanda eajisu mideaydooscheesa gadiyeeda biissa gwandeawa sileadaannyi lappiyaji bughala suguura dinaari. Gang'eessa ak ghoong'ng'waay ak ghoagheat nea gwayeeshsha, ‘Goona sileedeanyu.’
Gwatkuy aba madeadaannyi siitta eawoschu mideaydooschi aba gadiyeedean ak gamus nea gwayeeshsha, ‘Eaniyean nyoo ghannyi riyeeng'da ak gaydawalu sileadaang'u.’
Ghaheawa ak gwajaksa ghealooniga ea eaghus ea nuwalu sileetta.
Iiduw nea ghwadaa soomjooga mideaydooschi ng'asheanji gwanyareesi muuchchi, ak gaweay gwarukusa siida bea gadiyeeda iitteaba ng'asheesu sean siin siididean.
Ng'atta gaguursa siidida bea gadiyeedean ak gwayeeshsha, ‘Ea soomjeanda muy! Gwachchi ang'iing'i gimuschean gideaba aaniyean nyoo ghannyi bassean ak geasamseey siileetta sean ittaang'uun;
