ama ang'iing'i mammisseey gideaba gaybwayda soomjeanda indeaydooscheesi gadiyeeda gawuurji gidagwachchi easamsiindaneeyi?’
Ghwanyareas Siitta haw bea gadiyeedean muuchchi ak ghwanung' eayaat eesawan ea eaghus eaniwalu sileetta seaniin.
Asi gwasunu eara Bwaabwa mida humng'eeda gaygwahinduneegwa eara agooga iimaba siisi samsa oorjeeda geannyaawa aba jeadaannyi sean.”
Iiduw nea ghoahiit Yeesu ng'asheesu ghabeawa ng'eanyiida Galilaaya ak gawa ng'eanyiida Yahuudi, gigheawda eenda Jordaani;
ghwaat geeshta emeeda saang'a ak ghoahaap aba hoowa.
Ghapka headaannyi Farisayajeega ak gwasimsim nea gwayeeshsha, “Heappi ghwadoabiiwi gideaba siida gayghwanung' gatmoadannyi aba gilinyoo ea ramwasaani?”
Ghwasha nea gwayeeshsha, “Miyoassoamwana gideaba siida ghayi sineegwa ammwadi gwasin siida was ng'eedeeda ea siida was gatmooda,
ak gwayi, ‘Aba sareani gayghwanung'wa ng'eedeeda heeda ghwaan ea ghaamwat, ak gaygwaroochchi sea gatmoadaannyi, ama ng'atta ghoaw fiisu assiyeenyean saseanagi?’
Fiisu abeeda ea mudea iyyeenya, niiw saseanagi. Asi fukka aguuyi Aseettean, adiiduw gooheelli siida.”
Gwayeeshsha Saawa, “Abeeda iiduw goodaydeaysa naaha Muusa gheatta barawajeanda nung'ooda?”
Gwayeeshsha, “Muusa ghayi ghoadayda gheatta jea eanung'wa gatmooda aba hang'ooynachcheekka guroruunatkeagwa, nea abeeda ghayi mwadi ea masunu.
Asi geayeeshshineegwa: siida wassean jea ghwanung' gatmoadaannyi imwanung'wa aba ng'asheega hiseadayeandumeeda, akghaghi nuut, gamealuuli.”
Gwayeeshsha giinealangaaschi, “Ng'asheega siida ea gatmoadaannyi iisunu, ghang'wana ea meegeeshshi.”
Hean gwayeeshsha saawa, mwoammu buuneessean ghoang'ng'waay ng'asheanji, geaghus fukka adaw Aseettean.

Aba gideaba gwanda gulanga siji nea gwasnu ghang'eada jeesinga gheamadiga nyaawa, ak gwanda gulanga nung' buuneeda ghoaw gulanga, ak gwanda gulanga sin geat gulanga aba sugoochcheandumeeda humng'eeda. Dea ammu ghoang'ng'waay ng'asheanji, ea dang'ng'waanya.
Muchchu geeyeassa diibiga manang'i ghwayiin geattingaaschi iheenga diibiga ak ghamwaash ghawooda appadahuukka nyaawa. Iiduw goojuursa giinealanga;
gwayeeshsha Yeesu, “Anung'waada diibiga manang'i ghapka heedeanyu, adoakghuumnyi; aba gideaba fuga uurji suu sugoochcheandumeeda humng'eeda daanyaawa.”
Ghwayiin gattingaschi iheenga nyaawa, ak ghabeawa ng'eanyiitta.
Hean gabeessa Siyagi ak gwayeeshsha, “Giinealshoochcheanda, gaydasin ana ng'ashaan miy ijadanyas eaweega manda mudeanooda?”
Ak gwayeeshsha niny, “Ghwasaan anda ginyaashchaan iitta miyinda? Siida miy aa agi, ama iigasayi una jeeda eaweega, ging'ng'waannyi digheannyeekka.”
Gwayeeshsha niny, “Akkeega?” Gwayeeshshsha Yeesu, “Adinuusi siida, adimealuuli, adijagwadischi, adinapiisi siida ng'uyeega.
Sissiina mureeda gweanu ea geamadu, ak gibwariiydi gischeewoochchaandaang'u gidubwariiydi geaw.”
Gwayeeshsha gheareemaneedida, ng'asheesu seaniin nigeawiit dang'ng'waay; abeeda gudu ghwashoadeawan naaha gichcha?

Gwayeeshsha Yeesu niny, “Iigasayi huuwa siida hidaat, guwi ak gishaaydi haleanjeadaang'u indeawi, ak giidawi fuga barbari, ak abeeda gaymideawana gheaseeda aba humng'eeda, ama ng'atta guwuni eanni geeshteanyu.”
Iiy Ghearemaneedida ng'asheanji ghang'eat gawa nea gagiisan, aba gideaba gwandeawa haleanjeessang'a.
Gwayeeshsha Yeesu giinealangaaschi, “Aba huumwa geayeeshshinegwa gajahang'waay beatta jea gawa meanang'oochcheanda jeeda sugoochcheandumeeda humng'eeda.

Nuut gichcha geayeeshshineegwa, gajawussis muuchchi gideaba gaygwasik diyeayda suguura nngamiya seawadeeda sidageeda ea eamawuurji gideaba gaygawa meanang'oochcheanda jeeda sugoochcheandumeeda Aseetta.”
Iiy Giinealanga ghahamng'eanyi muuchchi nea gwayi, “Abeeda iisun gayghoammu ghwalaalaan ng'eaha?”
Goong'weersa Yeesu ak gwayeeshsha, “Ng'asheanji aba buuneeda ahang'waay, ak aba heeda Aseetta aawusis.”
Deagheatta ghwasha Betro nea gwayeeshsha, “Ang'wearda, aseasa sinung'wi heeda haleanjeessean ak geeyeadu geashtaang'u. Abeeda gajeanyasa naha?”

Gwayeeshsha Yeesu saawa, “Aba huumwa, geayeeshshineegwa, agoogeeda oyeadu geeshteanyu aba ng'eanyiideesh, jea ghwahidu eaweeda jea goopteadawa Balleanda Siida hoorgeadaannyi ghambiidaat, abeeda earagooga gajooppiidana hoorgajeekka attamaniyyeenyean ak goorgweaksi eemoojikka attamaniyyeenya bea Israeeliin.

Nea giliwas sih nung'usa heeda gheeda ghana oorjeeda ghaamwat ghana haweega ghaamwat ghana ghwaan ghana ghamwaat ghana diibiga ghana madameega, appadayda gheawungeasu, gayghwanyas niba bughala ak gwahearan eaweega manda mudeanooda.
Ak gea saang'a mida mwadi gayghoaw gea huuydean, nea gea huuydean gayghoow gea madeeda.”
“Aba gideaba sugoochcheandumeeda humng'eeda gawuurji siida bea gheeda ritteawa sakteayda duw ak gagasa fuga jea ghabwar ng'eanyi aba jeeda madamnyeandaannyi bea misabiibu.
Iing'atta nea nineajeesa buuneeda gideaba gayghoadaw lappiyeeda suguura dinaari aba gadiyeeda jeedaskwearda, ghwaat jeeda madamnyandannyi bea misabiibu.”
“Gwaritta sakteayda nea gaba aseetta samwagu ak ghwadaa buuneeda suuk nea ghaminaada aba jeeda naada nea mandeawana gadiyeeda;
gwayeeshsha fukka, ‘Aweayeena eara agooga ak goosinnyi gadiyeeda aba jeeda madamnyeanda misabiibu, ak abeeda gaydagooneegwa gittoobiiwseegwa.’ Ak gaweay.
Gabiikta gwaritta gichcha siitta bea madamnyeandean nea gaba aseetta lah ea aseetteaba shageash, ak gwasinda gidada.

Hitta aseetteaba damwanagi gabiikta gwaritta gichcha ak gabiikta ghwanyas fii suuk nea ghaminaada; hean ghoanyaash nea gwayeeshsha, ‘Ghwasaan anda agooga goomineadayyi aba hiji askwearda sean nea moosni gil?’
Geeyeeshsha saawa, ‘Gweagu gideaba manda siida goaneasa gadiyeeda.’ Gwayeeshsha Siidida saawa, ‘Aweayeena eara agooga ak goosinynyi gadiyeeda aba jeeda madamnyeanda misabiibu.’

Iiduw nea gamikta aseetta, gaguursa siida bea madamnyeanda siidaannyi ahaaghwa fuga gadiyeeda ak gwayeeshsha, ‘Guursiina fuga gadiyeeda ak giidawi gidageattinda nyaawa, nea ging'eadi siida huuydean, ea gagul siida madeeda.’
Ghwahidu fukwachchi siittaw gadiyeeda nea gaba aseetta damwanagi, ak gaba siisi siittaw dinaarajaanjagi.
Hidu fukwachchi bea madeeda ghaghay gili jea eattaw lappiyeeda meaji ghwanaawda, amaduw eara saawa gaba siisi siittaw dinaarajaanjagi.
Ng'atta ging'ng'ooyda, gooniiksa siitta bea gheedean,

nea gwayi, ‘Fiisu huydeaniin gagadiyi aba jeemba aseadeanagi akghwahit, ak ginung' gwadeennyi lappiyedeanya sea gaanyaawa nea gwachchi aseasa geamilikghti gadiyeeda hang'waay subwadi beasta askwearda sean.’
Ng'atta gwayeeshsha siyagi aba jeannyaawa, ‘Siideadupcheewi, aniini mwaagi ghanyangaagu; gwachchi meeheelleesiini gideaba gaydagoonnyi dinaari?
Geanda gea was gaaagu akkuwi; ghaabwariinyi gideaba gaydaadaw siisi huydeaniin oyyang'deayyeena.
Neada ea mwadoabiwa haleanjeedeanyu iyeagasayi dahinda gidaabwariiydi? Ghana gishti ghaang' aba gideaba geewoschi innya jihi?’
Asi, gwasunu eara fuga huydean gayghoaw fugeammwadi, nea fugeammwadi gayghoaw fuga huydean.”
Muchchu gheeda nea ghwascheang'da Yeesu gawa Yerusaleemu, ghwaat giinealangiga attamaniyyeenyean heeda funyaat ak gwayeeshsha aba naweeda,
“Ang'ulla, ghamneawa geascheang'di geeweayi Yerusaleemu; ak Balleanda Siida gajeang'ng'waay ak geayiin geattinga ashoohoodiga hees ea gea ng'oorshoodiga ak gajeergweaksiina miyeeda,
ng'atta gajeayaat ak geayiin geattinga Emoojiga eeshka, nea geabwar aba mughoowooda, ak geenngoor, ama eawetteaba samwagu gaygwaduudu.”
Ng'atta gawa Gheamatta jiilu balloojiga Sebedaayo ak gawa heeda nea goodeayi oorjooga aschi ama hitta gwatkuy ak gamus ng'ashaan.

Gwayeeshsha niny, “Gigasayi naaha?” Ak gwayeeshsha, “Rukta gideaba orjoosu ikkeasu assiyyeenyean nung' goopteada akkalealla aba gattindaang'u bea dugwa ak ginung' goopteada niirja aba gattindaang'u ghadaam aba jeeda sugoochcheandumeedaang'u.”
Ghwasha Yeesu nea gwayeeshsha, “Mwoanali eara gidoomuschi. Heappi! Ghoammuuschi aleayda bayookcheanda jea daleeyda aniini?” Gwayeeshsha, “Geammuuschi.”

Gwayeeshsha Yeesu, “Sawanadeedeanyu gajoomilikghteaysiina, ama duukku giipteadayda geattindeanyu bea dugwa ea geattindeanyu ghadaam, meandeawani uurda jea dagoona, geaghus eattaw fukghayi nibay gwararsa Bwaabwa.”
Iiy Giinealangiga attamwanamughuushiin ng'asheesu, gwanyareeksa oorjookka assiyyeenyean.
Ng'atta gaguursa Yeesu saawa ak gwayeeshsha, “Moanali gideaba fuga hees bea Emoojiga goombaleegwa aba uurda nea fuga hees ikkanyaawa iissa ghaminghiseagwa.
Ea maygwasunu aba heedeang'wa nea siida gasa gwaheedu aba jeedeang'wa, ea doawa soomjeandeang'wa,
nea siida wassean aba jeedeang'wa igasa ghoaw siida madeeda ea doawa ging'ng'oonyaneedeang'wa;
aba sareani eara Balleanda Siida mwoani egadiyeesa niny ghwaan gagadiyi, ak ghoadayda aweagaaschi ghoaw leadeeda fuga saang'a.”
Muchchu nea ghabeawa mujiineeda Yerikko ghwaat geeshta emeetuw.
Hean, gwanda ghuutta naweeda fii iyyeenya ng'oowwi nea goobitpiit, hean iiduw nea ghwayiiy gideaba ghang'atta Yeesu ghwaat naweetta, goojuur nea gwayi, “Bwaydaneasa, Balleanda Dawdi!”
Goowwoowsa emeeda nea geeyeeshsha asiinda; saawa gabiikta goojuur muuchchi nea gwayi, “Bwaydaneasa, Ng'uttamiida Balleanda Dawdi!”
Ghaminaada Yeesu ak gaguursa ak gwayeeshsha, “Googasayi dasinneegwa naaha?”
Geyeeshsha niny, “Ng'uttamida, geegasayi ghwajaada ghanyangaasa.”
Ghabwayda Yeesu ak ghoong'ng'waay gheanyanga nyaawa ama deagheatta ghwajaada, ak ghwaat geeshta.
Iiduw nea gwaneekkiissa Yerusaleemu ghwahitta Betfaagi, mida giijeeda masaytunajeega, hean goojeakta Yeesu giinealan iyyeenya,
nea gwayeeshsha, “Aweayeena ea ahitta gharang'da mida madeadeang'wa, deagheatta gajadaaha digeeda sirat ea gureandaannyi; goottinnyi ak gooyeannean.
Ama rukuneegwa siida ng'asheanda, gooyeeshshi, ‘Gagasa Ng'uttamiida,’ ak gaygwasikseegwa.”
Suh seaniin geesindunu gwadeaschi sea ng'asheanda ghayi rugu sibaneeda nea gwayi,
“Ayeeshshiina hudeaba Sayuuni,
Ang'wearda, sugoochcheandaang'u ghwaan headaang'u,
ea ng'eeni nea gwading'da digeeda,
gureenda digeeda, dayeenda digeeda.”
Gaweay Giinealanga ak gwasinda ng'asheega gida rukusiinda Yeesu;
goorjeanu digeeda ea gureandannyi ak gookkwealsa hang'weakka nyaawa badahuukka ak goopteada aba badayda.
Ghoabwarghaan emeeda hang'weakka nyaawa aba jeeda naweeda, nea buuneeda suurja gaptu seenga geediga ak ghoabwarghaan aba jeeda naweeda.
Goojuur emeetuw asheeda ea gea huydean nea gwayi, “Hoosaana Balleanda Dawdi! Sing'ushsha dea jea ghwaana gheawunga Ng'uttamiida! Hoosaana aba humng'eeda.”
Damanda hittaawa Yerusaleemu, ghwadakghuyan mujiineasean. Hean gwayi buuneeda, “Siisi ng'eaha?”
Gwayi emeetuw, “Nii sibaneeda was, Yeesuuyda leabu Nasareetteeda Galilaaya gil.”

Gawa Yeesu jeeda gheeda sibatta Aseetta, hitta ghahoan fuga shaayda haleanjeeda ea gea shaah aba jeeda gheeda sibatta Aseetta, ak goobimbiineada measajeega fuga nyarja lappiya, ea hoorgajeega fuga shaayda gharibajeega.
Gwayeeshsha saawa, “Geang'waar gideaba, ‘Gheenyu gajeeguura gheeda sumoorra ghawooda;’ amaduw ghoanung' agooga ghoaw gwaleeda funnya geat mareanghooga.”
Gaweay headannyi fuga badoojiga ea gea ng'oawwi ak ghwanyasa jeeda gheeda sibatta Aseetta, ak ghoahaap.
Iiduw nea ghwadaa ashoohoodiga hees ea ng'oorshoodiga ng'asheega deamdeameadi sin, ea ghuusiga diibiga ajuur aba jeeda gheeda sibatta Aseetta nea gwayi, “Hoosaana Balleanda Dawdi!” Gwanyareesi;
geeyeeshsha niny, “Heappi niyiinyi gida nyah fiisu?” Gwayeeshsha Yeesu saawa, “Ea huumwa ghayi, miyoassoamwana gideaba,
‘Aba ghuusiga diibiga ea gea ghameekka manang'i
gaygwaduumshooweey muuchchi?’”
Hit ghang'eat ghwanung'wa heeda, ak gwaritteawa mujiini ak gawa Bettaniya ak gwalla hoowa.
Sakteayda nea gagal mujiini, ghwayeachchi.

Ghwadaah shaboogheechcheanda mida ghuutta naweeda, ak gaweesa, ama hitta heeda ghwadaa mandeawana haghweega geaghus seenga akghwahit. Ng'atta gwayeeshsha geetta, “Adagudijiili haghweega ea ghoaw gweannyeekka manda mudeanooda!” Ghaghajamiit geettida aba geeshangiga.
Daa giinealanga, ghahamng'eanyi nea gwayi, “Ghwasaan anda geedi gabay ghaghajamiit?”

Ghwasha Yeesu nea gwayeeshsha saawa, “Aba huumwa geayeeshshineegwa, iyondeawi masaweega nea manda jeesingeagwa machmajeega, ghoammuuschi nea majeaghus nii bea shaboogheechcheandean akghwahit, gajoammusa eara gideaba gajayeeshshiina giijeeni, loadaada ak geejakseey jeeda basooda, ak gaygwasa.
Amaduw iyondeawi masaweega, ak goomuschi nea ghoamwaashchi ghawooda gajanyasa haleanjeessean oogasayi.”

Iiduw nea gawa Yeesu jeeda gheeda sibatta Aseetta goonealshi, damani anealsheewean gaweay heeda ashoohoodiga hees ea gweargwa ak geannyaash, “Ng'asheesu deenuun gisni aba gheambalmeedeabeang'a, gagoonnyi ng'eaha gheambalmeani?”
Ghwasha Yeesu nea gwayeeshsha, “Eara aniini gaydanyasheagwa ng'ashaanjagi; ama oashaayi abeeda eara aniini gaydarukuneegwa gheambalmeani easnni ng'asheesuun headaanyasi.

Gibaattiisanda Yohaana gwaleabu yeenu? Gwaleabu humng'eeda ghana leabu heeda buuneeda? Hean goonyeari geat saawa gideaba, iisiyeeshshi, ‘Gwaleabu humng'eeda,’ abeeda gaygwayeeshshineasa, ‘Abeeda ghwasaan andamoamwasi?’
Ama siyeeshshi. ‘Gwaleabu heeda buuneeda,’ earada geawwalli emeeda; aba gideaba ghwanal buuneassean gideaba Yohaana sibaneeda.”
Hean ghwasha ghuutta Yeesu nea gwayeeshsha, “Meanali.” Ghwayeeshsha saawa, “Eara aniini abeeda ea maydarukneegwa heeda aanyasi gheambalmeani easni ng'asheesu seaniin.”
“Heappi ghoadaaktiin? Gwandeawa siyagi oorju iyyeenya; gaweesa dea madeeda ak gwayeeshsha, ‘Balleanda, askwareani una ak gisni gadiyeeda aba jeeda madamnyeanda misabiibu.’
Ghwasha nea gwayeeshsha, ‘Maydawa.’ Iiduw gwaduukkuunna ak gawa.
Gaweesa siitta bea iyyeenyean ak gwarukuteayda gidagwachchi; ghwasha nea gwayeeshsha, ‘Gaydawa, Siida mureeda,’ ak ea mawa.

Heappi! Aba jeedeaba fiisu assiyyeenyean gwasin anneeda gidagasa ghwaan?” Gwayeeshsha saawa, “Diitta bea madeedeani.” Ng'atta gwayeeshsha Yeesu saawa, aba huumwa, geayeeshshineegwa, fuga ang'ng'oonyi gwaadi ea fuga hiseada gaygoosheedeaweegwa beatta jeeda sugoochcheandumeeda Aseetta.

Aba gideaba Yohaana ghayi ghwaan heedeang'wa aba naweeda doabiiwaat ak ea moamwasi agooga, amaduw ghamwas fuga ang'ng'oonyi gwaadi ea fuga hiseada. Earappeadi noadaayi haleanjeeni seaniin ghanyea miyaduukkuunana ghana amwasa niny.

“Olleysiniit gideagali nuut. Ghayi gwanda siisi bea gheeda ak gwandeawa madamnyeanda misabiibu ak gooneaweesa hilgweanda ak gwasin heeda jea eesissa difaayi aba jeeda ak ghwadeas eara madalooda, ak ghoadaw fuga jea gooragan, ak ghang'eat gawa bareannyeekka aba ng'eanyi nuut.
Neekiit damanda haghweega goojeakta soomjoogaaschi heedeaba fukka aragan madamnyeandean gaweay gweadu haghweegaaschi.
Gageanu fuga ghayi ragan madamnyeandean ak ghoang'ngwaay soomjookka siichcheaktean ak geabwar akkalealla, nea niirja geenuus, nea niirja geefutta lagheanga.
Gabiikta goojeakta soomjooga suuk saang'a naawa gea madeeda; gabiikta gichcha gwasma fiisu gidada.
Aba huydeanda goojeakta balleandaannyi nea gwayi, ‘Gayghoawal gheang'da balleandeanyu.’
Iiduw nea ghwadaa fugiga ghayi aragan madamnyeandean balleandida gabaloola saawa nea gaba geat gideaba, ‘Nii siichchea gwahearaniischi gil, eabwara ghami ak geegeandi hearaniischoadaannyi.’
Hean geang'ng'waay ak geerrutteawa madamnyeandida bea misabiibuun ak geenuus.
Abeeda iihidu siidida bea madamnyeanda misabibuun gaygwahindaan fukka ghayi aragan madamnyeandean?”
Geeyeeshsha niny, “Gayghwalas uhuudeaba fukka munyasiin, ak ghoadaw madamnyeandida fii suuk jea gooragan ak geattaw haghweega aba damandaannyi.”
Gwayeeshsha Yeesu, “Heappi miyoassoamwana iitteaba ng'asheanji aba jeeda Ng'ooruutka?
‘Lagheaneeda ghayi anaawaghaang' deekshoodiga
niiw lagheaneeda haw bea sindeetta;
ng'asheanji gwaleabu heeda Ng'uttamiida,
ak ea daamdaamwaat aba gheanyangaasa?’
Aba nii geayeeshshineegwa, sugoochcheandumeeda Aseetta gajearreadeagwa ak geattaw eemwa nuut ammu gagu haghweagaschi.”
Ne siida jea ghoabeada aba uhuudeaba lagheaneeni gaygagiishachchi; nea siida wassean jea gobeedeaysa, gayghang'aal ea goosha.
Hean iiy Ashohoodiga hees ea Farisayajeega ng'asheagaschi galageadiini, gwajeeng'u gideaba gabaloola saawa.
Hean geebiissa eegasa gichchea eang'ng'waayda, amaduw geawal buuneeda aba gideaba ghwadaa gideaba sibaneeda gil.
Gabiikta Yeesu gichcha goobalool buuneeda aba galeega nea gwayeeshsha,
“Sugoochcheandumeeda humng'eeda gawuurji sea sugoochcheanda gasa gageesheesa balleandaannyi,
hean goojeakta soomjoogaaschi gaguursa fukka sirariin ghapka nyeangiida, amaduw fukka sirariin ghaheawa ghapka.

Gabiikta gichcha goojeakta soomjoogaaschi suuk ak gwayeeshsha, ‘Ayeeshshiina fuga heetta sirar apkaani aba gideaba, Ang'ulla neanuuschi heewgeasu ea muhooga risheadi nigeawiit ghwahit sean, apkaani nyeangiida.’
Ghanyea maduuppa, ghang'eang'eat gaweay, gawa akkaleala madamnyeandaannyi niirja gawa giigeakshoadaannyi,
nea gea abit ghoang'ng'waay soomjookka ak geesissa ghwarjeeda, ama ng'atta geabwar gameewa.
Hean ghwanyareas sugoochcheanda ak goojeakta shirikkareadaannyi ghwalas uhuudeaba fukka bara buneedean nea geang'uda mujiineeda nyaawa beasta.
Ng'atta gwayeeshsha soomjoogaaschi, ‘Nyeangiida nigeawiit ghwahit ama duw fuga heetta sirar ea mudu gwadeaschi.
Asi ang'eatng'eada aweayeena guyeeda naweadinga ak googuursi fuga oadaayi sean aguursiina ghapka nyeangiida.’
Gwaritta soomjookka ak gaweay bearsheeda naweadinga ak gooweamu gilinyoo ghwadaa gea, munyas ea gea miyaas, ea ghwannyiit gheeda rabasta.
Iiduw gawa sugoochcheanda gah ghwadaa rabastaannyi, ghwadaa siyagi miigookwa hang'weakka nyeangiida;
ghoanyaash sugoochcheanda nea gwayeeshsha, ‘Siideaduupcheewi, guwundiin jeedeaba gheawi nea mindeawani hang'weakka nyeangiida?’ Geerukusa ak ghwaroat ghuutta.
Gwayeeshsha Sugoochcheanda fuga gadiyeeda, ‘Arada geattinga ea geeshanga, ak ghoayaachchi ak goojaksi jeeda misaneeda jarooda, aba hoowa gaygooyyeawda nea goowiiri geeshatka aba sawanadeeda.’
Aba gideaba gea suguursa aasaang'a, nea gea siloat ea ng'ay.”
Ng'atta gaweay Farisayajeega ak gabaloola gichchea ghaghasta Yeesu aba ng'asheagaaschi.

Iiduw goojeakta giinealanga nyaawa headaannyi ea gea Heroode geannyaash nea geeyeeshsha, “Giinealshoochcheanda, Aseasa geanalli gideaba ang'iing'i guwosi siida huumwa, ak gibwadi nii giinnaali buuneeda naweeda Aseetta aba huumeanda, nea ghanyea miduuppi hawunda siida aba gideaba ming'ulli ratooda buuneeda.
Heappi, rukuneasa aba ang'iing'i gidaaktiini. Ghwadoabiiwi gideaba geattawji Gaysaari gwaadi ghana mwadoabiiwa?”
Gwajeeng'u Yeesu munyasnachcheekka nyaawa ak gwayeeshsha, “Anda googasayi asimsimean ea fuga ammitu geat?
Oahimni heappi lappiyeeda ottayiideawi gwaadi.” Gageanu buuneeda ak geattaw shiliingajeanda.
Ng'atta ghoanyaash Yeesu nea gwayeeshsha, “Gili gawuurji ng'eaha, ak gheawung'su gabeang'a?”
Geeyeeshsha, “Gaba Gaysaari.” Gwayeeshsha saawa, “Haleanjeeda Gaysaari oattawa Gaysaari, ak gea Aseetta ghoattawji Aseetta.”
Geeyi bwak ama iiy ng'asheesu ghahamng'eanyi ak gaweay.
Eaweettida gaweay heeda Yeesu Fiisu suguura Sadukkayajeega eena manda duunnooda ak ghoanyaash,
nea gwayeeshsha, “Giinealshoochcheanda, ghayi gwayi Muusa, ‘Siida iimeah, nea mwoabuuda diibiga, gayghaghi masiing'eandida ittannyiin oorjeeda ghaamwat, ak gwanyaksa oorjeeda ghaamwat diibiga.
Asi aba hiji bea ghaheanyean gwanda oorju ispwa bea ghaamwadagi; gageeshshi dea madeeda ak ghami nea miighwanyas diibiga ak gwanung'usa gatmoadannyi oorjeeda ghaamwat.’
Gwasnu earaba oorjeedeaba iyyeenya, ea oorjeedeaba samwagu, ea ghwahitta ispeennyaawa.
Aba huydeandeaba sea eara gatmootta ghami.
Aba jeeda duunnooda gay ghoaw gatmoodeabeang'a aba fiisu as ispwaan? Aba gideaba nindeayi sean.”
Ghwasha Yeesu nea gwayeeshsha saawa, “Agooga ghoaramwaschi aba gideaba mwoanali Ng'ooruutka ghana uurda Aseetta.
Aba gideaba eaweetta siduttuuna majeegeeshshi nea mwajeaghi aba gideaba gaygawuurji malaykajeega humng'eeda.
Ama duukku iitta dunnooda miyeeda, ea miyoassoamwana gidaghayi rukuneegwa Aseetta, ghayi gwayeeshshineegwa,
‘Aniini geewoschi Aseetta Abrahaamu, ea Aseetta Isakka, ea Aseetta Yakkobo?’ Asi niny mii Aseetta fuga nimeewa gil, niny Aseetta fuga majeekcheewi.”
Iiduw nea gwayiing'shi emeeda ghahamng'eanyi aba ginealshoadaannyi.
Iimuchchu gheeda nea ghwayiiy Farisayajeega gideaba nirat ghuusiga Sadukkayajeega, ghabwat geat ak gabalool.
Ghoanyaash diinagiida nea gwasim.
“Ginealshoochcheanda, digheanda haw aba jeeda deaweeda anneeda?”
Gwayeeshsha niny, “Bwariinya Ng'uttamiida was Aseattaang'u aba guroroadaang'u sean, ea aba jeadaang'u sean, ea aba fughareadaang'u sean.
Nii digheanda hawi ak gabiissa ea dea madeeda gil.
Deaba iyyeenya gawuurji sea nii, bwariiyda siida ischeayeewi gidubwariiydi geaw.
Aba digheannyeeksu assiyyeenyean gwadiyeewa deaweedajeega sean ea sibanga.”
Iiduw nea ghabwatgeat Farisayajeega ghoanyaash Yeesu nea gwayeeshsha,
“Iing'ullayi Gristo ea ng'eaha? Heappi ghoanung' ghoaw balleandeabeang'a?” Ak gwayeeshsha Saawa, “Balleanda Dawdihi.”
Ak gwayeeshsha saawa, “Abeada ghwasaan iiduw inyas gwayeeshsha Dawdi aba Gurorooda, Ng'uttamiida, nea gwayi,
‘Ng'uttamiida gwayeeshsha Ng'uttamiideanyu,
apteada aba meatkweedeanyu bea geattinda dugwa,
bwak ea dayiin weajoadigaagu jeeda baneaguukka geashangaagu?’
Abeeda Dawdi iiguura Ng'uttamiida, abeeda ghoammu ghoawdaan ballaandaannyi?”
Aba hiji ghwaroat siida jea gwarukusa ng'asheanda. Ghang'eada eaweettida ghwaroat sichchea ghoanyaash gichcha ng'asheanda.
Ng'atta gwayeeshsha Yeesu emeetuw ea giinealangaschi,
“Ng'oorshoodiga ea Farisayajeega goobiitpiida hoorgeeda Muusa;
asi ng'asheega jea gwarukuneegwa sean oang'ng'waanya nea goosinnyi ak ea adoogali sinaweega nyaawa ea adoosinnyi aba gideaba saawa gwarukkwiida nea masinna.
Saawa iissa ghwarat sareennyeekka durmani ak ghoasari buuneeda ghwaada hamarjoojiga, nea magassa eara gideaba gayghwasat eara aba monneeda.
Gichcha sinaweega nyaawa sean inyeessa gwasin ghwadaa buuneeda aba gideaba iissa gooheettu barawajeegeagwa bea mooshta ghawooda, nea googeawiidi seapseata nyaawa.
Fuga bwariiy goobitpiida hoorgajeegeaba mwadi eaweetta ghwelmeeda, nea ghabwaariiy goobiida mwadi aba jeesinga ghoorajeega sinnealshachcheewa.
Iissa ghabwariiy gideaba gajeeyeenniisa seayu aba naadajeega nea gaguura buuneeda Rabi.
Ak agooga ea adagaguureeweegwa sih Rabi, aba gideaba Ginealshoochcheandeang'wa aa akkalealla amaduw agooga goobeayi ghaamwadagi.
Nea adooguuri siida, Bwaabwa aba ng'eanyiida aba gideaba, Ghweandeang'wa aa akkalealla nea gwanda humng'eeda.
Biissa gichcha ea adeeguureeweegwa fuga hees, aba gideaba, siida haw aakkalealla, nea Gristo gil.
Siida haw aba jeedeang'wa gayghoaw soomjeandeang'wa.
Siida adiing'u geaw gajeahiing'u, nea deahiing'u geaw gajeettiing'u.”

“Eamuy deang'wa ng'oorshoodiga ea Farisayajeega, ammiittu geat! Aba gideaba ghoakghuumi buuneeda gidaghuutta sugoochcheandumeeda humng'eeda, nea mooweayeeni jeeda, nea fuga jea gaweay ea moosiksiini gaweay jeeda. [

Ashageada agoogeeda was ng'oorshoodiga ea Farisayajeega ammiittu geat! Aba gideaba goyeagiisachcheewi gealga masinung'weega, amaduw aba gimminnoadeaba geat iissa ghoamwaashchi ghawooda nea gokkeawiichchi; asi gajanyasa ghorjooda haw muuchchi.]

Eamuy deang'wa ng'oorshoodiga ea Farisayajeega ammiittu geat! Aba gideaba gooneayeewi jeesinga baskweega ea ng'eanyiida bwadaw nea googasayi siyagi jea ghwalalaan, amaduw nea niiw, ghoanung' ghwoaw jeepta maloonghajeega niba iyyeenya ea ghwanawaneagwa agooga.

Eamuy deang'wa ashoohoodiga ng'oawwi! ‘Agooga iissa gooyeennyi siida iyaksa habeawooda gheeda sibatta Aseetta ea miigili; ama aksa habeawooda lagheanga meang'meang'i mida jeeda Gheeda Sibatta Aseetta abeeda ea nirat geaw aba habeawooni.’
Ea fuga ng'oawwi bissea leekghteega! Aghaloamwaat anneeda lagheanga meeng'meeng'i ghana gheetta sibatta Aseettean nung' ghoaw lagheanga meeng'meeng'i haleanjeeda ghaydidiin?
Nea gooyeenyi, ‘Siida jea gweaksa habeawooda altaari ea miigili; ama aksa habeawooda haleanjeeda sisappa geadi bea ghadooweeda mida badayda altaari, ea nirat geaw aba habeawoani.’
Ea fuga ng'oowwi! Aghaloamwaat muuchchi anneeda, haleanjeetta sisabwa geadi bea ghadooweedean ghana heeda wagiida, nung' ghoaw haleanjeeda sisabwa geadi bea ghadoweeda haleanjeeda ghaydit?
Siida aksa habeawooda altaari, gweaksa habeawooda eara haleanjeetta sean mida uhudean;
nea siida aksa habeawooda gheeda sibatta Aseetta, gweaksa habeawooda nii ea siida abiitta jeeda;
nea siida aksa humng'eeda habeawooda, gweaksa horgeeda sugoochcheandumeeda Aseetta habeawooda, ak ghabwada eara siida apteadayyeewa uhuudaannyi.

“Eamuy deang'wa ng'oorshoodiga ea Farisayajeega, ammiittu geat! Iissa ghoanung' ghoadayda buuneeda gilagi aba jeeda damanamughuush aba mwayoah ea ruruukta ea hamuumayga ea seenga ng'andit, nea ghoappuuchchi ng'asheega durmani bea deaweeda was humeanda ea innyeanda jeeda ea baydeayda ea masaweega. Suh ng'asheega ghwanyawa haguuw gideaba gajasna gil, nea mwoanung'waadani ng'asheega suurja.
Ea ashoohoodiga ng'oowwi, ammu ghamuush doonyooda ak ghwanukghutta ngamiya!

“Eamuy deang'wa ng'oorshoodiga, ea Farisayajeega ammiittu geat! Aba gideaba iissa goohuunnyi badayda bayookta ea dea gweeriida, nea jeeda ghwannyiit haleanjeeda orreedayi buuneeda ea shidoodeaba ghaang'.
Ea Farisayajeanda ng'oaw! Nyooh ghannyi asheeda ahuuna jeeda bayookta ak abeeda gayghammiidu eara badayda.

“Eamuy deang'wa ng'oorshoodiga, ea Farisayajeega ammiittu geat! Goowurjeewi bung'eadinga siyeasha badahuukka roonghooda, amaduw nea geeng'ulluna bwadaw ea miyaas, nea aba jih ghwannyiit geakka fuga nimeewa ea ririnnyeanda sean.
Gwasunu eara agooga ing'ulluunaneegwa buuneeda bwadaw goowoschi fuga doobiiweadi, nea aba jih ghwannyiit munyinnda ea ging'uuchcheeda.”
“Eamuy deang'wa ng'oorshoodiga, ea Farisayajeega ammiittu geat! Aba gideaba iissa ghoadeaschi bung'eadinga sibanga, ak iissa ghoattamdaamnyi bung'eadinga fuga miyaas,
nea gooyeennyi, ‘Inyeeda ghwanyawa geendi damandida bea gheamba ghwaanigaasa bea garayiin, gwachchi ea majeahhiida foojeanda sibaneeda.’
Aba sareani goomuuwu gideaba goowoschi balloojiga fuga ghayi nuus sibanga.
Asi oannyiida gitta ghayi adeenniida ghweanigeagwean.
Ea ichchipkeega ea dayeega udang'usheega, gajoammustaan amulsiina girgweageeda jea ghwadeagwa heeda maloonghajeega?

Ak gaydeajeagu sibanga ea weaghoodiga ea ng'oorshoodiga, mwaatkwa gajanuuseada nea goongoorsi iheenga beehajeega, nea suurja gajabwara aba jeesinga ghoorajeegeagwa siinnealshachcheewa nea ghoahoannyi aba gilinyoo ea mujiini,

ak abeeda gayghwahidu badahuukkeagwa foojeanda sean bea fuga doobiiweadi weayeesa badayda ng'eanyiida, ghang'eada fojeanda ghayi sihida bea Habeeli ghayi doabiiwaat, ea gagul fojeanda Sakkariya was balleanda Barakkiya ghayi onuukusi jeeda gheeda sibattiisa Aseetta dageascheeda heeda Ghaydit ea dea heeda heeda wagiida.
Aba huumwa geayeeshshineegwa ng'asheesu seaniin gayghwahidu badaydeaba seaygeani.”

“Ea Yerusaleemu, Yerusaleemooda, inuusay sibanga nea gifutti lagheanga fuga sichcheakseey! Neagasayi dabwada geat diibigaagu niba hada, gawuurji gidahinniida nghaghooda dayeagaaschi aba jeeda meang'eegaaschi ak ghoaheawi!
Asi ang'ulla ghaheang'wa sinung'usa heeda ghoaw eemeeda.
Asi geayeeshshineegwa, majagudoobiikta adahaan gichcha ea eaghus eeyi bwak ea ayeena, ‘Sittaw ghawooda siida wunna gheawunga Ng'uttamiida.’”
Gwaritteawa Yeesu jeeda gheeda sibatta Aseetta ak ghang'eat gawa, ak gaweay heeda giinealangaaschi ak geehiimsa gissideasta gheetta sibatta Aseettean.
Ghwasha niny ak gwayeeshsha, “Moong'ulli haleanjeeni seaniin? Aba huumwa geayeeshshineegwa, manda eara lagheaneanagi jea ghoabit aba uhuudeaba niirja jea ea majeeng'ng'adeadu.”

Iiduw nea goopteada Yeesu aba uhuuda gijeeda Maseytuunajeega, gaweesa giinealangaaschi aba heeda funyaat ak geanyasa hichpa geaw ak geannyaash gideaba, “Rukuni ng'asheesu gayghoaw eeju? Amaduw hinnoadaang'u gwanda gwadeagooda jea eadaaha ghana dea mudeanooda damanda?”
Ghwasha Yeesu nea gwayeeshsha, “Ang'ulla adiiduw gwareenganneegwa sih.
Aba gideaba gayghwahidu fuga saang'a nea gaygaba nii ayi, ‘Aniini geewoschi Gristo,’ ak gaygwareengani fuga saang'a.
Gajayiinya iitta ng'uchcheeda ea dea ng'uchcheadinga, ang'ulla adaghoabealeagwa, aba gideaba ng'asheesu mayghwashiy hinnooda, amaduukku mudeanooda ea mighoaw.
Aba gideaba gaygang'uchchi daroar ea daroar nuut, ak gang'uchchi sugoochcheandumeeda ea sugoocheendumeeda nuut, ak gaygwanda geejeeda ea sawooda ng'eanyiida aba hiji ea hiji:
suu seaniin ghang'eat ghuutta lajooda.
Iimuchchu gheeda gajealabeagwa bwadaw eesawaneegwa amaduw geenuuseegwa; gayghwasteagwa Emoojiga sean appadaydeanyu aba gheawungeasu.
Ak abeeda fuga saang'a gajeeruusa nea goohheakkiida geat nea gwasta geat.
Amaduw gayghwahidu sibanga saang'a bea ng'uyyeega ak gaygwareengani fuga saang'a.
Iiduw nea ghoahaada deambiilaneandumeeda buuneeda, hean gaygabiissa ghamwaning'idaada bariinyeega aba jeesinga nyaawa.
Abeeda siida jea ghamilikghta ea gammudean ada ea siida jea ghwalalaani.
Gichcha gajeerukkwiida Giijasta Miy bea sugoochcheandumeeda aba ng'eanyissean ghoaw muwwunooda aba emoojiga sean, ama ng'atta abeeda ghwahidu mudeanooda ng'eanyiida.”
“Asi iyoadaayi gidamuy jea gweadu nyariida, ghayi rugu sibaneeda suguura Daniyeeli nea niminaada aba heeda ghaydit (dea assoamwa adanala),
abeeda fuga mida ng'eanyiida Yudeeya dasalsiina giijeega;
nea siida mida badayda bulaliida ea adaghwararang'aan gageanu haleanjeeda mida jeedeaba gheannyi;
nea deamida madamnyeanda ea adagabiigu bwadaw ghamwagha hang'daannyi.
Eamuy dea gheamadiga mideawa diibiga ea gea areer diibiga aba damani!
Amwaasha Aseetta eamoosaldani eaweetta gooroogeeda ghanea eaweetta Sabattoohi
Aba gideaba damani gaygwanda sawanadeeda haw manda deadeenna aba deaghayi sisna ng'eanyiida ea ghoaw ghamneawa, ak ea maygudu abiikta adaah sawanadeeda uurji nii earahay.
Nea ghwanyawa askwearjoojusu dagheeda ea meannuwaasa ghwanyawa ea maygwanda sichchea ghwalalaan; iiduw geelagu askwearjoojusu appadahuukka fukghayi sibay ealoat.
Asi eaweechcheanji iyeeshshineegwa sih ‘Gristo gwanda hiji!’ ghana ‘Gwanda hoowa!’ Adoamwaschi.
Aba gideaba gayghwahidu Gristohajeega ng'uyyeega ea sibanga ng'uyyeega. Ak gayghoahiimu gwadeagwajeega hees deamdeameadi jea ghoammu gahutteawi fuga ghayi bay ealoat.
Ang'ulla nigeawiit dareekuseegwa ammwadi.
Asi iyeeshshineegwa, ‘Adaaha diida gwanda dareapcheada, ea adiiduw gooritti;’ ghana iisiyi, ‘Gwanda jeeda gheeda,’ ea adoamwaschi.
Aba gideaba gawuurji dadamandeetta abwaay heeda ghayeawa ea gagul heeda biyearean nii abeeda gichchea gawuurji hinnooda Balleanda Siida.
Heeda wassean mida gumeeda heeda jea gabattiisa geat madoonyakka.”

“Iimuchchu nea ning'atta sawanadeedida bea askwearjoojigigeaniin, gajeenung' gamisaniit gheang'da aseetta, nea sheeda ea maygooboong'u, nea miinga mida humng'eeda gaygoobittu, nea uurda humng'eeda gajeettumduum;

ng'atta gajeadaah gwadeagooda Balleanda Siida aba humng'eeda, abeeda emoojiga sean bea muunda ng'eanyiida gayguuttu heareega idaah Balleanda Siida nea ghwaan aba badayda shamooghuutka humng'eeda nea gwandeawa uurda ea gigheambiitta haw;

ak gaygoojeakta malaykajeegaaschi ghaghuut muuchchi durumbeatti ak gaygaweay gooweamu fugaaschi loat aba murdajeega assang'wan bea ng'eanyiida, ghang'eada murdeeda humng'eeda meatkweeni ea gagul meatkweetta.
“Ajeeng'ni ng'asheesu eagali shaboogheechcheandean: ifirfiir damealgaschi ak gwardu seenga, goojeeng'u gideaba damanda domeelda ninekkiit.
Gwasnu eara agooga iyoadaayi ng'asheesu seaniin nean ghwahidu ghoanalli gideaba ninekkiissa gidaghuut.
Aba huumwa gaydarukuneegwa gideaba mayghwanawda seaygeani nea miighwahidu suu seaniin.
Humng'eeda ea ng'eanyiida gayghang'atta, amaduukku ng'asheegeasu ea mayghang'atta eara hay.”
“Dukku iitta askwearjeandida ghana damandida manda siida nal eaweetta jea gawaseewa eara malaykajeega humng'eeda ghana Balleanda geaghus Bwaabwa nea gaba geaw.
Aba gideaba gaygawuurji gidaghayi bea damanda Nuuhu, nii gichchea gawuurji hinnooda Balleanda Siida gil.
Aba gideaba damandida ghayi miighwahinna roopta hawiin abeeda buuneeda iissa gweagiischi nea gwaleeshi, gageeshi nea geaghi, ea eayi bwak ea gawa Nuuhu jeeda maleambooda,
nea majeeng'na ea ghwahidu roopta duw ak gwaduulu buuneessean, nii abeeda gichchea gawuurji hinnooda Balleanda Siida gil.
Damandida gaygwanda fih iyyeenya madamnyeanda gajeegeanda agi ak geenung'usa heeda niirja.
Gadeem iyyeenya gajeahitta nea gang'ealshi, ak gajeegeanda agi ak geenung'usa heeda niirja.
Asi oang'ng'wearni aba gideaba mwoanali eaweetta jea ghwahinna Ng'uttamideang'wa.
Asi anala ng'asheanji gideaba inyeeda ghwanyawa ghwanal siida bea gheeda damanda eaweeda jea ghwahinna mareanghweanda, gayghoang'wearu nea ghanyea mayghwanung'waada enyarja gheannyi.
Gwasnu eara agooga asissina geat, aba gideaba Balleanda Siida gayghwahidu damanda morarsiini.”
Nii gajea anasihi was soomjeanda doabiiwaat mideawa weaghumeeda, iin siidaannyi haw uhuudeaba gheannyi ak ghoadaw buuneeda daghwarda aba damandaannyi?
Ghang'wana soomjeandida ama hidu Siidaannyi hawiin ghwahitta nea gwasinda ng'asheega gidaghayi surukusiindean.
Aba huumwa, gaydayeeshshineegwa, gaygageanu ak ghwayiin haghweeda halanjeadannyi sean.
Amadukku soomjeandida muyiin iyeeshsha geaw aba jeadaannyi nishing'da Siideanyu hawiin,
amahit gabiissa ghabwar soomjooga ama ng'atta gweagiischi nea gwaleeshi sea leeydean,
gayghwahidu Siidaannyi haw bea soomjeandideani eaweetta mararsiina ea damanda mwanala.
Ak gayghwaaga ghorjooda, ak ghwanung' gwandeayi sea fuga ammittu geat; abeeda gaygwanda shookka ea giwiirrooda geeshatka.
“Abeeda sugoochcheandumeeda humng'eeda gaygawuurji sea haw damanamughuush geanu gheaboonyaanga nyaawa akkaweay ghwadeapta siida geeshi.
Aba jeannyaawa ea dasheahi haw muut nea suurja gea ammuut ea weaghoodi.
Haweekka ammuut dasheahiin ghwaat gheaboonyanga nyaawa nea mwayiina jeesinga nagheeda;
duukku haweekka mideawa weaghumeedean gageanu nagheeda ak ghwayiin jeeda haleanjeeda sea gheaboonyanga nyaawa.
Iiduw nea ghwashing'da siida geeshshi geeyi bwak ea ghang'utta ghaat ak gwalil.
Bugusta eaweeda agweena ghwanya sideechcheekka nea gwayi, ‘Asaghayneawa, nihidu siida geeshi! Aweayeena deepteayda.’
Ghang'eat ng'eat haweegiga seaniin aba geeshangiga ak gwasissin gheaboonyanga nyaawa.
Gwayeeshsha haweegiga dasheahiin gea weaghoodi; ‘Agoaneasa nagheedeang'wa suung'ay aba gideaba gheaboonyangaasa iissa gamis.’
Gwayeeshsha giikka mideawa weaghumeedean, ‘Manda mayghoahideasa aseasa ea agooga! Ghang'wana ghoang'ng'waanyi naweeda ak gooweesi fuga sheahida nagheeda ak ghoashaayi.’

Ng'eat ng'eat haweekka dasheahiin gaweay ghwasha nagheeda, goobeeru siida geeshshi ak goodeayi jeeda gheeda haweekka hidaat bay ea niding'ding'dean ak gaweay jeeda gheeda nyeangiida amang'atta gearat gidaghuut.
Iiduw ghwahidu eara haweaga suurja ak gaguurriida aba gidaghuut nea gwayeenniissa, ‘Ea Ng'uttamiida, ea Ng'uttamiida, eaniyean jassseasa.’
Ghwasha nea gwayeeshsha; ‘Aba huumwa, geayeeshshineegwa, agooga mwanaleagwa.’
Hean gwayeeshsha, asi oang'ng'wearni, aba gideaba mwoanali eaweetta jea gawaseewa ghana damanda.”
Damandida gaygawuurji sea siida gasa gawa bareannyeekka, gaguursa soomjoogaaschi ak goodeaga haleanjeedaannyi;
gageanu ak gaba siisi adaw haleanjeeda heeda ammu ghoadaw siyagi lappiyeeda suguura dalanta muut, ak ghoadaw niirja iyyeenya, ak ghoadaw niirja agi, amahit ghang'eat gawa bareannyeekka.
Gageanu siitta heetta siittaw dalantaji muudiin amang'atta googeakshi ak gabiikta gwayi dalantaji muut gichcha.
Eara siida heetta sittaw dalantaji iyyeenya googeaksheatta ak gabiikta ghwanyas dalantaji iyyeenya suuk.
Dukku siidida siittaw agiin gawa amahitta ghaghurghur shoomanda ak ghafuy lappiyeeda siida bea gadiyeeda.
“Muchchu nea nigeawiit rudeaydaannyi gabiigu siidida haw bea soomjoogigeani amahidu gwayiida haleanjeedaannyi.

Ghwaan siitta ghayi siittaw dalantaji muudiin nea gweadu dalantaji muut suuk amahidu gwayeeshsha, ‘Siida haw, ang'wearda ghayi gugoonnyean dalantaji muut ak ghamneawa ea naahaachchi suuk dalaantaji muut.’
Gwayeeshsha siitta hawiin, Ghwadoabiiw soomjeanda miy doabiiwaat; nuwosi doabiwaat aba haleanjeeda ng'ayi, gajambala gasaang'a, benni apteada nea gihoosani sea siida haw.

Ghwahidu eara siitta ghayi siittaw dalantaji iyyeenyean nea gweadu dalantaji iyyeenya ahaada ak gwayeeshsha, ‘Siida haw, ghayi gugoonnyean dalantaji iyyeenya; sukwa nanyaschi suuk iyyeenya gea niihaada.’
Gwayeeshsha siidaannyi haw; ‘Ghwahit soomjeandeanyu miy doabiwaat; nuwosi doabiwaat aba haleanjeeda ng'ayi, gajambala gaasaang'a beenni apteada nea gihoosani sea siidaang'u haw.’”
“Ghwahidu siitta ghayi siittaw dalanteenagiin ak gwayeeshsha, ‘Siida haw, aniini ghanalli gideaba guwosi siida hang'waay, iissa gilaji heeda mihisani, ak giimughuushi aba heeda mileelsiini;
ghabealli ak geawi dafuy dalanteadaang'u aba jeessigeeda. Asi ang'ng'waanya gea was gaagu.’
Ghwasha siidaannyi haw nea gwayeeshsha, ‘Ang'iing'i guwosi soomjeanda muy bea ghaleehooda! Ginali gideaba iissa ghaalaji heeda ghayi meahisani ak ghamughuushchi aba heeda ghayi mealeelsiini?
Abeeda mammiiseeyi eaditta lappiyedeanyu heeda fuga jea goodiing'u nea abeeda ghwanyawa gaydanyas lappiyedeanyu ea gea jea ghoahaada.
Asi oarreada siisi dalanteani ak ghoattawji siitta mideawa dalantaji damanamughuushiin.
Aba gideaba siida nyoo googar gil gajeeheassa ea ghwanawda; amaduukku siitta meagara giliin, eara gitta mwanang' mideawean gajearreat.
Duukku soomjeanji marachchi giliin, ajaksiina jarooda jeeda misaneeda; hoowa gaygwanda shookka ea giiwiirrooda geeshatka.’”
“Damanda jea ghwahinna Balleanda Siida aba jeeda gigheambiittaannyi, nea goodeana malaykajeega, hean gaygoopteada aba uhuuda hoorgda giigheambiittaannyi.
Gaygabassa geat Emoojiga sean mwadeadaannyi ak gaygooheeldooscheatta gideajusu aheeldooscheatta jeagiischoochcheanda gisilga ea nooga,
akkayghwayiin gisilga meatkweadaannyi bea geattinda dugwa akghwayiin nooga meatkweadaannyi bea geattinda ghadaam.

“Ng'atta gaygwayeeshsha sugoochcheanda fukka mida meatkweadaannyi bea geattinda dugwean, ‘Abeenni agoogeeda ghayi nugooneegwa Bwaabwa ghawooda ahearana sugoochcheandumeeda ghayi sibay erarseegwa ghang'eada dea ghayi subwada ng'eanyiida;
aba gideaba geabearjeewi jalooda ak googoonnyean gichchadaak, geabearjeewi muwooshta ak googoonnyean beega jea dali, geabissi dawos rabascheanda ak goollullean,
geabissi dawos dawiish ak gookkweallean, ghamnyaannyi ak ghoapkannyi ollong'sean, geandi ghealooniga ak ghoapkannyi allong'sean.’

Aba damani gaygwayeeshsha fukka doobiiweadiin, ‘Ng'uttamiida, nii gajea andamwani sidayeay nea gibearjeewi jalooda ak geegoonnyeey gichchaaga, ghana bearjeewana muwooshta ak geegoonnyeey beega jaaleaha?
Ak nii gajea aneaweechcha gil jea ea sidaayeay nea guwosi rabascheanda ak geadeaptaanyeey, ghana woosa dawiish ak geakwealleey?
Nii gajea anndamwan gil jea ea sidahaneay nea gimnyaani, ghana midana ghealooniga ak geapkaannyi ellong'seey?’
Ghwasha Sugoochcheanda nea gwayeeshsha, ‘Aba huumwa gaydayeeshineegwa, gili wassean noosissi siyagi aba jeedeaba orjoosu bea giyeanya manang'iin goosinnean aniini.’

“Iiduw gaygwayeeshsha fukka mida meatkweadaannyi bea geattinda ghadaamiin, ‘Oang'amwana madeedeanyu, fukghayi sumwaashta, aweayeena jeeda beasta manda mudeanooda ghayi sibay eerarsa Meang'nyeandeenda ea malaykajeegaaschi;
aba gideaba geabearjeewi jalooda ak ea moogoonean gichchadaak, geabearjeewi muwooshta ak ea moogoonean beega jaadali,
geewoschi rabascheanda ak ea moollulean, geewoschi dawish ak ea mookweallean, ghaamnyaannyi nea geandi ghealooniga ak ea moapkaani oolloong'sean.’

Abeeda gayghwasha saawa nea gwayeeshsha, ‘Ng'uttamiida, nii gajea aneaweechcha gil sidaahaneey nea gibearjeewi jalooda, ghana muwooshta ghana wosa rabascheanda ghana wosa dawiish, ghana miyaana ghana midana ghealooniga, ak ameaweadeay?’
Ak gaygwayeeshsha niny, gaydayeeshshineegwa, ‘Aba huumwa, ghayi iissa iyoaheawi asissiina ng'asheesu siyagi aba jeedeaba orjoosu manang'iin, abeeda ghoaheawi asinnean aniini.’
Abeeda fiisu gaygaweay jeeda ghoorjooda manda mudeanooda, nea fukka doobiiweadiin gaygaweay jeeda eaweega manda mudeanooda.”
Iiduw nea ghoahiit Yeesu ng'asheesu seaniin gwayeeshsha giinealangaaschi,
“Mwoanali gideaba ing'atta eawooji iyyeenya abeeda gajea ghweelmeeda Basakka gil, ak gajeattayda Balleanda Siida engoor.”
Aba damandida gabassa geat Ashoohoodiga hees ea gweargwa seammooda gheeh Gayaafa nea ashoohoochcheanda haw gil.
Gabaloola gichchea ghoang'ng'wayda Yeesu aba seachta ak geenuus.
Iiduw gwaneaji gideaba “Adeesinnyi ng'asheanji eaweetta ghweelmeeda aba gideaba gajiiduw ghwadaakghuyan emeeda.”
Damanda mideewa Yeesu gheeh Simoneeda suguura siida bearji udamusuura,

ghwahidu headaannyi gatmooni eattu gideeshteayda nyiit nagheeda ng'andit guuyi sakghwiloah bissa gaba sheaydeeda haw, ghwahidu nea goobiitpiit gheatta agiischooda, ak goodalealsa uhuuda nagheetta ng'andidiin.
Daa Giinealanga ng'asheanji gwanyareesi, nea gwayi, “Darariini gaba naaha?
Nagheani gwachchi isishayda gayghwanyas lappiyeeda saang'a jea eattaw fuga barbari.”
Gwajeeng'u Yeesu gidabaloola jeesinga nyaawa ak gwayeeshsha, “Ghwasaan andagootteawiichi gatmooda? Niny gwasinnean ng'asheanda miy.
Aba gideaba fuga barbari goondeaydooscheewi galeegasean, amaduukku aniini ea majeendeayeena galeegasean.
Gatmooni goodalealsean nagheeda ng'andit aba gideaba gwasissinan aba bunyitteanyu.
Aba huumwa geayeeshshiineegwa, heeda wassean aba muunda ng'eanyiida surukwiideaysa Giijasi Miyiin, gili sin gatmooniin, gajeebaloolla aba giipkeattannyi.”
Muchchu gawa nisih Yudaayda Iskariyotte nea gaba jeedeaba giinealangiga attamaniyyeenyean heeda ashoohoodiga hees.
Hitta gwayeeshsha, “Gajagoonean naaha iyalaapchi bwadaw niny ak geagoonnyeegwa?” Geeyittisa geattinga shilingaji diktam ea damanamughuush.
Ghang'eada damandida gagaseadayyi gheatta gichchea ghwalaapta bwadaw.
Eaweetta madeada nea miighwahidu ghwelmeeda mukkattajeega miigamattawiidi, gaweay Giinealanga heeda Yeesu ak gwayeeshsha, “Gigasayi esinney hamitta basakka aba yeenu?”
Gwayeeshsha Niny, “Aweayeena mujiini gheappa sih ak gooyeeshshi, ‘Gwayi Ginealshoochcheanda, nigul damandeanyu ak geagasayi daak hamitta Basakka sea giinealangeasu aba jeedeaba gheang'u.’”
Gwasinda Giinealanga ng'asheega gidarukusiinda Yeesu ak ghoang'eat sinooda Basakka.
Huuw shing'ada goopteada Yeesu sea giinealangaaschi attamaniyyeenya nea gweagiischi.
Damani agiischeewean, gwayeeshsha, “Aba huumwa, geayeeshshineegwa, siyagi aba jeedeang'wa gayghwalaabwan bwadaw.”
Gagiisan giinealanga muuchchi, ak gaba siisi anyaashta nea gwayeeshsha, “Siida aniini Ng'uttamiida?”
Ghwasha nea gwayeeshsha, “Siida jea dang'utta buurda sea niny nii siida jea ghwalaabwan bwadaw gil.
Balleanda siida gaygawa, gawuurji gidaghayi sing'oorsiinda, amaduw eadashageada siidida jea ghwala bwadaw Balleanda Siidean! Siisi ghang'wana gwachchi ea meeji.”
Gwayeeshsha Yuudayda jea ghwala bwadaw, “Rabi, aniini ghanea?” Gwayeeshsha niny, “Girgu ang'iing'i.”
Damanda agiischooda gageanu Yeesu mukkatte ak gang'ushsha, ak ghabwanach, ak ghoadaw giinealangaaschi nea gwayeeshsha “Oang'ng'waanya ak ghooyaaji, nii sasedeanyu gil.”
Ng'atta gageanu bayookta, ak gabadiischeesa, ak ghoadaw nea gwayeeshsha, “Aleayda bayoogi oagasean.
Aba gideaba suu foojeandeanyu bea neajeeda gil, ak geahiida appadahuukka fuga saang'a aba geandeayda ring'eeda.
Gaydayeeshshineegwa maygudu dabiikta dali gichcha difaayeeda sabiibu ea eaghus dabiikta dali gichcha gea eashish sea agooga aba jeeda sugoochcheandumeeda Bwaabwa.”
Iing'atta sarmeeda duumda, ghang'eatng'eat gaweay uhuuda gijeeda masaytunajeega.
Gwayeeshsha Yeesu saawa, “Aweani bea ghamneawean gajastaan oagasean aba gideaba geang'waar, ‘Gaydabwar jeagiischoochcheanda, ak gayghwadarda hawanda gisilga.’
Iimuchchu nea ghang'atta dunnoodeanyu gaydeasheedeawaneegwa dawa Galilaaya.”
Ghwasha Betro nea gwayeeshsha niny, “Eara ghamwachmwachnyi buuneeda ak gwanung'useey heeda, aniini maydanung'useey heeda eara hay.”
Gwayeeshsha Yeesu niny, “Aba huumwa geayeeshshineey aweani bea ghamneawean heeda mii googuuleewa nnghaghooda, gajeenishaang'nyaan niba samwagu.”
Gwayeeshsha Betro, “Eara ghoaw miyeeda emewdeayeena maydashaang'nyi eara hay.” Ghwanyaashtunu giinealanga sean.
Iiduw goodeayi Yeesu ea saawa jeeda madamnyeanda mwanang' suguura Getsemaani, ama ng'atta gwayeeshsha giinealangaaschi, “Oppitpiida aba hiji dawa hoowa damwaash Aseetta.”
Ghwaat Betro sea orju iyyeenya bea Sebedaayo, ak ghang'ut giseaneega ea gwadeawiit.
Miighoaw gil gwayeeshsha, “Guroroodeanyu eagisaneat muuchchi ea ghwariikghta dami, ooppitpiida aba hiji nea ghoang'ng'wearu sea aniini.

Hean gawa mwadi gilimwanang' ak gwatkuy ak gakkula gheamamdaannyi ng'eanyi ak ghamwaash Aseetta nea, gwayi Ea Bwaabwa, iimmuusi ginung' ghwasajaadawanaan bayoogi, ea adaghoaw gideagassiidi aniini, nung' ghoaw gidigassiidi ang'iing'i.”
Ghang'eat gawa heeda giinealanga ak ghwahitta nea nilil. Gwayeeshsha Betro, “Heappi mimmuusi gideaba gajang'wearni eara jeemba aseedeanagi eesa aniini?
Oang'ng'wearni nea ghoamwaashchi Aseetta ea mwoappittani jeeda simsimda; gurorooda ghwanyawa gagasa, amaduw ang'arng'ar saseeda.
Gabiikta deabiyyeenya ak ghamwaash Aseetta nea gwayi, ea Bwaabwa, iimay ghwasajaadawanaan bayoogi ea eeghus daleayda nung'waanda gwasa gidigassiidi ang'iing'i.”
Gabiikta gichcha heeda giinealanga ak ghwahitta nea nilil aba gideaba nudurmaniidi gheanyanga nyaawa aba ruweanga.
Gabiikta gwanung'sa heeda ak gawa ghamwaash Aseetta deaba samwagu nea gwargu ng'asheega gwachchi.
Ng'atta gabiigu heeda giinealangaaschi ak gwayeeshsha, “Abissiina alla nea goofuufchi? Adaaha nihidu damanda ak Balleanda Siida gajeayiin geattinga fuga riing'eega.
Ang'eatng'eada, eweaya; oang'ng'wearda siida jea ghwalaabwan bwadaw nukkwa nineekkiit.”

Damanda duugwandeawa hoowa nea gabalool ghwahidu Juuda nea gaba jeedeaba giinealangiga attamaniyyeenyean, nea goodeannyi sea emeeda mideawa bwaangajeega ea gulupkeakka nea goojeagu ashoohoodiga hees ea gweargwa.
Iiduw siitta jea ghwala bwadaw Yeesuun abeeda ea nigeawiit ghoadaw gwadeagooda nea gwayeeshsha, “Siitta jea dasamiin ajeeng'ni gideaba niny gil, abeeda ghoang'ng'waanyi.”
Hean gwanekkiissa Yuuda Yeesu ak gwayeeshsha, “Seayu Siida haw!” Amwahit ghwasam.
Gwayeeshsha Yeesu niny, “Ea siideaduupcheewi, ghwasaan anda gindi hiji?” Ng'atta ghwahidu Fugiga ak ghoang'ng'waay Yeesu.
Gageanu Oorjeanagi aba jeedeaba oorjookka gwachchi mideawa Yeesuun, ak ghoahakta geadi ak gafagu bwaangeadaannyi, ak ghwalas soomjeandida bea ashoohoochcheanda hawiin, ak ghwalach iitta.
Gwayeeshsha Yeesu niny, “Adealda bwaangeadang'u jeeda labaldaannyi, aba gideaba siida bwarda bwaanga, eara niny gajeabwara bwaanga.
Moanali gideaba gwachchi ghammuuschi damus Bwaabwa ammiih ghoaw gil gaygoojeagu lugooda saang'a bea malaykajeega?
Abeeda gaygwasamwattaan Ng'ooruutka ayi nii gidamiisa ghoawda baloolda gil?”

Damandida gwayeeshsha Yeesu emeeda, “Assagooga ghoapkaannyi oang'ng'wanyaan nea gooyeadu bwaangajeega ea gulupkeakka ghoanung' dawuurji mareanghweanda? Eawoojusu geabiitti gheeda sibatta Aseetta nea geanealshi ak ea moong'ng'oonnyean!
Ghamneawa eanisa ng'asheesu seaniin gwasa Ng'ooruutka ghayi bea sibaneeda.” Iiduw gwanung'usa heeda giinealanga ak gwasalda.
Hean gageanu Fukwachchi ang'ng'waay Yeesu ak ghwaat gheeh Gayafeeda was ashoohoochcheanda haw, nea nibattiisa geat ng'oorshoodiga ea gweargwa.
Ghwaat geeshta Betro nea gameaji ea sheagi ea ghwahitta seammooda gheeda ashoohoochcheanda haw, gaweay jeeda gheeda nea goodeayi furiischoodiga nea gagasa ghwadaa gichchea eesin.
Hean gagasa Ashoohoodiga hees ea gweargwa sean bea gheeda girgweageeda ng'asheanda ng'uyyeega jea emuuwwu appadayda Yeesu jea iiduw eenuuksa,
iiduw ea mudughwanyas ng'asheanda jea ennoas earappeadi buwa mushoodiga saang'a bea ng'uyyeega. Hean iiduw aba huydeanda ghwahidu fii iyyeenya
ak gwayeeshsha, “Siisi ghayi gwayi, ghammuuschi danyarja gheawi Sibatta Aseetean ak geabiikti dadeas gichcha aba askwearjooji samwagu.”
Ghang'eat Ashoohoochcheanda haw ak ghoanyaash, “Heappi mwayshaaha eara ng'ashaani? Fiisu gamuuwu naaha appadaydaang'u?”
Ghwasiinda Yeesu. Gwayeeshsha Ashoohoochcheanda haw, “Eaniyean aksiina Aseetta majeek habeawooda rukuneasa ang'iing'i ea guwosi Gristo, Balleanda Aseetta.”

Gwayeeshsha Yeesu niny, “Girgu ang'iing'i. Asi gaydayeeshshineegwa, ghang'eada ghamneawa gajadaaha Balleanda Siida nea goopteada aba meatkweeda geattinda dugwa hoauur, nea ghwaana badayda shamooghuutka humng'eeda.”
Aba damani ghabwashaada ashoohoochcheanda haw hang'weakkaschi ak gwayi, “Ning'eawi Aseetta. Gudeegassa mushooduspwa naaha gichcha? Asi ghamneawa nukkwa siyiinyi ging'wakkaaschi.
Gooyeennyiin agooga aba girgweageedeang'wa?” Ghwasha Saawa nea gwayeeshsha, “Gammiisa gideaba gajeenuus.”
Hean geeng'ng'uriisa ng'usheega gheamamdaannyi, nea geabwar digeanga; nea suurja gagul,
nea gwayeeshsha, “Ea Gristo! heappi daaha aajaanala siida lasnyi?”
Aba damandida Betro goopteada aba seammooda. Hean gaweesa hudagi bea gadiyeeda ak gwayeeshsha, “Eara ang'iing'i gindeaydooscheewi Yeesuyda Galilaaya.”
Ghwashaang' Betro aba madeeda buuneeda nea gwayeeshsha, “Aniini mwanali eara gidurgu”
Iiduw nea gwaritteawa gidaghuut gabiikta ghwadaa hut nuut bea gadiyeeda ak gwayeeshsha, fuga ghwanyawa mida hoowa, “Siisi gwachchi gwandeayi sea Yeesuuyda Nasareti.”
Gabiikta ghwashaang' Betro nea ghwaak habeawooda nea gwayeeshsha, “Aniini siisi mwanali”
Ng'atta gheadi nuwaas gaweay Fukwachchi mida hoowa heeda Betro ak gwayeeshsha, “Aba huumwa earang'iing'i guwosi siyagi aba jeedeaba fukka aba gideaba ghoahiimu baloaldaang'u.”
Damani ghamwaashta geaw Betro nea ghwaak habeawooda nea gwayeeshsha, “Aniini siisi mwaanali.” Deagheatta googuul nnghaghooda.
Hean ghoapkaat Betro ng'asheega heetta rukusa Yeesu, bea gideaba, “Damanda migooguula nghaghooda gajeenishaang'nyaan niba samwagu.” Gwaritta jarooda ak gooyyeawda.
Imuchchu nea ghaghar gayeew gagasa Ashoohoodiga hees ea gweargwa gichchea gwanuusta Yeesu.
Geerada aba biingu ak geayaat heeda Bilatto nea siida ambal ng'eanyiitta gil.
Iiduw nea ghwadaa Yudaayda heetta lah bwadaw Yeesu gideaba sirgweaksa, ghang'ut giseaneega ak googuumsa ashoohoodiga hees ea gweargwa shilingajeekka attiktam ea damanamughuushiin.
Gwayeeshsha, “Neadiinyi aba gideaba ghadaydi siida manda gidinyeanda ennus.” Gwayeeshsha Saawa, “Neada ghwadaseasaani aseasa? Ng'asheanji gabeachcheeweey ang'iing'i.”
Hean gwahisa niny shilingajeekka jeeda gheeda sibatta Aseetta, ak ghang'eat gawa amwahitta ghwaratta geaw.
Gageanda ashoohoodiga hees shilingajeekka nea gwayi, “Mammisiina gideaba gajeayiina jeeda gheaseeda aba gideaba suu lappiyeeda foojeanda gil.”
Gwaneaji ak ghwashaaha lappiyeetta madamnyeamba siisi sineadayyi dahuundiga ak ghoaw heeda jea ebunnyiisa rabasta.
Ghoaw gida duueguureewa madamnyeandida madamnyeanda foojeanda ea ghwoaw ghamneawa.
Ak gwasa ng'asheega ghayi rukuta sibaneeda suguura Yeremiya gideaba, “Gageanda lappiyaji diktaam ea damanamughuush moonneeda ghayi bea siida mwas fuga Israeeli gideaba gayghoadayda,
ak ghwashaaha madamnyeanda siida sina dahuundiga gawuurji gidaghayi eshshindanean Ng'uttamiida sinnda.”

Geanung' ghaminaada Yeesu aba madeeda siida haw bea ng'eanyiitta. Hean ghoanyaash Siitta haw bea ng'eanyiidean nea gwayeeshsha, “Ang'iing'i guwosi sugoochcheanda fuga Yahuudi?” Gwayeeshsha Yeesu, “Girgu ang'iing'i.”
Nea aba damandida argweaksiina ashoohoodiga hees ea gweargwean ghanyea mwasha eara ng'ashaan.
Hean gwayeeshsha Bilatto, “Miyiinyi ng'asheesu sean sumuwwunaneeyiini?”
Ghanyea mwasha Yeesu eara ng'ashaanjagi ea ghahamng'eanyi siitta haw bea ng'eanyiittean muuchchi.
Iissa eaweeda ghweelmeeda gageanu siida haw bea ng'eanyiida ak goottin siyagi wassean mida ghealooniga gasa emeeda.
Aba damandida gwanda siisi nalaat muuchchi was siida ghealooniga suguura ghawungaaschi Baraaba.
Hean iiduw nea ghabwat geat buuneeda ghoanyaash Bilatto gideaba, “Googasayi deattin ng'eaha, Baraabahi ghana Yeesuuyda suguura Gristo?”
Ghoanyashtaydunu nea ghwanal gideaba geayaat headaannyi aba lachng'eanyiida.

Damanda mideawa Bilatto uhuuda hoorgeeda argweachcha goojeakta gatmoadannyi siida weah gwayeeshsha, “Adiiduw gighasi geaw siisi doabiiwaadiin, aba gideaba geesawanan muuchchi aba jeeda girgweatka appadaydaannyi.”
Gageanu ashoohoodiga hees ea gweargwa ak ghaghoash buuneeda nea gwayeeshsha, amsa ettinneegwa Baraaba ak geenuus Yeesu.
Ghoanyaash siida haw bea ng'eanyiitta nea gwayeeshsha, “Googasayi deattin ng'eaha aba jeedeaba fiisu assiyyeenyean?” Gwasha saawa, “Baraaba.”
Gabiikta Bilatto ghoanyaash nea gwayeeshsha, “Ghamneawa googasayi dahindaan Yeesuyda suguura Gristo?” Gwayeeshsha sean, “Anngoora.”
Ghoanyaashta Bilatto nea gwayeeshsha, abwanaaha? Neada ea nidiinya naaha? Gabiikta saawa ghoaraanya gijuureanda nea gwayeeshsha, “Angoora”

Daa Bilatto gideaba mwanyasa gil ghoahaada nyarasta, gageanu beega ak goohuun geattingaaschi aba madeeda emeeda ak gwayeeshsha, “Aniini manda gichchea ghwaagan aba foojeadeaba siisi asawsiina agooga nea goobwageat.”
Ghwasha Buuneessean nea gwayeeshsha, “Nung'waada foojeandeaba siisi ghapka badahuukkaasa ea gea diibigaasa!”
Hean gageanu ak goottissa Baraaba, hit bayiiga Yeesu aba mughoowooda ghoadayda Yeesu enngoorsa uhuuda beehiida.
Gageanu shirikkarajeanda siida haw bea ng'eanyiitta ak ghwaat Yeesu jeeda gheeda sugoochcheanda, ak gabassa geat shirikkareeda sean.
Geafwakta hang'weakkaschi ak geekkwealsa hang'da oomu.

Geanap shiipka halaghweenga, ak geayiin uhuuda Yeesu, nea geegeanu muudeanda ak geayiin gattindannyi bea dugwa. Iissa geetkuy ammwadeadaannyi nea geejuuga nea geeyeeshsha, “Seayu, Sugoochcheanda Yahuudi!”
Geeng'ng'urriisa ng'usheega nea geegeanu muudeanda ak geabwara uhuuda.
Iing'atta jukkooda geegeanda hang'dida ak geeshuup hang'weakkaaschi hii geayaat engoor.
Iiduw nea gaweay geadaah siyagi suguura Simoneeda ng'eanyiida Girene, ak geediing'sa ghwasar behiidaannyi.
Sihitta hiji suguura Golgootta (nea gideaba dea Geapkeeda Uhuuda gil,)
geattaw difwayeeda sikkuuyi sea gidang'weanda, hean samu niny ghaheawa ghwali.
Iiduw nea ning'atta gingoorda geelaja hang'weakkaschi nea geeng'alealleesa;
gobiitpiit nea gafur.
Geayiin deascheeda uhuudaannyi ng'asheega siihaaktaaw sung'waardunu, “Nii Yeesu gil sugoochcheanda Yahuudi.”
Abeeda gwanda fii iyyeenya was mareanghooga siingoruudayi sea niny, dea manda meatkweadaannyi bea geattinda dugwa, niirja gwanda meatkweeda geattinda ghaadaam.
Iissa fuga ng'atta aba naweeda goong'eawi nea goodiindiil iheenga nyaawa nea gwayeeshsha,
“Ang'iing'eeda jea gwanyarja gheeda sibatta Aseetta ak ghwadeas aba eawooji samwagu, asi lealni geaw! Iiwosi Balleanda Aseetta, girarang'aanani uhuuda beehiida.”
Gwasunu eara ashoohoodiga hees ea ng'oorshoodiga ea gweargwa, gabarra budeay nea gwayeeshsha,
“Gwalealu suurja ak amwoammu gwalealu geaw. Niny sugoochcheanda Israeeli gil; asi dararang'aanana uhuuda behiida ghamneawa ak abeeda earaseasa gajeamwasa.
Niny ghaghus Aseetta ea dalealna ghamneawa iigasa, aba gideaba gwayi, ‘Aniini Balleanda Aseetta.’”
Eara Fukka was mareanghooga singooruuday sea ninyiin gong'eawi.
Ghang'eada aseetteaba lah ea ghwahitta aseetteaba shageash gwadukta ng'eanyissean misaneeda.
Iiduw nea nihitta aseetteaba shageash gooyyeawuda Yeesu nea gooheedu daghatta nea gwayi, “Eloyi, Eloyi lama sabaktani?” Nea gideaba, “Aseetteanyu, Aseetteanyu, anda nunung'usean heeda?”
Iing'shi fukka gwachchi miinaada aba hoowean ng'asheesu gwayeena gaguursa Eliya.
Ghafwach Siyagi ak gageanu ghabuscheanda ak ghoannyit beega ng'weani ak ghwayiin uhuuda muudeanda ak ghoadaw ghwali.
Gwayeeshsha buuneeda mwaatkwa, “Oommeasa eadaaha ea jea ghwaan gwalealu.”
Gabiikta Yeesu gooyyeawda nea gooheedu daghatta amang'atta ghoabitta gurorooda.
Ghabwaasha, hang'da subwaasha gheeda sibatta Aseetta nibiyyeenya, ghang'eada humng'eeda ea gagul ng'eanyi, gwasim geaw ng'eanyiida ak gabearshachchi lagheanga hees;
ghwajaada ghuusiga bung'eadinga ak ghang'eatng'eat sasanuukka saang'a bea fuga ghayi lil.
Rinna jeesinga bung'eadinga nyaawa ing'atta dunnoadaannyi, gaweay jeeda mujiineeda ghaydit ak goohiimsa geat fuga saang'a.
Hean daa shirikkarajeanda haw ea fukwachchi fur Yeesu gidasimda geaw ng'eanyiida ea ng'asheekka ghwanyawa bunuun, ghabeal muuchchi nea gwayi, “Aba huumwa siisi Balleanda Aseetta gil!”
Abeeda aba hoowa gwanda gadeemga saang'a ng'ula nea sheagi. Suh gadeemga ghayi eadu geeshta Yeesu nea gwaleabu Galilaaya nea gagadiyeesa.
Aba jeannyaawa gwanda Mariyaayda suguura Magdaleena ea Mariya gheamatta Yakkobo ea Yoseefu, ea gheamatta oorjooga Sebedaayo.
Iiduw nea ghoaw shing'ada ghwahidu siyagi was meanang'oochcheanda bea ng'eanyiida Arimattaya suguura Yoseefu. Nea abeeda eara niny ea giinealaneeda Yeesu gil.
Gawa heeda Bilatto ak gamus saseeda Yeesu, hean ghwanung Bilatto eattawa.
Gageanda Yoseefu saseeda Yeesu ak gookwealsa hang'deesh miy.
Ak ghwayiin jeeda bung'eadaannyi eesh ghayi gurgursa jeeda harearacheanda amwahit gooreakreaksa lagheaneeda haw ghuutta bung'eeda ak gawa.
Damandida goobitpiit Mariyaayda Magdaleena ea Mariya niirja nea goofuursa jeesinga nyaawa bung'eeda.
Hitta eaweetteaba iyyeenya was eaweeda giding'ding'deayda, gabassa geat ashoohoodiga hees sea Farisayajeega heeda Bilatto,
gwayeeshsha, “Ea Siida mureeda, sipkaachchi gidaghayi rugu siitta milmiliin damanda mii ghameawa gideaba, ‘Ing'atta eawooji samwagu gaydaduudu.’

Asi nung' eefur bung'eeda muuchchi ea ghang'atta eawooji samwagu, aba gideaba gajiiduw ghapka giinealangaaschi ak gwajagwat amaduw gwayeennisa buuneeda, ‘Niduunna miyeeda,’ Rengaweega huydean gayghwalaabwa hoowa dea madeeda.”
Gwayeeshsha Bilatto saawa, “Goondeawi furiischoodiga aweayeena afra muuchchi aba gidoammuusti.”
Hean gaweay ak gafur muuchchi heeda sibunnyiisa buuneeda nea geerroor lagheaneetta ak geayiin furiischoochcheanda.
Iimuchchu nea ning'atta sabatto, nea ghaghar gayeew eaweeda madeeda bea wikkajeanda, gawa Mariyayda suguura Magdaleena ea Mariyaydida bea iyyeenyean ghwadaa heeda sibunnyiisa buuneeda.
Hean gwasimgeaw ng'eanyiida muuchchi, ak gwashubean malaykajeanda humng'eeda bea Ng'uttamiida leabu humng'eeda amwahit ghoarakghrakghta lagheaneedida sidukuteawa ghuutta bung'eedean ak goopteadawa.
Nea gheamamdaannyi ghawaar dadamandeeda nea hang'weakkaschi ea eashish ghawaar gapkeanda.
Daa furiischoodigiga ghabeal muuchchi nea ghabwaadan ea gawuurji fuga nimeewa.
Ghwalamda malaykajeanda humng'eeda ak gwayeeshsha gadeemgiga, “Agooga adoabealli; ghanalli gideaba googasayi Yeesuuyda heetta singoor.
Manda hiji aba gideaba nuduutteayda gidaghayi rukuteayda. Apkaani adaaha heeda heetta siyiin.
Asi ahalageat ak gooweayi arukusiina giinealangaaschi gideaba niduunna miyeeda, ak ghamneawa ea nisheedeawaneegwa gawa Galilaaya, iyoahitti hoowa gajadaaha. Asi neabean nearukuneegwa.”
Ghwalamwajaada ghabeawa heeda bung'eeda aba muuwda nea gang'weela muuchchi, gwasalda ak ghoadaw giinealangaaschi iitta.
Hean gwaroonnyi Yeesu sea saawa ak gwayeeshsha, “Seayu!” Gwaneekkiissa ak ghoang'ng'waay geeshanga ak ghaghadoawan.
Ng'atta gwayeeshsha Yeesu saawa, “Adoabealli! Aweayeena ak goorukusi oorjoogiyya gaweay Galilaaya amahitta hoowa gayaghwadaahan.”
Damanda beawa, ng'ulla gwanda furiischoojusu weay mujiini heeda ashoohoodiga hees ak ghoadayda iitta ng'asheega sean bunu.
Hean gwaroonnyi sea gweargwa ak gabalool, hit geattaw furiischoodiga lappiyeeda saang'a,
nea gwayeeshsha, “Ayeeshshiina buuneeda, ‘Ghwahidu giinealangaaschi eawa nea sililli ak gwajagwat.’
Amadeeppa ghwanyas iitta sugoochcheanda bea ng'eanyiida, gajeeppaloola niny ak gajeegeandeawaneegwa shatta.”
Gageanda lappiyeetta amwang'atta gwasinda baloolda gissurukusiinda. Gageawiit iitteaba ng'asheanji aba jeeda fuga Yahuudi ea ghwoaw ghamneawa.
Gaweay Giinealangiga attamwanagiin Galilaaya nea ghoaburbuur heayeeda ghayi rukusa Yeesu saawa.
Hean daa ghaghadoawan, nea mwaatkwa ghamwachmwach jeesinga nyaawa.
Ghwaan Yeesu heannyaawa ak goobalool ak gwayeeshsha, “Sugoonan gheambalmeeda sean aba humng'eeda ea ng'eanyiida.
Asi aweayeena ak ghoanung' ghoaw emoojiga sean giinealanga, nea gobattiisannyi saawa aba gheawunga Aseetta was Bwaabwa, ea gea Balleanda, ea gea Gurorooda Ghaydit.
Oannaala ghoang'ng'waay ng'asheega sean eagoonnyeegwa. Ang'ulla aniini geendeayi sea agooga galeega sean ea gagul mudeanooda ng'eanyiida.”
Nii gidangeatta Giijasta Miy bea Yeesu Gristohi was Balleanda Aseetta.
Gawuurji gissung'waarda aba jeeda gittabooda sibaneeda suguura Isaaya gideaba, Gwayi Aseetta,
“Ng'ulla gaydeajeagu giijasoochcheanji itteanyu
jea gosheedeawaneey ak gayghoaw Siichchea
gwasinney naweadaang'u.
Gwanda Siisi nyearra ghuutta jeeda dareapcheeda
Asissiina Ng'uttamiida naweeda
olleappa naweadingaaschi.”
Yohaaneeda Abattisachchi gedeaksa jeettareapcheeda nea gwarukkwiisa buuneeda gideaba adukkuunana ng'asheega munyas ak geppattiisan ak gwasamsa Aseetta ring'eega nyaawa.
Goreemsa Yohaana Emeettuw leabu ng'eanyiissean bea Yudeeya eaghoaw fuga Yerusaleemossean, ak gwadukkuuna ring'eega nyawa ak geppattiisan aba jeedeenda Yordaan.
Abeeda Yohaana gokkwealli hang'da sisna budeega ngamiya nea gwarattiisa manandannyi ghealooda. Ghoaw daghwardaannyi deashamga ea maleeda dareabeetta.
Gwarukkwiida Yohaana ng'asheega nea gwayeenniisa, “Gwanda sichchea ghwahidu jea ghwaduupnanaan geash. Siisi gaburdeawean uurda eara aniini mammisean dahiiy geaw ak geameewji deandoadaannyi.
Aniini geabattisananeegwa beega, Niny gaygobattisaneegwa aba Yeammeeda Ghaydit.”
Damandida ghwahidu Yeesu nea gwaleabu mujiineeda siyi Nasareetti mida Galilaaya, ak gobattiisan Yohaana aba jeedeenda Yordaan.
Siyeeng'na jeedeenda deagheetta ghwadaa nea ghwajaada bugusta humng'eeda ak gwashubeesa Yeammeeda Ghaydit nea gawuurji ghariibajeanda.
Ghwanya Ghuutta leabu humng'eeda nea gwayeeshsha, “Ang'iing'i guwosi Jeepteanyu abwariinyi gwadan jeedeanyu.”
Miighoaw gil ghwaat Yeammeeda Ghaydit ea gawa dareapcheanda.
Gobiida hoowa askwearjooji haradam nea gwasimsim Shattaani. Abeeda aba hoowa gwandeaydooschi diyeanga jarooda, nea ghaweadaada giijasoodiga humng'eeda.
Iiduw nea sijaksa Yohaana ghealooniga gawa Yeesu ng'eanyiida Galilaaya, nea gwarukkwiida Giijasta Miy bea Aseetta
nea gwayeenniisa, “Nugul damanda, nea gheambalmeeda Aseetta ea nineekkiit, Adukkuunana ring'oojiga ak ghoamwaschi Giijasta Miy.”
Iiduw nea Gwasik ghuutta basooda Galilaaya ghwadaa fii iyyeenya leallu ghweayeega nea Simon gil ea oorjeeda ghaamwat siyi Andereya nea gwatealluuna ngheearga nyaawa ghweayeega.
Gwayeeshsha, Yeesu, “Ayeanni geeshteanyu. Gaydanung' ahuuwa fuga jea gwaleallu buuneeda.”
Gwanungu'sa heeda gheareedanga nyaawa aba geeshangiga ak ghwaat geeshta Yeesu.
Gawa Yeesu mwadi gili mwanang' ak ghwadaa Yakkobo ea Yohaana, oorjooga Sebedaayo nea gwanda jeeda maleambooda nea ghwanapnap gheareedanga nyaawa.
Deagheatta gaguursa Yeesu ak gwayeeshsha, oyeanni geeshteanyu, Ghwanung'wa heeda ghweanda nyaawa was Sebedaayo sea fuga gadiyeeda jeeda maleambooda ak ghwaat geeshta Yeesu.
Ghwahitta Yeesu ea ginealangaaschi mujiineeni suguura Gapernaumu. Hean hitta eaweetta sabatto gawa Yeesu jeeda ghooriida fuga Yahuudi sinnealshachcheewa ak ghoang'eat ginealshooda.
Iiy Buuneessean aleeysiit ghwanung' ghahamng'eanyi aba ginealshoadaannyi, aba gideaba niny monealsheatta ginealshoodiga diineeda Yahuudi niny gonealsheatta siida mideawa gheambalmeeda
Deagheatta gwarinna jeeda ghooriida sinnealshachcheewa Siisi bearji meang'nyeandeenda
Gojuur nea gwayi, “Gendeayeesi naaha sea ang'iing'i Yeesuyda Nasareetti? Guwuni lasa uhuudeanya? Ghanalli siiduwosi guwosi siida Ghaydit bea Aseetta!”
Gojuursa, Yeesu meang'nyeandeenda nea gwayeeshsha “Siinda! Ritteawana Siisi.”
Godumduum Meang'nyeandeenda siidida ak goguul aba nyeashta haw ak gwaritteaysa.
Ghahamng'eanyi Buneassean, nea gonyeari geat, “Suuh ana ng'asha? Heappi, nii ginealshooni bunuu? Siisi gwandeawa gheambalmeeda ea joriichooda hoana meangeenda nea ghoawal gheang'da!”
Gabay gageawiit iitta Yeesu aba jeeda ng'eanyiida sean bea Galilaaya.
Deagheatta gwaritteawa Yeesu jeeda ghooriida sinnealshachcheewa ak gawa nea godeayi Yakkobo ea Yohaana ea gaweay jeeda gheeda geaba Simon bea Andereya
Abeeda gwanda Gheamadoanagia agweaji Simon nea gwanda muunda gabearji sheagheeda ng'waan. Duughwahidu Yeesu geebay eattaw iitta.
Gaweesa ak ghoang'ng'waay geattinda ak gagatgat, ak gwaritteaysa sheagheeda, ak ghang'eat gagadiyeesa buuneeda.
Mikta Aseetta ghapka Buuneeda heeda Yeesu nea geyeassa fuga sean miyeani ea fuga bearji meangeeniga.
Gabassa geat Fuga sean bea mujiineetta madeeda gheeda.
Ghoahaap Yeesu fuga saang'a bearji geyoonuung'weakka sean nea ghahoan meangeeniga saang'a, ak ea meanung' ghwanya ghuusiga meangeenda aba gideaba ghwanal niny siida was.
Muchchu nea gudea beashatta gil gawa Yeesu hichpa geaw ak ghamwaash Aseetta
Gawa Simon nea godeayi oorjooga suurja gagasa Yeesu
Sidaah geyeeshsha, “Gagaseadayyeey Gilinyoo ea siida.”
Gwayeeshsha Yeesu, “Essiipta eweaya darooraw suuk darukuta ng'asheanda Aseetta eara aba hoowa aba gideaba gidaghayi ang'waarji gil.”
Iiduw gawa gwaneayeewa jeeda ng'eanyida Galilaaya sean nea gwarukkwiida ng'asheega aba ghoorajeega nyaawa sinnealshachcheewa sean nea ghahoan meangeenda.
Iiduw ghwahidu heeda Yeesu Siisi beardooschi udamusuura hidu gwatkuy ak gamus nea gwayeeshsha, “Iigasayi gimmuusi amminnaan!”
Ghabwayda Yeesu siidideani, ak ghoahaakta geattindaannyi ak ghoang'ng'waay ak gwayeeshsha, “Geagasayi miinni!”
Gwaritteaysa siida udamusuura aba geeshangiga ak ghammiidu.
Hit ghamiin gheeng'da ak ghwanung' gabay ghabeawa howa nea gwayeeshsha,
“Asi Una nea adirukusi sih ng'asheanji. Una ahimsiina geaw ashoohoochcheanda, ak gidaydi haleanjeeda siyeada ghadooweeda was gidaghayi rukutteayda Muusa, eanal gideaba ang'iing'i nihaabi.”

Beawa hoowa Siidida gwarukusa siisi roonnyi sean, ea ghwayiiy gilinyoo ea siida gil. Iiduw Yeesu ea mudu ghwanung' ng'asheesu gabadaksa beatta jeeda mujiini. Gwajireada gawa hichpa geaw ak eara gwasa goremsiina Buuneeda meadajeega sean aba hoowa midean.
Iing'atta eawoojusu ng'ay gabiikta Yeesu ng'eanyiida Gapernaumu ak gabay ghwanyas Buuneeda iitta gideaba gwanda ghoah.
Goweameesa Fuga saang'a ghoah ea gwadukuta eara seawadeeda gidaghuut. Gwarukkwiida Yeesu Giijastaannyi.
Iiduw ghwahidu Fii ang'wan nea gwasareennu siisi miyaan bearji gibittunooda damealga

Sihhiidu siida miyaan nea geegasa eayaat gah heeda mida Yeesu ghwaroat naweeda aba seang'ayda buuneeda. Gaweay ak ghwasaaw uhuuda gheeda deascheeda mida Yeesu, ak gessiik siitta miyaniin nea gwanda badayda muundaannyi, ea eaghatghat ammadeeda Yeesu.
Daa Yeesu masaweega nyaawa gwayeeshsha siida miyaan, “Jeepteanyu, ring'eagaagu sisamsa.”
Abeeda gwanda hoowa Ginealshoodiga mwaatkwa bea diineeda Yahuudi gwachchi abitppiit nea gwayeena aba jeesinga nyaawa
“Assiisi gwarukutaydaan ng'asheesu? Nii gong'eawi Aseetta! Ghanyeamanda siisi ammu gwasamsa ring'eemba nuut, geaghus Aseetta akghwahit.”
Gwajeeng'u Yeesu ng'asheega baloola jeesinga nyaawa ak gwayeeshsha, “Ghamwach-mwach naaha jeesing'eagwa?
Awussus anneeda aba hedeang'wa gideaba gearukusi siisi abittu damealgean gideaba, ‘Sisamsa ring'eedaang'u ghana gideaba geyeeshsha ng'eada, Geanda mundaang'u ak guwi?’
Asi geagasayi anala gideaba Balleanda Siida gwandeawa Gheambalmeeda jea gwasamsiina buuneeda ring'eega aba ng'eanyiida.” Ng'atta gwayeeshsha Yeesu siidida bearji gibittunooda damealgean.
Geayi ng'eada, “Geanda mundaang'u ak guwi ghoah.”
Ghang'eat ak ghamughut muunda ak gawa nea geadahaada sean. Ghwanung' ghahamng'eanyi buuneessean ak ghoaghambiit Aseetta nea gwayi, “Ng'asheanji miyeadaaha eara heeda ghayi.”
Iiduw gabiikta Yeesu hoowa bea ghuutta basoodean. Gaweay emeettuw hoowa mida ninyiin, ak ghoang'eat ginealshooda.
Gawa Yeesu ghwaat naweeda ea ghwadaa nisiih Lawiiyda Alfaayo nea goopteada aba hoowa sing'ng'oonnya gwadiin. Gaguursa ak gwayeeshsha, “Benni eanni geeshteanyu.” Ghang'eat Laawi ghwaat geeshta Yeesu.

Iiduw nea gweagiischi Yeesu aba gheeh Laawi, goreemsa Fuga saang'a ang'ng'oonyi gwaadi ea fuga ring'eega, nea abeeda niny gweagiischi sea ginealangaaschi ea fuga mwaatkwa ghwanyawa eattu geashtaannyi.

Daa fuga mwaatkwa was Ginealshoodiga diineeda Yahuudi was Farisaayajeega gideaba Yeesu gombuuchchi fuga ring'eega geannyaash ginealanga gideaba, “Anda Yeesu ghwasaan inyas gombuuchchi sea fuga ring'eega ea gea ang'ng'oonyi gwaadi?”

Iiy Yeesu ng'ashesu gwayeeshsha saawa, “Fuga majeekcheewi magaseadayyi meang'nyeanda. Meang'nyeanda geaghus gagasa fuga miyeani. Asi eara Aniini mwawuni dagasa fuga doobiweadi. Ghawunnyi dagasa fuga ring'eega.”

Eaweechcha ghwarat jalooda ginealanga Yohaana ea gea Farisayajeega. Ghapka Buuneeda ak ghoanyaash Yeesu nea gwayeeshsha, “Anda ginealanga Yohaana ea gea Farisaayajeega gwarada jalooda nea gaagu amwarada?”
Ghwalamda Yeesu ak gwayeeshsha, “Fuga suguursa nyeangiida imidahiji siidageeshshi ghoang'ng'wa ghwaat jalooda? Inyoo gwanda hiji siida geeshshi fuga suguursa mayghwaat jalooda.
Amaduw gwanda eaweetta jea egeandeawa siida geeshshi eaweechcheanji fuga suguursa gayghwaat jalooda.
“Manda siida ammu gwalagu weasta hang'deesh ak ghawaasa hang'da waas. Iisisin ng'asheanji abeeda gayghwaloadadawa weastida eshiin hang'da waas ak abeeda ghami hang'da muuchchi.

Ghanyeamanda siida jea ghwayiin difaayeeda eashish jeesinga sheargweega woosi. Iisisin ng'asheanji gayghabwashaada difaayi sheargweega, ak abeeda gaygwanyara sheargweega ak gaweay difaayi. Difaayeeda eashish geyiina jeeda sheargweega eashish!”
Eaweachchanjagi mideewa ng'eanyiida sabatto, gawa Yeesu nea gwasik jeesinga madameega ngano Damani beawaan gwahirjeaweada Ginealangaaschi muschoonga ngano.
Gwayeeshsha Farisaayajeega Yeesu, “Ng'ulla ghwasaan anda ginealangaagu gwasin ng'asheanda meseamma eaweetta sabatto?”
Ghwalamda Yeesu ak gwayeeshsha, “Heappi miyoassoamwana gidaghayi sin Dawdi ea fugaaschi iyeachchih.

Gawa jeeda gheeda Aseetta ak ghwaak mukkattajeega siyiin madeda Aseetta. Ng'asheanji geesin damanda waseewa Habiyattaari ashoohoochcheanda haw. Mukkatteani geaghus ghwaak ashoohoodiga nea gaba geat. Amaduw ghwaak Dawdi ak ghoadaw eara fuga mideawa.”
Ng'atta gwayeeshsha Yeesu, “Sabatto geesissa buuneeda miigideaba buuneeda geesissa sabatto gil!
Asi Balleanda Siida Ng'uttaniida gil eara aba sabatto.”
Iiduw gabiikta Yeesu hoowa bea jeeda ghoriida sinnealshachcheewa nea abeeda gwanda hoowa siida aptu geattinda.
Abeeda gwanda Fiisu gasa ghoahaakta Yeesu, hean ghoamuughu ghwadaa ea jea ghoahaap siidida eaweeda sabatto. Aba sareani geegasa gichchea eanyasta ramaseanda jea eahhaaktoawa
Iiduw gwayeeshsha Yeesu siidida aptu geattindean, “Beenni hiji bea mwadiin.”

Ng'atta ghoanyaash Yeesu fukka nea gwayeeshsha, “Ghwadoabiiwi gideaba geesin ng'asheanda miy eaweeda sabatto ghana gideaba geesin ng'asheanda muy; ghang'wana gideaba geakghu eaweega ghana gideaba gelakku? Ameasha ghuttannyi geasiinda.”

Hean ghoaduup ghaang' Yeesu buuneeda aba nyarasta ak ghang'ut giseaneega idaah hang'ooynachcheekka guroruunatkeaba fugiga. Gwayeeshsha siitta aptu geattindean, “Asi adoabiiwa gattindaang'u.” Ghoadoobiiw siidida geattindaannyi ak gabiikta geattinda gamajegiit.
Deagheatta gwaritta jarooda fuga was Farisaayajeega ak gaweay gang'weaschi sea fuga Heroode, ghwadaawdaaw gichchea ghwanyasta gheatta nuusta Yeesu.
Gawa Yeesu nea goodeayi ginealangaaschi ea gaweay hoowa bea ghuutta basoodean. Ghwaat geeshta Yeesu Emeettuw. Fiisu gwaleabu ng'eanyiida Galilaaya ea ghoaw ng'eanyiida Yudeeya.
ea gea Yerusaleemu ea ghoaw Idumeaya, ea ghoaw eenda suguura Yordaan, ea ghoaw murdajeega mujiinajeega geaba Diro ea Sidooni. Iiy emeeda ng'asheega sina Yeesu goreemu ghapka headaannyi.
Daa Yeesu gida jea ghwariista buuneeda aba ghuutta basooda gwayeeshsha ginealangaaschi, “Anung' gosiibu maleambooda amwariisan buuneeda.”
Abeada nihaap fuga saang'a, ghapka Fuga geyoonung'weakka nea gagasa ghanyi ghawaas Yeesu.
Nea fuga bearji meang'nyeandeenda inyoo gwaroonnyi Yeesu, gobedeaysa madeadaannyi nea goojuur nea gwayeeshsha, “Ang'iing'i guwosi Balleanda Aseetta!”
Iiduw gwareekusa Yeesu meangeenda nea ghoang'waniit gideaba, adoorukusi buuneeda siideawoschi!
Iiduw gawa Yeesu amawea uhuuda heayeeda gagurriisa fuga gasa niny, Gaweay heeda fugiga.
Gagwalu fii damaniyyeenya jea godeaydooschi jea ghoow Giijasoodigaaschi jea gaweay gwarukkwiida Giijasta.
nea fiisu geattaw gheambalmeeda jea goruutteawa meangeenda.
Abeeda fiisu attamaniyyeenya sigwaluun geaba Simoneeda (amaduw gang'assa gheawunga siyi Betrohi,)
ea geaba Yakkobo ea Yohaana was oorjooga Sebedaayo (ghayi ng'assa Yeesu gheawunga siyi Bwaneegi, ghwanyawa isiyam ghuut gajeeyi Oorjooga Mbagiida.)
Ea Andereya ea Filippo, ea Bartolomayo, Mattayo ea Domaso, Yakkoboyda Alfaayo ea Dadeo, ea Simoneeda leabu Ganaani,
ea Yuudayda Iskariyotti was siida amaduw ghwala bwadaw.
Iiduw nee nuwa Yeesu ghooh gagaweesa heeda emeettuw ea eamudu ghwanyas niny gheatta agiischooda.
Nyas iittaannyi Fuga gheannyaawa gaweay ghoang'ngwaay nea geaghay gili ning'ul geeska.
Nea Ginealshoodiga diineeda Yahuudi leabu Yerusaleemu, saawa gwayi Yeesu, “Gwandeawa Belsebuuli! Ak ghahoan meangeenda aba uurda meang'nyeandeenda haw.”
Iiduw gaguursa saawa headaannyi, ak ghoanyaash nea gwasin ak gwayeeshsha, “Ghamneawa Shattaani ghoang'ng'wa ghahoan Shattaani?
Sugoochcheandumeeda imaweechchi sugoochcheandumeeni ea maygahuweada.
Nuut gichcha eara fuga jeeda gheadassagi idardawaat gheawi ea maygahuweada.
Eara shattaani ing'uchchi geaw, ea maygudu gageanu askwearjoojiga gaygabiissa gammudean.

“Gheeda siida mwaay biissa ahoauur manda siida jea gabadaksa gawa gah ghoareat haleanjeadaannyi. Geaghus abeeda ea sirada siisi bea gheedean abeeda gheawi ghoammu sih gawa jeeda gheeda ak ghwaat haleanjeeda.
Aba huumwa Gearukuneegwa, ring'oojiga sean sina buuneeda manda dea majeesamsa, eara ng'asheega munyas rittuuna ghuusiga buuneeda gaygwasamsa Aseetta.
Sinung' siida rukkuuna ng'asheega munyas badayda Gurorooda Ghaydit, siisi majeesamsa, gwandeawa ring'eeda eeweaga manda mudeanooda.” (
Yeesu abeeda gwarukuna ng'asheesu fuga baloolla gideaba, “Niny gwandeawa meang'nyeandeenda.”)
Iiduw ghwahidu Gheamatta Yeesu nea godeana oorjooga gennyea Yeesu ak ghaminaada aba jarooda ak gojeakta siida gawa gaguursa aba gah.
Abeeda goobiitpiit emeettuw nea gwaneaweesa ak geyeeshsha, “Gagasseey Geamadu ea oorjooga giyeang'wa aba jarooda.”
Ghwalamda Yeesu ak gwayeeshsha fugiga, “Iyya ea oorjooga giyeanya geabeang'a?”
Gwasachsa ghaat fugiga ghwanyawa abiitpidiin ak gwayi, “Ang'ulla Iyya ea oorjooga iyya fiisu gil!
Siida nyoo gwasna haleanjeeda bwariiy Aseetta, siisi gayghoaw oorjeediyya, nea gayghoow eara hudiyya, nea gayghoaw iyya.”
Gabiikta Yeesu gonealshi gichcha aba ghuutta basooda. Ghwasaabwan Emeettuw ea eanung' gawa jeeda maleambooda ak goopteada. Abeeda buuneeda gobiitpiit aba ghuutta basooda ng'eanyiida ghajaam.
Hean goneali buuneeda ng'asheega saang'a nea gagalla geat ng'asheega. Gwayeeshsha abajeeda ginealshoodaannyi,
“Oalleaydiit! Ghayi ghang'eat sii gawa gwahista booga.
Hitta nea gwahista boagaaschi gwanda booga abitpissa heeda was naweeda buuneeda, iiduw ghwahidu dariidakka ak ghwaak.
Gwanda eara booga abitpissa heeda was badayda harearachcheanda heeda manda sigeemba huumwa. Boosu gabay gwardu aba gideaba eara sigeedeaba hoowa eang'ay.
Boosu iiduw ghwalas daknooda nea gudugwanda ghuusiga sigeeda, ak gabay ghaghajamiit aba gideaba manda sigeemba huumwa ang'ng'waay hawunga.
Gwanda eara booga abitpissa jeeda geediga halaghweanga, iiduw nea gwardu boogiga ea maji gil aba gideaba ghwariis geediga halaghweenga.
Gwanda eara booga abitpissa jeeda sigeeda miyaas, iiduw nea gwardu gwaji muuchchi. Ghealooniga meatteena booga diktam ea damanamughuush, suurja gweatta laadam nea suurja gweatta bughala.”
Iiduw nea gayghoabuut Yeesu ghuutta baloaldaannyi gwayeeshsha buuneeda, “Siida agar iitta adayiinya ng'asheesu ikkeasuun.”
Iiduw nea gwandeawa Yeesu geaw, gaweesa Fukwachchi aleeysiit sea ginealangaaschi attamaniyyeenya ak geannyaash gidagwachchi baysiina gallodeaba geat bea ng'asheega.

Ghwalamda Yeesu ak gwayeeshsha, “Agogeeni ghamneawa simeayneegwa makcheameeda Gheambalmeeda Aseetta. Amasunung' fugiga manda jedeaba gheambalmeeniin, saawa ng'asheega ijea erukkwiisa geaghus egalla geat.
Ghoaw ramoraneeda ghayi sirukutta bea gideaba,
‘Fiisu gayghoang'wearda muuchchi,
ak ea mayghwadaah gil,
iidiga nyaawa gaygwayiing'shi muuchchi,
ak ea manda gili jea gwajeeng'u.
Ghang'wana gwachchi gwayamsa geat
Aseetta ak gwasamsa ring'eega nyaawa.’”
Hean ghoanyaashta Yeesu ak gwayeeshsha, “Assagooga miyajeeng'ni eara ng'asheesu eagalli geadiini? Gajoammustaan ajeeng'ni ng'asheesu jea dagalla geadiin?
Siida weah gwahista booga gwahista ng'asheega Aseetta.
Boogiga abitpissa ghuutta naweedean Fugiga iiy ng'asheanda deagheatta ghwahidu Shattaani ak gageandeawa jeesinga nyaawa.
Booga abitpissa badayda harearachcheandean. Fugiga ama iiy ng'asheanda ghwadeapta nea gahoosan.
Ghanyea mandeawana hawunga issa ghanyi gageanu gheadi nuwaas iihidu sawanaduutka ea munyinda gabay ghwalagaan.
Boogiga abitpissa jeeda halaghweengean, Fugiga iiy ng'asheanda Aseetta,
iiduw ghwahidu mittagheasta muunda ng'eanyiida bea geaba gassooda baruureega, ea sechmeeda seach saawa gilinyoo ghwariis ng'asheandida, ghwanung' ea mudugwaji haghweega.

Boogiga sihisa jeeda sigeeda miyaasiin, Fugiga iiy ng'asheanda ak ghoang'ng'waay ak gwaji haghweegeani. Ghealooniga meatteena booga diktam ea damanamughuush, suurja gweatta laadam nea suurja gweatta bughala.”
Gabiikta Yeesu ak gwayeeshsha, “Ghamneawa gheaboong'nyeanda ijea eapwaang'da gajeedukuteawa dahuuda ghana jea eayiin uutta bulaliida? Manda ameakghusa ak geayiin uhuumba gili?
Asi gilinyoo afunyaat gajeenung' ghwadajiit. Nuut gichcha gissudukuta gajeenung' ghabwar daknooda.
Asi Ayiinya iyondeawi iidiga!”
Gwayeeshsha Yeesu saawa, “Olleysiina iit muuchchi ng'asheesu oayinyiin! Gidottenniidi agooga gajettenneegwa nea geanung' ghwanaawda.
Aba gideaba siisi agar gil gajeehheassa nea siitta meagara giliin, eara gidida mwanang' mideawean gajearreat.”
Hean gabalool Yeesu nea gwayi, “Gheambalmeeda Aseetta gajeegala siisi ghayi wea gwahista booga.
Niny iissa ihidu eaweeda gawa gwalil, nea askweari ghoang'wearu, nea mwanala eara bookcheandida girritteayda.
Funnooda bookcheanda goobal Sigeeda akghwahit. Iissa ghwanung' ghanyi gwasin mbearga, hean gabiissa ghwasar muhooga, iiduw muhoogiga ea nisin gheanyanga booga.
Iiduw nea booga ea niheas, gaygawa seabwa ghwalach aba gideaba ghwadaa nihitta damanda lajitta.”
Iiduw gwayeeshsha Yeesu, “Ghamneawa Gheambalmeeda Aseetta gajeegala naaha? Iijea erukuna gajeegalana naaha?
Gaydagala ghajilleanda haradaali. Ghajilleandeaba geedi amwanang' ea ghwalaabwa hoowa ghajilleamba geat nuut.
Amaduw nea geayiin jeessigeeda gwardu ak gwaheedu ea ghoaw geetta gidahaw naawa geediga sean bea madamnyeanda. Iissa gwasin damealga duguuga hees ea ghamway jirooneadaannyi dariidakka.”
Abeeda Yeesu inyoo gagasa gwarukuta giijastaannyi, inyeessa ng'asheega asaang'a gea galla suurja.
Miighanyi gwarukuta ng'asheanji magalana nuut. Iiduw nea gwandeawa ginealangaaschi akghwahit, gwarukusa ganeega ng'asheega sean nea mwafnyana eara gil.
Shing'adedeaba eawettida gwayeeshsha Yeesu ginealangaaschi, “Eaniyean eakghaawana basooda eebu meatkweetta.”
Goheelli geat emeetta sang'aan. Gaweay Ginealanga jeeda maleambooda ghwanyawa mida Yeesu ak gaweay nea ghwaat Yeesu. Abeeda gwanda hoowa maleambajeega suuk.
Iiduw ghang'eat siilakghta aba jeeda basooda. Ghwalas maleambooda laweajajeega ak ghwanung' gwaneawwiida beega ea ghwannyiit jeeda maleambooda.

Abeeda Yeesu gwalil aba hoowa bea uutta maleamboodean nea gwadiiwa uhuudaannyi hang'da was ghabuscheanda. Ghwaheat ginealanga nea gwayeeshsha, “Ginealshoochcheanda. Assang'iing'i eara nyariideanya miduuppi?”
Ghang'eat Yeesu ak gwareekusa siilakghtida nea gwayeeshsha basooda, “Siinda! Eena saw!” Gwaregweesa jeammeeda. Gwayi basooda sean saw!
Hean gwayeeshsha, Yeesu ginealangaaschi, “Ghoabealeagwaani? Mondeawani masaweega?”
Ghabeel muuchchi ak gonyeari geat, “Nii siisi urjiini? Siida nukkwa ghoawal gheang'da eara jeammeeda ea basooda?”
Muchchu ghwahitta gigheawda basooda ng'eanyiida siyi Geraasi.
Deagheatta nea gwarinna Yeesu jeeda maleambooda geadaah siisi mideawa meangeenda nea gwaleabu heeda sibunynyiisa buuneeda ak gwaroonnyi.
Siisi eajusu gobiitta hoowa sibunyyiisa buneedean nea ghanyeamanda siisi ammu ghwarat aba munyaloalajeega.
Nea eara isiratta munyaloalajeega ghana biingu inyeessa gang'achcheaweada sean nea ghanyea mwoammu sih ghwajoar.
Inyeessa Gojureadayyi eawa ea askweari nea gahoonna geaw hoowa sibunynyiisa buneedean ea jeesinga beareega nea inyessa ghabwashadawa geaw lagheanga.
