Iiduw nea ghwadaa Yeesu nea gudeasheagi Ghafwach ama hitta heeda ghwahiiy geaw aba mureeda aba madeeda Yeesu
ak gojuur nea gwayeeshsha, Gendeeyeesi naaha Yeesu sea ang'iing'i, “Balleanda Aseetta haw? Geamuscheey aba gheawunga Aseetta adisawannyean!” (
Ghwanyaashtunu aba gideaba niyeeshsha niny, “Ritteaysiina siisi.”)
Ghoanyaash Yeesu nea gwayeeshsha, “Ghawungaagu ng'eaha?” Gwayeeshsha siidida, “Gheawungeasu geguura ‘Lugooda,’ aba gideaba aseasa geewoschi saang'a.”
Gamearmearani Yeesu nea gwayeeshsha, aniyean adiguttidaneasa aba ng'eang'i.
Abeeda gwanda hoowa hawanda ukkurumajeega sihhaghwa aba geeshta heayeeda.
Gamearmearani, Meangeenda Yeesu nea gwayeeshsha, “Nung' eweaya jeedeaba ukkurumajeegiga.”

Gwasiksa Yeesu lugoodida bea meangeendean, ak gwaritteaysa siidida ak ghoabitta jeeda ukkurumajeega. Abeeda ukkurumajeega gwariiksa sagalamnyooji iyyeenya. Gamng'aw ukkurumajeega ak ghoabuttaawa geat marechcheanda ak ghwaak basooda sean.
Gwasalda Fukkwachchi ahaaghwa ukkurumajeega ak gaweay ea ghwahitta mujiini ea heeda mawasa mujiini. Ghapka Buuneeda ghwadaa ng'asheega bunu.
Gaweay ama hitta hoowa mida Yeesuun ghwadaa siidida eawoojusu ng'uttooschi lugooda meangeenigean nea goopteada nea gookwa hang'daannyi nea nibiiksa fughareadaannyi, ak geabeal.
Iiduw gwarukusa Fukkwachchi daa ng'asheesu buneessuurja iitta gidabussa siitta bearji meangeendean ea iitta ukkurumajeega.
Hean gebiissa emus Yeesu gideaba ng'amwana ng'eang'deanya.
Daa Siidida nea gawa Yeesu jeeda maleambooda gamus godeayi.
Ghaheawa Yeesu godeayi siidida. Ghoadeal nea gwayeeshsha, “Una ghoah ak girukusi ng'asheega sean fuga ghaheang'wa ea gida nuweattaneey Ng'uttamiida ea gida nubwaydaaydaneey.”
Gawa Siidida ak gwarukkwiida aloheeda ng'asheega miyaas sissa Yeesu aba jeeda mujiinajeekka attamanamughushiin. Nyas buuneeda iidi bea ng'asheesuun ghahamng'eanyi sean.
Gwading'da Yeesu maleambooda ghoaghaawa basooda ak gawa ama wea gigheawda goreemsa Emeettuw gaweay ghwanyasa hoowa.
Iiduw ghwahidu heeda siisi suguura Yayro siisi abeeda gaba fuga hees ahaaghwa ghoriida fuga Yahuudi sinnealshachcheewa. Hitta Siisi gobedeaysa madeeda Yeesu nea gwayeeshsha,
“Jeebi itteanyu mwanang' bea haweega ghabwar miyeeda. Eeniyean beenni waasana geattingaagu ak abeeda gayghahaap.”
Ghang'eat Yeesu godeayi siidida. Ghabwang'aada emeettuw gamaseaw nea geasaabwan.
Abeeda gwanda hoowa gatmooni aream foojeanda galeagasean gweannyeew damaniyyeenya.
Gatmooni abeeda niduulu haleanjeedaannyi aba beatta gealga meanga nea ghanyeamalossiina eara gil gwareanyiisachchi muuchchi.
Abeeda ninyas iitta Yeesu Ghwaat geeshta ak ghawaas weleeda hang'da Yeesu.
Gwasin ng'asheanji nea gwayeeshsha Geaw, “Iyawaaschi weleedeaba siisi ghanalli gaydahaap.”
Hitta nea ghawaasa geaw weleeda hang'da Yeesu deagheatta gageanda gireemdida bea foojeandean. Nea eara iisawsa saseadannyi ghwadaa nimajegiit.
Jeeng'u Yeesu gidabeada nisuunya urdaannyi gwasachsa ghaat emeeda ak gwayeeshsha, “Ghawaas ng'eaha weleeda hang'deanyu?”
Gwayeeshsha ginealangaaschi, “Girukutaydiin nea gidaahi gidariistaneey buuneeda?”
Gong'weerng'weersa Yeesu meadajeega sean ghwadaa ea jea ghwanyas siida ghwanyawa waas.
Iiduw nea ghwadaah, gatmoodida gideaba nihaap gaweesa Yeesu nea ghabwadanaada aba muuwda ama hitta gwatkuy aba madeadaannyi ak ghoadayda iitta sean.
Gwayeeshsha, Yeesu gatmooda, “Balleanda gidahaapnyi masaweagaagu, una nea gibeahi seayu nea gagasa ea mabikseey geyoani.”
Duuw gabalool Yeesu gatmoodida deagheatta ea sichcheagu fiisu leabu gheeh Yayro ak gwayeeshsha, “Yeeptaang'u nimi. Ghwasaan andagideawiidi ginealshoochcheanda?”
Nyas Yeesu iidi ghoanaawa geaw ak gwayeeshsha, “Adibeali. Heappi ang'iing'i mwasa.”
Hean ea modeayi fii suuk geaghus Betro, Yakkobo ea Yohaanayda gennyea Yakkobo.
Ghwahitta gheeh Yayro ak ghwadaa Yeesu emeeda mwahawda heeda mwasakta dabeakka suurja gaguttu heareega nea ghoahaawda.
Hitta Yeesu gwayeeshsha, “Anda agooga goyyeawdi nea mandaneegwa eara hawdaaw? Balleanda eara miyeeda miighami. Gabeachchi ruweanga akghwahit.”
Gabarra rear buuneeda. Hean goruutta buuneessean jarooda ama hit gaguursa ghweanda jeepta ea gheamatta jeepta ea ginealangaaschi ghwanyawa adeana ak gaweay hoowa bea gah mida jeeptean.
Hitta Yeesu ghoang'ng'waay geattinda jeepta nea gwayeeshsha, “Dalittakum,” nea gideaba, “Huda mwanang' ng'eada!”
Deagheatta gafakna geaw ng'eanyi hudida ak ghang'eat gawa. (Jeeptida abeeda gaba gweenynyeew damaniyyeenya.) Ghwanung' ng'asheanji ghahamng'eanyi buuneeda muuchchi.
Iiduw gwayeeshsha Yeesu buuneeda, Adiiduw goorukusi gili gwachchi easinnyiin. Ng'atta gwayeeshsha oattawa huda gichchaghwaak.
Ghabeawa Yeesu hoowa ak gawa ea gawa ng'eang'da nyaawa nea godeayi ginealangaaschi.

Muchchu nea eaweeda mideewa sabatto gil, gawa jeeda ghoriida fuga Yahuudi sinnealshachcheewa gonealshi. Ghahamng'eanyi fuga saang'a aleeysiit nea gwayeena, “Assiisi ghwanyasa yeenu ng'asheesu? Ea bareaynadi bea uhuudean. Ak gwasindaan deamdeamanga sina
Neada nii ea mii siidida sina behajeega was oorjeeda Mariya bea gennyea Yakkobo bea geaba Yose bea Yuda ea Simon? Neada eara haweega ghaamwat ea manda ng'eang'i?” Geamwachmwach ng'asheagaaschi.
Ghwalamda Yeesu ak gwayeeshsha saawa, “Eara sibaneeda geaghus ghoadaw mureeda fuga sheagi. Sughus fuga ng'eang'da nyaawa ea gea was genoojigaaschi ea fugeaba gheannyi, aba saawa siisi mawuurji gil.”
Iiduw Yeesu ea mudugwasin deamdeamanga aba hoowa. Ghoang'ng'waay iheeng'spa fiisu ng'ay miyeani ak gaheaba.
Ghahamng'eanyi Yeesu idaah gidamwamwasta buuneeda ng'asheagaaschi.
Iiduw gwaskeada Yeesu gealga aba hoowa nea gonealshi.
Gaguursa ginealanga attamaniyyeenyean ak gojeakta nea ghwanung' gabadiinna iyyeenya iyyeenya. Ghabiiw uurda jea ghwajoara meangeenda
Gwayeeshsha, “Asi aweayeena nea adiiduw ghoasapchi geadi. Daba siisi aada geadi bileangida akghwahit. Eara gichcha ayaaga adoayaadi geadi, ghana shageeda, ghana lappiya.
Gwayeeshsha, oallaabwa geekka ak ea adoalassi hang'weakka iyyeenya.”
Gabiikta gwayeeshsha, “Gheeda wassean jea ahitta ak ghwadeaptaneegwa oppiidana ea eaghus ea noang'ami hoowa.
Nea iyoahitti ng'eanyiida deeppa ea meadeaptaneegwa nea ghanyea mealeyseegwa eara iit, iyoabeawi ng'eang'da nyaawa alalakta birjeanda geeshangeagwa. Abeeda gajea gibuhanda nyaawa gil.”
Hean ghang'eatng'eat giijasoodiga gaweay. Gwarukkwiisa buuneeda gideaba, Adukkuunana ng'asheega munyas bea ring'eeda.
Ng'atta goruutta meangeenda saang'a, ak ghwayeasha fuga miyeani nagheeda ak gaheaba.

Hean imuchchu eara sugoochcheanda siyi Heroode aninyas iitta ng'asheega sina. Abeeda Yeesu nigeawiit iitta muuchchi. Gwanda fugeena, “Nii gwaduudu Yohaaneeda ghayi abattisachchi, ak ghoaw uuri ghamneawa sinna ng'asheesuun.”
Buuneeda mwaatkwa gwayi, “Nii gwadeppea Eliya gil. Nea mwaatkwa gwayi, Nii gwadeppea sibaneeda. Anda gawuurji siyagi bea sibanga ghayi bea garayi.”
Nyas iitta Heroode gwayeena, “Nii ghamneawa niduudu Yohaaneeda ghayi alaji gheatta.”

Ghayi abeeda eaweechcha gojeakta Heroode shirikkareadaannyi ghoang'ng'waay Yohaana ak gwajaksa ghealooniga, aba ng'asheespa gatmooni suguura Herodiya ghayi geena oorjeeda gennyea Heroode suguura Filippo. Ghayi abeeda Heroode ghaghi gatmooni bea oorjeeda ghamwadiin.
Nea ghayi abeeda ea niyeeshsha Yohaana Heroode, “Mammiseey gheana gatmooda oorjeeda geamadu.”
Hean ghwasit Herodiya muuchchi Yohaana ea gidabal gwanuus. Geaghus gideaba mwoammu.

Heroode niny ghoawal gheang'da Yohaana. Aba gideaba ghwanal beadi Yohaana siida doabiwaat biissa ea ghaydit gil. Inyeessa Heroode gafur Yohaana nea ghabwariiy goleeysiit girgweageadaannyi ak iissa ghwanung' gwasawana jeadaannyi.

Eaweechcha ghwanyas gheatta Herodiya, eaweetta sineewa Heroode ghwelmeeda damanda ghayi sijiila. Gaguursa fuga hees ahaaghwa ng'eanyiida, ea fuga hees bea shirikkara ea fuga hees mida mwadi bea ng'eanyiida Galilaaya.

Iiduw ghwahidu Hudeaba Herodiya ak ghang'atta gawa madeeda Heroode ea rabastannyi ak ghang'was muuchchi ea gahoosa jeesinga buuneeda. Iiduw gwayeeshsha Heroode hudida bea Herodiyahiin, “Ng'alaan gidigasayi was sean gaydagoonnyi.”
Ghwaak Sugoochcheanda habeawooda nea gwayeeshsha, “Ng'alaan gidigasayi wassean eara ng'eanyiini ahaghwiin ghammuuschi dalach bugusta deadeennyi ak geagoonnyeey.”

Iiduw gwaritta Hudida ak gaweesa ghaamwat ak ghoanyaash nea gwayeeshsha, “Iyya gaydang'al naaha sugoochcheanda?” Ghwalamda ghaamwat ak gwayeeshsha, hudaannyi, “Eshshiina geagasayi uhuuda Yohaaneeda abattisachchi.”
Ghafwach Hudida ea ghwahitta heeda sugoochcheanda ak gwayeeshsha, “Geagasayi gonean uhuuda Yohaaneetta abattisachchiin nea ginung' eayiin jeeda harakta.”
Iiy Sugoochcheanda ng'asheanji gagiisan muuchchi. Apkaat habeawajeega ghwanyawa ak aba madeeda rabasta ghwaraay gichchea ghaheawaatta ng'asheenji.
Gojeakta shirikkarajeandaannyi furiisachchi nea gwayeeshsha. Ng'eada lamwaja uneanni uhuuda Yohaaneeda abattisachi. Gawa shirikkarajeanda ea ghwanyasa Yohaana ghealooniga ama hitta ghwalach gheatta.
Gweanna shirikkarajeanda uhuuda Yohaana jeeda harakta ak ghoadaw hudeaba Herodiya ak ghoadaw ghaamwat.
Nyas iitteaba ng'asheesu Ginealanga Yohaana ghapka ama hidu gageanda musta Yohaana ak gaweay gabuy.
Muchchu ea nibiigu fuga ghayi ajeakta Yeesu was Ginealangaaschi, hidu ghoadaw Yeesu iitta ginnisin ea gidanaal buuneeda.

Ghwalamda Yeesu ak gwayeeshsha saawa, “Aweayeena hichpa geat ak ghonyoo afuufa gili mwanang'.” Yeesu gwarukuta ng'asheanji idaah emeeda heeda maweayi suurja ghapka ea amwanung' ghwanyasa saawa eara gheatta agiischooda.
Iiduw Gaweay saawa nea gaba geat jeeda maleambooda nyaawa ak gosiipta gaweay hichpa geat.
Ghwadahaada Fuga saang'a gidabeada ak geanal gideaba saawa gil. Gwasalda buuneeda gosheeda aba geeshanga ghwalach mujiinajeega sean ea ghwanyoaha ng'eanyi saawa.

Duughwahitta ghuutta basooda ghoang'wearda Yeesu ak ghwadaa emeettuw ak ghabwayda aba gideaba inyeessa buuneeda ea nuwuurji gisilga nyaah haghweadochchean. Hean gabiissa Yeesu ghoanaal ng'asheega saang'a.
Geeyi bwak ama niriikghta gamikta geyeeshsha Yeesu aba girrukusa ginealangaaschi, “Nukkwa ghamneawa nimikta nea geenda dareabeetta manda sih.
Siksiina buuneeda gaweay madameega ea gharang'weakka gwasheaysa geat gichchaghwaak.”
Ghwalamda Yeesu ak gwayeeshsha, “Oattawa agooga buuneeda gichchaghwaak.” Ghwalamda Saawa ak gwayeeshsha Yeesu, “Gajeweaya eashaaha mukkattajeega aba dinaaraji

Gabiikta Yeesu ghoanyaashta nea gwayeeshsha, “Heappi gondeawi mukkattaji hada? Aweayeana ong'ng'wersiina.” Weay gong'weersa gabiigu ak gwayeeshsha, “Aba hiji gendeawi mukkattaji muut ea ghweayi iyyeenya.”
Hean gwayeeshsha Yeesu ginealanga anung' gobiitpiit buuneeda aba heeda mida nyeega nyawiiri nea ghoanung' gwasna gharmuchcheekka eatta fii bughala ea gea eatta fii haradam ea damanamughuush.
Hean Geanung' gobiitpiit buuneeda nea geanung' gwsna gharmuchcheekka eatta fii bughala ea gea eatta fii haradam ea damanamughuush.

Ngatta gageanu Yeesu mukkattajeekka ghwanyawa ammuudiin ea ghweayeekka ghwanyawa assiyyenyean ak gong'weersa humng'eeda ak gabadiischeesa Aseetta. Gageanu mukkattajeega ghwanyawa ak ghabwanajaada aba geattingaaschi ak ghoadaw ginealangaaschi gwalakkiisa buuneeda. Eara ghweayeega ghwanyawa assiyyeenya ghwanung' goguulli buuneessean.
Gweagiischi fugiga seaniin ea gwalang'u.
Hit agiischooda buuneeda gewweamu mukkattajeega abit ea ghweayeega abit ak ghwannyiit soscheew damaniyyeenya.
Nea fuga sing'ng'attaawa mukkattajeega ghwanyawa ea sagalamnyooji muut, headiga akghwahit.

Deagheatta ghwanung' Yeesu gaweay ginealangaaschi jeeda maleambooda nea gwayeeshsha, oshsheeda oakghaawana basooda aweayeena hoowa bea ng'eanyiida Betsaydaan. Aniini gaghanyi dahuuydean daheelli emeeda.
Iiduw nea niheelli buuneeda gawa uhuumba heaya gamus Aseetta.
Ghoaw shing'ada nea maleambooda gwanda bugusta basooda nea Yeesu gaba geaw aba ng'eanyiida ghajaam.

Ang'wearda ghwadaa nea gwadeawiit ginealangaaschi aba manmanda maleambooda nea ghwaak milaada aba gideaba goyuuk maleambooda jeammeeda. Ghargayeew ghabeawa Yeesu badayda beega nea gaweesa ginealangaaschi mida jeeda maleambooda. Gawa nea gwahinda gili jea ghwasuut.
Hean sidaah nea ghabeawa badayda beega Goguul nea ghaghay gili daa malonghajeanda.
Sidaah ghang'ut sean muuwuda. Iiduw ghwanya ghuutta Yeesu nea gwayeeshsha, “Asi abissiina ahawda! Siida aniini gil adoabealli!”
Gwading'da niny maleambooda ak ghahawuda jeammeeda. Ghwanung' ghahamng'eanyi saawa muuchchi.
Ghabeal muuchchi aba gideaba mwanala ng'asheega ghayi bea mukkatte. Nea gwasin hang'ooynachcheekka guroruunatka nyaawa.
Ng'atta nea gogeawusa ng'eanyiida Genasareetti, ghwanung' goduuw maleambooda nyaawa aba ghuutta basooda.
Hitta nea ghwararang'aana jeeda maleambooda gabay ghwadaa Buuneeda ak geanal.
Gwasalda Buuneeda gaweay gealga ak gwasareenu fuga miyeani siyeattuuna muuchka nyaawa eayaat heeda wassean siyiing'sa Yeesu.

Heeda laah Yeesu sean mida gharang'weakka ghanea mujiinajeega gil, ghanea madameega, inyeessa Geayiin fuga miyeani gheatta naweeda gawa ghwanyasa nea geeyeeshsha geat eara ghanyi ghawaap weleeda hang'daannyi gaygaheaba buuneeda. Ak ghoaw huumwa fuga waasa geat weleeda Yeesu gaheaba.
Ghapka fuga mwaatkwa was Farisaayajeega nea godeana ginealshoodiga diineeda Yahuudi nea gwaleabu Yerusaleemu ama hidu goweameesa heeda mida Yeesu.
Hidu nea ghoang'wearda ghwadaa ginealanga mwaatkwa bea Yeesu gweagiischi nea meahuuna geattinga.
Aba gideaba fuga was Farisaayajeega ea fuga sean was emeeda Yahuudi inyeessa gwasinda ng'asheega gidaghayi ang'ng'wanyaanda fugeaba garayi; iissa ea mayghwaak gil nea meahuuna geattinga muuchchi.
Saawa mayghwaak gida leabu jarooda nea menyooghanyi ehhuun. Gwanda seareeda ghayi sing'ng'wanyaan inyeessa gehhuun gweerajeega, ea dahuunatka, ea bwakkurajeega gharinga.

Ghoanyaash Yeesu, fuga was Farisaayajeega sea ginealshoodiga diineeda Yahuudi, “Ghwasaan anda ginealangaagu moang'ng'waanya ng'sheega ghayi bea fugeaba garayi? Eara iyagiischi ghwaakta geattinga mehhuuna?”
Ghwalamda Yeesu ak gwayeeshsha, “Fuga ammiittu geat! Niiw huumwa ramoraneeda ghayi rukutteawa. Isaya badahukkeagwa,
‘Ghayi gwayi Aseetta,
Fiisu gwasinnunean mureeda aba ghuusiga akghwahit,
nea guroruunatka nyaawa
easheagewean.
Earra gabattean ghanyea maygwaloossa gil.
Aba gideaba goneali buuneeda humeannyeekka
mawasa geasu was gea buuneeda.’
Agooga ghoanung'waadi digheanda Aseetta ak ghoang'ng'waanyi fughareenga buuneeda.”
Gabiikta Yeesu ak gwayeeshsha, “Agooga gowoschi milmili. Ghoanalli amulsiina deaweedeeda Aseetta aba ng'asheegeangwa oang'ng'wanyaannyi.
Ghayi gwayeeshsheegwa Muusa, ‘Sissiina gweanu ea geamadu mureeda.’ Nea, ‘Siida imwaashta ghwaan ghana ghaamwat gagasa ghami.’
Ghoayamnyi Agooga ak goyeeshshi, ‘Siida imideawa gili ghwanyawa jea ghoadaw ghwaan ghana ghaamwat, amaduw gwayi gili Gorbani.
Abeeda siisi gajeaninyas gidajeagamulsiinda weetta ghwaan ghana weetta ghaamwat.’
Nii ghamneawa Gidofooldi ng'asheanda Aseetta gil, aba ginealshoodeang'wa oang'ng'wanyaadi. Nea goosnayi eara ng'asheega saang'a uurji suh.”
Ghabwadageat Yeesu emeeda ama hit gwayeeshsha, “Oalleaydiit oagasean ak gojeeng'u.
Manda gichchea gawa jeessiida leabu jarooda, jea ghang'uda siida ririnnyeanda. Amadukku ng'asheanda leabu jeessiida ea gea ng'utta siida ririnnyeanda gil.” [
Siida agar iitta adayiinya ng'asheesu.]
Iiduw nea gwaheelli emeeda nea gawa jeeda ghoriida ghoanyaash Ginealangaaschi ng'asheega gwachchi galla geadiin.
Gwayeeshsha Yeesu, “Asseara agooga moanali? Moanali gideaba gidawea jeessiida leabu jarooda, mwoammu ghang'uda siida ririnnyeanda,
Aba gideaba mawa jeeda gurorooda, gawa jeeda siyeakkiisa hamitta. Amaduw gwaritta jarooda.” (Aba sareani Yeesu gohiimsa buuneeda gideaba hamichchoojiga sean ghwadoabiiw.)
Gabiikta Yeesu gwayeeshsha, “Siida geaghus ghang'uda ririnnyeanda ng'asheega munyas leabu jeadaannyi.
Aba gideaba ng'asheega leappu jessiida gwaleabu jeeda guroroadaannyi nea giikka munyasiini gil, nea hiseadayeandumeeda,
Ea gwadishta, ea nuusta buuneeda, mealuleega, shidoodeaba ghaang', munyinda, lachng'eanyiida, ririnynyeanda, geawunda gheang'da, ging'weakka, ghwarjeeda ea lendeeda.
Ng'asheesu munyas seaniin gwaleappu jih ak gang'utta fii ririnnyeanda.”
Ghabeawa Yeesu hoowa, ak gawa ng'eanyiida Diro. Aba hoowa iiduw gawa jeemba ghoah nea magassa ghwanal sih amaduw ghwaraay ghafuy geaw.
Abeeda gwanda Gatmooni mida jeebi ittaannyi bea haweega beardooschi meang'nyeandeenda, nea aninyas iitta Yeesu, Ghwaan ama hidu gobedeaysa madeadaannyi.
Gatmooni abeeda gaba emoojiga. Gaba ng'eanyiida Foynikkeeda mida jeeda Sirya. Hidu Gatmooni gwayeeshsha Yeesu, Aniyean nung' gwaritteaysa hudeanyu meang'nyeandeenda.
Ghwalamda Yeesu ak gwayeeshsha, “Ameasa ghanyi gwalang'u diibiga, mwadoabiiwa gideaba gegeanu hamitta diibiga ak geejaksa gudajeega.”
Gwayeeshsha Gatmoodida, “Ea Siida mureeda, eara gudajeega inyeessa goliim murmurga abuutpuut diibiga iyagiischi.”
Gwayeeshsha Yeesu, “Aba ng'asheanji ghamneawa irguun, una ghoah hudaang'u niritteaysa meang'nyeandeenda!”
Gawa Gatmoodida ghoah ama hitta ghwadaa hudaannyi gawiilgeaw aba bulaliida nea niritteaysa meang'nyeandeenda.
Ghang'eat Yeesu gawa ghang'amwa ng'eanyiida Diro. Gawa ak gwasik ng'eanyiida Sidooni, ak ghwahitta Basooda siyi Galilaaya, nea gwasik mujiinajeega attamanamughuush suguura Dekapooli.
Ghwahidu heeda Yeesu Fiisu eattu siisi miiy bissa ea manda ghuutta. Sihhiidu geyeeshsha Yeesu, aniyean mwasa ang'ng'waanya uhuudeaba siisi.
Gageanu Yeesu siidida ak gorutteawa jeeda emeeda. Hit gageanu ak ghoabuutta mooringaaschi jeesinga iidiga, gang'ushsha nea gageanu ak ghwasat ng'ushapta.
Hean gong'weersa Yeesu humng'eeda, amahit gosiima, ak gwayeeshsha siida ghwanyawa miyaan, “Efwatta!” Nea gideaba, “Jaadana.”
Hean gabiissa ghwajaada idigeaba siidida ak goottina ng'ushapta, ak eara ghuttaannyi gabiissa ghoammu gabalool.
Ng'atta gwayeeshsha Yeesu buuneeda, ng'asheesu easinnyiin adiiduw ghoanung' ghwayiiy eara siida. Nea iissa gidaheawaatta gideaba adoorukuti ada ghoaraanya buuneeda rukutteayda.
Ghahamng'eanyi Buuneeda muuchchi nea gwayi, “Gwasin ng'asheega sean nea ghoadoabiiw, ghwanung' gwayiing'shi fuga miinyi nea eara gea manda ghuusiga gabalool!”
Iiduw ghabwat geat emeettuw gichcha, ea ghwasang'ayiit. Abeeda fiisu mandeawana gichchaghwaak. Hean gaguursa Yeesu ginealangaaschi ak gwayeeshsha,
“Aniini ghabwaydi fiisu aba gideaba neandeayeesi hiji nea ghamneawa ea eawetteaba samwagu gil, nea mighwanyas gilak.
Iyeasiksi gaweay ghoah nea ghwaat jalooda gwanda gea jea gohiili aba naweeda, aba gideaba jeani gwanda fuga leabu heshsheagi.”
Geyeeshsha Yeesu aba girrukusa Ginealangaaschi, “Ghamneawa mukkattajeega jea goolang'u fiisu denuun gajegeannana yeenu aba dareabeedi.”
Gwayeeshsha Yeesu ginealangaaschi, “Gondeawi mukkattaji hada aba hiji?” Gwayeeshsha Ginealanga, “Aba hiji gendeawi mukkattaji ispwa.”

Hean ghwalamda Yeesu ak gwayeeshsha, anung' gobiitpiit buuneeda aba ng'eanyi. Hit gageanu Yeesu mukkattajeegiga ghwanyawa assispwaan ak ghanyi ghamwaash Aseetta. Gageanu ak gwalakkiisa ginealangaaschi nea gwayeeshsha, oattawaada buuneeda. Ghoadaw Ginealanga buuneeda mukkattajeegiga.
Abeeda gwanda eara ghweayeesu ng'ay. Gageanu Yeesu ak ghamwaash Aseetta earaba ghweayeesu ama hit ghoadaw ginealanga nea gwayeeshsha, oattawa buuneeda.
Gweagiischi fugiga seaniin ea gwalang'u. Hit agiischooda buuneeda nea gewweamu lajanga abit ghwannyiit soscheew ispwa.
Nea monneeda fuga ghwanyawa sing'ng'aatta ea sagalamnyooji ang'wan. Hit agiischooda gwasiksa Yeesu buuneeda gaweay.
Deagheatta gawa Yeesu jeeda maleambooda nea godeayi ginealangaaschi ak gaweay ng'eanyiida Dalmanuutta.

Ghapka fuga was Farisaayajeega heeda Yeesu ak gwasheang'nyi sea Yeesu. Nea abeeda geegasa eaghas aba jeeda baloaldaannyi, geegasa gwasin gwadeagooda jea ghoahiimu gideaba niny huumwa gil gojeagu Aseetta.
Gagiisan Yeesu aba guroroadaannyi aba ng'asheanji ak gwayi, “Anda fiisu bea seaygeaniin gagassiidunu gwadeagooda? Adiiduw. Aba huumwa fiisu bea seaygeaniin mwajeattaw gwadeagooda.”
Ghang'eat Yeesu ghang'amwa ng'eang'da nyaawa. Gwading'da maleambooda ak gawa ea ghoaghaawa basooda.
Abeeda Ginealanga Yeesu niroossa eaditta mukkattajeega deayeat, abeeda aba jeeda maleambooda gwandeawa mukkattajanjagi akghwahit.
Iiduw gwareekusa Yeesu ginealangaaschi nea gwayeeshsha, “Ashageada mattawanda Farisaayajeega ea dea Heroode.”
Iiy Ginealanga ng'asheesu gabiissa gwasheang'nyi sean nea gwayi, “Nii ghamneawa ghwanyaashtunu aba gideaba mekkari mukkatte aba hiji.”
Gabaygwajeeng'u Yeesu ak gwayeeshsha, “Anda agooga gosheang'nyeesi ng'asheega nyootta mukkatte? Asseara giloanalli ghana gili ojeeng'u mandana? Eara ihengeagwa mwariishta?
Assagooga gondeawi gheanyanga ak ea mwoang'ng'weardani? Gondeawi iidiga ak ea mwoayiinyani gili? Ammwoapkaadi eara gidaghayi
eaweeda ghayi ealakkisiini mukkattaji muut fuga ghayi as sagalamnyooji muudi? Heappi isiwweamu lajanga ghwannyiit soscheew hada?” Geyeeshsha, “Ghwannyiit soscheew damaniyyeenya.”
“Ama mukkattajeega ghayi abwanajaadi assispwa ak ghwaak fii sagalamnyooji ang'wan, iiduw nea gowweamu lajanga abit ghwannyiit soscheew hada?” Geyeeshsha, “Ispwa.”
Hean gwayeeshsha, “Ak ea miyajeeng'ni?”
Ghwahitta Yeesu ng'eanyiida Betsayda nea godeayi ginealangaaschi. Hean gweadu Buuneeda siisi ng'oaw ak geemus Yeesu gideaba waasana geattingaagu.

Ghoang'ng'waay Yeesu geattingeaba siitta ng'oawiin, gorutteawa jeeda ghooriida, ak gang'ushsha gheanyanga aba ng'usheega, ak ghwayiin geattingaaschi uhuuda ak gwayeeshsha, “Heappi gimmuusi daaha gili?”
Ng'atta ghoang'wearda Siidida ng'oawiin ak gwayeeshsha, “Ghadaayi buuneeda ak gawuurji geediga nea gawelweel.”
Gabiikta Yeesu ghoang'ng'waay gheanyangeaba siidida. Hean ghoang'wearda siidida muuchchi. Gabiikta ghanyangaaschi ghoang'wearda. Ghwadaah halanjeassean mahophopsiina eara gil.
Ng'atta gwayeeshsha Yeesu siidida, “Asi una ghoah nea adiski hoowa bea gharang'dean.”

Gawa Yeesu nea godeayi ginealangaaschi nea gaweay hoowa bea gharang'weakka Gaysariyayda Filippiin. Duuw gwanda naweeda, ghoanyaash Yeesu ginealangaaschi nea gwayeeshsha, “Heappi buuneeda ibalool gwayeena geawoschi ng'eaha?”

Ghwalamda Saawa ak gwayeeshsha, “Buuneeda mwaatkwa gwayeena guwosi Yohaaneedida abattisachchiin, nea mwaatkwa gwayeena guwosi Eliya nea mwaatkwa gwayi gwadeeppa wosa siyagi aba jeeda sibanga ghayi bea garayi.”
Hean ghwalamda Yeesu ak ghoanyaash saawa nea gwayeeshsha, “Ama agooga goyeennyi geawoschi ng'eaha?” Ghwalamda Betro ak gwayeeshsha, “Ang'iing'i guwosi Gristo.”
Gwareekusa Yeesu saawa nea gwayeeshsha, “Adiiduw goorukusi sih iitteanyu.”

Gabiissa hean goneali Yeesu ginealangaaschi nea gwayeeshsha, “Asi anala gideaba Balleanda Siida gayghwanyas sawanadeeda haw muuchchi nea gayghaheawa gweargwa, ea ashoohoodiga hees ea ginealshoodiga diini. Gaygwanuus ama ng'atta eawooji samwagu gaygwaduudu.”
Ng'asheesu gwarukuta Yeesu muuchchi nea mwafnya eara gil. Hean ghwaat Betro Yeesu hichpa geaw ak gowoowsa.

Ghwasach ghaat Yeesu gong'weersa ginealangaaschi ama hit gowoowsa Betro nea gwayeeshsha, “Ng'amwana madedeanyu ang'iing'i guwosi Shattaani! Ng'asheesu bea jeeda uhuudang'uun ghanyea maleapna heeda Aseetta. Suh ng'asheega uhuuda siida gil.”
Gaguursa Yeesu emeettuw sang'aan ea ginealangaaschi ak gwayeeshsha, “Siida wassean igasa gweadu geeshteanyu, ea adaghwarar geaw, geaghus gageanu behiidaannyi ak gweadu geeshteanyu.
Aba gideaba siida gasa ghoaghu aweagaaschi gaygabeagu, amaduw siida beagu aweagaaschi appadaydeanyu ea badayda Giijasta miy gayghoaghu.
Heappi ghamneawa siida eara ghwanyas halanjeassean bea muunda ng'eanyiida gaygwaloossa naaha, ihutteawi aweagaaschi?
Ama siida gayghoadayda naaha jea ghoalaaja aweagaaschi?

Siida wassean aba seaygeani bea ring'eeda biissa ea meawalla Aseettean, siida isinnean gheanyanga ea ng'asheegeasu, abeeda Balleanda Siida gaygwasissa gheanyanga siidida, damanda jea ghwaana nea nighambiit ghwaan sea giijasoodiga ghaydidi bea humng'eeda.”
Gabiikta Yeesu ak gwayeeshsha, “Aba huumwa gaydarukuneegwa gideaba aba jeani hiji gwanda fuga maygameewa ea eaghus anidaah gheambalmeeda Aseetta gidahittaayda nea gweadu uurda.”
Ing'atta eawooji lah, ghwaat Yeesu Betro bea Yakkobo ea Yohaana uhuumba gijeeni geaw nea gaba geat. Iiduw aba hoowa ghwayamwa deaktaannyi ammadeannyaawa,
ak eara hang'waakkaaschi gaweriidi muuchchi. Eara aba jeeda ng'eanyiissean ghanyeamanda siida ammu gohuun hang'weakka ea gawerittiidunu.
Deagheatta geadaah Eliya ea Muusa nea gabalool sea Yeesu.
Gwayeeshsha Betro Yeesu, ea, “Ginealshoochcheanda, amiy muuchchi gideaba geendi hiji. Anda meesni ghooraji samwagu aba hiji. Ghoriida mabeanyi ang'iing'i niirja gaba Muusa, nea niirja gaba Eliya.”
Abeeda Betro ea oorjooga ghwanyawa anung'ut muuwda ea ghwaroot eara gichchea gwargu.
Miighoaw gil ea nuhoonu shamoghooda ak gwadukuta. Ghwanya ghuutta Siida nyaasha jeeda shamoghooda nea gwayi, “Nii Jeepteanyu abwariinyi olleysiiniit.”
Miighoaw gil ghoang'wearda Ginealanga gichcha, ak amwadaaha siinuut geaghus Yeesu akghwahit ea saawa.
Iiduw nea ghwararang'aadawa gijeeda gwayeeshsha Yeesu, asi adiiduw goorukusi sih ng'asheega ghwanyawa oadayiin ea eaghus ea nuduunna miyeeda Balleanda Siida.
Ng'atta Ghoang'ng'waay ng'asheanji, amaduw gwasheang'nyi Saawa nea gwayi gwadeaschi naaha ng'asheanji bea dunnooda miyeedean.
Iiduw Geannyaash Yeesu nea geyeeshsha, “Anda gwayeena ginealshoodiga Diini gayghanyi goshoohu Eliya?”

Gwayeeshsha, ada huumwa, “Eliya gayghanyi goshoohu ghwaan gwasissin halanjeassean. Eara gwasa, ghwasaan anda geang'waar aba jeeda Ng'ooruutka Ghaydit gideaba, Balleanda Siida gayghwanyas hang'weanidooda muuchchi nea gefool?
Geayeeshshineegwa, Eliya ada nihidu, ak gwasma Buuneeda gidagassiida saawa, gawuurji gidaghayi sung'waarda appadaydaannyi.”
Gaweay ama hitta heeda ginealanga suurja ghwadaa emeetuw nibattiisa geat hoowa, nea gwasheang'dooschi sea ginealshoodiga mwaatkwa bea diineeda Yahuudi.
Daa Buuneeda Yeesu ghahamng'eanyi muuchchi. Gwasalda gaweay roonnyeeda Yeesu ak gogeachchi.
Gwayeeshsha Yeesu ginealangaaschi, “Ghwanyawa gosheang'nyeesi naaha ooga fiisu?”
Deagheatta gwarinna Sih jeeda emeeda ak gwayeeshsha, “Ea Ginealshoochcheanda, heetta geyeadu headaang'u balleanji itteanyu beardooschi meang'nyeandeenda nea iissa ghwanung' ghwaroat eara ghuutta.
Inyeessa ibalaksa meang'nyeandeenda gwajaksa ng'eanyi nea gabaru ghuutta furghwajeega nea gowiiri geeshatka nea ghabwarghanda. Iyeayeeshshi ginealangaagu orruutta meang'nyeandeenda ghwaraay.”
Gwayeeshsha Yeesu saawa, “Anda agooga gowoschi seaygeeda mandeawana masaweega! Assagooga gaydeabiita heedeang'wa ea ghoaw eeju? Gaydabattiseegwa ea ghoaw eeju? Heappi ayeanni hedeanyu.”
Geyeadu balleandida heeda Yeesu. Daa Meang'nyeandeenda Yeesu ghwanung' ghoahiil balleanda ak gobedeaysa ng'eanyi ak goberbeershi nea gabaru ghuutta furghwajeega. Gwayeeshsha Yeesu ghweanda balleanda,
“Miyeanji gaba eeju?” Gwayeeshsha Siidida, “Ghang'eada jeepcheandumeadaannyi.
Nea iissa gwajaksa Meang'nyeandeenda jeeda beasta ea jeeda beega, nea gagasa nuusta. Asi immuusi, Gibwaydaneasa ak guweachcheasa!”
Gwayeeshsha Yeesu, “Gwayi immuusi gili! Aba siida mideawa masaweega manda gichchea gwadilna.”
Gojuur Siida nea gwayeeshsha, “Asi geandeawi masaweesu miihaw nea giheannean.”

Daa Yeesu gidawamwaanda emeettuw madeadaannyi gabiissa gojuursa meang'nyeandeenda nea gwayeeshsha, “Meang'nyeandeenda inung' ghwaroat ghuutteaba jeebi nea ghaminyiit, geayi ritteawana saseedeaba jeebi nea adiiduw gudubiiksiina gichcha!”
Gojuur Meang'nyeandeenda nea gwajaksa balleanda ng'eanyi ak gwaritteaysa. Iisung'ula balleanda aba ng'eanyi ea nuwuurji musta ea gwayeena buuneessean, “Nimi!”
Gageanu Yeesu ak ghoang'ng'waay geattinda balleanda ak gagatgat. Hean ghang'eat ghaminaada.
Iiduw nea nuwa Yeesu gah, gaweay headaannyi ginealanga nea gaba geat ak ghoanyaash nea gwayeeshsha, “Ghwasaan anda ghwanyawa aseasa gearaanyi errutta?”
Gwayeeshsha Yeesu saawa, “Meang'nyeanji bea endean gaba giikka ama jea gwaritta geaghus eamwaash Aseettean gil.”
Gawa Yeesu nea godeayi ginealangaaschi, Gaweay nea gwasik jeeda ng'eanyiida Galilaaya. Abeeda Yeesu niny magassa ghwanal buuneeda heeda mida.
Nea nii abeeda gwasin gideaba niny iyanaal ginealangaaschi gwayeenniisa, “Balleanda Siida gajeenung' goobissa geattinga buuneeda jea ghabwar ghami. Nea ing'atta eawooji samwagu gaygwaduudu.”
Abeeda Ginealanga mwanala ng'asheanji ak ghoawal ghoanyaash.
Ghwahitta ng'eanyiida Gapernaumu. Iiduw nea nuweay jeeda gheeda ghoanyaash Yeesu ginealangaaschi nea gwayeeshsha, “Ghwanyawa aba naweeda gosheang'nyeesi naaha?”
Ghwasiinda Saawa, aba gideaba gwachchi nea gwanda naweeda gwasheang'nyeesa gideaba ahaw ng'eaha aba jeannyaawa.

Hean iiduw gawa Yeesu goopteada ak gaguursa ginealangaaschi attamaniyyeenya. Gwayeeshsha, “Siida gasa ghang'atta madeedeaba suurja dayiina geaw ng'eanyi ea gahuuydeana buuneessean ea ghoaw siida gadiyeesa buuneessean.”
Gaguursa jeebi mwanang' ak ghwanung' ghaminaada aba madeannyaawa. Gageanu ak gabeashsa geattingaaschi gheatta jeepta ak gwayeeshsha,
“Siida deapta jeepta uurji nii aba gheawungeasu, ghwadeaptanaan aniini. Nuut siida deaptanaan aniini mwadeaptanaan aniini akghwahit, ghwadeapta eara siida ajeaknean.”
Gwayeeshsha Yohaana Yeesu, “Ea Ginealshoochcheanda, sidaayi siida aruttiida meangeeniga aba gheawungaagu. Geyeeshshi nung'waada aba gideaba siidida mabwaheasa.”
Gwayeeshsha Yeesu, “Adagudochchuursi, manda siida jea gwasin deamdeamanga sunu nea gwasna gheawungeasu amaduw gwasheamu gwarukuna badaydeanyu ng'asheega munyas.
Aba gideaba siida mwahasheasa siisi gaba meatkwedeanya.
Ama siida wassean jea gagoonaneegwa beega jea aleaha gideaba gowoschi fuga Gristo siisi aba huumwa eara niny majaghanyi amwanyasa gimeardaannyi.”

“Siida wassean jea ghwanung' ghwaramwasta siyagi aba jeedeaba fiisu manang'i mwasaniin ak ghwanung' gwasin ring'eeda, siisi abeeda ghang'wana gegeanu lagheaneeda haw bea ng'ealdeayda ak geerassa gheattannyi ama hit geejaksa jeeda basooda.
Iinung' geattindaang'u, adiinya gilaji! Ghang'wana ginyasi eaweega nea gibeahi gattinagi, mwasamwa gideaba gindeawi geattinga sean ak guwi jeeda beasta manda mudeanooda. [
Aba hoowa gwanda ghughuutka mameewwa, ea beasta mammissa.]
Eara geashtaang'u iyaschoardaneey ghang'wana gilaji. Ghang'wana ginyasi eaweega eara beaha geashagi, mwasamwa gideaba gindeawi geashangaagu duwaaw amaduw geejakseey jeeda beasta manda mudeanooda. [
Aba hoowa gwanda ghughuutka mameewwa, ea beasta mamissa.]

Eara gheang'daang'u iyaschoardaneey, ghang'wana giloodu! Ghang'wana guwi jeeda gheambalmeeda Aseetta nea gibeahi ghaang'agi. Mwasamwa gideaba gindeawi gheanyangaagu duwaaw amaduw geejakseey jeeda beasta manda mudeanooda.
Aba hoowa gwanda ghughuutka mameewwa ea beasta mamissa.
Gaygaba siisi simmiinna beasta.
Balang'da gida miy gil. Amaduw balang'da inuhutta samneadaannyi gaygudu esma naaha? Gagasa ahuuwa balang'da aba jeedeang'wa nea gobeayi hoyyoo nea gororoochchi.”

Hean ghabeawa Yeesu hoowa ak gawa ea gawa ng'eanyiida Yudeeya, ea ghwahitta gigheawda eenda suguura Yordaan. Goreemsa emeetuw headaannyi gichcha. Hean gabiissa goneali buuneeda ng'asheega gichcha gawuurji gideasuju sina.
Ng'atta gaweay fuga Farisaayo heeda Yeesu ak gwasim nea gwayeeshsha, “Heappi ghwadoabiiwi gideaba gayghwanung' siida gatmoadaannyi?”
Gwayeeshsha Yeesu saawa, “Deawedeeda ghayi goneegwa Muusa anneeda gil?”
Gwayeeshsha Saawa, “Muusa ada ghayi gagoaneasa gheatta nea gwayi siida dang'waara barawajeanda jea ghwanung'wa gatmoadaannyi.”
Gwayeeshsha Yeesu saawa, “Muusa niny ghayi gagooneegwa gheadi nea gweagu hang'ooynachcheekka jeesingeagwa.
Nea aba gidaghayi subwatta ng'eanyiida, gwasin Aseetta ng'edeeda ea gatmooda.
Asi aba dascheani Siida gaygwaheelli ghwaan ea ghaamwat ak gaygodeayi sea gatmoadaannyi,
Fiisu assiyyenyean gayghoaw siyagi. Asi fiisu mudea fii iyyeenya gil niiw siyagi.
Asi fuga niroochchi Aseetta adagoheelli sih.”
Iiduw nea gabiikta gichcha gah ghoanyaash Ginealanga itteaba ng'asheanji.
Ghwalamda Niny ak gwayeeshsha, “Siida nung'usa heeda gatmoadaannyi ak ghaghi nuut godiiysa gatmoadaannyi aba mealuleega.
Gwasnu eara Gatmooda nung'wa heeda siyeadaannyi ak gawa gheemba siinuut gatmoani gamealuul.”
Muchchu gweadu Buuneeda diibiga manang'i heeda Yeesu ghoang'ng'waay iheenga, ak gowoowusa Ginealanga buuneeda.
Daa Yeesu gissin ginealangaaschi gwanyareeksa ak gwayeeshsha, “Anung'waada diibiga ghapka hedeanyu adoakghuumnyi, aba gideaba Gheambalmeeda Aseetta gammiisa fuga uurji suh.
Aba huumwa Gearukuneegwa gideaba siida mwamwastta ng'asheega Aseetta jeepta mwanang' siisi maygawa jeedeaba Gheambalmeani.”
Iiduw Ghwadeapta diibiga ak gabeashsa geattingaaschi ak ghoang'ng'wanyaada iheenga, ak ghoadawaada ghawooda.
Ng'eat Yeesu nea gaygawa bareannyeakkaaschi, gafaju sih ama hidu gwatkuy aba madeadaannyi ak gwayeeshsha, “Ea Ginealshoochcheanda waam, akkaydasin naaha ijadanyas eaweega manda mudeanooda?”
Gwayeeshsha Yeesu, “Ghwasaan inyas gigurewean siida Waam? Siida waam geaghus Aseetta.
Digheannyeekka ginali, ‘Adimealuuli, adinuusi siida, adijagwadiischi, adinabayi ng'uyyeega, adireenganayi siida, sisiina mureeda gweanu ea geamadu.’”
Gwayeeshsha Siidida, “Ea Ginealshoochcheanda, digheannyeeksu miighanyi danaawa eara ghayi aba jeepcheandumedeanyu”

Hean gong'weersa Yeesu siidida nea nubwariiy ak gwayeeshsha, “Ghwashoadeaweey gilagi, una akkishaaydi halanjeadaang'u indeawi sean amahit gigeanu lappiyeedida ak gidawaadi fuga barbari. Abeeda gaynyasa baruureega aba humng'eeda. Hit ginyuunyi eanni geeshtteanyu.”
Iiy Siidida ng'asheanji gafu duwunda ak ghang'eat gawa nea nigiisan, nea gwasin gideaba abeeda siidida meanang'ochcheanda gil.
Ghwasach ghaat Yeesu gang'ula ginealangaaschi ak gwayeeshsha, “Ghamneawa ghoanalli gidahang'waayda beatta jea gaweay meanang'oodiga jeeda Gheambalmeeda Aseetta!”
Iiy Ginealanga ng'asheanji ghahamng'eanyi. Nea Yeesu niny gabiikta ak gwayeeshsha, “Ea diibigeasu ghamneawa ghoanalli gidahang'waayda beatta jeeda Gheambalmeeda Aseetta.
Beatta jea gawa meanang'ochcheanda jeeda Gheambalmeeda Aseetta ahang'waay ea ghang'wana eara beatta jea gwasik nngamiya gheang'da sidageeda.”
Aba dascheani ghahamng'eanyi ginealanga muuchchi. Gonyeari geat nea gwayi! “Abeeda iisunu gwanda siichchea ghaghu?”
Gwayeeshsha Yeesu saawa nea gang'ula gheanyanga nyaawa, “Huumwa gil aba siida mwadaagha ng'asheanji maygwaroochchi. Nea aba Aseetta nii ea miigili. Aseetta manda gichchea gwadilna.”
Ghwalamda Betro ak gwayeeshsha, “Ama aseasa? Ang'wearda sinung'wi heeda haleanjeedeanya sean ak geyeadu geashtaang'u!”

Ghwalamda Yeesu ak gwayeeshsha, “Aba huumwa geayeshshineegwa, Siida wassean nung'usa heeda gheeda, ghana oorjooga ghaamwat ghana haweega ghaamwat, ghana ghaamwat, ghana ghwaan, ghana diibiga, ghana madameega appadaydeanyu ea Giijasta miy,

aba damani bea ghamneawean, gajeattaw niba bughala, ea ghwanaawa damani bea ghamneawean gheeda, ea oorjooga ghaamwat, haweega ghaamwat, ghaamwat, diibiga, ea madameega ea sawanadeeda ama damanda jea ghwahidu gayghwanyas eaweega manda mudeanooda.
Amaduw Fuga saang'a mida madedeaba suurja, gaygahuydeana sean. Nea fuga saang'a huydeanayyi, imuchchu gayghoaw fugeaba mwadi.”

Abeeda nea gwanda naweeda Yeesu sea ginealangaaschi nea gagal Yerusaleemu, nea abeeda gosheedeawa Yeesu saawa. Ghang'ut ginealangaaschi muuwda nea eara fuga aat geeshta anung'ut muuwda. Ghwasach Yeesu gichcha fukka attamaniyyeenya was ginealangaaschiin, ak gabiissa gwarukusa ng'asheega jea ghwanyas.

Gwayeeshsha, “Heappi oalleaydiit! Ghamneawa Geweayi Yerusaleemu. Nea aba hoowa Balleanda Siida gajeayiin geattinga ashoohoodiga hees ea ginealshoodiga diineeda Yahuudi. Fiisu gayghoahaakta enuus ak geayiin geattinga fuga emoojiga.
Ak gaygwajuuga, nea gong'urriisa ng'usheega nea geabwar aba mughoowooda ak gwanuus. Amaduw eaweetteaba samwagu gaygwaduudu.”
Hean gaweay geaba Yakkobo ea Yohaana was oorjooga Sebedaayo ama hitta heeda Yeesu gwayeeshsha, “Ea Ginealshoochcheanda, gwanda gili sigasayi emuseey.”
Ghwalamda Yeesu ak gwayeeshsha, “Googasayi dasinneegwa naaha?”
Ghwalamda Saawa ak gwayeeshsha, “Aniyean nung' goobiida siyagi meatkweadaang'u bea geattinda dugwa, nea goobiida niirja meatkweadaang'u bea geattinda ghadaam eaweetta sikghambidaneey.”

Ghwalamda Yeesu ak gwayeeshsha, “Agooga eara gidaghamneawa oomuschi moanali! Heappi ghoammuuschi aleayda bayokteanyu bea sawanadeeda? Ama gibattiisandida jea eppattisanan aniini agooga gajeeppattisaneegwa?”

Gwayeeshsha Saawa Yeesu, “Ea geammuuschi.” Gwayeeshsha Yeesu, “Huumwa gil bayookta jea daleayda eara agooga ghoammuschi gideaba gajaleayda Eara gibattisandida jea eppattisananiin gajeeppattisananeegwa eara agooga.

Ak gajea ng'eaha siida jea goobiida meatkweedeanyu bea geattinda dugwa, ghana meatkwedeanyu bea geattinda ghadaam. Nii mii gadiyeedeanyu jea dasin gil, geaghus eattaw fuga ghayi bay gwararsa Aseetta.”
Iiy Ginealanga suurja attamanamughuush gwanyareesi idaah gissin Yakkobo ea Yohaana.
Gaguursa Yeesu ak gwayeeshsha, “Ghoanalli gideaba fukka sighay gili sugoodiga emoojigeani iissa ghoahaghwiida fuga nyaawa uurda, nea fiisu hesiin iissa goombala fuga nyaawa gharbeeda.
Duukku agooga ea mii gichchea awurjeewana. Aba siida gasa hawunda aba jeedeang'wa doawa siideang'wa bea gadiyeeda.
Siida gasa ghang'atta mwadi gayghoaw soomjeanda buuneessean.
Aba gideaba Balleanda Siida ghayi mwoani egadiyeesa. Ghayi ghwaan Niny gagadiyeesa buuneeda nea ghwaan gabeagu eaweegaaschi aba gittinnooda fuga saang'a.”

Geahitta mujiineeda suguura Yerikko, iiduw ghang'eet Yeesu sea ginealangaaschi ghabeawa hoowa nea godeayi emeetuw. Geanyasa gheatta naweeda siisi ng'oaw musiisachchi suguura Bartimayo was oorjeeda Dimaayo.
Hean iiy gideaba ghang'atta Yeesuuydida leabu Nasareettiin gabiissa Gojuur nea gwayeeshsha, “Ea Yeesu Balleanda Dawdi, aniyean bwaydanaan!”
Gojuursa fukka sang'aan nea geyeeshsha, siinda, sirukusa ghoaraanya gijureanda muuchchi nea gwayeeshsha, “Ea Balleanda Dawdi, aniyean bwaydanaan.”
Hean gawus Yeesu ghaminaada ak gwayeeshsha buuneeda, “Agursiina.” Hean geguursa siidida ng'oawiin nea geyeeshsha, “Ammiinni uhuudaang'u ng'eada ak guwi gaguuru.”
Gwajaksa ng'eanyi hang'daannyi. Gotkweal ak gawa ea gawa heeda Yeesu.
Ghoanyaash Yeesu nea gwayeeshsha, “Gigasayi dasinneey naaha?” Gwayeeshsha Siitta ng'oawiin, “Ea Ginealshoochcheanda, aniini geagasayi dabiikta dang'wearda.”
Ghwalamda Yeesu ak gwayeeshsha, “Una, ang'iing'i nihaapnyi masaweagaagu.” Miighoaw gil gabiikta gichcha Siidida ng'oawiin ghoang'wearda ghang'eat ak ghoang'ng'waay naweeda ghwaat geeshta Yeesu.

Iiduw nea gwanekkiissa Yerusaleemu, ghwahitta mujiinajeega Betfaage ea Beettaniya nekkeewa gijeeda mida geediga suguura Masaytunajeega. Gageanu Yeesu ginealan iyyeenya aba jeeda ginealangaaschi ak gojeakta gosheeda.
Nea gwayeeshsha, “Aweayeena ea ahitta gharang'dida mida mwadiin. Iyoahitti gajanyasana hoowa digeeda migwaheedu ghayi eara ginealda miyeannaal. Gajadaaha nea radaat ak goottinnyi, ak gorjeanu.
Ideeppa ghoanyasheagwa buuneeda gideaba ghwasaan andagottinnyi goyeeshshi gagasa, ‘Ng'uttamiida nea gaygabay godeelu.’”
Gaweay Fugiga ak ghwanyasa ghuutta naweeda digeeni sirassa geetta dooshta. Hitta nea goottinu
ghwadaa Fiisu ghwanyawa mida ghuutta naweeda ak ghoanyaash nea gwayeeshsha, “Digeeni goottissi naaha?”
Gwarukuta Ginealanga ng'asheega sean ghwanyawa rukusa Yeesu. Geesiksa ghoarjaanda.
Gearjaanda digeeda ea ghwahitta heeda Yeesu. Gegeanu hang'weakka ak geayiin badayda digeeda amahit gwading'da Yeesu badayda ak goopteadawa.
Gageanu Fukka saang'aan ak ghoabwarghaan hang'weakka nyaawa aba naweeda, nea buuneeda suurja gaweay jeesinga madameega gwalagu seenga geediga ak ghoabwarghaan aba jeeda naweadaannyi.
Gwasim Buuneeda gaweay nea heeda measheedeawana Yeesu suurja gahuuydeana nea gwayi sean, “Oakghambiida Aseetta! Sibadischeesa siisi wuna gheawunga Ng'uttamidean!
Sibadischooweey ea gheambalmeeda sugoochcheanda ghayi was ghweandeanya siyi Dawdi. Oakghambiida Aseetta mida humng'eeda.”

Ghwahitta Yeesu mujiineeda Yerusaleemu ak gawa jeeda Gheeda Sibatta Aseetta. Hitta ghoang'wearda gwasikteawa haleanjeessean. Iiduw ghwadaa niiw shing'ada. Ghang'eat gawa ng'eanyiida Beettaniya nea godeayi ginealangaaschi attamaniyyeenya.
Muchchu nea gwanda naweeda gwaleabu ng'eanyiida Beettaniya ghwayeachchi Yeesu.

Ang'wearda ghwadaa shabogheechcheanda nea gudeasheagi nea gwandeawa seenga saang'a. Gaweesa ghwadaa eajeaghwanyasa haghweega. Hitta heeda nea gwasikteawa ghwadaa geaghus seenga nea gwasin gideaba miighwahitta damanda jea gwalakna haghweega.
Gwayeeshsha Yeesu mtineedida, “Maygudughwaganeey sih haghweega ea ghoaw gweanynyeekka manda mudeanooda.” Gwarukuta ng'asheandida nea abeeda ghwayiiy ginealangaaschi.

Ghwahitta Yeesu Yerusaleemu ak gawa jeeda gheeda Sibatta Aseetta, ak goruutta jarooda fuga gwachchi shaayda ea gea shah haleanjeeda. Ghoadandaarda haleanjeeda fuga ghwanyawa nyarja lappiya ea hoorgajeega fuga ghwanyawa shaayda ghariibajeega.
Ea mwanung' ghang'atta sih gwasik jeeda Gheeda Sibatta Aseetta nea ghwaada geadi gil.

Hit gabiissa Ghoanaal buuneeda nea gwayeeshsha, “Ghayi Aseetta gwayi aba jeeda Ng'ooruutkaaschi, ‘Gheawi itteanyuun gayghoaw heechchea gabattewean emoojiga sean.’ Ak ghoanung' ghoaw gwaleeda jea gafunnya geat mareanghooga!”
Iiy Ashoohoodiga hees ea ginealshoodiga Diineeda Yahuudi gabiissa ghamwaal gichchea gwanuusta. Iiduw Geawwal gheang'da idaah gidaduupta emeeda ginealshoadaannyi.
Iiduw nea niiw shing'ada ghang'eat Yeesu nea godeayi ginealangaaschi ak gaweay ghang'amwa jeeda mujiini.
Iimuchchu nea gaweshiit damanda ng'attaawa ghwadaa shabogheechcheanda nea nighajamiit sean ea gagul hawunga.
Apkaat Betro gidaheetta surukusa shabogheechcheanda gwayeeshsha Yeesu, “Ea Ginealshoochcheanda, ang'wearda! shabogheechcheanda heetta imwaashtiin nighajamiit!”
Ghwalamda Yeesu ak gwayeeshsha, “Agooga amwasa Aseetta.

Aba huumwa Gaydarukuneegwa gideaba, ‘Ghamneawa siida eashsha,’ gijeeni loadaadawana hiji ak guwi jaksiina geaw jeeda basooda nea siisi gwarukuta ng'asheanji nea mwanyeaha jeadaannyi, ak ghamwas gideaba ng'asheega sean rugu gaygwasa, ng'asheanji gajeesissa.
Asi Gaydayeeshshineegwa, iyoamwaashchi nea goomuschi gil, amwasa gideaba noanyaschi, ak gajegooneegwa.
Ghabwada iyoaminaadi nea gajamwaasha gil, daba siisi samsa gidinyeanda wassean deeppa ea nismaneey sih. Abeeda eara ghweandeang'wa mida humng'eeda gaygwasamsa gidinyeannyeekkeagwa. [
Ama mosammisiini gidinyeannyeekka simmeweega buuneeda eara Ghweandeang'wa mida humng'eeda ea maygwasamsa gidinyeannyeekkeagwa.]”
Gaweay ea ghwahitta gichcha Yerusaleemu. Iiduw nea gwaneayeewa Yeesu jeedeaba Gheetta Sibatta Aseettean, gaweay headaannyi ashoohoodiga hees ea ginealshoodiga diineeda Yahuudi ea gweargwa.
Geannyaash nea geyeeshsha, “Ak gheambalmeeni ittang'u isinni ng'asheesuun anneeda? Gagoonnyi ng'eaha gheambalmeeni isinni ng'asheesuun?”
Ghwalamda Yeesu ak gwayeeshsha, “Ommeasa eara agooga gaydanyasheagwa ng'ashaanjagi, iyoashaayi ng'asheanji eara aniini gaydarukuneegwa heeda leabu gheambalmeeni itteanyu easinni ng'asheesuun.
Heappi Arukunean gibattiisanda ghayi eadu Yohaana gwarinna yeenu? Gwaleabu heeda Aseetta ghana leabu heeda siida?”
Hean Gabiissa gwasheang'nyi nea gwayi, “Ghamneawa isiyeeshshi, ‘Ghayi gwaleabu humng'eeda, gaygwayi, Anda ak amoamwasi ng'asheega Yohaana?’
Ama Siyeeshshi, ‘Ghayi gwaleabu heeda buuneeda.’” (Ada geawwalli buuneeda aba gideaba ghamwas sean gideaba Yohaana sibaneeda gil.)
Hean iiduw ghwalamda Saawa ak gwayeeshsha Yeesu, “Aseasa meanali.” Ghwalamda Yeesu ak gwayeeshsha, “Eara aniini ea maydarukuneegwa heeda leabu gheambalmeeni itteanyu easinni ng'asheesuun.”

Ng'atta gobalool Yeesu saawa nea gagalla geat ng'asheega nea gwayeeshsha, “Ghayi sih ghabwar madamnyeanji ittaannyi ak gang'eapsa misabiibu. Hit goneaweesa madamnyandannyi hilooga, gageanu ak gwasin healadeeda jea emurriisa difaayeeda was mideega haghweega misabiibu, ak gwasin eara madalooda jea efurra madamnyeanda. Hean ghwanung' gooragan Buuneeda madamnyeandannyi. Ng'atta iiduw gawa Siidida ea gawa daroorakka sheagi.
Damandida bea lajittean Gojeakta soomjeanji ittaannyi heeda fuga aragan madamnyeanda, gweadu booga sinyas bea madamnyeanda was heeda dobiiwsa niny.
Ghoang'ng'waay Fugiga soomjeandida ak ghabwar amang'atta geanung' gabiikta nea mwaada gil.
Gojeakta gichcha soomjaan nuut, earada geesawan nea geesma ng'asheega munyas.
Gabiikta gichcha Siidida bea madamnyeandeen gojeakta soomjaan nuut, amaduw gwanuus fukka aragan madamnyeandeen. Eara fuga suuk sichcheakta earaga mwaatkwa geabwar nea mwaatkwa genuseada.
Abeeda ea sippuussa heeda siyagi, nea jeaptaannyi bwariiy gil. Iiduw Gojeakta ada nea gwayeeshsha geaw, ‘Gajeawwal gheang'da.’
Hean gwayeeshsha geat Fukka, ‘Nii siida jea numuji gwahearaniischi gil asi enuusa, ak abeeda gaygabwaheasa hearaniischooda!’
Hean geang'ng'waay ak genuus amahit geejakta musta eannaawa hilooga madamnyeanda.
“Asi gaygwasin naaha siida bea madamnyeanda? Gayghwahidu ak ghwalas uhuudeaba fukka ghayi aragan madamnyeandean amang'atta gayghwanung' gooragan fii suuk madamnyeanda misabiibu.
Assagooga miyoassoamwana gissung'waar bea gideaba,
‘Lagheaneani aneawwa
ghaang' deekshoodiga, ghamneawa aniiw
lagheaneeda haw akkar gheeda.
Nii gidaghayi sin Ng'uttamiida,
Ak adamdamwaat aba hedeanya.’”

Iiduw Ashoohoodiga ea ginealshoodiga diineeda Yahuudi ea gweargwa gagasa ghoang'ng'waay Yeesu aba gideaba saawa nijeeng'u ng'asheega ghwanyawa rukku beadi sigala saawa. Hean geegasa eang'ng'waay, amaduw ghoawal emeeda. Ghang'eat ng'eat ak gwanung'usa heeda.
Gechcheakta buuneeda mwaatkwa was Farisaayajeega, ea fuga duuba Heroode gaweay gobalool Yeesu nea gagasa gichchea eaghasta aba ng'asheagaaschi.

Geapka headaannyi ak geyeeshsha, “Ea Ginealshoochcheanda, aseasa geanalli gideaba guwosi siida doabiwaat rukkwiida humeannyeekka nea ghanyea miiwali gheang'ba sih. Nea eara hawunda siida ghanyeamiduuppi, ak ginealayi ng'asheega naweeda Aseetta bea huumwa. Heappi Rukuneasa ea ghwadoabiiwi gideaba gerruutta gwaadi eattaw Gaysaari ghana manda? Gajeattawa ghana mwajeattawa?”
Gwajeeng'u Yeesu gidammittaayda geat ak gwayeeshsha, “Anda agooga googasayi gichchea aghastanaan? Heappi ayeanni lappiyeeni suguura dinaariin dadaah.”
Gehhiimsa ak ghoanyaash saawa, “Uhuuni ea gheawung'su gabeang'a?” Geyeeshsha, “Gaba Gaysaari.”
Gwayeeshsha Yeesu saawa, “Oattawa Gaysaari gida was dea Gaysaari ak ghoattawji Aseetta gida was dea Aseetta.” Ghwanung' ghahamng'eanyi muuchchi buuneeda.
Ghapka heeda Yeesu Sadukkayajeega mwamwasa gideaba gaygwaduuttu buuneeda, ak gwayeeshsha,

“Ea Ginealshoochcheanda, ghayi Muusa gwayeashshineasa, ‘Siida iimeah nea gwanung'usa heeda gatmooda miigwaji, gatmooni was masiinng'weandean gaygwajiila diibiga oorjeeda ghamasiyeadaannyi. Nea diibiga iisiji gajegushteawa ghweanda nyaawa ghayi meah.’
Ghayi gwanda oorju ispwa bea ghamwadagi. Gageeshshi oorjeeda haw amaduw ghami nea ghwanung'wa hiji gatmooda miigwaji.
Iiduw masiinng'weandida gwahearan oorjeeda bassa. Iiduw ghami earada nea gatmooda ea miigwaji. Gabiikta gwahearan gatmooda orjeedeaba samwagu.
Iiduw gatmoodida gwahearan Oorjookka seaniin nea gameewwa agi ea goosha sean ispeannyaawa nea gatmoodida ea miigwaji. Muchchu aba huydeanda eara gatmootta ghami.
Asi heappi eaweeda dunnooda gatmooni iiduw gaygaba ng'eaha? Gatmooda nighi buuneeda ea ghwahitta ispwa.”
Gwayeeshsha Yeesu saawa, “Agooga noaramwaschi muuchchi aba gideaba moanali ginnyaah ng'ooruutka Ghaydit ghana uurda Aseetta.
Aba gideaba eaweettida iduuttu buuneeda ea maygageeshshi nea majeegeena, gaygawuurji giijasoodiga humng'eeda.

Asaha aba ng'asheesu bea dunnoaniin ghayi needa ea miyoassoamwana aba jeeda gittabooda Muusa heeda sung'waar ng'asheega geetta mughuush yeada beasta jeeda? Ghayi aba hoowa Aseetta gwayeeshsha Muusa, ‘Aniini geawoschi Aseetta Abrahaamu ea Aseetta Isakka ea Aseetta Yakkobo.’
Niny mii Aseetta fuga nimeewa gil. Niny Aseetta fuga duugwanda. Agooga noaramwaschi muuchchi.”

Deagheatta ghwahidu Ginealshoochcheanda diineeda Yahuudi ak goleysiit sheang'nyeeda nyaawa. Daa gideaba Yeesu ghwasha ng'asheega nyaawa nea ghoadoabiiw, ghwaan ak ghoanyaash, “Aba jeeda digheannyyeekka sean ahaw anneeda?”
Hean gwayeeshsha Yeesu, “Dea madeeda nii gil, ‘Aniyean aleaydiit Israeeli! Ng'uttamiida Aseetteanya gil. Ng'uttamiida niny gil nea gaba geaw.
Bwariinya Ng'uttamiida was Aseettaang'u aba jeadaang'u sean ea aba guroroadaang'u sean, ea aba fughareadaang'u sean, ea aba urdaang'u sean.’
Ng'asheanda haw bea iyyeenya gwayi, ‘Bwariiyda gischeewoochcheandaang'u gidubwariiydi geaw.’ Manda digheannyeekka hees naawa suu assiyyenyean.”
Gwayeeshsha Ginealshoochcheandida bea Diiniin Yahuudiin, “Asi huumwa gil ginealshochcheanda! Aba hiji girgu huumwa gideaba Aseetta aagi, ak ea manda nuut geaghus niny nea gaba geaw.

Ea huumwa gil siida geaghus ghabwariinya Aseetta jeadaannyi sean ea aba fughareadaannyi sean ea aba urdaannyi sean. Ea huumwa gil siida geaghus ghabwariiyda gischeewoochcheandannyi gidabwariiyda geaw. Ng'asheesu assiyyeenyean ea majeekcheewi ea ghwanaawa eara gisilleanda ghadooweeda ea haleanjeeda suurja sisappa geadi sigadoowanniida.”
Daa Yeesu girrukutteayda ng'asheega nea gomajeek gwayeeshsha, “Ang'iing'i ghanyeamuwosi sheageewa Gheambalmeeda Aseetta.” Ng'atta balooli ea mudugwanda siisi badaksa Yeesu ghoanyaash ng'asha suuk.
Damanda anealsheewa Yeesu aba jeeda Gheeda Sibatta Aseettean, ghoanyaashta nea gwayeeshsha, “Ghwasaan anda ginealshoodiga Diineeda Yahuudi gwayeena Gristo Balleanda Dawdi gil?
Damandida gwayi Dawdi aba uurda Guroroada Ghaydit ghwanung' gwayi,
‘Ng'uttamiida gwayeeshsha Ng'uttamiideanyu,
Beenni abiidana meatkweedeanyu
bea geattinda dugwa,
ea danung' allaapta ng'eanyi fuga was
weajoodigaagu.’
“Dawdi niny gaguura Gristo Ng'uttamiida. Asi abeeda Gristo gayghoawattaan jeaptaannyi?” Abeeda Emeeda goleeysiit ng'asheega Yeesu nea gahoosan.

Gwayi Yeesu aba jeeda ginealshoadaannyi, “Ashageada ginealshoodusu bea Diineeda Yahuudiin. Fuga bwariiy gwaleammideawa hang'weakka geawwi, nea geyeenniisa seayu aba mureeda aba naada. Fuga ama hitta ghoorajeega sinnealshachcheewa gwajiir hoorgajeega madeeda.
Nea eara Iweay gealga ghwelmeeda ghwanyoahaada hoorgajeega madeeda.
Fuga iissa ghwaak haleanjeeda masiinng'weega nea iissa ghamwaash ghawooda nea gogeawiit! Eaweeda girgweaksiinda gayghwanyas ghoorjooda haw.”

Muchchu goopteada Yeesu aba jeeda Gheeda Sibatta Aseetta nea nekkeewa sandakwajeanda siyiina haleanjeeda ghadooweeda. Gang'ula gidiinda Buuneeda lappiya jeeda sandakwajeanda siyiina haleanjeeda ghadooweeda. Ghwadaah meanang'oodiga inyeessa ghabwaang'da lappiyeassaang'a.
Deagheatta ghwahidu Gatmoanagi bwarbwar was masiinung'weanda, ak ghoadayda heelaji iyyeenya akghwahit.

Hean gaguursa Yeesu ginealangaaschi ak gwayeeshsha, “Aba huumwa geayeeshshineegwa, gatmoani was masiinung'weanda bwarbwariin, nii ghamneawa ghoadayda gidahaw ea ghwalaabwa hoowa buuneessean iin lappiya jeeda sandakwajeanda siyiina haleanjeeda ghadooweedean.
Aba gideaba Buuneeda suurja ghoadayda gidabinna jeeda baruureega nyaawa. Sunung' Masiinung'weanji earappeadi bwarbwariin niidayda gidamideawa sean. Niidayda daghwardaannyi sean.”
Damanda ritteawa Yeesu jeeda Gheeda Sibatta Aseetta gwayeeshsha siyagi was Ginealaneadaannyi, “Ea Ginealshoochcheanda, ang'wearda gealsu hesiin gissam, ea lagheanga ghayi sideasa!”
Ghwalamda Yeesu ak gwayeeshsha, “Ghamneawa gidaahi gealsu heesiin? Lagheang'su ghayi sideasaan manda dea jea enung'usa heeda aaragi. Gajeeng'ng'adeadu sean.”
Eaweechcha Yeesu goopteada aba uhuuda Gijeeda Masaytunajeega deaschi Gheeda Sibatta Aseetta gaweay geaba Betro ea Yakkobo ea Yohaana sea Andereya ak ghoanyaash Yeesu nea gaba geat gideaba,
“Aniyean rukuneasa ng'asheesu gayghoaw eeju? Ak gajerroorda naaha aba hinnoodeaba ng'asheesu.”
Gwayeeshsha Yeesu saawa, “Ashageada adagwareenganneegwa sih.
Aba gideaba gayghapka Fuga saang'a jea ghapkaana gheawungeasu nea gwayi, siida aniini gil! Ak aba sareani gaygwareengani fuga saang'a.
Iyoayiinyi ng'asheega ng'uchcheadinga ea gijuureanda ng'uchcheeda ea adoohirbabannyi. Ng'asheesu mayghwashiy hinnooda, duukku mudeanooda ea miighoaw.
Gaygaba ng'eanyiini ng'uchchi nuut, gaygaba Sugoochcheanji ng'uchchi nuut, gaygwasaw ng'eanyiida gichcha ak gaygang'eeda gejeadinga. Ng'asheesu seaniin gaygawuurji lajooda gatmooda jea gwaji.

“Asi agooga ashageada, aba gideaba gayghwadeagwa Buuneeda gheeda sirgweachcha, nea geabwareagwa aba jeesinga ghoorajeega sinnealshachcheewa. Gajeayadeagwa madeeda fuga hees ea madeeda sugoodiga appadaydeanyu, ak abeeda gajahuuwa mushoodigeasu aba madeannyaawa.
Nea hinnooda jea ghwahidu mudeanooda ng'eanyiida, abeeda gajeasurukusa buuneessean Giijasta miy.

Nea eara isiyadeagwa gheeda sirgweachcha, ea adoohirbabannyi, appadayda ng'asheega jea arukuta, ihidu damandida, arukuta ng'asheanda wassean sinyunneegwa, aba gideaba mii agooga gil fuga jea gabalool, gaygabalool Gurorooda Ghaydit.
Nea Siida gayghwala bwadaw oorjeeda ghaamwat ak genuus, nea Bwaabwa gayghwala bwadaw orjeadaannyi, eara Diibiga gayghabwar ghweaniga nyaawa ak gwanuuseada.
Ak agooga gayghwasteagwa Buuneeda aba gheawungeasu. Nea siida jea ghamilikghta ea gagul damandida bea mudeanoodean, siisi gayghaghu.”
“Asi iyoadaayi gidamuy jea gweadu nyariida nea niminaada aba heeda mahaguuwsiina, (Siida assoamwa ea dajeeng'na gidawas) asi abeeda fuga mida ng'eanyiida Yudeeya ea dasalsiina iheenga heayeeniga.
Abeeda siida deeppa eanyasa uhuuda gheeda adaghwararang'aan, aduwi geanni eara gidamida gah jea aadana geadi.
Siida deeppa eanyasa jeeda madamnyeanda eara hang'da badayda ghwanyawa nung'wa ghoah adaghamwaghaada.
Eshshiina gadeemga was bungaroodiga ashageada, ea gadeemga reer diibiga aba damandida!
Gomoorayi ea mwahinna ng'asheesu munyasiin damandida bea gorogedean.
Aba gideaba damandida gaygwanda sawanadeeda manda dea jea eegala ghang'eada deaghayi nubwada Aseetta ng'eanyiida ea gagul ghamneawa. Ak ea maygudu gabiigu gichcha dea jea gawuurji nih.
Inyeeda gwachchi ea moong'ayiida Ng'uttamiida askwearjoojikka ghanyeamanda siisi jea ghwalalaan. Amaduw appadahuukka fuga loossa geaw anisuuy Ng'uttamiida askwearjoojikka.
“Asi iyeeshshineegwa Siida, ‘Ang'wearda Gristo gwanda hiji,’ ghana gwayi, ‘Gwanda hoowa,’ adoamwaschi.
Aba gideaba gayghwahidu Fuga was Gristohajeega ng'uyyeega ea sibanga ng'uyyeega, gayghoahiimu gwadeagooda ea ng'asheega deamdeameadi, aba hutteawda fuga loat Aseetta.
Asi agooga ashageada. Aniini nearukuneegwa ng'asheega sean heeda mii ghwahinna.”
“Asi askwearjoojigiga nea ning'atta ng'asheandida ng'waaniin, gaygwattuudu gheang'da Aseetta nea eara sheeda ea maygudu goboong'u.
Nea miinga humng'eeda gaygoobittu nea gaygwaduumduum uurda humng'eeda.
Ak gajeadaah Balleanda Siida nea gwashubeana jeeda shamoghuutka nea gaygwandeawa uurda haw ea gigheambiitta.
Ak Gaygoojeakta giijasoodigaaschi bea humng'eeda godearsa meadajeega assang'wan bea ng'eanyiida gaweay goweamu fuga loossa geaw, ghang'eada mudeanooda ng'eanyiida ea ghoaw mudeanooda humng'eeda.”
“Agooga ang'ulla shabogheechcheanda. Gwanda gichchea ghoanaleagwa. Iyabit seenga nea ghafiirfiir gea nyawiiri gajanala gideaba domeelda nineekkiit.
Gwasnu eara agooga iyoadaayi ng'asheesu nea ghwahindu, anala gideaba Balleanda Siida nineekkiit muuchchi.
Gearukuneegwa aba huumwa, Seaygeani bea ghamneawean mayghwanaawda nea miyadaaha ng'asheesu.
Humng'eeda ea ng'eanyiida gaygammudean. Duukku ng'asheegeasu ea maygammudean.
“Dukku askwearjeandida, ghana damandida manda siida nal. Eara giijasoodiga humng'eeda, ghana Balleanda Aseetta. Siinnal geaghus Bwaabwa akghwahit.
Ashageada nea ghoang'ng'wearu, aba gideaba mwoanali damanda jea gawaseewa.

Gawuurji Siisi ghayi wea bareannyeekka ak gwaruuda nea ghwanung'wa gheeda fuga gadiyeeda. Nea nigeanu ak gaba siisi adaw gichchea gwasin ak gageanu ghwayiin furiischochcheanda jea gafur dooshta nea gwayeeshsha milmiliida.

Asi oang'ng'wearni adoolilli aba gideaba mwoanali eaweetta jea ghwahinna siida bea gheeda, gwadeeppa ghwahidu shing'ada, ghana gwadeeppa ghwahidu eaweedagweena, ghana gwadeeppa ghwahidu beashatta, ghana gwadeeppa ghwahidu nea gorearu Aseetta.
Asi oang'ng'wearni gajiiduw gwashameegwa ak ghabwardaneegwa ng'eenyi nea goondi jeerruweanga.
Gichchea darukuneegwa oagasean, gaydayi, Oang'ng'wearni, adoolilli!”

Iimuchchu nea ghwashoada eawooji iyyeenya ak gayghwahidu ghwelmeeda Basakka ea dea mukkattajeega memmattawiitta. Abeeda gagasa ashoohoodiga hees sea ginealshoodiga diineeda Yahuudi gichchea ghoahaktaayda Yeesu akghoang'ng'waay ak gwanuus.
Iiduw gwayi, “Adiiduw geang'ng'waanyi eaweechcheanji bea ghwelmeeda mideewa fuga sang'aan, gaygang'eessa fii buuneeda.”

Yeesu abeeda gwanda ng'eanyiida Beettaniya. Gwanda gheeh Simoneeda ghayi beardooschi udamusuura. Iiduw nea goopteada gweagiischi ghwahidu headaannyi Gatmooni eattuuna geadi dabichcheanda nyiit nagheeda haw sheayeat suguura nardo biissa ea ng'andit. Hidu goodalealsa uhuuda Yeesu nagheedida ng'andidiin.
Gwanda Fuga mwaatkwa nyareesi nea gwayi, “Nagheani geahhaak ng'eanyiida ghwasaan?
Nagheani ghwanyawa isishaayda ghoammu ghwanyas dinaaraji bughalaji samwagu. Nea lappiyeani ghwanyawa iisinyas gajeattawaada fuga barbari.” Gewwoowusa gatmoodida muuchchi.
Nea Yeesu niny gwayeeshsha, “Anung'waada gatmooni oagasean. Gotteawiissi naaha? Nii gwasinnean gittoabiiw.
Fuga barbari gondeaydoscheewi galeega sean. Abeeda iyoogasayi aweada gajaweada. Duukku Aniini ea maydeabiitta heedeang'wa galeegasean.
Niny gwasin gidida ammuun. Niny ghwayeashanaan nagheada nea gwadawwiisa saseedeanyu bunyitta.
Ak ghamneawa aba huumwa ghoanung' darukuneegwa, heeda wassean aba muunda ng'eanyiida jea eweay ak gerukkwiida Giijasta Miy, ng'asheanji sin gatmooniin gajeerukku ghoaw gichchea epkkeatta niny.”
Hean gawa Yuudaayda Iskariyotti bea jeedeaba ginealangiga attamaniyyeenyean, ea gawa heeda ashoohoodiga hees nea gagasa ghwala bwadaw Yeesu.
Nyas iidi ashoohoodiga gahoosan muuchchi nea gwayeeshsha Yuuda, “Eara lappiya gajegoona.” Hean gabiissa ghamwaal Yuuda gichchea ghwalaapta bwadaw Yeesu.
Eaweetta madeeda bea ghwelmeeda mukkattajeega memmattawiitta, nea eaweetta sinuusa dayeenda gisilleanda bea ghwelmeeda Basakka
Gojeakta Yeesu ginealangaaschi assiyyeenya nea gwayeeshsha, “Aweayeena ea ahitta jeeda mujiini. Gajaroonnyeewana siida sar sirbiida beega. Ghoayaachchi geeshta.

ea ghwahitta gheeda jea gawa jeeda, iyoahitti goyeeshshi siida bea gheeda, ‘Gwayi Ginealshochcheanda abwaara aba jeedeaba gheang'u ghooriini siyeaksi hamitta ghwelmeeda Basakka aniini ea ginealangeasu?’
Ak gayghoahimneegwa ghooriini haw ghayi sideeksa uhuumba nuut, nea sisin muuchchi ak goosissi jeani.”
Gaweay Ginealanga ea gaweay jeeda mujiini. Hitta ghwadaakta ng'asheega sean gidagwachchi rukutteayda Yeesu. Hean gwasin hamitta ghwelmeeda Basakka.
Huuw shing'ada ghwahidu Yeesu nea godeana ginealangaaschi attamaniyyeenya.
Iiduw nea geyeagiischi gwayeeshsha Yeesu, “Aba huumwa ghamneawa geayeeshshineegwa jeedeang'wa gwanda siida eambuchcheewi jea ghwalaabwan bwadaw.”
Ghang'ut giseaneega Ginealanga ak gaba nii anyaash Yeesu nea gwayeeshsha, “Ssiida aniini?”
Gwayeeshsha Yeesu saawa, “Siida gwanda jeedeang'wa agoogeani attamaniyyeenyean. Nukkwa ghamneawa ghang'utta mukkatte sea aniini aba jeeda buurda.
Asi Balleanda siida gaygawa hechchea gawa gawuurji ginnyaashta Ng'ooruutka Ghaydit. Nea ea dashageada siitta jea ghwala bwadaw Balleanda Siidean. Siisi ghayi ghang'wana ea meeji.”
Iiduw nea geyeagiischi ghwasng'u Yeesu mukkatte ak ghamwaash ghawooda. Hit gageanu gwalakkiisa ginealangaaschi nea gwayeeshsha, “Oang'ng'waanya ayaaga nii saseedeanyu gil.”
Ng'atta Gageanu bayookta ak gabadiischeesa Aseetta, ak goheaksa saawa ak ghwaleayda sean.
Gwayeeshsha Yeesu, “Suuh foojeandeanyu neajeeda ghayi sihhiida appadahuukka fuga saang'a gil.
Aba huumwa, Mayguttali difaayeani was mideega haghweega musabiibuun, ea eaghus galannya dawa dali gea eashish aba jeeda Gheambalmeeda Aseetta.”
Hean Gwasarman amahit gwaritta, ak gwascheeng'sa Gijeeda Masaytunajeega.
Gwayeeshsha Yeesu ginealangaaschi, “Agooga gajamwachmwajaan ak ghoanung'wanaan heeda aba gideaba gwayi Ng'ooruutka Ghaydit,
‘Gaydabwar jeagiischochcheanda ak gayghwadarda gisilga.’
Nea iiduw iyeaduudu gaydeasheedeawaneegwa dawa Galilaaya.”
Ghwalamda Betro ak gwayeeshsha, “Eara ghamwachmwachnyi fiisu seaniin, ak gwanung'useey heeda aniini mayghanyi danung'waneey heeda.”
Ghwalamda Yeesu ak gwayeeshsha, “Aba huumwa geayeeshshineey, aweani bea ghamneawean heeda mii goguula nghaghooda niba iyyeenya, gajeaniheawanaan niba samwagu.”
Gabiikta Betro gwayeeshsha nea goomajeek, “Adiiduw aniini maydaheawaneey, goobal emeewuudayeena, maydanung'useey heeda.” Ghwanyaashtunu eara ginealanga suurja.
Geweay ea eahitta hiji suguura Getsemaani.
Gaguursa Betro ea Yakkobo ea Yohaana ak godeayi. Ghang'ut giseaneega nea ghawishaan uhuuda.
Hean Gwayeeshsha saawa, “Ghwariikghta gwanuus guroroodeanyu giseaneega. Oppiidana hiji nea adoolilli, oang'ng'wearni.”
Ghwaloat geash gili miigeaw ak gwajaksa geaw ng'eanyi, ak ghamwaash gideaba, nung' danaawa gheadi bea sawanadeedean.
Ghamwaash Aseetta nea gwayeeshsha, “Ea Bwaabwa, Bwaabwa, ang'iing'i manda gida miimmuusi. Aniyean gischoarjaan bayookcheanji bea sawanadedean. Nea adaghoaw humeandeanyu, nung' ghoaw daang'u.”
Iiduw nea Gabiikta hoowa ghwahitta nea ginealangiga assamwaguun ea nilil. Ghoanyaash Betro, “Ea Simon, Annilli? Mimmuussi ang'wearni eara gheadi nuwaasi?”
Ng'atta gwayeeshsha ginealangaaschi, “Oang'ng'wearni nea ghoamwaashchi Aseetta ea mesmeegwa. Gurorooda gagasa amaduw saseeda ea manduurda.”
Gabiikta gichcha ak ghamwaash Aseetta nea gwarukuta ng'asheega ghwanyawa rukkwiida.
Iiduw Gabiikta gichcha hoowa bea ginealangaaschiin ak ghwahitta nea nilil. Eara gheanyanga nyaawa mudughoammu ghwajaat aba ruweanga ak amwanala eara gichchea gwarukutta.
Iiduw Gabiigu heannyaawa deaba samwagu ak gwayeeshsha, “Akkudandana jeeda ruweanga nea gofuufchi? Anung'waada gwadeenu! Nugul damanda! Nukkwa Balleanda Siida gajeayiin geattinga fuga ring'eega.
Asi ang'eatng'eada eebu. Oang'ng'wearda siitta jea ghwalabwan bwadawiin nineekkiit.”

Damanda duu gabaloola Yeesu, ghwahidu Yuuda nea gaba jeedeaba ginealangiga attamaniyyeenyean, ghwahidu nea goodeana emeettuw mideawa bwangajeega ea gulupkeakka. Fiisu abeeda gojeagu ashoohoodiga hees, ea ginealshoodiga diineeda Yahuudi ea gweargwa.
Abeeda Yuudayda jea ghwala bwadaw Yeesu nirukusa emeeda gichchea goroorda. “Siida jea dasam gheatta abeeda niny gil ak ghoang'ng'waanyi nea goofurji.”
Hidu Yuuda ghang'atta ama hitta heeda Yeesu gwayeeshsha, “Ea Ginealshochcheanda!” Nea ghwasam gheatta.
Hean daa Emeeda ghang'eatng'eat ak ghoang'ng'waay Yeesu.
Aba jeeda fuga ghwanyawa minaada sea Yeesu gafagu Sih bwaanga ak ghwalas soomjeanda ashoohoochcheanda haw ak gwalaksa ng'eanyi iitta.
Hean gwayeeshsha Yeesu fugiga, “Ghamneawa goyeadu bwangajeega ea gulupkeakka aba ging'ng'ooydeanyu neada ghoanung' dawuurji mareanghweanda?
Easuju nea geanealayi buuneeda aba jeeda Gheeda Sibatta Aseetta, anda mong'ng'onnyean. Ak gwasa ng'asheesu ghoaw gidanyaashta Ng'ooruutka Ghaydit.”
Gamng'aw Ginealangaaschi sean ak gwasalda gwanung'usa heeda.
Abeeda gweattu geeshta Yeesu Balleanji mwanang' nea gookwa hang'da. Hean geegasa eang'ng'waay.
Iiduw ghamwanmwanda Balleanda ak gwanung'usa heeda hang'daannyi ak ghafwach nea dawiish.
Geayaat Yeesu ea eayaat gheeda Ashoohoochcheanda Haw. Ghwahitta nea nibattiisa geat hoowa ashoohoodi suuk hees sea gweargwa sea ginealshoodiga Diineeda Yahuudi.
Abeeda Betro gamaseaw Yeesu nea sheagi, gawa jeedeaba gheedida bea ashoohoochcheandida hawiin, gopteada ak ghoabwaal beasta sea furiischoodiga.
Iiduw gagasa ashoohoodiga hees sea gweargwa girgweageeda siida jea gamuuwwu gidinyeanda Yeesu, ak abeeda gwanuus ak aamwanyasa.
Abeeda gwanda Fuga saang'a muuwwu ng'asheega ng'uyyeega appadayda Yeesu. Amaduw ng'asheega nyaawa ea mudu gaweechchi.
Gwanda Fuga suuk minaada ak gamuuwwu ng'uyyeega aba badayda Yeesu nea gwayeeshsha,
“Ghayi Siyiinyi siisi nea gwayeena, ‘Gaydanyarja Gheawi Sibatta Aseetta ghayi sideasa geattingean, ak aba jeemba eawooji samwagu gaydadeas nuut dea meesnana geattinga buuneeda.’”
Iiduw eara ng'asheega Nyaawa muuwwu ea meatteayyi.
Ghang'eat ashoohoochcheanda haw aba madeeda buuneeda ak ghoanyaash Yeesu, “Mwayshaaha ng'ashaani? Fiisu gwarukuna naaha bwadaydaang'u?”
Ghwasiinda Yeesu marukuta eara ng'ashaanjagi. Gabiikta asohohoochcheandida ghoanyaash Yeesu nea gwayeeshsha, “Heappi ang'iing'i guwosi Gristoyda was Balleanda Aseetta Ghambidaadi?”
Gwayeeshsha Yeesu, “Ea ada geawoschi. Ghabwada nii gajadaaha Balleanji bea Siidean nea gobideada aba meatkweeda geattinda dugwa bea Aseetta hoauur, nea godeana shamoghuutka humng'eeda.”
Ng'atta ghabwashaada ashoohoochcheanda haw hang'waakkaaschi ak gwayi, “Gudeegassa mushoodispa naaha?
Noayiinyi gidang'eawwiida Aseetta! Goyeennyiin agooga?” Gwayi sean siisi gagasa enuus.
Gwanda Fuga mwaatkwa ang'urriisa ng'usheega, geedukutta gheanyanga ak geabwar madeang'akka nea geyeeshsha, “Heappi rukuni siida lasnyi!” Eara Fuga gadiyeeda ghabwar madeang'akka.
Damani duu gwandeawa Betro seammodean, ghwahidu Hudi gadiydooschchi aba gheeda ashoohoochcheanda haw.
Iiduw nea ghwadaa Betro nea gwaju beasta, gong'weersa ak gwayeeshsha, “Eara ang'iing'i gindeaydooscheewi Yeesuyda Nasareetti.”
Ghwashaang' Betro nea gwayeeshsha, “Mwaanali, anda eara gidurgu mwaanali!” Ng'atta ghang'eat Betro ak gawa ea gawa hoowa bea dooshtean. Miighoaw gil ea niguul nghaghooda.
Ghwadaah Hudideani Betro gichcha ak gwayeeshsha fiisu ghwanyawa minaada, “Eara siisi gaba jeeda fuga easuju adeaydooschi Yeesu.”
Iiy Betro gabiikta ghwashaang' gichcha. Miighoaw gil geyeeshsha Betro aba girrukusa Fiisu ghwanyawa minaada, “Aba huumwa eara ang'iing'i gibeahi jeedeaba fugiga aba gideaba guwosi siida Galilaaya.”
Ghamwaashta geaw Betro nea ghwaak habeawooda nea gwayeeshsha, “Aniini siisi orukku iittannyiin mwaanali.”

Miighoaw gil gabiikta goguul nghaghooda deaba iyyeenya. Hean gabiissa ghoapkaat Betro gidaheetta rukusa Yeesu bea gideaba, “Heeda miigabiikta nghaghooda giguleandeaba iyyeenya gajaniheawanaan niba samwagu.” Hean gabiissa Betro goorareang'u dabeakka goyyeawda.
Iimuchchu nea gudughaghar gayeew gabalool Ashohoodiga hees sea gweargwa, ea ginealshoodiga diineeda Yahuudi ea girgweageeda sean, ak ghwarat Yeesu aba biingu, ak ghwaat ea ghwayiin geattinga Bilatto.
Ghoanyaash Bilatto Yeesu nea gwayeeshsha, “Assang'iing'i guwosi sugoochcheanda Yahuudi?” Ghwalamda Yeesu ak gwayeeshsha Bilatto, “Girgu ang'iing'i.”
Ghoahaktaawa ashoohoodiga hees Yeesu ng'asheega duguuga saang'a.
Gabiikta Bilatto ghoanyaash Yeesu nea gwayeeshsha, “Anda ang'iing'i mirukuni gil? Iinya ng'asheega surukuna badaydaang'u gitteenna.”
Amwaasha Yeesu ng'ashaan ea ghwanung' ghahamng'eanyi Bilatto.
Abeeda iissa iinyoo ghwahitta damanda ghwelmeeda Basakka inyeessa Bilatto gwasiksa siyagi aba fuga mida ghealooniga gasa buuneeda.
Abeeda damandida gwanda ghealooniga siisi suguura Baraba nea geeraduudayi fii suuk ghayi nuseada buuneeda nea ghwanung' ghaghoakghoayda emeeda.
Ghaghoayda Emeeda gaweay heeda Bilatto ama sihitta geyeeshsha, Aniyean sinneasa gidagweannyekka sean.
Ghoanyaashta Bilatto nea gwayeeshsha saawa, “Heappi googasayi deattinneegwa sugoochcheanda Yahuudi?”
Abeeda niny ghwanyaashtunu aba gideaba ashoohoodiga hees ghoahaktaawa Yeesu sichcheeda.
Nea ashoohoodiga hees saawa ghoang'waalng'waal buuneeda nea gagasa gideaba gaygamus buuneeda gwasiksa Baraba.
Hean ghoanyaash Bilatto buuneeda gichcha nea gwayeeshsha, “Googasayi dahinndaan siisi oguuri sugoochcheanda Yahuudiin?”
Gabiikta Buuneessean gojuur nea gwayeeshsha, “Angoorsiina uhuuda behiida.”
Gwayeeshsha Bilatto aba girrukusa buuneeda, “Nea gidinyeandeaba siisi ea naaha gil?” Gabiikta Buuneeda gojuur muuchchi nea gwayeeshsha, “Angoorsiina uhuuda behiida!”
Hean Bilatto aba gassooda gasa ghoammiidu gheanyanga emeeda, gageanu ak gwasiksa Baraba. Hit ghwanung' egeanu mughowooda ak geabwar Yeesu amahit geayaat enngoorsa uhuuda behiida.
Ghwaat Shirikkareedida Yeesu ea eahhiitta heeda suguura Braytoriyo was seammooda gheeda sugoochcheanda. Hean ghapka eara Shirikkara suurja ak gabassa geat hoowa.
Gegeanu ak gekkwealsa Yeesu hang'da oomu. Gegeanu ng'oroorga eanaaw ak geayiin uhuuda eanung' ghoaw shiipka uhuudaannyi.
Hean Geguursa nea geyeeshsha, “Seayuu sugoochcheanda Yahuudi!”
Gealas uhuuda Yeesu aba digheechcheanda nea gong'urriisa ng'usheaga. Geetkuy aba madeadaannyi ehinda gili siittaw mureeda.
Ng'atta jukkooda gegeanda hang'da ghwanyawa oomu sikkwealsa ak gekkuumsa hang'weakkiga ikkaschiin. Ng'atta Geayaat engoorsa uhuuda behiida.

Geweay aba naweeda ea eroonnyi siisi suguura Simoneeda ng'eanyiida Girene. Niny ghweanda geaba Aleksanda bea geaba Rafo gil, nea aba damani gwaleabu madamnyeanda. Gediing'sa aba uurda ghwasar behiida Yeesu.
Geayaat Yeesu ea eahhiitta hiji suguura Golgootta nea ghwanyawa isiyam ghuut gajeguura, “Deageapkeeda uhuuda.”
Gegeanu difaayi ak geng'ng'olng'olsiinnyi sea manemane. Geattaw nea geyeeshsha leaha. ak ghaheawa ghwali.
Ng'atta hean Gengoorsa uhuuda behiida, ama hit gegeanu hang'waakkaaschi ak geelaja, nea geng'alealleesa hang'daannyi eadaa siida jea gageanda.
Gengoorsa uhuuda behiida nea gaba aseetta samwagu.
Nea gissihaktaawa geang'waar gideaba, “Nii sugoochcheanda Yahuudi.”
Gengoorsa iheenga beehajeega eara fii iyyeenya abeeda was mareannghooga. Dea meanung' ghwalaabwa Yeesu meatkweeda geattinda dugwa niirja ghwalaabwa meatkweeda geattinda ghadaam. [
“Ak gwasa gidaghayi nyaah Ng'ooruutka Ghaydit nea gwayi, ‘Sinung' gwandeayi sea fuga munyas.’”]
Nea abeeda Fuga ng'atta aba naweeda gong'eawi nea godiindiil iheenga nea geyeeshsha, “Asi! Siida jea gwanyarja gheeda Sibatta Aseetta ak ghwadeas aba jeeda eawoojiga assamwagu!
Asi ayyaawa geaw! Hing'aanana uhuuda behiida.”
Eara ashohoodiga hees sea ginealshoodiga diineeda Yahuudi gwajuuga nea gwayi, “Ghoaghu buuneeda, ak ghwaraay ghoaghu geaw!
Asi geeyi nii Gristoyda was sugoochcheanda Israeeli! Asi dahing'aana aba uhuuda behiida eadaaha ak geamwaschi.” Eara fukwachchi singoruudayi ninyiin earaga gong'eawi.
Hean iiduw nea ghabwarbwara aseetta gwaduk ng'anyiissean misaneeda ea gaba aseetta shageash.
Gul aseetteaba shageash ghwanya ghuutta Yeesu nea gojuur nea gwayi, “Elooyi, Elooyi, laama sabatkaani?” Nea gideaba, “Ea Aseetteanyu, Ea Aseetteanyu, andang'iing'i ninung'usean heeda?”
Fiisu ghwanyawa neekki iyiiy ghuutta Yeesu gwayi, “Ayiinya! Gaguursa Eliya.”

Ghafwach Sih ak gageanu gili was ghabuschcheanda ak ghang'uda jeeda beega ng'weani bea haghweega geetta. Ghoahaaktaawa digheechcheanda ak ghoadaw Yeesu ghamit nea gwayeeshsha buuneeda, “Ommeasa eadaaha Eliya eajea ghwahidu ghoang'aamwa uhuuda behiida.”
Ghwanya ghuutta Yeesu nea gagis daghatta muuchchi ak ghoabitta.
Hean ghabwaasha bugusta hang'dida subwaasha jeeda Gheeda Sibatta Aseettean, ak ghoaw iyyeenya ghang'eada uhuuda ea gagul ng'eanyi.
Abeeda Shirikkarajeanda haw ghwanyawa ghaminaada aba hiji gang'uleadayyi Yeesu. Daa gidabittaayda siida gwayi, “Siisi aba huumwa ghayi Balleanda Aseetta gil!”
Gwanda eara Gadeemsu abeeda ang'weerru nea sheagi. Jeedeaba gadeemsu gaba geaba Mariyaayda suguura Magadaleena, ea Saloome, ea Mariyaayda was gheamatta geaba Yakkoboyda mwanang' ea Yose.
Gadeemsu ghayi gabay godeaydooschi Yeesu damanda mideewa Galilaaya nea gagadiyeesa. Abeeda gwanda eara gadeem suuk saang'a adeana Yeesu Yerusaleemu.
Damanda huweewa shing'ada bea eaweettida, nii abeeda eaweeda sitting'ding'deawa gil nea imuchchu ea eaweetta Sabattohi.

Ghang'eat nisiih Yoseefu was siida ng'eanyiida Arimattayu. Niny abeeda gaba gweargwa girgweageeda nea geawwal gheang'da muuchchi. Easuju eara niny goolla gafurriida Gheambalmeeda Aseetta. Siisi ghang'eat ak ghabwadakta ak gawa heeda Bilatto ghang'al musta Yeesu.
Ghahamng'eanyi Bilatto iyiiy gideaba Yeesu nigeawiit ghami. Gaguursa shirikkarajeanda haw ak ghoanyaash Yeesu ea nigeawiit ghami.
Iiduw nea ghwanyas Bilatto iitta aba heeda shirikkerajeanda gideaba Yeesu nigeawiit ghami, gwayeeshsha Yoseefu aada musta Yeesu.

Gawa Yoseefu ak ghwasha hang'deesh, hit gawa ama hitta goorareang'u musta. Gokkwealsa hang'dida eeshiin akghwaat ea ghwayiin jeemba bung'eeni ghayi sighurghur nihit mida jeemba laghaana. Hean gooreakreaksa lagheaneeda haw ghuutta shoomanda.
Abeeda Mariyaaydida suguura Magadaleena sea Mariyaaydida was gheamatta Yosehiin abeeda saawa ghwadahaada heeda siyiin musta Yeesu.
Ng'atta ghwelmeeda Sabatto ghang'eat geaba Mariyaayda suguura Magadaleena ea Saloome ea Mariyaayda was gheamatta Yakkobo gaweay ghwasha nagheeda ng'andit jea ghwayeasha musta Yeesu.
Hean imuchchu nea gudugorearu aseetta eaweeda jumwappiili gaweay Gadeemsu ea ghwahitta heeda bung'eeda.
Gaweay nea gabaloleada aba naweeda nea gwayeeshsha geat, “Ghamneawa gayghoarakghrakghtaang'a lagheaneetta haw bea ghuutta shoomanda bung'eedean?”
Ghoang'wearda ak ghwadaa lagheaneedida nea sigeanda, (Nea mii laghaana gil gidahaw muuchchi.)
Duugwasik ghuutta shoomanda bung'eeda ghwadaa Ghearemaneeni akkwa hang'deesh nea goopteada aba meatkweeda geattinda dugwa, Ghahamng'eanyi muuchchi.

Hean gwayeeshsha Ghearemaneeni gadeemgiga, “Ada ghahameegwa ng'eanyi. Ghanalli beadi ogaseadayyi Yeesuuyda Nasareetti, singoorsa uhuuda behiida. Siisi nuduudu eara hiji mudugwanda. Ang'ulla heeda siyiin.
Asi agooga aweayeena oattawa iidi ginealangiga ikkaschiin ea Betro gideaba nisheedeawaneegwa gawa Galilaaya. Iyoahitti hoowa gajadaakta gidaghayi rukutteayda.”
Ng'atta Ghabeawa hoowa bea bung'edean nea gwasalda, aba gideaba nubwaadan ak ea nung'ut muuwda nea ghahamng'eanyi. Eamudu gwarukusa sih ng'ashaan aba gideaba nibeal muuchchi.
Ng'atta dunnooda Yeesu nea beashatta eaweetta jumapiili gil gohiimsa geaw Mariyaayda suguura Magadaleena, was gatmooda ghayi arutteawa Yeesu saseeda meangeeniga assispwa.
Gawa Mariyaayda Magadaleena, ak gawa gwarukusa fuga easuju mideaydooschi Yeesu, nea abeeda aba damandida Fukka goyyeawda nea gaguttu heareega.
Iiduw nea Ghwayiiy gideaba Yeesu ea majeek ea gideaba nidaah Mariyaayda Magadaleena ea meamwasa.
Hean imuchchu gohiimsa geaw Yeesu ginealan iyyeenya nea niyamwa deakta. Abeeda Ginealang'su gaweay madamnyeanda.
Eara Saawa gaweay ak gwarukusa suurja. Earappeadi surukusean ghanyea mwamwasa.

Iiduw aba huydeanda gohiimsa geaw Yeesu ginealan damwanagi hitta Yeesu nea gweagiischi. Gowoowsa Yeesu saawa muuchchi aba hang'ooynachcheekka iheenga nyaawa, ea gideaba mwamwasa ng'asheegiga bea fugeadu iitta dunnoadannyyin.
Hean gabiissa Gwayeeshsha, “Aweayeena ng'eanyiissean ak gorukkwiidi Giijasta Miy aba heeda buneassean.
Nea siida mwas ak geppattiisan gayghaghu, nea siida mwamwasa gajergweaksa.
Ak abeeda eara gwadeagooda gaygodeaydooschi Fukka mideawa masawegean, aba gheawungeasu gaygoruutta meangeeniga ak gaygabaloola iit nuut.
Nea eara ghoang'ng'waany ichchipkeega ghana eara eabiiw siida gichchea ghabwar, ea manda gili jea gwahissa. Nea inyeessa Gayghoang'ng'waay iheenga fuga miyeani ak gaheaba.”
Iiduw Ng'uttamiida was Yeesu gobalool saawa amahit, geanung' gawa humng'eeda gobiida meatkweeda geattinda dugwa bea Aseetta.
Hean gaweay Ginealanga ng'eanyiissean nea gwarukkwiida Giijasta Miy. Gwasin Ng'uttamiida gadiyeeda sea saawa ak gomajeek Giijasi aba gwadeagooda adeaydooschi saawa.]
Aba gideaba ng'asheesu ning'waar Fuga saang'a nea gooroottooschi, aba iitta ng'asheega ghayi sisin aba dageascheedeanya,
gawuurji gidaghayi goondaneasa mushoodiga daa ea aba heeda fuga rukkwiida ng'asheenda,
Ak ea nadaayi eara Aniini gideaba ghwahit, ak ea neasikteawi muuchchi gidaghayi ng'eatta ng'asheesu seaniin aba beanatta, ak geang'orneey ng'asheesu nea ghadoabiiwji Diofilooyda mureeda,
abeeda gay nala humeanda appadayda ng'asheega ghayi sibean surukneeyi.

Damanda waseewa Heroode sugoochcheada Yudeeya, abeeda gwanda ashoohoochcheanji suguura Sakkariya, bea gharmuchcheanda Abiya, nea gwandeawa gatmoadaannyi bea haweega Aron, nea gheawungaaschi geguura Elisabeetti.
Nea abeeda saawa ea doobiweadi aba madeeda Aseetta, nea ghoang'ng'waay muuchchi digheanynyeekka sean ea humeannyeekka Ng'uttamiida nea meerukunana badahuukka ng'asheega munyas.
Abeeda ea mandeawana jeepta aba gideaba Elisabeetti sonnooda nea nuwoosiidi sean.
Nea aba damanda sineewa gadiyeeda ashoohoochcheandumeeda aba madeeda Aseetta nea abeeda ea galannyeanda sineewa gadiyeeda lugoodaannyi,
aba seareetta bea gissiniida ashoohoodiga gadiyeedean, inyessa ghwaloat Aseetta siida gawa jeeda gheeda sibatta Aseetta bea Ng'uttamiida ghaghwarda geetta sing'ng'andiitta.
Nea aba damani sing'ng'andiida gheedean abeeda gwanda Emeessean daghatta gheeda ghamwaash Aseetta.
Hean goobeersa Malaykajeanda Ng'utamiida ak ghaminada aba murdeeda geattinda dugwa bea heeda wagiida siyiina geetta sing'ng'andiitta.
Daa Sakkariya gwahirbaban nea ghabeal.
Ak gwayeeshsha Malaykajeanda, “Adibeal, Sakkariya, aba gideaba siyiiy gidumwaashi, nea eara Elisabeetteeda was gatmoadaang'u gaygwajiilneey balleanda, ak gaygureewana ghawungaaschi Yohaana.
Ak gay hoosana nea ging'weelayi muuchchi,
nea eara fuga saang'a gaygahoosassa jeattaannyi;
aba gideaba gaygwaheedu aba madeeda Ng'uttamiida,
Mayghwali difaayi ghana gichchea gooboogit,
ak gajeannyiit Gurorooda Ghaydit, ghang'eada jeeda ghaamwat.
Ak gaygooguumsa balloojiga saang'a bea Israeeli Ng'uttamiida was Aseetta nyaawa,
ak Gaygosheedeawa aba jeeda gurorooda ea uurda Eliya,
ak ghwayam guroruunatka ghweaniga gagal diibiga,
nea fuga mandeawana mureeda ghoadaw weaghumeeda doobiiwnatta,
ak gwasissa Ng'uttamiida fuga hideadi.”
Ak gwayeeshsha Sakkariya malaykajeanda, “Gaydajeeng'daydaan ng'asheanji? Aba gideaba aniini nawaasiichchi nea eara gatmoodeanyu ea nuwaasiit.”
Ghwasha Malaykajeanda nea gwayeeshsha, “Aniini geawoschi Gabrieleeda minaada aba madeeda Aseetta, ak gechcheakneani headaang'u deanneay Giijasi miyiin.
Asi ng'ulla, gayghwaroat ghuuttaang'u ea eamudammuussa baloola ea ghwahita eaweeda jea ghang'attaawa ng'asheesu, aba gideaba mumwasi ng'asheegeasu jea gwasa aba damanda nyaawa.”
Nea gafurriida buuneeda Sakkaria, ghahamng'eanyi sean aba gideaba nishiing'da aba jeeda gheeda sibatta Aseetta.
Hean nea gwardu jarooda, ghwaraay goobalool buuneeda, ak gwajeeng'u buuneeda gideaba sihhiimsa gil aba jeeda gheeda sibatta Aseetta; goobaloola geattinga nea niroat ghuutta.
Duulean galandaannyi bea gadiyeada, gawa gheannyi.
Ng'atta eawoojusu ng'ay ghwadurmaniit gatmoadaannyi suguura Elisabeetti, ak ghafuy geaw sheamuut nea gwayi,
“Nii gissinnean Ng'uttamiida aba eaweeda ng'ulleewanean ak gageandeawean rearga aba jeeda buuneeda.”
Sheedeaba lah goojeakta Aseetta malaykajeanda suguura Gabrieli gawa mujiineeda Nasareetti mida ng'eanyiida Galilaaya,
hichpa hudi miyeasat suguura Mariya, anyeari siisi suguura Yoseefu bea dooshagi sea sugoochcheanda sugura Dawdi.
Ghwahidu headaannyi ak gwayeeshsha, “Seayuu ang'iing'eeda siittaw dagheerjeandumeeda ang'iing'i gindeayi sea Ng'uttamiida!”
Hean gwadeawiit muuchchi aba ng'asheanji ak goottemsheesa seayoani giduurji.
Gwayeeshsha Malaykajeanda, “Adibeali Mariya, aba gideaba nugoonnyi Aseetta dagheerjeandumeeda.
Asi ngulla, gaygweayiida ak Gayjiila balleanda, ak gayguureewana gheawungaaschi Yeesu.
Nea gajeahaw, ak gajeeguura Balleanda Aseetta haw mida humng'eeda;
nea gayghoadaw Ng'uttamiida was Aseetta hoorgeeda sugoochcheandumeeda Dawdi was ghwaan,
nea gayghoahaaghwa gheeh Yakkobo ea ghoaw gweanyeekka manda muudeanooda;
nea sugoochcheandumeedaannyi ea maygwanda muudeanooda.”
Gwayeeshsha Mariya malaykajeanda, “Gayghoawattaan ng'asheanji nea aniini ea meandeawani siyeeda?”
Gwayeeshsha Malaykajeanda,
“Gaygwashubeseey Gurorooda Ghaydit,
nea uurda Aseetta haw gaygookwealseey jirooneeda;
aba sareani jeepta jea eeji gajeeguura siida ghaydit,
Balleanda Aseetta.
Asi ng'ulla, buweachcheandaang'u was Elisabetti eara niny nigweayiit aba jeeda woosindaannyi ak gaygwaji balleanda; nea nii ea sheedeaba lahi; nea niny abeeda geeguura sonooda.
Aba gideaba manda ng'asheanda jea ghwaraay Aseetta.”
Gwayeeshsha Mariya, “Ng'ulla, anini geawoschi soomjeanda Ng'uttamiida, nung' gwasa aba heeeanyu ng'asheanji inyashiin.” Ak ghabeawa headaannyi Malaykajeanda.
Askwearjoojikka ghang'eat Mariya ak ghwalamwajaada gawa ng'eanyiida heayeeniiga jeeda mujiineeda Yuuda.
Ak Gawa jeeda gheeh Sakkariya ak googeachchi Elisabeetti;
Iiy Elisabeetti giigeachcheeda Mariya, ghwadanghan jeepta miida jeadaannyi ak geannyiit Elisabeetti Gurorooda Ghaydiit
goojuur aba ghuutta haw nea gwayi, “Sugoonnyi ghawooda aba jeeda gadeemga, ak ea sittaw ghawooda dea jea jiila!
