Gayghoawdaani aba heedeanyu, gideaba ghwahidu heedeanyu gheamatta Ng'uttamiideanyu?
Aba gideaba ng'ulla, iyayiinyi ghuutta seayoadaang'u ghwadanghan jeepta mida jeedeanyu aba ng'weellooda.
Ghang'wana siida jea ghamwas gideaba gay gwasa ng'asheega rukusa Ng'uttamiida.”
Gwayi Mariya,
“Jeedeanyu ghoaghambiit Ng'uttamiida,
Nea guroroodeanyu gahoosasa Aseetta was lealnochcheandeanyu
Aba gideaba nidaah nyootta uurda soomjeandaannyi.
Asi ng'ulla, ghang'eada ghamneawa gaygaguureewean jeachcheenga sean dea sing'ushsha;
Ak ea nisinneani siida sittaw ghawooda hoauur ng'asheega hees muuchchi,
ak gheawungaschi ea ghaydiit.
Nea baydeaydaannyi gwanda heeda buuneessean awal gheang'daannyi
ghang'eada jeachcheenga ea gagul jeachcheenga.
Ak ea nihiimu uurda aba geattindaanyi,
nea ghoadabwarda fuga ghwarjajeega aba jeesinga nyaawa,
Ak ea nirareang'na fuga mideawa uurjeenga hoorgajeega nyaawa bea sugoochcheandumeeda,
ak goodiing'u fukka mandeawana uurjeengean;
Ninnyiit fuga bearji jalooda aba haleanjeeda miyaas,
nea meanang'oodiga gaweay nea ghwadalaada.
Ak anuweat soomjeandaannyi was Israeeli,
aba giipkeatta baydeaydaannyi,
gawuurji gidaghayi rukusiinda ghwaanigaasa,
ea Abrahaamu ea jaattaannyi aba gweannyeekka manda muudeanooda.”
Gwandeayi niny sea Mariya ea goosha sheah samwagu, imuchchu gabiiktta gheannyaawa.
Iiduw nea ghwahitta damandaannyi bea jeatta gwaji Elisabeetti jeepta was balleanda.
Iiy gischeawdaannyi ea buweadeagaaschi gideaba nubwayda Ng'uttamiida Elisabeetti gang'weela sean.
Eaweetteaba siis geayaat jeepta ghasmeahooda; ak ghwanyawa gajeeng'assa gheawunga ghwaan siyi Sakkariya,
ak gwayeeshsha ghamwat, “Manda; gajeeguura Yohaana.”
Ak geeyeeshsha, “Aba buweadeagaagu manda siida sing'assa gheawung'su.”
Iiduw geeng'wachsa geadi ghwaan gwargu gheawunga gasa gang'assa.
Gamus eeyeasa beehiida jea ghang'waar, ak ghang'waar gideaba, “Gheawungaaschi Yohaana.” Ghahamng'eanyi sean.
Deagheatta ghwajaat ghuutta nea goottina ng'ushapta ak gabadiischeesa Aseetta.
Hean ghang'ut muuwda gischeewda nyaawa sean. Ak gageawiit iitteaba ng'asheesu aba heayeeniga sean mida ng'eanyiida Yudeeya;
Fuga sean iiy iitteaba ng'asheesu gaba nii ang'ng'ooysa jeadaannyi nea gwayi, “Jeebi gayghoaw siida uurjiin?” Aba gideaba geattinda Ng'uttamiida gwanda badaydaannyi.
Nea Sakkariyaayda was ghweanda jeepta geannyiit Gurorooda Ghaydit ak ghwaramoaran nea gwayeena,
“Dumsheesiinda gaba Ng'uttamiida was Aseetta Israeeli,
aba gideaba nibareassa ak gwalealu buneadaannyi,
nimiinda gujaweeda lealnooda
aba jeeda gheeda soomjeandaannyi was Dawdi,
Gawuurji gidaghayi rukuteayda aba ghuutta sibangaaschi ghaydidi ghang'eada garayi,
ak gajeelealnaneasa heeda weajoodigaasa,
ea geattinga fuga sean sideasa;
ak gayghabwayda ghwanigaasa aba gidaheelleesa,
nea ghoapkaat neajeadaannyi ghaydit,
ak gweaksa habeawooda Abrahamooda was ghweandeanya,
ak gagooneasa
gideaba gajeelealnaneasa geattinga weajoodigaasa,
ak geaghadoawannyi nea meawwali gil,
aba ghaydidanda ea doobiiwnatta galeagasean amwadeadaannyi aba jeeda eaweegaasa sean.
Nea ang'iing'i jeepta, gajegureweey sibaneeda Aseetta haw;
aba gideaba gajasheedeawana Ng'uttamiida sissiina naweadingaaschi,
Nea gwarukusa fugaaschi ghwanal fughareeda lealnooda
aba samsiinda aba geandeayda riing'eega nyaawa,
Aba baydeayda Aseetteanya,
nirearseasa weeshinda leabu humng'eeda,
ak gayghoabwaay fuga sean mida jeeda misaneeda haw bea jirooneeda miyeeda,
ak ghoadoabiiw geashangaasa eayaada naweeda miy bea hoyyoo.”
Ak gwahissa heeda jeepta nea ghwanyas uurda aba gurorooda, nea goobiitta dareapcheenda ea ghwahitta eaweedaannyi jea goohimsina geaw fuga Israeeli.
Askwearjoojikka ghoadayda Gaysaari Aguusto digheanda nea gwayeeshsha, ang'waara monneeda buneassean mida jeeda ng'eanyiida.
Ng'oordi dea madeeda, nea gwanda sugoochcheandumeeda Sirya Gireeniyo.
Gaba siisi weah eang'waar aba mujiineeda ng'eang'da nyaawa.
Hean ghwascheang'da Yoseefu ghabeawa Galilaaya, nea ghabeawa mujiineeda Nasaretti, ak gawa Yudeeya, ea ghwahitta mujiineeda Dawdi, suguura Betleheemu, aba gideaba gaba dooshta Dawdi,
Gawa eang'waar sea Mariyaayda was huuda anyeari, nea abeeda ea gweayiideat.
Damanda mideewa hooweani ghwahitta damanda jea gwajiila.
Gwaji duweachcheadaannyi was balleanda ak gookkwealsa hang'weakka jeepcheandumeeda ak goluul aba jeeda daghwalda leehha dugwa beega, aba gideaba mwanyasa heeda jea gwalla aba ghoorida rabasta.
Nea aba damandida abeeda gwanda ng'eanyiitta Jeagiischoodiga fur gisilga nyaawa eawa.
Gabussa saawa Malaykajeanda Ng'uttamiida, ak ghoabwaay murdajeega nyaawa sean gigheambiitta Ng'uttamiida, ak ghang'ut muuwda.
Ak gwayeeshsha Malaykajeanda, “Adoobealli; ang'ulla geayeanneegwa giijasta miy bea hoseaneega jea gwahiissa buuneessean.
Aba gideaba eannean aba mujiineeda Dawdi siji appadahuukkeagwa, lealnoochcheanda, niny Gristoyda was Ng'uttamiida gil.
Nea gwadeagooda jea adaaha ea nihi; gajadaaha jeepta sikkwealsa hang'weakka jeepcheandumeeda nea geelluul aba jeeda daghwalda leehha dugwa beega.”
Deagheatta gwandeayi sea malaykajeanji lugooda saang'a bea humng'eeda ak gwaduumsheesa Aseetta nea gwayi,
“Gigheambiita gaba Aseetta mida humng'eeda,
ak aba ng'eanyiida ghoaw hoyyoo aba heeda fuga ahoosan!”
Iiduw nea nibiikta Malaykajeega humng'eeda, gwayeenniissa geat Jeagiischoodiga, “Asi eweaya Betleheemu eadaaha gidabunu, rukuneasa Ng'uttamiida.”
Gaweay nea ghwalamwajaada ak geanyasa Mariya ea Yoseefu heeda mida jeepta nea gwalil aba jeeda daghwalda leehha dugwa beega.
Daa gwarukuta gidagwachcheaya surgu aba badaydeaba jeebi;
ghahamng'eanyi fukka sean iyiiy gidaruksa jeagiischoodigean.
Nea Mariya gong'ng'ooysa jeadaannyi ng'asheesu seaniin, nea gottemsheesa geaw.
Iiduw gabiikta jeagiischoodiga nea ghoaghambiit nea gwaduumsheesa Aseetta aba ng'asheega siyiiy ea gea sidaah, gawuurji gissurukusiinda.
Ng'atta eawooji sis nea siyaat ghasmeahooda geeguura Yeesu, gheawunga ghayi ng'assa malaykajeanda nea mii ghwanyas ghaamwat gweayumeeda.
Iimuchchu nea ghwahitta damanda nyaawa bea gimmiinnooda gawuurji ginnyaashta deaweedeeda Muusa, hean geayaat niny Yerusaleemu ak geattaw Ng'uttamiida
(gawuurji gissung'waarda aba jeeda deaweedeeda Ng'uttamiida, “Gilinyoo ea balleanda was duweachcheeda gil gajeeguura siida ghaydiit bea Ng'uttamiida,)”
ak ghoadayda haleanjeeda sisapa geadi gawuurji gidanyaashta deaweedeeda Ng'uttamiida, “Was bakpakchooji iyyeenya ghana dayi iyyeenya bea ghariibajeanda.”

Nea abeeda gwanda Yerusaleemu, siisi suguura gheawungaaschi Simon, nea siisi abeeda ea doabiiwaat, nea gabada Aseetta, nea goomuukku hawdeayda fuga Israeeli, nea gwanda badaydaannyi Gurorooda Ghaydit.
Nea ea nigeawiit goohiimsa Gurorooda Ghaydit gideaba mayghami nea mighwadaah Gristoyda Ng'uttamiida.
Ak ghwaat Gurorooda Ghaydit gawa jeeda gheeda sibatta Aseetta; nea ghwaat ghwaan ea ghaamwat Yeesu jeeda gheeda nea geehinda giduurji ng'asheega deaweeda,
ghoang'ng'waay aba geattingaaschi ak gabadiischeesa Aseetta nea gwayi,
“Ng'uttamiida, biissiina siksiina soomjandaang'u gabiissa gawa nea ghwaat hooyyoo,
gawuurji ginnyah ng'asheandaang'u;
aba gideaba gheanyangeasu nidaa lealeanoodaang'u
ghayi isni nea ghwadaa buuneessean,
Weeshinda jea ghoabwaay emoojiga,
ak ghoaw gigheambiitta aba heeda fugaagu was Israeeli.”
Hean eara Ghwaan ea ghaamwat ghahamng'eanyi aba gissirgu appadaydaannyi;
Gang'ushsha Simon saawa nea gwayeeshsha Mariyaayda was ghaamwat,
“Ng'ulla, jeebi gajeenung ghoaw gibeedeayda ea ng'eedooda fuga saang'a bea Israeeli,
ak gayghoadaw gwadeagooda jea ghaheawa buuneeda
(nea jeadaang'u gayghwalach barda)
nea ng'asheega jeesinga fuga saang'a gajeattaajiit.”
Ghayi gwanda gatmooni was sibaneeda, suguura Ana, was hudeaba Fanuweeli, bea emeeni siyi Asheeri; ak ea nuwasiit muuchchi, ghayi geaghi nea miyeasat ak gwandeawa siyeeda gwaannyeaw ispwa,
goobida masinung'weandumeeda gweannyew seedam ea ang'waan. Nea mii gwaheelli gheeda sibatta Aseetta, nea gagadoowani nea gwarada jalooda nea gamoora Aseetta eawa ea askweari.
Gwardu aba damandida ak gabadiischeesa Aseetta, ak goobaloola niny ng'asheega sean bea fuga amuukku lealnooda Yerusaleemu.
Iiduw nea nihiit sinooda ng'asheega sean gawuurji ginnyaashta deaweedeeda Ng'uttamiida, gabiikta Galilaaya, mujiineeda gheannyawa was Nasareetti.
Gwahiissa heeda jeepta nea ghwanyas uurda, ak geannyiit weaghumeeda; nea gwandeawa dagheerjeandumeeda Aseetta.
Nea Ghwaan ea ghaamwat gabadiini gilakkweay Yerusaleemu aba damanda ghwelmeeda Basakka.
Iiduw nea nihiitta gweannyeew damana iyyeenya, ghwascheang'da gawuurji gideajusu bea geallaan;
duulean ghwelmeeda, damanda biikteawa, geeppuussa bwadaw balleanda was Yeesu aba Yerusaleemu nea ghwaan ea ghaamwat ea majeeng'na.
Gearar gideaba gwanda jeeda bareanda ak gaweay ea gamikta, geang'ng'eat ghuutta gassooda aba jeeda buweadeega ea fuga sinal;
ama duuw nea mudeanyas, Geebiikta Yerusaleemu nea geegaseadayyi.
Muchchu nea ning'atta eawooji samwagu geanyasa jeeda gheeda sibatta Aseetta, nea goopteada aba bugusta ginealshoodiga, nea gooleeysiit nea Gonyearriida ng'asheega;
nea fuga sean iiy ghahamng'eanyi isiidaa gidabwaraayda uhuuda ea gisheahiida ng'asheega sinnyaash.
Sidaah niny geahamng'eanyi; ak gwayeeshsha Ghaamwat, “Balleanda, ghwasaan anda gihinduneasa? Ng'ulla, aniini ea gweanu sinyarji aba gassodaang'u.”
Hean gwayeeshsha saawa, “Ghwasaan anda googaseadayean? Neada ea mwoonali gideaba gammisean giibinda jeeda ghooriida Bwaabwa?”
Nea saawa ea majeeng'na ng'asheanda rukusa.
Ghwararang'aada godeayi ea ghwahitta Nasareetti, nea gwasissa mureada; nea ghaamwat ghwayiin jeedaanyi ng'asheesu seaniin.
Gwahissa heeda Yeesu aba weaghumeeda ak gohoosan Aseetta ea buuneeda.

Aba gweaydeaba damana muut bea Diberio Gaisaari, nea abeeda Bondio Bilatto ea sugoochcheanda ng'eanyiida Yudeeya gil, nea Heroode abeeda ea sugoochcheanda ng'eanyiida Galilaaya, nea oorjeeda ghaamwat suguura Filippo ea sugoochcheanda Idureeya ea Dirakonit, nea Lasaniya, abeeda ea sugoochcheanda Abileeni,
Nea abeeda aba damanda waseewa Anaasi ea Gayafa ashoohoodiga heesi, ghwahidu ng'asheanda Aseetta heeda Yohaana balleanda Sakkariya aba dareapchcheeda;
Hean ghang'eat gawa ng'eanyiissean neaweesa Yordaan, nea gwarukkwiida gibattiisanda samsiinda ring'eega.
Gawuurji gidasung'waarda aba jeeda gittabooda ng'asheega sibaneeda suguura Isaaya gideaba,
“Ghwanya ghuutta siida nyearra dareapcheenda;
nea gwayeena asissina naweeda Ng'uttamiida,
olleappa naweadingaaschi.
Nea geeng'alsa ghalalayeekka sean,
ak geahiing'u giijeega ea heayeeniga,
nea heeda ghwana gajeattoabiiw
nea naweadinga gudung'nyoojiga gajeesin gamiyeasiidi;
Ak gilinyoo ea sihi gayghwadaah lealnooda Aseetta.”
Gwarukusa fuga saang'a buwa heedaannyi eppattiisan, ak gwayeeshsha, “Ea dayeega udang'usheega! Gwareekuseegwa ng'eaha ea amng'awa ea mwanyaseagwa nyarasta jea ghwahidu?
Asi ajiila haghweega miisa dukkuunooda, ak ea adooyeenniisi geat, ‘Geendeawi ghweandeanya nea Abrahaamu,’ Asi geayeeshshineegwa ghoammu Aseetta ghwayam lagheang'su ghoaw diibiga Abrahaamu.
Ak ghamneawa joommooda asiyiin gumsheakka geediga, ak geediga maji haghweega miyaas gajealach ak geejaksa jeeda beasta.”
Ghoanyaash emeeda nea gwayeeshsha, “Abeeda gajeesna naha?”
Ghwasha niny nea gwayeeshsha, “Siida mideawa hang'weak iyyeenya, dadawa hang'agi siida mandeawana, nea siida mideawa hamitta ea dasindunu.”
Ghapka eara fuga ang'ng'oonyi gwaadi eppattiisan, ak eara saawa gwayeeshsha, “Gajeesna naaha aseasa Ginealshoochcheanda?.”
Gwayeeshsha saawa, “Adoong'ng'oonyayi gwadeeda haweawa dea sirukuneegwa.”
Eara shirikkara ghoanyaash nea gwayeeshsha, “Ama aseasa gajeesna naaha?” Gwayeeshsha, “Adoareachchi siida gidaannyi aba urda ghana oahhaakta aba ng'uyyeega, akghusa mushahareedeang'wa.”
Damanda duu gwandeewa buuneeda jeeda furdeaydean, gonyeari geat buneassean aba jeesinga nyaawa aba iitta Yohaana, gideaba gwadeeppa ea Gristohi,

ghwasha Yohaana nea gwayeeshsha buuneessean “Aniini geabattiisananeegwa beega; nea siida jea ghwahidu gaburdeawean uurda, mammiisean geattineadi deanga geakkaaschi; nea niny gaygobattisananeegwa Gurorooda Ghaydit ea beasta.
Gida aleella booga gwanda geattindaannyi, ak gobuus heeda jea goleelsa, ak iiduw ghwayiin booga silleal jeeda gijigooda, nea looyda ghaghwarda aba jeeda beasta maygamis.”
Gwareekusa nea goobaloola buuneeda ng'asheega saang'a nea gwarukkwiida Giijaasta Miy.
Iiduw gowoowsa Heroodeeyda was sugoochcheanda, nea gowoowsiina gheenda Heroodiya, was gatmooda oorjeeda ghaamwat, ea badayda ng'asheega munyas saang'a sina Heroode,
ea mwaara gil gwasin dea muy nuut gwajaksa Yohaana ghealooniga.
Hit gibattiisanda buuneeda sean, ea dea Yeesu nea ghamwaash Aseetta ghajaada bugusta humng'eeda,
ak gwashubeesa uhuudaannyi Gurorooda Ghaydit wunnda ghariibajeanda ak ghwanya ghuutta nyaasha humng'eeda nea gwayeeshsha, “Ang'iing'i guwosi balleandeanyu abwariinyi gwadan jeedeanyu.”
Yeesu ghoang'eat ginealshoadannyi nea gaba gweannyeew diktam ea damanamughuush, nea abeeda (geaghay) gideaba niny balleanda Joseefeeda Eeli,
Eeli gaba Mattari, Mattari gaba Laawi, Laawi gaba Meelgi, Meelgi gaba Yanayi, Yanayi gaba Yoseefu,
Yoseefu gaba Matattiiya, Matattiya gaba Amos, Amos gaba Nahum, Nahum gaba Esli, Esli gaba Nagayi,
Nagayi gaba Maatti, Matti gaba Madattiya, Madattiya gaba Shemeyi, Shemeyi gaba Yoseefu, Yoseefu gaba Yuuda,
Yuuda gaba Yoana, Yoana gaba Reesa, Reesa gaba Serubabeeli, Serubabeeli gaba Shaltieli, Shaltieli gaba Neeri,
Neeri gaba Meelgi, Meelgi gaba Adi, Adi gaba Goosam, Goosam gaba Elimadaamu, Elimadaamu gaba Eeri,
Eeri gaba Yoshuwa, Yoshuwa gaba Elieseri, Elieseri gaba Yoorim, Yoorim gaba Matatte, Matatte gaba Laawi,
Laawi gaba Simon, Simon gaba Yuuda, Yuuda gaba Yoseefu, Yoseefu gaba Yonaamu, Yonaamu gaba Eliyakkiimu,
Eliyakkiimu gaba Meleeya, Meleeya gaba Meena, Meen gaba Matatta, Matatta gaba Nattani, Nattani gaba Dawdi,
Dawdi gaba Yeese, Yeese gaba Obedi, Obeedi gaba Boasi, Boasi gaba Saala, Saala gaba Nashooni,
Nashooni gaba Aminadabu, Aminadabu gaba Admiini, Admiini gaba Araamu, Araamu gaba Hesroon, Hersoon gaba Bereesi, Bereesi gaba Yuuda,
Yuuda gaba Yakkobo, Yakkobo gaba Isakka, Isakka gaba Abrahaamu, Abrahaamu gaba Deera, Deera gaba Nahoori,
Nahoori gaba Seruugi, Seruugi gaba Reewu, Reewu gaba Beleegi, Beleegi gaba Ebeeri, Ebeeri gaba Sheela,
Sheela gaba Genaani, Genaani gaba Arfosaadi, Arfosaadi gaba Sheemu, Sheemu gaba Nuuhu, Nuuhu gaba Lameek,
Lameek gaba Metusela, Metusela gaba Henookko, Henookko gaba Yareedi, Yareedi gaba Mahaleeli, Mahaleeli, gaba Genaani.
Genaani gaba Enooshi, Enooshi gaba Seetti, Seetti gaba Adaamu, Adaamu gaba Aseetta.
Iimuchchu nea ninyas Yeesu Gurorooda Ghaydit, gabiikna Yordaan ak ghoadoabiiw Gurorooda
gobiida dareapchcheeda askwearjooji haradam nea gwasimsim Meangnyeandeenda. Amwaaga gil eawoojusu seaniin; ng'atta askwearjoojusu, ghwayeachchi.
Gwayeeshsha meang'nyeandeenda, “Iiwosi Balleanda Aseetta ginung' ghoaw lagheaneeni mukkatte.”
Ghwasha Yeesu nea gwayeeshsha, “Geang'waar gideaba, ‘Siida moammu goobideewa ng'eanyiida mukkatte akghwahit.’”
Ghwaat Meang'nyeandeenda ak goodiing'da heeda miy ghaang' ak goohiimsa daroorakka sean bea ng'eanyiida gili nuwaas.
Ak gwayeeshsha, “Gaydagoonnyi gheambalmeani seaniin ea gigheambiitta nyaawa; aba gideaba sigoonan, ak gaydaadaw siida wassean eagasayi.
Iighadoawannyaan, gayghoaw haleanjeeni seaniin gaagu.”
Ghwasha Yeesu nea gwayeeshsha, “Geang'waar gideaba,
‘Ghadoawana Ng'uttamiida was Aseetttaang'u,
nea gigadiyeesi niny akghwahit.’”
Hean ghwaat Yerusaleemu, ak godiing'da uhuuda gheeda sibatta Aseetta heeda geaw, ak gwayeeshsha, “Iiwosi Balleanda Aseetta, ging'adaattaawi geaw hiji;
aba gideaba geang'waar,
‘Gaygoojeagu malaykajeagaaschi ak gafurnyi,’
Ea gideaba,
‘Gayghwadeabwaneey geattinga nyawa,
ea mwalasa geeshtang'u lagheaneeda.’”
Ghwasha Yeesu nea gwayeeshsha, “Ghayi geeyi, ‘Adisimsimi Ng'uttamiida was Aseetttaang'u.’”
Hean ahiit meang'nyeandeenda giliwas simsimda, ghanyi gawa ea ghwanyas gheatta damannuut.
Iiduw gabiigu Yeesu aba uurda Gurorooda ak gawa Galilaaya, ak gageawiit iitaannyi aba daroorakka sean neekki.
Goonealshachi aba jeeda ghoorajega nyaawa sinealshachcheewa, nea ghooghambiit buuneessean.
Iiduw ghwahidu Nasareetti, heeda ghayi hissiina heeda, ak gawa jeeda ghooriida sinnealshachcheewa, gawuurji gideajusu bea geallaan, aba eaweeda sabatto. Ghamiinaada ak ghoassoamwa;
geattaw gittaabooda sibaneeda suguura Isaaya. Ghoayyaaw gittaabu ak ghwanyas heeda sing'oorsa gideaba,
“Gurorooda Ng'uttamiida gwanda badaydeanyu,
aba gideaba nimwaaran dawa darukkwiisa fuga barbari Giijasta Miiy.
Gojeaknean darukusa fuga mida ghealooniga siksiinda nyaawa
nea fuga ng'oowwi gayghoang'wearda,
ak gojeaknean dalealu fuga sighabwas,
nea gearukuti gweayda sumwas bea Ng'uttamiida.”
Hean ghwarat gittaabu, ak ghoadaw siida gadiyeeda, ak goopteada; ak gohang'ooysa ghaang' buuneessean mida jeeda ghooriida sinnealshchcheewa.
Ghoang'eat baloaldaannyi nea gwayeeshsha, “Eannean ng'ooruussu nisa aba jeeda iidigeagwa.”
Gabaloola sean ng'asheega miyaas appadaydaannyi nea geahamng'eanyi isiyiiy ng'asheega dagheerjeandumeeda baloola. Ak geeyi, “Neada siisi ea mii balleanda Yoseefu?”
Gwayeeshsha saawa, “Geasikteawi gideaba gajoorukuneani ghwasildeanga gideaba, ‘Bwanamwagaanga, ahaabwa geaw'; ng'asheega siyiinyi ghayi isni aba Gapernaumu, sina earaba ng'eanyiidaang'u.’”
Ak gwayeeshsha, “Aba huumwa geayeeshshineegwa manda sibaneeda jea eamwas aba jeeda ng'eanyiidaannyi.

Asi aba huumwa geayeeshshineegwa, ghayi gwanda masiinung'weega saang'a ng'eanyiida Israeeli aba damanda Eliya, damanda roada roopta gweannyeew samwagu ea shealaah, ak ghwahidu gejeeda haw jeeda ng'eanyiisean;
eara Eliya ea mechcheakta gawa hichpa nuut, geenung' gawa heeda masiinung'weanda assagi mida Serepta, mida ng'eanyiida Sidoni.
Abeeda gwanda fuga saang'a bearji udamusuura aba ng'eanyiida Israeeli gweayda waseewa Eliisha sibaneeda; ak ea meammiinna eara siyagi, geaghus Naamaneeda ng'eanyiida Sirya.”
Iyiiy ng'asheanji Fuga mida jeeda ghooriida sinnealshachcheewa gwanyareesi sean.
Ak ghang'eatng'eat erruteawa mujiini, ak geayaat mareetta heayeeda sideeksa mujiineeda nyaawa, nea geegasa eang'ng'adattaawa uhuuda heayeeda.
Ghang'eat ak ghwalach bugusta nyawa ak gawa.
Ak ghwararang'aada gawa Gapernaumu, was mujiineeda Galilaaya. Ak ghoanaal saawa eaweeda Sabatto;
ghahamng'eanyi buuneeda aba ginealshoadaannyi, aba gideaba ng'asheandaannyi gwandeawa gheambalmeeda.
Nea aba jeedeaba ghooriitta sinnealshachchewean gwanda Siisi mideawa gurorooda meangeenda muy hean; gojuur muuchchi aba ghuutta haw,
“Seh! Akayhindaneasan ang'iing'i Yeesuuyda Nasareetti? Ghwasaan anda gineayaneasa? Ghanalli siiduwosi guwosi dea Ghaydit bea Aseetta.”
Goojuursa Yeesu niny nea gwayeeshsha, “Siinda, ak giritteawi siisi!” Ghwanung' Meangeenda ghoabeada siida aba bugusta buuneeda, ak gwaritteaysa siidida nea mii gwasawan.
Hean ghahamng'eanyi sean ak gaba nii eshsha nuut, “Nii ana ng'ashaani? Iissa Gwarukutteawa uurda ea gheambalmeeda nea gwayeeshsha meangeenda aritta ak gwaritta.”
Gageawiit iittaannyi aba jeedeaba ng'eanyiitta seaniin eageng'oojiga.
Iiduw ghang'eat ak gwaritteawa jeeda ghooriida sinnealshachcheewa, ak gawa gheeh Simon. Nea abeeda gheamatta agweaji Simon ghamnyaan, gabearji sheagheeda ng'waan ak geemus ghoahap.
Gawa heeda mida gheamattida ak ghamiinaada aba murdeadaannyi, ak goojursa sheagheeda, ak ghahabwa gheamatta sheagheadaannyi; deagheatta ghang'eat ghoang'aatta saawa.
Damanda mikteawa aseetta, ghapka Buuneeda sean headaannyi nea gweadu fuga miyean bea siisi bearji geeyoadaannyi, ak ghwayiin geattingaaschi iheenga fuga miyeani ak gaheaba sean.
Gwaritteaysa fuga saang'a meangeenda nea gojuuri nea gwayi, “Ang'iing'i guwosi Balleanda Aseetta!” Gowoowusa saawa, ak ghwarat ghuusiga ea mabaloola aba gideaba eara saawa ghwanal niny Gristo gil.
Muchchu sakteayda ghang'eat gawa heeda manda sii, ak gagaseada Buuneeda ama sihiitta heeda geegasa eatteal ea manung'usiina heeda;
gwayeeshsha saawa, “Gaydawa darukkwiida Giijasta Miy bea sugoochcheandumeeda Aseetta aba mujiinajeega suurja, aba gideaba suu gea sichcheaknaneani.”
Abeeda gwarukkwiida Giijasta Miy aba jeeda ghoorajeega sinnealshachcheewa aba ng'eanyiida Yudeeya.
Eaweechcha nea gwanda murdeeda basooda Genasareetti gwaneaweesa buuneeda nea goleeysiit ng'asheega Aseetta.
Ghwadaa maleambaji iyyeenya aba murdeeda basooda, nea abeeda ea nuweay fiibwa gohuun gheareedanga nyaawa sing'ng'oonnya ghweayeega.
Gawa jeemba maleamboonagi was dea Simon, gwayeeshsha seabwa nung' gosiipta maleambooda gil mwanang' gawa jeeda basooda ak goopteada ak ghoanaal buuneeda nea gwanda jeeda maleambooda.
Rat ghuutta baloolda, gwayeeshsha Simon, “Asiipsiina heeda saang'a beega, ak ghoapputti ghearedangeagwa alealni ghweayeega.”
Ghwasha Simon nea gwayeeshsha, “Siida haw, geegadiyi aweasean ak ea meang'ng'waanyi gil! Ama ninyaashtunu gaydabuutta gheareedanga.”
Iing'atta sinoodeaba nii, ghoang'ng'waay ghweayeega saang'a; ea ghwariikghta gang'ada gheareedanga nyaawa,
Gang'wachsa geadi fiisu mida jeemba maleambooni neekki ghapka ghaweat. Geegawusa maleambajeega duwaaw ea gwaramagu gwalik beega.
Daa Simon Betro ng'asheanji, gobeedeaysa madeeda Yeesu nea gwayeeshsha, “Ea Ng'uttamiida, asiipteawana heedeanyu, aba gideaba geabea riing'a.”
Ghahamng'eanyi sea fukka sean mideayiin, aba ghweayeega siing'ng'waay;
nea abeeda gwanda Yakkobo ea Yohaana was balloojiga Sebedaayo sinuudayi gadiyeeda sea Simon. Ng'atta gwayeeshsha Yeesu Simon, “Adibeali; ghang'eada ghamneawa gaylealluuni buuneeda.”
Aruunna maleambajeega nyaawa jeeda basooda ghang'eatng'eat gwanung'sa heeda haleanjeessean ak geayaat geeshta.
Eaweechcha nea gwanda jeemba mujiinajean, ghwahidu headaannyi Siisi bearji udamusuura, daa Yeesu, gobeedeasa madeadaannyi ak gamus nea gwayeeshsha, “Ng'uttamiida, iigasayi gimmuusi amminnaan.”
Ghoahaakta geadi Yeesu ak ghawaas nea gwayi, “Geagasayi; miinni.” Deagheatta gwaritteaysa udamusuura.

Ghamiin gheang'da ea marukusiina sih; nea gwayeeshsha, “Una ahimsiina geaw ashoohoochcheanda, ak gisabi geadi haleanjeeda siyeada ghadooweeda was gidaghayi rukuteayda Muusa, asi abeeda gajeadaah gideaba simminneey.”
Ak gageawiit iitta aba daroorakka sean, ak ghapka Emeeda headaannyi goleeysiit nea ghoahaap fuga bearji geyoonung'weakka.
Iiduw gwajireada ak gawa dareapcheeda ghamwaash Aseetta.

Eaweechchanjagi aba jeedeaba eawoojikka gonealshi, abeeda goobiitpiit Farisayajeega ea ginealshoodiga deaweeda leabu gilinyoo ea gharang'da Galilaaya, ea Yudeeya ea gealeabu Yerusaleemu; nea gwandeawa uurda Ng'uttamiida ak ghoahaap buuneeda.
Asi ng'ulla, ghapka Buuneeda nea gwasareenna muunda siisi abittu damealga, ak geegasa gichchea eayaatta gah, ak geeyiin madeeda Yeesu;
iiduw nea mwanyasa gheatta gichchea gweetteayda gah aba seang'ayda emeeda, gwading'da uhuuda gheeda ak geerrareang'u sea muundaannyi gwasku seawadeeda ea eayiin madeeda Yeesu.
Daa masaweega nyaawa gwayi, “Siida, sisamsa ring'eegaagu.”
Gonyeari geat Farisayaajeega ea ng'oorshoodiga nea gwayeena, “Siisi ng'eaha ang'eawi Aseetttean ghanyeamanda siisi ammu gwasamsa ring'eeda geaghus Aseetta akghwahiit.”
Jeeng'u Yeesu ng'asheega anyeari geat gwayeeshsha, “Ghwasaan anda gonnyearayi geat ng'asheesu aba guroruunatkeagwa?
Awussis anneeda, gideaba dayi, ‘Ring'eegaagu sisasmsa,’ ghana dayi, ‘Ng'eada ak guwi?’

Asi geagasayi anala gideaba Balleanda Siida gwandeawa gheambalmeeda aba jeeda ng'eanyiida jea gwasamsiina ring'eega iiduw gwayeeshsha siitta abittu damealgeani, geayi, ng'eada, sareana muundaang'u ak guwi ghoah.”
Deagheatta ghang'eat siidida aba madeennyaawa, ak ghwasar muundaannyi ak gawa ghoah nea ghoaghambiit Aseetta.
Ghahamng'eanyi sean, nea geakghambiit Aseetta nea ghang'uut muuwda nea geeyi, “Eannean sidaayi ng'asheega deamdeameadi.”
Iiduw gwaritta jarooda ak ghwadaa siisi ang'ng'oonyi gwaadi suguura Laawi, nea goopteada aba gheeda sing'ng'waanya gwadiin; ak gwayeeshsha, “Eanni geeshteanyu.”
Ghang'eat ak gwanung'usa heeda halanjeasean, ak ghwaat geeshta.
Gwasissa Laawi ghwelmeeda haw aba gheannyi; ak gweagiischi nea gambuuchchi fuga saanga ang'ng'oonyi gwaadi ea buuneeda suurja.
Hean goniiksa Farisayajeega ea ng'oorshoodiga nyaawa ginealangaaschi, nea gwayeeshsha, “Ghwasaan anda goyeagiischi nea goleeshi sea fuga ang'ng'oonyi gwaadi ea fuga ring'eega?”
Ghwasha Yeesu nea gwayeeshsha, “Fuga majeekcheewi magaseadayyi bwanamwagaanga geaghus gagasa gea miyeani.
Aniini mwaawuni daguursa fuga doobiiweadi, ghawunnyi daguursa fuga ring'eega gwadukkuuna ring'eega nyaawa.”
Hean geeyeeshsha, “Anda ginealanga Yohaana goluulliida geat nea ghamwaash Aseetta, ak eara ginealanga Farisayajeega gwasiniidunu, nea gaagu gweagiischi nea gwaleeshi.”
Gwayeeshsha Yeesu, “Ghoammu gwaliilda rabasta nyeangiida nea gwandeayi sea siida geeshshi?
Amaduw gwanda eaweetta jea egeandeawa siida geeshshi aba jeennyaawa, eaweechcheanji gaygwaliilda.”

Hean gwarukusa galeega nea gwayeeshsha, “Manda siida jea ghabwaash weasta hang'deesh ak ghawaasa hang'da waas, iisindunu gayghabwaash dea eesh, ak abeeda weastida bea hang'deeshiin maygweatteayyi sea dea waas.
Ak ea manda siida jea ghwayiin difaayeeda mii ghwaheas jeesinga ghadeatka woosi; iisindunu, gaygwanyarjeaweada difaayeeda mii ghwaheas ghadeatka ak gaygaweay difaayeeda, ak gwanyara ghadeatka.
Difaayeeda mii ghwaheas geaghus eyamsa jeesinga ghadeatka eashiish.
Ea manda siida jea iing'atta leeyda difaayeeda heeseadi jea gagasa gea mii heeseadi; aba gideaba gaygwayi, ‘Gea heeseadi amiyaas.’”
Eaweeda Sabatto damanda beawa gwasik jeesinga madameega, hean ghwalajaada ginealangaaschi muschoonga, ak gang'ealng'ealsa jeesinga baneaguukka nyaawa ak ghwaak.
Gwayeeshsha Farisayajeega mwaatkwa, “Ghwasaan anda goosinnyi ng'asheanda mwadoabiiwa eaweeda sabatto?”
Ghwasha Yeesu nea gwayeeshsha, “Miyoassoamwana gidaghayi sin Dawdi iyeachchih.
Gidabeada jeeda gheeda Aseetta, ak gageanu ak ghwaak mukkattajeega siyiin madeeda Aseetta, nea mwadoabiiwa aba hichpa siinuut geaghus ghwaak ashoohoodiga, ak ghoadaw eara fuga mideayi sea niny?”
Ak gwayeeshsha, “Balleanda Siida Ng'uttamiida sabattoohi.”
Eaweechcha nuut bea sabatto, damanda beawa jeeda ghooriida sinnealshachcheewa ak goonealshi, gwanda jeeni siisi apttu geattinda dugwa.
Gang'ula Ng'oorshoodiga ea Farisayajeega eadaa ea jea ghoahaap siidida eaweeda sabatto, aba sareani geegasa gichchea eanyasta ramaseanda jea eahhaktaawa.
Hean ghwanal gidamida jeesinga nyaawa, ak gwayeeshsha siidida aptu geattindean, “Beenni miinaada aba hiji.” Ak ghang'eat ak ghamiinaada aba hoowa.
Ak gwayeeshsha Yeesu, “Gaydanyasheagwa, aba eaweetta sabatto, ghwadoabiiwi gideaba geesin ng'asheanda miyi ghana ng'asheanda muy. Ghang'wana gighuuyda eaweega ghana ng'wana lakkunooda?”
Ng'atta ghoaduup ghaang' buuneeda aba murdajeega sean ak gwayeeshsha siidida, “Asi adoabiiwa gattindaang'u.” Hean ghoadoabiiw ak gabiikta geattinda gamajeegiit.
Ghwanyareas muuchchi fugiga ak geebalool eegasa gichchea eehinda Yeesu.
Askwearjoojikka gawa iheenga heayeeniga ghamwaash Aseetta; ghamwaash Aseetta eaweesean.
Iimuchchu, Gaguursa ginealangaaschi, ak ghwaloat damaniyyeenya aba jeennyaawa, ak gaguura malaykajeega;
Nea Simoneeda suguura gheawungaaschi Betrohi, ea oorjeeda ghaamwat siyi Andreya, ea Yakkobo ea Yohaana, ea Filippo, ea Bartolomayo,
ea Mattayo, ea Domaso, ea Yakkobo balleanda Alfayo, ea Simoneeda suguura Selotte,
ea Yuuda balleanda Yakkobo, ea Yuudayda Iskariyoti, was siida amaduw ghwala bwadaw.

Iiduw nea ghwararang'aan sea saawa ak ghamiinaada aba heeda miy ng'eanyi, abeeda gwandeawa fuga saang'a was ginealangaaschi ea emeettuw leabu meatkwajeega sean bea Yudeeya, ea Yerusaleemu ea ghuutta basooda Diro, ea Sidooni, nea ghapka gooleeysiit niny nea geahaap geyoonung'eakka nyaawa;
Ak ghoahaap eara fugiga bearji meangeenda munyasiin.
Gagasa emeessean ghawaas niny, aba gideaba uurda gwaleabu headaannyi ak ghoahaap sean.
Iiduw gagatgat gheanyangaaschi goong'weersa ginealangaaschi, ak gwayeeshsha:
“Ghoang'wani agogeeda barbari, aba gideaba sugoochcheandumeeda Aseetta deang'wa.
Ghoang'wani agoogeeda yeadeagwa jih ghamneawa, aba gideaba gajoolang'uuda.
Ghoang'wani agoogeeda oyyeawdi ghamneawa, aba gideaba gajoayaaga rear.
Ghoang'wani agoogeeda sideagwa buuneeda, nea gwahistaneegwa nea gong'eawweegwa ak geemmunyasiidi gheawungeagwa, appadayda Balleanda Siida!
Ahoosana aba eaweettida, nea ghoang'waschi aba hooseaneega, aba gideaba gimeardeang'wa aahaw aba humng'eeda, aba gideaba nii gidaghayi hinda ghweaniga nyaawa sibanga.
“Asi ashageada agoogeeni owoschi baruurjeewiin, aba gideaba noanyaaschi hawdeayda.
Ashageada agoogeeni owoschi lang'uudeat ghamneawean, aba gideaba gajadaaha jalooda. Ashageada agoogeeni oayaaji rear ghamneawean, aba gideaba gajaguttuuni heareega nea gooyeawdi.
Ashageada agoogeeni, jea gagwarseegwa buuneessean iin aba gideaba eara ghweaniga nyaawa ghayi gwahindunu sibanga ng'uyeega.”
“Asi Geayeeshshineegwa agoogeeni oyiing'shiin, abwariinya weajoodigeagwa, asissiina geamiyaas fuga sideagwa,
Abadiischeesiina fuga morridaneegwa, amwaasha Aseetta appadahuukka fuga ghabwaseegwa.
Siida iilas madang'daang'u, giidawi eara meatkweeda niirja; iiyareannyi sih hang'daangu ginung'usi eara shaatteadaang'u.
Siida musnyi gil adawa, nea siida arreannyi halanjeadaang'u ea adimaseawi.
Asi gidoogasayi gwasinneegwa buuneeda agooga, asissina eara saawa.
“Iyoabwariinyi fuga bwarinyeagwa, abeeda ghoahhiimu naaha miy? Aba gideaba eara fuga ring'eega ghabwariiy fuga bwariiy saawa.
Iyoosissi geamiyaas fuga sinnuneegwa gea miyaas, abeeda ghoahhiimu naaha miy? Aba gideaba eara fuga riing'eega gwasna gea urjunu.

Iyoanung' goleakshi fuga oanalli gideaba gay ghoaghuumneagwa abeeda ghoahhiimu naaha miy? Aba gideaba eara fuga riing'eega gooleaksheewa heeda fuga ring'eega, aba gideaba ghwanal gideaba gay ghoaghuumu.

Asi abwariinya weajoodigeagwa, nea goosinnyi gea miyaas, nea ghoanung' goleakshi, nea adoofurdi godelneegwa gil; abeeda gimeardeang'wa gajaahaw, ak gajahuuwa balloojiga Aseetta haw mida humng'eeda; aba gideaba niny aamiy aba fuga mabadiischeesiina ea gea geawwi gheanyan.
Andeawana baydeayda, ak gawuurji gidamideayeatta Ghweandeang'wa baydeayda.
“Adoorgweakkiisi buuneeda, ak ea majeergweakseegwa; adooyeatti ghuussi, buuneeda ak ea majeeyeatteeweegwa ghuussi; asammisiina buuneeda, ak gajeesamseagwa;
oattawa buuneeda haleanjeeda ak gajeegoneegwa; daanyiit, sidaksa, siittuumduum, ea ghwanawda, ea gichchea gagoneegwa. Aba gideaba giideennooda ootteennidi gichchea eetteenneegwa.”
Gabalool nea gagalla geat ng'asheega: nea gwayeeshsha, “Heappi siida ng'oaw gayghoammu ghoadoabiiw siinuut ng'oawi? May ghoabitta duwaawi jeeshshoomanda?
Ginealaneeda mwang'ala ginealshoochcheandaannyi, geaghus ea niduulu ginealshooda abeeda gaygwadeennyi sea ginealshochcheandaannyi.
Ghwasaan anda gung'ulayi hararooyeanda mida jeeda gheang'da oorjeeda geamadu nea mung'ulli geetta mida jeeda gheang'daang'u?

Ak gajammuustaan eshshiina oorjeeda geamadu, ‘Oorjeeda iyya, nung' dageanu hararooyeanda mida gheang'daang'u,’ nea midaahi geetta mida gheang'daangu ang'iing'i. Siida ammiittu geaw, nyoo ghanyi geanda geetta mida ghang'daang'u, abeeda gaydaaha muuchchi gichchea geandeayda hararooyeanda mida gheang'da oorjeeda geamadu.”
“Geetta miiy majiilla hagheega munyas, eara geetta muy ea majiilla haghweega miyaas;
aba gideaba gilinyoo ea geadi geenalla haghweagaaschi. Aba gideaba mwaang'wa eebinna gulageetka geetta halaghweenga, ghana mwoang'wa ebiinna misabiibu heeda yudeeda.

Siida miy aba jeeda gheaseedaannyi miy bea guroroadaannyi goruuttu gea miyaas, nea siida muy aba jeeda gheaseedaannyi muy iissa goruuttu gea munyas; aba gideaba ghuutta gabaloolla gea nyiit jeeda jeeda guroroadaannyi.
“Ghwasan anda googurewean ‘Ng'uttamiida, Ng'uttamiida,’ nea moosinni gidearukneegwa?
Siida wassean wuh heedeanyu ak ghwayiiy ng'asheegeasu ak gwasin, gaydahiimu giduurji:
gawuurji sea siida deekshi, ghurghurda daranajeega muuchchi ak ghwayiin sindeetta heeda mida lagheanga; hidu guldeayda eenda, gagulsa gheeda, ak ea mwabwaanya, aba gideaba sideas muuchchi.
Nea siida iiy ng'asheegeasu ak ea masna gawuurji siida deeksa gheeda badayda ng'eanyiida nea manda sindeetta; hidu guldeayda, deagheatta ghabwaay, ak habitkweedeaba gheetta ahaw muuchchi.”
Iiduw ahiit Yeesu baloaldaannyi sean gasa ghwayiiy buuneeda gawa Gapernaumu.
Damandida gwanda ngeanyiitta shirikkarajeanda haw mideawa siidaannyi bea gadiyeeda bwariiy muuchchi, nea abeeda ghabwar miyeeda.
Iiyiiy iitta Yeesu, goojeakta gweargwa Yahuudi headaannyi eemus ghwahidu ghoahaap siidaannyi bea gadiyeeda.
Hitta heeda Yeesu gemeermeerani nea geyeeshsha, “Siisi gammiisa weattaang'u.
Aba gideaba siisi ghabwariiy emeedeanya ak gwadeekneasa ghooriida sinnealshachcheewa.”
Goodeayi Yeesu saawa. Geeyi bwak ama neekkiisa gheeda, goojeakta shirkarajeanda hawfuga duupchi eyeeshsha, “Ng'uttamiida adideawiidi geaw aba gideaba mammisean gideaba gay hinni jeedeaba gheenyu.
Aba gideaba mammiisean dahidu heedaang'u, ang'iing'i rukuni ng'asheanjagi ak gay ghahaap siideanyu bea gadiyeeda.

Aniini geawoschi siida mideawa gheambalmeeda ak geaballi shirkara, inyeessa iyeayeeshshi akkalealla, ‘Una,’ gawa; nea nuut iyeayeeshshi, ‘Beenni,’ ghwaan; ak eara siideanyu bea gadiyeeda iyeayeeshshi, ‘Sina gili,’ gwasin.”
Ghahamng'eanyi Yeesu iiyiiy ng'asheesu hean gwayamsa geaw emeeda gwachchi eattu geashtannyiin, ak gwayeeshsha “Earaba jeeda ng'eanyiida Israeeli mii dadaah siida mideawa masaweega huumwa uurjunu.”
Iiduw nea gabiikta fukka gwachchi sichcheaktean ghoah, ghwahitta nea ea nihaap siitta bea gadiyeedean.
Iiduw ghang'eat Yeesu gawa mujiineeda suguura Naini, nea goodeayi ginealangaschi ea emeetuw.
Iiduw nea geneekkiissa ghuutta mujiini, hean geroonnyi sea sareenda eadu muspa balleanji was ghaamwat masiinung'weanda, ak ea balleanda ghus ghaamwat gil nea goodeana emeettuw bea mujiineetta.
Daa Ng'uttamiida gatmoodida ghabwayda ak gwayeeshsha, “Adiiyyeawudi.”
Gawa ama neekkiissa ghwoang'ng'waay ghabearanga ak ghamiinaada buuneeda ak gwayeeshsha, “Geeyi ng'eada baleanda.”
Gwaduudu Siida nimi ak goopteada ak gabalool ak ghwoadaw Yeesu ghaamwat.
Ghabeal buuneassean; ak geakghambiit Aseetta, nea geeyi, “Nirinna ng'eang'deanya sibaneeda haw! Ak eara Aseetta ea nihidu gabareessa fugaaschi.”
Gageawiit iittaannyi aba ng'eanyiida Yudeeya ea geng'oojigaaschi.
Gweassa Ginealanga Yohaana iitteaba ng'asheesu seaniin.
Hean gaguursa Yohaana ginealangaaschi iyyeenya ak gojeakta heeda Ng'uttamiida ghoanyaash gideaba, “Ang'iing'i guwosi siida ghayi jea ghwaani ghana jea eammuukghuna nuut?”
Gaweay ama hiitta heeda geeyeeshsha, “Goajakneasa Yohaaneeda Abattiisachchi nea gwayi, ‘Ang'iing'i guwosi siitta ghayi jea ghwahiduuni ghana jea eammuukghuna nuut?’”
Ak aba damandida ghoahaap fuga saang'a miyeani ea gea bearji meangeenda, ak eara fuga ng'oowwi aniimmu ghoang'wearda.

Ghwasha nea gwayeeshsha, “Aweayeena ak goorukusi Yohaana ng'asheesu oayinyiin ea gea oadaayi, Fuga ng'oowwi niimmu ghoang'wearda, fuga badoojiga gaweelweel, fuga udamusuura siimmiidu, fuga miinyi niyiing'shi, muschcheekka siittuuttu, gea barbari geerukusa Giijasta Miy.
Ghang'wana siitta mwamwachmwajaniin.”
Iiduw nea gabiikta fuga gwachchi ajeagu Yohaana ghang'eat goobalool emeeda aba badayda Yohaana nea gwayeeshsha, “Gwachchi goweayi ong'ng'wearsiina naaha aba dareapcheeda, mudayeanda ayuuk jeammeeda?
Abeeda gooweayi adaaha naaha? Siida akkwaa hang'weakka bumbuni miyaasi? Ang'ulla, gideaba buuneeda mideawa hang'weaka miyaas ak ghwaak miyeenooda gwanda gealga sugoodiga.
Abeeda gooweayi adaaha naaha? Sibaneeda? Huumwa gil, geayeeshshineegwa, ahaweawa eara sibaneeda.
Nii siida ghayi sibean eergu aba jeeda ng'ooruutka gil gideaba,
‘Ng'ulla, geajeagu giijasoochcheandeanyu ghwaan madeadaang'u,
jea gwasin naweadaang'u aba madeadaang'u.’
Aba
Asi geayeeshshineegwa aba jeeda diibiga jih gadeemga manda dea haweewa Yohaana; ak eara gwasa siida mwanang' muuchchi aba jeeda sugoochcheandumeeda Aseetta ahaweewa niny.”
(Iiduw nea ghwayiiy fukka ng'asheesu sea fuga ang'ng'oonyi gwadiin geamwas dobiiwnatta Aseetta aba gideaba fiisu fuga ghayi sippattiisan aba gibattiisanda Yohaana;
nea Farisayajeega ea diinagoojiga ghaheawa ng'asheega gasa Aseetta bea badahuukka nyawa, aba gideaba ghaheawa goobattiisan niny.)
“Gaydagala naaha fiisu bea jeachcheeng'suun, suuh fuga urjiini?
Gawurji diibiiga abiitbiit aba jeanaadi ak gaguurriisa geat nea gwayi,
‘Gealaschi igeambooda ak amoang'wasi;
geennyahushshi ak ea mooyyeawdani.’
Aba gideaba Yohaaneeda Abattiischchi ghwahidu ak ea mwaaga mukkatte nea mwali difaayeeda ak gooyeennyi, ‘Gwandeawa meangeenda.’
Ghwahidu Balleanda Siida ak gweagiischi nea gwaleeshi; ak gooyeennyi, ‘Ang'ulla, gitteaw ea leyeanda, fugaaschi gea ang'ng'oonyi gwaadi gil ea fuga ring'eega!’
Nea weaghuumeeda ea nidaajiit gideaba ea doabiiwnatta aba heeda diibigaaschi sean.”
Gaguursa siyagi bea Farisaayu goombuuchchi niny, gawa gheawi bea Farisaayuun ak goopteada gweagiischi.
Hean iiy gatmoomba riing'a mida mujiineedida, gideaba gwanda gheeda Farisayajeanda gweagiischi, gweadu gideeshteayda nyiit nagheeda ng'andit,
hean ghamiinaada appwadaw aba murdeeda geeshangaaschi ak gooyeawda, ea goobitpissa dabeakkaaschi geeshanga ak gobuus aba buudeagaaschi uhuudaannyi ak ghwasam geeshanga nea ghwayeasha nagheedida.
Daa siitta was Farisayajeandida guursean gissin goottemshi nea gwayi, “Inyeeda siisi gwachchi ea sibaneeda gil, gwachchi gayghwanal gatmoani waasiin giduurji aba gideaba gaba ring'a.”
Ghwasha Yeesu ak gwayeeshsha niny, “Simon, gwanda ng'asheanji jea darukuneey.” Ghwasha niny ak gwayeeshsha, “Naaha gil, Ginealshoochcheanda?”
“Siyagi ghayi gwandeawa fii iyyeenya mideawa sileadaannyi; akkalealla gwandeawa sileemba dinaaraji bughalaji muut, nea niirja gwandeawa haradam ea damanamuughuush.
Iiduw nea niraay gidaydeayda, gwasamsa fiisu seaniin. Asi ghamneawa aba jeedeaba fiisu dea jea ghabwariiy muuchchi anneeda?”
Ghwasha Simon nea gwayeeshsha, “Ghaaghanyi gajea siitteani sisamsiina gasaang'aani.” Gwayeeshsha niny, “Asi nirgu huumwa.”

Gwayamsa geaw Yeesu gatmoodida ak gwayeeshsha Simon, “Gung'ulayi gatmooni? Ghawunnyi gheang'u, ak ea miigoona beega jea deahuuna geeshangeasu, nea niny ghwanung' gobitpissa dabeakkaaschi geeshangeasu ak gobuus buudeegaaschi.
Ang'iing'i mii samwaan nea niny dea naahinni hiji ea miighwanung'waada samitta geeshangeasu.
Miyeashana uhuudeanyu nagheeda nea niny ea niyeasha geeshangeasu nagheeda.
Asi gaydayeeshshineey, ring'eegaaschi saang'a sisamsa, aba gideaba ghabwariiy muuchchi, nea dea sisamsa gilimwanang' gayghabwariiy gilimwanang'.”
Ak gwayeeshsha niny, “Sisamsa ring'eegaagu.”
Iyiiy fukkeanji agiischiin mideayi sea ninyiin gaba nii eeshsha geaw, “Siisi ng'eaha jea gwasamsa riing'eemba nuudiin?”
Ak gwayeeshsha gatmoodida, “Nighuunyi masaweagaagu; una nea gibeahi hoyyoo.”
Iiduw ghang'eat gwasik jeeda mujiinajeega ea gharang'weakka, gwarukkwiida nea gweadu Giijasta Miy bea sugoochcheandumeeda Aseetta. Nea abeeda gwandeayi sea ginealangaaschi attamaniyyeenya,
nea abeeda goodeay gadeemsu mida jeeda gea siihaabwa meangeenda ea geeyoonng'weakka: Nea Mariyaayda suguura Magdaleena ghayi sirruutteawa meangeenda assispwa,
ea Yoana gatmooda Guusa, ea haghweadoochcheanda haleanjeeda Heroodehi, ea Susaana, ea suuk gea saang'a, gadiydooscheesa saawa aba haleanjeeda mideawa.
Iiduw bwat geat Eemeetuw leabu mujiinajeega sean gaweesa Buuneeda niny, ak gwarukusa galeega nea gwayeeshsha:
“Ghayi ghang'eat sih gawa histeayda; hitta nea gwahista gwanda gea abitpissa heeda was naweeda, ak geallaaplaap aba geeshanga, nea ghwahitta dariidakka humng'eeda ak ghwaak.
Gwanda eara gea abitpissa heeda was harearachcheanda; ridu ghwasis aba gideaba mii nyeewaneat sigeeda.
Gwanda eara gea abitpissa jeeda geediga halaghweenga; iiduw nea gwardu sea halaghweenga ghwariis geediga.

Gwanda eara giikka abitpissa jeeda sigeeda miyaasiin ak gwardu, gaba ghealooni jih bughala.” Iing'atta rukunoodeaba ng'asheesu, gojuur nea gwayeeshsha, “Siida mideawa iidiga jea ghwayiinya, ea dayiing'shi.”
Iiduw ghoanyaash ginealangaaschi gidabaysiina gallodeaba geat bea ng'asheega,
gwayeeshsha, “Agoogeeni simeayneegwa makcheameeda sugoochcheandumeeda Aseetta; nea aba fii suuk geaghus eegalla geat, aba gideaba eara iyang'wearda amayghwadaa, ama eara iyiiy amayghwanal gidawas.”
Balooli gissigala nihi: Histeanga geegala ng'asheanda Aseetta.
Giikka abitpissa naweedean fugiga ama iiyiin gil; hean ghwahidu meangeenda gageandeawa ng'asheandida guroruunatka nyaawa, aba gideaba adaghamwas ak gealealu.

Nea giikka abitpissa badayda harearachcheandean, giikka ama iiy ng'asheanda ghoang'ng'waay nea gahoosaniini; ak ea mandeawana hawungeani, iissa ghamwas gilinuwaas ama duw nea geesimsim gabay gabiikta bwadaw.

Nea giikka abitpissa jeeda geediga halaghweengean, ea giikka ama iiy, iiduw nea gaweay ghwariis mittagheasta muunda ng'eanyiida bea gassooda barureega, ea haleanjeeda bwariiy sasanuuka nyaawa ak iiduw haghweagaaschi ea mwaheasa.
Nea giikka abitpissa jeeda sigeeda miyaasiin, giikka ama iiy ng'asheanda, gabay ghoang'ng'waay muuchchi aba gurorooda miyiini, ak gwaji haghweega aba milikghteayda.
“Manda siida jea ghoayeat gheaboong'nyeanda ak gwadukuteawa dahuuda, ghana ghwayiin uutta bulaliida, geaghus ghwayiin uhuuda ghamarda, abeeda ghwadaa fuga buwa gah weeshinda.
Ea manda gidafunyaat ak ea majeenung' ghwadajiit, ak ea manda gidawassean was makcheameeda jea ea majeattahaach ak geeyeadu heedeesh.
Asi ashageada aba gidoayiing'di; aba gideaba siisi agar gil gajeehheassa, nea siitta meagara giliin, eara gitta mideawean gajeegeanda.”
Iiduw ghwahidu ghaamwat sea Oorjooga geennyea Yeesu ghapka headaannyi, ak ea meanyasa gheatta jea eahhittaawa headaannyi aba seang'ayda emeeda.
Geerukusa nea geeyeeshsha, “Geamadu ea oorjooga geamadu ghamiinaada aba jarooda, nea gagasseey.”
Ak gwayeeshsha Yeesu saawa, “Iiyya ea oorjooga iyya gea iiy ng'asheanda Aseetta ak gwasiniini.”
Eaweechcha gawa jeeda maleambooda sea ginealangaaschi, ak gwayeeshsha saawa, “Eakghaawana basooda eebu meatkweeda niirja.” Hean ghang'eatng'eat gaweay,
damani beawaan abeeda ghoang'ng'waay ruweanga. Gabalagu siilakghta aba jeeda basooda ak ghwanung' gwaneawwiida beega ea gwaramagu ghwannyiit beega jeeda maleambooda nea gwanda jeeda washta.
Geeweay ak ghwaheat nea geeyeeshsha, “Siida haw, siida haw, Sishsheali!” Ghang'eat ak gwareekusa silakghtida ea laweajajeegiga bea basoodean; ak ghwaasiinda gwayi saw.

Hean gwayeeshsha saawa, “Gwandeenu masaweegeagwa?.” Hean ghabeal nea ghahamng'eanyi ak gaba siisi eeshsha nuut, “Siisi nii siida urjiini, ammu gwareekusa jeammeeda ea beegean, ak ghoawal gheang'dean?”
Iiduw ghwahiitta ng'eanyiida Geraasi, deaschi sea Galilaaya.
Rarang'aan ak ghoalla ng'eanyiida ghajaam gwaroonnyi siisi bearji meangeenda; leabu mujiini nea nigeawiit ea meakwealla hang'weakka, ak ea mobiitteena eara ghoah gobiitta heeda bung'eadinga.
Daa siitteani Yeesu gobeedeaysa madeadaannyi ak gojuur aba ghuutta haw nea gwayeeshsha, “Geendeayeesi naaha sea ang'iing'i Yeesu Balleanda Aseetta miida humng'eeda? Aniyean adisawannyean.”

Ghwanyaashtunu aba gideaba abeeda niyeeshsha Yeesu meangeenda ritteaysiina siisi. (Ak ea nibiikssa siisi nyamoanna; inyeessa geefur nea geerada aba munyaloalajeega ea biingu, ak gang'achcheaweada sean ak ghwaat uurda meangeenda ea gawa eeshtearajeanda aba uurda meangeenda.)
Ghoanyaash Yeesu niny nea gwayeeshsha, “Ghaawungaagu ng'eaha?” Ghwayeeshsha siidida, “Aniini geguurewean Lugooda;” aba gideaba gabearji meangeenda saang'a.
Gamearmearani Meangeenda nea gwayeeshsha, Geemuschcheey, adiiduu ginung' eeweaya jeeshshoomanda sheagi.
Aba damani gwanda hawanda ukkurmajeega daghatpa heaya ghwajeada, ak gamearmearani Meangeeda gideaba nung' eweaya eappitta jeedeaba ukkurmajeesu. Ak ghwanung' gaweay.
Gwaritteawa meangeenda siidida ak ghoabiitta jeeda hawanda ukkurmajeega, gwasalda hawanda ukkurmajeega ghwararang'aadawa beareega heayeeda, ea ghoabiitta jeeda basooda ak goosha sean.
Daa jeagiischoodiga gaweay gwarukuta gidabunu, gaweay mujiini ea jeeda ng'eanyiida.

Iiduw gaweay Buuneeda ghwadaa gidabun, gaweay heeda Yeesu, ak ghwadaa siidida sihhaabwa meangeendean, nea goopteada aba murdeeda geeshanga Yeesu, nea gookwa hang'daannyi, nea nibiiksa fughareadaannyi; ak geabeal.
Nea fukka dahiin gwarukwiida gideaba siitta bearji meangeendean sihaap.
Hean gamus buuneessean mida geeng'oojiga Geraasi gideaba ng'amwana ng'eang'deanya; aba gideaba ning'ut muuwda; nga'atta gwading'da maleambooda ak gabiikta.
Gamus Siidida sihhaabwa meangeendean iidaa nea gawa hean gwaneawsageaw nea gagasa godeayi, ghwanung' gawa nea gwayeeshsha,
“Una gheang'u, ak girukkwiidi gitteenna ng'asheega sean bea ginnuweattaneey Aseetta.” Ghang'eat gawa gwarukkwiida aba mujiineesean gitteenna ng'asheega sean sissa Yeesu.
Iiduw nea gabiigu Yeesu ghwadeapta emeeda aba gideaba nigeawiit gomuukku sean.
Iiduw ghwahidu heeda siisi suguura Yayro, nea abeeda ghoahaaghwa ghoriida sinnealshachcheewa; hidu gobedeaysa geeshanga Yeesu ak gamearmearani goodeayi gheannyi,
nea abeeda hudaannyi was haghasheeda, bea gweannyeew damaniyyeenya, ghabwar miyeeda.
Damani weewean ghwariis Buuneeda Yeesu aba murdajeega sean.
Abeeda gwanda gatmooni areemi foojeanda gweannyeew damaniyyeenya ak ea manda siida ammu ghoahaap.
Ghwaat geeshta ak ghawaasa geaw weleeda hang'daannyi; deagheatta goosha gireemdida bea foojeandean aba geeshangiga.
Ak ghoanyaashta Yeesu nea gwayeeshsha, “Ghawaas ng'eaha?” Ghwashaang' buuneessean, gwayeeshsha Betro, “Siida haw, emeeda gwaneaweeseey nea ghwariisnyi!”
Gwayeeshsha Yeesu, “Gwanda siida nuwaasan; aba gideaba ghadaayi niritteawanean uurda.”

Iiduw nea ghwadaa Gatmoodida gideaba mudughoammu ghafuy geaw, gaweesa nea ghabwaadanaada aba muuwda, ama hitta ghoabeada aba madeadaannyi ak ghoadayda iitta aba madeeda buuneessean gidawaasta, ea gidasihhaapta aba geeshangiga.
Gwayeeshsha niny, “Huda gidahaapnyi masaweagaagu, una nea gibeahi hoyyoo.”
Damani duuw gabaloolean, ghwahidu siida leabu gheeda siida haw ahaaghwa gheeda sinnealshachcheewa ak geeyeeshsha, “Hudaang'u niibitta; adagudideawiidi Ginealshochcheanda.”
Iiy Yeesu iidi ghwasha nea gwayeeshsha, “Adibeali, ang'ing'i mwasa abeeda gayghahaap.”
Hitta ghoah eamwanung' gaweay buuneeda gah sea niny, geaghus niny ea Betro ea Yohaana ea Yakkobo, ea ghwaan ea gheamatta jeepta.
Nea abeeda goyyeawda sean nea gaguuttu heareegaaschi; hean gwayeeshsha, “Adooyyeawdi; aba gideaba mii gami gwalil.”
Geebarra rear, aba gideaba geanal goolla ghami.
Hitta ghoang'ng'waay geattinda ak gaguursa nea gwayeeshsha, “Balleanda, ng'eada.”
Gabiiksa guroroodaannyi, ak ghaminaada aba geeshangiga; ak gwayeeshsha, oattawa gichchea ghwaak.
Ghahamng'eanyi ghaamwat ea ghwaan; ak gwayeeshsha, “Adiiduw goorukusi sih ng'asheanji gwachchi easinnyiin.”
Hean gaguursa ginealangaaschi attamaniyyeenya ak ghoadaw uurda ea gheambalmeeda jea goobala meangeenda sean ea giheapta geyoonung'weakka,
Goojeakta gaweay gwarukkwiida sugoochcheandumeeda Aseetta, nea ghoahaap fuga miyeani.
Gwayeeshsha saawa, “Adoayaadi geadi gil iyoweayi bareannyeekka, eara haleanjeeda, ghana shageeda, ghana mukkatte, ghana lappiya ak ea adolassi hang'weakka iyyeenya.
Gheeda jea ahitta wassean, oppiidana, ea eaghus ea noang'ami ng'eang'da nyaawa.
Nea iyoahitti heeda meegasseegwa, iyooritteawi mujiineedida ghoalalakti birjeanda mida geeshangeagwa ak gayghoaw muwwunooda appadahuukka nyaawa.”
Hean ghang'eatng'eat gaweay gharang'weakka gwarukkwiida Giijasta Miy nea ghoahaap fuga miyean aba hiji nyoo ghwahitta.
Hean iiyiy sugoochcheanda was Heroode iitta ng'asheega sean sisin, hean gwahirbaban, aba gideaba gwayi fuga mwaatkwa sittuuna Yohaana jeeda miyeeda,
nea mwatkwa gwayeena niihiimu geaw Eliya, nea suuk gwayeena niduudu sibaneeda bea gea ghayi bea garayi.
Nea Herode niny gwayeena, “Yohaana ghayi nalaji gheatta; nii ghamneawa gajea ng'eaha eaying'si badayda ng'asheesu seaniin?” Hean gagasa ghwadaah.
Muchchu ea nibiigu Giijasoodigaaschi gwarukusa iitta ginnisin. Ghwaat saawa ea ghwahitta mujiineeda suguura Betsayda.
Iiduw nea gwajeeng'u emeetuw, geayaat geeshta; ama sihitta ghwadeapta saawa ak goobaloola iitta sugoochcheandumeeda Aseetta, ak ghoahaap fuga gasa giiheapta.
Iiduw nea niriikghta gamikta; ghapka ginealanga ak gwayeeshsha niny, “Siksiina buuneeda gaweay gharang'weakka ea jeeda ng'eanyiida gagasa gichchea ghwaak; aba gideaba hiji geendi heeda manda sih.”
Gwayeeshsha saawa, “Oattawa agooga buuneeda gichchaghwaak.” Geeyeeshsha, “Mendeawani gil geaghus mukkataji muut ea ghweayi iyyeenya. Geaghus eweaya eashaaha hamitteaba fiisu seaniin.”
Abeeda fiisu headiga akghwahit ea sagalamnyooji muut. Hean gwayeeshsha ginealangaaschi, “Anung' gobiitpiit nea gwasna gharmuchcheekka eatta fii haradam adamanamughuush.”
Ak gwasinda gidarukteayda, ghwanung' goobiitpiit sean.

Ng'atta gageanu mukkattajeekka ghwanyawa ammuudiin ea ghweayeekka ghwanyawa assiyyeenyean ak gagatgat gheanyangaaschi gogeal humng'eeda, ak gabadiischeesa ak ghabanajaada, ak ghoadaw ginealangaaschi ghoang'attaawa emeeda.
Gweagiischi sean ea gwalang'u. Gewweamu gheaptanga banajanga ak ghwannyiit sooscheew damaniyyeenya.
Eaweechcha nea ghamwaash Aseetta nea gabwageaw, nea abeeda gwandeayi sea ginealangaaschi; hean ghoanyaash nea gwayeeshsha saawa, “Heappi buuneeda ibalool gwayeena geawoschi ng'eaha?”
Ghwasha Saawa nea gwayeeshsha, “Gwayeena guwosi Yohaaneeda Abattiisachchi; gwayeena suurja Eliya; nea suuk gwayeena guwosi siyagi aba jeeda sibanga ghayi bea garayi nuduudu.”
Hean gwayeeshsha saawa, “Ama agooga goyeennyi geawoschi ng'eaha?” Ghwasha Betro nea gwayeeshsha, “Ang'iing'i guwosi Gristoyda Aseetta.”
Gwareekusa nea gwayeeshsha, adiidu goorukusi sih ng'asheanji,
Gwayeeshsha, “Balleannda Siida gayghwanyas sawanadeeda ng'waan muuchchi, nea gayghaheawa gweargwa ea ashoohoodiga hees ea ng'oorshoodiga, ak gajeenuus, ak gaygwaduudu eaweetteaba samwagu.”
Ak gwayeeshsha buneasean, “Siida wassean iigasa gweadu geeshteanyu, ea ada gwasamsa geaw, ak gageanu behiidaannyi ghwasar galagasean ak gweadu geeshteanyu.
Aba gideaba siida wassean iigasa gwalealu eaweagaaschi gaygabeagu, nea siida hutteawi aweagaaschi aba badaydeanyu gaygwalealu.
Siida gaygwaloossa naaha iinyas haleanjeessean bea muunda ng'eanyiida ak gahutteawi eaweegaaschi?
Siida isinnean gheanyanga ea ng'asheegeasu, eara ninyi gaygwasissa gheanyanga Balleanda Siida, damanda jea ghwahinna aba giighaambiittaanyi ea dea Bwaabwa ea dea malaykajeega ghaydidi.
Aba huumwa gaydarukuneegwa gideaba aba jeeni itteang'wean gwanda fuga miinaada aba hiji maygwasamu miyeeda ea eaghus anidaah sugoochcheandumeeda Aseetta.”
Ng'atta eawooji sis nea ghoahiit baloolda gaguursa Betro ea Yohaana ea Yakkobo, hean gaweay uhuumba gijeeda ghamwaash Aseetta.
Damani Mwasheewa Aseettean, ghwayamwa ormeeda nea eara hang'wakkaaschi gaweeriidi muuchchi ea gameeng'meeng'i.
Hean gabalool sea fii iyyeenya, Muusa ea Eliya,
fiisu ghwahidu nea godeana gigheambiitta ak gabaloola badayda miyeadaannyi, jea gwasa aba Yerusaleemu.
Aba damani Betro ea oorjooga suurja ea ning'ng'waay ruweanga muuchchi, ama ng'eatng'eat ghwadaa gigheambiittaannyi ea fuga assiyyeenya miinaada sea ninyi.

Iiduw nea gwasimsa fiisu beatta gwayeeshsha Betro Yeesu, “Siida haw ghwanyawa gahaguuw ameang'amwani hiji; anda meesni udahabeascheew samwagu aba hiji, dea mabeanyi ang'iing'i nirja gaba Muusa nea niirja gaba Eliya;” nea niny abeeda mwanala eara gidarukta.
Damani baloolean, ghwahidu shamoghooda ak gwadukuta; ghabeal iidaa nea gwadukuta shamooghooda.
Ghwanya ghuutta nyaasha jeeda shamoghooda, nea gwayi, “Nii Balleandeanyu aloachchi, olleeysiiniit niny.”
Ng'atta nyeashi, geadaah Yeesu akghwahit. Hean ghwasiinda ak ea meruksina sii aba eawoojikka ng'asheega daa.
Muchchu nea ghwararang'aana uhuuda gijeeda, gwaroonnyi emeeda saang'a.
Ng'ulla, gwarinna Sih jeeda emeeda ak goojuur nea gwayi, “Ginealshoochcheanda, geamuscheey ang'weersiina balleannji itteanyu was haghasheedean;
ng'ulla inyeessa ibalaksa meangeenda ghwanung' goojuur, ak ghoahiil nea gwarinna ghuutta furghooda, ak gwasawan muuchchi, nea magassa gwaritteawa.
Iyeayeeshshi ginealangaagu orruutta, ghwaraay.”
Ghwasha Yeesu nea gwayeeshsha, “Ea fuga mandeawana masaweega was jeachcheenga rodeadi, ak gaydeabiitta heedeang'wa ea ghoaw eeju? Eanni balleanji hiji.”
Damani wunaan, ghwanung' meang'nyeandeenda ghoabeada ak ghoahiil. Ak gojuursa Yeesu meangeenda muy, ak ghahaabwa balleandida ak ghoadaw ghwaan.
Ghahamng'eanyi sean isiidaa uurda haw bea Aseetta.
Damani duu ghahamwang'eanyi aba haleanjeeni siniin, gwayeeshsha ginealangaaschi,
“Anung' gaweay ng'asheesu jeesinga iidigeagwa; aba gideaba Balleanda Siida gajeayiin geattinga buuneeda.”
Ea mwanala ng'asheanji surukusean, aba gideaba sufnya saawa, ak abeeda ea majeeng'na; ak ghoawal ghoanyaash niny iitteaba ng'asheanji.
Iiduw ghoaptu sheang'nyeeda eegasa eanal siida jea gwaheedu aba jeannyaawa.
Hean gwajeeng'u Yeesu gidabaloola guroruunatka nyaawa, gaguursa jeebi mwanang' ak ghwayiin murdeadaanyi,

ak gwayeeshsha saawa, “Siida deaptaawa gheawunngeasu jeepta uurji nii ghwadeaptanaan aniini, nea siida deaptanaan aniini ghwadeapta siida ghayi ajeaknean; aba gideaba siida mwanang'eewaneegwa oagasean ahaweewaneegwa oagasean.”
Ghwasha Yohaana nea gwayeeshsha, “Siida haw, sidaayi siida arutta meangeenda aba ghawungaagu, ak geeyeeshshi nung'waada aba gideaba siidida mabwaheasa.”
Gwayeeshsha Yeesu niny, “Adagudoaheawi; aba gideaba siida mwahasheasa siisi gaba meatkweedeanya.”
Iiduw nea nineekkiit eawoojiga jea ghabeawa humng'eeda hean gamanya beatta Yerusaleemu.
Goojeakta buuneeda goosheedeawa niny, ak gaweay gharang'da Samariya, gwasissin heechchea gobiida;
ak ghaheawa Fugeaba hoowa ghwadeapta niny, aba gideaba ghoang'ng'waay naweeda gawa Yerusaleemu.
Daa ginealangaaschi was geaba Yakkobo ea Yohaana gwayeeshsha, “Ng'uttamiida, gigaasay eguursiina beasta jea gwaleabu humng'eeda ak gwadulu fiisu?”
Gwayamsa geaw saawa ak gwareekusa.
Ghang'eatng'eat gaweay gharang'da nuut.
Iiduw nea gudugwanda naweeda gwayeeshsha Siih niny, “Gaydeadu geeshtaang'u aba hiji uwi sean.”
Gwayeeshsha Yeesu niny, “Fureayoonga gwandeawa shoomeanga, nea dariidakka gwandeawa ghoorajeega nyaawa, nea Balleanda Siida ea mandeawaana eara heeda jea ghwayiin uhuudaannyi.”
Gwayeeshsha siinuut, “Eanni geeshtteanyu.” Ak gwayeeshsha, “Ng'uttamiida, nyoo siksean ghanyi dawa dabuy ghweandeanyu.”
Gwayeeshsha niny, “Nung'waada muscheekka gabuy muscheekka nyaawa; ak ang'iing'i, guwi rukkwiida sugoochcheandumeeda Aseetta.”
Gwayeeshsha sii nuut, “Aniini gaydeadu geeshtaang'u, Ng'uttamiida; nea gidamadeeda ginyoo goonean gheatta dawa dahealli fugeaba gheenyu.”
Gwayeeshsha Yeesu niny, “Manda siida jea ghoang'ng'waay mageemng'eanda ak goong'weersa bwadaw jea ghwahit aba sugoochcheandumeeda Aseetta.”
Ng'atta ng'asheesu ghwaloat Ng'uttamiida fii suuk laadam ea damanamughuush, ak goojeakta gabadiinna iyyeenya, goosheedeawa niny, gaweay gil nyoo ea mujiini gil ea heeda wassean gasa niny gawa.
Gwayeeshsha saawa, “Booga asaang'a ak ea ng'ay fuga gadiyeeda, amwaasha Ng'uttamiida bea booga goojeakta buuneeda jea ghwalach boagaaschi.
Asi aweayeena; nea gong'ulayi aba gideaba geajeakteaydaneegwa dayeega gisilga jeeda suyeekka.
Adiiduw ghoayaadi geadi shageeda, ghana sandakwajeanda, ghana geekka; nea adoakkeachcheewi siida aba naweeda.
Nea gheeda wassean oweayi jeeda gidameeda ayeena, ‘Daba gheawi hoyyoo!’
Abeeda iimida balleanda hoyyoo hoowa, gayghwanyas hoyyooydeang'wa; ama mandana, abeeda gaygabikseegwa.
Ak goopiidi gheawi, ak gooyeagiischi nea ghoaleayi gissugooneegwa, aba gideaba siida gadiiyi gahaguuw gidageattindaannyi; adooritteawi gheawi ak gooweay ghaaw nuut.
Iyoahitti mujiineeda wassean sideaptaneegwa, ayaaga gissugooneegwa;
oahhaabwa fuga miyean mida jeedida nea goorukusi fugiga gideaba, ‘Sugoochcheandumeeda Aseetta nineekkiiseegwa.’
Nea aba mujiineeda oweayi sean ak ea mwadeaptaneegwa, goosikchi naweadingaschi nea gooyeennyi,
‘eara birjeanda mujiineedeang'wa noas geashangaasa geelalaksi iheengeagwa; ak gobiissi anala gideaba sugoochcheandumeeda Aseetta nineekiit.’
Gaydayeeshshineegwa, gayghoammu ghamilikghta muuchchi Sodooma eaweettida ea ghang'al mujiineetta.”

“Shageada, Gorasiini! Shageada, Betsayda! Aba gideaba deamdeamanga ghayi sisin aba heedeang'wa inyeeda ghayi geesin aba Diro ea Sidon, gajea goolla gwaduukkuuna nea gookkwa guniyajeega ak goobiitpiida deareeda.
Nea abeeda ghayghoammu ghamilikghta girgweaksiinda Diro ea Sidooni ea ghang'aleagwa.
Nea ang'iing'i Gapernaumu, gigaasayi adiing'da geaw ea hiitta humng'eeda? Gajeahiing'daneay ea hitta uutta ng'eanyiida.”
“Siida aleeyseegwa iit, gooleeysean iit aniini, nea dea heawaneegwa, ghaheawanaan aniini, nea dea heawanaan ghaheawa dea ghayi ajeakneani.”
Gabiigu Fuga alladam ea damanamughuush nea gahoosan, nea gwayeena, “Ng'uttamiida, eara meangeenda ghoawal ghaanyangaasa aba ghaawungaagu!”
Gwayeeshsha saawa, “Ghadahaannyi Shattaani nea ghang'adaana humng'eeda gawuurji dadamandeeda.
Asi ang'ulla, neagonnyeegwa gheambalmeeda jea oolleapsiinana ng'eanyi ichchipkeega ea udagilbajeega, ea uurda jea oopalana weajoochcheanda; nea manda gichchea gwahisseegwa.
Asi adiidu gohoosannyi aba gidawalda gheang'deagwa meangeenda, ahoosana aba gideaba sung'waar gheawungeagwa aba humng'eeda.”

Aba damandida gohoosan Gurorooda Ghaydiit ak gwayi, “Geabadischooweey Bwaabwa, Ng'uttamiida bea humng'eeda ea ng'eanyiida, aba gideaba gifnyi ng'asheesu fuga mideawa weaghumeeda ea gea mideawa fughareenga ak giihiimsi diibiga manang'i; Asaha Bwaabwa, ada gida igassiidi gil.
Haleanjeassean nugoonan Bwaabwa; ak ea manda siinnal Balleanda geaghus Bwaabwa, ak ea manda siinnal Bwaabwa geaghus Balleanda ea siida wassean gasa Balleanda goohiimsa.”
Gwayamsageaw ginealangaaschi ak goobalool aba makchcheameeda nea gwayeeshsha, “Ghang'wana gheanyanga daa ng'asheega oadaayi agooga!
Aba gideaba geayeeshshineegwa, sibanga ea sugoodiga ghayi gagasa ghwadaa ng'asheesu oadaayiin ak ea mwadaaha, nea gagasa ghwayiiy gea oayiinyi ak amwayiinya.”
Hean ghamiinaada diinagiida ak gwasimsim nea gwayeeshsha, “Ginealshoochcheanda, gay dasin naaha iijaadanyas eaweega manda muudeanooda?”
Gwayeeshsha niny, “Geang'waar naaha aba jeeda deaweeda? heappi gissoamwandiin?”

Ghwasha nea gwayeeshsha, “Bwariinya Aseetta was Ng'uttamiidaang'u aba guroroadaang'u sean, ea aba jeadaang'u sean, ea aba uurdaang'u sean, ea aba fughareadaang'u sean; ea giischeewoochchandaang'u gawuurji gida ibwariiydi geaw.”
Gwayeeshsha niny, “Asi girgu huumwa; una sina ng'asheesu, abeeda gaynyasa giibinda.”
Hean gagasa ghoahiimda doobiiwnattaannyi ak gwayeeshsha Yeesu, “Neada giischeewoochcheandeanyu ea ng'eaha?.”

Ghwasha Yeesu nea gwayeeshsha, “Ghayi ghwararang'aana sih Yerusaleemu nea gawa Yerikko, ak goobissa geattinga mareanghooga, ak geareat hang'weakka nea geabwar, ak gaweay nea gwanung'usa heeda nea niriikghta ghami.
Aba gheamamda ghwararang'aana naweedida ashoohoochcheanda dineeda Yahuudi; daa siidida ghwasajaadawa,
eara siispa Laawi was bareannyeanda gweadu naweeda, ama hiitta howeani ghwadaa ak ghwasajaada.
Ghwahidu siispa Samariya was bareannyeanda, gweadu naweeda ama hiitta hoowa mida siididean; ghwadaa ak ghabwayda,
gaweesa ak ghwayeasha deanneaduutka nagheeda nea ghwayiin difaay ak ghwarat ama hiit gooding'da badayda digeeda ak ghwaat ea ghoahiitta gheeda roochcha rabasta ak ghoarear.
Iimuchchu gageanu lappiyeeda suguura dinari iyyeenya ak ghoadaw siida bea gheeda ak gwayeeshsha, ‘Areara siisi, ama shoada gil aba gireerda, abeeda gaydannyiit iyeabiigu.’
Iing'ulayi heappi aba jeedeaba fiisu assamwaguun, giischeewoochcheandeaba siisi abissa geattinga mareanghoogean anneeda?.”
Gwayeeshsha, “Dea ghwanyawa bwayda gil.” Gwayeeshsha Yeesu niny, “Eara ang'iing'i una ak gisindunu.”
Iiduw nea gudeenda naweeda, gaweay ak ghwahitta jeemba gharang'i, mida gatmooni suguura Marta, ghwadeapta ak ghwaat Yeesu gheanyi.
Abeeda gwanda hutpa ghaamwat suguura Mariya, apteada aba madeeda Yeesu nea gooleeysiit ginealshoadaanyi.
Nea abeeda gwadeawiit Marta muuchchi aba gadiyoojiga saang'a; gaweesa niny ak gwayeeshsha, “Ng'uttamiida miduuppi gideaba ghwanung'wanaan hudiyya gadiyeeda nea gabwageawi? Rukusiina ghwaan ghaweadan.
Ghwasha Ng'uttamiida nea gwayeeshsha, Marta, Marta gihashi nea gideawiidi aba ng'asheega saang'a;
gidasigasa aagi akghwahit. Mariya aniloat gidamiy mwajeammu eegeandeawa.”

Eaweechcha ghamwaash Yeesu Aseetta, ama ahiit goobearsa ginealaneanagi bea jeeda ginealangaaschi nea gwayeeshsha, “Ng'uttamiida, anaaleasa mooshta Aseetta gawuurji gidanaalda Yohaana ginealangaaschi.”
Gwayeeshsha saawa, “Iyoamwaashchchi Aseetta goyeennyi,
‘Ghweandeanya gheawungaagu nung' eakghaambiida.
Nung' ghwahidu sugoochcheandumeadaang'u.
Goaneasa daghwardeanya galeagasean;
samseasa riing'eagaasa, gawuurji gidasisammiisiindi
siida mideawa sileedeanya; ak ea adiigalleassa jeeda simsimda.’”
Gwayeeshsha saawa, “Gajeang'eaha aba jeedeang'wa mideawa siittuupchi, jea gaweesa bugusteaweeda ak gwayeeshsha, ‘Siideaduupcheewi, nung' dalaajaneey mukkaattaji samwagu;
aba gideaba nihissean siidi eaduupcheewi ak ea meandeawani gichchea dayiin mwadeadaannyi;’
ak gaygwaayeeshsha siitta mida gahiin, ‘Adiideawiichchean, sijapchi gidaghuut ak ea sililli sea diibigeasu, mwammuusi dang'eat dagoonnyi gil?’
Geayeeshshineegwa, mayghang'eat ghoadaw gil earappeadooda duupchiin ak gayghang'eat ghoadayda halanjeasean gasa siisi aba gideaba mabuurnana giidiktiksiinda musooda.
Ak geayeeshshineegwa, amusischcheena ak Gajeegooneegwa; agassa, ak gajadaaha; agulgula gidaghuut, ak gajejeasseegwa.
Aba gideaba siida wassean musiischi gajeattaw, nea siida gaseadayyi gayghwadaa, nea siida gulgul gidaghuut gajeejeassa.
Gajea ana ghwaani, aba jeedeang'wa ama mus balleandaannyi ghweayeanda, ghoadaw ichchibooda;
ghana iimus burung'nyeanda jea ghoadaw udagilba?
Agooga fuga munyas, iyoanaldunu gichchea oattawda diibigeagwa haleanjeeda miyaas, abeeda Ghweandeang'wa mida humng'eeda mwanala muuchchi ghoadawda Gurorooda Ghaydiit fukka musa ninyiin!”
Hean goruutta meangeenda manda ghuutta; damanda ritteawa meangeenda, deagheatta gabalool siitta manda ghuuttean, ak ghahamng'eanyi buuneeda.
Hean gwayi buuneeda mwaatkwa, “Gooruutta meangeenda aba uurda Belsebuuli, meangeenda diitta hawiin;”
nea Mwaatkwa, gwasimsim, nea geegasa ghoahiimda gwadeagooda leabu humng'eeda.
Nal gidabaloola jeesinga nyaawa, gwayeeshsha saawa, “Iing'uchchi sugoochcheanduumeemba ng'anyiinagi abeeda sugoochcheandumeeni ea maygahuuweada, nea gheeda dardaawaat gayghoabeada.
Ak eara Shattaani ibalaksa ak gang'uchchi geaw, abeeda sugoochcheandumeedaannyi gaygamajeegiittaan? Ak goorukuttaydiin gideaba aniini gearuutti meangeenda aba uurda Belseebuuli?
Ama iyearuutti meangeenda aba uurda Belsebuuli, diibigeagwa goruuttiideawa ng'eaha? Aba sareani gaygoorgweakseegwa fugeagwa.
Ama iyearuutti meangeenda aba uurda Aseetta abeeda ghoanalli gideaba sugoochcheandumeeda Aseetta nihissegwa.
Gheeda ng'edeeda hoauur, biissa gwandeawa dabitta, iifur gheannyi, halanjeadaannyi sean gaygaba hoyyoo;
ak geaghus iiweesa siida burdeawa uurda ak ghabwar ea ghwajoar, abeeda gayghoareat dabittaannyi sean bea ng'uchcheeda, ak gwalakkiisa fugaaschi.
Siida meandeayeewani washteanyu gil, nea dea meaweamuudayeewani goodearriida.
“Meang'nyeandeenda iiritteawa siida gwaneaydooschi aba ng'eanyiida manda beega gagaseada heechchea gafuufa; raay gwayi, ‘Gaydabiiksa gheenyu ealeabu.’
Iihitta ghwadaa nea siippuus ak ea sittamdaam.
Iidaaktunu gayghamwaghaada meangeenda ispwa munyasseewa niny muuchchi, ak gaweay goobiida jeedida; ak giibindeaba siitta gajeamuy ea ghwanaawa diitta ghayi bea mwadiin.”
Damandida duuw gabaloolean, ghwajaat ghuut gatmu aba jeedeaba emeetta nea gwayeeshsha, “Ghang'wana jeeda jiilneey ea gidinga ireeri!”
Hean gwayeeshsha, “Ghang'wana fukka iiy ng'asheega Aseetta nea ghoang'waayiin!”
Iiduw nea nibassa geat emeettuw, gwayeeshsha, “Jeachcheeng'su jeachcheenga munyas gil; gaseadayi gwadeagooda ak ea manda gwadeagooda, jea ehhiimsa geaghus gwadeagooda ghayi bea Yoona.
Gida ghayi waseatta Yoona gwadeagooda aba heeda fuga Ninawi, ea gichchea ghoawaatta Balleanda Siida gil aba jeachcheeng'su.

Gatmooda was sugoochcheanda leabu Wilooda ng'eanyiida biyeara gayghwahidu eaweeda jea ergweaksiina fugeaba jeachcheeng'su ak gaygoorgweaksa; niny gwaleabu heeshsheagi ak ghwaan goleeysiit weaghumeeda Sulemaani, nea hiji ging'ulayi, gwanda dea haweewa Sulemaani.
Gay ghapka fuga Ninawi eaweeda girgweaksiindeaba jeachcheeng'su ak gaygoorgweaksa; nea gwaduukkuuna ng'asheega iiyiiy ng'asheega rukkwiisa Yoona, nea ging'ulayi, aba hiji gwanda dea haweewa Yoona.
“Manda siida jea ghoayeat gheaboong'nyeanda ak ghwayiin heeda funyaat ghana gwadukteawa dahuuda, iissa geayiin uhuuda ghamarda ak abeeda fuga buwa gah gayghwadaa weeshinda.
Gheaboong'nyeanda saseeda gheang'da; gheang'daang'u iimiy abeeda eara saseadaang'u gaygwanda heedeesh; ama abeeda amasnu, abeeda saseadaang'u gwanda jeeda misaneeda.
Asi amilmiliitta adiiduw ghoaw weeshinda mida jeadaang'u misaneeda.
Asi saseadaang'u sean iimida weeshinda nea manda hiji misana, gaygaweeshiit saseadaang'u sean, gawuurji gilabwaanyi gheaboong'nyeanda aba weeshindaannyi.”
Damani duugabaloolean, gaguursa siyagi was Farisaayu ghwahidu gheannyi gweagiischi, gawa ak gweagiischi.
Ghahamng'eanyi Farisayajeandida iidaa gweagiischi nea miigoohuun geadi.
Gwayeeshsha Ng'uttamiida niny, “Agooga Farisayajeega iissa gohhuunnyi badayda bayookta ea dea gweeriida, nea jeesinngeagwa ghwannyiit mareanghumeeda ea munyinnda.
Fuga dasheahi! Dea sin gea jarooda miidea sin eara geaba jihii?
Asi oattawa haleanjeeda sisappa geadi bea ghadoweeda bea jih; abeeda gayghammiidu haleanjeessean aba heedeang'wa.

Asi Farisayajeega ashageada! Agooga aba gideaba ghoattaydi aba jeeda gilattamanamughuush bea haleanjeedeang'wa iissa ghoattaydi akkaleala, aba seenga hamuumayga ea sooktayda ea seenga suuk bea nyeanyiida, nea ghoanung'waadi ng'asheega doobiiweadi ea bariinyeega Aseetta; ng'asheesu gammiiseegwa sinooda, nea maroosseegwa ng'asheega suurja.
Farisayajeega ashageada! aba gideaba ghoabwariinyi oppitpiidana horgajeega madeeda aba jeeda gealga sinnealshachcheewa nea geekkeattooscheeweegwa aba naada.
Ashageada! Aba gideaba nowuurjeewi bung'eadinga mwadaajiida, sik badahuukka buuneeda nea mwanala.”
Ghwasha siyagi aba diinagoodiga ak gwayeeshsha, “Ginealshoochcheanda, iininyaashtunu ea ning'eawweasa eara aseasa.”
Hean gwayeeshsha, “Eara agooga diinagoodiga ashageada! Aba gideaba goossareenayi buuneeda sareenda meammu easaar, nea agooga ea mwoasadi sareeni eara aba monneenagi.
Ashageada! Aba gideaba goosnayi bung'eedinga sibanga nea ghweanigeagwa ea fuga ghayi nuus gil.
Nea agooga gowoschi muushoodiga gideaba ghoamwaschi gadiyeeda ghweanigeagwa, aba gideaba saawa gwanuus, ak goosinnyi agooga bung'eadinga nyaawa.
Ak gwayi weaghuumeeda Aseetta, ‘Gaydeajeakta sibanga ea giijasoodiga ak gaygwanuuseada mwatkwa nea geesawan,’
nea foojeanda sibanga sean, geahhiida ghang'eada dea sisna sindeetta ng'eanyiida, ak gajeegasa aba heedeaba jeachcheeng'su,

ghang'eada gihiideayda foojeanda Habiili ea gagul foojeanda Sakkariya, ghayi sinuuksa dageascheeda heeda wagiida ea heeda Ghaydiit. Asi humwa gil geayeeshshineegwa, gajeegasa aba heedeaba jeachcheeng'su.
Diinagoodiga ashageada! Aba gideaba nogeandi gissittinna gidaghuutta fughareeda, nea agooga ea miyooweayeena gah, nea fuga weay gah eanoakghuumnyi.”
Iiduw nea ghabeawa hoowa, gwaneaweesa muuchchi ng'oorshoodiga ea Farisayajeega ak geasassat nea geennyeari ng'asheega saang'a,
geebassa nea geegasa ng'asheanda ramwasaat jea gwaleabu ghuuttaanyi.
Damandida bwadeewa geat emeeda nyiit sagalamnyoojiga ea goolleabi geadiin hean gwayeeshsha niny ginealangaaschi, “Afura geat aba hamirayda fuga Farisaayajeega was gimmiitunodeaba geadiin.
Gilinyoo eedukutta gajeanung' ghwadaajiit, ghana dea funyaat jea ea mwajeanal.
Eara ng'asheega obalooli aba jeeda misaneeda, gajeayiiy aba heedeesh, nea gea omeang'shi aba ghoorajeega gajearukkwiida aba iheenga ghoorajeega.”
“Fuga eaduupcheewi, geayeennyi adoawwalli fiisu ammu gwanuus saseedean, ama ng'atta ea manda gil nuut ammu gwasiniin.
Gaydamiin gheang'deang'wa aba dea jea oawwala, diitta ama nuusiin, ghoammu gwajaksa jeeda duwayda mamissean; asaha geayeennyi oawala niny!
Neada udabwaraadaji muut meesheahhideawana heelaji iyeenya? Ak ea manda dea jea gwaroosa Aseetta eara akkalealla.
Eara buudeesu bea iheengeagwean siyiida sean. Asi adoawwalli ng'eang'i, ghoang'waaneewi agooga udabwaradajeega saang'a.”
“Ak geayeeshshiineegwa gilinyoo ea siida gil nyoo ghamwasan aba madeeda buuneeda, eara niny gayghamwas Balleanda Siida aba madeeda malaykajeega Aseetta;
nea siida heawanaan aba madeeda buuneeda gajeaheawa niny aba madeeda malaykajeega Aseetta.
Siida wassean rugu ng'asheega munyas appadayda Balleanda Siida gajeesamsa; nea siida ang'eawi Gurorooda Ghaydiit ea majeesamsa.
Ama deeppa eayadeagwa ghooriida sinnealshachcheewa ea fuga ahaaghwa ng'eanyiida ea madeeda gea mideawa gheambalmeeda, ea adoohirbabannyi aba gichchea ashaayda ea ng'asheega jea arukutta;
aba gideaba gayghoanaleagwa Gurorooda Ghaydiit gichchea arukutta aba damandideani.”
Ak gwayeeshsha Siyagi aba jeedeaba eemeetta, “Ginealshoochcheanda, rukusiina oorjeeda iyya gagwalnean haleanjeeda jea dahearan.”
Gwayeeshsha niny, “Siida, ghwayiinan ng'eaha doaw siichchea goheeldoscheegwa ghana siida jea gwalakkuneegwa haleanjeeda?”
Ak gwayeeshsha saawa, “Afra geat aba geawunda gheang'da; aba gideaba eaweega siida manda jeeda haleanjeeda saang'a mideawa.”
Gwarukuteawa gwarukusa saawa galeega nea gwayeeshsha, “Ghayi madamnyeamba siisi was meanang'oochcheanda ghwaheas muuchchi;
hean gootteemshi nea gwayi, ‘Gaydasin naaha aba gideaba muttandeawa heechchaadayiin boogeasu?’
Iiduw gwayi, ‘Gaydasindunu: gaydanyarjeaweada gijigoonngeasu ak geasinnyi suuk geahees; ak gaydayiin boogeasu ea haleanjeedeanyu sean.’
Ak gay dayeeshsha geaw, ‘Ea jeedeanyu, ginndeawi haleanjeesaang'a miyaas idiing'deaysi geaw aba gweannyeekka saang'a, fuufa, agiischeena, lesheena, ak gihoosani.’
Ak gwayeeshsha Aseetta niny, ‘Rageananeeda! Aweani geegasa eaweegaang'u; abeeda haleanjeeda idiiwusi geaw gay gaba ng'eaha?’”
Asi nii giduurji siida adiiwwiisa geaw gheaseeda, “Nea meabarursiina gea Aseetta.”
Hean gwayeeshsha ginealangaaschi, “Asi geayeeshshineegwa, adoodeawiissi eaweegeagwa gajayaaga naah, ea gichchea okkwealana sasanuukkeagwa.
Aba gideaba eaweega ghwalaabwa hoowa hamiitta ak eara saseeda ghwalaabwa hoowa hang'weakka.
Ng'ulla udaghuuh: mahissiida nea malachcha, ea mandeawana gijigoonga, ghana gudihoojiga ak ghoarear Aseetta saawa. Ghoang'waneawi agooga muuchchi dariidakka!
Ng'eaha aba agooga ammu goodeawiit geaw ak ghoahat geawunda aweagaaschi earea geattinagi?
Asi imoammuusi eara ng'asheanda mwanang'; ghwasaan anda gonneayi geat aba ng'asheega suurja.
Ang'ulla deakghweeda gidabuwaanda; ea magadiydooschi nea mamanmanna; ak geayeeshshineegwa, eara Sulemaani aba jeeda baruureagaaschi sean miigookkwealsheatta deakghweeni.
Asi iyakkwealsheesiindunu Aseetta deakghweeda madameega mida askweareeni ama numuji ea sihisa jeeda duwayda, heappi maygwasinneegwa muuchchi agooga, ea fuga manang'i masawi!
Asi adootteawiichchi iheengeagwa aba gassooda gichchea ayaaga ghana gichchea oaleaha.
Aba gideaba emoojiga muunda ng'eanyiida gagaaseadayyi haleanjeeni; ak ghwanal Ghweandeang'wa gideaba googasayi.
Anyoo ghanyi agassa sugoochcheandumeeda Aseetta ak suuh abeeda gajeehheaneegwa.
“Adoabealli agoogeeda ng'ay, aba gideaba gagasa Ghweandeang'wa gideaba gahaguuw gagoneegwa sugoochcheandumeeda.

Ashaayda haleanjeeda ondeawi ak ghoattaydi haleanjeeda sisappa geadi bea ghadooweeda; asissina geat shageeniga mawoosiitta, gheaseeda mayghoashoay aba humng'eeda heeda may gwaneekkiissa mareanghweanda, heeda mayghwaak eara muguyga.
Aba gideaba heeda mida gheaseadaang'u heechchea goobiida guroroadaang'u.
“Arada mananuunatkeagwa nea ghoanung' ghwayeat gheaboonyangeagwa,
awuurjeewana fuga furda siida haw jea gabiikna nyeangiida, aba gideaba ibiigu ak gagulgul gidaghuut geebay ejeassa.
Ghang'wana soomjookka hiitta ghweanda nyaawa nea ghoang'wearuun; aba huumwa geayeeshshineegwa, gaygwaradiischi ak gagoneegwa hamitta, nea gagadiyeeseegwa.
Iihidu buguusta eaweeda ghana beashatta, ak ghwahidu nea gwasindunu, abeeda ghang'wana soomjoosu.
Asi anala ng'asheanji, gideaba siida bea gheeda inyeeda gayghwanal damanda jea ghwahinna mareanghweanda gayghoang'wearu, mayghamwas gideaba gajeenyarja gheannyi.
Asi agooga awosa hidaat aba gideaba damanda moorarsiini gayghwahidu Balleanda Siida.”
Gwayeeshsha Betro, “Ng'uttamiida, ng'asheesu igalli geadiin girukuneasa aseasa akghwahidi ghana irukusi eara buuneasean?”

Hean gwayeeshsha Ng'uttamiida, “Gajea ng'eaha gil was haghweadoochcheanda doabiiwaat biissa ea bwaraawuh, jea ghoahaaghwa gheannyi nea ghoadaw siida haw goombal, ak ghoadaw buuneeda gichcheaghwaak aba damandaanyiin?
Ghang'wana soomjeanda jea gabiigu siida haw ak ghwahiitta nea gwasindunuun.
Aba huumwa geayeeshshineegwa gayghwanung' goombal haleanjeedaannyi sean.
Ama eeshsha geaw soomjeandida aba jeadaannyi, nishing'da siida haw aba hinnooda, ak ghoang'eat bayiiga soomjeandidean was headiga ea gadeemga, ak gweagiischi nea gwaleeshi ak gaboogit,
gaygabiigu siitta haw bea soomjeandida eaweeda mararsiina ea damanda mwanala. Gayghwaaga ghoorjooda ak ghwayiin hijagi sea fuga miidobiiweadi.
Nea soomjeanda nal gidabwariiy siida hawiin ak ea mwang'aabwa geaw nea masna gidasubwariiyiin, gajeabwar muuchchi.

Nea siitta mwanalaan ak gwasin gida miisa bayiigean, gajeabwar gil mwanang'. Gilinyoo eattaw gasaang'a aba headaannyi gajeegasa gasaang'a nea dea siittaw ghoahaghwa gasaang'a muuchchi, aba headaannyi gajeegasa gasaang'a ea ghwanawda.
“Aniini ghaawunnyi dajaksa beasta jeeda ng'eanyiida; ak gidabal ea ning'atta giiyeetta!
Ak gwanda giibattiisanda miisa gideaba gajeeppattiisanan ea eaghus anihiit!
Agooga ghoaghanyi gili awunnyi deadu hoyyoo jeeda ng'eanyiida? Manda, Geayeadu dardeayda;
ghang'eada ghamneawa aba jeeda gheedassagi gaygwanda fii muut dardaawaat samwagu fuurji iyyeenya nea gafuurji iyyeenya gea assamwagu;
gayghwadarda ghweanda ea ballanda ea balleanda ea ghwaan, ak ghwadarda gheamatta ea huda ea huda ea ghamwaat, nea ghwadarda ghamasiyeeda ea gatmooda ballanda ea gatmooda balleanda ea ghamasiyeeda.”
Ak gwayeeshsha emeeda, “Iyoadaayi shamooghooda aba heeda biyeara, deagheatta gooyeennyi ‘Ghwaan roopta;’ ak ea huumwa gil ghwahidu.
Inyeessa iighuudu jeammeeda leabu wiilooda ng'eanyiida ghayeawa goyeennyi, ‘Gayghwaraanya daknooda;’ ak gwasa.
Fuga ammiittu geat! Ghoanalli arukuni giduurji ng'eanyiida ea humng'eeda ak ea moanaldaniin arukuni damani bea ghamneawean?”
“Ghwasaan anda agooga moammusi alaja girgweageedeang'wa nea gobeayi geadi?

Aba gideaba ideayeewi siida ahaaktaneey madeeda siida laja girgweaguutka, hiji duu andeewana naweedean ghang'wana goduupchi ada ghwaannyi ea ghoahiittaneey madeeda siida laja girgweaguutka, ak ghwayiinnyi siida laja girgweaguutka geattinga shirikkarajeanda ak gwajakseey shirikkarajeanda ghealooniga.
Aba humwa geayeeshshineey mayritteawana ghealooniga ea eaghus ea niidaydi helajeanda huydean.”
Abeeda damandida gwanda Fiisu rukusa iitta fuga Galilaaya aguuyi Bilatto foojeanda nyaawa sea haleanjeeda sisabwa geadi bea ghadooweeda.
Ghwasha nea gwayeeshsha, “Agooga ghoaghanyi gili fiisu bea Galilaayaan gaba riing'a muuchchi ea ghang'al fuga Galilaaya suurja, aba gideaba gwasawaneattunu?
Geayeeshshineegwa, Manda; imoduukkuunani ring'eegeagwa eara agooga gajooshshealda saawa.
Ghana fukka attamassis bea Siloamu meewa ing'adeesa gheeda geawiin, ghoaghanyi gideaba fiisu niramwas muuchchi ea ghang'al buuneasean abiitta Yerusaleemu?
Manda; geayeeshshineegwa, imoduukkuunaani eara agooga gajooshshealda gidashealda saawa.”
Goobaloola galeega nea gwayeeshsha, “Sih ghayi gwandeawa shabogheechcheanda aba jeeda madamnyandaannyi bea msabiibu, iiduw gawa gagasa haghweega ak ea mwanyasa eara akkalealla.
Gwayeeshsha siida fur madamnyeanda, ‘Nii gweaydeaba samwagu gil nea geahittu dagasa haghweegeaba geedi ak ea mwanyasi eara akkalealla. Laksiina ng'eanyi, aba gideaba gaygweaksa naaha uurda sigeeda?’
Ghwasha niny nea gwayeeshsha, ‘Siida mureeda, eanung'waada jeemba gwaanyagi, ghanyi dabarsa nea ghayiinnyi sururuuda.
Iideeppa gweanyiin gwaji haghweega abeeda ghwahiit; iideeppa ea maji, abeeda gilaksi ng'eanyi.’”
Hean eaweechcha nea gonealshi aba jeeda ghoriida sinnealshachcheewa eaweeda sabatto.
Abeeda gwanda gatmooni sinyuut ng'uttooschi meangeenda nea niiluul gweannyeew damassis, nea nighuumwa ea eamudu ghoammu gwadiiw geaw.
Daa Yeesu gatmoodida gaguursa ak gwayeeshsha, “Iyya siihaapnyi aba geeyooni ibearjewiin.”
Ghwayiin geattingaaschi uhuudeaba gatmoodida, deagheatta gwadiiw geaw ak gwaduumsheesha Aseetta.

Ghwanyareas siida haw ahaaghwa ghooriida sinnealshachcheewa aba gideaba Yeesu ghoahaap siida eaweeda Sabatto, hean gwayeeshsha buuneeda, “Gondeawi eawooji laah jea asnana gadiyeeda, asi apkaani eahhabeagwa askwearjoojusu, ak ea adoapkaannyi eaweeda Sabatto.”
Hean ghwasha Ng'uttamiida nea gwayeeshsha, “Fuga ammiittugeat! Aba agooga gwanda siida maygwajeassa heaydaannyi ghana digeadaannyi aba seammooda, eaweeda Sabatto ak gawa ghoalleayda?
Ama ghamneawa gatmooni, was hudeaba Abrahaamu nirada Shattaani gweannyeew damassisiin, mammisiina eettin aba ghealoonigaaschi eaweechcheanji bea Sabattohiini?”
Rugu ng'asheesu ghabwaspwas sean; gea gwachchi sheang'nyi niny nea gahoosan buuneeda sean aba ng'asheega gheambiideadi sin niny.
Ghoanyaashta nea gwayeeshsha, “Ghamneawa sugoochcheandumeeda Aseetta gawuurji sea naaha? Ak gaydagalla naaha?

Gawuurji ghajilleanda geetta suguura haradaali geanu sih ak gwahista aba jeeda madamnyanndaanyi mwanang, ak gwardu ak gwaheedu ea ghoaw geetta, inyeessa gwasin damealga ea gwasissa dariidakka ghoorajeega nyaawa.”
Iiduw gabiikta gichcha gwayeeshsha, “Gaydagala naaha sugoochcheandumeeda Aseetta?
Gawuurji sea hamiireeda geanu gatmooda ak ghwayiin jeemba sooscheew samwagu bea dearanga, ak ghwanung' ghaghuut geat sean.”
Hean ghang'eat gawa nea gwasik mujiinajeega ea gharang'weakka, gonealshi nea gagal Yerusaleem.
Ghoanyaash siida nea gwayeeshsha, “Ng'uttamiida fuga jea ghwalalaan gajeang'ayi?” Hean gwayeeshsha saawa,
“Amilmiliitta ak goosikchi gidaghuutta mwanang'; aba gideaba geayeeshshineegwa, gaygagasa fuga saang'a gwasik ak ea mayghoammu.

Gayghwahidu damanda jea ghang'eat siida bea gheeda ak ghwajap gidaghuutta, hean goobissi amiinaada ak googulgulli gidaghuutta, nea gooyeennyi, ‘Ng'uttamiida, jasseasa.’ Ak gayghwasha niny nea gwayeeshsha, ‘Mwaanali heedooleabu.’
Ak gajayeeshshina, ‘Aseasa ghayi geembuttoschchi nea geleeshachchi sea ang'iing'i nea ginealshachchi aba mujiineedeanya.’
Ak gaygwayeeshsha, ‘Geayeeshshineegwa, mwaanali heedooleabu, ang'amwana heedeanyu, agoogeeni sina ng'asheega munyasiin!’
Abeeda gayghwahidu shookka ea giwiirrooda geeshatka, iyoadaayi Abrahaamu ea Isakka ea Yakkobo ea sibanga sean aba jeeda sugoochcheandumeeda Aseetta nea agooga ea sihisaneegwa jarooda.
Ak gay ghapka Fuga jea gwaleabu heeda ghayeawa ea heeda biyeara, ea wilooda ng'eanyiida ghayeawa ea wilooda ng'eanyiida biyeara, ak gaygweagiischi aba jeeda sugoochcheandumeeda Aseetta.
Asi ang'ulla fuga huydean gayghoaw fuga madeeda, nea fuga madeeda gayghoaw fuga huydean.”
Aba damandida ghapka headaanyi Farisayajeesu ng'ay ak gwayeeshsha, “Ng'amwana hiji, aba gideaba Heroode gagasa gwanuusnyi.”
Ng'atta gwayeeshsha saawa, “Aweayeena ak gooyeeshshi fureayootta, ‘Ng'ulla askwareani ea numuji gaydearuutta meangeenda nea ghaahaapchi fuga miyeani, eaweedeaba samwagu gaydaahiit gadiyeedeanyu.
Eara gwasa gammiisean dang'ng'waay naweedeanyu askwareani ghanea numuji ghanea niseerida; aba gideaba mammiisiina gideaba gajeenuuksa sibaneeda heeda mawosa Yerusaleemu.’

Ea Yerusaleemu, Yerusaleemu, gibarayi sibanga nea guftayi aba lagheanga fuga siichcheagu headaang'u! Neagasay niba hada damuughuushta diibigaagu gidamguurriida nghaghooda dayeagaaschi aba jeesinga meang'eagaaschi, ak ghoaheawi!”
Ang'ulla, ghaheang'wa sinung'usa heeda. Ak geayeeshshineegwa, maygudu abiikta adaahaan ea eaghuus ayeena, “Sibadiischeesa siida wuna gheawunga Ng'uttamiida!”
Eaweechcha nea gwanda sabatto gawa gweagiischi aba gheappa siyagi ambaliischi bea Farisayajeega, hean geeng'ulla niny.
Asi ng'ulla, gwanda madeeda siisi lolloohani saseeda.
