Gobalool Yeesu diinagoodiga ea Farisayajeega, nea gwayeeshsha, “Heappi ghwadoabiiwi gideaba gajeahhaap siida eaweeda Sabatto, ghana manda?”
Hean geasiinda. Ghoang'ng'waay siidida ak ghoahaap, ak gwasiksa gawa.
Ak gwayeeshsha saawa, “Gajea ng'eaha aba jeedeang'wa, jea ghoabitta, balleandaannyi ghana heaydaannyi jeeda healadeeda, eaweeda Sabatto jea ea maygabay gwalealu?”
Ea measha ng'asheanji.
Iiduw gwaruksa Yeesu buuneeda gidagala fuga siguush, iidaa gidiissa ghwaloatta buuneeda hoorgajeegeaba mwadi, ak gwayeeshsha,
“Tiguurneey siida wassean nyeangiida, adiipteadawi hoorgeda madeeda, aba gideaba gwadeeppa ea siguush siida siwwal gheang'da mawuurjeeweey;
ak ghwahidu siida guusheegwa ak gwayi, ‘Assiipta goopteada siisi aba hiji,’ abeeda gajuna apteadawana horgeedeaba bwadaw nea gibwaspwasaadi.

Asi isiguushnyi, guwi ak giipteadi aba hoorgajeegeaba bwadaw, iihidu siida guurneey gaygwayi, Siida eaduupchcheewi beenni hiji bea mwadiin, abeeda gaynyasa mureeda aba madeeda buuneessean imbuuchcheewi.
Aba gideaba siisi nyoo goodiing'u geaw gajeahiing'u nea dea hiing'u geaw gajeettiing'u.”

Ng'atta gwayeeshsha siitta guush ninyiin, “Iidaydi hamitteaba askweari ghana ghweelmeeda, adiguushi fuga iduupcheewi ghana oorjooga geamadu ghana buweadeegaagu ghana giischeawdaang'u was meanang'oodiga, gajiiduw gaguushnyi saawa gawalu guurshtida ghayi ittaang'uun.
Eaweeda isini ghwelmeeda aba gheang'u abeeda giguursi fuga barbari, ea gea ghanyeatta ea gea badoojiga, ea gea ng'oowi,
abeeda gaynyasa ng'wanooda, aba gideaba fiisu mandeawana gichchea gawalneey. Ak gaygawalneey Aseetta eaweetta dunnooda fuga doobiiweadi.”
Iiy Siagi bea jeeda fuga ammbuuchchi gwayeeshsha, “Ghang'wana siida jea ghwaak mukkatte aba jeeda sugoochcheandumeeda Aseetta!”
Ghwasha ak gwayeeshsha niny, “Siyagi ghayi gwasin ghweelmeeda haw, ak gaguush fuga saang'a;
hitta damanda ghweelmeeda goojeakta soomjeanda gaguush rabastannyi nea gwayeeshsha, ‘Abeenni aba gideaba haleanjeessean nihit.’
Hean ghabwar badooji sean. Ak gwayeeshsha dea madeeda siitta, ‘Nashaayi madamnyeanda ak gaydawa dadaa, geamuscheey samsean.’
Gwayi niirja, ‘Nashaayi heew damanamughuush bea barooda, ghamneawa geawi danaal, geamuscheey samsean.’
Gwayi nirja, ‘Nagheannyi gatmooda ak ea maydaammu dahidu.’

Iiduw gawa soomjeanda ghoadaw siidaannyi haw itteaba ng'asheesu seanin. Ak ghwanyareas siida bea gheeda ak gwayeeshsha soomjeandaannyi, ‘Lamwaja una jeeda naweadinga hees ea gea manang'i bea mujinin, ak giyeadu fuga barbari ea gea ghanyeatta ea gea badoojiga ea gea ng'oowwi.’
Ak gwayeeshsha soomjeanda, ‘Siida mureeda, gida ijeakteawanean nahiichchi ak gheeda ea miighwannyiit.’
Hean gwayeeshsha Siitta hawiin soomjeanda, ‘Ritta jarooda una guyeeda naweadinga ea moonghajeega ak gidiing'si buuneeda ghapka gah ghwannyiit gheanyu.
Aba gideaba geayeeshshineegwa, manda eara siyagi aba jeedeaba fukka sigushiin dea jea gwasamu ghwelmedeanyu.’”
Hean gaweay emeeda nea goodeay niny; ak Ghwayam geaw ak gwayeeshsha,
“Siida iihidu heedeanyu nea mwasta ghwaan ea ghaamwaat ea gatmoadaannyi ea diibigaaschi ea oorjooga ghamwaat ea haweega ghaamwat, nea amwasta eaweagaaschi mwoammu ghoaw ginealaneedeanyu.
Siida mwaada behiidaannyi ak gweadu geeshteanyu, mwoammu ghoaw ginealaneedeanyu.
Heappi gajea ng'eaha aba agooga gasa ghwadeas gheeda haw sikkeawiit, ak ea meapteada gwayiida nea goodeen haleanjeeda jea ghwadeakta ghwadaa ea jea gwadeay?
Aba gideaba gajiiduw gwasin sindeetta, ak ghwaraay ghoahiit, ak abeeda gwajuuga fukka sean dahiin,
nea geeyi, ‘Siisi ghoang'eat ghuutta deekshooda ak ghwaraay ghoahiit.’

Ghana gajea ana sugoochchean gil jea iigasa gawa gang'uchchi sea niirja, jea ea mayghanyi goopteada, ak gootteemshi ghwadaa ea ghoammu ninyi sea fii sagalamnyooji damanamughuush, ea jea ghoammu gang'uchchi sea niirja mideawa fii sagalamnyooji diktam?
Ak idaa gideaba mwoammu gabay gojeakta buuneeda gabay gagasa hoyyoo nea gudeasheagi.
Asi gwasnu eara aba agooga, siida manung'usiina heeda haleanjeedaannyi sean mideawa mwoammu ghoaw ginealaneedeanyu.
“Balang'da aamiy, ak balang'da iinuhutta samneeda, ea manda gichchea ekkuuyi gabiiksa mattawanda?
Biissa ea mudugwarachchi gil earaba ng'eanyiida ghana raghwatta, inyeessa gageanu buuneeda ak gohiisa jarooda. Siida mideawa iidiga ea dayiing'shi.”
Eaweechcha gaweesa Fuga ang'ng'oonyi gwaadi ea fuga ring'eega gooleeysiit niny.
Hean ghoaniikghi Farisayajeega ea ng'oorshoodiga nea gwayi, “Siisi gaguursa fuga ring'eega ak gombuuttooschi.”
Hean gwarukusa galeega nea gwayeeshsha,
“Nii gajea anasihi aba jeedeang'wa mideawa gisil bughala, ama roat agi ea maygwanung'usa heeda giikka was seedaam adamwashshageashiin, ak gawa dareabeetta gagasa diitta roadiin ea ghwanyas?”
“Amaduuw nea ghwanyas, ghwayiin ghattaannyi nea gahoosan.
Amaduw nea ghwahitta gheannyi gaguursa fuga duupchi ea fuga ascheayi ak gwayeeshsha, ‘Ahoosaana sea aniini aba gideaba naanyaaschi gisilleandeanyu roat.’

Asi gwasnu, ak geayeeshshineegwa, gaygwanda hooseaneega muuchchi aba humng'eada appadayda siyagi mideawa ring'eeda ak gwaduukkuna, maygawuurji fukka was seedam ea damwashshageesh doobiiweadi magassa duukkuunoodean.”
“Nii gajea ana gatmu, mideawa shiliingaji damanamughuush, amaroat akkalealla ea maygorabeat gheaboonyaneeda, ak goobuus gheeda ak gagasiischi muuchchi ea ghwaanyasi?
Amaduw nea ghwanyas gaguursa fuga duupchi ea giischeawdaannyi ak gwayeeshsha, ‘Eehoosana easasean aba gideaba nanyaschi shilingajeandida gwachchi roadiin.’
Asi gwasnu, ak geayeeshshineegwa, gaygahoosan malaykajeega Aseetta appadayda siida assagi mideawa ring'eada iduukkuuna.”
Hean gwayeeshsha, “Ghayi gwanda siisi mideawa ballooji iyyeenya;
gwayeeshsha damwanang' ghwaan, ‘Bwaabwa, gwalnean haleanjeeda miisean.’ Ng'atta gagwalsa duwaaw halleanjeeda nyaawa.
Ama miighang'atta eawoojusu saang'a ghang'eat balleanda mwanang' ghwashaayda haleanjeedaannyi sean ak gawa bareannyeekka ea gawa ng'eanyiida sheagi, hitta ghwasaksakta haleanjeedaanyi.
Geeyi bwak ama niduulu haleanjeedaannyi sean ghang'eat geejeeda haw aba ng'eanyiitta, ak eara niny gaba fuga gasa gichcheaghwaak.
Iiduw gawa gadiyeeda aba hichpa siyagi bea ng'eanyiitta, ak ghwanung' siitta gawa madamnyeandaannyi ghoarear ukkurmajeega.
Iiduw Gagasa ghwaak hamitta ak ukkurmajeega ak ea manda siisi adaw gil.
Jeeng'u aba Jeadaannyi gwayi, ‘Gwadeannaan soomjooga agiischi aba ghaheanya, ea ghwalach hamichchoojiga nea aniini gayghabwaran jalooda aba hiji!’
Gaydang'eat dawa heeda ghweandeanyu ak geayeeshshi niny, ‘Bwaabwa neadiiysi humng'eeda ea madeadaang'u;
ak ea mammisean gideaba gajeegureewean jeeptaang'u, nung' dawurji fiisu was soomjoogeaba gheang'uun.’
Ghang'eat ak gabiikta heeda ghwaan. Hean nea gudu ea dildeaweat ghoang'wearda ghwaan ama daa ghabwayda ak ghafwach ghwadeapta nea ghwasam gheatta.”
“Hean gwayeeshsha Balleandida niny, ‘Bwaabwa aniini neadiiysi humng'eeda ea madeadaang'u, mammiisean gideaba gajeegureewean ballandang'u.’
Ghwalamda Ghwaan ak gwayeeshsha soomjoogaaschi, ‘Alamwaja ayeanni hang'dida miyyiin ak gookkwealsi, nea gooshshuupchi moonneeda ghuniida nea goolleapsi eara geekka;
ak gooyeadu meaydida riishaadiin ak goonuuschi, eayaaga nea geehoosannyi;
aba gideaba balleanji iitteanyuun ghayi nimi, ak ghamneawa ea niduudu; ghayi niroat ak ghamneawa ea sinyas.’ Ak geebiissa eang'ng'eat hooseaneega.”
“Abeeda Oorjeadaannyi haw gwanda madamnyeanda, damani duugwandeawa naweeda nea niriiksa gheedean ghwayiiy ghuutta sarmeeda ea deangheeda.
Gaguursa soomjeanda ak ghoanyaashta nea gwayeeshsha, ‘Gwandaani hiji?’
Geeyeeshsha niny, ‘Nibiigu oorjeeda geamadu ak ea ninuus gweanu meayda riishaat aba gideaba nibiigu nea gudeamajeek.’
Ghwanyareas balleandida hawiin, ak ghaheawa gawa ghoah. Iiduw gwaritta ghwaan jarooda ak gamearmearani niny ghwaan ghoah,
ak ghwasha nea gwayeeshsha ghwaan, ‘Daa, aniini naaweachcheay gweannyeekka saang'a, nea mwoang'ng'wa danung'waada huumeandaang'u; nea migoonean eara dayeenda ak geahoosannyi sea fuga eaduupcheewi.
Ghamneawa nea ghwahidu balleanji iittaang'uun duulu haleanjeedaang'u sea gadeemga hiseadean ginuuksi meayda riishaat!’
Gwayeeshsha niny, ‘Balleandeanyu, ang'iing'i geendeaydooschi galagasean ak haleanjeeda eandeawi sean ea gaagu.
Ak gichcha iisihoosan ghwahit geeng'weala aba gideaba orjeeni bea geamaduun ghayi nimi, ak ghamneawa ea niduudu, ghayi niiroat, ak ea sinyas.’”

Gwayeeshsha ginealangaaschi, “Ghayi gwanda siyagi was meanang'ochcheanda nea gwandeawa haghweadoochcheanda ak iiduw geattaw meanang'oochcheandida iitta gidasaksaktaayda haghweadoochcheanda haleanjeedaannyi.

Gaguursa niny siidida ak gwayeeshsha, ‘Ng'asheesu eayiinyayi aba badaydaang'uun naaha? Goona iitta moonneeda haleanjeedeanyu bea haghweadoochcheandumeadaang'u, aba gideaba maygudu huuwa haghweadoochcheanda.’
Gwayeeshsha geaw haghweedoochcheanda, ‘Gaydasin naaha, aba gideaba siideanyu haw gagasa gageandeawaneani haghweadoochcheandumeeda? Meandeawani uurda jea dabwara ng'eanyi, ak ghaawalli musischchooda.
Ak ea nanyaschi gichchea dasin, ak abeeda ghwadeaptanaan buuneeda aba gealga nyawa isigeandeawanean haghweadoochcheanda.’
Iiduw Gaguursa fuga mideawa siileeniga siida haw ak gaguurriisiinagi ak gwayeeshsha siida madeeda, ‘Gindeawi siileeni deanaan bea siida haw?’
Gwayeeshsha, ‘Ghadeat bughala bea nagheeda.’ Hean gwayeeshsha niny, ‘Nukkwa siileadaang'u lamwaja apteada ak ging'waari haradam ea damanamughuush.’
Ng'atta gwayeesha nuut, ‘Ang'iing'i gindeawi siileeni deannaan?’ Gwayeeshsha, ‘Guniyaji bughala bea ngano.’ Gwayeeshsha niny, ‘Nukkwa siileadaang'u ng'waara seedaam.’
Gagwarsa Siida haw haghweadoochcheandida sina ng'asheega munyasiin, aba gideaba balloojigeaba ng'eanyiin eabareahi iheen aba jeedeaba rooproobang'su ea ghang'al fuga abiitta heedeesh.
Asi geayeeshshineegwa, asissiina geat roroochcheeda aba meanang'oochcheandumeeda mwadoabiiwa, ama ashealaneegwa gil, ghwadeaptaneegwa aba jeeda giibiinda manda muudeanooda.
Siida doabiiwaat aba halleanjeeda manang'i muuchchi gajeadoabiiwaat eara aba halleanjeeda heesi muuchchi; nea dea miidoabiiwaat aba haleanjeeda manang'i eara aba gea heesi gajea miidoabiiwaat.
Asi imoowosi dobiiweadi aba meanang'oochcheandumeeda mwadoabiiwa, gaygagooneegwa ng'eaha meanang'oochcheandumeeda huumwa?
Nea imoowosi doobiiweadi aba haleanjeemba sii nuut, gaygagooneegwa ng'eaha haleanjeetta was geagwa?

Manda soomjeanda jea ghoammu gagadiyeesa fiisu hees iyyeenya, aba gideaba gayghwasiit nii ak ghabwariiy nii, ghana ghoang'ng'waay geat sea nii ak gafool nih. Mwoammusi agadiiyeesiina Aseetta ea meanang'ochcheandumeeda.”
Iiduw nea ghwayiiy Farisayajeega ng'asheesu seaniin gwashka niny aba gideaba sawa ghabwariiy lappiya.

Ng'atta gwayeeshsha saawa, “Agooga goohindi geat gili oowoschi miyaas aba madeeda buuneeda, nea Aseetta ghwanal guroruunatkeagwa; nea gilinyoo goodiing'u geaw aba madeeda buuneeda, gayghoanyarees Aseetta.
Deaweedajeega ea sibanga ea gagul Yohaana; hean geerukkwiida Giijaasta miy bea sugoochcheandumeeda Aseetta, nea gaba siisi abwasaay geaw.
Gajeawussus ng'atteayda jea ghang'atta huumng'eeda ea ng'eanyiida, mayghwasam gideaba gayghwasuunya ng'ashaanjagi mwanang'a was deaweeda.
Siida wassean nung' gatmoadaannyi ak ghayi nuut siisi gamealuul, ak siida jea ghaghi gatmooda sunung' earada siisi gamealuul.”
“Ghayi gwaanda Meanang'oochchaanjagi akkweali hang'weakka oomng'i bea sheayeeda haw ak gwasna ghwelmeeda galagasean.
Nea abeeda gwanda ghuutteaba gheanyi siisi bwarbwar suguura Lasaaro, nea gwandeawa deanneaduutka saang'a,
inyeessa gagasa ghwaak lajanga abiittuuna heeda agiischeewa meanang'ochcheanda, nea inyeessa ghapka gudajeega gameera deanneaduutkaaschi.
Ghami siitta bwarbwariin, ak ghwaat malykajeega ea ghoahiitta madeeda Abrahaamu. Muchchu ghami eara meanang'oochcheandida ak geebuy;
gatgat ghaanyangaaschi meanang'ochcheanda nea gwanda heeda abiitta fuga nimewa nea gwanda jeeda hang'weeniidooda, ghwadaa Abrahaamu nea sheagi nea Lasaaro gwanda madeadaannyi.
Gaguurda nea gwayeeshsha, ‘Bwaabwa Abrahaamu, samsean ajeakni Lasaaro ghang'uda moanneadannyi jeeda beega, googarbiit ng'ushapteanyu aba gideaba geasawani aba jeedeappeasi.’

Gwayeeshsha Abrahaamu, ‘Balleandeanyu, apkaada gideaba ang'iing'i ninyasi haleanjeeda miyaas aba jeeda aweagaagu, nea Lasaaro ghwanyas gea munyas, ak ghamneawa niny geenung' ghahawda, nea ang'iing'i gindi jeeda hang'weanidooda.
Nuut gichcha, dageaschedeanya ea agooga ea siyiin ghalalayda haw, aba gideaba fuga gasa ghapka hooweani ondiin ea mayghoammu, nea eara fuga meatkwedeang'wa ea maygoogeaw heeda sindi.’
Hean gwayeeshsha, ‘Adabeeda ghweandeanyu, geamuscheey, ajeaksiina fuga ghaheanya,
aba gideaba geandeawi orjoogiyya muut, ereekusa amwapka eara saawa hiji bea hang'weanidoodean.’
Gwayeeshsha Abrahaamu, ‘Gwandeawa Muusa ea sibanga, nung'waada goolleeysiit saawa.’
Hean gwayeeshsha, ‘Manda ghweandeanyu Abrahaamu; inyeeda gabiiksa saawa siida leabu miyeeda, gaygwadukkuuna.’
Gwayeeshsha niny, ‘Iimealeeysiiniit Muusa ea sibanga, ea mayghamwas eara gabiiksa siida duunna miyeeda.’”
Ng'atta gwayeeshsha ginealangaaschi “Simsimda jea gweadu riing'eeda mayghwashiy hinnooda ak ea dashaageada siidida jea ghwanung' ghwahidu!
Gwachchi gayghang'wana siisi geerassa gheatta lagheaneeda sing'ealliida ak geejaksa jeeda basooda, mayghwasam gideaba gayghwanung' goodiiy siyagi aba jeedeaba suu manang'iin.
Afra geat; iyadiiy oorjeeda geamadu, gireekusi, idukkuuna gisamsi;
ama adiiyseey niba ispwa aba jeemba askwarjaanjagi, ak gabiikseey niba ispwa nea gwayi, ‘Neadukkuuni,’ Abeeda gisamsi.”
Gwayeeshsha Giijasoodiga Ng'uttamiida, “Aheaneasa masaweega.”

Gwayeeshsha Ng'uttamiida, “Inyeeda goondeawi masaweega deenna gheang'nyeanda geetta suguura haradaali, abeeda gajoammuusa ayeeshshiina meagheayeanda, ‘Loadaana ak geng'eapseey jeeda basooda,’ ak gayghoawal gheang'deang'wa.”
“Heappi gajea ng'eaha gil aba jeedeang'wa mideawa soomjeanda bwar ng'eanyi ghana ghoahaghwa gisilga, jea gwayeeshsha niny ibiikna madamnyeanda, ‘Lamwajaana beenni apteada agiischeena?’
Heappi maygwayeeshsha, ‘Sinnean gichcheadaak, radiischeena ak gigadiyeesean ea daahiit, agiischooda ea leeshooda, ak abeeda giyeagiischi nea gileeshi?’
Gaygabadiischeesa soomjeandida aba gideaba nisin gissiruksa?
Eara agooga gidowuurjeewi gil, iyoasinnyi gidasiyeeshshineegwa asna, gooyeeshshi geat, ‘Aseasa geewoschi soomjooga marachchi gil, geesinnyi gidamiseasa sinooda.’”
Iiduw nea gwanda naweeda gawa Yerusaleemu gwasik dageascheeda ng'eanyiida Samariya ea Galilaaya.
Geeyi bwak ama hitta jeemba gharang'agi gwaroonnyi sea fii damanamughuush beardooschi udamusuura, ak ghaminaada nea sheagi
Goojuur nea gwayi, “Yeesu, Siida haw, eaniyean bwaydaneasa.”
Daa saawa gwayeeshsha, “Aweayeena ohhiimsiina geat ashoohoodiga diineeda Yahuudi.” Damandida beawaan geammiidu.
Daa siiyagi aba jeannyaawa gideaba nihaap, gabiigu nea ghoaghambiit Aseetta aba ghuutta haw;
gobeedeaysa Siidida geeshanga Yeesu ak gabadischeesa. Nea siidida gaba emeeda Samariya.
Hean gwayi Yeesu, “Fuga gwachchi sihhaap adamanamughuush? Gea ashshageash gwandayeenu?.
Manda dea nibiigu ghoaghambiit Aseetta geaghuus rabascheanji?”
Ak gwayeeshsha niny, “Ng'eada una; gidahaapnyi masaweagaagu.”
Ng'atta ghoanyaash Farisayajeega nea gwayeeshsha, “Sugoochcheandumeeda Aseetta gayghwahidu eeju?” Ghwasha nea gwayeeshsha saawa, “Sugoochcheandumeeda Aseetta mayghwahidu nea geadahaan.
Ea manda siichchea gwayi, ‘Gwanda hiji!’ ghana ‘Hoowa!’ Aba gideaba ng'ulla sugoochcheandumeeda Aseetta gwanda jeesingeagwa.”
Hean gwayeeshsha ginealanga, “Gayghwahidu eawoojiga jea agasseena adaahana eaweechcheanjagi aba eawoojiga Balleanda Siida, ak ea mwajadaaha.
Ak gajeeyeeshshineegwa, ‘Ang'ulla gwanda hoowa!’ ghana ‘Ang'ulla gwanda hiji!’ Adooweayi, nea adooyaachchi geeshta nyaawa.
Aba gideaba gaygawuurji dadamandeeda aboong'na meatkweanagi bea humng'eeda ea ghwahitta meatkweeda niirja bea humng'eeda, ea gichchea gawuurji Balleanda Siida gil aba aweadaannyi.
Ak gayghanyi ghwanyas hang'weanidooda ammadeeda aba haleanjeessaang'a, nea gayghaheawa fiisu bea jeachcheeng'suun.
Ak gidaghayi uurji aba eawoojiga Nuhu, ea gichchea gawuurji gil aba eawoojiga Balleanda Siida.
Geeyeagiischi, nea geeleeshi, geegeeshshi, nea geegeena, ea ghwahiitta eaweeda weewa Nuuhu jeeda maleambooda, ghwahiing'aan roopta haw ak ghwalas uhudeaba sean.
Gaygawuurji gidaghayi uurji aba eawoojiga Luuttu, abeeda geyeagiischi nea geeleeshi, geasha nea geashayda, geehista, nea geedeekshi,
muchchu eaweeda ritteawa Luuttu Sodomean ghoaptu beasta wunda roopta leabu humng'eeda ak ghwalas uhuudeaba sean.
Nii gichchea gawuurji gil aba eaweeda jea eattaajiida Balleanda Siida.
“Eaweedida siida mida uhuuda gheeda nea gwanda haleanjeedaannyi jeeda gheeda, adaghwararang'aan gageanda; ak eara dea mida madamnyeanda ea adagabiikta bwadaw.
Oapkaada gatmooda Luuttu.
Siida wassean gasa ghoaghu aweagaaschi gaygahutta, nea dea hutteawi aweagaaschi gayghoaghu.
Geayeeshshineegwa eaweedida, gaygwandeayi fii iyyeenya aba bulaliida, ak gajeegeanda siyagi ak geenung'usa heeda nirja.
Gaygang'ealshi gadeem iyyeenya aba hijagi, gegeanda agi ak geenung'usa heeda niirja.” [
Gaygwanda fii iyyeenya madamnyeanda, ak gajegenda akkalealla, ak genung'usa heeda akkalealla.]
Ak geeyeeshsha niny “Eenu gil Ng'uttamiida?” Gwayeeshsha saawa, “Heeda mida guumeeda heeda jea gooweameesa madoonyaakka.”
Hean gwarukusa ng'asheega nea gagalla geat nea gagasa gideaba gaygammiisa sawa mooshta Aseetta galeagasean nea mapra.
Gwayeeshsha, “Aba jeemba mujiinajean gwanda Siisi laja girgweaguutka meawalla Aseetta nea maduuppa eara sii;
ak aba jeedeaba mujiineeni gwanda Gatmooni was masiinung'weanda, wuna headaannyi galeaga sean nea gwayeenniisa, ‘Weadaan nuung' danyas gidamiisean aba heeda weajoochcheandeanyu.’
Ea golla gaheewachchi, ammuchchu gwayeeshsha geaw, ‘Earea meawalli Aseetta ghana gheang'ba sihiin,
aba gideaba godeawiidan masiinng'weanji gaydaadaw gidagasa ea meabuuraan aba hittunooda heedeanyu.’”
Hean gwayeeshsha Ng'uttamiida, “Oalleaydiit ginnyaashta Siitta mii doabiiwaat laja girgweaguutkean.
Gajeyeena Aseetta mayghoadaw dobiiwnatta fugaaschi loossageaw ayyeawussa askweari ea eawa? Gayghwashing'da aba weetta nyaawa?
Geayeeshshineegwa, Gayghwalamwachi ghoadaw gidamiisa, nea Balleanda Siida ihiidu gayghwadaah masaweega aba jeeda ng'eanyiida?”
Iiduw gwaruksa galeega fuga hinda geat gilidobiiweadi nea gafool suurja.
“Ghayi gwanda headi iyyeenya siyeang'da gaweay ghamwaash Aseetta aba jeeda gheeda sibatta Aseetta, akkalealla Farisayajeanda gil nea niirja ea siida ang'ng'oonyi gwaadi.

Ghang'eat Farisayajeanda ak ghamwaashtunu Aseetta aba jeadaannyi, ‘Ea Aseetta, geabadischoweey aba gideaba aniini meawurjeewani buuneeda suurja, fuga areedi buuneeda haleanjeeda, ea fuga miidoobiiweadi, ghana fuga mealuuli, nea meawuurjeewani eara siisi ang'ng'oonyi gwadiin.
Aniini inyeessa gealuuldi geaw nibiyyeenya aba jeemba eawooji ispwa, ak aba jeeda gilattamanamughuush bea haleanjeedeanyu, iissa ghaadaydi akkalealla.’
Hean ghaminaada Siitta ang'ng'oonyi gwadiin nea dildeaweat nea eara gheanyangaaschi ea meageala humng'eeda, gagiisan nea gwayi, ‘Aseetta, bwaydanaan aniini geabea riing'a!’

Geayeeshshineegwa, ghwararang'ada siitta ang'ng'oonyi gwaadiin gawa gheannyi nea sittaw doobiiwnatta ea ghang'al niirja; aba gideaba siida nyoo godiing'u geaw gajeahiing'u, nea dea hiing'u geaw gajeettiing'u.”
Hean geeyeassa diibiga niny ghoadaw ghawooda; daa ginealanga gowoowsa buuneeda.
Ng'atta gaguursa Yeesu saawa nea gwayeeshsha, “Anung'waada diibiga ghapka heedeanyu adoakghuumnyi, aba gideaba gea uurji suu gammiissa sugoochcheandumeeda Aseetta.
Aba huumwa gearukuneegwa gideaba, siida mwadeaptaayda sugoochcheandumeeda Aseetta jeepta maygawa jeeda.”
Ghoanyaash siyagi ahaaghwa ng'eanyiida nea gwayeeshsha, “Ginealshoochcheanda miy, gaydasin naaha iijeadanyas eaweega manda muudeanooda?”
Gwayeeshsha Yeesu niny, “Ghwasaan anda gigurewean siida miy? Manda siida miy geaghus Aseetta akghwahit.
Ginali digheannyeekka: ‘Adimealuuli, adinuusi siida, adijagwadiischi, adimuuwwu ng'uyyeega, gisissi mureeda gweanu ea geamadu.’”
Gwayeeshsha, “Ng'asheesu seaniin nang'ng'waannyi ghang'eada jeepcheandumeedeanyu.”

Iiy Yeesu ng'asheesu gwayeeshsha niny, “Ghwashoadeweey ng'ashaanjagi. Shaayda halanjeadaang'u indeawi sean ak gilakkiisi fuga barbari, ak gaynyasa gheaseeda aba humng'eeda, ak guwuni eanni geeshteanyu.”
Iiy niny ng'asheanji gagiisan, aba gideaba eabaruur muuchchi.
Gang'ulla Yeesu niny ak gwayeeshsha, “Ahang'waaydaan beatta jea gaweay meanang'oodiga jeeda sugoochcheandumeeda Aseetta!
Asi gajawussis muuchchi gideaba gaygwasik nngamiya seawadeeda sidageeda, maygawuurji beatta jea gawa meanang'oochcheanda jeeda sugoochcheandumeeda Aseetta.”
Gwayi fukka iiy nea gwargu ng'asheanjiini, abeeda iisunu gwanda siida jea ghaghu?
Ng'atta gwayeeshsha, “Ng'asheega hang'oonyi aba heeda siida aba heeda Aseetta miihang'waay.”
Gwayeeshsha Betro, “Ng'ulla aseasa sinung'wi heeda galgaasa ak geeyeattu geashtaang'u.”
Hean gwayeeshsha saawa, “Aba huumwa geayeeshshineegwa, manda siida nung'wa heeda gheannyi, ghana gatmoadaannyi, ghana oorjooga ghaamwat, ea fuga jiilu ghana diibiga aba sugoochcheandumeeda Aseetta,
siisi mwanyasa gasaang'a aba damani bea ghamneawean nea iiduw aba damandida jea ghwahiduun, gayghwanyas eaweega manda muudeanooda.”

Ng'atta goobalool ginealangaaschi attamaniyyeenya nea gwayeeshsha, “Ang'ulla ghamneawa geascheang'di eweaya Yerusaleemu, ak ng'asheega sean ghayi ng'waar sibanga appadayda Balleanda Siida, gaygabiissa ghwahidu.
Aba gideaba gajeayiin geattinga emoojiga ak gajeebarra rear nea geng'ng'eawi nea geng'ng'urriisa ng'usheega;
nea gajeabwara mughowooda, ama ng'atta genuus, amaduw eaweetteaba samwagu gaygwaduudu.”
Ea manda siichcheeng'u ng'asheesu eara gidawas nea ng'asheanji ea sifnya saawa nea majeeng'na gissibaloola.
Geeyi bwaak ama riiksa Yeesu Yerikko, gwanda siisi ng'oow apteada aba gheatta naweeda nea gamusiisachchi;
iiduw nea ghwayiiy gidang'attayda emeeda ghoanyaashta gideaba “Gwanda naaha hiji?”
Geyeeshsha, “Ghang'atta Yeesuuydida bea Nasarettiin.”
Gabiissa Gojuur nea gwayeeshsha, “Ea Yeesu, Balleanda Dawdi, eaniyean bwaydanaan!”
Gojuursa Fukka asheedeawean nea geeyeeshsha, Siinda; sirukusa Ghoaraanya gijureanda muuchchi nea gwayeeshsha, “Balleanda Dawdi, eaniyean bwaydanaan!”
Hean gawus Yeesu ak ghwanung' eyeadu headaannyi. Neekkiissa siitta ghoanyaash Yeesu nea gwayeeshsha;
“Gigasayi dasinneey naaha?” Gwayeeshsha, “Ng'uttamida aniini geagasayi dang'wearda.”
Gwayeeshsha Yeesu niny, “Nyasa ging'weerdeada; nihaapnyi masaweagaagu.”
Mighoaw gil ghoang'wearda ak ghwaat geeshta nea ghoaghambiit Aseetta; daa emeeda ng'asheesu ghoaghambiit Aseetta.
Ghwahitta mujiineeda Yerikko, ghang'atta nea ghwalach bugusta.
Abeeda gwanda jeedeaba mujiineeni siisi suguura Sakkayo, siisi ea haweewa fuga ang'ng'oonyi gwaadi ak ea meanang'ochcheanda.
Siisi abeeda goolla gagaseaday deakta Yeesu gideaba siida urjiini, ak ghwaraay ghwadaa aba seang'ayda emeeda, aba gideaba ninyi anuwaas.
Ak iiduw Ghafwach gawa mwadi, ak gwading'da uhuuda meagheayeanda ghwadaah, aba gideaba gaygwasku naweetta.
Hitta Yeesu deascheeda mida gong'weersa uhuuda geetta ak gwayeeshsha, “Sakkayo lamwaja rarang'aana, aba gideaba gammiisean deabiida gheang'u askweareani.”
Ghwalamwach ghwararang'aan ak ghwadeapta nea gahoosan.
Iiduw nea ghwadaa ng'asheanji ghoaniikg sean nea gwayi, “Nuwa ghoaw rabascheanda aba gheeda siida ring'eeda.”

Ghang'eat Sakkayo ghamiinaada ak gwayeesha, “Ng'ulla, Ng'uttamiida, gaydalach bugusta haleanjeedeanyu ak ghaadawji fuga barbari, ak iimida siida nareachchi gida aba fughareeda, gaydeadeelsa niba ang'waan.”
Ghwayeeshsha Yeesu niny, “Askweareani lealeanooda nihidu gheawi aba gideaba eara niny balleanda Abrahaamu.
Aba gideaba Balleanda siida ghwahidu gagasa nea gwalealu diitta roadiin.”
Iiduw nea ghwayiiy ng'asheesu, hean gwarukuta aba galleega, aba gideaba nineekkiissa Yerusaleemu, aba gideaba saawa ghaghay gil sugoochcheandumeeda Aseetta gaygabean ghwadaajiit.
Gwayeesha, “Ghayi gwanda siisi haw siiwal gheang'da, wea bareannyeekka ng'eanyiida sheagi eattaw uurda sugoochcheandumeeda, ak gabiigu.
Hean gaguursa fii damanamughuush aba jeeda soomjoogaaschi, gaba nii adaw lappiyaji bughala ak gwayeesha, ‘Agadiyeatta ea dabiigu.’
Ak siisi ghwasit fuga ng'eang'da nyaawa ak gechcheaksa buuneeda eyeeshsha, ‘Aseasa meegassi siisi ghoahaaghwaneassa.’
Iiduw nea gabiigu siidida nea ninyas uurda sugoochcheandumeadaannyi ghwanung' eguursa soomjookka ghayi adaw lappiyean ghwanaal niba siisi nyas gea deannaan aba gadiyeedaannyi.
Ghwahidu dea madeeda headaannyi ak gwayeesha, ‘Ng'uttamiida, lappiyeadaang'u appughala niji suuk bughala.’
Ghwayeesha niny, ‘Ghwahiit guwosi soomjeanda miy! Aba gideaba guwosi doabiiwaat aba ng'asheanda mwanang' gajambala mujiinaji damanamughuush.’
Ghwahidu Soomjeandeaba iyyeenya ak gwayeeshsha, ‘Ng'uttamiida, lappiyeadaang'u aharadam ea damanamughuush niji suuk haradam ea damanamughuush.’
Gwayeeshsha nii, ‘Ang'iing'i ambala mujiinaji muut.’
Ng'atta ghwahidu nuut ak gwayeeshsha, ‘Ng'uttamiida, sukkwaanji lappiyeadaang'u attamanamughuush ghayi igooni, geadiiwsi jeeda weasta;
ghaawalleay, aba gideaba guwosi siida ng'waan iissa gigeandi gida miidaang'u ak gilaji gea mihistani.’
Gwayeeshsha niny, ‘Gaydeargweaksinaneey ng'asheanda ghuuttaang'u, soomjeanda muy! Ginali gideaba geawoschi hang'waay geageandi gidamiideanyu, ak ghaalaji gea meahistani?
Ak ghwasaan anda migadiyeatta lappiyeedeanyu gwaji suuk, ama ahidu geageandi sean ea gea ahaada?’
Hean gwayeeshsha fukkeanji minaada aba hooweanjiin, ‘Oarreada lappiyeeni mideawean ak ghoattawji siitta mideawa bughalaan.’
Geeyeeshsha niny, ‘Ng'uttamiida, gwandeawa lappiyaji bughala!’
‘Geayeeshshineegwa, Aba gideaba siisi agar gil gajeehheasa, nea siitta meagara giliin, eara gidida mwanang' mideawean gajearreat.
Ak fukka was weajoodigeasu magassa gideaba gaydaahaaghwa saawaan, ayeani hiji ak gonuuseadi aba madeedeanyu.’”
Iiduw nea ghoahiit ng'asheesu, goosheedeawa saawa, ak ghwascheang'da gawa Yerusaleemu.
Hean neekkiisa Betfagi ea Bettaniya, nea neekki gijeeda suguura Masaytuuni, goojeakta fii iyyeenya aba jeeda ginealangaaschi,
nea gwayeeshsha, “Aweayeena gharang'dida mida mwadiin iyoahitti gajanyasana hoowa gureenda digeeda nea radaat nea eara ginealda ea miyeannaal, goottinnyi ak goyeadu hiji.
Iideeppa ghoanyasheegwa sii gideaba, ‘Ghwasaan anda gottinnyi?’ Goyeeshshi, ‘Gagasa Ng'uttamida.’”
Gaweay Fugiga siichcheaktean, amahitta hoowa ghwadaakta gidagwachchi rukusiinda saawa.
Damandida siittina gureendean, gwayeeshsha fiibwa, “Ghwasaan anda gootiinnyi gureenda?”
Geeyeeshsha, “Gagasa Ng'uttamiida.”
Gearjaanda ea ghwahitta heeda Yeesu, gegeanu hang'wekka eayiin badayda gureenda amahit geanung' gwading'da Yeesu badayda ak goopteadawa.
Damandida beawaan, gageanu buuneeda ak ghwoabwarghaan hang'weakka nyaawa aba naweeda.
Iiduw nea gwaneekkiissa rarang'eadayda giijeeda Masaytuuni, gang'weela fuga saang'a was ginealangaaschi nea gwaduumsheesa Aseetta aba ghuutta haw aba gadiyoojiga hees sean sidaa,
nea geeyi, “Ning'ushsha Aseetta sugoochcheanda wuna gheawunga Ng'uttamida! Niiw hooyoo aba humng'eeda ea gigheambiitta aba hoowa bea humng'eedean.”
Gwayeeshsha Farisayajeesu ng'ay mida jeedeaba emeetta, “Ginealshoochcheanda, rekusiina ginealangaagu.”
Ghwasha nea gwayeeshsha, “Geayeeshshineegwa, inyas ghwasiinda saawa, gaygoojuur lagheanga.”
Iiduw nea gwaneekkiit mujiini ak ghwadaa goyyeawussa,
nea gwayi, “Gideaballi gwachchi eara ang'iing'i ginali eaweechcheanji miisa hooyyoohiin! Ak ghamneawa ea siwwiimwa gheanyangaagu.
Aba gideaba gayghwahidu eaweeda jea goneaweeseey weajoodigaagu, gajeeneaweeseey ak geebeasheesinaneey meatkwajeega sean,
ak gaygwajakseeyi ang'iing'i ea diibigaagu ng'eanyi nea ea mwajeanung'usa laghaana uhuumba nuut aba jeedeang'wa aba gideaba mii jeeng'ni damanda jea eebareassiinaneegwa.”
Hean gawa jeeda gheeda sibatta Aseetta ak goruutta fukka shaayda haleanjeedean,
ak gwayeeshsha saawa, “Geang'waar gideaba, ‘Gheawi itteanyuun gayghoaw heechchea gamoora buuneeda Aseetta ghawooda,’ ak ghoanung' ghoaw gwaleeda jea gafunnya geat mareanghooga.”
Inyeessa goonealshi galagasean aba jeeda gheeda sibatta Aseetta. Nea ashoohoodiga hees ea ng'oorshoodiga ea fuga hees was ashoohoodiga buuneeda ghamwaal gichchea gwanuusta niny;
ak ea meanyaasa gichchea eesin aba gideaba gelleeysiit buuneessean.
Eaweechcha nea ghoonaal buuneeda aba jeeda gheeda sibatta Aseettean, nea gwarukwiida giijaasta miy, gaweay headaannyi ashoohoodiga hees ea ng'oorshoodiga ea gweargwa
ak geeyeeshsha niny, “Rukuneasa gisni ng'asheesu aba gheambalmeedeabeang'a, ea ng'eaha gil siida goonnyi gheambalmeani.”
Ghwasha saawa nea gwayeeshsha, “Earaniini gaydanyasheagwa ng'ashaanjagi, asi arukunean,
Ghayi gibattiisanda Yohaana gwaleabu humng'eeda ghana leabu heeda buuneeda?”
Hean gabiissa gwasheang'nyi nea gwayi, “Ghamneawa isiyeeshshi ‘Gwaleabu humng'eeda,’ gaygwayi, ‘Ghwasaan anda ghayi ak ea mwoomwasi niny?’
Ama siyeeshshi, ‘Gwaleabu heeda buuneeda,’ ada gaygafutteasa buuneessean aba lagheanga aba gideaba ghamwas sean gideaba Yohaana sibaneeda.”
Hean ghwasha Saawa nea gwayeeshsha aseesa meanali heelleabu.
Gwayeeshsha Yeesu saawa, “Eara aniini ea maydarukuneegwa heeda leabu gimbalischooni itteanyu easinni ng'asheesuun.”

Hean ghoang'eat giibaloolda buuneeda nea gwarukusa galeesu, “Ghayi sii gang'eapsa sabiibu jeeda madamnyeandaannyi, hean gwanung'usa madamnyeandaannyi fuga jea gooragan, ak gawa daroorakka sheagi, goobiida hoowa ea gageawiit.
Godendeen ama gul damandida, gojeakta soomjeanda heeda fuga aragan madamnyeandean eattaw haghweega mwatkwa bea sabiibu; ng'atta ghabwar fukka aragan madamnyeandean ak geanung' gawa nea mwaada gil.
Iiduw gojeakta siidida soomjeanda nuut; hitta earada geabwar ea eesawan ak geenung' gawa nea ghabwaspwasaada nea mwada gil.
Iiduw gojeakta siideaba samwagu; ada geabwar ea gwasawana ak geahoan gawa jarooda.
Gwayi siidida bea madamnyeanda misabiibuun, ‘Gay dasin naaha? Gaydeajeakta balleandeanyu abwariinyi; gwadeeppa eesissa mureeda.’
Daa fukka aragan madamnyeandean, gwayeeshsha geat saawa, ‘Siisi dea jea gwahearaniischi, anung' eabwara ghami ak gabwaheasa hearaniischooda.’
Hean geang'ng'waay balleandida bea siidean ak gerruutteawa jeeda madamnyeanda misabiibu ak geenuus. Asi heappi sisi bea madamnyeandean iihidu gaygwahindaan fiisu?
Adaaha gayghwaan ama hidu gaygwanuuseada fugiga aragan madamnyeandannyiin ama hit gaygagasa fii suuk jea gwanung'usa madamnyeandaannyi.” Siyiiy ng'asheesu geeyi, “Gagasa ghoashiiy Aseetta!”
Hean ghoaduup ghaang' saawa, ak gwayeesha, “Abeeda ng'asheesu sing'wardunun naaha bea gideaba:
‘Lagheaneeni aneawa ghaang' fuga deekshi nea meanung' ghoaw giliin
niiw lagheaneeda haw washiin?’
Nea siida jea gobedeaysa lagheaneeni gaygagiishachchi, nea siida was sean ng'adeesa lagheaneeni gay ghang'aal.”

Muchchu gagasa ng'oorshoodiga ea ashoohodiga hees gichchea ghoang'ng'waayda aba damandida, ak ghoawal buuneeda; aba gideaba saawa nijeeng'u gideaba ng'asheesu sigalla geadiin geerukuna badahuukka nyawa.

Inyessa geasaach niny nea geegasa gheatta miy ak gechcheakta fuga hinda geat fuga doobiiweadi, eanyas gheatta gichchea eaghasta aba nga'sheesu ikkaaschiin, ak geayin geattinga sugoochcheanda haw ahaaghwa ng'eanyiida.
Geannyaash niny nea geeyeesha, “Ginealshoochcheanda, geanalli gideaba girukku ng'asheega nea gidoabiiwi, nea miduuppi siisi haw, ang'iing'i ginaali buuneeda naweeda Aseetta doabiiwaat.
Heappi, ghwadoabiiwi gideaba geattaw Gaysaari gwaadi, ghana manda?”
Gwajeeng'u milmilanda nyaawa ak gwayeeshsha,
“Oahiimnaan shiliingajeanda. Uhuuni ea gheawung'su gabeang'a? Geeyeeshsha, Gaba Gaysaari.”
Gwayeeshsha saawa, “Asaha ghoattawji Gaysaari gea Gaysaari, ak ghoattawji Aseetta gea was gea Aseetta.”
Hean gearaay gichchea eang'ng'waayda aba ng'asheagaaschi aba madeeda buuneeda; ghahamng'eanyi buuneeda aba gida shaayda ng'asheega ak ghwasiinda sean.
Iiduw ghapka headaannyi fiisu ng'ay was Sadukkayajeega eena manda dunnooda,

Hean geannyaash nea geeyeeshsha, “Ginealshoochcheanda, Muusa ghayi gang'oorneasa gideaba siida iimea oorjeeda ghaamwat, nea gwandeawa gatmooda mandeawana diibiga, gaygageanda oorjeeda ghaamwat gatmootta ak gwanyaksa diibiga oorjeeda ghaamwat.
Ghayi gwanda oorju ispwa bea ghaamwadagi, gageeshshi oorjeeda haw, amaduw ghami nea ghwanung'wa hiji gatmooda mandeawana diibiga;
ea deaba iyyeenya
gea deaba samwagu, iiduw gwahearan oorjookka seaniin assipwaan nea gameewwa agi ea goosha sean nea gatmoodida ea mandeawana diibiga.
Iiduw eara gatmoodida ghami.
Heappi eaweetta siittuunna buuneeda gatmooni gaygaba ng'eaha? Aba gideaba nighi buuneeda ea ghwahitta ispwa.”
Gwayeeshsha Yeesu saawa, “Balloojigeaba ng'eanyiini gageeshshachchi, nea gegeena;
nea fukka sinung' ghoaw gili miisa ng'eanyiidida bea hooweaniin nea duunnoodida bea miyeedeani mageeshshachchi nea megeenna,
ea maygabiikta gameewa aba gideaba gaygawuurji malaykajeega, ak saawa ea balloojiga Aseetta gil ea gideaba saawa balloojiga sittuuttu.
Aba iitta gideaba gwaduuttu buuneeda, eara Muusa ghoahiimu aba jeeda ng'ooruutka iitta geetta mughuush damanda guursiina Ng'uttamiida was Aseetta Abrahaamu ea Aseetta Isakka ea Aseetta Yakkobo.
Asi ghamneawa niny mii Aseetta fuga nimeewa gil, aba gideaba ghwanyas sean eaweega aba niny.”
Ghwasha ng'oorshoodiga mwaatkwa nea geeyeeshsha, “Ginealshoochcheanda, aba hiji girgu huumwa.”
Ea mudu gwanda siida ammu gabadaksa ghoanyaash ng'asheanda.
Ng'atta gwayeeshsha saawa, “Gaygwayeendaan saawa gideaba Gristo balleanda Dawdihi?.
Aba gideaba gwayi Dawdi aba jeeda gittabooda nyiigheaga,
‘Ng'uttamida gwayeeshsha Ng'uttamideanyu,
Apteada aba geattindeanyu bea dugwa,
ea danung' ghoaw weajoodigaagu horgeeda jea iinna geashangaagu.’
Abeeda Dawdi iguura niny Ng'uttamiida ghoawdaan balleandaannyi?”
Hean nea gwayiing'shi buuneessean gwayeeshsha ginealangaaschi,

“Ashageada ng'oorshoodiga, fuga bwariiy gwaleammideawa hang'weakka geawwi bwariiy eyenniisa seayu aba naadajeega, ea hoorgajeega miyaas aba gealga sinnealshachcheewa, nea eara iweay gealga ghwelmeeda ghwanyoahaada hoorgajeega madeeda,
fuga inyeessa gweagiisachchi aba gealga masiinung'weega nea aba gimminnoodeaba geat inyeessa ghamwaash Aseetta nea gogeawiit. Asi gayghwanyas girgweaksiinda haw.”
Ng'atta gang'ula ak ghwadaa gidiinda meanang'oodiga haleanjeeda sisappa geadi bea ghadoweeda jeeda gheaseeda.
Ghwadaah eara masinung'weanji bwarbwar nea ghwayiin jeeda gida heelaji iyyeenya akghwahit.
Ak gwayeeshsha, “Geayeeshshineegwa aba huumwa masiinung'weanji bwarbwariin ghoadayda gidahaw ea ghwalaabwa hoowa buuneessean;
Aba gideaba suurja ghoadayda gidabinna jeeda barureega nyaawa, sinung' niny aba jeeda barbarandaannyi niidayda gidamideawa sean.”
Iiduw nea gabaloola mwaatkwa gheeda sibatta Aseetta, gida siittamdaamda aba lagheanga miyaas ea haleanjeeda sisappa geadi bea ghadooweeda gwayeeshsha,
“Aba haleanjeeni ong'ulayiin, gayghwahidu damanda jea ea mayghoabit lagheana aba uhuumba nuut jea ea majeeng'ng'adeasa ng'eanyi.”
Hean geannyaash niny nea geyeeshsha, “Ginealshoochcheanda, ng'asheesu gayghoaw eeju, ak gwadeagoodeaba ng'asheesu ea naaha jea ghoahiimu gideaba hinnoodeaba ng'asheesu nineekkiit?”
Hean gwayeeshsha, “Ashageada adagahuttaneegwa siida; gwanda fuga saang'a jea ghapkaana gheawungeasu, nea gwayeena, ‘Siida aniini gil!’ Nea ‘Damanda nineekkiit!’ Adoayachchi geeshta.
Inyeessa gajayiinya iitta ng'uchcheeda ea jaleadinga, ea adoabealli; aba gideaba ng'asheesu gaygoosheeda ghwahidu, nea muudeanooda ea maygabay ghwahidu.”
Ng'atta gwayeeshsha saawa, “Gaygaba daroori ng'uchchi daroar nuut, ea sugoochcheandumeeni ng'uchchi sugoochcheandumeeda nuut;
gaygwanda sawooda haw bea ng'eanyiida, ak gaygang'eeda gejeadinga aba daroorakka sean ea geyoonung'wea kka; ng'asheega jea ghwanung' eahamng'eanyi, ea gwadeagwajeega hees leabu humng'eeda.

Ak damanda migapnu ng'asheesu seaniin gajeang'ng'waanyeagwa ak geesawaneegwa, nea geayadeagwa gealga sinnealshachcheewa ak gajeejakseegwa ghealooniga ak gajeayadeagwa madeeda sugoodiga hees ea madeeda fuga hees ambaliischi aba gheawungeasu.
Ak abeeda gili gayghoaw muwwunooda aba heedeang'wa.
Asi ong'ng'ooysiina jeesingeagwa ak ea adootteemshi aba gichchea ashaayda ng'asheega;
aba gideaba gaydagoneegwa ng'asheega ea weaghumeeda jea inyeessa eara weajoodigeagwa ghwaraay ng'alealleeda ghana gichchea ghwashang'da.
Ak gayghaghaseagwa ghweanigeagwa ea gheamadigeagwa ea oorjooga geamadu, ea buweadeegeagwa ea fuga oduupcheewi nea mwaatkwa gaygwanuusseegwa;
ak agooga gajeasteagwa aba gheawungeasu.
Ea mayghwaroat eara budeanjagi bea iheenngeagwa.
Ak agooga aba milikghteaydeang'wa gajookghuuha eaweegeagwa.
“Asi iyoadaayi mujiineeda Yerusaleemu nea nineaweesa lugooda, abeeda anala gideaba nineekkiit nyaroadaannyi.
Nea fuga mida Yudeeya ea dasalsiina iheenga gijeega, nea gea mida mujiin ea daritteaysiina nea gea mida gharang'da ea adiidu ghapka jeani;
aba gideaba eawoojigiga gajea gea sawanadeeda ak ghoaw gida nyaashta ng'ooruutka.

Dashageada gadeemga mideawa diibiga ea gea areerji diibiga aba askwearjoojikka! Aba gideaba gayghwadaa ng'asheanda ng'waan, aba gideaba gaygwanda sawanadeeda haw jeeda ng'eanyiida ea nyarasta aba badaydeaba fiisu;
Ak gajeenuseadawa bwaanga nea suuk geattabwaardawa jeeda emoojiga sean nea Yerusaleemu gayghoalla emoojiga ea ghwahidu damanda fuga emoojiga.
“Gajadaaha gwadeagwajeega aba gheang'da aseetta ea sheeda ea miinga, gayghwanyas emoojiga jeeda ng'eanyiida sawanadeeda nea ghahamng'eanyi aba nyeashta laweajajeega basooda,
buuneeda gaygoohiili aba muuwda aba gimmuukghnooda gichchea gwahissa ng'eanyiida, aba gideaba uurda mida humng'eeda gajeetuumduum.
Ak gajeadaah Balleanda Siida nea ghwaana jeeda shamoghooda nea gwandeawa uurda ea gigheambiitta haw.
Asi ghamneawa ng'asheesu iihidu ghoahalli geat, amiinada ak goong'ullay humng'eeda, aba gideaba nineekiit lealnoodeang'wa.”
Hean iiduw gwarukusa saawa galeega nea gwayeeshsha, “Ang'ulla shabogheechcheanda ea geediga suurja sean;
Iyoadaayi nea ghafirfiir seenga nyawiiri, abeeda goojeeng'u gideaba doomeelda nineekkiit.
Asi eara agooga iyoadaayi ng'asheesu nea gapnu, anala gideaba sugoochcheandumeeda Aseetta nineekkiit.
Aba huumwa geayeeshshineegwa jeachcheengsu bea ghamneawean mayghwanaawuda nea miyadaaha ng'asheesu.
Humng'eeda ea ng'eanyiida gaygammudean. Duukku ng'asheesu ea maygammudean eara hay.
“Asi afra geat adagoobal guroruunatkeagwa beeshkweeda ea booktuumeeda ea eaweesu bea ghamneawean, ea gwashameegwa eaweettida; gawuurji gidang'ng'oonnyiida ghudumbwaada haleanjeeda;
aba gideaba nii gichchea gwahissinda fuga sean abiitta badayda ng'eanyiisseani.
Asi agooga afra geaet galaagasean, nea ghoamwaashchi Aseetta gagoonegwa uurda jea oattaraamwa ng'asheesu sean jea gapnun, ea aminaada aba madeeda Balleanda Siida.”
Inyeessa gonealshi askweari aba jeeda gheeda sibatta Aseetta, nea eawa gwaritteawa jeeda mujiini ak gawa gobiida uhuuda gijeeda suguura Masaytuni.
Hean inyeessa sakteayda duw gaweay buuneessean headaannyi eelleeysiit aba jeeda gheeda sibatta Aseetta.
Hean abeeda ea nineekkiit ghwelmeeda mukkattajeega miyeayiin hamiira suguura Basakka.
Nea ashoohoodiga hees ea ng'oorshoodiga abeeda gwanda jeeda gassooda gichchea ghoang'ng'waayda ak gwanuus; ak iiduw ghoawal buuneeda.
Hean ghoabiitta Shattaani jeeda Yuudayda suguura Iskariyotte, nea gaba jeedeaba fugiga attamaniyyeenyean;
Ng'atta gawa goobalool ashoohoodiga hees ea shirikkareeda hees gidajea ghwalaapta bwadaw niny aba saawa.
Gahoosan saawa muuchchi ak gwaheelleesa gideaba gajeattaw lappiya.
Hean ghamwas ak gagasa gheatta jea ghwalapta bwadaw nea manda hiji emeeda.
Ghwahidu eaweeda ghweelmeeda mukkattajeega meayiina hamiira, nea eaweetta sinuusa dayeenda gisilleanda ghweelmeeda Basakka gil.
Iiduw gojeakta Yeesu Betro ea Yohaana nea gwayeeshsha, “Aweayeena asissina heechchea eyeaksiina Basakka.”
Ak geeyeeshsha, “Gigasayi eang'aabwa aba yeenu?.”
Gwayeeshsha saawa, “Ang'ulla, iyoahitti mujiini gajaroonnyeewana ng'edeeda sar sirbiida beega; ghoayaachchi geashtaannyi ea ahitta gheeda jea gawa jeeda,
goyeeshshi siida bea gheeda, ‘Gwayi Ginealshochcheanda, abwaara ghoriini siyeaksi Basakka aniini ea ginealangeasu?’
Ak gayghoahimneegwa ghoorini haw sideeksa uhuumba nuut, ak ea sittamdaam; ak goosissi jeani.”
Hean Gaweay amwahitta ghwadaakta ng'asheega sean gidagwachchi rukutteayda; hean gwasissin Basakka.
Hitta damanda agiischooda goopteada niny ea giijasoodigaaschi gweagiischi.
Ak gwayeeshsha, “Neagasayi muuchchi daak basakkeani aniini ea agooga heeda miidanyasa hang'weanidooda;
aba gideaba geayeeshshineegwa, mayguttaak ea eahhiit aba jeeda sugoochcheandumeeda Aseetta.”
Hean gageanu bayookta, ak gabadischeesa ak gwayeeshsha, “Oang'ng'waanya gili, ak goolakkisiina geat;
aba gideaba geayeeshshineegwa, majaguttali mideega haghweega misabiibu, ea ghwahidu sugoochcheandumeeda Aseetta.”
Ak gageanu mukkatte, ak gabadischeesa ak ghabwanachchi ak ghoadawaada saawa nea gwayeeshsha, “Nii saseedeanyu gil siittayda aba badahuukkeagwa. Ahinniidunu aba gipkeatteanyu.”
Ak gwahindunu eara bayookta ing'atta agiischooda gwayi, “Bayoogi geahhiida appadahuukkeagwa neajeeda eesh aba foojeandeanyu.
Ak gong'ulayi geattinda siichchea ghwalaabwan bwadaw geambuchcheewi aba hiji.
Asi Balleanda Siida gayghabeada gidaghayi sibean eerarsiinda ak ea dashageada siidida jea ghwalaabwan bwadaw!”
Gabissa gonyeari geat saawa, nea gwayi, Ng'eaha nii aba jeedeanya jea gwasin ng'asheanjiin.
Iiduw gwardu sheang'nyeeda aba jeanyaawa gideaba ahaw ng'eaha aba jeedeanya.
Gwayeeshsha saawa, “Sugoodiga emoojiga inyessa gombaliischi aba heannyaawa; giikka mideawa ghealmbalmeedean aba heannyaawa geguura fuga weeda buuneeda.
Agooga ea mii gichchea awurjeewana; aba agooga siida gasa hawunda dawuurjeewana siida mwanang'eawa sean, nea siida gasa ghang'atta mwadi dawuurjeewana siida gadiyeeda.
Aba gideaba ahaw ng'eaha, siida apteada ak gweagiischi, ghana siitta gadiyeesa buneedeani? Ak ghaghanyi gajea siitteani agiischiini. Ak aniini aba jeedeang'wa geawurjeewi siida gadiyeeda.
“Agooga gowoschi fuga ghayi milikkiida galagasean sea aniini aba jeeda simsindeanyu;
gawuurji gidaghayi gondaneani Bwaabwa sugoochcheandumeeda, earaniini gaydagooneegwa,
Ak gajayeagiischeena nea goleeshi aba jeeda sugoochcheandumeedeanyu, nea goppitpiidi horgajeega sugoodiga ak gorgweaksi doshin damaniyyeenya bea Israeeli.”
“Simon, Simon, ng'ulla, Shattaani gagasseegwa ghoalealdaneegwa nngano,
ak aniini ea namwaaschi Aseetta amwasuunya masaweagaagu, ama ibiikeani gimajeegi oorjooga geamadu.”
Hean gwayeeshsha niny, “Ng'uttamiida, geawoschi hidaat eara etteayeena ghealooniga ghana dami.”
Gwayeeshsha, “Geayeeshshineey, Betro, eannean maygoguul nnghaghooda eaweani nea miishaang'aan niba samwagu gideaba ginallaan.”
Gwayeeshsha saawa, “Damanda eajeakteawaneegwa, nea mondeawani shageeda ghana sandakwajeanda ghana geekka, abeeda gwanda gida nishoadeweegwa?” Geyeeshsha, “Mandana.”
Gwayeeshsha saawa, “Ghamneawa siida mideawa shageeda daada, ak gwasnu eara dea mideawa sandakwajeanda. Nea siida mandeawana bwaanga ea dashaayda hang'daannyi ak ghwasha.
“Aba gideaba geayeeshshineegwa ng'ooruussu majaghanyi ea meahhiida aba badaydeanyu, ‘Aba gideaba geegalageat sea fuga munyas,’ aba gideaba gissung'waar appadaydeanyu gwanda mudeanoadaannyi.”
Hean gwayeeshsha, “Ng'uttamiida, ang'wearda, hiji gwanda bwaangaji iyyeenya.” Gwayeeshsha saawa, “Gwadeay.”
Iiduw gwariitta ak gawa gawuurji gideaba eawoojusu, ea ghwahitta giijeeda Masaytuuni, nea ghwaat geeshta ginealanga.
Hitta hooweani gwayeeshsha saawa, “Amwaasha Aseetta adiiduw gesmeegwa ak ghoappitti jeeda samsiinda.”
Ghwanung'wa saawa heeda, ak ghwaloat geash gili ayang'da jakteayda lagheaneeda, ak ghang'uda gutng'weakkaaschi ng'eanyi ak ghamwaash Aseetta, ak gwayi,
“Bwaabwa, igidiibwariiydi gil gischoarjaan bayokcheanji; nea adaghoaw gideagassiidi, nung' ghoaw daang'u.” [
Hean ghwahidu malaykajeanda leabu humng'eeda ak ghoadaw uurda.
Iiduu nea gwanda jeeda sawanadeeda, hean ghamwaash seetta muuchchi; ak gawuurji gheawwochcheandaannyi foojeanda nea gobitpissa ng'eanyi.]
Ng'eada mooshta Aseetta, nea gabiikta heeda ginealanga, ghwahitta nea nilil aba gideaba ning'ut giseaneega,
ak gwayeeshsha, “Ghwasaan anda goolilli? Ang'eatng'eada amwaasha Aseetta adiiduw ghooppitti jeeda simsimda.”
Miighoabiit ghuutta aba baloolda ghwahidu emeeda nea godeana siisi suguura Yuuda, bea jeeda ginealanga attamaniyyeenya, nea gooshooyna saawa. Gwaneekkiissa Yeesu ak ghwasam gheatta;
gwayeeshsha Yeesu, “Yuuda ghamneawa gilaabi bwadaw Balleanda siida aba samitta gheatta?”
Deagu fukka mideawean gwayeeshsha, “Ng'uttamiida gajeabwarana bwaangajeega?”
Gafagu siyagi bwaangeadaannyi ak ghwalas soomjeanda ashoohoochcheanda haw ak gwalaksa ng'eanyi iitta geattinda dugwa.
Gwayeeshsha Yeesu, “Anung'waada nideay!” Ghoang'ng'waay iitta ak ghoahaap.

Ng'atta gwayeeshsha Yeesu ashoohoodiga hees, ea shirikkareeda gheeda sibatta Aseetta ea gweargwa, buwa ghoang'ng'waay niny, “Ghoapkaandi gili oapkaanji oang'ng'oonya mareangheanda, nea gooyeadu bwaangajeega ea gulupkeakka?
Eajusu nea gendeaydooschi galeagasean aba jeeda gheeda sibatta Aseetta, ghanea miyoang'ng'wanyaan ak ghamneawa nii ea damandeang'wa gil ea uurda misaneeda.”
Hean geang'ng'waay ak geayaat ea eayaat gheeda Ashoohoochcheanda haw. Gamaseaw Betro nea sheagi;
iiduw geayyeat beasta aba bugharjeanda daghatta gheeda nea gendeayi sean, ak eara Betro gwanda hiji.
Ng'atta ghwadaa hutpa gadiyeeda nea gwanda heedeesh ak gohang'ooysa ghaang' ak gwayeeshsha, “Eara siisi gwandeaydooschi sea niny.”
Ghwashaang' nea gwayeeshsha, “Gatmooda, siisi aniini mwaanali.”
Miigageawiit ghwadaa siinuut ak gwayeeshsha, “Eara ang'iing'i gibeahi jeedeaba fukka.” Gwayeeshsha Betro, “Siida meabeahi.”
Iiduw nea ning'atta aseedeanagi gwayeeshsha siinuut, “Aba huumwa siisi earada goodeaydooschi niny; aba gideaba niny siida Galilaaya.”
Gwayeeshsha Betro, “Siida, mwaanali eara gidinyaashi.” Deagheatta damani duu gabaloolean, goguul nnghaghooda.
Ghwayam geaw Ng'uttamiida ak gang'ula Betro. Ghoapkaat Betro ng'asheanda Ng'uttamiida, gidaghayi rukusiinda gideaba, “Eannean heeda miigoguula nnghaghooda gajea niheawanaan niba samwagu.”
Hean gwariitta jarooda ak goyyeawda muuchchi.
Ghwahitta Fukkeanji gwachchi ang'ng'waay Yeesuun ak gwashka nea ghabwar;
Gegeanu ak geeduukta gheanyanga ak geppearsa nea geeyeeshsha, “Heappi rukuneasa siida lasnyi?.”
Ak gerukusa ng'asheega saang'a bea ging'weakkwa.
Sakteayda nea gorearu aseetta, gabadageat gweargwa sea ashoohoodiga hees, ea ng'oorshoodiga, ak geyeadu madeeda girgweageeda, ak geeyeeshsha,
“Iiwosi Gristo, girukuneasa.” Gwayeeshsha saawa, “Eara darukuneegwa, majaghanyi amwasa;
ak eara daanyaashcheagwa ng'asheanda ea mwajashaaha.
Nea gidang'eada ghamneawa Balleanda Siida gaygoopteada aba meatkweeda geattinda dugwa bea Aseetta hoauur.”
Gwayeeshsha sean, “Aba sarean guwasi Balleanda Aseetta?” Gwayeeshsha saawa, “Goorgu agooga gideaba geawoschi.”
Hean geeyi, asi gudeegassa mushooduspwa naaha? Aba gideaba siyiing'si geat ng'asheega ghuuttaannyi.
Ghang'eatng'eat Fukka sean bea girgweageedean ak ghwaat madeeda Bilatto.
Geang'ng'eat giheakteayda nea geeyi, “Geadaayi siisi nea ghoaschoarda emeedeanya, aba gideaba ghoaghuumwaneesa ea meattai Gaysaari gwaadi nea gwayeena niny Gristoyda was sugoochcheanda gil.”
Ghoanyaash Bilatto nea gwayeeshsha, “Assang'iing'i guwosi sugoochcheanda Yahuudi?” Ghwasha niny ak gwayeeshsha, “Gidirukuteaydi ang'iing'i gil.”
Gwayeeshsha Bilatto Ashohoodiga hees, ea emeeda, “Mwadaahi ng'asheanji muy aba badaydeaba siisi.”
Godiiktiiksa muuchchi nea gwayeenniisa, “Siisi ghoang'waal buuneeda aba ginealshoadaannyi aba ng'eanyiida Yahuudi sean, ghang'eada Galilaaya ea ghwahidu hiji.”
Iiy Bilatto ng'asheesu ghoanyaashta siisi ea gaba ng'eanyiida Galilaaya.
Nyas iitta gideaba gwanda ng'eanyiida sugoochcheanda siyi Heroode, ghwaat heeda Heroode aba gideaba damandida gwanda Yerusaleemu.
Gahoosan Heroode muuchchi idaa Yeesu, aba gideaba ghayi nigeawiit gagaseadayyi deaktaannyi, aba gideaba ghayi ninyas iittaannyi nea gagasa ghwadaa gwadeagooda jea gwasin.
Ghoanyaash ng'asheega saang'a; ak ea mwasha.
Ghang'eatng'eat ashoohoodiga hees ea ng'oorshoodiga ak ghoahaakta muuchchi aba urda.
Gafool Heroode sea shirikkareadaannyi ak gwajuuga, ak gekkwealsa hang'i mideawa ormeeni miy ak geatealda heeda Bilatto.
Ghang'eada damandida gwaduupchi Heroode ea Bilatto, aba gideaba ghayi ammwadi gwanda fuurjeeda dageascheeda nyawa.
Iiduw gaguursa Bilatto ashoohoodiga hees sea fuga ahaaghwa ng'eanyiida ea buuneeda,
ak gwayeeshsha saawa, “Siisi goyeadu heedeanyu nea goyeennyi nischoarda buuneeda. Iiduw nea geasikteawi ng'asheanji aba madeedeang'wa, ea mwaadaahi aba headaannyi gidinyeanda was sean oahaaktaawi;
nea eara Heroode godelneasa siisi aba gideaba mandeawana gidinyeanda miisa miyeeda;
aba sareani gaydanung' eabwar ak geasiksi gawa.” [
Aba gideaba iissa gammiisa gideaba gaygoottissa siyagi mida ghelooniga aba damanda ghwelmeeda.]
Hean gojuur sean nea gwayi, “Geanda siisi ak gisiksi Baraaba,”
nea niny ea siida sijaksa ghealooniga aba gideaba ghwanung' ghaghoakghoayda emeeda mujiini ea gideaba gwanuus siida.
Gabiikta Bilatto gobalool saawa nea gagasa gwasiksa Yeesu;
gojuur nea gwayeeshsha, “Angoora, Angoora niny!”
Gwayeeshsha gichcha deaba samwagu, “Nea gidinyeandeaba siisi ea naaha gil? Mwadaahi ng'asheanji jea enuusa, asi gaydabwar ak geasiksi gawa.”
Gojuur muuchchi aba uurda nea gagasa engoor. Ea gwajoriischi gijureanda nyawa.
Gorgweaksiinda Bilatto gidagassiida buuneeda.
Gwasiksa siitta ghayi sijaksa ghealooniga nung' ghaghoakghoayda buneedean, ea gideaba ninuus siidean, was dea gasa saawa; ak ghoadayda Yeesu aba gidagassiida saawa.
Iiduw nea geayaat, geroonnyi Simoneeda ng'eanyiida Girene, nea abeeda gwaleabu neayeeda, ak geang'ng'waay ak geanung' ghwasar behiidida nea ghwaat Yeesu geeshta.
Ak ghwaat geeshta emeetuw, ea gadeemga aat geeshta nea gaguuttu heareega nea gooyyeawda.
Gwayamsa geaw Yeesu ak gwayeeshsha, “Haweega Yerusaleemu, adoyyeawdaneani, oyyeawda geat ea diibigeagwa.
Asi ang'ulla, gayghwahidu eawoojiga jea gwayeena, ‘Ghang'wana gea was sonung'weega, ea jeesinga moang'ng'wa gwaji, ea gidinga miiyereer!’
Hean gaygwayeeshsha giijeega, ‘Oppedeayseasa;’ ea heayeeniga, ‘Afunyeesa.’
Aba gideaba isisissa ng'asheesu geetta shabwaat, gaygawuurjiin aba geetta ghajaam?”
Hean geayaat eara fii iyyeenya adiiy enuusuudayyi niny.
Iiduw nea sihitta hiji suguura Geapkeeda Uhuuda, gengoorsa uhuuda behiida, sea fukka adiiyiin, dea manda geattinda dugwa niirja gwanda geattinda ghadaam.
Ak gwayi Yeesu, “Bwaabwa, eaniiyean samsiina fiisu; aba gideaba mwanala gissin.” Hean geelaja hang'wakkaaschi ak geng'alealleesa.
Ghaminaada buuneeda nea geeng'ula, nea fukka ahaaghwa ng'eanyiidean gang'ula nea gwashka nea gwayeena, “Gwalealu suurja, asi dalealna geaw, iiwas Gristoyda Aseetta loat niny!”
Eara fuga shirikkara gwashka ak gaweesa ak ghoadaw beesu ng'weani,
nea geeyeenniisa, “Iiwosi sugoochcheanda fuga Yahuudi, gilealu geaw!”
Gwanda ng'ooruutka uhuuda behiidaannyi sung'waar, “Nii sugoochcheanda Yahuudi gil.”
Gwayeeshsha siyagi adiiy gwachchi singooruudayyi sea niny, “Ang'iing'i muwosi Gristohi? Asi lealni geaw ak gilealneasa eara aseasa!”
Hean gowoowsa niirja nea gwayeeshsha, “Ang'iing'i miiwali eara Aseetta, nea eara ang'iing'i gindi jeedeaba girgweaksiini?
Nii gammiiseasa aseasa, aba gideaba geanyaschi gimeardeanya aba gissisinnyi, nea siisi ea miigwasin gidamuy wassean.”
Ng'atta gwayeeshsha, “Yeesu apkaadaan ihitti jeeda sugoochcheandumeadaang'u.”
Ak gwayeeshsha, “Aba huumwa geayeeshshineey askweareeni, gajendeayesiina nyeamus.”
Geeyi bwak ama gul aseetteaba lah gwaduk ng'eanyiissean misaneeda ea gaba aseetta shageash,
iiduw nea gagarbiit aseetta; hean ghang'at bugusta hang'dida subwaasha jeeda gheeda sibatta Aseettean nibiyyeenya.
Ng'atta goyyeawda Yeesu nea gojuur muuchchi nea gwayi, “Bwaabwa, nayiinnyi guroroodeanyu geattingaagu!” Ahiit balooli ghoabitta.
Daa shirikkarajeanda haw gwaduumsheesa Aseetta nea gwayi, “Aba huumwa siisi ea doabiiwaat!”
Daa emeeda gwachchi bwatgeat aba hoowa nea ghwadaa ng'asheanjiin, gabikta gealga nyaawa nea gagiisan.
Nea fuga sean duupchi ea gadeemga ghayi adeana aba ng'eanyiida Galilaaya, ghaminaada nea sheagi nea ghwadaa ng'asheeu.
Aba damandida gwanda siisi suguura Yoseefu was siida mujiineeda Yahuudi siguura Arimattaayu. Niny abeeda gaba gweargwa girgweageeda nea ng'eeni, ak gabiissa ea doabiiwaat,
nea niny ea mwamwasa gidagasa saawa ea gissin, nea abeeda gomuukku sugoochcheandumeeda Aseetta.
Ghang'eat siisi ak gawa ea gawa heeda Bilatto ama hitta gamus musta Yeesu.
Ng'atta gorareang'u ak gokkwealsa hang'da miy ak ghwayiin jeemba bung'eeni mida jeemba laghaana ghayi miyeebung'sa sii.
Nea eaweechcheanji ea eaweetta sing'aap gil jea ghwahinna sabattoohi.
Nea Gadeemga ghayi adeana niny leabu ng'eanyiida Galilaaya ghwaat geeshta ghwadaa bung'eeda ea gissibuyda;
hean iiduw gabiikta ghoah ak gwasin nagheeda ea geediga ng'andidi. Ak gafuuf eaweeda Sabatto gwahinda gidanyashta digheanda.
Iimuchchu eaweeda madeeda bea wikkajeanda, nea ghaghar gayeew, gaweay heeda bung'eeda, nea ghwaat geediga ng'andidi nisin.
Hean sihitta geadaah lagheaneedida nea sishsheagiida ghuutta shoomanda bung'eeda,
iiduw nea gaweay jeeshshomanda bung'eeda ea mwadaaha muusta.
Damani duuw ghahamwang'eanyi aba ng'asheanjiin, hean ghamiinaada fii iyyeenya aba murdeannyaawa nea gookwa hang'weakka meang'meang'i;
damanda duughang'uda muuwda nea ghwahiiy geat gogeal iheenga nyaawa ng'eanyi, gwayeeshsha sih saawa, “Ghwasaan andagoogaseadayyi siida majeeck aba jeeda fuga nimeewa?
Oapkaada gidaghayi rukuneegwa, damanda duuw gwandeewa Galilaaya,
gideaba, Balleanda Siida gajeayiin geattinga fuga ring'eega, ak gengoor, ak gwaduudu eaweetteaba samwagu.”
Hean geapkaat ng'asheagaaschi,
bikna hooweanji bea bung'eedean gaweay ghoadaw iitta ginealangiga attamwanagiin ea buneessuurja.
Nea Mariya Magdaleena gil, ea Yoana ea Mariya gheamatta Yakkobo, ea gadeemga suurja gwachchi mideawean suu fuga rukusa giijasoodiga iitteaba ng'asheesun gil;
gawuurji ng'asheesu aba heannyaawa duguuga mwadagha, ak ghanyea meamwasa.

Aka gawuurji ng'asheega nyaawa aba heannyaawa duguuga mwadaagha, nea ghanyea mwamwasa. Ng'atta ghang'eat Betro ak ghafwach ea ghwahitta heeda bung'eeda, ak ghwahiiy geaw gong'weersa jeeda, ghwadaa wegeakkiga sibung'dean akghwahit; hean ghang'eat gawa nea ghaham ng'eanyi aba ng'asheega bunu.
Eaweettida gaweay fii iyyeenya aba jeannyaawa gharang'i suguura Emawu, nea sheageewa Yerusaleemu jea ghoahiitta aseetta iyyeenya hitteayda,
gabalooleadawa iitteaba ng'asheekka nndeareetta bunuun.
Aba damani balloleadawa nea gonyeari geadiin, gawa Yeesu ea gwaneekkiissa ak godeayi.
Geadukuta gheanyanga nyaawa ea mwanala siida was.
Hean gwayeeshsha saawa, “Ng'asheespa naaha obalooleadawi nea goweayiin?.” Ghaminaada nea niikkaroomnyi gheamamuunatka nyaawa.
Ghwasha Siyagi aba jeannyaawa, suguura Gleoppa ak gwayeeshsha, “Neada ang'iing'i guwosi rabascheanda nea gubwaageawi aba Yerusaleemu mwanala ng'asheega sisiin aba hiji askwearjoojusu?”
Hean gwayeeshsha saawa, “Ng'asheespa naaha?” Geyeeshsha niny, “Ng'asheega Yeesuuyda Nasareetti, ghayi was sibaneeda mideawa uurda sinooda ea baloolda aba madeeda Aseetta ea dea buuneessean,
ea gidahaaktaayda ashoohoodigasa hees ea fuga ahaaghwa ng'eanyiida ak ghoadayda ergweaksiina miyeeda, ak gengoor.
Nea abeeda aseasa geararji gideaba niny siichchea ghoaghu Israeeli gil. Gilnuut gichcha askwareani ea deaba samwagu aba ng'eetta ng'eada ng'asheesu.
Gabiissa gwanda gadeem bea ng'eang'deanya gwachchi nung' eabeala. Weay bung'eeda sakteayda duuw
ea mwadaaha mustaannyi; ak ghwahidu ak gwargu gideaba niroonnyi sea malaykajeanda eeshsha ea majeek.
Eara fii suuk gichcha gwachchi sindeawi gaweay hoowa bea bung'eedean ak ghwadaakta gidagwachchi rugu gadeemgiga; nea niny ea meadaaha.”
Ng'atta gwayeeshsha saawa, “Ea fuga dasheahi, mideawa guroruunatka hang'oonyi ak amwamwasa eara ng'asheega ghayi rugu sibanga!
Mammisiina gideaba Gristo gayghwanyas sawanadeeda ama ng'atta gawa jeeda gigheambiittaannyi?”
Hean ghoang'eada Muusa ea sibanga sean, ak gwarukusa saawa ng'ooruutka sean bea ng'asheega bwadaydaannyi.
Gaweay ea gwaneekkiissa gharang'dida gwachchi weayiin. Ak gwahinda geaw giligasa ghang'atta,
hean gemearmearani nea geeyeeshsha, “Shinya endeayeena, aba gideaba niisha Aseetta ak ea nihiidu eaweeda.” Hean gawa jeeda gheeda ak gwandeayi.
Damandida mideayeewa aba agiischoodean gageanu mukkatte ak gang'ushsha ak ghabwanach ak ghoadaw saawa.
Ghwajaada gheanyanga nyaawa, deagu ghwanal gideaba ninyi, ama ng'atta ghwaroada gheanyanga nyawa.
Gonyeari geat nea gwayeena, “Neada jeesingaasa ea mwayeadana beasta damandida gwachchi abaloolaneasa aba naweedean, nea gang'achcha iitteanya aba gidaghayi nyaah ng'ooruutka?”
Ghang'eatng'eat damandida ak gabiikta Yerusaleemu, ak ghwanyasa hoowa giikka attamwanagiin nea gwandeawa giikka eawooschu mideaydooschiin,
nea gwayi, “Humwa gil niduudu Ng'uttamiida, geabwada nihiimsa geaw Simon!”
Hean ghoadayda iitteaba ng'asheekka bussa aba naweedean, ea gida siyi bwak ea ghwanalda saawa gideaba ninyi damanda bwanaja mukkatte.
Damani duuw gwandeawa jeedeaba baloliin, ghaminaada Yeesu appugusta nyaawa.
Ghahamng'eanyi ak ghabeal muuchchi, nea ghaghay gili daa malonghajeanda.
Gwayeeshsha saawa, “Ghwasaan anda nung'deagwa muuwda, ak ghwasaan anda goonyearayi geat ng'asheesu aba jeesingeagwa?

Ong'ng'wersiina geattingeasu ea geeshangeasu, gideaba aniini gil; ong'ng'waanya eara saseedeanyu ak ghoadaayi; aba gideaba malonghajeanda mandeawana saseeda ea geekka gawuurji gidoadaaktanaan ghamneawa.”
Iiduu ne ning'atta rukunoodeaba ng'sheesu gohiimsa geattingaaschi ea geeshangaaschi.
Damani mii ghamwasa aba hooseaneegean, nea ghahamng'eanyi nea gwayeeshsha saawa, “Goondeawi gichchea ayaaga aba hiji?”
Geattaw banajaneeda ghweayeanda sibeash.
Gageanu ak ghwaak aba madeannyaawa.

Hean gwayeeshsha saawa, “Suu ng'asheegeasu ghayi earukuneegwa, damanda sindeaydooscheewi, ak abeeda ng'asheega appadaydeanyu aba jeeda deaweedeeda Muusa ea sibanga ea gittaabooda Nyiigheega gajeahhiit.”
Ng'atta ghwajaat fughareenga nyaawa ghwanal ng'ooruutka.
Ak gwayeeshsha saawa, “Nii gidaghayi sung'waarda gil gideaba Gristo gayghwanyas hang'weanidooda ak gwaduuna miyeeda eaweetteaba samwagu,
ea gideaba duukkuunooda ea samsiinda ring'eega gajeerukkwiida aba gheawungaaschi, aba jeeda emoojiiga sean, ghang'eada Yerusaleemu.
Nea agooga gowoschi mushoodigeaba ng'asheesu.
Ang'ulla, geayeaneegwa heelleeda Bwaabwa; asi oppiidana mujiineeni ea egoneegwa uurda leabu humng'eeda.”
Ghoadoabiiw ea ghoahiitta ng'eanyiida Bettaniya, ak gagatgat geattingaaschi ak gang'ushsha.
Damani ng'ushshiinean goheelli geaw ak geettiing'da eayaat humng'eeda.
Ama ng'atta gabiigu Yerusaleemu nea gahoosan muuchchi,
goobiitta jeeda gheeda sibatta Aseetta nea gwaduumsheesa Aseetta.
Ghayi aba garayi gwanda Ng'asheanda, nea Ng'asheanda gwandeayi sea Aseetta, nea Ng'asheanda ea Aseetta.
Aba garayi niny gwandeayi sea Aseetta;
haleanjeessean geesin aba niny, nea iimanda niny ghanyea maygwanda gil aba haleanjeeda sisin.
Jeadaannyi gwanda eaweega, nea eaweesu ea weeshinda buuneeda.
Nea weeshini ghoabwaay jeeda misaneeda, nea misaneeda ea miighoammu ghwajoar.
Abeeda gwanda siisi sichcheagu leabu heeda Aseetta; suguura gheawungaaschi Yohaana.
Niny ghwaan ak gamuuwwu iitta weeshinda, ak abeeda ghamwas buuneessean aba niny.
Nea niny ea mii weeshinda gil, niny ghwaan gamuuwwuu iitta weeshinda.
Nii weeshinda huumwa gil hidu jeeda ng'eanyiida ak ghoabwaay giliwas sihi.
Niny ghayi abeeda gwanda jeeda ng'eanyiida, nea ng'eanyiida geesin appadaydaannyi ak amwanala ng'eanyiida.
Niny ghwahidu gheannyi, ak ea mwadeapta fugaaschi.
Nea fukka sean deapta ninyiin, ak ghamwas aba gheawungaaschiin, ghoadaw uurda jea ghoaweawa diibiga Aseetta;
Fuga meejiilana naweeda geallaan, ghana gidabwariiyda saseeda, ghana gidabwariiyda siida, geaghus Aseetta.

Ak iiduw ghoaw Ng'asheandida saseeda ak goobiida jeedeanya, niny ghwannyiit dagheerjeandumeeda ea humeanda ak ea sidaayi, gigheambiittaannyi, gigheambiitta uurji dea Balleanda was haghasheeda leabu heeda Bwaabwa.
(Yohaana gamuuwwu iittaannyi, ak goojur, “Nii dea ghayi earukku nea geayi, ‘Nii dea ghayi eayeennyi gay gweadu geeshteanyu ak ahaweawaneani aba gideaba gwanda madeedeanyu.’”)
Aba hidoadaannyi aseasa sinyaschi dagheerjeanduumeeda nea gettaguurji.
Aba gideaba deaweeda geegu aba naweeda Muusa; nea dagheerjeandumeeda ea huumeanda ghapkaana naweeda Yeesu Gristo.
Manda siida nidaah Aseetta; Balleanda was haghasheeda, mideayi sea Bwaabwa, niny siida adaajiidi.
Nii gidamuwwu Yohaana, gojeakta Fuga Yahuudi mida Yerusaleemu ashoohoodiga ea fuga Laawi ghoanyaash gideaba, “Guwosi ngeaha?”
Ghamwas ak ea mwashaanga ghamwas, nea gwayi. “Aniini meawosi Gristo.”
Gennyaash niny, “Ak guwosi ngeaha? Guwosi Eliyahi?” Gwayeeshsha, “Meawosi,” Geyeeshsha, “Abeeda guwosi sibaneeda?” Gwayeeshsha, “Manda.”
Geyeeshsha niny, “Asi ang'iing'i guwosi ngeaha? Rukuneasa ak geyeassi iitta fuga ajeakneeasa. Giyeaniin appadaydaang'u?”
Gwayeeshsha, “Geawoschi ghuutta siida nyearra jeeda dareapcheenda. ‘Olleappa naweeda Ng'uttamiida,’ gawuurji gidaghayi rukuteayda sibaneeda suguura Isaaya.”
Fiisu abeeda gojeagu Farisayajeega.
Ng'atta geannyaash nea geyeeshsha, “Ang'iing'i imuwosi Gristo ghana Eliya, ghana sibaneeda anda gibattisanayi buuneeda?”
Ghwasha Yohaana nea gwayeeshsha, “Aniini geabattiisananeegwa beega, ak gwanda jeedeangwa siida minaada nea moanali,
Siisi gaygamaseawnean ak aniini ea mammisean gideaba gaydeameew deanga geakkaaschi.”
Ng'asheesu seaniin geesin aba hoowa bea Bettaniyaan gigheawda Yordaan was heeda abattiisanniisa Yohaana buuneeda.
Muchchu ghwadaa Yeesu nea ghwaan headaannyi ak gwayeeshsha, “Ngulla Dayeenda Gisilleanda bea Aseetta jea gageanda ring'eeda jeeda ng'eanyiida!
Nii dea ghayi earukku eayeennyi, ‘Gwanda siisi jea gamaseawneani, aba gideaba niny ghayi gabay gwanda madeedeanyu, aba gideaba gwanda madeedeanyu.’
Aniini siisi ghayi mwaanali, amaduw ghaawunnyi deabattisana aba beega ak abeeda getteajiissa Israeeli.”
Ng'atta gamuuwwu Yohaana ng'asheega nea gwayi, “Nadaayi Gurorooda gwashubeanda gharibajeanda nea ghoabinna humng'eeda ak goobissa uhuudaannyi.

Earaniini abeeda mwaanali; amaduw ghwanung' siitta ghayi ajeaknean deabattiisan aba beegean gwarukunean gideaba, ‘Siitta jea daaha nea gwashubeesa Gurorooda ak goobissa uhuudaannyiin siida nii diitta jea gobattiisan aba Gurorooda Ghaydidiin.’
Ak aniini ea nadaayi ak ea neamuuwwu gideaba siisi Balleanda Aseetta gil.”
Muchchu gabiikta Yohaana ghaminaada sea ginealangaaschi assiyyeenya.
Hean gang'ulla Yeesu nea ghang'atta ak gwayeeshsha, “Ng'ulla, Dayeenda gisilleanda bea Aseetta!”
Ghwayiiy Ginealangiga assiyyeenyean niny nea gwargu ng'asheesu ak ghwaat geeshta Yeesu.

Ghwayam geaw Yeesu ak ghwadaa nea ghwaat geeshta ak ghoanyaash saawa nea gwayeeshsha, “Gogaseadayyi naaha?” Hean geyeeshsha niny, “Raabi” (nea gideaba Ginealshochcheanda gil), “ang'iing'i gibiitti yeenu?”
Gwayeeshsha saawa, “Abeenni ak gajadaaha.” Ng'atta ghwaat geeshta, ak ghwadaa heeda eajusu abiitta, gobitpiit gwandeawa niny eaweettida abeeda gaba aseetta damanamughuush.
Iiy oorjeanagi aba jeedeaba giikka assiyyeenyean nea gabalool Yohaana ak ghwaat geeshta Andereya gil, was oorjeeda gennyea Simoneeda suguura Betro.
Gosheeda ghwadaa Simoneeda was oorjeeda ghaamwat, ak gwayeeshsha, “Sidaayi Masiya” (nea gideaba Gristohi).
Hean ghwaat heeda Yeesu. Daa Yeesu gwayeeshsha, “Ghamneawa gegureweey Simon Balleanda Yohaana? Asi gajegureweey Geefa.” (Nea gideabeadaannyi ea Betro gil).
Iimuchchu eanigasa Yeesu beatta Galilaaya. Ghwadaah Filippo ak gwayeeshsha, “Eanni geeshteanyu.”
Filippo niny siida leabu Betsayda gil, mujiineeda geaba Andreya ea Betro.

Filippo ghwadaa Nattanaeeli ak gwayeeshsha, “Sidaayi siida ghayi ng'waar Muusa ng'asheagaaschi aba jeeda deaweeda. Siisi ghayi ng'asheagaaschi ghang'waar sibanga. Yeesuuyda Nasareetti, was balleada Yoseefu.”
Gwayeeshsha Nattanaeeli niny, “Asseara Nasareetti ghoammu gwarinna gilimiyi?” Gwayeeshsha Filippo niny, “Benni daaha.”
Ghwadaa Yeesu Nattanaeeli nea ghwaan headaannyi, ak gwayi, “Ng'ulla, Israeelajeanda huumwa, manda jeadaannyi ng'uyyeega eara gil!”
Gwayeeshsha Nattanaeeli niny, “Assang'iing'i ginaldananniin?” Ghwalamda Yeesu ak gwayeeshsha, “Ghwanyawa ghadayeay nea gudumidana guumda shabogheechcheanda nea eara Filippo eamighwaan gaguurneey.”
Ghwasha Nattanaeeli nea gwayeeshsha, “Rabi, ang'iing'i guwosi Balleanda Aseetta! Guwosi Sugoochcheanda Israeeli!”
Ghwasha Yeesu nea gwayeeshsha, “Ghamneawa gumwasi aba gideaba geayeeshshineey ghwanyawa ghadayeay nea gudumidana guumda shabogheechcheanda? Asi gaydaaha ng'asheega hees naawa suh.”

Hean gwayeeshsha niny, “Aba huumwa, aba huumwa, geayeeshshineegwa, gajadaaha nea ghwajaada humng'eeda, ak gajadaaha malaykajeega Aseetta heeda mwascheeng'da suurja ghwararang'aan ghapka heeda Balleanda Siida.”
Iimuchchu eaweetteaba samwagu gwanda nyeangiida Gaaneeda mida Galilaaya, eara gheamatta Yeesu abeeda gwanda hoowa;
nea eara Yeesu ea ginealangaaschi ea suguursa ghapka nyeangiini.
Iiduw nea ning'at difaayi gwayeeshsha gheamatta Yeesu niny, “Mudugwandeawa difaayi.”
Gwayeeshsha Yeesu ghaamwat, “Ea iiyya, ang'iing'i gendeayeasi naaha? Damandeanyu miighwahidu.”
Ghwalamda Gheamatta ak gwayeeshsha soomjooga, “Agooga asna gilinyoo gwargu niny.”

Abeetta gwanda hoowa sirbaji lah ghayi sisna lagheanga, ak geyiina beega ahunniida fuga Yahuudi aba gimminnoodeaba geat, aba heesinnyeekka jeesinga nyaawa gwalassa galanajeega diktam ghana diktam ea damanamughush.
Gwayeeshsha Yeesu saawa, “Oannyiida sirbajeesu beega.” Hean geannyiit ea ghwanaawnaawda.
Ng'atta gwayeeshsha saawa, “Asi aramni ak goyeassi siida haw ang'aatta buuneeda.” Hean geyeasa.

Iiduw nea gwasamu Siidida ang'aatta buuneedean beegiga, aniyamwa ghoaw difaayi, nea abeeda niny amwanala heeda leabu, (nea soomjookka ghwanyawa ramu beegean ghwanal), gaguursa Siitta ang'aatta buuneedean siida geeshshi

ak gwayeeshsha, “Eajusu buuneeda inyeessa ghanyi goshoohu difaayi miyaas; amadaa beadi nileeshi buuneeda muuchchi, hean gabiissa goruudu gea munyas; ang'iing'i nukkwa gudumideawana difaayi miyaas eara ghamneawa.”
Gwadeagooni diitta ghayi sin Yeesu bea madeedean gil aba Gaaneeda Galilaaya nea abeeda ghwanung' eadaah gigheambittaannyi; eara ginealangaaschi hean gabiissa ghamwas niny.
Iing'atta ghangeat ghwararang'aada gawa Gapernaamu nea godeayi ghaamwat ea oorjooga ghaamwat ea ginealangaaschi; gobiida hoowa askwearjoojusu ng'ay.
Abeetta gwanekiidean ghwelmeeda Basakka bea fuga Yahuudi, hean ghwascheang'da Yeesu gawa Yerusaleemu.
Ghwanyasa jeeda gheeda sibatta Aseetta buuneeda; heeda mwashaayda heewga suurja ghwashaayda gisilga nea suurja ghwashaayda ghariibajeega, ea gea nyarja lappiyyeeda gadiyeatta.
Hean gwasin ghealooda, amahit ghahoan buuneesean mideawa gisilga ea heewga aba jeeda gheeda sibatta Aseetta; ak ghoahiida lappiyeeda fuga nyarja lappiya nea gobimbineada measajeega nyaawa.
Gwayeeshsha fugiga ghwanyawa sheahhiida gharibajeegean, “Oang'aamwana dugusu hiji; adoonung ghoaw ghooriida Bwaabwa ghoariida sikkeakshachcheewa.”
Ghoapkaat ginealangaaschi gideaba geang'waar. “Barinyeegeasu aba gheang'u gayghwaagan.”
Ghoanyaash fuga Yahuudi nea gwayeeshsha, “Gaysina ana gwadeagu jea eadaaha gideaba gisni ng'asheesu?”
Ghwasha Yeesu nea gwayeeshsha, “Anyarja gheawi sibatta Aseettean ak gaydadeas aba jeemba askwearjooji assamwagu.”
Hean gwayeeshsha Fuga Yahuudi, “Gheawi sibatta Aseettean ghayi destaannyi gageanu gweannyeew haradam ea lah, ak gaydeasa aba jeemba askwearjooji samwagu?”
Nea abeeda Gheeda sibatta Asseetta rugu ea saseadaannyi gil.
Iiduw nea niduunna miyeeda, ghoapkaat ginealangaaschi gideaba ghayi nurgu ng'asheesu, ak ghamwas ng'oruutka ea ng'asheega ghayi rugu Yeesu.
Damanda mideewa Yerusaleemu aba jeeda ghwelmeeda Basakka, ghamwas fuga saang'a gheawungaaschi idaa gwadeagooda sin;
nea Yeesu amwamwasa fugiga aba gideaba nisikkideawa sean,
aba gideaba niny ghwanal buneassean ak ea magassa gideaba gaygamuuwwu sih; aba gideaba niny ghwanal gidamida jeessiida.
Asi gwanda siispa Farisaayajeega suguura Nikkodeemu, nea ghoahaaghwa fuga Yahuudi.

Siisi Gaweesa Yeesu eawa ak gwayeeshsha, “Rabi, aseasa geanalli gideaba ang'iing'i guwosi ginealshochcheanda ak gileabu heeda Aseetta; aba gideaba manda siida ammu gwasin gwadeagwajeesu isinayiin, geaghus siida mideayi sea Aseetta.”
Ghwasha Yeesu ak gwayeeshsha niny, “Aba huumwa, aba huumwa geayeeshshineey siida imebiikta eeji deaba iyyeennya ea mayghwadaah sugoochcheandumeeda Aseetta.”
Gwayeeshsha Nikkodeemu niny, “Iijea ebiikta eeji siida niheedu? Gayghoammu gideaba gaygabiikta jeeda ghaamwat deaba iyyeenya ak geeji?”
Ghwasha Yeesu ak gwayeeshsha, “Aba huumwa, aba huumwa, geayeeshshineey, siida imiyeejiilna beega ea Gurorooda ea mayghoammu gawa jeeda sugoochcheandumeeda Aseetta.
Gissijiila saseeda gaba saseeda, nea gissijiila gurorooda gaba Gurorooda.
Adihami ng'eanyi aba gideaba geayeeshshineey, ‘Siida geaghus eebiikta eeji.’
Yeammeeda iissa gagal heeda gasa, ak giyiinyi ghuutta ak ea minali helleabu ghana heedagal, ea giduurji siiidida sijiila Guroroodean.”
Gwayeeshsha Nikkodeemu niny, “Ng'asheesu ijeagwasa?”
Ghwasha Yeesu ak gwayeeshsha niny, “Eara ang'iing'i giwosi ginealshochcheanda Israeeli ak aminali ng'asheesu?
Aba huumwa, aba huumwa, geayeeshshsineey, aseasa geerukku gida sinalli ak geemuwwu gidaghayi sidaayi; amadukku agooga ghanyea mwoamwasi ng'asheega simuuwwu.
Asi iyearukuneegwa ng'asheega badayda ng'eanyiida ak amoamwasi, abeeda iyearukneegwa ng'asheega mida humng'eeda gajamwastaan?
Manda siida ghayi nidiyeada ea gawa humng'eada geaghus Balleanda Siida ghayi rarang'aana humng'eeda
Gawurji gida ghayi attoasta Muusa ichchibooda aba dareapcheeda, gwasnu eara Balleanda Siida gajeattoastunu.
Abeetta siida jea ghamwas niny gayghwanyas eaweega manda mudeanooda.”
Aba gideaba Aseetta ghabwariiy ng'eanyiida ea eeyibwak ea ghoadayda Balleandaannyi assakkalealla, ak abeeda siida wassean mwas niny amwaroada ak abeeda ghwanyas eaweega manda mudeanooda.
Aba gideaba Aseetta ghayi mojeakna Balleanda ghwaan ng'eanyiida, ak gorgweaksa ng'eanyiida, geegasa ghwalalan ng'eanyiida appadaydaannyi.
Siida mwas niny majeergweaksa; nea siitta mwamwasaan ea ning'aatta girgweaksinda, aba gideaba mwamwasa gheawunga Balleanda assakkalealla bea Aseetta.
Ak girgweaksinda ea nihi, ghwahidu weeshinda jeeda ng'eanyiida, ak ghabwariiy buuneeda misaneeda ea ghoadaraam weeshinda, aba gideaba sinaweega nyaawa eamunyas.
Siida sina ng'asheega munyas iissa ghwasit weeshinda, nea ghanyea mayghwaan heedeesh aba gideaba gajiiduw geattaajiit sinaweagaaschi munyas.
Nea siitta sina humeandean gayghwaan heedeesh, ak geesikteawa sinagweegaaschi gideaba ghoawal gheang'da Aseetta.
Iing'atta ng'asheesu gawa Yeesu sea ginealangaaschi ea ghwahitta ng'eanyiida Yudeeya, gobiida hoowa sea ginealangaaschi nea gobattiisan.
Abeeda eara Yohaana gobattiisan aba Aynooni, nekkeewa Saleemu, aba gideaba hoowa gwanda beega saang'a; iissa gaweay buuneeda heeda ak gobattiisan.
Aba damandida Yohaana miyeayaat ghealooniga.
Iiduw ghoaptu sheang'nyeeda aba jeeda Ginealanga Yohaana ea siispa Yahuudi aba ng'asheega gimminooda.
Hean iiduw gaweay heeda Yohaana ak gwayeeshsha, “Rabi, siida heetta indeawi aba gigheawda Yordaan ghayi imuuwwu ng'asheagaaschi eara niny ghamneawa gobattisan, nea gaweay headaannyi buuneessean.”
Gwayeeshsha Yohaana, “Siida mwoammu ghwanyas gidawassean geaghus dea siittaw leabu humng'eeda.
Nea eara agooga ghoammuuschi amuuwwuni gideaba geayeennyi, aniini meawosi Gristo, aniini gechcheaknean deashoayna niny.

Siida mideawa gatmooda bea nyeangiida niny siida geeshshi, amadukku sittuupchi siida geeshshi, iissa ghaminaada nea goleeysiit nea gahoosan muuchchi iyiiy ghutteaba siitta geeshshiin; asi aba sareani hooseanegeasu niheedu.
Gammiisa niny gideaba gajea ghaloamwat ak ea meawosi aniini ghaloamwaat.”
Siida leabu humng'eeda ahaweewa sean, nea siida mida badayda ng'eanyiida gaba ng'eanyiida, ak gabaloolla ng'asheega ng'eanyiida; nea siitta leabu humng'eedean ahaweewa sean.
Niny iissa gamuuwwu ng'asheega daa ea gea iiy, ak ghanyeamanda siida mwas muwwunoadaannyi;
amaduw siitta mwas muwwunoadaannyiin, abeeda eara niny ea niroor gideaba Aseetta huumwa.
Aba gideaba siida ghayi ajeagu Aseetta iissa gabaloola ng'asheega Aseetta ak ghoadaw gurorooda nea modeena;
Bwaabwa ghabwariiy Balleanda, ak aniyiin haleanjeesean geattindaannyi.
Siida mwas Balleanda gwandeawa eaweega manda mudeanooda; nea siitta moawaala gheang'da Balleandean ea mayghwanyas eaweega, abeeda gaygwanda badaydannyi nyarasta Aseetta.
Iimuchchu nea ninal Ng'uttamiida gideaba niyiiy Farisayajeega gideaba Yeesu ninyas ginealanga saang'a burdeawa Yohaana nea gobattiisan
(nea Yeesu niny ea migobattiisan buuneeda, gobattiisan ginealangaaschi),
ghabeawa ng'eanyiida Yudeeya ak gabiikta gichcha Galilaaya.
Aba beadi gaygwasik jeeda ng'eanyiida Samariya.
Ghwahitta mujiineeda Samariya suguura Sikkaari, nekkeewa madamnyeanda ghayi adaw Yakkobo balleandannyi suguura Yoseefu.
Abeeda gwanda hoowa healadeeda Yakkobo, hean ea nibur Yeesu aba beatta, ak gopteada aba murdeeda healadeeda. Nea abeeda gaba aseetta lah.
Iiduw ghwahidu gatmoomba Samariya ghwaram beega. Gwayeeshsha Yeesu niny, “Gonean beesu aleayi.”
Abeeda aba damandida nuweay ginealangaaschi mujiini ghwasha hamitta.

Gwayeshsha Gatmootta bea Samariyahiin niny, “Ang'iing'i guwosi siida Yahuudi, nea aniini geawoschi gatmooda Samariya gimmustiin gideaba gaymusean beega?” Aba gideaba fuga Yahuudi maguuyi haleanja sea fuga Samariya.

Ghwasha Yeesu nea gwayeeshsha niny, “Inyeeda ghwanyawa ginali haleanjeeda goona Aseetta ak ea ng'eaha gil siida eshshiineey, ‘Gonean beega jaadali,’ ghwanyawa gaymusa niny ak gaygagoonnyi beega mideawa eaweega.”
Gwayeeshsha Gatmootta niny, “Ea siida mureeda ang'iing'i mindeawani geammooda jea ramnana beega, ak ghabwada nii healadeeda easheagi jii; abeeda gaygeannana yeenu beesu mideawa eaweegean?
Neada ang'iing'i guwosi haweewa ghweandeanya was Yakkobo goaneasa healadeani nea ghwali niny beega sea diibigaaschi ea dugwaaschi?”
Gwayeeshsha Yeesu gatmootta, “Siida wassean nyoo ghwali beesu gaygabiikta ghwaak muwoash,
amadukku sichchea ghwali beega jadaadaw aniini mayghwaak muwoash earahay; aba gideaba beekka jea dadawiin gayghoaw aba jeadaannyi gheang'deenda nea goobeakbeaksa eaweega manda mudeanooda.”
Gwayeeshsha Gatmootta niny, “Siida mureeda, aniyean gonean beesu, ea mabiikta ghwaagan muwoash gichcha nea meabiikni hiji daram beega.”
Gwayeeshsha Yeesu niny, “Una, gursiina siyeadaang'u ak gideani hiji.”
Gwayeeshsha gatmoodida niny, “Meandeawani siyeeda.” Gwayeeshsha Yeesu gatmootta, “Asi girgu huumwa gideaba, ‘Mindeawani siyeeda;’
aba gideaba nindeawi siyeenat muut, ak ghamneawa nii indeawiin ea mii siyeadaang'u gil. Asi aba hiji girgu huumwa.”
Gwayeeshsha Gatmoodida niny, “Siida mureeda, aniini iyeang'ulayi guwosi sibaneeda.
Ghwanigaasa ghayi iissa ghaghadoawan Aseetta aba uhuudeaba gijeeni, amaduw goyeennyi agooga heeda miisa ghadoawanda Aseetta Yerusaleemu gil.”
Gwayeeshsha Yeesu gatmootta, “Iyya, mwasaan ghwaan damanda jea ea majaghadoawana Bwaabwa aba uhudeaba gijeeni, ghana hoowa bea Yerusaleemuun.
Agooga iissa ghoaghadoawannyi gida mwoanali, duukku aseasa geanalli gida sighadoawannyi, aba gideaba lealeanooda gwaleabu heeda fuga Yahuudi.
Ak ghamneawa ghwaan damanda, nea damanda gwanda, nea fuga ghadoawan bea huumwa gayghadoawan Bwaabwa aba gurorooda ea huumwa, aba gideaba Bwaabwa gagaseadayyi ghaghadoawan fuga sunu.
Aseetta gurorooda gil nea fuga ghadoawan niny gammiisa ghaghadoawan aba gurorooda ea huumwa.”
Gwayeeshsha Gatmoodida niny, “Ghaanalli gideaba gayghwahidu Masiyeeda (suguura Gristo), eaweetta hinna gayghoahiimneasa ng'asheega sean.”
Gwayeeshsha Yeesu gatmootta, “Aniineani ghamneawa abaloolnyiin niny gil.”
Deagheatta ghapka Ginealangaaschi ak ghahamng'eanyi idaah nea gobalool gatmooda, ghanyi ea manda siideeshsha, “Gigasayi naaha?” ghana “Ghwasaan anda gibalooli sea gatmooda?”.
Gwanung'usa Gatmoodida sirbiidaannyi heeda ak gawa mujiini amahitta gwarukusa buuneeda gideaba,
“Apkaani adaaha siida rukunean ng'asheegeasu sean ghayi easinnyi! Siisi gajea mii Gristohi?”
Ghabeawa buuneeda mujiini ak gaweay headaannyi.
Aba damandida gamearmearani Ginealangaaschi nea gwayeeshsha, “Rabi, agischeena.”
Hean gwayeeshsha niny saawa, “Aniini geandeawi hamitta jea daak moanali agooga.”
Hean gonyeari geat Ginealanga gideaba, “Gwadeappa gwanda siida niyeassa hamitta?”
Gwayeeshsha Yeesu saawa, “Hamitteanyu sinooda gidabwariiy siida ghayi ajeaknean gil, ak ghahiichchi gadiyeadaannyi.

Neada ea moyeeni agooga, ‘Ghwashoada sheeh anng'wan ak ghwahit, ak gay ghwahidu damanda lajitta booga?’ Ak geayeeshshineegwa aniini, oang'ng'weerda ak ghoadaayi beadooda madameega nigeawiitt gaweeriidi aba lajitta.
Siida lach booga ninyas mushahareadaannyi, nea iissa ghoawaam haghweega aba eaweega manda mudeanooda, ak abeeda gaygahoosan duwaawi siida heetta hista ea daalach.
Ak ghoaw huumwa ng'asheanda ghayi surgu bea gideaba; ‘Gwahista siyagi ak gwalach siinuut.’
Aniini geajeaktaneegwa alaja booga mii agadiyeesiina, ghayi gagadiyi fii suuk ak ghamneawa agooga ea noweayi jeeda gadiyeeda nyaawa.”
Ghamwas fuga saanga bea Samariya niny aba jeedeaba mujiineetta appadayda muuwwunoodeaba gatmoodida, bea gideaba, “Gwarukunean ng'asheega sean ghayi easinnyiin.”
Gaweay fuga Samariya heeda ak gamus gwandeayi saawa, ak goobiida hoowa eawooji iyyeenya.
Ghamwas fuga saang'a muuchchi appadayda ng'asheandaannyi.
Gwayeeshsha saawa gatmoodida, “Aseasa meamwasi aba ng'asheagaagu irgu, aseasa siyiinyi, ak geanalli gideaba aba huumwa siisi lealnochcheanda ng'eanyiida.”
Iing'atta eawooji iyyeenya ghabeawa hoowa ak gawa ng'eanyiida Galilaaya.
Aba gideaba Yeesu gamuuwwu gideaba sibaneeda mwoammu ghwanyas mureeda aba ng'eanyiidaannyi.
Hean hitta Galilaaya, ghwadeapta Fuga Galilaaya, aba gideaba eara saawa abeeda gwanda jeeda ghwelmeeda, ak ea nidaah ng'asheega sean sin aba Yerusaleemu damandida bea ghwelmeedean.
Gabiikta gichcha mujiineeda Gaaneeda Galilaaya heeda ghayi yamwa beega ak ghoaw difaayeeda. Abeeda gwanda Gapernaumu siisi haw mideawa baleanda miyaan.
Iiduw nea ghwayiiy siidida gideaba Yeesu nuwuna ng'eanyiida Yudeeya ak anihidu Galilaaya gawa heeda ak gamus gideaba beenni ahaabwa balleandeanyu ghabwar miyeeda.
Ak gwayeeshsha Yeesu, “Iimwoadaahi gwadeagooda ea haleanjeeda deamdeameadi ea mwajamwasa.”
Gwayeeshsha Siitta hawiin niny, “Siida mureeda, aniyean nung' eweaya heeda miighameawa jeepteanyu.”
Gwayeshsha Yeesu niny, “Una; balleandaang'u eamajeek.” Hean ghamwas Siidida ng'asheega Yeesu ak ghang'eat gawa.
Damandida duuw ghwararang'aadawaan, gwaroonnyi sea soomjoogaaschi ak geerukusa gideaba balleandaannyi eamajeek.
Ghoanyaashta niny damanda haabwa balleanda, gwayeeshsha saawa, “Ghabeawa sheagheeda heetta askweari nea gaba aseetta ispwa.”
Iiduw ghoapkaat ghwaan gideaba damandida rukusina Yeesu gideaba, “Balleandaang'u eamajeegiini;” hean ghamwas niny, sea fugeaba gheannyi sean.
Nii gwadeagoodeaba iyyeenya sin Yeesu gil damanda leapna ng'eanyiida Yudeeya nea gawa Galilaaya.
Ng'atta damandida ghwahidu ghwelmeeda fuga Yahuudi, nea abeeda ghwascheang'da Yeesu gawa Yerusaleemu.
Aba hoowa bea Yerusaleemu neekkeewa gidaghuutta gisilgean gwanda dabascheanda suguura aba iitta Ebraniya Betsada, nea gwandeawa dodonung'weak muut.
Gwanda jeani fuga saang'a miyeani nea gwalil, fuga ng'oowwi, ea fuga badoojiga, ea fuga abittu damealga.
Abeeda gwanda hoowa siyagi ghayi miyaan geannyeew diktam ea damassis.
Hean daa Yeesu siitta nea gwalil aba hoowa ak ghwanal gideaba niibiida hoowa gili geaw, ghoanyaash nea gwayeeshsha, “Gigasayi haabwa?”

Ghwasha siitta miyaaniin nea gwayeeshsha, “Siida mureeda, aniini meandeawani siichchea ghoobuuttanaan jeeda dabaschcheanda iing'atta ging'oolda beega, iissa iyeagasayi daabitta jeeda goosheeda siinuut ghoabitta.”
Gwayeeshsha Yeesu niny, “Ng'eada, geanda muundaang'u ak guwi.”
Miighoaw gil ghahaap siidida ak gageanda muundaannyi ak ghang'eat gawa. Nea abeeda eaweettida ea Sabattohi.
Iiduw gwayeeshsha Fuga Yahuudi siitta sihhabiin, “Askweareani eaweetta Sabatto gil, ak ea mammiiseey gideaba gaysareana muundaang'u.”
