Ing'atta gingoorda Yeesu gageanu Shirikkara hang'weakkaaschi ak geesin gharmuchcheew ang'wan, ak gaba siisi sittaw gharmuchchandaannyi; ghabwada gageanda eara hang'da geaw gul ng'eanyi. Nea abeeda hang'dida geanap nea agi ghang'eada uhuuda ea gagul ng'eanyi;
hean gabaloola saawa gideaba, “Adeabwaashchi ghang'wana geng'alealleesi ak geadaayi siichchea gageanda.” Ng'asheanji geesin ak gwasa gida ghayi nyah Ng'oruutka bea gideaba,
“Ghoadabwaarda hang'weakkeasu aba jeannyaawa,
Ak gang'alealleesa hang'deanyu.”
Hean gwasindunu shirikkara. Abeeda murdeeda behiida Yeesu ghamiinaada Ghaamwat ea huda ghamaghaamwat, ea Mariyaayda was gatmooda Gleoppa, ea Mariya Magdaleena.
Daa Yeesu nea ghamiinaada ghaamwat nea gwanda murdeeda ginealaneetta bwariiyiin, gwayeeshsha Yeesu ghaamwat, “Iyya, ng'ulla balleadaang'u!”
Hit gwayeeshsha ginealaneetta, “Ng'ulla geamadu!” Ghang'eada damandida ghwaat ginealaneetta gwandeawa aba gheannyi.
Iing'atta nea ninal Yeesu gideaba niisha ng'asheega sean, gwayi, (ijeagwasa ng'oruutka), “Ghwaagan muwoash.”

Nea abeeda gwanda hoowa gweriida nyiit beega ng'weani bea haghweega geetta. Hean gegeanu gidawas ghabuschcheanda ak geappuutta jeeda beega ng'weani ak geahaaktaawa digheechcheanda ak geayiin ghuuttaannyi.
Ng'atta nea ninukghuta Yeesu beekka ng'weaniin gwayi, “Niisha;” ak ghwahiing'u uhuuda ak ghoabitta gurorooda.

Abeeda eaweeda giding'ding'deayda, ea mammiissina gideaba gaygobiida muscheekka iheenga behajeega eaweeda Sabatto (aba gideaba eaweeda Sabatto eaweeda haw gil), gaweay gamus Fuga Yahuudi Bilatto ehirjeaweada geeshanga ak gegeanda.
Gaweay Shirikkara ak gwahirja geeshanga siida madeeda, ea geaba siitta bea iyyeenya; ghwanyawa singooruudayi sea ninyiin;
iiduw nea ghwahitta heeda Yeesu ghwadaa gideaba nigeawiit ghami, ak ea mudugwahirjeaweada geeshangaaschi.
Hean gageanu Siyagi ak ghang'ut gisheajeega Yeesu aba ng'utta, deagheatta gwardu foojeanda ea beega.
Nea siitta daa nga'sheesuun gamuuwwu aba gideaba ng'asheega rugu gaba huumwa. Nea ghwanal gideaba gwarukku huumeanda ak abeeda ghoamwaschi.
Ng'asheesu geesin gwasa ng'ooruutka, “Manda eara geapkeadaannyi jea eehirja.”
Gabiikta gwayi ng'ooruutka suuk, “Gaygang'ula Fukka heetta ng'udiin.”

Iig'atta ng'asheesu gawa Yoseefooda ng'eanyiida Arimattaya was ginealaneeda Yeesu aba makcheameeda, aba gheawalmeeda fuga Yahuudi, gamus Bilatto musta Yeesu ghwaat, ak ghoadaw Bilatto gheatta. Hean ghwaan ak gageanda mustaannyi.
Deagheatta ghwahidu Nikkodeemooda ghayi weah heedaannyi eawa, ghwaan nea gweadu gharmuchcheanda sikkuuyi weapkeanda ea hideeda ng'andit nea ghwannyiit debajeanda ea dea agween iyyeenya.
Gegeanda musta Yeesu ak gekkwealsa hang'weakka bumbuni sea haleanjeetta ng'andidiin aba seareetta bea fuga Yahuudi bea eaweetta bunyischodean.
Hoowa singoorsean abeeda gwanda madamnyeanji mwanang' nea jeedeaba madamnyeanji gwanda bung'eeni ris eaghurghur miyeebung'sa siida jeeda.
Iiduw aba ng'asheega Yahuudi bea eaweetta giding'ding'deayda, ea gideaba eaneekki bung'eeda muuchchi geyiin Yeesu jeedida.
Hean eaweeda madeeda bea wikkajeanda, gawa Mariya Magdaleena heeda bung'eeda gheatta beashatta nea gudeamisana ak ghwadaa lagheaneeda nea sigeanda aba ghuutta bung'eeda.
Ng'atta ghafwach ea ghwahitta heeda Simon Betro ea ginealaneeda niirja ghayi bwariiy Yeesuun ak gwayeeshsha, “Sigeanda Ng'uttamiida aba jeeda bung'eeda ak ameanali heeda siyiin.”
Gaweay Betro sea ginealaneeda niirja ea ghwahitta heeda bung'eeda.
Gwasalda duwaawi, amaduw ghafwach Ginealaneeda niirja muuchchi ea ghoadaraam Betro, ak gosheeda ghwahitta heeda bung'eeda;
ghwahiiy geaw ak gong'wearsa jeeda shoomanda ak ghwadaa hang'weakka bumbuni mida hoowa, ak ea moabitta jeeda.
Ghwahidu Simon Betro, gweadu geeshta amahidu gawa jeeda bung'eeda; ak ghwadaa hang'weakka aba ng'eanyi,
nea weastida, heetta sirada uhuudaanyiin ea meanung' ng'wandeayi sea hang'dida, nea abeeda asimughut ak geayiin hichpa geaw.
Iiduw eara Ginealaneeda ghwanyawa asheeda ghwahitta heeda bung'eedean, earada ghoabitta jeeda bung'eeda, ak ghwadaa ak ghamwas;
abeeda mii ghwanal ng'oruutka ginnyaashta, bea gideaba gabean ea gaygwaduunna miyeeda.
Hean gabiikta Ginealangiga gaweay ghoah.
Abeeda Mariya ghaminaada aba murdeeda bung'eeda nea goyyeawda, damani duu goyyeawdewean ghwahiiy geaw gong'wearsa jeeda shoomanda bung'eeda;
ghwadaa malaykaji iyyeenya akkwa hang'weakka eashish nea gobiitpiit aba heeda heetta siyiin musta Yeesu, nea deamanda deascheeda uhuuda niirja gwanda deascheeda geeshanga.
Gwayeeshsha niny, “Iyya, ghwasaan anda giyyeawdi?” Gwayeeshsha gheamatta saawa, “Sigeanda Ng'uttamiideanyu ak amwaanali heessiyiin.”
Ing'atta rukunoodeaba ng'asheesu ghwasachsaghaat bwadaw ak ghwadaa Yeesu nea ghaminaada ak amwanala gideaba Yeesu gil.

Gwayeeshsha Yeesu niny, “Iyya ghwasaan anda giyyeawdi? Gigaseadayyi ng'eaha?” Duugwayeena Mariya gwadeeppea siida fur madamnyeanda gil gwayeeshsha, “Siida mureeda ideeppa eanigeandi ang'iing'i girukunean heeda iyiin, ak gaydawa aniini dageanda.”
Gwayeeshsha Yeesu, “Mariya.” Ghwayam geaw ak gwayeeshsha aba iitta Ebraniya, “Rabooni!” (nea gideaba Ginealshoochcheanda gil).

Gwayeeshsha Yeesu niny, “Ading'ng'wanyaan, aba gideaba mii dawa heeda Bwaabwa; asi ng'eada una heeda oorjooga iyya ak giyeeshshi saawa, aniini nascheang'di dawa heeda Bwaabwa nea Ghweandeang'wa gil, heeda Aseetteanyu nea Aseetteang'wa.”
Ghang'eat Mariya Magdaleena gawa ak gwayeeshsha ginealanga, “Naadaayi Ng'uttamiida;” ak gwayeeshsha saawa gideaba nirukusa ng'asheesu.

Iiduw nea niiw shing'adeeda eaweettida bea madeeda bea wikkajeandean abeeda ea nibassa geat Ginealanga jeemba ghaaw, nea abeeda asirat gidaghuut aba gheawalmeeda fuga Yahuudi, deagheatta ghwaan Yeesu ak ghamiinaada appugusta nyaawa ak gwayeeshsha, “Abeaha Hoyyoo.”
Iing'atta rukunoodeaba ng'asheanji gohiimsa geattingaaschi ea gisheajeagaaschi. Hean gahoosan Ginealangiga muuchchi iidaa Ng'uttamiida.
Gabiikta Yeesu ak gwayeeshsha gichcha, “Abeaha Hoyyooh. Gawuurji gidaghayi ajeakteaydanean Bwaabwa, asi earaniini geajeaktaneegwa agooga.”
Ahiit rukunoodeaba ng'asheesu gaguussa jeameada nea gwayeeshsha, “Ong'ng'waanya Guroorooda Ghaydit.
Nea iyosammiisi ring'eega buuneeda, gajeesamsa, ammosamsiini, ea majeesamsa.”
Damani Domasodida bea jeedeaba oorjookka attamaniyyeenya suguura Saleaygweandean, abeeda ghwanyawa ea mandeawana oorjooga suurja damandida hinna Yeesuun.

Hean gwayeeshsha Ginealanga suurja niny, “Sidaayi Ng'uttamiida.” Gwayeshsha niny saawa, “Imeadeaksiini geattingaaschi ghuusiga musumwaarajeega ak ghang'ng'waanyi monneedeanyu heeda haabwa deanneaduutka musumwaarajeega nea ghayiinnyi monneedeanyu gisheajeegaaschi ea maydamwas.”

Muchchu nea ning'atta eawoji sis gabiikta gichcha gabassa geat ginealanga jeeda ghooriida nea abeeda eara Domaso gwanda hiji. Abeeda gidaghuudajeega sirat, deagheatta ghwahidu Yeesu ak ghaminaada aba jeannyaawa ak gwayeeshsha, “Abeaha hoyyoo.”
Ng'atta gwayeeshsha Domaso, “Goona monneadaang'u iina hiji, ak gung'ulayi geattingeasu; ak gugooni gattindaang'u ak ging'ng'waanyi gisheajeegeasu; ak ea aduwosi siida mwamwasa, huwa siida mwas.”
Ghwasha Domaso nea gwayeeshsha, “Ng'uttamiideanyu ea Aseetteanyu!”
Gwayeeshsha Yeesu niny, “Gumwasi aba gideaba gidayaani? Ghang'wana fukka mwadahan amaduw ghamwasiin.”
Yeesu gwasin aba madeeda ginealangaaschi gwadeagwajeega suuk duguuga saang'a miyeang'waar aba jeedeaba gitaaboani;
suu geang'waar aba gideaba abeeda ghoamwaschi gideaba Yeesu Gristo gil, Balleanda Aseetta, amabeeda oamwaschi ghoanyaschi eaweega aba gheawungaaschi.
Iing'atta hiji gabiikta Yeesu gohiimsa geaw ginealangaaschi aba ghuutta basooda Diberiya, ak gohiimsiindunu geaw.
Simon Betro, ea Domasoyda suguura Saleaygweanda ea Nattanaeliyda ng'eanyiida Ganeeda Galilaaya, balloojiga Sebedaayo, sea ginealangaaschi suuk iyyeenya, nea abeeda gwandeayi sean.

Gwayeeshsha Simon Betro saawa, “Gaydawa daleallu ghweayeega.” Gwayeeshsha saawa niny, “Earaseasa gajetteayeena sea ang'iing'i.” Ng'atta godeayi ak gwading'da maleambooda; ak eaweedida amwanyasa eara gil.
Muuchchu nea gorearu aseetta ghaminaada Yeesu aba ghuutta basooda; nea ginealanga amwanala gideaba Yeesu gil.
Hean gwayeeshsha Yeesu saawa, “Diibiga, gondeawi ghweayeega?” Ghwasha saawa nea gwayeeshsha, “Manda.”
Gwayeeshsha saawa, “Ajaksiina gheareedanga murdeeda maleambooda bea geattinda dugwa, ak gajanyasa. Ng'atta gwajakta gheareedanga ak ghwaraay gongiiru aba seang'ayda ghweayeega.”

Iiduw gwayeeshsha ginealaneedida bwariiy Yeesuun Betro, “Nii Ng'uttamiida!” Iiy Simon Betro gideaba nii Ng'uttamiida gil, gageanu hang'daannyi ak gwaradischeewa aba gideaba gwachchi adawiish, amang'atta gwadeambiirsa jeeda beega.

Hean ghapka Ginealanga suurja ea ghwahidu ghuutta basooda nea gongiiru gheareedanga nea ghwanyiit ghweayeega, nea abeeda eamisheageewa ng'eanyiida ghajaam aba iisidasaada geeshanga gayghwahitta geeshan bughala hitteayda ghuutta beega.
Hitta ng'eanyiida ghajaam ghwadaa beasta ghuurga nea sughwar nea gwanda beasta ghweayeega ea mukkatte.
Gwayeeshsha Yeesu saaw, “Ayeanni hiji ghweayeega mwaatkwa olealu ghamneawa.”

Hean gwading'da Simon Betro jeeda maleambooda ak gaksu gheareedanga ea ghoahiidu ng'eanyiida ghajaam nea ghwanyiit ghweayeega hees nyiit bughala ea haradam ea damassanmwagu; earappeadi saang'a ea gwadeenuun, ea mii gang'achcheaweada gheareedanga.
Gwayeeshsha Yeesu saawa, “Apkaani ajaada ghuussi.” Nea abeeda ghanyea manda aba jeeda ginealanga dea badaksa ak ghoanyaash gideaba, “Ang'iing'i ng'eaha?” Aba gideaba ghwanal Ng'uttamiida gil.
Ghwaan Yeesu ak gageanda mukkatte ak ghoadaw saawa ak gwasindunu earaba ghweayeegiga.
Nii deaba samwagu gil aba gihiimsinda ahiimsa geaw Yeesu ginealangaaschi aba iing'atta dunnooda duunna miyeeda.

Iing'atta nea nijaat ghuusiga ghoanyaash Yeesu Simon Betro nea gwayeeshsha, “Simon, balleanda Yohaana, gibwarinyaan ea laabwana hoowa orjoosu?” Gwayeeshsha niny, “Eah, Ng'uttamiida; ginali gideaba aniini ghaabwariinyeay.” Gwayeeshsha, “Ahaaghwana gisilgeasu.”
Gabiikta gwayeeshsha niny deabiyyeenya, “Simon, balleanda Yohaana, gibwarinyaani?” Gwayeeshsha Betro niny, “Eah, Ng'uttamiida; ginali gideaba ghabwarinyeay.” Gwayeeshsha, “Ahaaghwana gisilgeasu.”

Gabiikta ghoanyaash deaba samwagu, “Simon, balleanda Yohaana, gibwarinyaani?” Gagiisan Betro aba gideaba geannyaash deaba samwagu gideaba “Gibwariinyaani” Gwayeeshsha niny, “Eah, Ng'uttamiida; ang'iing'i ginali haleanjeessean, ang'iing'i ginali gideaba aniini ghabwarinyeay.” Gwayeeshsha Yeesu, “Ahaaghwana gisilgeasu.

Aba huumwa, aba huumwa, geayeeshshineey, ghayi nea guduwosa gheareemaneeda iissa gimmuusi rada manandaang'u ak guwi heeda wassean igasayi; amaduw nea nihuwi gweargweeda, gajadoabiiwa geattingaagu, ak ghwarannyi siinuut ak ghwaannyi heeda ghwanyawa migassi una.”
(Aba inyas ghwanyaashtunuun gohiimsa Betro gichchea ghameawda ak ghoaghambiit Aseetta). Ng'atta ng'asheesu gwayeeshsha, “Eanni geeshteanyu.”

Iiduw ghwayamgeaw Betro ak ghwadaa ginealaneetta bwariiy Yeesuun, nea ghwaat geeshta, nea diitta ghayi diiw geaw aba daghattannyiin gil shing'ada damanda agiischooda nea ghoanyaash gideaba, “Ng'uttamiida siida jea ghwalaapnyi bwadaw ng'eaha?”
Daa Betro niny gwayeeshsha Yeesu, “Ng'uttamiida ama oorjeani?”
Gwayeeshsha Yeesu niny, “Iyeagasayi gobiida badayda ng'eanyiida ea dabiigu gwasawannyi naaha? Ang'iing'i eanni geeshteanyu!”

Hean ghaghayda iittida aba jeedeaba oorjookka gideaba ginealaneetta mayghami; nea Yeesu niny ea mii gwayeeshsha, ginealaneani mayghami geaghus gideaba gwayeeshsha, “Iyeagasayi gobiida badayda ng'eanyiida ea dabiigu, gwasawannyiini?”
Ginealaneani nii dea muuwwu ng'asheesuun gil, ak ghang'waar; ak geanalli gideaba muuwwunoadaannyi huumwa gil.
Gwanda ng'asheega saang'a sin Yeesu; nea inyeetta ghwanyawa geang'waar sean, ghaaghanyi eara ng'eanyida gwachchi mayghoammu godiiw gittabwajeega jea eang'waar.
Aba gittabooda madeeda, Ea Diofilo, geasinnyi haleanjeessean ghayi sin Yeesu nea ghoanaal,
ea ghwahitta eaweetta siyaada humng'eeda, iing'atta nea niidaw digheanda giijasoodiga ghayi loat aba naweeda Gurorooda Ghaydit.

Ak goohiimsa geaw saawa iing'atta miyeeda nea majeek ing'atta sawanadeeda nea ghoahiimda geaw aba gwadeagwajeega saang'a, ak gabussa saawa iing'atta askwearjooji haradam, nea gabaloola iitta sugoochcheandumeeda Aseetta.
Damanda mideayeewa gwareekusa saawa amwabeawana Yerusaleemu, ak ghoommuughu helleesiinda Ghweanda, nea gwayi, “gooyiing'si headeanyu,
gideaba, Yohaana goobattiisan aba beega, nea heeda miighang'attaawa eawoojusu saang'a agooga gajeeppattiisaneegwa aba Gurorooda Ghaydit.”
Iiduw nea ghabwat geat, geannyaash niny, “Ng'uttamiida, abeeda aba damani gajadeelsiina sugoochcheandumeeda Israeeli?”
Ng'atta gwayeeshsha saawa, “Miih gadiyeedeang'wa gil nalooda damannyoojiga ghana gheatta sin Bwaabwa aba gheambalmeadaannyi.
Ak gajanyasa uurda iiwuh heedeang'wa Gurorooda Ghaydit; ak gajahuuwa muushoodigeasu aba Yerusaleemu ea Yuudeeyeessean ea Samariya ea ghoaw muudeanooda ng'eanyiida.”
Iing'atta rukunoodeaba ng'asheesu, damanda duu gang'ulleewa, gettiing'da humng'eeda, ak gageandeawa shamooghooda madeeda gheanyanga nyaawa.
Hean nea gudugang'ula humng'eeda damanda beawa, ng'ulla ghamiinaada fii iyyeenya ammurdeeda nyaawa nea gookkwa hang'weakka eashish,

ak gwayi, “Fuga Galilaaya ghwasaan anda ghoamiinaadi nea gong'ulayi humng'eeda? Yeesuheeni beawa heedeang'wa ak gawa humng'eedean, gaygabiikteaydunu gawuurji gidaghamneawa oadaakti nea gawa humng'eedean.”
Iiduw gabiikta Yerusaleemu, nea abeeda gwaleabu gijeeni mida geediga sugura Masaytunajeega neekkeewa mujineeda Yerusaleemu, hitta gilomitteanagi;

iiduw nea gehitta, gaweay jeemba ghooriini sideeksa uhuumba nuut, ak goobiitpiit geaba Betro, Yohaana, Yakkobo, Andereya, Filippo, ea Domaso, Batlomayo, ea Mattayo, Yakkobo balleanda Alfayo, Simoneeda Selotte, ea Yuuda balleanda Yakkobo.
Fiisu abeeda ghabwat geat ghamwash Aseetta ghawooda, ak gwanda jeedeaba gadeemsu Mariyayda was gheamatta Yeesu, ea oorjooga ghaamwat.
Aba eawoojikka ghang'eat Betro ghamiinaada aba jeeda fuga siduupcheewi (nea abeeda monneeda buuneeda ghwahitta bughala ea diktam), ak gwayeeshsha,
“Fuga suduupcheewi, gaygwasa ng'ooruutka, ghayi rugu Gurorooda Ghaydit ammwadi aba ghuutta Dawdi, appadayda Yuudayda was siida asheedeawa fuga ang'ng'waay Yeesu.
Yuuda abeeda gaba meatkweendeanya aba gideaba gealoat eara niny gwasin gadiyeeni.”
(Ng'atta ghwasha siisi madamnyeanda aba gissiittaw aba munyindaannyi; ak ghoabeadaawa uhuuda ak ghwanyar jeeda ak gwardu hineagaaschi jarooda.
Ghwanal buuneessean bea ng'eanyida Yerusaleemu hean geng'assa madamnyeandida gheawunga ak geguura, “Akealdama” nea gideaba madamnyeanda foojeanda.)
“Aba gideaba geeng'orsa jeeda gittabooda Nyigheega gideaba,
‘Gagasa ghoaw gheannyi emeeda ak ea adagoobida sii jeada;’
nea
‘Hoorgeadaannyi bea gadiyeeda dageanda sinuut.’
Nea siyagi aba jeeda fuga siitteayeewi damannyoojiga sean wuna Ng'uttamiida was Yeesu nea gwaritteawa jeedeanya,
ghang'eada gibattiisanda Yohaana ea gagul eaweetta ghayi siyaada humng'eeda nea ghabeawa heedeanya nea siyagi aba jeedeaba fiisu geaghus eetteayeena ghoaw muushoochcheanda aba duunnoadaannyi.”
Hean iduw geergu gheawung'spa fii iyeenya, Yosefeeda suguura Barsaba nea ghaawun suuk geguura Yusto, ea Mathiya.
Ng'atta geamwash Aseetta nea geeyi, “Ng'uttamiida, ang'iing'i ginali guroruunatka buuneessean, asi ahiimneasa aba jeedeaba fiisu assiyeenyean siida iloadi,
ak gwasin gadiyeeni bea giijasoochcheandumeedean, gawa horgeeda ghayi bea Yuuda nung'usa heeda niny ak gawa hich nuut.”
Ng'atta geeng'alealleesa saawa, ak iiduw gealoat Mattiya; ak gheawungaaschi geeng'oorsiinnyi sea gea giijasoodikka attamwanagiin.
Iiduw nea nihitta eaweeda Bendegosti, abeeda gwanda fugasean hijagi.
Deagheatta ghwaanya ghuutta leabu humng'eeda nyashta jeammeeda sharareeda ng'waan, ea ghwanung' ghwannyiit ghooriidida sinda jeedean.
Gwardu duguuga uurji ng'ushapta beasta, ak goobitpissa uhuumba gilinyoo ea siihi.
Hean geannyiit sean uurda Gurorooda Ghaydit ak gabalool aba iit nuut aba gidagassiida Gurorooda gwarukutteayda.
Nea abeada aba Yerusaleemu gwanda Yahuudi fuga bada Aseetta, leabu emoojiga sean bea jeeda ng'eanyiida.
Hean nea geeyiy ghuutteaba nyeashtida ghabwat geat fuga sang'a nea ghahamng'eanyi sean muuchchi aba gideaba gaba sii iiy nuut nea gabaloola itta gheannyaawa.
Ak geabeal nea geahamng'eanyi, ak geeyi, “Heappi fiisu seanin siyinnyi nea gabalooldunuun mii fuga ng'eeanyiida Galilaaya?
Ak ghoawattaan anda geayiinnyi gil was sii nea gabaloola iitta ghaheanya?
Fuga ng'eanyida Partiya, ea Meedi, ea Elaami, ea fuga abiitta Mesopotamia, Yudeeya ea Gabadokkiya, Boonto ea Asia,
ea gealeabu Frugia ea Bamfiliya, ea Misri, ea gealeabu murdajeega Libya, ea gea leabu Kirene, ea rabasta leabu ng'eanyiida Ruumi, sea fuga Yahuudi ea gea niyamwa ghoaw fuga diineeda Yahuudi,
fuga Grette ea fuga Araabiya, geayiinnyi nea gabaloola sean iitta ghaheanya gadiyoojiga heas bea Aseetta.”
Hean ghahamng'enyi sean nea ghang'ut muuwda, nea gaba siisi anyaash nuut nea geeyi, “Seh ng'asheanji naaha?”
Hean gwanda fuga juuga suurja nea geeyi, “Fiisu niboogit aba difaayeeda heesseadi.”

Ghang'eat Betro ghaminaada sea giijasoodigiga attamanaagin, ak ghwajaat ghuttannyi gorgweaksa buuneeda nea gwayeashsha, “Ea fuga Yudeeya ea buuneessean abiitta Yerusaleemu, geagasayi anala ng'asheesu, ak golleysiiniit ng'asheegeasu ak ghoanalli nea ghoayiinnyi iidigeagwa ng'asheasu
Aba gideaba fiisu miigaboagit, aba gidoorarji, aba gideaba ghwasan ghamneawa nea aseetta gutgaba samwagu bea sakteayda;
nii deaghayi rugu sibaneeda sugura Yoeli,

‘Nea aba askwearjoojiga huydean gaygwasnu, gwayi Aseetta, gaydadaw buuneassean Guroroodeanyu, ak dibigeagwa was balloojiga ea haweega, gayghwaramoaran ak gheareemangeagwa gayghwadaah girgweatka, nea gweargweagwa gaygoorgweadi girgweatka;
eara soomjoogeasu was headiga ea gweallajeega askweajoojikka gaydeadabearsa Guroroodeanyu; ak gayghwaramoaran.
Ak gaydahiimu deamdeamanga, aba humng'eeda, ea gwadeagooda aba hiji bea ng'eanyiidean, foojeanda, ea beasta, ea aroosta haw;
ak gayghwayamwa aseetta gamsaniit, ak ghwayamwa sheeda ea ghawaar foojeanda, damanda miighwahinna eaweedida bea Ng'uttamiidean, eaweetta biissa ahaw ak adaajiin
Ak abeeda siida wassean nyoo gaguursa gheawunga Ng'uttamiida gajeelealu.’

“Fuga Israeeli, olleeysiina iit ng'asheesu: Yeesuuyda Nasareetti, was siida muuwwuneegwa Aseetta aba gadiyoojiga hees ea deamdeamanga ea gwadeagwajeega ghayi sin Aseetta appadaydaannyi aba dageascheedeang'wa, gawuurji gidoanaldi agooga,
Yeesuheeni siyaat humng'eeda aba gidabay ghwanalda Aseetta, ak goongoorji ak goonuuschi aba geattinga fuga munyas.
Ak siisi iiduw gooduudu Aseetta, nea gageandeawa sawanadeeda miyeeda, aba gideaba niny moammu ghoang'ng'waay miyeeda.
Aba gideaba gwayi Dawdi appadaydaannyi,
‘Aniini iissa ghaadaayi Ng'uttamiida aba madeedeanyu,
aba gideaba niny gwanda meatkweedeanyu bea geattinda dugwa ak abeeda ea meettuumduuman;
aba sarean gang'weela guroroodeanyu, nea gahoosan ng'ushapteanyu;
nea ghwaraanya saseedeanyu gaygoobiida jeeda rarooda.
Aba gideaba maynung'siina guroroodeanyu heeda maloonghajeega,
ghana nung' ghaghaarshan Siidaang'u Ghaydit.
Ak ea ninung' danal naweadinga eaweega;
nea ginnyiichchaan ng'weellooda aba iisindeayi.’”

“Fuga eaduupcheewi, geagasayi darukuneegwa nea geang'achchi idigeagwa aba ng'asheega ararji ghayi nyas sugoochcheanda siyi Daudi, niny ghayi ghami ak geebuy, ak bung'eadannyi gwanda hiji bea ng'eang'deanyean ea ghoaw ghamneawa.
Amaduw nea ghoaw sibaneeda, ghwanal gideaba Aseetta niyaak habeawooda appadaydeaba niny gideaba gayghwayiin hoorgeadannyi siida jea gwaleabu jattannyi,
gabean ghwadaa ak gabaloola duunnooda Gristo, ea gideaba niny miyeenung'usa Gheeda Maloonghajeega, nea saseadaannyi ea mii goomealu.
Yeesuheeni gooduudu Aseetta, ak aba ng'asheanji geewoschi muushoodiga.
Nea geettiing'da ea ghwahitta meatkweeda geattinda dugwa bea Aseetta, iiduw nea ninyas aba heeda Bwaabwa helleesiinda Gurorooda Ghaydit, ng'atta goodalealsa gitta oadaayi nea ghoayiinnyiin.
Aba gideaba Dawdi niny miigwadiyeada ea gawa humng'eeda; aba gideaba gwayi niy,
‘Ng'uttamiida gwayeeshsha: Ng'uttamiideanyu, Apteadawana meatkweedeanyu bea geattinda dugwa,
ea danung' ghoaw weajoodigaagu hoorgeeda geeshangaagu.’
Fuga sean bea gheennyea Israeeli, gammiissa ghwanal aba huumwa gideaba Aseetta ninung' ghoaw Yeesuheeni ghayi ongoorjiin Ng'uttamiida ea Gristo.”
Ak ghwayiy buuneeda ng'asheesu ak gwasawana guroruunatka nyaawa, hean geennyaash Betro ea giijasoodiga suurja nea geeyeeshsha, “Fuga siduupcheewi, gajeasina naaha?”
Ghwalamda Betro ak gwayeeshsha, “Aduukkuunana, giliwas sih geeppaattiisananeegwa gheawunga Yeesu Gristo aba samsiinda ring'eegeagwa; ak gegooneegwa Gurorooda Ghaydit.
Aba gideaba helleesiinda deang'wa gil ea diibigeagwa ea buuneessean sheagachchi, gilinyoo ea sih gil jea gaguursa Ng'uttamiideanya was Aseetta.”
Ng'atta gamuuwwu aba ng'asheega suuk saang'a nea ghamiin gheanyanga nea gwayeeshsha, “Alealni geat aba seaygeeni munyasiin.”
Hean fukka mwas ng'asheandaannyiin geeppattiisan, ak ghoahaada eaweettida fii sagalamnyooji samwagu.
Ak goodeaga geat ginealshooda giijasoodiga nea gabareannyi, aba banachta mukkatte ea mooshta Aseetta.
Iiduw ghwanyas giliwas sih muuwda; ng'atta geesin ng'asheega hees ea gwadeagwajeega aba geattinga giijasoodiga.
Ak fuga sean mideawa masaweegean goobiida hijagi ak eara haleanjeennyaawa gekkuuyi;
inyeessa gaba nishayda haleanjeedannyi mideawa ak gwalakkiisa geat ak gaba siisi siittaw gidaga.
Nea inyeessa galagasean geronnyeesa sean jeeda gheeda sibatta Aseetta nea geabwanach mukkatte aba gealga nyaawa, ghwaak hamitta nea gahoosan guroruunatka nyaawa,
iiduw geduumsheesa Aseetta nea ghabwariy buuneessean. Ak ghwanung' Ng'uttamiida ghoahaada monneeda fuga silealu galeagasean.
Ng'atta gaweay Betro ea Yohaana gheeda sibatta Aseetta damanda simwaasha Aseetta nea gaba Aseetta shageash.

Hean geesareenu siida badeeda ng'eada deaghayi sijiila, nea iissa gamuchchu ak geayiin gidaghuutta gheeda sibatta Aseetta suguura Gidaghuutta miy ak gamus haleanjeeda sisappa geadi bea ghadooweeda aba heeda fuga weay jeeda gheeda sibatta Aseetta.
Iiduw nea ghwadaa siidida Betro ea Yohaana nea ghwariikghta gaweay jeeda gheeda sibatta Aseetta, gamus eattaw haleanjeeda sisappa geadi bea ghadooweeda.
Ng'atta goohang'ooysa Betro ghaang' niny sea Yohaana, ak gwayeeshsha, “Heappi ng'ulleassa.”
Goofursa geaw sawa, nea ghaghayi gilijea ghwanyas gil aba heennyaawa.
Ghwalamda Betro ak gwayeeshsha, “Aniini meandeawani lappiya ghana lagheanga meeng'meeng'i, ak gaydagonnyi gideandeawi; aba ghawunga Yeesu Gristoyda Naasareet, ng'eada ak guwi.”
Ng'atta ghoang'ng'waay aba geattinda dugwa ak gagatkat ghamiinaada; deagheatta ghwanyas geeshangaaschi ea gheatkweakka geeshangaaschi uurda.
Gotgweala ng'enyi ak ghaminada ak gawa jeeda gheeda sibatta Aseetta nea goodeayi saawa, nea gootkwealeada aba hooseaneega nea gwaduumsheesa Aseetta.
Nea abeetta ghwadahada buuneessean gidaweeda siida, ea gidaduumsheesiinda Aseetta,
gwajeeng'u buuneeda gideaba nii siidida eawoajusu muusisachchi abiitta ghuutta gheeda sibatta Aseetta sugura, “Gidaghuutta Miyiin; hean ghabeal nea ghahamng'eanyi aba ng'asheega bussa siitta.”
Damanda neawsiina geaw siidida Betro ea Yohaana, gwasalda buuneessean gaweay heannyaawa aba doodooni sugura doodooda Solomon nea ghahamng'eanyi.

Daa Betro fugiga goorgweaksa buuneeda, “Ea fuga Israeeli, andagooga ghahameagwa ng'eanyi aba ng'asheanji, ak ghwasaan anda gong'ulleasa, nea ghoaghanyi gideaba siisi ghoahaap uurdeanya ghana doobiiwnatteanya ak geenung' gawa?

Aseetta Abrahaamu ea Isakka ea Yakkobo, Aseetta ghweenigaasa, nighambiit soomjeandaannyi was Yeesu ak siisi eadeaghayi oyiinnyi geattinga fuga hees gil ak goodardeaysi aba madeeda Bilatto, eara aba damandiida gasa gwasikksina ninyiin.
Amaduw ghoashaang'nyi dea Ghaydit was dea Assagi Doabiiwaat, ak googasayi siida nuusa buuneeda egooneegwa,
ak goonuuschi Siitta goona eaweegean, ak gooduudu Aseetta aba jeeda miyeeda. Ak aseasa geawaschi muushoodigeaba ng'asheanji.

Nea gheawungaaschi, ak aba masaweega aba gheawungaaschi, ea niidaw siisi majeeknatta was siida noadaayi ak ghoanalli; nea masaweekka sinyassa naweeda Yeesuun ea niidaw siida majeeknatta hit aba madeedeang'wa oogasean.
“Asi ghamneawa, fuga eaduupcheewi, ghoanalli gideaba iissa goosinnyi ng'asheega aba lendeeda, gawuurji gissinda fuga ahaaghwaneegwa.
Nea ng'asheanda ghayi bay ghwaramoar Aseetta aba ghuusiga sibangaaschi, nea gideaba Gristoheani gaygwasawana gil ak ea nisa.
Asi aduukkuunana, ak goobiikti ayamni geat, ak abeeda gegeanda ring'eegeagwa, ak abeeda ghwahidu damanda hawdeayda jea gwaleabu heeda Ng'uttamiida,
ama abeeda goojeagu Gristoyda ghayi siloat appadahuukkeagwa, was Yeesu,
was dea gasa goobiida humng'eeda ea ghwahitta damanda jea eang'ng'eada ng'asheega sean ghayi rugu Aseetta aba ghuusiga sibangaaschi ghaydidi ghang'eada dea waas.
Aba gideaba gwayi Muusa, ‘Ng'uttamiida was Aseetta gaygageanu sibaneeda aba jeeda fuga oduupcheewi gawuurji gidaloattanaan. Ak gooleeysiit niny aba ng'asheega wassean jea gwarukuneegwa.
Ak abeeda giliwas sii meeleeysiina iit sibaneeda gajeenuus gwaheelli buuneeda.’
Nea sibanga sean balool, ng'eada Samweeli ea gea duubu geashtaannyi, earaga gwargu iitteaba askweajoojusu.
Agooga goowoschi balloojiga sibanga ea helleesiinda ghayi adaw Aseetta ghweanigeagwa, nea gwayeeshsha Abrahaamu, ‘Aba jeattaang'u gayghwanyas fuga sean bea muunda ng'eanyiida ghawooda.’
Iiduw nea niduudu Aseetta soomjeandaannyi, goojeakta niny gaweesa fuga madeeda, ak abeeda gabadiischeesa giliwas sii aba jeedeang'wa arinnana jeeda munyasnachcheekkeagwa.”
Damanda duu goorgweaksiina buuneeda, ghapka heannyaawa ashoohoodiga sea shirikkarajeanda haw ng'ula gheeda sibatta Aseetta sea fuga suguura Sadukayajeega ghapka heannyaawa.
Gwanyareesi muuchchi aba gideaba ghoanaal buuneeda nea gwarukkwiida gideaba Yeesu niduuna miyeeda.
Geang'ng'waay saawa ak geehisa ghealooniga ea gamuchchu, aba gideaba niiw shing'ada.
Nea abeeda fukka saang'a iiy ng'asheesuun ghamwas; nea monneeda headiga ghwahitta sagalamnyooji muut.
Iimuuchchu ghabwat geat fuga ambaliischi sea gweargwa sea ng'oorshoodiga aba Yerusaleemu,
seat ashshoochcheanda haw sugura Annasi, ea Gayafa, ea Yohaana, ea Iskaanda, ea fuga sean bea dooshshta ashoohoochcheanda haw.
Iiduw nea niyiin bugusta nyaawa geannyaash gideaba, “Ngasheesu goosinnyi aba anuur ghana aba gheawungeabeang'a?”
Ng'atta ghwanyas Betro Gurorooda Ghaydit, ak gwayeeshsha saawa, “Fuga ambal buuneeda ea gweargwa,
asi ghamneawa iyoannyashcheasa iitta ng'asheanda miy sisissa siida badeeda, ea gidasihhaapta siida,

gagasa anala oogasean, sea fuga sean bea Israeeli, aba gheawunga Yeesu Gristoyda Nasareetti, ghayi ongoorji, ak gooduunna Aseetta miyeeda, appadaydeaba niny siisi ghamiinaada aba madeedeang'wa nea majeek.
Nii lagheaneeda ghayi heawa fuga deekshi, ak ghoaw lagheaneeda washiin akkar gheeda.
Ak ea manda lealeanooda aba hichpa siinnuut, aba gideaba manda gheawun suuk hing'eadayda humng'eeda ghayi siittaw buuneeda jea gwalealneasa.”
Daa saawa meaynatta Betro sea Yohaana, ak gwajeeng'u gideaba mii ghoassoamwa, fuga geallaan gil, hean ghahamng'eanyi; ak gwajeeng'u gideaba gwandeaydooschi sea Yeesu.
Iiduw nea ghwadaa siitta siihaabiin nea ghamiinaada aba murdeeda nyaawa, ghwaraay gwarguu gil aba gichchea ghwashaang'da.
Iiduw nea gwarukusa saawa gideaba aritteawana jeeda girgweageeda, hean goobalool geat saawa nea gwayi,
“Asi gajeesmana naaha fiisu? Aba gideaba ng'asheanda damdaamwaat sisin aba saawa ak ea nidaajiit aba heeda buuneessean abiitta Yerusaleemu, ak ea meammuusi eashaang'a.
Iimayghaghayda ng'asheesu muuchchi aba jeeda buuneeda, ghang'wana gereekusi saawa eamabiikta gwarukusa siida wassean aba gheawung'su.”
Ng'atta gaguursa saawa ak gereekusa saawa ea mabaloolana ghana ghoanaal aba gheawunga Yeesu.
Ghwalamda Betro ea Yohaana ak gwayeeshsha saawa, “Heappi nii humeandea gideaba gajeelleayseagwa iit ak ea mealleysini iit Aseetta asi girgeageeni alaja agooga;
aba gideaba meammuusi easiinda gajeerukuna iitta gissidaayi ea gissiyiinyi.”

Hean nea nimuuw saawa, ghwanung'waada gaweay, aba gideaba mwanyasa gheatta gichchea ghwaakta aba ghorjooda, aba gideaba gwanda hiji buuneeda; aba gideaba gwaduumsheesa buuneessean Aseetta aba ng'asheega bunu.
Nea abeeda siisi gwachchi sihabin abeatta gweanyeegaaschi ea ninaawa haradam.
Iiduw nea geettin gaweay heeda fuga duupchi ak gwarukusa saawa gitta gasa ashoohoodiga heesiin ea gweargwa.
Nea ghwayiiy, gagatkat sean daghanuunatka nyaawa nea googeal heeda Aseetta nea gwayi, “Ng'uttamiida Haw, ghayi sin humng'eeda ea ng'eanyiida ea basooda ea haleanjeessean mida jeeda,
nea aba ghuutta ghweandeanya was Dawdi, was soomjeandaang'u, ak gwargu aba naweeda Gurorooda Ghaydit,
‘Ghwasan anda Emoojiga gwanyareesi,
anda buuneeda gootteemsheesa haleanjeeda mwadaagha?
Sugoodiga ng'eanyiida nijip geat, nea fuga ambaliischi ea nubwatgeat,
ak ghaheawa Ng'uttamiida ak ghaheawa eara dea simmwaar,’
nea aba huumwa jeedeaba mujiineeni gabattiisa geat fuga heawa soomjeandaang'u ghaydit was Yeesu, was dea ghayi imwaari, sean Heroode sea Bontiyo Bilatto, sea fuga Emoojiga ea fuga Israeeli,
ak gwasin gidawassean ghayi bean gagasa geattindaang'u ea fughareadaang'u gideaba gaygwasa.
Asi ghamneawa, Ng'uttamiida, ng'ulla gimuuwda nyaawa, ak giidawi soomjoagaagu ak gwarukkwiida ng'asheandaang'u aba meaynatta sean,
ak giihaakti geattindaang'u ak ghoahaap siida, nea gwadeagwajeega ea deamdeamanga iissa geesin aba gheawunga soomjeandaang'u ghaydit was Yeesu.”
Iiduw nea sihhit mooshta Aseetta, gwadumdum heeda gwachcha bassa geat; ak gaba nii sinnyiit Gurorooda Ghaydit ak gwarukwiida giijasta miy bea Aseetta aba meaynatta.
Nea ghamneawa bareannyeedeaba fukka ghayi mwasiin gaba guroroanagi ak ghanyea manda siida ayi haleanjeessean mideawa ghanyea maygwayi geasu, nii abeeda saawa goobareannyi haleanjeessean.
Iiduw gaweay giijasoodiga nea gwandeawa uurda haw muuchchi ak gamuuwwu iitta duunnooda Ng'uttamiida was Yeesu, ak ghwanyas sean dagheerjeandumeeda haw.
Ak ea manda eara siisi gasa gil aba jeannyaawa, aba gideaba fuga mideawa madammeega ghana gealga gayghwashaayda, ak gweadu lappiyeetta bea gidasishaaydaan,
ak lappiyeetta geayiin geattinga giijasoodiga; ak iiduw geallaja gaba niisiittaw gidagasa.
Nea Yoseefooda ng'assa giijasoochcheanda gheawunga siyigheawunga siyi Barnaba (nea gideaba, Balleanda jea goomajeek gil), nea niny ea siida Laawi, siida ng'eanyiida Gupro,
ng'atta ghwashaayda madamnyeanda was daannyi, ak gweadu lappiya ak ghwayiin geeshanga giijasoodiga.
Ghayi gwanda siisi suguura Ananiya ak gwandeawa gatmoodaannyi suguura Safira, ghwashaayda haleanjeeda nyaawa mwaatkwa,
iiduw nea ghwanal gatmoadaannyi ghafuy haleanjeeda mwaatkwa, ak gweadu mwaatkwa ak ghwayiin geattinga giijasoodiga.
Ghwalamda Betro ak gwayeeshsha, “Ananiya ghwasaan andaginung' goobal guroroadaang'u Shattaani ea ghwanung' reenganna Gurorooda Ghaydit ak gifunyi haleanjeeda mwaatkwa bea madamnyeandean?

Madamnyeanda damanda mii shaaydaawana, abeeda mii daang'u? Ama ning'atta sheaydeayda, abeeda haleanjeeda ea manda geattingaagu? Abeeda ginyastiin gideaba gaysina ng'asheanji aba jeeda guroroadaang'u? Ang'iing'i mireenganni buuneeda gireenganayi Aseetta.”
Iiy Ananiya ng'asheesu, ghoabeada ak ghami. Hean iiyi buneessean ghabeal muchchi.
Ng'atta ghapka ghearemmanga ak geakwealsa hang'da ak geerutta jarooda ak geayat eebuy.
Iiduw nea ning'atta roobuut samwagu bea aseetta ghwahidu gatmoadaannyi jeeda gheeda, nea mwanala gidanupnu.
Ng'atta gwayeeshsha Betro gatmooda, “Rukunean monneeda oashaaydaawi madamnyeanda gwandeenu?” Gwayeeshsha gatmooda, “Ea gwadeenu.”

Ghwalamda Betro ak gwayeeshsha gatmooda, “Ghoanyastiin gideaba gajahelleesiina duwaawi ak goosimnyi Gurorooda Ng'uttamiida? Ng'ulla, geeshanga fuga buy siyeadaang'u gwanda gidaghuut, ak gaygooruuttaneey jarooda earang'iing'i.”
Deagheatta goobeedeaysa ng'eanyi madeeda geeshangaaschi ak ghami. Yamu geat gheareemanga ghwahidu nea nimi, ak geeruutta jarooda ak geebung'sa murdeeda siyeadaannyi.
Iiduw ghang'ut muwda haw muuchchi ganiiseeda sean ea fuga sean iiy iitteaba ng'ashsheesu.
Gwadeagwajeega saang'a ea ng'asheega deamdeameadi geesissa bugusta buuneeda nea gwasin geattinga giijasoodiga. Nea abeeda abwadageat sean aba Dodooda Sulemaani.
Ak ea manda aba jeedeaba fukka siida badaksa guyeedeaba fukka, amaduw ghoang'ng'waay buuneeda muuchchi ak gwasissa mureeda.
Ghoahaada muuchchi fuga mwas ak gooheadeesa Ng'uttamiida, fuga was emeetuw headiga ea gadeemga,

ea iissa eeyibwak ea easar fuga miyeani eayiin gheatkweakka naweadinga, ak geanung' gwalil appadahuukka bulaleenga ea likkajeega, ama abeeda hidu Betro earaghanyi goojiroon jirooneadaannyi buuneeda mwaatkwa.
Ghabat geat fuga leabu mujiinajeega neaweesa Yerusaleemu, nea gweadu fuga miyeani ea fuga beardooschi meangeenda, ak geahaap sean.
Ng'atta ghang'eat ashoohoochcheanda haw sea fuga sean mideawa, nea fuga mwaatkwa was Sadukayajeega, hean gwashissa ghaang'
ghoang'ng'waay giijasoodiga ak geayiin ghealooniga.
Iiduw eawa ghwahidu malaykajeanda Ng'uttamiida ak goottin gidaghuutta gheeda ghealooniga; ak goruutta jarooda ak gwayeeshsha,
“Aweayeena ak ghoominaadi aba jeeda gheeda Sibatta Aseetta ak gooruksi buuneeda ng'asheega sean bea eaweesuun.”
Iing'atta nea niyiiy ng'asheesu, muchchu gaweay jeeda gheeda sibatta Aseetta askweari ak goonealshi.
Ng'atta ghwahidu ashoohoochcheanda haw sea fuga mideawa ak gaguursa gweargwa girgweada ea fuga sean argweaji bea Israeeli, ak goojeakta gaweay ghealooniga gweadu fukka.
Hitta fukka heesiin, ea mwanyasana saawa ghealooniga, gwayamu geat ak ghoadaw iitta, nea gwayeeshsha,
“Geehissi ghooriidida siratiisa buneedean nea radaat nea furischoodiga ghamiinaada aba gidaghuudajeega, ama siittinnyi ea meanyasani eara sih.”
Iiy shirikkarajeanda haw ambal gheeda sibatta Aseetta sea ashoohoochcheanda haw ng'asheesu, ghahamng'eanyi appadahuukka nyaawa, nea gwayeena ng'asheesu gayghoaw naaha.
Deagheatta ghwahidu sii aba geshangiga ak gwayeeshsha, “Fugigeanji heetta oojaksi ghealoonigean, ghamneawa gwanda jeeda gheeda sibatta Aseetta ghwannaal buuneeda.”
Ghang'eat shirikkarajeanda haw nea goodeay shirikkareadaannyi ak gaweay ama hitta geeyeadu saawa nea meang'ng'wanyana uurda, aba gideaba ghoawal ea mafutteewana buuneeda lagheanga.
Iiduw nea siyeadu saawa, geanung' ghamiinaada aba madeeda girgweageeda. Ak ghoang'eat ashoohoochcheanda haw ghoanyaash nea gwayeeshsha,
“Ghwasaan nea geaheawi gideaba gajoannaala buuneeda aba gheawung'su, ak ghamneawa ea noannyiichchi Yerusaleemu ginealshoodeang'wa aba gideaba googasay ayeanni foojeandeaba siisi badahuukkaasa.”
Ghwalamda Betro sea giijasoodiga ak gwayeeshsha, “Gamiiseasa gideaba gajeawwala gheang'da Aseetta mwasamwa siida.
Aseetta ghweanigaasa gooduudu Yeesuuyda ghayi onuuschi aba damanda ongoorsiini uhuuda geettean.
Nii deaghayi adiing'u Aseetta gil ak gawa geattindaannyi bea dugwa ak ghoaw siida haw ea lealnoochcheanda, ak ghwanung' gwaduukuuna fuga Israeeli ak geesamsa ring'eega.
Aseasa geewoschi muushoodigeaba ng'asheesu, ak gwasnu eara Gurorooda Ghaydit adaw Aseetta fukkeanji sissa niny mureedean.”
Iiy fukkeanji ng'asheesu gwanyareesi muuchchi, ea gagasa gwanuus saawa.
Hean gwanda Farasayajeanda girgweageeda suguura Gamaliyeeli, was ginealshoochcheanda deaweeda, adawi buuneessean mureeda, ng'atta ghamiinaada ak ghwanung' erruutta buuneeda jarooda gilinuwaas.
Ama ng'atta gwayeeshsha fukkeanji, “Ea fuga Israeeli, ang'ulla muuchchi gichchea ahinda fiisu.

Nea damanda mii ghwahinna askwearjoojiga ghang'eat Dewdas, nea ghoahiimu geaw gideaba niny gili, nea niny gaba jeedeaba fukka, ramagu ghwahitta bughalaji ang'waniin, hit godeayi sea niny; amaduw gealach gheatta sea fuga sean aat geeshta ak geattaarda ea ghoaw haleanjeeda mwadaagha.
Iing'atta niny ghwahidu Yuudayda was siida Galilaayaan aba askwearjoojikka bea iittooda buneedean ak ghwaat buuneeda mwaatkwa; ak eara niny ghami, nea fuga sean aat geeshta ghwadarda.
Asi aba damani bea ghamneawean gaydayeeshshiineegwa, ohhelleewana geat fiisu ak ghoanung'waadi; aba gideaba badiini ghana fughareani ibea buuneeda, gayghoabeada;
ama iileabu heeda Aseetta, ea mwajoommuusa abwaanya fiisu aba gideaba gajiiduw geejeeng'u gideaba gosheang'nyeewi Aseetta!”
Ng'atta geesin gidagasa, iiduw nea geeguursa giijasoodiga, geabwar amahit geeruksa gideaba adagudoannalli buuneeda aba gheawunga Yeesu, iiduw geesiksa gaweay.
Gwaritta ak ghang'amwa madeeda girgweageeda, nea gahoosan aba gideaba gamiissa sawanadeeda aba gheawunga Yeesu.
Nea galeagasean iissa aba jeeda gheeda sibatta Aseetta ea aba ghoah ea mii ghwanung'waada ginealshooda ea rukkwiideayda Yeesu gideaba Gristohi.

Nea aba askweajoojisu ea niihaada monneeda ginealanga, ng'atta ghoaptu giniikghta dageascheeda fuga Yahuudi baloola iitta Yunaani sea fuga Ebraniya aba gideaba ninung'usa heeda masiinung'weega nyaawa aba lakkiisiinda haleanjeedeaba galeagasean.
Hit gaguursa fukka attamaniyyeenyean ginealanga sean nea gwayeeshsha, “Mwahida gideaba gajeanung'waada rukkwiideayda ng'asheanda Aseetta ak geeppiitpiichchi aba badahuukka measajeega.
Asi fuga eaduupcheewi, aloada fii ispwa aba jeedeaba fiisu miyaas searoojiin, mideawa Gurorooda Ghaydit, ak ea weaghoodi, ak gajeettaw gadiyeani.
Ak aseasa gajeamwaasha Aseetta nea geesinnyi gadiyeeda ng'asheanda.”

Nea ng'asheanda rugu goohoosan emeetuw, ak ghwaloat Stefaano, siida mideawa masaweega muuchchi ak gwandeawa Gurorooda Ghaydit, ea Filiippo, ea Burokkoro, ea Nikkano, ea Diino, ea Barmeenas, ea Nikkola, was siida doabiiwaat bea ng'eanyiida Antiyokkiya.
Ng'atta geayaat fiisu madeeda giijasoodiga, ak ghamwaash Aseetta nea ghwayiin geattinga nyaawa iheenga nyaawa.
Ghaghayda ng'asheanda Aseetta; nea ghoahaada muuchchi monneeda ginealanga aba Yerusaleemu, nea ashoohoodiga saang'a gwasissa mureeda masaweega.
Nea Stefaano, abeeda gwandeawa dagheerjeandumeeda ea uurda, gwasna ng'asheega deamdeameadi ea gwadeagwajeega aba jeeda buuneeda.

Iiduw gwanda fuga mwaatkwa bea gheeda sinnealshachcheewa bea Fuga abalgeat (aba gidasuguura), ea gea Greene, ea gea Aleksandariya, ea fukka leabu Gilikkiya ea Asiyan, hean ghoaptu sheang'nyeeda sea Stefaano.
Ak ea meammu eajoar aba weaghuumeeda adaw Gurorooda ak ghwanung' gabaloolliin.
Ng'atta geahaak buuneeda aba makcheameeda, nea gwayi, “Siyiinyi siisi nea gwargu ng'asheega ging'weakka appadayda Muusa ea Aseetta.”
Ak geng'ng'uuchchi buuneeda ea gweargwa ea ng'oorshoodiga, hean geeweesa niny ak geeng'ng'waay ak geeyaat madeeda gheeda sirgweachcha,
geesin muushoodiga ng'uyyeega ak gwayeeshsha, “Siisi moang'ng'wa ea marukuna ng'asheega munyas appadaydeaba hiji ghaydidiin ea deaweeda;
aba gideaba siyiinyi nea gwayi, Yeesuheani bea Nasareettiin gaygwanyarja gheawi sibatta Aseettean, ak gayghwayam searoojiga ghayi gooneasa Muusa.”
Asi gang'ula buuneessean niny, nea fuga sean mida jeeda gheeda sirgweachcha ghwadaa gideaba gheamamdaannyi gawuurji sea gheamamda malaykajeanda.
Ghwalamda ashoohoochcheanda haw ak gwayeeshsha, “Heappi ng'asheesu huumwa?”

Ghwasha Stefano ak gwayeeshsha, “Fugeaduupcheewi ea ghweanigeasu, oleeysean iit. Aseetta ghaambiidaat ghayi gabussiinnyi sea ghweandeanya was Abrahaamu, damanda mideewa ng'eanyiida Mesopotamiya, nea mii gawa goobiida Haraani,
ak gwayeeshsha niny, ‘Ng'eada ng'amwana hiji bea ng'eanyiidaang'uun ak ginung'usi heeda eara fugaagu ak guwi ng'eanyiida jea daahiimneay.’
Ghang'eat ghang'amwa ng'eanyiida eemeeda siyi Galdayu, ak gawa goobiida Haraani. Iiduw nea ning'atta miyeeda ghwaan, goobaleaga Aseetta ng'eanyiidida ak ghwahidu ghamway ng'eanyiin ghamneawa ondiini;

ak ea moadawa hearaniischooda aba ng'eanyiitta, eara hiji ayang'da baneakta geeshta, ak gwaheelleesa gideaba gayghoadaw niny ak ghoaw daannyi sea diibigaaschi jea gweadu geeshteaba niny, earappeadi mandeawana jeepta.

Hit goobalool Aseetta damandida nea gwayeeshsha, diibigaagu rabasta aba ng'eanyiida ambal fii suuk, ak aba hooweanji gajeenung' ghoaw ging'gn'oonyanga ak ghwanyas sawanadeeda gweannyeew bughalaji ang'wan.
‘Ak aniini gaydeargweaksa emeeda gadiyeesa,’ aba girrugu Aseetta, ‘nea iing'atta hiji gaygwarinna jeannyaawa ak ghaghadoawan aba hiji.’

Ak ghoadaw niny neajeeda ghasmeahooda. Ak ghoaw Abrahaamu ghweanda Isakka, ak ghwaat niny ghasmeahooda eaweetteaba sis; ak ghoaw Isakka ghweanda Yakkobo, nea Yakkobo ghoaw ghweandeaba oorjookka attamaniyyeenyean.
“Nea balloojisu inyeesa gwashissa ghaang' Yoseefu, ak geeshaayda aba ng'eanyiida Misri; nea Aseetta gwandeayi sea niny,

ak gwalealna jeeda sawanaduutkaaschi sean, ak ghoadaw alooheeda ea weaghumeeda aba madeeda Faraoyda was sugoochcheanda ng'eanyiida Misri, ak ghwanung' ghoaw sugoochcheanda haw bea ng'eanyiidida Misri ea fugeaba gheannyi.
Iiduw ghang'eat geejeeda ng'waan aba ng'eanyiida Misri ea ng'eanyiida Ganaani, ea sawanadeeda haw, ak eara ghweanigaasa ea ning'assa hamitta.
Iiduw nea ghwanyas iitta Yakkobo gideaba ng'eanyiida Misri gwanda booga, goojeakta ghweanigaasa aba ng'eetta madeeda.
Iiduw nea gabiikta gabareessa deaba iyyenya gwarukuta geawi Yoseefu aba heeda oorjooga ghaamwat ak eara Farao ghwanal oorjookeenyea Yoseefu.
Goojeaksa Yoseefu Yakkoboyda was ghwaan ea fukgheenyaawa sean, fii laadam ea damana muut;
ghang'eat Yakkobo gawa ng'eanyiida Misri. Ak gameewsa, niny sea ghweanigaasa,
iiduw geasar eakghuumda Shekkemu ak geebung'sa jeeda bung'eetta ghayi shaaha Abrahaamu lappiyeeda mida monneeda aba heeda balloojiga Hamori mida ng'eanyiida Shekkemun.
“Iiduw nea nineekkiit damanda heelleesiinda ghayi adaw Aseetta Abrahaamu, ghoahaada monneeda buuneeda ea ghwadarda aba ng'eanyiida Misri
ea eeyibwak ea goombal ng'eanyiida Misri sugoochcheanda nuut mwanala Yoseefu.

Ak gwasiissa fuga ng'eanyiideanya seareeda muy ak gwasissa eara ghweanigaasa ng'asheega munyas, aba gideaba gwading'sa ghweanigaasa gwahissa diibiga nyaawa manang'i jarooda, ea meabiidana ng'eanyiida.
Muusa abeeda geeji damani ak ea jeepta miy aba madeeda Aseetta. Geereersa gheanyaawa sheah samwagu;
iiduw nea geeruutta jarooda ghwanyas hudeaba Farao ak ghoarear ea gwaheedu nea ghoaw balleandaannyi.
Muusa iiduw geenaal weaghumeeda sea fuga ng'eanyiida Misri, ak ghwanyas uurda aba baloaldaannyi ea sinaweagaaschi.
“Geeyibwak ama ahiitta gweannyeew haradam, gagasa aba guroroadaannyi gawa ghwadaa fuga duupchi was balloojiga Israeeli.
Ghwadaa siyagi nea geabwar, hean gawa ghaweat siitta sisawaniin, ak iiduw ghawalda mureandooda ak gwanus siitta bea Misriin.
Niny abeeda ghaghayi gideaba fugaaschi duupchi gaygwajeeng'u gideaba Aseetta niyeadu siida jea gwalealu aba geattindaannyi ak ea majeeng'na.
Iimuchchu eaweeda bassa ghwadaa fii iyyeenya bea Israeeli nea gabearji hean gawa gooheel ak gwayeeshsha, ‘Agooga gowaschi oorjoospwa gheawagi, iijea gwaybwak ea abearjeena.’
Ng'atta ghang'eat oorjeeda gwachi bwar giischeewoochcheandaannyi ak gwajakta nea gwayeeshsha, ‘Ghwayiinyi ng'eaha gadiyeani bea gimbaliischoodean ea gideaba guwasi siida jea gooheeldooscheesa.
Gigasayi nuustanean gida heetta inuusti siidida bea ng'eanyiida Misriini?’
Iyiy ng'asheesu Muusa gamng'aw, ak ghoaw mang'eaweanyeanda aba ng'eanyiida Midiyaani, goobiida hoowa ea gwaji ballooji iyyeenya.
“Ng'atta gweanyeew haradam goobeersa Muusa malaykajeanda aba jeeda dareapcheeda neekeewa giijeeda Sinayi, aba ng'ushapta beasta yeada jeeda murunjooda.
Daa Muusa ghahamng'eanyi aba hoowa; iiduw nea gwaneekkiisa gang'ula ghwanya ghuutta Ng'uttamiida,
‘Aniini geawaschi Aseetta ghweanigeagwa, ak geawoschi Aseetta Abrahaamu, ea dea Isakka dea ea Yakkobo.’ Hean ghabeal Muusa muuchchi ea ghabwaadan ea ea mutghoammu gang'ula.
Gwayeeshsha, Ng'uttamiida niny, ‘Fakta geakkaagu aba geeshangaagu aba gideaba hiji imiinaadawiiniin ng'eanyiida ghaydit gil.
Aba huumwa naadaay ng'asheega munyas sisma fugeasu aba ng'eanyiida Misri ak ea naayiinyi shookka nyaawa, ak ghaawunnyi dalealu. Asi ghamneawa beenni gaydeajeaktaneey Misri.’

Muusa nii deaghayi siheawa, nea geeyeeshsha, ‘Ghwanung' ng'eaha huwa siida ambaliischi nea giheeldooschi buuneeda?’ Aseetta iiduw goojeakta ghoaw siida ambaliischi ea lealnoochcheanda aba geattinda malaykajeanda bussiinnyi aba jeeda murunjooda.
Nii deaghayi aruuna buuneeda ng'eanyiida Misri gil, nea gwasin gwadeagooda ea ng'asheega deamdeameadi aba ng'eanyiida Misri, ea aba jeeda Basoodareara, ea jeeda dareapcheeda gweanyeew haradam.
Nii Muusa dea ghayi eeshsha fuga Israeeli, ‘Aseetta gaygoojeakseegwa sibaneeda jea gawuurjeaweani ak siisi gaygwaleabu jeeda fuga oduupcheewi.’
Siisi nii dea ghayi mideawa buuneeda aba dareapcheeda gil sea malaykajeanda abalool niny aba uhuuda Giijeeda Sinayi, sea ghweanigaasa; ak geattaw ng'asheega mideawa eaweega jea gagoaneasa.
“Ak ghaheawa ghweanigaasa gwasissa niny mureeda, geasach ghoaw gidamwadaagha, ng'atta gagasa guroruunatka nyaawa gabiikta Misri,
Iiduw geeyeeshsha Aroon, ‘Sinneasa aseechcheekka jea goosheedeawaneasa; aba gideaba meanali gidanibussa Muuseeda ghayi aruuneasa ng'eanyiida Misri.’
Iiduw geesin meayda aba askwearjoojikka, amahit geattaw lukghamajeega gidamawosa Aseetta nea geesin ghweelmeeda hean gahoosassa gadiyoojiga geattinga nyaawa.
Iiduw ghwayam Aseetta ak ghwanung' ghabwat miinga humng'eeda, gawuurji gissung'waarda aba jeeda gittaabooda sibanga:
‘Neada haleanjeeda onnuuseadi ea lukghumajeega gogonnyeani,
gweannyeew haradam aba dareapcheeda, Ea gheeh Israeeli?
Agooga ghayi ghoasareannyi maheemajeanda Molokki,
ea ming'weanda aseetteang'wa suguura Refani,
ea gidaghayi osinnyi ak ghoabwachchi;
ak gaydeabaleageegwa ea dasuudeagwa ng'eanyiida Babiloni.’
Ghwanigaasa ghayi gwandeawa maheemajeanda muwwunooda aba dareapcheeda, ak gawuurji siitta ghayi abalool Muusa sgideaba sina, gawuurji gidaghayi daakta.
Iiduw ghoang'ng'waanyaan ghwanigaasa ea ghwahitta damanda Yoshuwa isihoan emoojiga aruutta Aseetta ammadeeda ghwanigaasa. Ak geang'ng'waanyaan ea ghwahitta damanda Dawdi,
ghayi nyas alooheeda aba madeeda Aseetta ak gamus beatta gawa gagasa heechchea goobiida Aseetta Yakkobo.
Ak siida iiduw deeksa gheeda ea Sulemaani.
“Nea Aseetta haw ghanyea meabiitteena jeeda gheeda sideasa geattinga; gawuurji ginnyaashta sibaneeda,
‘Humng'eeda hoorgeedeanyu bea gheambalmeeda,
nea ng'eanyiida ea hoorgeeda geeshangeasu.
Ana ghaaw gil dea jea adeeknean, aba ginnyah Ng'uttamiida,
ghana gwanda yeenu hoorgeedeanyu jea dafuufa?
Ak ea masna geattindeanyu haleanjeeni seaniini?’
“Ea fuga hang'oonyi iheen, miyeeyaat ghasmeahooda guroruunatka nyaawa ea iidiga, iissa galeagasean ghoattealli Gurorooda Ghaydit. Gawuurji gidaghayi sinda ghweanigeagwa, earagooga goosindunu.
Aba jeeda sibanga gajea anneeda gil dea mii ghaghabwas ghweanigeagwa? Ak genuuseada fukka ghayi rugu ammwadiin hinnooda siida Doabiiwaat assagi, was dea ghayi osawannyi ak goonuuschi,
agoogeeda noang'ng'waannyi deaweeda gawuurji gidaghayi goondaneegwa malaykajeanda ak ghanyea mii ghoang'ng'waay.”
Ng'atta nea ghwayiiy ng'asheesu gwanyareesi nea goowiiri geeshatka nyaawa appadaydaannyi.
Iiduw nea niny ea ninyiit Gurorooda Ghaydit, gang'ula humng'eeda ak ghwadaa gigheambiitta Aseetta, nea Yeesu ghamiinaada aba meatkweeda geattinda dugwa bea Aseetta;
Ak gwayi, “Ang'ulla, ghaadaayi humng'eeda nea ghwajaada, nea Balleanda Siida ghamiinaada aba meatkweeda geattinda dugwa bea Aseetta.”
Goojur muuchchi ea gwadukuta iidiga nyaawa ak geedeambiirsa sean ak geang'ng'waay.
Geeruuteawa jeeda mujiini ak geefta lagheanga; ak gageanu muuwshoodiga ghwayiin hang'weakka nyaawa geattinga balleanji suguura Sauli.
Damani sifutteewa Stefaano lagheangean, ghamwaash Aseetta nea gwayi, “Ng'uttamiida was Yeesu, deabwa guroroodeanyu.”
Ng'atta gwatkuy ak ghoahawda nea gwayi, “Ng'uttamiida, adiiduw ginung' ghwanyas fiisu ring'eani.” Iiduw nea niihiit ng'asheesu, ghami.
Ak ghamwas Sauli miyeadaannyi.
Nea aba eaweettida ghwanyas ganiiseeda mida Yerusaleemu ghabasta haw; ak ghwadarda sean aba jeeda ng'eanyiida Yuudeeya sea Samariya, ea eaghus giijasoodiga.
Iiduw gaweay fuga mwas Aseetta gabuy Stefaano, ak gaguuttu heareega muuchchi.
Aba damandideani Saulo gagasa gwanyarja ganiisa, aba gideaba iissa gawa jeemba giliwas ghoah ak gooruutta jarooda headiga ea gadeemga ak ghwayiin ghealooniga.
Iiduw fukkeanji dardaawaadiin gaweay gwarukwiida ng'asheanda.
Gawa Filippo mujiineeda Samariya ak gwarukwiisa saawa ng'asheega Gristo.
Ng'atta gooleeysiit emeetuw ginyaah Filippo, nea geadaa ng'asheega deamdeameadi sin.
Aba gideaba gwarinna meangeenda munyas jeeda fuga saang'a ghayi ninyas, ak goojuur aba ghuutta haw; ak eara fuga saang'a abiittu damealgean ghana fuga badoojiga geahhaap.
Hean gehoosan muuchchi aba mujiineedida.
Ghayi abeetta gwanda siisi suguura Simon ghayi ammwadi was beeneekweanda aba mujiineetta ea ghwanung' ghahamng'eanyi fuga ng'eanyiida Samariya, nea gwayi aniini geawaschi siida haw.
Inyeessa niny gooleeysiit muuchchi buuneeda, ghang'eada siida mwanang' ea ghoaw gea hees, nea geeyeenna, “Siisi uurda Aseetta suguura uurda haw.”
Ng'atta gelleeysa iit muuchchi aba gideaba nigeawiit inyeessa ghwanung' ghahamng'eanyi buuneeda aba beneetkweandumeadaannyi.
Hean nea ghamwas buuneeda giijasta miy bea Filippo bea badayda sugoochcheandumeeda Aseetta ea gheawunga Yeesu Gristo, geeppattiisan sean, headiga ea gadeemga.
Simon eara niny iiduw ghamwas, ng'atta giibattiisandaannyi hean goodeayi Filippo. Ak ghwadaa ng'asheega deamdeameadi ea gwadeagwajeega hees sisin, ak ghahamng'eanyi.
Iiduw nea ghwayiiy giijasoodigiga mida Yerusaleemuun gideaba fuga Samariya nimwas ng'asheega Aseetta, geechcheakta saawa Betro ea Yohaana,
gaweay ama hitta ghwamwaash Aseetta appadahuukka nyaawa gideaba gagasa ghwanyas Gurorooda Ghaydit;
aba gideaba aba damandida miigwashuubeesa sih aba jeannyaawa, gabeachchi gideaba geeppattiisan aba gheawunga Ng'uttamiida was Yeesu.
Ng'atta ghwayiin geattinga nyaawa iheengeaba fukkeanji ak ghwanyas Gurorooda Ghaydit.
Iiduw nea gwajeeng'u Simon gideaba Gurorooda geenyasa iiyiin giijasoodiga geattinga nyaawa buuneeda, hean gageanu ghoadaw lappiya,
nea gwayeeshsha, “Agooneani eara aniini uuri ak abeeda siida nyoo dayiin geattindeanyu uhuudaannyi ghwanyas Gurorooda Ghaydit.”
Ghwalamda Betro ak gwayeeshsha, “Roosiina hoowa ea lappiyeedaang'u, aba gideaba gighayi gilijea nyasa gidaguh Aseetta aba lappiya!
Ak ang'iing'i ea mibwaheasa nea meebareannyeeni aba ng'asheanji, aba gideaba guroroadaang'u mwadoabiiwa aba madeeda Aseetta.
Asi duukkuunana searoojusu ikkeagwa munyasiin, ak gumwaashi Ng'uttamiida, immuusi, ak gaygwasamseey aba gidigasayi mida jeeda guroroadaang'uuni.
Aba gideaba naadaayi gindi jeeda lachng'eanyiida ng'waan ea jeeda ghealooniga appadayda munyinda.”
Ghwalamda Simon ak gwayeeshsha, “Eaniyean amwasha Aseetta appadaydeanyu aba heeda Ng'uttamiida, ak ea adaghwanyasan gidawassean aba jeedeaba ng'asheesu oorguun.”
Asi ghamneawa inumuuwwu ng'asheega nyaawa ea rukwiideayda ng'asheanda Ng'uttamiida, gabiikta Yerusaleemu, ak gwarukwiida gijasta miy aba gharang'weakka saang'a bea ng'eanyiida Samariya.
Ng'atta gwayeeshsha malaykajeanda Ng'uttamiida Filippo, “Ng'eada ak guwi wilooda ng'eanyiida biyeara was bwalbwaleeda leabu Yerusaleemu gal Gasa.” Nea naweani ea eeshtearajeanda.

Ghang'eat ak gawa. Deagheatta ghwadaa siida ng'eanyiida Etiyopiya was gulaneeda, ak ea siida haw ambal Gandakehi was sugoochcheanda was gatmooda bea ng'eanyiida Etiyopiya, ambal eara maghastaannyi, hean ghwaan Yerusaleemu ghaghadoawan Aseetta
iiduw nea gabiikta ghoah; gawa goopteada aba badayda muttukkoadaannyi, nea ghoassoamwa gittaabooda sibaneeda suguura Isaaya.
Gwayeeshsha Gurorooda Ghaydit Filippo, “Siyeang'da ak guwi ding'da muttukkwajeandida ak gideayeewi.”
Ghafach Filippo gawa murdeadaannyi, ak ghwayiiy nea ghoassoamwa siidida gittaabooda sibaneeda suguura Isaaya, ak ghoonyaash, “Heappi, ng'asheesu isoamwaniin ginali?”
Ghwasha Siidida ak gwayeeshsha, “Gaydanaldaan aniini, nea manda siisi anaalan?” Ak gaguursa siidida Filippo gwading'da ak goobiitpiit sea niny.
Nea Ng'ooruutka asaamwa geeng'wardunu:
“Gawuurji gisilleanda siyaat ealach gheatta
gawuurji dayeenda gisilleanda silach buudeega nea ghwasiinda,
ak eara niny ea miighwanya ghuutta.
Geapwaaspwaas ak geaweada gidadoobiiwusa,
ng'eaha gil siida jea ghoomu gwargu ng'asheega seaygeedaannyi?
Aba gideaba eaweegaaschi sigeandeawa jeeda ng'eanyiida.”
Ak goobearsa siidida was gulaneedean Filippo, “Heappi sibaneani ghamwaash Aseetta appadaydeabeang'a inyas gwargu ng'asheesuun, gabaloola badaydaannyi ghana baloola badayba sii nuut?”
Ghang'eat Filippo ghwajaat ghuuttaannyi, nea ghoong'eada ng'ooruussu ak gwarukusa giijasta miy bea Yeesu.
Iiduw nea geeweay aba naweeda geeyibwak ea eehitta heeda mida beega, gwayeeshsha siidida was gulaneedean, “Hiji gwanda beega! Gwanda gichchea ghoadealan ea meeppattiisani?” [
Ng'ooruutka suuk bea garayi ghoahaat, Ng'atta gwayeeshsha Filippo, “Iimwasi aba guroroadaang'u sean, gay sina.” Ghwasha nea gwayeeshsha, “Ghaamwaschi gideaba Yeesu Gristo Balleanda Aseetta.”]
Ak ghwanung' ghamiinaada muttuk, ak ghwararang'aada duwaawi ng'eanyi ak gaweay jeeda beega, Filippo sea siitta was gulaneedean, ak goobattiisan niny.
Iiduw nea gwascheeng'na jeeda beega, ghwanung' Gurorooda Ng'uttamiida ghwaroat Filippo; ak ea mudugabiikta siidida was gulaneedean ghwadaa gichcha, ak ghang'eat gawa nea gahoosan.
Iiduw geadaah Filippo nea gwanda ng'eanyiida Asotto, ak gwasik jeeda mujiinajeega sean nea gwarukwiida giijasta miy ea ghwahitta ng'eanyiida Gaysariya.
Aba damandida Sauli ghoabeal buuneeda muuchchi nea gwanuus ginealanga Ng'uttamiida, ak gawa heeda ashoohoochcheanda haw
ak gamus niny barawajeanda jea ghwaat ghoorajeega sinnealshachcheewa mida Dameski, ea gideaba inyasa hoowa headiga ghana gadeemga aat Naweetta, ghoang'ng'waay ak gweadu Yerusaleemu.
Iiduw nea gwanda naweeda nea gwaneekiissa Dameski, deagheatta ghoabwaay murdajeegaaschi sean weeshinda leabu humng'eeda.
Goobeedeaysa ng'eanyi ak ghwanya ghuutta siida nea gwayeeshsha, “Sauli, Sauli, ghwasaan anda gighabwaschaan?”
Gwayeeshsha, “Ang'iing'i ng'eaha gil, Ng'uttamiida?” Ghwasha nea gwayeeshsha, “Aniini geawoschi Yeesu, dea ghamneawa ighabwasi;
asi ng'eada ak guwi mujiini, amiihitti gajeerukneey gichchea sina.”
Nea fukwachchi adeana Sauli ghamiinaada aba hoowa nea ghwasinda, hean ghwayiiy ghuutta siida ama sing'wearda ea meadaaha sih.
Ghang'eat Sauli aba ng'eanyi; ghwajaat gheanyeangaaschi ak ghwaraay ghoong'wearda; ama ng'atta geeng'ng'waanyaada geattinda ea ghwahitta ng'eanyiida Dameski.
Goopteada Sauli eawooji samwagu nea moang'wearda, ak ea mwaaga gil nea mwali gil.
Aba hooweanji bea Dameskiin gwanda ginealaneeda suguura Ananiya. Gwayeeshsha Ng'uttamiida siisi aba jeeda giirgweatka gideaba “Anania.” Ak gwayeeshsha, “Geandi hiji, Ng'uttamiida.”

Gwayeeshsha Ng'uttamiida niny, “Ng'eada ak guwi ea hitta naweeda suguura naweeda doabiiwaat ama ihiitti ghea Yuuda giibwaardi siisi leabu ng'eanyiida Darso suguura Sauli; ng'ulla ghamneawa ghamwaash Aseetta.
Ghamneawa anidaah siisi suguura Anania nea ghwahidu gah ak ghwayiin geattingaaschi uhuudaannyi ak abeeda ghwajaada gheanyangaaschi.”
Ghwasha Anania nea gwayeeshsha, “Ng'uttamiida, naayiinyi ng'asheegeaba siisi aba heeda fuga saang'a, ak eara ng'asheega munyas nisma fugaagu ghaydidi aba Yerusaleemu;
ak ghamneawa gwandeawa gheambalmeeda adaw ashoohoodiga hees bea gideaba gayghwoong'ng'waay ak gwajaksa ghealooniga fuga rukku gheawungaagu.”
Gwayeeshsha Ng'uttamiida niny, “Una, aba gideaba siisi dabichcheanda siloat gil iitteanyu ghwaat gheawungeasu jeeda Emoojiga ea sugoodiga ea fuga Israeeli;
ak gaydaahiimsa ng'asheega saang'a jea ghwanyasa sawanadeeda aba gheawungeasu.”

Iiduw gawa Anania ea gawa jeedeaba gheedida. Ak ghwayiin geattingaaschi uhuuda nea gwayeeshsha, “Oorijeediyya Sauli, Ng'uttamiida was Yeesu heetta iroonyeewi aba naweeda nea abeeda gigalu hiji, goojeakneani ghwajaada gheanyangaagu nea ginyasi uurda Gurorooda Ghaydit.”
Ng'atta ghoobitbinna gheanyangaaschi duguuguurji badatka aba geeshangiga, ak gabiikta ghoang'wearda. Hean ghang'eat ak geeppattiisan,
ng'atta gweagiischi ak gabiiksa uurda.
Iiduw gwandeayi eawojusu ng'ay sea ginealanga aba Dameski.
Ak deagheatta ghoong'eat ghuutta rukwiideayda iitta Yeesu, nea gwayi, aba jeeda ghoorajeega sinnealshachcheewa gideaba “Niny Balleanda Aseetta.”

Ghahamng'eanyi buuneessean alleeysiit, nea geeyi, “Siisi miidea ghayi las uhuuda buuneeda aba Yerusaleemu was fuga rukku gheawung'su? Ak ghwahidu hiji nea gagasa ghoong'waay buuneeda ak gwarada ak gweassa ashoohoodiga hees.”
Iiduw ghwanyas Sauli uurda, ak ghwanung' ghabeal fuga Yahuudi mida Dameski aba ng'asheanji gideaba Yeesu niny Gristohi.
Ng'atta eawoojiga saang'a, ghabwat geat fuga Yahuudi ak geemakcheamana nuusittaannyi,
ghwanyas Sauli iitteaba makcheameani. Inyeessa geefur dooshinga askweari ea eawa, nea geegasa eenuus niny;
iiduw gageanda ginealangaaschi eawa ak geappuuttaawa uhuuda ghamarda, ak gearraraang'daawa sooscheanda.
Iiduw nea ghwahitta Yerusaleemu gagasa gwandeay sea fukka was ginealangean; hean geewal aba gideaba miyeamwas gideaba eara niny niiw ginealaneeda.

Ghwaat Barnaba niny, ea ghwaat heeda giijasoodiga, ak gwaruukusa gidanironnyeatta aba naweeda sea Ng'uttamiida, ak gobalool, ea gidarukwiideayda giijasta Aseetta aba Dameski aba meaynatta aba gheawunga Yeesu.
Ng'atta gawa jeeda nea gwaritteawa jeannyaawa aba Yerusaleemu,
gwarukwiida giijasta Aseetta aba meaynatta aba gheawunga Ng'uttamiida. Gabalool nea gwasheang'dooschi sea fuga Yahuudi baloola iitta Yunaani; ak gagasa gichchea gwanuusta niny.
Iiduw nea gwajeeng'u fuga siduupcheewi ng'asheesu, geeyat ng'eanyiida Gaysariya, ak geenung' gawa Darso.
Iiduw ganiisa aba jeeda Yudeeyayda sean ea Galilaaya ea Samariya ghwanyas hoyyoo nea gedeegu; hean ghabeawa muuwda aba heeda Ng'uttamiida nea gageanda salagheang'da Gurorooda Ghaydit ak ghoahaada.
Asi ghamneawa damanda neayeewa Betro aba hiji ea hoowa aba jeannyaawa sean, ghwararang'aan eara niny ea ghwahidu heeda fuga ghaydidi abiitta Liida.
Ghwanyasa hoowa siisi suguura gheawungaaschi Aeneya, nea nimnyaan ea ghwahitta gweannyeew sis nea gobittu damealga.
Hean gwayeeshsha Betro niny, “Enea niihaapnyi Yeesuyda was Gristo; ng'eada mughuda mundaang'u.” Deagheatta ghang'eat aba geeshangiga.
Daa buuneessean niny fuga ng'eanyida Liida ea Sharoon, hean gwayamsa geat Ng'uttamiida.
Abeeda gwanda ng'eanyiida Yoppa ginealaneeni suguura gheawungaaschi Dabitta, nea gideaba Dorkas gil. Abeeda gwasna gadiyoojiga ninyas nea gaweeda buuneeda.
Eawoojikka ghwalas sheagheeda ak iiduw ghami; iiduw nea ning'atta gihundaannyi ak geeweay eyiin jeemba ghooriini sideeksa uhuumba nuut.
Abeeda Liida eaneekkeewa Yoppa, ghwayiiy ginealanga gideaba Betro gwanda hoowa, geechcheakta fii iyyeenya headaannyi eemus gideaba, “Asi geemuscheey beenni heedeanya nea adishing'di.”

Ghang'eat Betro ak goodeayi saawa. Iing'atta hinnooda, geayaat ettiing'da uhuuda ghooriida sideeksa uhuumba nuut. Ghamiinaada masinung'weega sean aba murdeadaannyi nea goyyeawuda, nea gehhiimsa meachkweega ahaat uurda saseeda ea hang'weakka sin Dorkas damanda duu gwandeayeewa saawa.

Hit goorutta Betro buuneessean jarooda ak ghang'da gutng'weakka ng'eanyi ak ghamwash Aseetta; ak gwayamsa geaw mustida ak gwayeeshsha, “Tabita ng'eada.” Ng'atta ghwajaat gheanyangaaschi, amang'wearda ghwadaa Betro ak ghang'eat goopteada.
Ng'atta ghoadaw geattindaannyi ak gagatganna ng'eanyi. Ak gaguursa fuga ghaydidi ea masiinung'weega ak ghwayiin madeennyaawa nea majeek.
Iiduw gageawiit iiteaba ng'asheanji aba ng'eanyiisean bea Yoppa, ak ghamwas fuga saang'a Ng'uttamiida.
Ng'atta goobida Yoppa ea gageanu eawoojiga saang'a, nea goobiida gheapa siisi naba muuchka suguura Simon.
Abeeda aba Gaysariya gwanda siisi suguura Gorneliyo, was shirikkarajeanda haw ambal lugooda shirikkareeda leabu ng'eanyiida Italiya,
siisi amiy ea fugeaba gheanyi sean, ak goowali Aseetta, iissa ghoadayda haleanjeeda sisappa geadi bea ghadoweeda ak ghaweat buuneeda, nea inyeessa ghamwash Aseetta galagasean.
Ghayi eaweechcha nea gaba aseetta shageash bea askweari ghwadaa muuchchi aba girgweatka malaykajeanda Aseetta nea ghwahidu gah ak gwayeeshsha, “Gorneliyo.”
Gang'ula nea nibeal ak gwayeeshsha, “Naaha gil Ng'uttamiida?” Ghwalamda ak gwayeeshsha, “Mooshtaang'u bea Aseetta ea haleanjeeda isabi geadi nidiyeada ak ghoaw giipkeatta aba madeeda Aseetta.
Asi ajeakta ghamneawa buuneeda gaweay ng'eanyiida Yoppa, gaguursa siisi suguura Simon, nea geeguura Betro;
niny gwanda gheappa siisi suguura Simon, was siida naba muuchchka, mida gheannyi ghuutta basooda.”
Iiduw nea gabiikta malaykajeanda, gaguursa fii iyyeenya was soomjoogaaschi ea shirikkarajeanda aba jeedeaba fukka amuukku ninyiin,
ng'atta nea nirukusa saawa ng'asheega sean goojeakta ng'eanyiida Yoppa.
Iimuchchu nea gwanda naweeda nea abeeda eaniriiksa mujiini, ng'atta gwading'da Betro uhuuda gheeda ghamwaash Aseetta nea gaba aseetta lah.
Iiduw, ghwayeachchi ak gagasa gichchea ghwaak; damandida siweay eegasa gichchea ghwaagiin ghwalas gheatta ruweanga ak goorgweadi
ak ghwadaa nea ghwajaada humng'eeda, ak geerareang'u giduurji hang'da haw, nea geeng'waanyaan meatkwajeega sean asang'wan ea ghwahidu ng'eanyi.
Jeedeaba hang'dida abeeda gwanda diyeanga sean ea gea badiina jeesinga ea dariidakka ng'eettiida.
Ak ghwayiiy nyeashta nea gwayeeshsha, “Betro, ng'eada; nuusa ak giyaagi.”
Ghwalamda Betro ak gwayeeshsha, “Manda, Ng'uttamiida; aniini miidaak eara heedaghayi haleanjeeda geallaan ghana gilinyoo gwandeawa ririnyeanda.”
Gabiikta ghwanya ghuutta gichcha deaba iyyeenya nea gwayeeshsha, “Haleanjeeda nimmiidu Aseetta, adiguuri duguuga geallaan.”
Ng'asheanji gabiikta nibwa samwagu, iiduw gitta geettealda humng'eeda aba geeshangiga.
Damani duu ghahama ng'eanyi Betro aba ng'asheesu daa aba girgweatkean gidawas, ging'ulayi, fuga gwachchi ajeakta Gorneliyo, ea nihita gidaghuutta ghee Simon, hean ghamiinaada aba gidaghuut
ak gaguurda nea ghoanyaashta Simoneeda suguura Betro mida jeedeaba gheawi.
Damani gudugooteemsheewa Betro aba ng'asheesu gwachchi dahiin, gwayeeshsha Gurorooda niny, “Ng'ulla, gwanda fii samwagu jarooda nea gagasseey.
Lamwaja rarang'aada ak giideayeewi nea adibeali; aba gideaba fiisu geajeagu aniini.”
Ghwararang'aada Betro ak gwayeeshsha fukkeanji, “Siida ogaseadayi aniini, ghwasaan anda googassean?”

Ghwalamda ak gwayeeshsha, “Goojeakneasa shirikkarajeanda haw ambaliischi suguura Gorneliyo, was siida awali Aseetta, ak gwasissa emeeda sean bea Yahuudi mureeda, ak siisi gwayeeshsha malaykajeanda ghaydit gideaba una gheedeaba siisi, ak golleeyseey iit gidajea rukuni.”
Gaguursa ak ghwanung' ghoaw rabastaannyi. Iimuchchu ghang'eat gawa nea goodeayi fiisu, ea fiisu ng'ay siduucheewi leabu ng'eanyiida Yoppa ak goodeayi niny.
Eaweetteaba iyyeenya geehitta ng'eanyiida Gaysaariya. Nea abeeda Gorneliyo gafurda fiisu ak gaguursa fugeaba gheanyi ea fuga duupchi.
Iiduw nea ghwahita Betro ghoah gwaritta jarooda Gorneliyo ghwadeapta ak gwatkuy aba madeeda geeshangaaschi ak ghaghadoawan.
Gagatgana Betro ng'eanyi nea gwayeeshsha, “Ng'eada, earaniini geawaschi siida.”
Damani duu gabaloola sea ninyiin, gawa gah ak ghwanyasa fuga saang'a bwatgeat;

gwayeeshsha fukkeanji, “Agooga goobay anala gideaba gilinyoo ea siida Yahuudi gil mwahida gideaba gay gaguuy sea fuga emoojiga suuk; nea aniini aniihiimnaani Aseetta gideaba adeaguuri siida wassean siida geallaan ghana gili bea ririnyaan.
Ghoaw sareani heetta iyooguuru ghaahidu nea mwaashaang'iin, asi gaydaanyaasheagwa googuuru naaha?”

Ghwayeeshsha Gorneliyo, “Ning'atta eawooji ang'wan, ak damanda uurji nii, ak ghamwaashchi Aseetta aba jeedeaba gheenyu; nea gaba Aseetta shageash bea askweari; ak ging'ulayi, ghamiinaada siida aba madeedeanyu nea gookkwa hang'weakka eashish,
nea gwayi, ‘Gorneliyo, mooshtaang'u bea Aseetta siyiiy ak eara haleanjeeda isabi geadi ea niipkaat Aseetta.
Ajeakta siida gawa ng'eanyiida Yoppa gaguursa siisi suguura Simon nea gheawunga suuk geeguura Betro; gwanda gheappa siisi suguura Simon, naba muuchka, mida ghuutta basooda.’

Ak geajeagu buuneeda aba geeshangiga ak eara ang'iing'i gidoabiiwi muuchchi aba gideaba guwuuni. Asi ghamneawa aseasa geendi hiji bea madeeda Aseettean, elleeysiiniit ng'asheega sean indeawi gonnyi Ng'uttamiida.”
Ng'atta ghoang'eat Betro baloaldaannyi nea gwayi, “Aba huumwa neajeeng'u gideaba Aseetta manda shiitmeeda;
aba jeeda giliwas eamwa siida wassean awali gheang'da Aseetta nea gwasna gea miyaas siisi gayghamwas niny.
Ak ghoanalli ng'asheanda ghayi ajeaksa fuga Israeeli, bea rukwiideayda giijasta miy bea hoyyoo aba naweetta bea Yeesu Gristoohiin, (nea niny ea Ng'uttamiida buuneessean,)
ng'asheanda ghayi sirukwiida aba ng'eanyiissean bea Yahuudi, ng'eada Galilaaya, iing'atta gibattiisanda rukkwiida Yohaana:

gidamwaarda Aseetta Yeesuyda Nasareetti aba Gurorooda Ghaydit ea uurda; ea gidaneayeatta nea gwasin ng'asheega miyaas nea ghoahaap buuneessean minighis meang'nyeandeendean, aba gideaba Aseetta gwandeayi sea niny.
Aseasa geawoschi muuwshoodigeaba ng'asheesu sin seaniin aba ng'eanyiida Yahuudi ea Yerusaleemu. Iiduw genngoorsa uhuuda geetta ak geenuus;
ak eaweetteaba samwagu gooduudu Aseetta ak ghwanung' eadaah;
ak ea mii heeda buuneessean gil, geaghus heedeanya ghayi loadeasa Aseetta eahuuwa muushoodiga, ghayi siyeagiischi nea geleeshi sea niny iing'atta dunnooda duunna miyeedean.

Ak goojeaktaneasa erukkwiida giijasta Aseetta aba heeda buuneeda, nea gorukwiidi gideaba nii dea ghayi iin Aseetta geattinga uhuudaannyi gil jea ghoaw dea jea goorgweaksa fuga majeekjeew ea gea nimeewa.
Ghayi niny gabean gamuuwwu sibanga gideaba siida wassean nyoo ghamwas siisi gayghwanyas samsiinda ring'eagaaschi sean aba gheawungeaba siisi.”
Damani duu gabaloola Betro ng'asheesuun, gwashuubeesa Gurorooda Ghaydit fukkeanji alleeysiit ng'asheesuun.
Nea fukka mideawa masaweega leabu jeeda fuga siyaat ghasmeahooda ghayi adeena Betrohiin ghahamng'eanyi, aba gideaba Gurorooda Ghaydit siittaw eara fuga Emoojiga.
Aba gideaba geeyiiy nea gabaloola iitta emooji suuk nea geekghambiit Aseetta. Ak gwayi Betro,
“Gwanda siida jea ghaweada beega fiisu ea meppattiisana nea ninyasta Gurorooda Ghaydit gissinyasti aseasa?”
Ghwanung' eppattiisan aba gheawunga Yeesu Gristo. Ak gamus ghanyi gwandeayi eawoojusu ng'ay.
Iiduw ghwayiiy giijasoodiga ea fuga siduupcheewi mida ng'eanyiida Yahuudi gideaba eara fuga Emoojiga nimwas ng'asheega Aseetta.
Gawa Betro Yerusaleemu, ak geenyareeksa nea gwasheang'nyi sea fuga ghasmeahooda,
nea geeyeeshsha, “Ang'iing'i ghwasaan andaguwi heeda fuga miyeayaat ghasmeahooda ak gimbuchcheewi?”
Hean iiduw gwarukuta Betro ng'asheega ghayi daa nea ghoong'eada gidaghayi ng'eatta:

“Ghayi nea geandi jeeda mujiineeda Yoppa nea ghamwaaschi Aseetta; nea geandi jeeda ruweanga, geahiimnaani giduurji hang'da haw, nea gerrareang'na humng'eeda, nea geng'waanyaan meatkwajeega sean assang'wan; ak geanung' ghwaan headeanyu.
Geang'weesi jeedida nea neekki ak ghaadaayi diyeanga ea diyeanga aga suurja ea diyeanga beawa jeesinga ea dariidakka humng'eeda.
Ak ghaayiinyi ghuutta eeshshiinean, ‘Betro, Ng'eada; nuusa ak giyaagi.’
Geayeeshshi manda Ng'uttamiida, aba gideaba gilinyoo gaba ririnyaan ghana gidamiih miy miighanyi dayiin ghuutteanyu.
Ghwanya ghuuttida leabu humng'eedean gichcha nea gwayi, ‘Haleanjeeda nimmiidu Aseetta adiguuri haleanjeeda geallaan.’
Ng'asheanji gabiikta nibwa samwagu, iiduw geattealda haleanjeesean humng'eeda.
Hean ghapka fii samwagu aba geeshangiga sicheaksean leabu Gaysariya ak ghapka gheeda eandi.
Gwayeeshiinean Gurorooda, adeayeewana fiisu nea adibeali. Oorjoosu allah siduupcheewiin eara saawa geadeayeewi, fiisu ghee Gorneliyo.
Ak gwarukuneasa gidaghayi hissiinda malaykajeanda miinaada ak gwayeeshsha, ‘Ajeakta siida ng'eanyiida Yoppa gaguursa siisi suguura Simon, bea gheawunga suuk suguura Betro;
niny gaygwarukneey ng'asheega jea gwalealneey, ang'iing'i ea fugeaba gheang'u.’
Damani duu dang'eada dhuutta balooldean, hean gwashuubeesa Gurorooda Ghaydit gawuurji gidaghayi sinyasti aseasa aba mwadi.
Ak ghaapkaachi ng'asheega ghayi rugu Ng'uttamiida bea gideaba, ‘Yohaana goobeattiisana beega, ak agooga gajeepeattiisananeegwa Gurorooda Ghaydit.’
Asi iniidaw Aseetta eara fuga emoojiga suuk Gurorooda Ghaydit gidagoondaneasa aseasa damanda simwaseawi Ng'uttamiida was Yeesu Gristo, asi aniini geawoschi ng'eaha daheawa ng'asheega Aseetta?”
Iiduw nea ghwayiiy ng'asheesu ghwasiinda. Ng'atta geakghambiit Aseetta nea geeyi, “Aseetta niidaw eara Emoojiga gheatta duukkuunooda ak ghwanyas eaweega.”

Hean fukka ghayi darda aba sawanadeeda bunu appadayda Stefanohiin gaweay ea gwasheagiidi ea ghwahitta ng'eanyiida Foinikke ea Saypras ea Antiyokkiya, nea gwarukkiida ng'asheanda aba heeda fuga Yahuudi.
Ak gwanda fuga mwaatkwa, was fuga leabu Saypras ea Grene, amaduw nea ghapka ng'eanyiida Antiyokkiya gobalool eara fuga Yunaani, nea gwarukkwiida iitta Ng'uttamiida was Yeesu.
Gadiyeani geesna uurda Ng'uttamiida, hean ghamwas fuga saang'a ak ghoahaada buuneeda yamsageat Ng'uttamiida.
Gageawiit iitteaba ng'asheesu ea ghwahitta iidiga fuga ganiiseeda mida Yerusaleemu, geechcheakta Barnaba gawa Antiyokiya.
Hitta hooweanji ak ghwadaa dagheerjeandumeeda Aseetta, gahoosan; ak gwayeeshsha fukkeanji oppiidana jeedeaba doobiiwnadi itteang'wean aba heeda Ng'uttamiida nea ghwaarjeang'da;
aba gideaba niny siida miy gil, ak gwandeawa Gurorooda Ghaydit ea masaweega, ak ghapka fuga saanga heeda Ng'uttamiida.
Iiduw gawa Barnaba ng'eanyiida Darso gagasa Sauli;

hean ghwanyas ak gweadu ng'eanyiida Antiyokkiya. Aba gideaba nindeayi gweayda mughuush sea fuga ganiisa, ak ghoanal fuga saang'a; nea aba Antiyokkiya ea heeda madeeda sishsheeda eguura ginealanga fuga Gristohi.
Aba eawoojikka ghapka sibanga leabu Yerusaleemu ea ghwahidu Antiyokkiya.

Hean ghamiinaada siyagi aba jeedeaba fukkeanji suguura Agapo ak gwargu ramooraneadaannyi aba uurda Gurorooda, gideaba gayghang'eat geejeeda ng'waan aba muunda ng'eanyiida sean; ghang'eada damanda waseewa Glaudio sugoochcheanda.
Ghang'eat fukka was ginealangean ak gabaniiaat gida ammu wassean, ak geeyeassa weetta fuga siduupcheewi mida Yudeeyaan;
ghoawaam lappiyeennyaawa, amahit geattaw Barnaba ea Sauli ghwaat ea ghwaahiitta heeda gweargwa.
Aba damandida ghang'eat sugoochcheanda suguura Herode ghuutta sawanda Ganiisa.
Ghwang'waay Yakkobo oorjeeda geennyaawa Yohaana, ak gwanuus aba bwaanga;
daa nea ghabwaariiy fuga Yahuudi ng'asheanji gabiikta ak ghwang'waay Betro. Nii geesin aba damandida bea mukkatteeyda meammwattawiidean.
Iing'atta ging'ooyda geejaksa ghealooniga, ak geenung' gafur gheamughuscheew ang'wan bea shirikkara, abeetta gabaysiina gideaba iing'atta ghweelmeeda Basakka geayaat madeeda emeeda.
Geayiin Betro ghealooniga; ak ghamwaash Aseetta fuga ganiisa.

Eaweedida jea gwachchi iimuchchu gooruunna Herodehiin, abeetta Betro gwalil aba dageascheeda shirikkaraji iyyeenya, ak ea sirada aba munyaloalaji iyyeenya, nea shirikkara suuk gafur gheeda sirattiisa buuneeda;

asi ng'ulla, ghwahidu malaykajeanda Ng'uttamiida, ak ghoabwaay weeshinda jeeda ghooriida mida fuga ghealooniga; ak ghwasat hamarjeeda Betro nea gwayeeshsha, “Lamwaja ng'eada.” Ghoabitbit munyaloalajeega gwachchi mida geattingaaschi.
Ghwalamda malaykajeanda ak gwayeeshsha, “Ashshuuba geaw hang'weakkaagu akkiillaabi geekkaagu.” Hean gwasindunu. Hit gwayeeshsha, “Radiischeena ak giyeadu geeshteanyu.”
Ghang'eat ak ghwaat geeshta; gwaritta jarooda, nea headaannyi gwanda jeeda girgweatka.

Gaweay ak ghang'atta ghwasuut shirikkareeda madeeda ea geaba iyyeenya, ak geehitta gidaghuutta gharinyeanda, ama sing'atta geeweay mujiini. Goottina gidaghuut nea gabwageaw, ama siritta jarooda geenyoo etteayi aba naweeda; deagheatta gwanung'usa heeda malaykajeanda.

Biissa gwajeeng'u Betro ng'asheanji ak gwayi, “Bissa neajeeng'u aba huumwa gideaba Ng'uttamiida goojeagu malaykajeandaannyi gwalealnaneani geattinga Herode, ak goruutteaweani jeeda ng'asheega ammuukkuunaneani fuga Yahuudi.”
Iiduw nea gwajeeng'u ng'asheesu, gawa gheeh Mariya, gheamatta Yohaana bea gheawunga suuk suguura Marko, ghwahitta nea nibwatgeat buuneeda saang'a nea geemwaash Aseetta.
Iiduw nea gaguurda aba gidaghuut, hean gawa hudi suguura Rooda ghwajaat gidaghuut.
Nal ghuutta gwajeeng'u gideaba siida Betro gil, hean gahoosan muuchchi ea eamutghwajaat gidaghuut, ghafach gawa gah gwarukusa buuneeda mida gah gideaba Betro ghamiinaada aba gidaghuut.
Geeyeeshsha hudida, “Ang'iing'i gibwaageas.” Amwasiinda huda gwayeeshsha, ng'asheanji earuguuni huumwa gil. Ak geyeeshsha, “Nii jironeadaannyi gil!”
Aba damandida Betro gudugaguuriideawa gidaghuut; iiduw geeweay ejaat gidaghuut, ama sidaah geehamng'eanyi.

Goohiimsiina buuneeda geattinda gideaba asiinda ak gwarukusa buuneeda gidaruutteayda Ng'uttamiida aba ghealooniga. Ak gwayeeshsha, arukusiina ng'asheesu Yakkobo ea fuga siduupcheewi. Hean gwaritta jarooda gawa daroar nuut.
Iimuchchu sakteayda, ea nung'ut muuwda shirikkarajeega nea geeyi nihissaani Betro.
Iiduw gagasa Herode ama mudughwanyas, gwasikteawa shirikkara ak gojeakta ghwanung' eenuuseada. Ng'atta ghabeawa Yudeeya ak gawa goobiida ng'eanyiida Gaisariya.

Iiduw ghwanyareas Herode muuchchi appadayda fuga ng'eanyiida Diro ea Sidoni; ak geapka headaannyi, nea abeeda ea nibalool Blasto, abeetta niny siida haw ambal gheeda sugoochcheanda gil, gaweay gamus gideaba nung' eebeaha hoyyoo, aba gideaba ng'eang'deanya ghaghus ng'eanyiideaba sugoochcheanji aba hamitta.
Ghayi eaweechcha ghang'eat Herode ak gooshshuup geat hang'weakaaschi bea sugoochcheandumeeda, ak gawa goopteadawa hoorgeadaannyi bea sugoochcheandumeeda, hean gorgweaksa buuneeda.
Goojuur buuneeda muuchchi nea geeyi, “Nii ghuutta aseetta gil, mii dea siida!”
Deagheatta ghwalasta malaykajeanda Ng'uttamiida, aba gideaba moaghambiida Aseetta; ak ghwaak ghuughuutka ea ghami.
Googuulli ng'eanyiisean ng'asheega Aseetta nea gwaheedu.
Iiduw nea gabiigu Barnaba ea Sauli, Yerusaleemu nea niihiit gadiyeeda nyaawa, gweadu Yohaana bea gheawung' suuk suguura Marko.

Asi jeeda ganiiseeda Antiyokiya abeeda gwanda sibanga, ea ginealshoodiga, nea geaba Barnaba gil, ea Simoneeda suguura siittuw, ea Lukiyoyda ng'eanyiida Gurene, ea Manaeni dea ghayi hissaheeda aba gheeda sugoochcheanda suguura Herode ea Saulo.
Ghayi eaweechcha nea ghabwat Ng'uttamiida, nea ghwarat jalooda, hean gwayeeshsha Gurorooda Ghaydit, “Aloada Barnaba ea Saulo gwasin gadiyeeda eaguursi gwasin.”
Iing'atta radooda jalooda ea mooshta Aseetta ghwayiin geattinga nyaawa iheengeaba fiisu ak geesiksa gaweay.
Hean iiduw ea niijeakta Gurorooda Ghaydit, ghwararang'aada ea ghwahitta ng'eanyiida Seleugiya; ak geeng'eada hoowa ak gwading'da maleambooda haw ea ghwahitta ng'eanyiida Saypras.
Iiduw nea ghwahitta Salami, gwarukkwiida ng'asheega Aseetta aba jeesinga ghoorajeega sinealshachcheewa bea fuga Yahuudi. Nea abeetta gwandeayi sea Yohaana nea ghaweat saawa.
Iiduw nea geesuut ng'eanyiida neaweesa basooda hean geahitta ng'eanyiida Bafo, sihitta geanyasa hoowa siisi was beeneetkweanda, bea emeeda Yahuudi was sibaneeda ng'uyyeega suguura Bar-Yeesu.
Siisi abeeda gwandeayi sea sugoochcheanda ahaghwa ng'eanyiida, suguura Sergio Baulo, ak ea siida mideawa fughareeda, hean gaguursa Barnaba ea Baulo aba gideaba gagasa ghwayiiy ng'asheega Aseetta.
Nea Eliimayda was benetkweanda (aba gideaba nii gidawas gheawungaaschi) ghaweada saawa, nea gagasa ghwayam sugoochcheanda goheelli masaweega.
Iiduw Sauloyda amaduw geeguura Baulo ghwanyas uurda Gurorooda Ghaydit geehhang'ooysa gheang'da siidida ak geeyi,

“Ang'iing'i guwosi balleanda meang'nyeandeenda, ak guwosi weajoochcheanda haleanjeesean doobiiweadi, ak gaba ng'uyya muuchchi ea munyinda, ak ea minung'waadani eara hutteayda naweadinga doobiiweadi bea Ng'utamiida?

Ng'ulla ghamneawa, gay ghwalasnyi Ng'uttamiida, ak gay ng'oawiida ea eamuttaaha weeshinda aseetta ea ghwahitta damwan.” Deagheatta aba geeshangiga ghwahidu headaannyi dung'usta ea misaneeda ak gagaseada buuneeda jea ghoang'wanyaada geattinda.
Iiduw ghamwas sugoochcheanda, iidaa ng'asheega bunu, aba gideaba ghabeal aba ginealshooda Ng'uttamiida.
Ghang'eat Baulo ea barandaannyi ak gwading'da maleambooda ghabeawa Baafo, ak gaweay ea ghwahitta Berga mida ng'eanyiida Bamfiliya. Ghwanung'wa heeda Yohaana fiisu ak gabiikta Yerusaleemu,
ak iiduw ghang'atta ea ghwahitta Berga hean geeweay ea ghwahitta mujiineeda Antiyokiyaayda mida Bisidiya. Hean eaweeda Sabatto gaweay jeeda ghooriida sinealshachcheewa ak goobiitpiit.

Iing'atta nea nihit giissoomanda digheanda ea gittaabooda deayeega Muusa ea gea ng'ooruutka sibanga, hean ghang'eat fuga hees bea ghooriida sinealshachcheewa ak geechcheaksa nea geeyeeshsha, “Fuga siduupcheewi, iyoondeawi ng'asheanda ogasayi amusa appadahuukkeaba fiisu ak goomajeek goorugu.”
Hean ghang'eat Baulo ak googeachchi buuneeda nea ghamiinda geattingaaschi ak gwayeeshsha;
“Ea fuga ng'eanyiida Israeeli, ea fuga sean awali gheang'da Aseetta oalleaydiit.
Aseetteaba emeeni bea Israeeli ghayi ghwaloat gheamba ghweanigaasa ak ghwanung' ghoaw fuga hees damandida mideewa ng'eanyiida Misri, ak goruudu aba geattindaannyi.
Nea aba gweannyeew haradam ghamilikghta sea saawa aba dareapcheeda.
Iiduw nea nilas uhuudeaba daroorakkiga assispwaan mida ng'eanyiida Gananiin, ghoadaw saawa ng'eanyiida nyaawa gwahearan, aba gweannyeew bughalaji ang'wan ea haradam ea damanamughuush.
Ng'atta hiji hean ghoadaw fuga laja girgweaguutka ea ghwahitta sibaneeda suguura Samweeli.
Ak iiduw gagasa eattaw sugoochcheanda; hean iiduw ghoadaw Aseetta Saulo balleanda Gishi, bea dooshta Benjamin ea ghoaw gweannyeew haradam.

Iiduw nea gegeanda niny, hean ghwaloat Dawdi ghoaw sugoochcheanda nyaawa; hean gamuuwwu ng'asheega badaydaannyi nea gwayi, ‘Naanyaschi aba jeeda Dawdi balleanda Yese siida mwas guroroodeanyu, ak nii ea siichchea gwasin ng'asheega sean eagasayi dasini.’
Aba siisi jea ghwahiduun niidaw Aseetta fuga Israeeli lealnoochcheanda, Yeesu, gawuurji gidaghayi helleesiinda.
Damanda mii ghwahinna ghanyi gooshoohu Yohaana ak gwarukkwiisa fuga sean bea Israeeli gideaba gammiissa gwaduukkuuna ring'eega nyaawa ak geeppattiisan.

Iiduw nea niihiit Yohaana gadiyeadaannyi gwayeeshsha, ‘Ghoaghanyi gili aniini eawoschi ng'eaha? Aniini meawosi siitta oofurdiin. Manda, ak gwanda siida jea gamaseawnean, ak aniini ea mammiisean deattin deandooda geakkaaschiin.’
“Fugeaduupcheewi, balloojiga dooshta Abrahaamu, ea buuneessean mida jeedeang'wa awali gheang'da Aseettean, giijasi bea lealnoodean siyanneasa.
Aba gideaba fuga mida Yerusaleemu ea fuga nyaawa ambaliischi, ak ea mwanala niny ghana gwajeeng'u ng'asheega sibanga sissoomani aba giliwas sabatto, hean ghoahiit aba girgweaksiinda.
Ak earappeadi ea meadaaha ramaseanda miisa nuustaannyi, geemus Bilatto ak ghwanung' eenuus.
Iiduw nea geehiit ng'asheega sean ghayi sung'oorsa badaydaannyi, gerrareang'na uhuuda geetta, ak geeyiin jeeda bung'eeda.
Ak gooduuna Aseetta jeeda miyeeda;
ak gabussa eawoojiga saang'a fukka ghayi adeana aba Galilaaya ea ghwahitta Yerusaleemuun, was ghamneawa muushoodigaaschi aba heeda buuneeda.
Aseasa geapkaannyi eyeaneegwa giijasta miy ng'asheandida ghayi heelleesa Aseetta gheamba ghweanigaasaan.
Ak ea nisissa aba heedeanya suwoschi diibigaaschi aba duunnooda Yeesu; gawuurji gidaghayi sung'waarda aba jeeda gittaabooda nyiigheegeaba iyyeenya gideaba,
‘Ang'iing'i guwosi Balleandeanyu,
aniini eanean neajiilleey.’
Damandida gooduunna jeeda fuga nimeewean, aba gideaba adagabiikta gichcha hooweanji ak gamunyiit, hean gwayi,
‘Gaydagooneegwa ghwaooda ghaydit bea huumwa ghayi bea Dawdi.’
Ak gwayi aba jeemba gittaabwajaan bea nyigheega,
‘May nung'waada Siidaang'u Ghaydit ghwanyas munyida.’
Eara Dawdi iing'atta sinooda gadiyeeda Aseetta damanda seaygeadaannyi, hean ghami, ak gebunyuudayyi ghwanigaaschi, ak ghwanyas saseadaannyi munyinda;
Nea siitta aduuna Aseetta jeeda miyeedean amwanyasa munyinda.
Ak ghoanalli ng'asheanji, fugeasu eaduupcheewi gideaba aba naweedeaba siisi gajeerukuneegwa samsiinda ring'eeda,
ak aba niny siisi nyoo ghamwas gaygoobal geaw aba haleanjeessean gidagwachchi maygwasa aba deaweedeeda ghayi bea Muusa.
Asi ashageada geat, adaghwanyaseagwa gea ghayi beangwargu subanga nea gwayi:
‘Ang'ulla, agooga fuga foolafii, ahamwang'eanyi, ak goroodayi;
aba gideaba geasinnyi ng'asheanda aba damandeang'wa,
ng'asheanda mwajamwasa gil, eara gwarukuneegwa siida.’”
Damanda ritteawa hean gamus buuneeda gabiigu gichcha eaweeda sabattoyda jea ghwaan gwargu muuchchi iitteaba ng'asheesu.
