Iiduw nea ghwadardaawa buuneeda girgweageeda gheeda sinneaoshachcheewa, hean ghwaat geeshta geaba Baulo ea Barnaba fuga saang'a bea Yahuudi ea fuga emoojiga suuk ghayi weay dineeda Yahuudi, hean goobaloola saawa gideaba aweayeena mwadi aba jeeda dagheerjeandumeeda Aseetta.
Hitta eaweeda sabattoyda bassa ghabwat geat fugeaba mujiineedida gooleeysiit ng'asheega Aseetta.
Hean ghwadaa fuga Yahuudi fuga saang'a, nea ghapka gwashissa ghaang', hean geeheawa ng'asheega gwachchi rukku Baulo, nea geebiissa eng'ng'eawi.

Gabalool Baulo ea Barnaba aba meaynatta nea gwayi, “Gammiisa gideaba gayghanyi erukuneegwa ammadeeda ng'asheanda Aseetta. Amaduw nea ghoaheawi ak gohindi geat gili mammiiseegwa eaweega manda muudeanooda, ang'ulla, gajeeyamsiina geat Emoojiga.
Aba gideaba nii gidaghayi rukuneasa Ng'uttamiida, nea gwayi,
‘Naanung' huwa weeshinda Emoojiga,
ak gihuwi lealeanooda ea ghwahitta muudeanooda ng'eanyiida.’”
Iiy fuga Emoojiga ng'asheanji, gahoosan ak geakghambiit ng'asheanda Aseetta; nea giikka ghayi sirarsean ghwanyas eaweega manda muudeanoodean hean ghamwas Aseetta.
Ghaghayda ng'asheanda Ng'uttamiida aba ng'eanyiitta seaniin.
Iiduw ghwahaak fuga Yahuudi gadeemga was fuga hees ghayi bada Aseetta ea headiga hees siiwali gheang'da bea mujiineedida, hean ghaghabwas Baulo ea Barnaba, ak gehoan ghang'amwa ng'eang'da nyaawa.
Ng'atta gabardeaysa birjeanda geeshanga nyaawa, ak gaweay ng'eanyiida Ikonio.
Gahoosan ginealanga nea ghwanyas Gurorooda Ghaydit.
Hitta ng'eanyiida Ikkoniyo gaweay jeeda ghooriida sinnealashachcheewa bea fuga Yahuudi, ng'atta ghamiinaada ak gwarukuta ng'asheega Aseetta ak ghamwas fuga saang'a, was fuga Yahuudi ea gea Yunaani.
Nea fuga Yahuudi suuk heawa ng'asheesu goong'uchchi buuneeda was Emoojiga suurja ak ghwadattas fughareenga nyaawa ghaheawa fuga siduupcheewi.

Iiduw goobiida hoowa ea gageawiit, nea gabaloola meaynatta appadayda Ng'uttamiida, nea gamuuwwu ng'asheanda dagheerjeandumeadaannyi, nea ghoadaw gwadeagooda ea ng'asheega deamdeameadi jea gwasin aba geattinga nyaawa.
Gwaheelli fugeaba mujiineedida; gea maba meatkweeda fuga Yahuudi suuk gaba meatkweeda giijasoodiga.
Hean gagasa fuga Emoojiga ea fuga Yahuudi, ea fuga nyaawa ambaliischi ak geegasa naweeda jea esawana giijasoodiga nea geefta lagheanga,
iiduw nea gwajeeng'u ng'asheanji gwasalda gaweay ng'eanyiida Listra ea Derbe, mida jeeda ng'eanyiida Lugaonia, ea ng'eanyiida neekkeewa;
hit goobiida hoowa nea gwarukwiida giijasta miy.
Aba ng'eanyiitta bea Listraan gwanda siisi apteada bea geeshanga badeeda; ghang'eada deaghayi sijiila mii ghanyi gaweelweel.
Siisi abeetta gooleeysiit Baulo damanda baloola; hean gang'ulla Baulo siisi muuchchi, ak ghwadaa gideaba siisi gwandeawa masaweega jea eahhaabwa,
hean gwayeeshsha aba ghuutta haw, “Miinaadawana geeshangaagu.” Hean ghang'eat siitta aba geeshangiga ak gawa.
Daa emeetuw gidasin Baulo, hean goojur aba ghuutta haw nea gwayi, Lugaonia nea gwayi, “Niiiseasa aseechcheekka nea gawuurji buuneeda!”
Gaba siisi sing'assa gheawungaaschi Barnaba geeguura Seu nea Baulo, aba gideaba niny siida gwachchi balooli, geeguura Heeme.

Iiduw ghwahidu ashoohoochcheanda gheeda sibatta Aseetta bea Seu mida ritteayda mujiini, nea gweadu heewga ea shiipka deakghweeda ak ghwayiin gidaghuutta mujiini, ak gagasa emeeda ghoadaw haleanjeeda sisappa geadi bea ghadooweedean.
Iiy giijasoodiga was Barnaba ea Baulo ng'asheanji, hean ghabwaashaada hang'weakka nyaawa ak gwasalda gaweay jeedeaba emeetta nea gooyyeawda.

Nea geeyi, “Buneeda, ghwasaan andagoosinnyi ng'asheesu? Aseasa geawoschi buuneeda mideawa searoojiga uurjeewaneegwa, ak geapkaannyi erukuneegwa giijasta miy, ak ghoanung'waadi haleanjeeni bea mwadaaghaan, ak gooyamsi geat Aseetta majeek ghayi bwat humng'eeda ea ng'eanyiida ea basooda ea haleanjeessean mida jeeda.
Ghayi garay Aseetta ghwanung'waada gilinyoo ea emoojiga gil gwasin gidagasa;

ak eara aba sarean ea mii ghwanung'waada muwwunoodeaba geaw aba ng'asheega miyaas sin, gagooneegwa roopta leabu humng'eeda ea booga aba damandaannyi, ak ghwanung' gwalang'u guroruunatkeagwa aba daghwara ea hooseaneega.”
Eara gabalooldunu ghwaraay gideaba gajeatteala buuneeda amoadawa giijasoodiga haleanjeeda sisapa geadi bea ghadooweeda.
Iiduw ghapka fuga Yahuudi leabu ng'eanyiida Antiyokiya ea Ikkoniyo; ak gafoolan buuneeda, ak geefutta Baulo lagheanga ak geengiir ea erruutteawa jeeda mujiini, nea geaghayi gili nimi.
Hean iiduw nea gwaneaweesa ginealanga hean ghang'eat ak gabiikta jeeda mujiini; muchchu eaweedeabiyyeenya goodeayi Barnaba ng'eanyiida Derbe.
Ahiit rukwiideayda giijasta miy aba mujiini nea ninyas ginealanga saang'a, hean ghang'eatng'eat gabiikta Listra ea Ikkoniyo ea ghwahitta Antiyokiya,
hean goomajeek guroruunatka ginealanga, nea gobaloola gideaba oppiidana jeeda masaweega, ak gwayeeshsha gajeanyasa sawanaduutka saang'a ijea eweaya jeeda sugoochcheandumeeda Aseetta.
Iiduw nea niloat gweargwa jea ghoahaaghwa aba jeeda ganiisa, aba mooshta Aseetta ea raditta jalooda, ghwayiin geattinga Ng'uttamiida was dea mwas saawa.
Iiduw ghang'eatng'eat gaweay nea gwasik ng'eanyiida Bisidiya, ak ghwahitta Bamfiliya.
Iiduw nea ghoahiit rukwiideayda ng'asheanda aba ng'eanyiida Beerge, hean ghang'eat gaweay Attaliya;
hean ng'eada hooweanji gealach bugusta basooda nea geeding'da maleambooda haw nea geebiikta Antiyokiya; heeda ghayi siittawa dagheerjeandumeeda Aseetta aba gadiyeeda nihiit.
Iiduw nea ghwahitta, geebwadageat ganiisa ak geerukusa ng'asheega sean nisissa Aseetta saawa, ea gidanijaatta Aseetta gidaghuutta masaweega aba heeda fuga Emoojiga.
Hean goobiida hooweanji ea gageanu eawoojiga saang'a sea ginealanga.
Iiduw ghapka fiisu ng'ay leabu ng'eanyiida Yahuudi ak ghoanal fuga siduupcheewi, nea gwayeeshsha, “Imeayaadeagwa ghasmeahooda gawuurji gidaghayi bea deaweedeeda Muusa, abeetta ea majeelealneegwa.”

Ng'asheanji ghwanung' gwardu sheang'nyeeda ak gobalool Baulo ea Barnaba sea saawa, ak gealoat Baulo ea Barnaba sea buuneeda mwaatkwa ak geanung' gaweay Yerusaleemu heeda giijasoodiga ea heeda gweargwa ghoanyaashta ng'asheanji.
Iiduw nea goojeakta ganiisa gaweay gwasik dageascheeda Foynikke ea dea Samariya, nea gwarukku gideaba fuga Emoojiga niyamsa geat Aseetta, ak gahoosan buuneessean appadayda fuga siduupcheewi.
Hean gaweay amahitta Yerusaleemu, ghwadeapta fuga ganiisa bea hooweanjiin ea giijasoodiga ea gweargwa, hean geerukuta ng'asheega sean sin Aseetta aba badahuukka nyaawa.
Iiduw ghang'eat fii suuk mideawa masaweega was fuga Farisayo, ak gwayi, “Ghwahit gideaba gajeeyaat fiisu ghasmeahooda, ak geerukusi ghoang'ng'waay deaweedeeda ghayi bea Muusa.”
Hean ghabwat geat giijasoodiga ea gweargwa ak gabaloola badaydeaba ng'asheanji.

Geebalool ea gageawiit baloolda, hean ghang'eat Betro ak gwayeeshsha, “Ea fuga eaduupcheewi, agooga ghoanalli gideaba ghayi ammwadi Aseetta ghwaloadan aba bugusteang'wa, ak aba ghuutteanyu ghwayiiy fuga Emoojiga ng'asheanda giijasta miy ak ghammwas.
Nea Aseetta nal guroruunatka buuneeda gamuwwu ng'asheanji ak ghoadaw saawa Gurorooda Ghaydit gawuurji gidaghayi gondaneasa aseasa;
ak ea masna shiitmeeda aba aseasa ea saawa, ak goohuun guroruunatka nyaawa aba masaweega.
Asi ghwasaan andagoosimsimnyi Aseetta ak ghoayiinnyi gheatkweakka ginealanga jokki nea eara ghweanigaasa ghana aseasa ameammuusi?
Ak geamwaschi gideaba aseasa gajeelealneasa aba naweeda dagheerjeandumeeda Ng'uttamiida was Yeesu ewuurjeewana saawa.”
Gwayi buuneessean saw; ak gooleeysiit Barnaba ea Baulo nea gwarukwiisa buuneeda gwadeagooda ea ng'asheega deamdeameadi sin Aseetta aba jeannyaawa aba jeeda fuga Emoojiga.
Ahiit baloolda nyaawa, ghwasha Yakkobo nea gwayeeshsha, “Fuga eaduupcheewi,
Simon ghwasaan nea nirgu gidaghayi deaptaayda Aseetta fuga Emoojiga, ak ghwaloat fiisu ng'ay aba jeannyaawa ghoaw fugaaschi. Ak aba nii ghamwas ng'asheega sibanga, gawuurji gissung'waarda.
Nea ng'asheanji ghamwas muuchchi ng'asheega sibanga, gawuurji gissung'waarda,
‘Iing'atta ng'asheesu gaydabiigu,
ak gaydadeas gichcha gheedida bea Dawdiin, ghayi abeadaan;
gaydabiikta dadeas heeda nyar,
ak gaydanung' ghamiinaada,
ak buneesuurja gaygagasa Ng'uttamiida,
sea Emoojiga sean ghayi sigurriisiina gheawungeasu,
gwayi Ng'uttamiida, ng'eaha siida ghayi nung' ghwanal buuneeda ng'asheesu ammwadi.’
“Asi aba girgweageedeanya nihi, adootteawiichchi fuga Emoojiga yamsa geat Aseetta,
ak ging'oorsi gideaba adoayaaji hamichchoojiga mideawa ririnnyeanda gidamawosa Aseetta ak ghwasaja geat hiseadayeandumeeda ea gida sing'ng'waay ghuutta ea foojeanda.
Aba gideaba ghang'eada seaygoojiga gwandeawa Muusa fuga rukkwiida ng'asheagaaschi aba jeesinga giliwas mujiini, iissa geassoamwa gilinyoo ea sabatto gil aba jeesinga ghoorajeega sinnealshachcheewa.”

Ng'atta ghwadaa giijasoodiga ea gweargwa gideaba amiy ea fuga sean bea ganiisa, gideaba ghwaloat fii iyyeenya aba jeannyaawa ak ghwanung' gaweay ng'eanyiida Antiyokiya sea Bauoo ea Barnaba. Hean gealoat Yuudaayda suguura Barsaba, ea Sila, ak fiisu geannaal muuchchi aba jeeda fuga siduupcheewi,
ak ghwaat barawajeanda sung'waardunu, “Fuga eaduupcheewi was giijasoodiga ea gweargwa, heeda fuga siduupcheewi was fuga Emoojiga mida Antiyokiya ea Siriya ea Gilikiya, ghaghachcheagwa.
Geeyiinyi gideaba gwanda fiisu ng'ay leabu ng'eang'deanya ak ghamwanmwaneagwa aba ng'asheega nyaawa, nea ghwanung' ea moapta ng'eanyi fughareengeagwa, nea ng'asheesu sin fiisuun ea meattawi aseasa,
ak aba heedeanya amiy gideaba gajeeneajeatta gilagi, ak gealoat buuneeda ak geechcheagu ng'eang'deang'wa nea goodeana fuga subwariinyi was Barnaba ea Baulo,
fuga ghayi ramagu gabeagu eaweega nyaawa aba badayda Ng'uttamiida was Yeesu Gristo.
Ghamneawa geechcheagu heedeang'wa Yuuda ea Sila, ak gaygwarukuneegwa saawa ng'asheega uurji suu aba ghuusiga nyaawa.
Ak amiy aba heeda Gurorooda Ghaydit ea heedeanya gideaba majeesareenneegwa sarean nuut geaghus haleanjeetta miseegwean:

nea gideaba anung'waada hamichchoojiga sighadoawana gidamawosa Aseetta ea foojeanda adoayaaji bannyeega gidasing'ng'waay ghuutta ea hiseadayeandumeeda. Abeeda iyohhelleewi geat haleanjeani abeeda ghoattoabiiwji. Ebeaseayu.”
Iiduw geechcheakta gaweay, ng'eanyiida Antiyokiya ghabwada geat fuga mwas Aseetta, amahit geettayda barawajeanda.
Hean nea geassoamwa barawajeandida ghwanung' gahoosan aba ng'asheega ammajeek saawa.
Nea Yuuda ea Sila, abeeda saawa ea sibanga gil, hean goomajeek fuga siduupcheewi aba ng'asheega saang'a ak ghwanung' gamajeekcheewiidi.
Ng'atta nea nibiida hoowa askwearjoojusu ng'ay gojeakta fuga siduupcheewi nea ghabeawa weada gabiiksa fukka ghayi ajeaguun. [
Ng'asheesu manda jeeda ng'ooruutkeaba garay, Ghwadaah Sila gideaba ghwahit gobiida hoowa.]
Hean iiduw goobiida Baulo ea Barnaba Antiyokiya, nea gonnealshi nea geerukkwiida ng'asheanda Ng'uttamiida, sea fii suuk saang'a.
Iing'atta eawoojusu ng'ay gwayeeshsha Baulo Barnaba, “Beenni eebiikta mujiinajeega ghayi surukwiideaysi ng'asheega Ng'uttamiida, eadaaha fuga siduupcheewi gissin.”
Gagasa Barnaba gideaba gaygoodeayi sea Yohaaneeda suguura Marko.
Hean ghwadaa Baulo gideaba mwahida gideaba gaygodeayi siida ghayi nung'usa heeda saawa aba ng'eanyiida Bamfiliya, ak ea meadeayi saawa gadiyeeda.
Hean gwardu sheang'nyeeda haw aba dageascheeda nyaawa ea iiduw gwaheelli; hean goodeayi Barnaba Marko ghwalach bugusta basooda ak gaweay ng'eanyiida Saypras,
ng'atta ghwaloat Baulo Sila ak godeayi, ak ghwanung' fuga siduupcheewi ghabeawa dagheerjeandumeeda Ng'uttamiida.
Hean ghang'eat gwasik ng'eanyiida Siriya ea Gilikiya nea goomajeek ganiisajeega.
Iiduw ghwahitta ng'eanyiida Derbe ea Listra. Nea abeeda gwanda hoowa ginealaneeni suguura Dimotteo, was balleanda gatmooda Yahuudi mideawa masaweega; nea ghwaan gaba emeeda suguura Yunaani.
Nea abeeda ea nimuuwwu fuga siduupcheewi mida Listra ea Ikkoniyo ng'asheagaaschi.
Baulo abeeda gagasa gideaba gaygoodeay sea niny; hean ghwaat ghasmeahooda aba fuga Yahuudi mida hooweanji, aba gideaba ghwanal sean gideaba ghwaan gaba emeeda Yunaani.
Damanda beawa nea gwasik jeeda mujiinajeegean, hean ghoadaw gang'ul ng'asheega gasa giijasoodiga ea gweargwa aba Yerusaleemu.
Hean ghwanyas ganiisajeega uurda aba masaweega, ak ghoahaada monneeda nyaawa galeagasean.
Iiduw geesik ng'eanyiida Fregiya ea Galattiya aba gideaba ghaheawa Gurorooda Ghaydit gwarukwiida ng'asheanda aba ng'eanyiida Asiya.
Iiduw nea geehitta monghooda ng'eanyiida Musiya, geegasa eeweay Bituuniya, hean amoadawa gheatta beatta Gurorooda Yeesu;
hean geang'atta nea geesik ng'eanyiida Musiya, ak gaweay ea ghwahitta ng'eanyiida Drowa.
Hean eaweedida geehiimsa Baulo siyagi bea ng'eanyiida Makkedooniya nea ghamiinaada aba hoowa ak gamus Baulo nea gwayeeshsha, “Ageawuni beenni Makkedooniya weadeasa.”
iing'atta nea ghwadaa gitta siihiimsean, deagheatta geegasayi eng'eada eweaya Makkedooniya, eahhiida ng'asheega gurneasa Aseetta erukusiina saawa giijasta miy.
Sing'eadi Drowa hean geeding'di maleambooda ak geelaji bugusta basooda ak geeweayi ea eehitta Samodrake, ammuchchu geahitti ng'eanyiida Neapoli,
sing'eadi hoowa geehitta ng'eanyiida Filippi, mujiineeda haw mida Makkedoniya, was ng'eanyiida ambal Ruumi. Hean geeppiidi mjiineetta eawoojusu ng'ay,

hean eaweeda Sabatto geeweayi ea eritteawana gidaghuut ak geeweayi ghuutta eenda, nea geeghanyi gideaba gwanda heeda jea eamwaashana Aseetta; hean geppiitpiichchi ak geeppaloolji gadeemsu bassageat hoowa.

Abeeda gwanda gatmoanagi aleeyseasa iit suguura Lidiya, leabu mujiineeda Diyattira, nea gwasheahhiida hang'weakka oomng'i, haw sheayeat ak gabada Aseetta. Hean ghwajaat Ng'uttamiida guroroadaannyi goleeysiit muuchchi ng'asheega rugu Baulo.
Iiduw nea sippattiisan, sea fugeaba gheannyi, hean gaguurneasa nea gwayi, “Iinoadaayi gideaba aniini geawoschi doabiiwaat aba heeda Ng'uttamiida, abeeda ghoapkaannyi oppiidana gheenyu.”

Ghayi eaweechcha nea geeweayi heeda sibatta Aseetta, geeroonnyeewi hudi was ging'ng'oonyaneeda mideawa gurorooda ng'ushteayda, nea inyeessa aba ng'ushtaaydaannyi ghwanung' ghwanyas meanang'oodigaaschi lappiyeeda saang'a.
Hean ghwaat hudida geeshta Baulo ea geeshteanya nea goojuur nea gwayeena, “Fiisu soomjooga Aseetta haw gil, ak ghapka gwarukuneegwa naweeda lealeanooda.”

Seareedida bea hudideani inyeesa gwasnu askwearjoojiga saang'a, gwaybwak ea ghwanyareas Baulo, ak gwayamsa geaw meang'nyeandida bea eendean ak gwayeeshsha, “Aba gheawunga Yeesu Gristo geayi ritteawana hudi.” Hean gwaritta aba geeshangiga.

Daa meanang'oodigiga bea hudideaniin ng'asheanji ea gideaba naweedida eawoojusu nyassa meanang'oochcheandumeedean biissa mutgwanda, hean geang'ng'waay Baulo ea Sila ak geengiir ea ehiitta jeannaada was madeeda fuga hees ambaliischi;
ak iiduw geayaat heeda fuga laja girgweaguutka ak geeyeeshsha, “Fiisu fuga Yahuudi gil ak ghwadattas mujiineedeanya.
Aba gideaba gwarukwiisa buuneeda deaweedeeda mammiiseasa aseasa fuga Ruumi gideaba gajeeng'ng'waanya ak geeyaachchi geeshta.”
Ghwaat geeshta nyaawa emeetuw nea ninyareas nea geegasa eabwar ak gageanu fuga laja girgweaguutka ak ghwanung' efakta hang'weakka Baulo ea Sila aba uurda ak ghwanung' ebwar aba ng'aritka.
Iiduw nea nihit bayiiga nea sisawan muuchchi, hean geejaksa ghealooniga, ak geeyeeshsha furiischoochcheanda gheeda sirattiisa buuneeda gideaba furiischeena muuchchi.
Iiy ng'asheanji, hean gageanu ak ghwaat jeeda ghooriida duukteawa niirja mida hoowa bea gahiin ak geerassa geeshanga nyaawa gumsheekka daranajeega.
Hitta bugusta eaweeda abeeda Baulo ea Sila ghamwaash Aseetta nea gwasarman sarmeeda gigheambiitta Aseetta, nea gooleeysiit buneesuurja bea ghealooniga,

deagheatta gwasimgeaw ng'eanyiida, ak ghwanung' gwadumdum sindeetta gheeda sirattiisa buuneeda; miighoaw gil goottina gidaghuudajeega ak goottineada eara munyalaalajeega siratta fukka bea ghealoonigean.
Iiduw nea ghang'eat shirikkarajeanda gwachchi furiischi nea ghwadaa gidaghuut ajaadaat, hean gafagu bwaangeadaannyi ak gagasa gwanuus geaw, nea ghaghay gil nuwaapta buuneeda mida ghealooniga.
Hean gaguurda Baulo nea goojuur nea gwayeeshsha, “Adinuusi geaw aba gideaba aseasa geendi hiji sean.”
Hean gaguurda shirikkarajeanda eyeadu gheaboong'nyeanda amahit ghafwach gawa gah, nea ghabwaadan aba muuwda ak goobeedeaysa madeeda Baulo ea Sila,
hean gooruudu jarooda ak goobearsa nea gwayeeshsha, “Ea fuga Mureeda, ak daysin naaha ijea dalaalaan?”
Ghwalamda saawa ak gwayeeshsha, “Mwasa Ng'uttamiida was Yeesu, ak gajeelealneey, ea fugeaba gheang'u.”
Hean geerukusa ng'asheega Ng'uttamiida niny ea fugeaba gheanyi sean.
Iiduw ghwaat shirikkarajeandida ghoah ak goohuun deaneaduutkeaba fukkeani eaweedida, hean geeppattiisan aba geeshangiga niny ea fugeaba gheanyi.
Ng'atta ghwaat shirikkarajeandida gheanyi, ak ghoadaw gichchea ghwaak; ak gahoosan sea fugeaba gheanyi aba gideaba nimwas Aseetta.
Muchchu sakteayda, goojeakta fukka laja girgweaguutkean shirikkara nea gwayeeshsha, “Aweayeena ak goosiksi fukka mida ghealoonigean.”
Gawa shirikkarajeandida gwachchi furiischiin ak gwarukusa Baulo ng'asheega nea gwayeeshsha, “Niijeagu fukka laja girgweaguutkean eesikseegwa; asi arinni ak gooweayi nea goobea hoyyoo.”

Ghwalamda Baulo ak gwayeeshsha, “Aseasa geebwareasa aba madeeda buuneeda, nea meergweakseasa, ak gabiissa aseasa eawosa fuga ng'eanyiida Ruumi, hit geejakseasa ghealooniga; ak ghamneawa geegasa esikseasa aba makcheameeda? Manda! Nung'waada ghapka saawa gwasikseasa.”
Goodeelsa shirikkarajeega ng'asheanji heeda fuga laja girgweaguutkean, iiduw nea ghwanyas iitta gideaba fuga ng'eanyiida Ruumi gil;
ghapka gamearmearani. Gooruuna gah ak gwayeeshsha abeawana jeedeaba mujiineedida.
Iiduw nea gwaritteawa ghealooniga ak gaweay gabareassa Lidiya; hitta nea ghwadaa fuga duupchi, hean goomajeek amahit ghang'eang'eat gaweay.
Muchchu ghang'eatng'eat gaweay nea gwasik ng'eanyiida Amfipooli ea Appoloniya, ghwahitta ng'eanyiida Desalonikke, mida ghooriida sinnealshachcheewa bea fuga Yahuudi.
Hean gawa Baulo jeeda ghooriida, gawuurji gideabeawoojusu bea geallaan, ak gwasheang'dooschi sea buuneeda aba ng'asheega Ng'ooruutka Ghaydit eawooji diktam ea agi;
abeeda gwarukusa buuneeda gidanyaah ng'ooruutka bea gideaba Gristo gayghwanyas hang'weaniidooda ak gwaduuna miyeeda, ak gabiikta gwayeeshsha, “Yeesuheeni ghamneawa earukuneegwean, Gristo gil.”
Hean iiduw ghamwas fuga mwaatkwa ak ghwaat geeshta Baulo ea Sila; ak eara fuga saang'a bea Yunaani awali gheang'da Aseetta ea gadeemga saang'a was fuga hees.

Gwashissa ghaang' fuga Yahuudi, ak gaweay ghamwaghaada fuga munyas seara saang'a aba jeeda mujiini ak gooyuuk buuneeda, hean geeng'eessa gheeh Yason, nea geegasa erruudu jarooda ak geayaat madeeda buuneeda.
Ama iiduw nea mudeanyas, hean geengiir Yason eayaat sea fiisu ng'ay siduupcheewi ak geayaat ea eehitta madeeda sugoodiga mujiini, nea geechchuur nea geeyi, “Fiisu yam ng'eanyiidean nupka eara hiji,
ak Yason ea nideapta fiisu; ak fiisu seaniin eanisin ng'asheanda meatteayi sea digheanda sugoochcheanda suguura Gaysaari, nea gwayi, gwanda sugoochcheanda nuut suguura Yeesu.”
Hean gwahirbaban sugoodiga ambal mujiin iiyiy ng'asheanji.
Iiduw geeyaaga ghoorjooda Yason ea fugaaschi, amahit geesiksa gaweay.
Deagheatta gojeakta fuga siduupcheewi Baulo ea Sila eawa gaweay Berooya; hean hitta hooweanji geeweay jeeda ghooriida sinnealshachcheewa bea fuga Yahuudi.

Fugeaba ng'eanyiitta gooleehiidiit muuchchi mawuurji fuga ng'eanyiida Desalonikke, aba gideaba ghwadeapta ng'asheanda aba hooseaneega, ak ghwasikkiideawa ng'ooruutka ghaydidi galagasean ghwadaa gideaba ng'asheega huumwa gil.
Ak ghamwas fuga saang'a, aba jeedeaba fiisu eara gadeemga mii ng'ay was fuga hees bea fuga Yunaani ea headiga.
Iiduw nea ghwayiiy fuga Yahuudi bea ng'eanyiida Desalonikke gideaba Baulo gwarukwiida ng'asheega Aseetta earaba ng'eanyiida Berooya, geeweay ama sihitta geeyuuk buuneeda nea geang'uda foolayda.
Deagheatta gojeakta fuga siduupcheewi Baulo gawa ng'eanyiida ghuutta basooda nea Sila ea Dimotteo saawa goobiida hoowa.
Iiduw fukka ghwanyawa adoabiiw Baulohiin ghwaat ea ghoahiitta Adene; hean ghwanung' eyeassa Sila ea Dimotteo, gideaba abeanni alamwajaana hean ghang'eatng'eat gaweay.
Damani ammuukghna Baulo saawa aba Adeenehiin, abeetta ea ninyareas muuchchi aba gideaba ghwadaa mujiineedida nea saang'a duguuga sinung' ghoaw aseechcheekka.
Aba damani mideawa jeeda ghooriida sinnealshachcheewean hean gwasheang'nyi sea fuga Yahuudi ea Emoojiga suurja awalli gheang'da Aseetta, ea fuga naadi galagasean ea fuga mida hoowa.

Iiduw gwaroannyi sea fuga suguura Eppikuriya ea Stoigi mideawa fughareenga. Hean gwayeeshsha fuga mwaatkwa, “Siisi ajuuriin gagasa gwayiin?” Gwayi mwaatkwa, “Iisung'ulayi ea rabascheanda rukkwiida giijasta aseechcheekka meenala,” aba gideaba gwarukku ng'asheega Yeesu ea ng'asheega dunnooda.
Hean geang'ng'waay amahit geayaat heeda Areopago, ak geeyeeshsha, “Geegasayi eanala gidawas ginealshooni eesh gwachchi igooniin?
Aba gideaba ng'asheesu iyeaduun aba idigaasa gidabunu gil; asi geegasayi eanala deayeegeaba ng'asheesu gidawas.”
Fuga ng'eanyiida Adene ea rabasta abiitta hoowa ea mandeawana gheatta jea gwasna gil nuut geaghus rukwiideayda ng'asheega ea giileeysiindeabiit bea ng'asheega bunu.
Hean ghamiinaada Baulo aba madeeda emeeda mida hiji suguura Areopagohiin ak gwayeeshsha, “Ea fuga ng'eanyiida Adeene ghaadaayi gideaba agooga ghoabwariinyi muuchchi ng'asheega diini.

Aba damanda ang'attaawi, ghaadaayi haleanjeedeang'wa bea ghadoweeda, ghaadaayi aba heeda wagiida heeda sung'oorsa ng'asheesu, ‘Heeda aseetta meadaaha.’ Siida obadayi nea moanaliin, dea earukuneegwa iittaannyi.
Aseetta ghayi bwat muunda ng'eanyiida ea haleanjeesean, niny Ng'uttamiida humng'eeda gil ea ng'eanyiida, niny moobiitteena jeeda gealga sibatta Aseetta sideasa geattinga,
ak niny ea moammu geattinga buuneeda gagadiiyeesa, gawuurji gili niny gasa gil, deagoona eaweega gil, ak ghoadaw buuneeda gisimeanda ea haleanjeesean.
Ak gwasin niny aba siyagi emoojiga sean was buuneeda ak ghwanung' goobiida badayda ng'eanyiida, ama ng'atta nea niidaw damannyoojiga ghayi bay gwarukuta niny, ea monghajeega gibinda nyaawa.
ak abeeda gagasa Aseetta earappeadi rar gideaba eara ghanyi ghawaas niny ak ghwanyas niny. Nea niny ea mii sheageewa siida wassean.
‘Iisindi jeadaannyi aseasa gendeawi eaweega, ak geeweelweelli, ak gendeawi sasanuukkaasa;’
gawuurji gidanyaashta siyagi aba duumdaannyi nea gwayi,
‘Aba gideaba geewoschi diibigaaschi.’
Ak aseasa iisiwoschi diibiga Aseetta, ea mwahida gideaba geenung' gawuurji Aseetta lagheanga meang'meang'i, ghana lappiya, ghana lagheaneeda, sin siida ea ghwadaamdaam aba gearinda.
Damanda lendeeda ninaawa geaw Aseetta, ak ghamneawa gwarukusa buuneeda gideaba aduukkuunana ring'eegeagwa,

aba gideaba nisin eaweeda jea goorgweaksiina fuga muunda ng'eanyiida nea ghoadoabiiw, aba siitta ghayi loat ninyiin, ak ea niidaw buuneessean ng'asheesu nea goomajeek aba gidaduutteayda aba jeeda miyeeda.”
Siyiiy iitta ng'asheega duunnooda miyeeda, hean gwajuuga nwaatkwa; nea mwaatkwa gwayeeshsha, “Geegasayi elleeysiiniit gichcha ng'asheanji.”
Hean ghang'eat Baulo gwanung'usa heeda fukka.
Iiduw ghwaat geeshtaannyi fuga mwaatkwa ak ghamwas, aba jeedeaba fiisu siyagi Dionisiya gil was siida gheeda girgweageeda bea Areopago, ea biissa gatmooni suguura Damaari ea fii suuk mideawa.
Ng'atta ng'asheesu ghang'eat ghabeawa Adeene ak gawa ng'eanyiida Goriinto.

Hitta hoowa ghwanyasa siispa Yahuudi suguura Akkila, ghayi sijiilsa ng'eanyiida Bontas, nea ris gwaleabu ng'eanyiida Italiya sea gatmoadaannyi suguura Brisila, aba gideaba Glaudio abeeda ninung' gwaritteawa fuga sean bea Yahuudi ng'eanyiida Ruumi. Hean ghang'eat Baulo gawa ghwadaa fiisu;
iiduw aba gideaba gwasin gadiyeanagi gopteada sea saawa, ak gagadiiyi, aba gideaba gadiyeeda nyaawa sinooda udahabaschajeega.
Inyeessa eaweeda Sabatto, gawa jeeda ghooriida sinnealshachcheewa ak gabalool nea ghaghurghur fuga Yahuudi ea gea Yunaani.
Iiduw nea ghapka geaba Sila ea Dimotteo nea gwaleabu Makkedoniya, ghoang'eat Baulo rukwiideayda giijasta, nea gwarukusa fuga Yahuudi gideaba Gristo niny Yeesu.

Iiduw nea ghaheawa nea geeng'ng'eawi, hean ghang'eat ghwalalakta hang'weakaaschi nea gwayeeshsha, “Foojeandeang'wa gagasa goobiida iheengeagwa! Aniini meandeawani gidamuy. Ak gidang'eada ghamneawa gaydaweesa Emoojiga.”
Ng'eada hoowa gawa goobiida gheapa siisi suguura Ditto Yusto, was siida bada Aseetta, nea gheedeaba siisi gwanda murdeeda ghooriida sinnealshachcheewa.
Nea Grispayda was siida ahaaghwa ghooriida sinnealshachcheewa, ghamwas Ng'uttamiida, sea fugeaba gheanyi sean; nea eara fuga Goriinto iiy gidabaloolda Baulo ghamwas ak geppattiisan.
Ghayi aweanagi gwayeeshsha Ng'uttamiida Baulo aba jeeda girgweatka, “Adibeali, rukwiida giijasta miy nea adisiindi.
aba gideaba aniini ea ang'iing'i geendeayi, manda siisi jea ghwasannyi ghana gwasawannyi; aba gideaba hiji bea mujiiniin geandeawi fuga saang'a.”
Hean goobiida ng'eanyiitta ea gwaduulu gweanyagi ea shealah nea ghoanaal ng'asheanda Aseetta aba jeannyaawa.
Ak damanda waseewa Galiyo sugoochcheanda ahaghwa ng'eanyiida Akkaya, gaguuyi fuga Yahuudi ak gang'eessa Baulo ak geayaat gheeda sirgweachcha,
nea geeyi, “Siisi ghaghurghur buuneeda ghabwat Aseetta aba naweeda mwaada geeshta deaweeda.”
Damanda mii gabaloola Baulo, ghwalamda Galiyo ak gwayeeshsha fuga Yahuudi, “Gwachchi inyeeda eanisin gidamuy ghana ng'asheanda mwadoabiiwa, abeeda gaydealeeyseegwa iit, Ea fuga Yahuudi;
ama sughus ng'asheega sheang'nyeeda bea ng'asheega ea gheawunga deaweedeedeang'wa, adaaha agooga nea goobeayi geat; aniini ghaheawi doaw sichchea gorgweakkiisa ng'asheesu.”
Ak ghahoan gooruutteawa jeeda gheeda sirgweachcha.
Hean geeng'eessa sean ak geeng'ng'waay Sostene, was siida ambal ghooriida sinnealshachcheewa, ak geebarsa madeeda girgweageeda. Nea Galiyo gang'ula nea maduupeewana gil ng'asheanji.

Iing'atta ng'asheesu gobiida Baulo hoowa eawoojiga saang'a, hean ghang'eat gwanung'usa heeda fuga duupchi ak gawa ng'eanyiida Sirya, nea godeayi Brisila sea Akkila. Ng'atta ghwareakghu budeagaaschi aba Gengreya, aba gideaba ghayi gwandeawa radannyeanda.
Gabiikta ng'eanyiida Efeeso, ak gwanung'usa saawa hoowa; hean gawa niny jeeda ghooriida sinnealshachcheewa ak gwasheang'dooschi sea fuga Yahuudi.
Hean geemus endeayi gilgeaw, ak ghaheawa.
Damani ng'eada gawean gwayeeshsha, “Gaydabiigu heedeang'wa gichcha ng'eang'deang'wa iimwas Aseetta.” Hean ghang'eat gwading'da maleambooda ak ghabeawa Efeeso.
Gawa amahitta ng'eanyiida Gaysariya, ghwararang'aana ak gawa googeechchi fuga ganiisa, amahit ghang'eat gawa Antiyokiya.
Hit goobiida hoowa eawoojusu ng'ay ak gawa nea ghabeawa daroar ak gawa daroar nea gwasik ng'eanyiida Galittiya ea Firgia, nea goomajeek ginealanga.
Ghayi gwanda siispa Yahuudi suguura Appolo sijiilsa ng'eanyiida Aleksandariya, ghwahidu ng'eanyiida Efeeso. Siisi abeeda baloolaneeda gil, ak gabiissa ghwanal muuchchi ng'ooruutka ghaydidi.

Aba gideaba niny ghayi sinnaal naweani bea Ng'uttamiidean; ak ea guduashang'shang' guroroadaannyi, hean ghoanaal muuchchi nea gabaloola badayda Yeesu, nea ghwadoabiiw ak siisi ghwanal gibattiisanda ghayi bea Yohaana akghwahit.
Hean ghoang'eat balooldaannyi aba muraneandumeeda aba jeeda ghooriida sinnealshachcheewa; hean iiduw nea ghwayiiy Brisila sea Akkila ghuuttaannyi, geayaat ak geennaal muuchchi ng'asheega Aseetta.

Iiduw nea gagasa ghoaghaaw gawa Akkaya, gageanu fuga siduupcheewi ak gommajeek niny, ak geeng'waar barawajeanda gaweesa ginealangiga ghwadeapta siisi. Damanda hittaawa hoowa, ghaweat fukkeanji muuchchi ghayi mwas aba dagheerjeandumeedean,
aba gideaba gabalool nea mwaawala gil ea ghwajoar fuga Yahuudi aba eeshpwaara, nea ghoahiimu aba ng'ooruutka ghaydidi gideaba Gristo niny Yeesu.
Damanda mideewa Appolo Goriinto, hean ghang'atta Baulo nea gwasik jeeda ng'eanyiida ea ghwahitta Efeeso hitta ghwanyasa hoowa ginealang'su ng'ay.
Hean gwayeeshsha saawa, “Heappi noanyaschi Gurorooda Ghaydidi damanda oamwaseewi?” Ghwalamda saawa ak gwayeeshsha, “Manda, eara gideaba gwanda Gurorooda Ghaydit miyeayiinya.”
Goobearsa gichcha nea gwayeeshsha, “Abeetta Ghoanyaschi gibeattiisanda uurjiin?” Geeyeeshsha, “Gibeattiisanda Yohaana.”
Ghwalamda Baulo ak gwayeeshsha, “Yohaana ghayi goobattiisan aba gibattiisanda duukkuunooda ring'eega, ak gwayeeshsha buuneeda amwasa jea gweadu geeshteanyu, was Yeesu.”
Hean siyiiy ng'asheesu geeppattiisan aba gheawunga Ng'uttamiida was Yeesu.
Iiduw nea ghwayiin Baulo geattingaaschi iheenga nyaawa, gaba niishuubeesa Gurorooda Ghaydit; ghang'eat gaba niibaloola iit nuut nea gwaramoorani ng'asheega.
Monneeda buuneessean ea damaniyyeenya.

Gawa jeeda ghooriida sinnealshachcheewa gwarukwiida ng'asheega gheambalmeeda Aseetta nea ghabwadatka ea gwaduulu sheah samwagu, nea goobalool buuneeda nea gwasheang'dooschi aba ng'asheega sugochcheandumeeda Aseetta;

ak mwaatkwa eahang'oonyi iheen ak ghaheawa ghamwas, ak gong'eawi Naweedida aba madeeda buuneeda, hean ghang'eat gwaheelli fiisu, ak gaweay hichpa geat nea ghwaat ginealanga, ak goobalool galagasean aba seammooda gheappa siisi suguura Dirano.
Ng'asheesu gwasindunu ea goosha gweannyeew iyyeenya, ea ghwayiiy fuga sean bea ng'eanyiida Asiya ng'asheega Ng'uttamiida sea fuga Yahuudi ea gea Yunaani.
Gwasin Aseetta gwadeagooda haw aba geattinga Baulo,
inyeessa gageanu buuneeda weasta hang'da rassa manandaannyi ak geeyeassa fuga miyeani, ak ghahaabwa geeyooning'weaka nyaawa, ak eara fuga bearji meang'eenda gwaritteawa.

Abeeda gwanda fiisu ng'ay bea Yahuudi neaydooschi aruuttiida meangeenda munyas inyeessa gamanya rukkuunooda gheawunga Ng'uttamiida was Yeesu, appadahuukka fuga mideawa meangeenda munyas nea gwayi, “Geeyeenyi ritteaysiina siisi aba gheawunga Yeesu diitta rukwiida Baulohiin.”
Eara balooji ispwa bea ashoohoochcheanda haw bea Yahuudi suguura Sikkewa eara saawa gwanda jeedeaba fiisu sin gadiyeaniin.
Ghwalamda meang'nyeandeenda ak gwayeeshsha saawa, “Ghaanalli Yeesu, ak ghaanalli eara Baulo; as agooga goowoscho geabeang'a?”
Hean gootkwealsa siidida bearji meang'nyeandeendean saawa ak ghwajoar sean, aba uurda, hean gwasalda jarooda gwaritteawa jeedeaba gheedida nea dawiiri nea sukghuraada.
Hean geanal iitteaba ng'asheanji aba ng'eanyiida Efeeso ea ghwayiiy gil wassean was fuga Yahuudi ea fuga Yunaani; ea ghang'ut buuneeda sean muuwda; ak geekghambiit gheawunga Ng'uttamiida was Yeesu.
Iiduw ghapka fuga saang'a numwas Aseetta ak gwaduukkuuna ring'eega aba madeeda buuneeda ea ng'asheega munyas ghayi sina.

Nea fuga saang'a ghayi sina ng'asheega meang'nyeandumeeda ghoamughuush gittaabajeega nyaawa ak ghaghwarda aba madeeda buuneessean; gwayiida monneeda lappiyeeda sishaaha gittaabwajeegiga ak ea sagalamnyooji haradam ea damanamughuush.
Ak aba sarean gageawiit iitta ng'asheanda Ng'uttamiida nea ghwanyas uurda muuchchi.
Ng'atta ng'asheesu ghwanung' Gurorooda ghang'eat Baulo gawa nea gwasik ng'eanyiida Makkedoniya ea Akkaya ak gawa Yerusaleemu nea gwayi, “Iyaahitti hoowa, gaydawa dadaah eara Ruumi.”
Ng'atta goojeakta fii iyyeenya was weedangaaschi nea Dimotteo gil ea Erasto, nea niny ghanyi goobiida Asiya eawoojusu ng'ay.
Aba damandida ghoaptu deakghuyandeeda haw aba ng'asheega Naweeda.
Aba gideaba siisi suguura Demetriyo, sina lappiya, ghayi biissa gwasna ghoorajeega sibatta Aseetta sisna lappiya bea Artemi, iissa ghwanung' ghwanyas deekshoodiga haleanjeesaang'a.
Ghang'eat ghabwada geat, fuga gadiyeeda ea fii suuk sin gadiyeeda uurji ak gwayeeshsha, “Ea oorjooga, ghoanalli gideaba daghwardeanya gwaleabu heedeaba gadiyeani.

Ak ghamneawa gajayiinya nea gajadeaksiina geat ng'asheega ak ea meakghusa aba Efeeso niriikghta googuulli ng'eanyiisean bea Asiya niny nighurghur fuga saang'a nea ghwayam fughareenga buuneeda nea gwayi aseechcheekiga sisna geattingean mii aseechcheeka huumwa gil.

Mii gideaba gadiyeedeanya gwanda jeeda washta foolaweega, eara gheeda sibatta aseetta was gatmooda suguura Artemi, ak geanung' ghoaw gili mii gili, ak geegeandeawa hawundaannyi, biissa gagadoowani Asiyaayda sean ea muunda ng'eanyiida.”
Iiy ng'asheesu geenyareesi ak geechchuur nea geeyi, “Arteemeeda Efeeso ahaw!”

Hean ghwadaakghuyan buuneeda sean bea mujiini; ak geetkwealsa ak geeng'waay Gayo ea Aristago saawa abeeda fuga ng'eanyiida Makkedoniya nea gaba bwaranagi sea Baulo, hean geesaldeawa ea eehitta heeda sideanganna.
Baulo niny abeeda gagasa gawa jeedeaba emeani, ak ghoadeal ginealanga.
Ak goojeaksa Baulo fuga hees bea Asiya was fugaaschi ghayi duupchi, ak geemus nea geeyeeshsha, adiidu guwi heeda sideanganna.
Aba damandida gaba siisi ajuur, nea mwaatkwa gabalooldunu; gwayibwak ea ghwadarda girgweageedida ea eamudeanal gidasibattiisa geat.

Iiduw gwayi buuneeda mwaatkwa siida eadu deakghuyandeeda Iskanda gil, aba gideaba fuga Yahuudi ghwanung' gawa madeeda buuneeda. Hean gang'wachsa Iskanda buuneeda geattindaannyi, ak ghaweat geaw aba baloolda aba madeeda buuneeda.
Sidaah gideaba niny siida Yahuudi gil, hean geechchuur ea goosha aseechcheew iyyeenya nea geeyeena, “Arteemeeda Efeeso ahaw!”

Iiduw nea ninung' siida ng'oorshachchi ghwasiinda emeeda gwayeeshsha, “Ea headiga Efeeso, moanali gideaba mujiineeda Efeeso furiischoochcheanda gheeda sibatta aseetta bea Arteemeeda hawi, ak ea dea lagheaneeda abinna humng'eedeani?
Ak ea manda siida jea ghwashaang' ng'asheesu, asi asiinda, ak ea adoojirjirsi sinooda ng'asheanda.
Aba gideaba ghamneawa gooyeadu fiisu hiji nea manda ginijagwat aba jeeda gealga sibatta Aseetta nea miigoong'eawi aseetteanya was gatmooda.
Asi Demetriyo ea fugaaschi bea gadiyeeda, iimida ng'asheanda jea goorgweaksiina siida wassean, asi gealga sirgweachcha ea fuga laja girgweaguutka gwanda; asi orgweaksiina geat aba hoowa.
Ama mida gilnuut sajaada ogasayi, ayaada madeeda emeeda eesin.
Aba gideaba aseasa geendi jeeda washta jea ergweakseasa aba deakghuyandeani bea ghamneaweani, ak ea manda samsiinda aba deakghuyandeeni seaniin ak geanung' ghoaw doobiiwnatta deakghuyandeani.”
Iiduw nea niihit ng'asheesu hean ghoadaarda girgweageeda.
Iiduw nea ning'atta deakghuyandeedida, hean gaguursa Baulo ginealanga ak goomajeek jeesinga nyaawa ak ghang'eat gawa ng'eanyiida Makkedoniya.
Hean nea gwasik jeeda ng'eanyiida nea goomajeek saawa gawa ng'eanyiida Yunaani.

Ng'atta goobiida hoowa sheeh samwagu, muchchu nea gagasa fuga Yahuudi ng'asheega munyas appadaydaannyi nea abeeda eanigasa niny gawa ng'eanyiida Siriya, hean gwasheamu ak gabiigu nea gwasku naweeda Makkedoniya.
Gawa nea goodeayi Soppattoyda was balleanda Birho leabu Desalonikke; ea Gayoyda leabu Derbe, ea Dimotteo ea Dikkiko sea Drofimoyda ng'eanyiida Asiya.
Fiisu goosheedeawaneasa ak ghoamukghneasa aba ng'eanyiida Drowa,
hean geabeawi ng'eanyiida Filippi nea geeding'di maleambooda iing'atta eaweeda mukkattajeega memmattawiitta, ghang'atta eawooji muut ak geahitti heannyaawa aba Drowa, akkeeppiidi hoowa eawooji ispwa.

Eaweeda madeeda bea eawooji ispwa, nea abeeda ea subwachchi geat easuunya mukkatte, hean goobalool Baulo saawa, nea abeeda gagasa gideaba gaygawa iimuchchu; hean googeawiit baloaldaannyi ea ghoaw bugusta eaweeda.
Abeeda gwanda beascheekka saang'a aba jeedeaba gheetta sideeksa uhuudeaba niirjean nea subwachchi geat.

Nea abeeda gwanda balleanji mwanang' suguura Ewudekko apteada aba seawadeeda. Hean ghwalas gheatta ruweanga damanda baloola Baulo ea gageawiit; ea eeyibwak ea ghwajoar ruweanga, ng'atta ghang'adaana humng'eeda uhuuda gheeda siroap samwagu ak geegatkanna ng'eanyi nea nimi.
Ghwararang'aada Baulo amahitta gwahiiysa geaw, ak ghwayiin daghattaannyi nea gwayi, “Adaghahameagwa ng'eanyi, aba gideaba eaweagaaschi gudugwanda.”
Iiduw nea gabiikta Baulo gwadiyeada ak ghwasuuy mukkatte ak ghwaak, hean goobalool saawa, ea gageawiit, geeyibwak ea goorearu aseetta, ak ghang'eat Baulo gawa.
Ng'atta geayaat balleanda ghoah nea majeek, ak ghwanyas buuneeda hawdeayda.
Iiduw geeshsheedi eweaya mwadi ak geeding'di maleambooda, ak geegasayi ettiing'da Baulo; aba gideaba niny abeeda nibada beatta jea ghwala ng'eanyiida ghajaam.
Iiduw nea geeroonnyeesi Asso, hean geettiing'di niny ak geapkaannyi ea eahiinna Mitilene.
Geabeawi jeeda basooda ea eahitta Giyo eaweedeaba iyyeenya; eaweeda bassa geahiitti Samos; ammuchchu eaweeda niirja geahitti Miletto.

Aba gideaba gagasa Baulo ghwalach bugusta basooda gwasik Efeeso, aba gideaba magassa ghwashing'da aba ng'eanyiida Asiya; aba gideaba gwalamajeesa hitteayda Yerusaleemu, ijea ghoammu ghwahitta eaweeda Bendekosti.
Damanda mideewa Miletto goojeaksa eeguursa gwearugwa ganiisa mida Efeeso.
Hean hidu headaannyi, gwayeeshsha saawa, “Agooga ghoanalli gideabiideatti aba heedeang'wa damanyoojiga sean ng'eada dea nallaabi geeshteanyu ng'eanyiida Asiya,
nea geagadiyeesi Ng'uttamiida nea geayeadayi geaw ng'eanyi muuchchi nea geasni dabeakka ea samsiinda anyaschi aba foolayda fuga Yahuudi;
ea gideaba mii daheawa rukunooda ng'asheanda wassean miiseegwa, ak ghaanalleagwa aba eeshpwara nea ghaabeawi gheawi ak geawi gheawi,
ak geamuuwwiisi sean fuga Yahuudi ea fuga Yunaani ak gearukusi iitta duukkuunooda aba heeda Aseetta ea iitta masaweega mida jeeda Ng'uttamiideanya was Yeesu Gristo.
Ak ghamneawa, ng'ulla, geawi Yerusaleemu, nea ghwaadan Gurorooda, nea mwaanali ng'asheega jea gabussean aba hoowa;
geaghus gitta nimuwwunean Gurorooda Ghaydit aba mujiinajeega sean bea gideaba ghoamuukghunaan ghealooniga ea sawanadeeda.

Ak ea mwanung' ghoaw eaweegeasu gil ghana danung' ghoaw gidaghaloamwaat, geagasayi ghanyi dahiit gadiyeedeanyu anyaschi aba heeda Ng'uttamiida was Yeesu, ak geammuuwwu iitta giijasta miy bea dagheerjeandumeeda Aseetta.
Asi ghamneawa, ng'ulla, aniini ghaanaalleagwa oagasean nea geaneayeewi jeedeang'wa nea geerukkwiidi giijasta sugoochcheandumeeda ak ea manda siida jea gudughwadaah gheamamdeanyu.
Asi ng'asheesu geamuwwuneegwa askwareani gideaba mandanean gidinyeanda aba foojeandeang'wa oagasean,
aba gideaba mii danung'waada rukunooda girgweageeda Aseetta. Asammiisiina geat oagasean sea hawanda,
was gea ghayi nung' Gurorooda Ghaydit ahuuwa fuga jea ghoahaaghwa, ak goong'ulayi ganiiseeda Aseetta ghayi nyas aba foojeanda Balleandaannyi bea saseadaannyi.
Ak ghaanalli iimuchchu nea neawi gayghwahidu jeedeang'wa suuyeekka ng'weani, jea ea mayghwalach hawanda;
nea aba jeedeang'wa agooga gaygwarinna fuga jea gwargu ng'asheega ng'ooweatta, jea ghwanung' ghwaat ginealanga geeshta nyaawa.
Asi oang'ng'wearni, nea ghoapkaachchi gideaba aba gweannyeew samwagu mii danung'waada rekusiimba giliwas sih aba dabeakka.
Ak ghamneawa ghadawjeegwa Aseetta ea ng'asheanda dagheerjeandumeeda, jea ghoammu gwadeekneegwa nea gagooneegwa hearaniischooda aba jeeda fuga sean ghayi simmiidu.
Ak ea mii dashissa ghaang' lappiyeeda siida ghana lagheanga meeng'meeng'i ghana eagweega.
Ak ghoanalli agooga gideaba aniini geagasayi aba geattingeasu, ak ghaanyaschi haleanjeeda aba gitteenna, sea fugeandeawi.

Aba haleanjeessean naahiimneegwa gideaba iisawaneattunu abeeda giweadi fuga ng'arng'ari, nea ghoapkaachchi ng'asheega Ng'uttamiida was Yeesu, heeda eneewa, ‘Ghang'wana giidaydeayda mwasamwa gideaba geegoonnyi,’”
Iing'atta rukunoodeaba ng'asheesu, gwatkuy ak ghamwaash Aseetta sean.
Ng'atta gooyyeawda sean ak ghwayiin Baulo daghanuunatka nyaawa nea ghwasam,
ghwanung' gwaramagu gagiisan sean appadaydeaba ng'asheandida rukutean, bea gideaba maygudu abiikta adaaha gheamamdeanyu. Hean geayaat heeda maleambooda.
Iiduw nea gwaheelli saawa, hean geeding'di maleambooda ak geeweayi ea ehitta ng'eanyiida Gosi muchchu geeweayi ea ehitta Rode, sing'eadi hoowa geeweayi Battara.
Sihiitti hoowa geanyaschi maleambooda jea gawa ng'eanyiida Foinikke, hean geeding'di ak geeweayi.

Iiduw nea geang'ng'weardi geedaayi ng'eanyiida Saypras, hean geelaabi meatkweeda geattinda ghaadaam ak geeweayi Siriya, iiduw geewuschi aba ng'eanyiida Diro; aba gideaba gajeerrareeng'u dabitta mida jeedeaba maleambooni.
Sihitti hoowa geenyasi ginealanga ak geendeayi ea ghang'atta eawooji ispwa, hean gabaloola ginealang'su uurda Gurorooda ak geeyeeshsha Baulo aduwi ng'eanyiida Yerusaleemu.

Iiduw nea niisha askwearjoojigaasa, geeweayi bareannyeekkaasa nea ghoadoabiiweasa sean ea gadeemga nyaawa ea diibiga nyaawa, ea gooruutteawaneasa mujiini; hean sihitti ghuutta basooda geetkunyi ak geemwaaschi Aseetta nea geakghachchi geat sean.
Hean iiduw geeheeli ak geeding'di maleambooda nea gabiikta saawa ghoah.
Iiduw nea gwaduulean bareannyeekka aba Drowa, geeweayi ea ehitta Domayi; ak geekkeachcheewi fuga siduupcheewi ak geendeayi eaweechchaanjagi.
Iimuchchu geeweayi Gaysariya, amasihitti geeweayi gheeh Filippo was siida rukwiida giijasta miy, niny gaba jeedeaba fughayi assispwa siloat ak geeppiidi gheannyi.
Ak siisi ghayi gwandeawa haw ang'wan miyeasat, nea abeeda haweesu gwarukwiida ramooranga.
Iiduw nea geeppiidi hoowa eawoojusu ng'ay, iiduw ghwahidu sibaneeda suguura Agabo leabu ng'eanyiida Yahuudi.

Hidu heedeanya gageanda ghealooda mananda Baulo ak ghwarada geeshangaaschi ea geattingaaschi ak gwayeeshsha, “Gwayi Gurorooda Ghaydit, ‘Fuga Yahuudi mida Yerusaleemu gayghwarattunu siisi bea ghealooniin, ak geeyiin geattinga Emoojiga.’”
Siyiinyi ng'asheesu, hean geemearmearanayi aseasa ea fukka mida hooweanjiin gideaba adagawa Yerusaleemu.

Ghwalamda Baulo ak gwayeeshsha, “Agooga goosinnyi naaha, shookka nea googasayi ang'udanaan guroroodeanyu muuwda? Aba gideaba meakghusa gideaba geerattean, geawoschi hidaat eara enuusan aba Yerusaleemu aba gheawunga Ng'uttamiida was Yeesu Gristo.”
Iiduw nea ghaheawa ng'asheagaasa, hean geasiindi ak geeyeenyi, “Nung'waada gwasin Ng'uttamiida gidagassiida.”
Iing'atta gibindeaba eawoojigiga, hean gearachchi sareendeanya ak geeweayi Yerusaleemu.

Nea geetteayyeewi ginealanga mwaatkwa bea ng'eanyiida Gaysariya ak ghwaadeasa ea ghoahiittaneasa gheeh Mnasoni was siida ng'eanyiida Saypras, ak siisi was ginealaneeda, ak ea siida jea eppiidana gheannyi.
Sihitti Yerusaleemu, ghwadeaptaneasa muuchchi fuga siduupcheewi aba hooseaneega.
Iimuchchu geetteayi sea Baulo ea eeweaya gheeh Yakkobo ak eara gweargwa sean gwanda hoowa.
Hit gigeachcheeda hean gwarukuta iitta huumwa bea ng'asheega sean sissa Aseetta fuga Emoojiga aba gadiyeadaannyi.

Siyiiy ng'asheesu, geekghambiit Aseetta. Ak geeyeeshsha niny, “Ea oorjeediyya, ghamneawa gidaahi gideaba gwanda fuga Yahuudi nyiit sagalamnyoojiga ak ghamneawa ea numwas; ak ghoang'ng'waay muuchchi ng'asheega deaweeda.
Ak ea sinyas iittaang'u gideaba inyeessa ginaali fuga Yahuudi mida bugusta Emoojiga ghaheawa Muusa, amwaada diibiga nyaawa ghasmeahooda ak ea adaghwaat geeshta searoojiga fuga Yahuudi.
Ghamneawa gajeesna naaha? Gajeasinyas iitta gideaba nihidu.
Asi ghamneawa sinda gissurukuneey. Geendeawi fii ang'wan ghayi mideawa radannyeanda,

geanda fisu ak gimmiidu geaw sea saawa ak giidaydi haleanjeeda deaschi gimmiinooda, ak ghwareakghwa iheenga nyaawa. Ak abeeda ghwanal buuneessean gideaba manda gil appadayda ng'asheega surgu appadaydaang'u duukku ang'iing'i gipteadi nea ging'ulayi deaweeda.

Ng'asheega badaydeaba fukka was Emoojigean numwasiin, goolla eng'oorsiina barawajeanda gideaba adaghwaak giliwassean sibwara heelga aseechcheekka ng'uyyeega, ea gideaba adeali foojeanda, adeayaak bannyeega diyeayda wassean sing'ng'waay ghuutta, ak geepuut hiseadayeandumeeda.”

Muchchu ghang'eat Baulo ak goodeayi fukkeanji ghadoweeda ak ghoammiidu geaw sea saawa ak gawa jeeda gheeda sibatta Aseetta, gwarukusa buuneeda huydeanda eaweeda gimmiinoodeabwa geat nea gaba siisi adayda haleanjeeda sisappa geadi appadahuukka nyaawa.
Iiduw nea niriikghta goosha eawooji ispwa hean ghwadaa fuga Yahuudi leabu Asiya ak ghwadaa nea gwanda jeeda gheeda sibatta Aseetta, hean geehaak emeessean ak geeng'ng'waay,

ak geechchuur nea geeyi, “Ea fuga Israeeli apkaani aweadeesa! Siisi nii dea ghayi aneali buuneeda aba ng'eanyiisseani ak ghwanung' gafool buuneeda deaweeda ea ng'eang'i; ak gabiissa gweadu fuga Yunaani jeeda gheeda sibatta Aseetta, ak ea nung'uda ririnnyeanda heeda ghadit.”
Ng'asheanji geerukuna gideaba geadaah ammwadi siisi suguura Drofimo bea ng'eanyiida Efeeso, nea gwandeawa niny aba mujiini ak geeghay gideaba Baulo gweadu jeeda gheeda sibatta Aseetta.

Hean googuuli mujiineesean nea ghwadakghuyan ea ghapka buuneessean leabu meadajeega sean ak ghabwat geat hean geeng'ng'waay Baulo ak geengiir ea eruutteawa jeeda gheeda sibatta Aseetta ak gearat ghuutta gheeda.
Damandida duu eegassa nuustaannyiin, hean ghwanyas iidi shirikkarajeanda haw gideaba Yerusaleemu nidakghuyan.

Gooseelu shirikkarajeanda haw aba geeshangiga lugooda shirikkara ea ashoohoodiga nyaawa ak gaweesa saawa; ang'wearda nea ghwadaa shirikkarajeanda haw ea lugoodaannyi bea shirikkara, hean geenung'waada bayiiga Baulo.
Gaweesa shirikkarajeanda haw Baulo ak ghwang'ng'waay, ak gwayeeshsha aradana munyaloalaji iyyeenya, amahit ghoabwaarda, siida was ng'eaha, ea ginnisin.

Buuneeda mwaatkwa mida jeedeaba emeedida goojuur nea marukuna gili nuut gwargu diitta; ea mutghwanal gichchea gwasin aba giijuureandeaba fiisu, hean gwarukusa fugaaschi gideaba ayaada Baulo ghealooniga.
Iiduw nea sihitta ak ghoalla giding'eanda gidaghuut, geeyibwak ea ghwasar shirikkara aba gideaba niraanya emeeda;
aba gideaba ghwaat geeshtaannyi emeetuw nea goojuur nea gwayi, “Anuusa!”
Damani riikghta eahhiinna Baulo ghealoonigean, hean gamus shirikkarajeanda haw nea gwayeeshsha, “Gisagasayi darukuneey ng'ashaani?” Ghwalamda ak gwayeeshsha, “Heappi ginali iitta emeeda Yunaani?
Ang'iing'i muwosi siida ng'eanyiida Misri, heetta neekki ang'eat ng'uchcheeda ak ghwaat fii sagalamnyooji ang'wan, bea Asaasin ghwaat dareapcheeda?”
Ghwalamda Baulo ak gwayeeshsha, “Aniini geawoschi siida Yahuudi, leabu Darso mida Gilikkiya, aniini geawoschi siida mujiineeda mii nalaat; eaniyean siksean deabalool fiisu.”

Hean sisiksa gabalool, hean ghamiinaada Baulo aba uhuuda giding'eeda ak ghamiinda geattinda gwareekusa buuneeda ghwasiinda hean ayi saw buuneeda, hean ghoang'eat gabalool aba ghuutta Eburaniya nea gwayi:
“Fuga eaduupcheewi, ea geaba Bwaabwa, eaniyean olleaydiit dargu ng'asheegeasu aba madeedeang'wa.”
Siyiiy gidabaloolda aba ghuutta Eburaniya, hean geeyi saw ak geelleeysiit muuchchi aba damanda baloola ak gwayi:

Aniini geawoschi siida Yahuudi, geejiilsean ng'eanyiida Darso mida Gilikkiya, ak geahissiini heeda mujiineeni, ak ghwaanaalaan Gamaliyeeli muuchchi ng'asheega deaweedeeda ghayi bea gweargwaasa ak geasinnyi gadiyeeda Aseetta gawuurji gidaghamneawa owuurjeewi agooga.
Ghayi inyeessa ghaanung' ghwanyas hang'weaniidooda fukka aat Naweaniin nea geanuuseadi, ak ghaarachchi, inyeessa geajaksi ghealooniga sean headiga ea gadeemga,

ng'asheesu aba damandida gamuuwwu ashoohoochcheanda haw ea gweargwa sean bea girgweageeda aba gideaba gagoonan barawajeanda fuga eaduupcheewi, ak ghaayaachchi Dameski, hean geawi daang'ng'waay fukkeanji ak geayeadu Yerusaleemu nea sirada geattinga ammuchchu geabwar.
“Iiduw nea geawi bareannyeekkeasu nea geaneekkiisi Dameski, abeeda nihitta aseetteaba lah bea askweari, deagheatta ghoabwaanyan weeshinda haw muuchchi leabu humng'eeda.
Ak geabeedeaysi ng'eanyi ak ghaayiinyi ghuutta siida nea gwayi, ‘Sauli, Sauli, ghwasaan andagighabwaschaan?’
Ak ghaanyaaschi, ‘Ang'iing'i ng'eaha gil Ng'uttamiida?’ Ak gwasha nea gwayeeshshean, ‘Aniini geawoschi Yeesuyda Nasareetti ighabwasi.’
Fukkeanji gwachchi eandeawiin ghwadaa weeshindida ak eamiighwayiiy ghuutta siida abaloolan.
Ak geabearsi gideaba, ‘Ghamneawa gaydasin naaha Ng'uttamiida?’ Ak gwayeeshshean Ng'uttamiida, Ng'eada ak guwi Dameski ak gajeerukuneey haleanjeesean jea eegoonnyi sina.
Hean nea muttaammu daang'wearda aba weeshindida ng'waaniin, hean ghoang'ng'waanyaada geattindeanyu fukwachchi eandeawi ea ghoahiittanaan Dameski.”
“Abeeda siyagi suguura Ananiya was siida doabiiwaat ang'ng'waay muuchchi deaweeda, biissa gwarukkuuna buuneessean bea Yahuudi mida hoowa ng'asheega miyaas badaydaannyi,
ghwahidu heedeanyu, ak ghamiinaada aba murdeedeanyu ak gwayi, ‘Oorjeediyya Sauli, ang'wearda.’ Hean ghang'weardi aba geeshangiga ak ghaadaayi niny.
Hean gwayeeshshean, ‘Aseetta ghweanigaasa niloannyi aba gidagasa, ak gidaahi dea Assagi Doabiiwaat ak giyiinyi ghuuttaannyi;
ak gayhuwa muushoochcheanda aba heeda buuneessean, aba ng'asheega idaahi nea giyiinyi.
Ghamneawa gimuughu naaha? Ng'eada eppattiisannyi, ak geehhuun ring'eegaagu, nea giguursi gheawungaaschi.’”
“Iiduw nea geebiikti Yerusaleemu ak ghamwaaschi Aseetta aba jeeda gheeda sibatta Aseettean, hean geargweadayi
ghaadaayi niny ak gwayeeshshean, ‘Lamwaja ak gibeawi Yerusaleemu, aba gideaba fiisu mayghamwas ng'asheesu imuuwwu bea badaydeanyuun.’

Ghaalamdi ak geayeeshshi, ‘Ng'uttamiida, saawa ghwanal muuchchi gidaghayi eabadiinniidi jeeda ghoorajeega sinnealshachcheewa ak ghang'ng'waannyi buuneeda nea ghaabwarji fuga mwasnyi ak geajaksi ghealooniga.

Eara damanda ghayi sihhiidaawa foojeanda muushoochcheandaang'u suguura Stefaano, abeeda geandi heeda ak ghaadaayi aba heedeanyu gideaba ng'asheandida ghwadoabiiw, ak geefurji hang'weakkeaba fukka nuusiin.’
Ak gwayeeshshinean, ‘Una aba gideaba gaydeajeaktaneey heeda sheagi was ng'eanyiida Emoojiga.’”
Geelleeysiit ama rugu ng'asheanji; hean geechchuur muuchchi nea geeyi, “Oang'ng'aamwana siisi hiji ak goonuuschi! Mammiisiina giibinda.”
Ea mwasiinda giijuureanda nea gooyuuk hang'weakka nyaawa nea gwasaksa birjeanda humng'eeda,
hean gwayeeshsha shirikkarajeanda haw ayaada ghealooniga ak ghoabwarji nea ghoannyaashchi ng'asheesu ak gajeanala gidajuura fiisu ea gwasnu appadaydaannyi.
Iiduw nea nihit raditta aba ghealooniga, ghoanyaash Baulo shirikkarajeanjagi miinaada aba hoowa nea gwayeeshsha, “Heappi ghwadoabiiwi gideaba geabwar siida ng'eanyiida Ruumi, nea miyeergweaksa?”
Iiy ng'asheanji shirikkarajeandida gawa gwarukusa shirikkarajeanda haw nea gwayeeshsha, “Gigasayi sina naaha? Siisi gaba ng'eanyiida Ruumi.”
Hean gaweesa shirikkarajeanda haw ak gwayeeshsha, “Heappi rukunean, ang'iing'i guwosi siida ng'eanyiida Ruumi?” Ghwalamda ak gwayeeshsha, “Ea geawoschi.”

Ghwalamda shirikkarajeanda haw ak gwayeeshsha, “Eara aniini geawoschi siida ng'eanyiida Ruumi, aba gideaba ghaadaydi lappiyeeda saang'a.” Ghwalamda Baulo ak gwayeeshsha, “Aniini ghayi geejiilsean ng'eang'i.”

Hean ghang'eatng'eat gaweay aba geeshangiga fukka gwachchi gasa goonyeeri ng'asheegean aba geeshangiga; eara shirikkarajeanda haw iiduw ghabeal, iijeeng'u gideaba Baulo siida ng'eanyiida Ruumi gil, ea gideaba gwachchi nirada.

Iimuchchu sakteayda, gagasa danal gidabaysiina fuga Yahuudi giheakteaydaannyi, ak abeeda goottin, ak ghwanung' ghabwat gea ashoohoodiga hees sea gweargwa girgweageeda, ak gweadu Baulo ak ghwanung' ghamiinaada aba madeannyaawa.
Hean gang'ula Baulo fukka bea girgweageedean muuchchi ak gwayeeshsha niny, “Fugeaduupcheewi, aniini geabiideawi gurorooda miy aba madeeda Aseetta ea ghoaw ghamneawa.”
Ghwalamda ashoohoochcheanda haw suguura Ananiya ak gwayeeshsha fukka miinaada aba murdeadaannyiin, alasa ghuutteaba siisi.

Ghwalamda Baulo ak gwayeeshsha, “Gayghwalasnyi Aseetta ang'iing'eani uwosi ghamarda siyeasha ronghoodean! Iijea apteada ak girgweaksean aba naweeda deaweeda, nea ang'iing'i giyami deaweeda ak ginung' eabwaran?”
Gwayeeshsha fukka miinaada aba hooweaniin, “Aba sarean ging'eaway ashoohoochcheanda haw bea Aseetta?”
Ghwalamda Baulo ak gwayeeshsha, “Fuga eaduupcheewi, miidanal gideaba niny ashoohoochcheanda haw gil; aba gideaba geang'waar, ‘Adirgu ng'asheanda muy aba badayda siida ambal fugaagu.’”

Hean nea gwajeeng'u Baulo gideaba fukka bea giegweageedean mwaatkwa Sadukkayajeega gil nea mwaatkwa ea Farisayajeega gil, hean goojuur aba madeeda girgweageeda nea gwayi, “Fugeaduupcheewi, aniini geawoschi Farisayajeanda, balleanda Farisayu; ak geandeawi mureeda aba gidaararji ea duunnooda miyeeda ak ghamneawa geergweaksean.”
Ahiit rukunoodeaba ng'asheesu, hean gwardu jaliida aba heeda fuga Farisayu ea gea Sadukkayo ea ghabwaasha girgweageeda.
Aba gideaba gwayi fuga Sadukkayo manda duunnooda, ghana malaykajeanda, ghana gurorooda; nea fuga Farisayajeega ghamwas gideaba suu gwanda sean.

Hean ghoahaada giijuureanda; ak ghamiinaada ng'oorshoodiga mwaatka bea Farisayu ak ghoaniikgh nea gwayi, “Aseasa meadaahi gilimuy aba heedeaba siisi. Siisi ideeppa eaniibalool gurorooda ghana malaykajeanda abeeda gwanda naaha?”

Geeyibwak ama heedu jaliida ea ghang'ut muuwda shirikkarajeanda haw nea gwayi, eannean Baulo gajeabwaashaada, ak gwayeeshsha shirikkarajeanda eaniyean oappitta jeedeaba fukka ak goong'ng'oonyu Baulo amahit ghoattealdi ghealooniga.
Hean eaweeda bassa gwadaah Baulo nea ghamiinaada Ng'uttamiida aba murdeadaannyi ak gwayeeshsha, “Adibeali, aba gideaba nimuwwuunean aba Yerusaleemu, ak gaymuwwuuni aba Ruumi.”
Iimuchchu sakteayda, gaweay gwasin fuga Yahuudi makcheameeda ak ghwaak habeawooda gideaba, “Mwajeayaaga gil nea mwajealeaha gil ea eaghus ea sinuuschi Baulo.”
Fuga gasa enuus Baulo ghwanaawa haradam.
Hean geeweay heeda ashoohoodiga hees ea gweargwa ak geeyeeshsha, “Aseasa siyaaji habeawooda gideaba majeayaaga gil ea eaghus ea sinuuschi Baulo.

Eaniyean agooga ea gweargwa gheeda girgweageeda, ochcheaksiina shirikkarajeanda haw gideaba eanni Baulo heedeang'wa ak goohindi geat giloogasayi anala ng'asheega muuchchi aba headaannyi ak geawoschi hidaat enuusa nea mii gwaneekkiit.”
Hean ghwayiiy ng'asheesu balleanda huda geennyea Baulo, hean gawa heeda abiitta shirikkara ak gwarukusa Baulo ng'asheesu.
Hean gaguursa Baulo shirikkarajaanjagi ak gwayeeshsha, “Eaniyea aada balleanji heeda shirikkarajeanda haw gwanda ng'asheanda gasa gwarukusa.”
Ghwaat balleandida ea ghoahiitta heeda shirikkarajeanda haw ak gwayeeshsha, “Goojeakneani Bauloyda mida ghealooniga deanneey balleanji aba gideaba gwanda ng'asheanda jea gwarukuneey.”
Hean ghoang'ng'waay shirikkarajeanda haw geattinda balleandida ak ghwaat hichpwa geaw ak ghoannyaash, “Gigasayi rukunean naaha?”

Ak gwayeeshsha, “Heetta niirgweach fuga Yahuudi ak gwaheelleesa gideaba gajeepka eemusnyi aada Baulo gheeda sirgweachcha nea gaygwahinda geat fukka bea gheeda sirgweachcheen giligasa ghwanal ng'asheega muuchchi aba badaydaannyi.

Asi adumwasi aba gideaba ghamneawa gwanda fuga abiina haradam jea gwanuus, eaniyaak habeawooda gideaba maygweagischi nea mayghwali gil ea eaghus ea sinuus Baulo; ghamneawa saawa ghoammughu gidajea nyaasha ang'iing'i.”
Ghwalamda shirikkarajeanda haw ak gwayeeshsha, “Eaniyean adaghwayiiy sih gideaba nihidu rukunean ng'asheanji, asi ng'eada una.”

Hean gaguursa shirikkaraji iyyeenya ak gwayeeshsha, “Iibea eaweeda samwagu ghoang'aapchi shirikkaraji bughalaji iyeenya sea shirikkaraji laadam ea damwanamughuush mideawa farasajeega ea shirikkaraji bughalaji iyyeeya ng'uchcheatta ng'utkeakka ak gooweayi ng'eanyiida Gaysariya.
Ak gigasayi faraaseeda jea gwading'da Baulo, ak giyeadu nea gaba seayu ea ahiinni heeda Feliiseeda was sugoochcheanda haw.”
Ak ghang'waardunu barawajeanda:
“Aniini Gilawdiyooyda Lisiya gil, ak geang'oorneey barawajeanji ang'iing'i Sugoochcheanda Mureeda Feliisi. Seayu.
Siisi ghoang'ng'waay fuga Yahuudi, ak gwaramagu gwanuus, iiduw geawi ronnyeeda nea geadeani shirikkara ak ghaweachchi, ak geegu iitta gideaba siisi gaba ng'eanyiida Ruumi.
Hean geagasayi danal gidinyeandeaba siisi, ak ghayaachchi madeeda girgweageeda.
Hean geajeeng'u gideaba geergweaksiina sheang'nyeeda ng'asheega deaweedeeda gheannyaawa, ak ea mwaadaahi ramaseanda sin siisi miisa nuusta ghana gawa ghealooniga.
Iiduw nea geeyeanean iitta gideaba geesin badiida gichchea gwanuusta, hean geabay deadu headaang'u, gwargu fuga argweaksa gidamideayeesa siisi.”
Hean gageanu shirikkara aba gitta ghayi sinnaldaan, ak ghwaat Baulo eawa ea ghoahiitta heeda Antipatri.
Iimuchchu gabiikta shirikkareetta heeda abiitta, nea ghwanung'wa heeda shirikkareeda beawa farasajeega nea ghwaat Baulo.
Geeweay, ama sihitta ng'eanyiida Gaysariya ak ghoadaw sugoochcheanda barawajeandida, hean geayiin Baulo madeadaannyi.
Ahiit gisoomandeaba barawajeandida, hean ghoannyaashta gideaba gwaleabu ana daroar. Iiduw ghwanal gideaba gwaleabu ng'eanyiida Gilikkiya.
Ghwalamda ak gwayeeshsha, “Gaydealeeysiit girgweageadaang'u iihidu fuga ahaaktaneey. Ak gwayeeshsha, ayaada jeeda gheeh Heroode ak goofurji.”

Iing'atta eawooji muut ghang'eat ashoohoochcheanda haw suguura Ananiya hean ghwaan nea goodeana gwearsu ng'ay ea dinagiida suguura Dertulo. Hean ghwayiin madeeda sugoochcheanda haw gidasiihaaktaawa Baulo;

iiduw nea geeguursa, ghoang'eat Dertulo giiheakteayda nea gwayi, “Dea nihaghwideawaneasa iissa geehoosannyi nea geebeayi hoyyoo, nea aba gheambalmeadaang'u, Feliseeda Mureeda, nirdu ng'asheega siyamyam appadaydeaba ng'eanyiin,
aba naweadinga sean ea heeda wassean iissa geamwaschi ng'asheesu aba badiischooda.
Ak ea meegassi deammiikta aseettaang'u, geemuscheeyi aba alooheadaang'u alleeyseasa iit muuchchi.
Aba gideaba sidaayi siisi gaba ng'ooweatta, siida ang'eedi giiheakteayda buuneeda aba jeeda fuga Yahuudi sean mida muunda ng'eanyiida, ak gabiissa ea siida mida madeeda fuga Nasarayo gil.
Ak siisi gagasa ghang'uda ririnyeanda gheeda sibatta Aseetta, ak iiduw geeng'ng'waannyi. Ak [geegasayi eergweaksiinana naweeda deaweedeeda ghaheanya.]
Iihahidu shirkarajeanda haw sunguura Lisiya ak ghwareadeasa aba uurda.
Asi ginyaashi ang'iing'i gwadeeppa nyasa aba headaannyi ng'asheega sean siihaaktaawi.”
Ghwaroop ghuutta fuga Yahuudi nea gwayeeshsha ng'asheesu siihaaktaawa ghoahiimu gideaba sean huumwa gil.

Hean nea gwayeeshsha sugoochcheanda haw baloola, ghwasha Baulo nea gwayeeshsha, “Ghaanalli gideaba niyaagi gweannyeekka saang'a aba gadiyeani bea lachchooda girgweaguutkean aba jeedeaba emeani. Asi gaydaweat geaw nea geahoosannyi.
Giimmuusi gakkiisiina geaw huumeandeaba ng'asheanji, gideaba miighwanaawa eawooji damaniyyeenya dea nabeawi damwaash Aseetta aba Yerusaleemu;

ak ea miyeenyasanaan hich nea geesheang'nyeewi sih ghana ehidu nea ghang'waalng'waalli buuneeda, aba jeeda gheeda sibatta Aseetta ghana jeeda ghooriida sinnealshachcheewa ghana hiji wassean bea jeeda mujiini.
Ghana sikteawana ng'asheanda ahaaktaawanaan;

asi ghaamwaschi ng'asheanji aba madeadaang'u, nea gideaba aba naweeda, was dea diini, iissa ghaabwachchi Aseetta ghweanigaasa, ak ghaamwaschi ng'asheega sean siyiin madeedeanyu aba deaweeda ghana dea sung'oorsa sibanga,
nea ghaaghuschi Aseetta, ak eara saawa ghamwas ng'asheanji, bea gideaba gaygwanda duunooda aba heeda fuga doobiiweadi ea gea mii doobiiweadi.
Iissa aniini ghaanyaschi sawanadeeda galeagasean ak ghaanyaschi fughareeda miy aba heeda Aseetta ea heeda buuneeda.
Iing'atta gweanyeekka saang'a ghawunnyi deassa fuga emeedeanyu haleanjeeda sisappa geadi bea ghadooweeda ea gujaweeda.
Damandida easni ng'asheesuun, ghwahidu nea ning'atta gimmiinoodeaba geaw aba jeeda gheeda sibatta Aseetta, nea manda emeani eandeawi ghana deakghuyandeeda.
Abeeda gwanda fiispa Yahuudi ng'ay leabu ng'eanyiida Asiya, fiisu gidabal gwachchi ghapka hiji ak goshooynaneegwa ak gwasin gichchea ghoahaaktaawa, iimida ng'asheanda wassean jea ghoahaaktaawanaan.
Ghana nung'waada fiisu gwargu ramaseanda deaksean aba damanda ghayi amiinaadawi aba madeeda girgweageeda,
geaghus ng'ashaanjagi earukutti nea ghaamiinaadi aba madeannyaawaan, ‘Appadayda duunnooda fuga nimeewa ghoaw gissirgweaksiinanean ghamneawa aba madeedeang'wa.’”
Abeeda Feliksi ea doobiiwaat fughara aba Naweeda, iiduw gwayeeshsha, “Iihidu hiji shirikkarajeanda suguura Lisiya, gaydeang'weersa girgweageadaang'u.”
Hean ghoadaw shirikkarajeanda iitta gideaba ayiina gah ak ghoanung' goobal geaw gilimwanang', ak ea adoakghuumnyi fugaaschi duupchi aba eassiinda haleanjeeda gasa.

Ng'atta eawoojusu ng'ay ghwahidu Feliksi nea godeana gatmoadaannyi suguura Drusila, bea emeeda Yahuudi; hean ghwanung' eeyeadu Baulo amahit gooleeysiit ng'asheega baloola bea iitta masaweega Yeesu Gristo.
Damanda balool Baulo ak ghwasat ng'asheega doobiiwnatta ea gheadeenda ea iitta girgweaksiinda jea ghwahidu, ghabeal Feliksi ak gwayeeshsha, “Nyoobiikta, iyaanyaschi gheatta gichcha gaydaguurneey.”
Inyeessa damandida ghaghay gideaba Baulo gayghwasaaw. Hean inyeessa gaguursa ak goobalool.
Muchchu nea ning'atta gweannyeew iyyeenya, ghoaghiis hoorgeeda Feliksi siisi suguura Barkiyo Festo; ak gagasa gooduupchi geaw fuga Yahuudi, muchchu Feliksi ghwanung'wa Baulo ghealooniga.
Muchchu ghwahidu Festo jeeda ng'eanyiidaannyi, ng'atta eawooji samwagu hean ghang'eat ak gawa Yerusaleemu nea ghabeawa Gaysariya.
Hean ghang'eat ashoohoodiga hees sea fuga hees bea Yahuudi ak geattaw iitta girgweageeda Baulo, hean geemus,
ghamwas eyeadu siida Yerusaleemu, aba gideaba geasach naweeda jea eabwara ghami damanda mideewa naweeda.
Ghwalamda Festo ak gwayeeshsha, Baulo geefur aba hoowa bea Gaysariyahiin, ak aniini geagasayi dawa hoowa askwearjoojusu duwaawiin.
“Asi,” aba ginnyah, “fukka ambaliischi aba jeedeang'wean anung' deadeayi, ama iimida ng'asheanda muy nisin siisi abeeda gorgweaksa.”
Iing'atta gibindeaba hoowa eawooji sis ghana damanamughuush sea saawa, iiduw gawa Gaysariya, muchchu gawa jeeda gheeda sirgweachcha ak goopteada aba hoorgeeda amahit gwayeeshsha ayeanni Baulo.
Iiduw nea geeyeadu, hean gwaneaweesa fuga Yahuudi leabu Yerusaleemu ak geahaakta, hean geenappiisa ng'asheega saang'a durmani moammu gogingiini.

Hean ghaweat geaw Baulo nea gwayeeshsha, “Aniini manda gidinyeanyi neasinnyi bea ng'asheega deaweedeeda fuga Yahuudi, ghana gheeda sibatta Aseetta ghana ramaseanda aba heeda sugoochheanda suguura Gaysaari.”
Festo abeeda gagasa ghoammiidu geaw aba heeda fuga Yahuudi, hean ghoanyaash Baulo nea gwayeeshsha, “Gigasayi una Yerusaleemu ak geergweakseeyi aba ng'asheesu nea gindi madeedeanyu?”

Ghwalamda Baulo ak gwayeeshsha, “Aniini ghaamiinaadi aba heeda sirgweachcha bea Gaysaari, ak hiji ea heeda miisean ergweaksiinanean gil; ginali muuchch gideaba manda ng'asheanji muy neasissi fuga Yahuudi, ak eara ang'iing'i ginali muuchchi.

Ama naaramwaschi deaweeda ghana ineasinnyi ng'asheanda muy wassean miisa miyeeda, amwaaheawani miyeeda; ama ng'asheesu sirgweaksiinaneaniin ii mii huumwa ea manda siida jea ghwaadan, gaydaang'aatta girgweageedeanyu heeda Gaysaari.”
Hean gabalool Festo sea gweargwaaschi bea gheeda girgweageeda, gwayeeshsha, “Gigasayi ghang'atta girgweageedaang'u gawa heeda Gaysaari; gajakkuwi heeda Gaysaari.”
Ng'atta eawoojusu ng'ay ghwahitta Gaysariya sugoochcheanda suguura Agripa sea Bernise googeachchi Festo.
Hean goobiida hoowa ea gageanu eawoojiga saang'a, iimuchchu ghoadaw Festo sugoochcheanda iitta girgweageeda nea gwayeeshsha, “Gwanda sih hiji ghayi nung'wa Feliki ghealooniga;
nea damandida eandeawi Yerusaleemuuni, hean ghapka ashoohoodiga hees ea gweargwa fuga Yahuudi ak geahaakta, ak geemusan deargweaksa.
Ak geayeeshshi saawa, nii mii naweeda fuga Ruumi, aba gideaba gajeergweaksa siida siihaakta nea mii gwaroannyi fuga ahaakta ak geattaw gheatta jea ghaweada geaw aba ng'asheesu siihaaktaawan.
Hean nea ghabwat geat aba hiji, ea mwashing'dani iimuchchu geawi jeeda gheeda sirgweachcha ak geapteadi, ak ghaanung' eyeadu siidida.
Iiduw nea ghamiinaada fukkeanji ahaaktaan, ea miidayiiy ng'asheanji muy siihaaktaawa ak ea mawuurji gidagwachchi eararsiindi;
ak geaghus sheang'nyeeda nyaawa sea niny aba ng'asheega diini ea badayda siisi suguura Yeesu ghayi meah, ak goomajeek Baulo gideaba eamajeek.
Hean roat gichchea daanyaashta huumeandeaba ng'asheesu, geabearsi gideaba gigasayi una Yerusaleemu ak geergweakseey aba ng'asheesu siihaaktaawaneeyiini?
Iiduw gamus Baulo gideaba anung'waadanaan deabiida ghealooniga ak gayghoang'aatta girgweageedaannyi heeda sugoochcheanda haweewa sean, ghaanung' eefur ea ghwahitta eaweeda jea daada heeda Gaysaari.”
Ghwalamda Agrippa ak gwayeeshsha Festo, “Geagasayi eara aniini dealleeysiit siisi.” Ghwalamda Festo ak gwayeeshsha, “Gajalleeysiiniit numuji.”
Iimuchchu gaweewa gharbeeda Agripa jeeda gheeda girgweageeda sea Bernike, nea goodeay shirikkareeda hees, ea fuga hees bea mujiini. Hean ghwanung' Festo eruudu Baulo.

Hean ghang'eet Festo ak gwayi, “Ea sugoochcheandeanya was Agiripa ea buuneessean mida hiji siisi mida madeedeang'wean goong'ulayi nii ghayi gooniiksean fuga Yahuudi mida ng'eang'i ea gea mida Yerusaleemu, inyeessa geechchuur nea geegasa nuustaannyi.
Ak aba meatkweedeanyu ea mwaadaahi ng'asheanji nisin muy miissa miyeeda; geaghus gideaba gagasa niny ghoang'aatta girgweageadaannyi heeda sugoochcheanda haweewa sean, hean ghaanung' eyeadu.

Ak aniini ea meandeawani gidahuumwa jea dang'oorsa siideanyu haw aba badaydeaba siisi. Ak ghoaw ng'asheanji eayeanni madeedeang'wean raanya madeadaang'u ang'iing'i Sugoochcheanda was Agirippa, ak inyearayi ng'asheega gaydanyas gichchea dang'waar.
Aba gideaba ghaadaayi mwadoabiiwa, gideaba ghaayaachchi siida ghealooniga nea meeng'oorsiina ng'asheega siihaaktaawa.”
Gwayeeshsha Agirippa Baulo, ng'atta ghamiinda Baulo geattindaannyi “Neagoonnyi gheatta ng'eada baloola ang'iing'i.”
“Aniini ghaaghanyi geandeawi gheamamda aba gideaba geandi madeadaang'u, Sugoochcheanda was Agrippa, eannean gaydabalool aba weetteaba geaw appadayda ng'asheega sean ahaaktaawanaan fuga Yahuudi,
aba gideaba ang'iing'i ginali muuchchi naweadinga sean ea jaleadingeagwa bea fuga Yahuudi; ak geamuscheey aleeysean iit nea gimilikghti.
“Seareedeanyu ea giibindeanyu ghang'eada jeepcheandumeedeanyu, geagadiyeatti ghang'eada mwadi aba jeeda emeedeanyu aba ng'eanyiida Yerusaleemu, ak ghwanal fuga sean bea Yahuudi.
Ak ghayi gabean ghwanalan nea iigasa ghoammu gamuuwwu gideaba ghayi geabean dawas majeek nea ghaayaachchi naweeda diineedeanya doabiiwaat ak geabiideatti Farisayajeanda.
Ak ghamneawa ghaamiinaadi aba hiji ergweaksean aba gideaba ghaararji neajeeda ghayi heelleesa Aseetta sea gheambaghweanigaasa.
nea diitta ghus dooshingaasa was damaniyyeenyean gil ak ghwarar gideaba gayghwanyas iibwat Aseetta eawa ea askweari. Nea aba gidaararji gidaghamna ahaaktaawanaan fuga Yahuudi ea sugoochcheanda!
Ea fuga Yahuudi ghwasaan anda agooga ghoaraannyi amwasa ng'asheanji bea gideaba Aseetta ghoammu gooduudu fuga nimeewean?
Aba huumwa aniini ghayi geadeaksi geaw gideaba gamiisean dasin haleanjeesean, maweapchi sea gheawunga Yeeseeda ng'eanyiida Nasareetti.
Geasinyi ng'asheesu aba Yerusaleemu; ak ea meekghusa gideaba naarachchi fuga saang'a ghaydidi, iiduw nea geenuuseada ghaamwaschi earaniini.

Inyeessa ghaanung' ghwanyas sawanadeeda aba jeeda ghoorajeega sinnealshachcheewa sean nea geading'si gong'eawi Aseetta; inyeessa ghaanyareaschi muuchchi aba badahuukkeaba fiisu, hean geawi ak ghaaghabwaaschi aba mujiinajeega sheagi.”
“Aba jeedeaba bareannyeeksu eawi Dameskiin nea geandeawi gheambalmeeda ea barawajeanda leabu heeda ashoohoodiga heesiin.
Ea sugoochcheanda ghayi eaweechcha nea geandi naweeda ghaadaayi weeshinda abwaay leabu humng'eeda, nea aba eeshmeeda ghang'al dea aseetta arearu, ak gwaneaweesean weeshinda ea bareandeanyu.
hean geappeedeaysi ngeanyi, ak ghaayiinyi ghuutta nyah aba iitta fuga Ebraniya, ‘Sauli, Sauli, ghwasaan anda ang'iing'i gighabwaschaan? Ahang'waay aba headaang'u gideaba gaydasa geetta ng'aniip.’
Ak ghaanyaschi, ‘Ang'iing'i ng'eaha gil Ng'uttamiida?’ Ghwasha Ng'uttamiida nea gwayi, ‘Aniini Yeesuudida ighabwaasi.

Asi ng'eada ak gimiinaadi aba geeshangaagu; aba gideaba naahiimneey geaw appadayda ng'asheanji ak ghaloachcheay ak ghoaloachchi amaduw ghaloachchi ak gimmuusi ak gamuuwwu haleanjeeda gwachchi nidahi aba heedeanyu ea heedeaba fukka jea dabassean,
gaydalealnaneey heeda buuneeda ea heeda Emoojiga, ak geajeaktaneegwa nyaawa,

ak ghwayam gheanyanga nyaawa, geat gwaheelli misaneeda ak gaweay jeeda weeshinda ak gwaritteawa jeeda uurda Shattaani amahit gwayamsa geat Aseetta, ak ghwanyas samsiinda ring'eega ea giibinda aba jeeda fukka ghayi simmiidu aba masaweega aba jeedeanyuun.’”
“Ea sugoochcheandeanyu was Agirippa, aba sareani aniini mii daahang'waay uhuudeanyu aba gitta gissiihiimnaan aba humng'eedean,

ak aba madeeda ghaang'eachchi rukwiideayda ng'asheega Aseetta aba ng'eanyiida Dameski, ea Yerusaleemu ea ng'eanyiisean bea Yahuudi, ea heeda fuga Emoojiga, gideaba gwaduukkuuna ak gwayamsa geat Aseetta ak ghoahiimu aba gadiyoojiga nyaawa gideaba niduukkuuna.
Hean aba ng'asheanji iiduw ghoang'ng'waanyan fuga Yahuudi aba jeeda gheeda sibatta Aseetta ak gagasa gwanuusan.

Iiduw ghaweadan Aseetta ak ghoaw gidaghamna amiinaadawi nea geawoschi majeek nea geamuuwwiisi ng'asheega fuga manang'i ea gea hees, nea ng'asheega eabalooli ea gea ghayi rugu sibanga ea Muusa gil gideaba gayghwahidu:
bea gideaba Gristo gayghwanyas sawanadeeda, ea gideaba niny ihuuw dea asheeda eattuuna miyeeda, gaygwarukkwiida iitta weeshinda aba heeda fugaaschi ea heeda fuga Emoojiga.”
Aba damani weada geaw Baulo aba balooldean, hean ghang'eat Festo goojuur nea gwayeeshsha, “Baulo, ang'iing'i gibwageas, gissoomani ittaang'u hawiin ning'ulnyi geeska.”
Ghwalamda Baulo ak gwayeeshsha, “Ea Festo, siida mureeda, aniini mwabwa geas, geargu ng'asheega fughareeda bea huumeanda.

Aba gideaba sugoochcheanda ghwanal iitteaba ng'asheesu, ak aniini ghammuschi deabalool nea mwaawali gil; aba gideaba ghaanalli muuchchi gideaba manda eara ng'ashaanjagi mwanala niny, aba gideaba ng'asheanji meesna aba heeda funyaat.
Heappi sugoochcheandeanyu was Agirippa, subanga gumwasi? Ghaanalli gideaba gumwasi.”
Ghwalamda Agirippa ak gwayeeshsha Baulo, “Aba gheadi nuwaas gigasayi nung' doaw siida Gristohi?”
Ghwalamda Baulo ak gwayeeshsha, “Ea nuwaas ghana ea geaw gaydamus Aseetta ea mii ang'iing'i gil gabeachchi, eara fuga sean aleeyseaniit ghamneawa gidabal gawuurjeewean ak ea meeratta gawuurjeewean.”
Hean ghang'eat sugoochcheanda haw ea sugoochcheanda haw bassa ea Bernike ea buuneessean gwachchi abiitpiit mideay.
Iiduw nea ghang'eatng'eat gaweay geebalooleada nea geeyi, “Siisi mii gwasin gilmuy miisa miyeeda ghana ghealooniga.”
Siisi inyeeda gwachchi ea mii ghoang'aatta girgweageadaannyi heeda Gaysaari, gwachchi gajeesiksiina.
Iiduw nea nihidu beatta ng'eanyiida Ittaliya, hean geattayda Baulo goodeayi sea fiisu ng'ay mida ghealooniga, nea gafur fiisu shirikkarajeanda haw bea “Gharmuchcheanda Agustoyda suguura Yuliya.”

Hean geeding'di maleambooda haw leabu Adiramito, maleamboodida abeeda ghwariikghta ghwahitta mujiineeda mida ghuutta basooda ng'eanyiida Asiya, hean geeng'ng'eachchi ghuutta beatta nea abeeda geetteayeewi siispa ng'eanyiida Makkedoniya suguura Aristarko leabu ng'eanyiida Desalonikke.
Iimuchchu geefuufchi aba Sidoni; ak gwasissa Uuliya Baulo gawa googeachchi fugaaschi duupchi nea gearrear.
Sing'eadi hooweanji geeweayi nea geegeanni ng'eanyi Saypras, aba gideaba ghoadealeasa jeammeeda.
Hean nea silaji bugusta basooda Gilikkiya, ea Bamfiliya, geehidu Mira mida Lugiya.
Hean sihitti hoowa ghwadaa Shirikkarajeandida maleambooni haw leabu Aleksandariya nea gawa ng'eanyiida Ittaliya, hean goodiing'daneasa.

Hean geeweayi nea geeghwalghwalaadi ea ghwasang'ayiit eawoojiga ea iiduw ehitta mujiineeda Nido nea sisawani, aba gideaba gudang'wan jeammeeda inyeessa ghoadealeasa, hean geadoabiiwji eweaya nea geeleapnani Grette ng'eanyi nea neekkeewa Salmone.
Ak geeweayi nea geeghwalghwalaadi nea geesikchi ghuutta basooda ak geahittaawi sawanadeeda hiji suguura Ghuutta basooda miy nea neekkeewa mujiineeda Laseya.
Ghayi nea ning'atta eawoojiga saang'a, nea bareanyeekka gwanda washta ak eara damanda siratta jalooda ea goolla ghang'atta, hean gwareekusa Baulo saawa nea gwayeeshsha,
“Ea oorjooga ghaadaayi bareanyeeksu ikkaasaan gajeeshageadana ak gayghwaageasa lugooda, majeeghus dea sareenda ea maleambooda akghwahit, eara dea aweagaasa.”
Ak gooleeysiit shirikkarajeandida muuchchi siida mwanmwan maleambooda ea siida bea maleambooda, nea maduuppa ng'asheega gwachchi rugu Baulo.

Ak hooweanji sindean amwahida aba giibinda damanda gooroogeeda, hean iiduw gagasa fuga saang'a gideaba isimmu geeweayi ea ehitta ng'eanyiida Foynikke, mida ghuutta basooda ng'eanyiida Grete, mida meatkweeda wilooda ng'eanyiida ghayeawa, ea wilooda ng'eanyiida biyeara, ak geeppiidi hoowa damanda gooroogeeda.
Hean iiduw nea ghaghuudu jeammeeda leabu wilooda ng'eanyiida biyeara, hean ghaghay saawa gideaba ninyas gidagasa, hean geettin maleambooda ak geeweay nea geesik ghuutta basooda neekkeewa Grete.
Miighoagil ghaghuudu jeammeeda ng'waan, wunda shaarara leabu wilooda ng'eanyiida ghayeawa;
hean ghwalas jeammeeda maleambooda ea ghwaraay beatta aba jeammeeda, geanung'waadi gagutgutta aba gideaba meammuusi eatteala.
Iiduw nea geang'atti nea gealamwajaadi aba murdeeda ng'eanyiida neaweesa beega suguura Gawuda, geayaaji milaada aba giding'deayda maleambooda mwanang' uhuuda maleambooda haw.
ng'atta gageanu gidasittenniida ak ghwarada maleambooda; iiduw ghabeal nea ghaghay gili jea ghoabitta jeeda iseaskweanda, ng'atta ghwanung' gojiileada gidasumwanmwana, amang'atta geahoan.
Iiduw nea niraanya jeammeetta, hean iimuchchu geesuuy sareenda mida jeeda maleambooda ak geejaksa jeeda basooda;
eaweedeaba samwagu geehiista haleanjeeda mida maleambooda aba geattinga.
Muchchu nea ning'atta eawoojiga saang'a nea miyeedaa aseetta ghana miinga, nea manda madeedeanya siilakghta, iiduw goosha gitta sirarji gwachchi jea gwalealneasean.

Iiduw nea nigeanu buuneeda eawoojusu ng'ay nea mandeawana hamitta, hean ghang'eat Baulo ak gwayeeshsha, “Ea oorjooga, inyeeda goolleeyseaniit, ak ea meeng'amwani Grete, gwachchi washi ea lugooni mwajeanyasa.
Ak ghamneawa geayeeshiineegwa adoabealli; aba gideaba manda eara siyagi jea gahutta eaweegaaschi geaghus maleambooda akghwahit.
Aba gideaba ghoossa eawa gwahisseani malaykajeanda Aseetta eabeayi nea geabadayi, ghwahidu ak gwayi,
‘Baulo adibeali; gaygwasa gideaba gaymiinaada aba madeeda Gaysaari; ak ea nigoonnyi Aseetta baraandaang'u sean.’
Asi adoabealli, aniini geandeawi masaweega aba heeda Aseetta ak gaygwasa girrukunean.
Ak maleamboodeanya gayghwaat jeammeeda ea ghwahitta ng'eanyiini mida bugusta basooda.”

Hean ng'atta eawooji damanang'wan, nea gagutguttaneasa jeammeeda googealeasa meatkwajeega sean bea basooda Adiriya, hean bugusta eaweeda ghaghay fukka bea maleamboodean gideaba sineekkiisa ng'eanyiida ghajaam.

Iiduw geegeanu ak geerassa lagheaneeda uhuuda mareamarooda ak geeppuutta jeeda basooda eadaa gidayang'da sheaginda, ak geanyas geeshan haradam; iiduw geebiikta gichcha eeppuutta mareamarooda ak geenyas geeshan damanamuut.

Iiduw geewal gideaba gajiiduw gagul maleambooda lagheanga, hean geegeanu laghean ang'wan jea ghoammu ghoadeal maleambooda ak geerassa uutta maleambooda ak geappuutta jeeda basooda ak geamwaash Aseetta gabean gaweeshiit.
Hean iiduw gagasa ghawaapta fukka bea maleamboodean, ak ea nirareang'sa maleambooda jeeda basooda, ak gwahinda geat giliweay mwadi goorareang'sa jeeda basooda lagheanga jea ghoadeal maleambooda,
ghwalamda Baulo ak gwayeeshsha shirikkarajeanda haw ea shirikkara, “Fiisu bea maleamboodean imeabiidana jeeda maleambooda ea mayghaghu.”
Hean gageanu shirikkarajeega ak ghwalach mareamarajeega maleambooda, ak geenung'waada gawa.
Iimuchchu nea gaweeshiit, gamus Baulo gweagiischi sean nea gwayeeshsha, “Askwareani deaba damanang'wan gil nea geammuughu nea geerat jalooda, ak ea mii ayaaga gil.
Asi geamuscheegwa ayeagischeena; aba gideaba gajanyasa uurda, aba gideaba eara budeanjagi bea iheengeagwa manda dea jea ghwaroat.”
Iiduw nea ghoahiit balooli, hean gageanu mukkatte ak gabadiischeesa Aseetta aba madeennyaawa hean ghabwanach ak ghwaak.
Hean ghoabit ng'eanyi jeesinga nyaawa ak gaba siisi agiischi.
(Moonneeda fuga mida jeeda maleambooda ea bughalaji iyyeenya ea laadam ea damwallah.)
Iiduw nea nilang'u, hean geesuuy sareenda maleambooda, ak geegeanu mushoodakka ngano ak geehisa jeeda basooda.
Ng'atta nea numuchchu, eamut ghwanal ng'eanyiitta heeda was, hean geadaa ghwanadeeda basooda ea iseaskweanda ghuutta basooda, hean geebaloola gideaba eenung' gawa maleambooda hoowa.

Hean geegeanu ghoabuutta gitta sirattiisa lagheangean ak geenung'usa jeeda basooda, ak aba damandida geepealbeal mareamarajeegiga sirada gissimanmanniidean; hean geegeanu weastideani adeeli jeammeedean ak geetting'da eeyiin madeeda maleambooda hean geeweesa iseaskweandida.
Hean ghoabitta maleambooda jeeda iseaskweanda saang'a uurji dulgwajeanda; ak ghoang'ng'waay madeeda maleambooda iseaskweanda ea ghwaraay ghwasat geaw, nea uutta maleambooda gwahirja laweajajeega.
Iiduw gagasa shirikkara gwanuuseada fuga ghealooniga aba gideaba ghoawal gideaba fiisu gwadeeppa ghabwar gaydooda ea gwaritteawa jeeda basooda ak gawappiida;
ng'atta gagasa shirikkarajeanda haw ghoaghu Baulo, ghoaghuum ea masna ng'asheanda gasa gwasin. Gwayeeshsha fuga ammu ghabwar gaydoodean dahisana geat jeeda basooda googeawsa ng'eanyiida ghajaam,
nea fuga buuneeda suurja ghoang'ng'waanyaada beehajeega maleambooda ghana beareadanga loadaana maleambooda. Hean ghoaw gidaritteayda buuneessean nea gaba seayu ak ghwahitta ng'eanyiida ghajaam.
Iiduw nea geebea seayu, geejeeng'u gideaba ng'eanyiitta geeguura Molta.
Nea fuga ng'eanyiitta amiyaas muuchchi aba gideaba ghwadeaptaneasa ak gagwarneasa beasta eesasean, aba gideaba ghang'at humng'eeda ak gwanda jeammeeda.
Iiduw gageanu Baulo goolliimu ghweenga ak ghwayiin jeeda beasta, hean gwajakna beasta ichchibooda jeeda ghweenga ak ghaghanya, amwahit ghabwarda ghaat aba geattindaannyi.

Daa fukkeanji gidabwardayda ghaat diyeayda aba geattinda, gaba nii eesha nuut, “Siisi isung'ulayi ghayi ea nibwar siida. Ak earanighu aba jeeda badooda, gili mwayghamwas doobiiwnatta ghoaghu aweagaaschi.”
Hean gwalalaksa diyeayda jeeda beasta, ak ea mii gwasma gil ichchibooda.
Ghoammuughu nea ghaghay gili jea ghoapka geattinda ghana ghoabeada aba geeshangiga ak ghami; geebassa ea gageawiit ak ea meedaaha gili muy, hean ghwayam fughareenga nyaawa ak gwayi, aseetta gil.
Abeeda ea neekkeewa hoowa madameespa siisi haw bea ng'eanyiitta suguura Bubliyasi, hean ghwadeaptaneasa ak geeppiidi gheanyi eawooji samwagu.
Abeeda ghamnyaan ghweanda Bubliyasi gabearji sheagheeda nea gabearji jeeda; hean gabareessa Baulo ak ghamwaash Aseetta amwahit ghwayiin geattingaaschi uhuuda siida miyaan ak ghahaap.
Iiduw nea geesin ng'asheanji, ghapka fuga miyeani sean bea ng'eanyiitta ak geehaap.
Ak ghoamwareasa buuneeda; ak eara damandida sing'eadi nea gajeeweaya bareannyeekkean, hean geeyiin eara jeeda maleambooda haleanjeeda wassean sigasayi.
Ng'atta sheesamwagu hean geeng'eachchi eeweaya nea geeding'di maleambooni mida ng'eang'i damanda gooroogeeda leabu Aleksandariya suguura Oorjooga was Saleahooga.
Hean geeweay ea ehitta mujiineeda Sirakasi ak geeppiidi hooweanji eawooji samwagu.
Iiduw geeng'eadi hoowa ak geehitti mujiineeda suguura Regiyam; ng'atta aweachchanjagi ghang'eat jeammeeda leabu wilooda ng'eanyiida biyeara, hean eaweedeabiyyeenya geehitti Butteoli.
Sihitti hooweanji geenyasi fuga siduupcheewi ak gammiiseasa gideaba endeayeena sea saawa ea ghang'atta eawooji ispwa. Ng'atta geehitti ng'eanyiida Ruumi.

Iiduw nea ghwanyas iitta fuga siduupchcheewi mida hooweanji iitteanya ghapka ghwadeaptaneasa aba hiji battiisa geat buuneeda suguura Appiya, “Gealsamwagu bea Agiischooda.” Daa Baulo ng'asheanji hean gabadiischeesa Aseetta ak ghoabit ng'eanyi.
Nea geehitti Ruumi, geamwas goopteada Baulo nea gaba geaw sea shirikkarajeanjagi jea gafur.

Ng'atta eawooji samwagu gaguursa fuga ambaliischi bea Yahuudi; iiduw nea ghabwat geat goobalool nea gwayeeshsha, “Fuga eaduupcheewi, earappeadi aniini manda gilmuy neasinnyi aba heeda fugaasa ak ea mii daheawa naweadinga ghayi bea gweargwaasa, ak geeng'ng'waanyaan amahit geejaksean ghealooniga aba Yerusaleemu ak geeyiinan geattinga fuga Ruumi.
Iiduw nea gwasikteawean, gagasa gwasiksean aba gideaba iisiippaloolan ea meedaaha ng'asheanji muy miissa miyeadeanyu.
Iiy ng'asheanji fuga Yahuudi ghaheawa gideaba gajeesiksean, ghwanung' fiisu ghang'atta girgweageedeanyu heeda Gaysaari, nea ghanyea manda ng'ashaan jea daahaaktaawa fuga emeedeanyu.
Ghoaw gideagurnaneegwa ak geebaloolli aba gideaba geeratteewean munyaloalajeega aba gitta ghus fuga Israeeliin.”

Ghwalamda saawa ak gwayeeshsha, “Aseasa manda barawajeanda sinyaschi leabu ng'eanyiida Yahuudi appadaydaang'u, ak ea manda eara siyagi siduupcheewi nihidu hiji nirgu ghana gabaloola ng'asheanda muy appadaydaang'u.

Ak ghang'wana geelleeysiit ng'asheega leabu ghuuttaang'u ang'iing'eesean; ea gididaakti ng'asheesu, asi geenalli gideaba geerukkuuna badahuukkeaba fiisu bea diineeniin ng'asheega munyas aba gideaba gabaloola buuneeda.”

Iing'atta nea niheelleesa eaweeda jea gwaroonnyeewa, gaweesa fuga saang'a eanyasa gheeda abiitta.
