Gwarukusa nea gweassa geaw ghang'eada sakteayda ea ghoaw shing'ada muwwunooda ng'asheega sugoochcheandumeeda Aseetta, nea ghaghughur aba ng'asheega Yeesu, aba deaweedeeda ghayi bea Muusa ea dea sibanga.
Hean ghamwas fiisu ng'ay ng'asheagaaschi, nea mwaatkwa ea mwamwasa.

Iiduw ghang'eat gaweay nea moang'ng'waanya geat baloolda nyaawa iing'atta ng'asheanda assagi rugu Baulo bea gideaba, “Aba huumwa ghoadoabiiw Gurorooda Ghaydit aba ng'asheega rukusa ghwanigaasa aba naweeda sibaneeda suguura Isaaya:
‘Una heedeaba fiisu, ak giyeeshshi,
ing'shooda gajayiinya huumwa ak ea mwajanala,
ging'weerdeayda huumwa ak ea mwajadaaha.
Aba gideaba guroruunatkeaba fiisu eahang'oonyi,
nea iidiga nyaawa eadurmani aba iing'shooda,
nea gheanyanga nyaawa ea nudukutta;
ak amwadaaha aba gheanyanga nyaawa,
ak ghwayiiy aba iidiga nyaawa,
ak ghwanal aba guroruunatka nyaawa,
ak gwayamsean geat ak gaheaba.’”
Asi agooga anala gideaba lealeanooda Aseetta siyeassa fuga, “Emoojiga; saawa gaygooleeysiit.” [
Ng'ooruutka suuk bea garayi ghoahaat ghealoodeaba 29, Ahiit rukunoodeaba ng'asheesu, gaweay fuga Yahuudi gabiikta gealga nyaawa nea gaba siisi anyeari nuut ng'asheega.]
Ng'atta goobiitta hoowa ea ghang'atta gweannyeewi iyyeenya nea goodayyiida lappiya aba gibindeaba gheawi, inyeessa ghwadeapta buuneessean hidu gooloong'sa,
gwarukkwiida sugoochcheandumeeda Aseetta nea goonealli ng'asheega badayda Ng'uttamiida was Yeesu Gristo ng'asheesu gwasin aba eeshpwaara nea manda siisi adeal.
Baulo, soomjeanda Yeesu Gristo, suguursa ghoaw giijasoochcheanda, sisach aba gadiyeeda giijasta miy bea Aseetta
ghayi siheelleesa ammwadi aba naweeda sibangaaschi aba jeeda ng'ooruutka ghaydidi,
giijasi miy bea badayda Balleandannyiin, leabu jeeda jeatta Dawdihiin aba gissijiilda aba saseeda
Balleanda Aseetta sihhiimu gideaba gwandeawa uurda aba Gurorooda ea ghaydidanda aba duunnoodaannyi aba jeeda miyeeda, Yeesu Gristoyda was Ng'uttamiideanya,
nea appadaydeaba niny ghayi geanyaschi dagheerjeandumeeda ea giijasoochcheandumeeda ak ghwanyas mureeda ea masaweega aba ghawungaaschi aba jeeda emoojiga sean;
nea ghabwada agoogeeni suguureewaneegwa fuga jea gaba Yeesu Gristohiin;
aba fuga sean mida ng'eanyiida Ruumi, ghayi bwariiy Aseetta, suguursa ghoaw fuga ghaydidi:
Gagasa anyasa dagheerjeandumeeda ea hoyyooyda leabu heeda Aseetta was Ghweandeanya, ea heeda Ng'uttamiida was Yeesu Gristo.
Gidamadeeda geabadiischeesi Aseetteanyu aba Yeesu Gristo appadahuukkeagwa oagasean aba gideaba masaweegeagwa geerukkwiida aba muunda ng'eanyiissean.

Aba gideaba Aseetta muushoochcheadeanyu gil, eagadiyeesi aba guroroodeanyu aba jeeda Giijasta miy bea Balleandaannyi, nea iissa ea meapri aba rukunooda badahuukkeagwa galeagasean aba jeeda mooshteanyu bea Aseetta,
ak geamuschi gideaba gayghamwasan Aseetta ak ghammuuschi dahidu heedeang'wa.
Aba gideaba geagasayi muuchchi dadaheang'wa, ak abeeda geagoonnyeegwa haleanjeeda gurorooda ak abeeda gagooneegwa uurda,
nea abeeda geeheettu nea geemmajeekchi geat aba masaweega giliwas siida, deang'wa ea deanyu.

Iiduw fuga eaduupcheewi, geagasayi anala, gideaba iissa geagasayi galeagasean wunooda heedeang'wa, (ak geattealan ea ghoaw ghamneawa), ak abeeda ghaanyaschi haghweega aba heedeang'a, gawuurji gidanyasti aba jeeda Emoojiga.
Geandeawi gidamisean aba heeda fuga Yunaani ea geamawosa, heeda fuga was weaghoodiga ea gea dasheahi:
Asi, aniini geagasayi muuchchi rukkwiideayda Giijasta Miy earaba heedeang'wa agoogeeda mida ng'eanyiida Ruumi.
Aba gideaba maydabwaspwas aba Giijasta Miy, ba gideaba uurda Aseetta gil dea eadu lealeanooda aba heeda siida wassean mideawa masaweega, heeda siida Yahuudi ammadeeda ak gabassa siida Yunaani.
Aba gideaba doobiiwnatta Aseetta geattahaach aba jeadaannyi, ghang'eada masaweega ea gagul masaweega, gawuurji gidasung'waarda gideaba, “Siida doabiiwaat aba masaweega gaygoobiideawa masaweega.”
Aba gideaba nyarasta Aseetta sittahaach aba humng'eeda appadayda fuga heawa ea gea munyas amaduw aba munyasnachcheekka nyaawa ghaminighis humeanda.
Aba gideaba ng'asheega jea eanal aba heeda Aseetta nidaajiit aba jeennyaawa, aba gideaba niihiimsa Aseetta saawa.
Hean dea sisna ng'eanyiida aba gidameadaakta niny, raanya uurdaannyi maygammudean aba gidawasta Aseetta, sidaa aba jeeda haleanjeeda ghayi sisin.

Ak earappeadi nal Aseettean ghanyea masissiina mureeda niny gawuurji Aseetta ghana gabadiischeesa niny, hean ghoaw duguuga mwadaagha aba iheenga nyaawa nea fughareenga nyaawa marachchi gil geanung' gamisaniit.
Fuga hinda geat gili weaghoodi, gwadasheahiidi,
ak gooyamuuji gigheambiitta Aseetta manda mudeanooda ak ghwanung' gawuurji haleanjeeda uurji sea siida jea ghami munyinda ghana dariidakka ghana diyeanga ghana diyeanga badiinna ng'eanyi.
Iiduw ghwanung'waada Aseetta goobiida jeeda haleanjeeda bwariiy guroruunatka nyaawa ak gwasin ririnnyeanda, ak gwajakteaysa sasanuukka nyaawa mureeda.
Aba gideaba niyamuuji humeanda Aseetta ghoaw ng'uyyeega, ak ghabwat gida sidamali nea gagadiyeesa nea ghwanung'waada Aseetta sin halanjeessean, siduumsheesa damanda manda mudeanooda! Amin.
Aba sareani ghwanung'waada Aseetta gwasin gidashissa ghaang'. Ak eara gadeemga nyaawa ghwayam searoojiga miisa gissisinniida, ak gwasinda gidaghayi mawosa seareetta bea gisisinniidean,

gwasnu eara heediga ghwanung'waada seareetta bea gissindeaydooscheatta sea gadeemgean ak gwayamsa geat headiga aba geawunnyeekka gheanyanga, ak gwasin headiga ng'asheega baspaseega sea headiga ak ghwanyas aba sasanuukka nyaawa ghoorjooda aba gidiinyeannyeekka nyaawa.
Hean nea ghwadaa gideaba mwahida gideaba gayghamwas Aseetta, ghwanung'waada Aseetta gwasin searoojiga munyas gasa fugheerga nyaawa.

Ninnyiit jeesinga nyaawa ng'asheega sean munyas, munyinda, ea shidoodeaba ghaang; geawunda gheangda. Lajoodeaba ghuut, ea nuusta buuneeda, ea jaleadinga, ea reengaweega, sichcheeda, fuga aga badahuukkeaba geat,
nappiisa geat ng'uyyeega, fuga biissa ghwasit Aseetta, bea ghwarja, fuga manda gidamwanang', bea ghwarjeeda, fuga iissa gwasin ng'asheega munyas, masinsiina ghweaniga nyaawa mureeda,
fuga dasheahi, mandeawana masaweega, biissa ng'weani jeesin, fuga mabayyiida suurja.
Earappeadi nal muuchchi digheanda Aseetta nea fuga sina ng'asheesu gammiisa miyeeda, ameakghusa gideaba gwasin ng'asheesu, iissa ghamwas eara fuga sina ng'asheesu.

Asi mondeawani samsiinda, ea siida, neada guwosi ng'eaha, irgweaksi siinuut, aba inyas girgweaksi siida ada abeeda girgweaksi geaw ang'iing'i, aba gideaba ang'iing'eada argweaksa siida, gisni ng'asheanda uurji diitta.
Ak geanalli aseasa gideaba girgeageeda Aseetta gaba huumwa appadahuukka fuga sina ng'asheesu.
Ang'iing'i siida, iissa girgweakkiissi fuga sina ng'asheesu, ak gisni ang'iing'i ng'asheegiga gwachchi sin saawaan, gajammuusa siyoara ghoorjooda Aseetta?
Ghana ang'iing'i irari nga'sheega baruureega aba ng'eenindaannyi ea gidamajeekta ea riyeang'deayda? Ak ea minali gideaba ng'eeninda Aseetta gayghoadoabiiwnyi ea ghoahiittaneey jeeda dukkunooda?
Nea aba hang'ooynattang'u bea gurorooda mandeawana duukkuunooda gidiiwsi geat nyarasta aba eaweetta nyarasta jea ghwahinna ghoorjooda Aseettean.
Imuchchu ghoadaw giliwas siida gitteenna seang'ayda ng'asheega nisin:
aba heeda fuga milikghta aba sinooda gadiyoojiga miyaasiin gagaseadayyi gigheambiitta ea mureeda ea ng'asheega maygameewa, gayghoadaw eaweega manda muudeanooda;
nea fukka aheakkiida suurjeaniin biissa ea moawalla ng'asheega huumwaan, nea gwasinniisa mureeda ng'asheega munyas, gay ghwanyas nyarasta ea gharbeeda.
Ak gaygwanda deawiitmeeda ea sawanadeeda aba heeda buuneessean sina ng'asheega munyas, ammadeeda siida Yahuudi ea siida Yunaani,
duukku gigheambiitta ea mureeda ea weayda aba heeda siida wassean sina ng'asheega miyaas, ammadeeda siida Yahuudi akkabassa siida Yunaani.
Aba gideaba aba heeda Aseetta manda shiitmeeda.
Aba gideaba fukka sean ghayi adiiy nea manda deaweedean, gay gwarooda nea manda deaweeda, nea fuga sean adiiy mideawa deaweeda gajergweaksiina deaweeda.
Ak ea mii fuga iiy deaweeda gil gea jea ghwanyas doobiiweadi aba madeeda Aseetta, geaghus fukka sina deaweeda jea eattaw doobiiwnatta.
Aba gideaba fuga Emoojiga mandeawana deaweeda aba gealaan was gidagasa deaweeda, niiw deaweeda aba heannyaawa, earappeadi mandeawana deaweeda.
Ak ghoahiimu gadiyeeda deaweedeeda ghayi sung'oorsa guroruunatka nyaawa, nea gammuuwu fughareenga nyaawa ea gidamida jeesinga nyaawa, ghoahaakta ghana eesamsa saawa
nea aba eaweettida aba ginnyaashta giijasteanyu miy, goorgweaksa Aseetta macheamuutka buuneeda aba naweeda Gristo Yeesu.
Ak ang'iing'i iguuri geaw siida Yahuudi nea gikghusi deaweeda ak gighwari geaw aba gidindeayeatti Aseetta
ak ginali gitta bwariiy ninyiin, ak gumwasi ng'asheega was gea miyaas, ak abeeda ea sinnaalnyi aba deaweeda,
ak inali aba huumwa gideaba ang'iingi guwosi siida ahhaghwa fuga ng'oowwi, weeshinda fuga mida jeeda misaneeda,
siida aneali fuga dasheahi, ginealshoochcheanda diibiga, gwandeawa aba jeeda deaweeda saseeda aba fughareeda ea humeanda,
asi ang'iing'eada anaal fii suuk, ghwasaan anda minali geaw ang'iing'i? Ang'iing'eada rukkwiidi gideaba adijagwadiischi siida, gijagwadiischi ang'iing'i?
Ang'iing'eada iyeenniisi siida adimealuuli, gimealuuli ang'iing'i? Ang'iing'eada sit haleanjeeda sibada sinung' gawuurji aseechcheekka ak gijagwadi gheeda sibatta Aseetta?
Ang'iing'eada iissa gighwari geaw gideaba ginali deaweeda, iissa gijakteaysi Aseetta mureeda aba heheeweega deaweeda?
Ak geang'waar gideaba, “Gheawunga Aseetta iissa geerukuna ng'asheega munyas aba jeeda Emoojiga appadahuukkeagwa.”
Aba gideaba ghasmeahooda gammiisa iwosi siida sissa mureeda deaweeda ama inuusi deaweeda abeeda ghasmeahoadaang'u aniiw gideaba mii una ghasmeahooda.
Nea siida miyeayaat ghasmeahooda iyang'ng'waay deaweeda, abeeda nyoattaannyi bea beetta ghasmeahooda majeanung' ghoaw gil nuwa ghasmeahooda?
Nea fukka miyeayaat ak ghoanng'waay deaweedean, heapi maygorgweakseegwa agoogeeda mideawa gittaabooda deaweeda ea ghasmeahooda ak gwanuus deaweeda.
Aba gideaba niny mii Yahuudajeanda huumwa gil appadaw, ak ea mii ghasmeahooda huumwa gabeachchi badayda saseeda.
Niny Yahuudajeanda gil aba gurorooda, ea ghasmeahooda huumwa leabu jeeda guroroooda, ghaydit ak ea meemmaseawa nuut. Nea dumsheesiindaannyi ea maygwaleabu heeda buuneeda gaygwaleabu heeda Aseetta.
Asi siida Yahuudi gaburda naaha? Ama ghasmeahooda gwarachi naaha?
Gaburda muuchchi aba naweadinga sean. Aba madeeda fuga Yahuudi siittaw ng'asheega gasa Aseetta.
Gay gawuurjiin abeeda ii mwamwasa fuga mwaatkwa? Nyootta masaweega nyaawa gay ghoammu ghwayam doobiiwnatta Aseetta?
Manda! Aseetta adoobiiwaat galeagasean earappeadi bea ng'uyya buuneessean. Gawuurji ginnyaashta ng'ooruutka,
“Ng'asheagaagu iissa iirgu eadoobiiweadi,
nea girgweageeda iissa gijooriischi.”
Nea munyasnachcheakkaasa iyadahaach doobiiwnatta Aseetta, gajeayeanaan? Gajeeyeena Aseetta miidoabiiwaat iiyeadu ghoorjooda? (Aba hiji geabalooldi siida.)
Manda! Aba dascheani gwachchi gay ghoammu Aseetta gorgweaksa ng'eanyiida nea ghoadoabiiw?
Asi aba ng'uyyeegeasu iiniibiida huumeanda Aseetta jeeda gigheambiitta abeeda ghwasaan gudeergweaksiinanean siida riing'eeda?
Ak abeeda ghwasaan inyas measni ng'asheega munyas ghwahidu gea miyaas? Aba gideaba fuga beasheasa goorgweakseasa aseasa nea gwayi. Girgweageeda nyaawa ghwadoabiiw.

Asi gajeayeanaan? Aseasa fuga Yahuudi geewoschi miyaas muuchchi? Manda, eara gili mwanang'. Aba gideaba sisikteawi aseasa gideaba buuneessean, fuga Yahuudi ea fuga Yunaani, eara saawa gwanda jeeda uurda ring'eeda,
gawuurji gissung'waaarda;
“Manda siida doabiiwaat, mandana eara akkalealla;
manda siida nal gil, manda siida gaseadayyi Aseetta.
Niyam geat sean, ak ea nimunyasiidi sean;
manda siida sina ng'asheega miyaas, eara akkalealla.”
“Muwooguukka nyaawa bung'eeda abwara ghuusi,
nea ng'ushapkeakka nyaawa iissa gwareengani buuneeda.”
“Gwarittuuna ghuusiga nyaawa furooda uurji dea ichchibooda.”
“Ghuusiga nyaawa ghwannyiit mooshteayda ng'waan.”
“Geeshanga nyaawa eang'weani aba gihideayda foojeanda,
naweadinga nyaawa sik sea gwanda nyariida ea hirbabandeeda,
nea ghanyea mwanala naweeda weayda.
Nea gheawalmeeda Aseetta ghanyea manda gheanyanga nyaawa.”
Asi sinalli gideaba ng'asheega sean rugu deaweeda gwarukuna badahuukka fuga mida jeeda deaweeda, ak abeeda gearat ghuusiga sean, ak gawa ng'eanyiisean jeeda girgweageeda Aseetta;
ak ea manda siida jea ghwanyas doobiiwnatta aba madeadaannyi aba gadiyoojiga deaweeda, nea aba deaweeda iissa geanyas fughareeda ring'eeda.
Ak ghamneawa doobiiwnatta Aseetta ea nidaajiit nea manda deaweeda, aba gideaba sibanga ea deaweeda gamuuwwu ng'asheesu,
ak ea doobiiwnatta Aseetta gil, aba naweeda masaweega mida jeeda Yeesu Gristo aba heeda buuneessean mideawa masaweega. Aba gideaba maheelli;
aba gideaba nisin buuneessean ring'eeda, ak ghwasunyeawa gigheambiitta Aseetta,
iissa geattaw doobiiwnatta mwadaagha aba dagheerjeandumeadaannyi, aba naweetta bea lealeanooda mida heeda Gristo Yeesuun;

nea niny ghayi ea ninung' Aseetta ghoaw siida jea goohuun buuneeda, aba foojeandaannyi, ak geanyas aba masaweega. Ak abeeda ghoahiimu doobiiwnattaannyi ak gwasindunu nea gagasa ghoahiimu gideaba niny adoobiiwaat ak ghwanung'waada Aseetta ring'eega ghayi siisheeda eesin;
ak ghoadaajiit aba damani gideaba niny ea doabiiwaat ea gideaba gaygoomajeek siida mideawa masaweega aba jeeda Yeesu.
Asi gwandeenu ghwaroadeaba geaw? Sirassa jarooda. Aba deaweedeeda uurjiin? Aba deaweedeeda jea eesini? Manda! Geaghus deaweedeeda mideawa masaweega.
Asi sidaayi gideaba siida iissa ghwanyas doobiiwnatta aba masaweega nea meakna sinooda deaweeda.
Ama Aseetta niny Aseetta fuga Yahuudi gil akghwahidi? Niny mii Aseetta Emoojiga seani? Huumwa, niny Aseetta Emoojiga seani.
Aba huumwa Aseetta iiyagi, nea dea jea ghoadaw doobiiwnatta fukka siyaat ghasmeahooda aba masaweegeani abeeda gay ghoadaw doobiiwnatta eara fukka mii gaweay ghasmeahoodean aba masaweega.
Abeeda gajeayamwa deaweeda aba masaweegiga? Manda! Iisiyam abeeda geemajeekchi deaweeda.
Asi gajeayeanaan appadayda Abrahaamooda was gheambaaghweandeanya aba saseeda?
Asi abeeda Abrahaamu iinyas doobiiwnatta aba gadiyeeda, abeeda gwandeawa gichchea ghaghwara geaw, ak ea mii madeeda Aseetta.
Aba gideaba gwayiin Ng'ooruutka? “Abrahaamu ghamwas Aseetta, ak geanung' ghwanyas niny doobiiwnatta.”
Nea siida sin gadiyeeda, ea majeanung' ghoaw mushaahareadaannyi gissiittaw mwadaagha gajeanung' ghoaw sileeda.
Nea aba siida masna gadiyeeda ghus gideaba ghoadaw doobiiwnatta siida mammiisiina, abeeda masaweegeaba siisi sinung' ghoaw doobiiwnatta.
Ak ghwanyaashtunu Dawdi nea gabadiischeesa siitta adaw Aseetta doobiiwnatta nea masna gadiyeedeani:
“Ghang'wana fukka sisamsa gidinyeannyeekka nyaawaan, ea giikka siihuun ring'eega nyaawaan;
ghang'wana siitta may ghoapkaat Ng'uttamiida ring'eadaannyiin.”
Asi, ng'wanaweesu geargu appadahuukka fuga nuweay ghasmeahooda, ghana earaba heeda fuga mii eayaat ghasmeahooda? Aba gideaba geayeennyi “Abrahaamu sinung' ghoaw masaweagaaschi doobiiwnatta.”
Abeeda geattawdaan niny? Geattaw ammwadi ghana iing'atta beatta ghasmeahooda? Mii iing'atta beatta, ghwanyas nea miyeayaat ghasmeahooda.

Iiduw ghwanyas ghasmeahooda ak ghoaw gwadeagooda ghana mascheewda doobiiwnatta mideawa aba masaweega nea mii gawa ghasmeahooda. Ak abeeda ghoaw niny ghweanda fuga mideawa masaweega nea miyeayaat ghasmeahooda ak abeeda eara saawa ghwanyas doobiiwnatta,
gwasnu eara ghweanda ghasmeahooda, nea meakna gideaba nuweay ghasmeahooda, geaghus gideaba ghwaat naweetta bea masaweega ghayi aat Abrahaamu nea miyeayaat ghasmeahoodean.
Aba gideaba heelleesiindida bea Abrahaamu ea jeattaannyiin, bea gideaba gaygwahearan ng'eanyiida mwaani aba deaweeda geattaw aba doobiiwnatta siittaw aba masaweegean.
Aba gideaba iijea ghoaw fuga deaweeda fuga jea gwahearaniischi, masaweega ak ghoaw heelleesiinda gidamwadaagha.
Aba gideaba deaweeda dea anyareesi fih gil, aba gideaba ii manda deaweeda abeeda ea may gwanda gidinyeanda.

Asi ng'asheanji gapnu aba masaweega, ak abeeda heelleesiinda ghoang'waay geat sea dagheerjeandumeeda, ak abeeda gamajeegiit heelleesiindida aba heeda jeachcheengaaschi sean, nea meakghusa fukka bea deaweedean ak ghwahit geabwada eara fukka mideawa masaweega Abrahaamun, was gheambaaghweandeanya eesaseaniin,
gawuurji gissung'waarda bea gideaba, “Neahuwjeey huuwa ghweanda emoojiga saang'a,” aba madeeda Aseetta ghayi mwas, adaw eaweega fuga nimeewa ak gaguursa ak ghwanung' goobiida haleanjeeda mandana.
Ak gafurda ng'asheega meammu eefurda, ak abeeda ghoaw ghweanda emoojiga saang'a, aba gidaghayi sinyaashta, “Ak ea gichchea gwadeenna diibiga jea jiila gil.”
Niny miighabealbeal aba masaweega aba iing'ula niny saseadaannyi, sam gidasam miyeeda aba gideaba niriiksa gweannyeew bughala aba gweargumeeda, ghana iing'ula nyootta jeatta mida jeeda Saara.
Nea iisibaloola badayda ghanyea mashta aba iitta heelleessiinda Aseetta, hean gamajeegiit aba masaweega, nea ghoaghambiit Aseetta,
nea ghwanal aba huumwa gideaba Aseetta ghoammu gwasin ng'asheega niheelleesa.
Ak geanung' ghoaw “masaweega aba headaannyi doobiiwnatta.”
Nea ng'asheega, “surgu appadaydaannyi,” ea meang'waara aba niny akghwahit,
earaba aseasa. Gajeegoaneasa aseaseeda mideawa masaweega aba ninnyeeda ghayi aduunna Yeesuuyda was Ng'uttamiideanya jeeda miyeeda,
ak geenuus aba gidiinyeannyeakkaasa ak gooduudu ak geenyaschi doobiiwnatta.
Asi iisugoaneasa doobiiwnatta aba masaweega, abeeda geanyaschi weayda aba heeda Aseetta aba naweeda Ng'uttamiideanya was Yeesu Gristo.
Nea appadaydeabwa niny ea sinyaschi naweeda dagheerjeandumeeda ghamneawa simiinaadawiin, nea geehoosannyi aba rarooda gigheambiitta Aseetta.
Ameakghusa nii, aseasa geehoosannyi aba jeeda sawanaduutkaasa, nea geanalli gideaba sawanadeeda iissa gweadu milikghteayda,
nea milikghteayda gaygweadu hang'ooynatta jeeda, nea hang'ooynatta jeeda gaygweadu rarooda,
nea rarooda ea maygwareenganneasa, aba gideaba bariinyeega Aseetta nigeawiit ghwayiin jeesingaasa Gurorooda Ghaydit ghayi sugooneasa aseasan.
Aba gideaba damandida meendeawani uurdean, iiduw nea ghwahitta damanda ghami Gristo appadahuukka fuga munyas.
Ghwasaan, inyas gayghami siida appadayda siida doabiiwaat, iiduw ghoammu siida gabadaksa miyeeda appadayda siida miy.
Iiduw aniihiimu Aseetta bariinyeagaaschi niny nea gaba geaw appadahuukkaasa aseasa aba gideaba Gristo ghami appadahuukkaasa nea abeeda ea gudeebeaha riing'a.
Ak gay ghwaraanya iisugooneasa doobiiwnatta aba foojeandaannyi, ak ghwaraanya muuchchi gajeelealnaneasa jeedeaba nyarastida bea Aseettean appadaydaannyi.
Aba gideaba damanda duuw eawooseewana weajoodiga geettuupchaneasa sea Aseetta aba miyeeda Balleandaannyi, raanya muuchchi, iing'atta giduupcheeda geelealneasa aba jeeda aweagaaschi.
Ameakghusa nii, geehoosannyi aba heeda Aseetta aba naweeda Ng'uttamiideanya was Yeesu Gristo, nea appadaydeaba niny ghamneawa asinyaschi giduupcheeda.
Asi ring'eeda iihidu jeeda ng'eanyiida appadayda siida assagi ak gweadu ring'eani miyeeda, iiduw ghwahitta miyeeda heeda buuneessean aba gideaba nisin sean ring'eeda,
aba huumwa ghwahidu ring'eeda jeeda ng'eanyiida nea miyeegu deaweeda, ak ring'eeda ea meyiitta aba heeda manda deaweeda.
Nea abeeda miyeeda goombalischi damanda Adam ea gagul Muusa, ak gabiisa goombal eara fuga mii gwasin ring'eeda uurji dea Adam was siida sigala dea jea ghwahidu.

Nea gidasiittayda ea mawuurji sea gidiinyeanda. Aba gideaba ghayi iimeewa fuga saang'a aba gidiinyeamba siyagi, ak ghwaraanya muuchchi dagheerjeandumeeda Aseetta ea gidasugu aba dagheerjeandumeeda siida assagi was Yeesu Gristo naawda appadahuukka fuga saang'aani.

Amaduw gidasiittayda mwadaagha ea mawuurji sea gidiinyeandida bea siida assagiin. Aba gideaba girgweageeda iissa gamaseaw gidiinyeanda jea gweadu ghoorjooda, duukku gidasugu appadahuukka gidiinyeannyeekka saang'a gaygweadu doobiiwnatta.

Aba gideaba ghayi iyadiiy siyagi, hean goombaliischi miyeeda appadaydeaba siitta assagiin, gay ghwaraanya muuchchi fukka jea ghwanyas dagheerjeandumeeda naawda ea gitta siittaw mwadaaghaan aba doobiiwnatta, ak abeeda gay goombaliischi aba jeeda eaweegeaba siitta assagi was Yeesu Gristohiin.
Asi ghayi aba gidiinyeanjagi geergweaksa buuneessean hean aba gadiyeemba siyagi doabiiwaat gweadu eaweega aba heeda buuneessean.
Asi gwasnu iiheawa siyagi iiduw ghwanyas buuneessean ring'eeda, gwasnu eara iisin siyagi mureeda iiduw ghwanyas buuneessean doobiiwnatta.
Deaweeda ghwahidu ak gwaheedu gidinyeandida muuchchi, ammuchchu nea gwaheedu ring'eeda hean gwaheedu dagheerjeandumeeda ea ghwanaawda,
gawuurji gidambalda ring'eeda miyeeda, gwasnu eara miyeenooda goombal doobiiwnatta ak gweadu eaweega manda muudeanooda aba naweetta bea Yeesu Gristoyda was Ng'uttamiideanyean.
Asi gajeayeanaan? Gajeeppiidana jeeda ring'eeda ak abeeda gwaheedu dagheerjeandumeeda?
Manda! Aseaseeda ghayi simeewayi appadayda ring'eeda gajeeppideattaan gichcha jeeda ring'eeda?
Moanali gideaba aseaseeda ghayi siippattisaneasa aba jeeda Gristo Yeesu geeppattiisaneasa aba jeeda miyeadaannyi?

Asi geepnyeasa sea niny aba naweeda giibattiisanda aba jeeda miyeada, ak gawuurji gittutteayda Gristo aba jeeda miyeeda aba naweetta bea gharbeeda Ghweandean, gwasnu earaseasa gagasa eabeawana jeeda weeshinda mideawa eaweega eeshish.
Aba gideaba gawuurji gidaghayi siikkuuyeattaneasa sea niny aba jeeda miyeadaannyi, gwasnu gajeekkuuyaneasa gawuurji gidaghayi dutteayda niny.
Nea geanalli gideaba sasanuukkaasa bea garayi geengoorsiinnyi sea niny ak abeeda ghwanyawa saseani bea ring'eedean nyariida, ak ea mudeahuuwa gichcha ging'ng'oonyanga ring'eeda.
Aba gideaba siida nimi sihheelli ring'eeda.
Asi ghayi iisimeewuudayi sea Gristo, abeeda geamwaschi gideaba iimuchchu gajeendeayeena sea niny.
Nea geanalli gideaba iimuchchu nea gwaduunna Gristo miyeeda abeeda ea maygudu gabiikta ghami; nea miyeeda ea maygwandeawa uurda appadaydaannyi.
Aba gideaba miyeeda ghayi meah gameewsa badayda ring'eeda nibwagi akghwahit, ak aba giibindaannyi niny, goobiideewa badayda Aseetta.
Gwasnu earagooga asna geat fuga nimeewa aba ring'eeda ak goowooschi fuga majeekcheewi aba heeda Aseetta aba naweeda Gristo Yeesu.
Asi adagoombal ring'eeda sasanuukkeagwa ammu gameewa, nea ghoamwaschi gitta gasean.

Nea adiiduw ghoattaydi sasanuukeagwa ghoaw dabitta jea eesna ng'asheega munyas bea ring'eeda, ghang'wana ghoattawji geat Aseetta nea goowuurjeewi fuga majeekcheewi iing'atta miyeeda, nea ghoattawji Aseetta sasanuukkeagwa ghoaw dabitta doobiiwnatta.
Aba gideaba maygudu goombal ring'eeda sasanuukeagwa, aba gideaba moondani jeeda deaweeda, goondi jeeda dagheerjeandumeeda.
Asi naaaha? Gajeesna ring'eeda aba gideaba meendani jeeda deaweeda nea gweagu gideaba geendi jeeda dagheerjeandumeeda? Manda!

Moanali gideaba iyoaytaydi geat agooga awuurjeewana ging'ng'oonyanga mideawa mureeda, noahuuyi ging'ng'oonyangeaba siitta oosissi mureedean, ghana dea ring'eeda, ghoanung' ghoaw siida gadiyeesa ring'eeda jea gweadu miyeeda, ghana siida gadiyeewa mureeda jea gweadu doobiiwnatta?
Ak gagasa ebadiischeesa Aseetta, aba gideaba ghayi goowooschi ging'ng'oonyanga ring'eeda amaduw goosinnyi mureeda aba gurorooda gawuurji fughareetta ghayi siinnaleagwean,
amang'atta nea sinung' ooppala geat ak goosheagiidi ring'eeda, iiduw ghoahuuyi ging'ng'oonyanga doobiiwnatta.

Asi geabalooli nea gearukutteaydi siida, aba ng'arng'arandeang'wa bea geallaan. Aba gideaba ghayi noattaydi sasanuukkeagwa gwasin ririnnyeanda ea munyinda haw, asi ghamneawa oattawa sasanuukkeagwa doobiiwnatta ak geammiidu.
Aba gideaba damanda oowoseewi ging'ng'oonyanga ring'eeda, abeeda gooppalli geat nea goowooschi sheageewa doobiiwnatta.
Abeeda ghoanyaschi alooheemba naaha aba damandida oosinni ng'asheekka ghamneawa nung' ghahameagwa ng'eanyiin? Aba gideaba huydeandeaba ng'asheesu miyeeda gil.

Ak ghamneawa iisinung' ooppala geat ak goosheagiidi ring'eeda ak geanung' ahuuwa ging'ng'oonyanga Aseetta, abeeda gichchea anyasa gimminnooda gil, ama aba huydeanda gajanyasa eaweega manda muudeanooda.
Aba gideaba mushaahareeda ring'eeda miyeeda gil, nea gichchea gagu Aseetta mwadaagha ea eaweega manda mudeanooda gil aba jeeda Gristo Yeesu Ng'uttamiideanya.
Fuga eaduupcheewi moanali (gideaba ng'asheesu geabalooli fuga nal deaweeda) gideaba deaweeda goobal siida iiduweamajeegi?
Aba gideaba gatmooda mideawa siyeeda nirada deaweeda aba siyeeda damanda duweamajeegiin, ammuchchu nea ghami siyeeda, abeeda ea siitin deaweedeedida bea siyeedean.
Asi abeeda gajeeguura gili mealuul iimideayi sea ng'eedeeda nuut iiduu ea majeek siyeadaannyi. Ama meah siyeedaannyi abeeda gaygoobal geaw aba deaweedeedida, ama gheah siinuut abeeda ea mamealuula.
Asi gwasnu ofuga eaduupcheewi, earagooga noomeewsi deaweeda, aba saseeda Gristo, ak ghoahuuyi haleanjeemba siinuut, siida ghayi duunna jeeda miyeeda ak abeeda geenyaksi Aseetta haghweega.
Aba gideaba damanda duweeppiideewana saseeda aba gassooda ring'eeda, mida appadayda deaweeda, sin gadiyeeda aba sasanuukaasa ak iiduw gwajiilsa miyeeda haghweega.

Nea ghamneawa ea sittinneasa aba jeeda deaweeda, aba gideaba simeewwiisi gidaghayi nung' eahuuwa ging'ng'oonyanga, ak abeeda ea meegadiyeeni aba hiing'eadayda deaweedeeda sung'waar geaghus aba jeeda Gurorooda.

Asi gajeeyeanaan? Neada deaweeda ea ring'eedea? Eara gwasa! Gwachchi iimanda deaweeda, gwachchi ea mwaydanal ring'eeda. Ak ea mwaydanal geawunda gheangda iimarukuna deaweeda nea gwayi, “Adishti ghaang'.”
Iiduw ghwanyas gheatta ring'eeda aba diigheandida, ak gwasin aba jeedeanyu haleanjeessean siimmu eeshissa ghaang. Aba gideaba ring'eeda ii manda deaweeda ea nimi.
Nea abeeda geawooschi majeek nea abeeda ea manda deaweeda, ammuchchu nea ghwahidu digheanda, gamajeegiit ring'eeda ak ghaameayi;
ak digheandida jea gweadu eaweegean gweadu miyeeda heedeanyu.
Aba gideaba ring'eeda ghwanyas gheatta aba digheanda, gwareengannean amang'atta gwanuusan.
Asi deaweeda aa ghaydit, ak diigheanda earada aa ghaydit nea gabiissa aa doabiiwaat, ak aa miy.

Heapi gitta miyiin niyeadu miyeeda heedeanyu aniini? Eara gwasa! Ring'eeda gil, ak gweadu miyeeda jeedeanyu ak gwajakta gidamiy, ak abeeda geahhiimu ring'eeda gideaba ring'eeda, ak aba naweeda digheanda ghwanyas ring'eeda haw meammu etteen.
Aba gideaba geanalli beadi deaweeda gaba gurorooda; amaduukku aniini geawooschi siida beachchi saseeda, sishaaydaawa jeeda ring'eeda.
Aniini mwaanali eara gideasinnyi, aba gideaba iissa gitta aabwariinyiin ea maydasin, iissa geasinnyi gitta mwaabwariinyiin.
Iiduw nea geasinnyi gitta mwaabwariinyiin, abeeda ghaamwaschi gideaba deaweeda aamiy.
Asi ghamneawa mii aniini gil deasin ng'asheesu, gwasin ring'eetta mida jeedeanyuun.
Asi ghaanalli gideaba jeedeanyu manda gidamiy, nii aba saseedeanyu. Iissa geagasayi dasin gil doabiiw, ak ea maydasin.
Aba gideaba gitta miy aabwariinyiin iissa ea measni, iissa geasinnyi gida mwaabwariinyi.
Asi ghamneawa iissa iyeasinnyi gitta meagassiin, measni aniini nea gabwageaw, iissa gwasin ring'eetta mida jeedeanyuun.
Asi naadaayi deaweedeani gideaba aniineeda gasa gwasin ng'asheanda miyiin iissa gwaneawu ng'asheanda muy.
Aba gideaba geahoosassi deaweedeeda Aseetta aba jeedeanyu,
amaduw ghaadaayi aba saseedeanyu deaweeda nuut nea gang'uchchi sea deaweedeeda fughareedeanyu ak ghwanung' doaw ging'ng'oonyaneeda deaweedeeda ring'eeda mida jeeda saseedeanyuun.
Aniini meahoosani earahay! Nii gajea ng'eaha gil jea gwalealnanean saseani bea miyeedean?
Geabadiischeesi Aseetta aba Yeesu Gristoyda was Ng'utamiideanya! Asi iisunu aniini geagadiyeesi deaweedeeda Aseetta aba fughareedeanyu nea aba saseedeanyu geagadiyeesi deaweedeeda ring'eeda.
Asi ghamneawa manda girgweaksiinda appadahuukka fuga mida jeeda Gristo Yeesu.
Aba gideaba deaweedeeda Gurorooda eaweega mida jeeda Gristo Yeesu nigoonan gibaldeaba geaw, aba heeda deaweedeeda ring'eeda ea miyeeda.

Aba gideaba ng'asheekka meammu aba deaweedean, aba gideaba manda uurjeenga aba ng'asheega saseedean, iiduw aba gijeaknooda ajeagu Aseetta Balleandaannyi nea ghwanung' gawuurji siida mideawa ring'eeda, amaduw appadayda ring'eeda iiduw goorgweaksa ring'eeda mida saseeda;
ak abeeda gwasa ginnyaashta deaweeda aba jeesingaasa aseaseeda meaduubi ng'asheega saseeda geaduupchi ng'asheega gurorooda.
Aba gideaba fukka aat geeshta ng'asheega saseedean iissa ghoapkaat iheenga nyaawa ng'asheega saseeda, amaduukku fukka aat gheeshta ng'asheega guroroodean ghwayiin iheenga nyaawa ng'asheega Gurorooda.
Aba gideaba gidagasa saseeda miyeeda gil, nea gidagasa gurorooda ea eaweega gil ea weayda.
Nea fughareeda sikkeal ng'asheega saseeda ea muy aba heeda Aseetta; ghanyea mwamwasa deaweedeeda Aseetta, nea aba huumwa ghanyea maygwasissa mureeda;
nea fukka aat geeshta saseedean, ghanyea may ghoammu goohoosan Aseetta.
Ak ea moowosi fukka aat geeshta ng'asheega saseedean, gowoschi fuga Gurorooda, aba huumwa iimida jeesingeagwa Gurorooda Aseetta. Siida mandeawana Gurorooda Gristo ghanyea maba niny.
Nea Gristo ii mida jeesingeagwa earappeadi sasanuukeagwa nimeewa aba ring'eedean, guroruunatkeagwa ea majeekcheewi aba doobiiwnatta.

Nea gurorooda siida ghayi aduunna Yeesu jeeda miyeeda ii mida jeedeang'wa, abeeda siida ghayi aduunna Gristo Yeesu jeeda miyeedean, gay ghoaghu sasanuukkeagwa mida jea gameewa aba guroroodaannyi mida jeesingeagwa.
Asi fuga eaduupcheewi, geendeawi siileeda, nea maba saseeda, ak geayaachchi geeshta ng'asheega saseeda,
nea iyoppideewi ng'asheega saseesa gajameewwa, ama oppideewi Gurorooda abeeda ghoanung' gameewa gadiyoojiga saseeda ak abeeda gajanyasa eaweega.
Aba gideaba buuneessean adoabiiw Gurorooda Aseetta, fiisu abeeda ea balloojiga Aseetta gil.
Aba gideaba ghayi meegoaneagwa gurorooda ging'ng'oonyaneandumeeda jea gweadu muuwda, ghayi geegooneegwa gurorooda jea ahuuweewana balloojiga. Nea geeyeawdi, “Bwaabwa! Bwaabwa!”
Gurorooda niny gamuuwwu sea guroruunatkaasa gideaba aseasa geewooschi diibiga Aseetta,

ama suwooschi diibiga, adabeeda geewooschi fuga jea gwahearaniischi, fuga adaw Aseetta hearaniischooda, jea gwahearaniischi sea Gristo, asaha, iisisawaneasa sea niny abeeda iimuchchu geakghambiideasa sea niny.
Aba gideaba ghaanung' ghoaw sawanadeen bea ghamneawean gili mii gili iyeahiimnyeadi sea giigheambiitta numuji jea eettahaachneasa.
Aba gideaba haleanjeessean weelweel appadayda ng'eanyiida gafuurda nea gahoosan aba furdeayda gidaheachta balloojiga Aseetta;
nea haleanjeeda ghayi sisin geanung' ghoaw duguuga mwadaagha, nea mii gidagassiida niny gil gidagassiida deaghayi nung' earara,

aba gideaba haleanjeessean weelweel gay ghwanyas giibaldeaba geat ak geegeandeawa jeeda ging'ng'oonyaneandumeeda eadu nyariida, ak geanung' ghwanyas giibaldeaba geat bea giigheambiitta diibiga Aseetta.
Ak geanalli haleanjeessean weelweel iissa gamnyeani sean nea gwasawana ea ghoaw ghamneawa;

ak ea meakghusa haleanjeeda sisin, earaseaseeda mideawa haghweega madeeda bea Gurorooda, ak earaseasa geenniikghchi aba guroruunatkaasa, nea geammuughu eahuwa balloojiga nea lealnooda sasanuukaasa gil.
Aba gideaba aseasa geelealneasa aba gitta sirarjiin. Nea gitta sirarji nea geadayiin ea mii gichchea earar gil. Aba gideaba gajea ng'eaha jea ghwarar gitta daahiin?
Ama sirarji gittta meadaahaan, abeeda geefurdi nea gearjeang'di.

Gwasnu eara Gurorooda ghaweadeasa aba ng'arng'arandeanya, aba gideaba meammuusi eamwaashta Aseetta gidahaguuwsiindaneasa, iiduw iissa ghamwaash Gurorooda ghawooda appadahuukkaasa nea gaba geaw nea gwasawana aba gisimeanda meammu eergu.
Nea siida sikkiideawa guroruunatka buuneeda ghwanal fughareeda Gurorooda, aba gideaba Gurorooda gamusiischeesa fuga ghaydidi aba gidagassiida Aseetta.
Ak geanalli gideaba aba jeeda ng'asheega sean iissa gwasin Aseetta gadiyeeda miy sea fukka bwariiy ninyiin, fukka ghayi suguursa aba gidagassiida ninyiin.
Aba gideaba fukka ghayi bay ghwanal niny ammwadiin geegala sea balleandaannyi, ak abeeda ghoaw niny siichchea eeshsheeda eeji aba jeeda fuga eaduupcheewi saang'a.
Amaduw fukka ghayi bay ghwaloat ammwadiin, iiduw earaga siguursa, amaduw fukka guursean hean ghoadaw nea fukka adaw doobiiwnattean ghoadaw gigheambiitta.
Asi gajeeyeenaan appadaydeaba ng'asheesu? Aseetta iimida meatkweedeanya, abeeda gwanda ng'eaha uhuudeanya?
Ninyeeda ghayi mabwayda eara Balleandaannyi assakkalealla, ak gagu appadahuukkaasa easasean, niny maygagoaneasa haleanjeeda miyaas sea ninyi?
Nii gajeang'eaha jea goorgweaksa fuga loat Aseetta? Aseetta gil dea adayyiida doobiiwnatta;
gaygoorgweakseegwa ng'eaha? Gristo Yeesu gil, ghayi meah, huumwa, ak gwaduunna miyeeda, ak gwanda geattinda dugwa bea Aseetta, amaduw gamusiischoaweasa?

Ak ea ng'eaha gil siida jea gooheellaneasa sea bariinyeega Gristo? Heappi, gajea hang'weaniidoodea, ghana deawiitmeeda, ghana sawanadeeda, ghana jalooda, ghana dawiishnatta, ghana halootta, ghana bwaanga?
Gawuurji gidaghayi sung'waarda,
“Apwadaydaang'u geenuuseasa askwearda sean,
sinung' eewuurjeewana gisilga jea eenuuseada.”
Manda, aba jeedeaba ng'asheesu seaniin iissa geang'alli fuga jooriischi, aba heeda siida ghayi bwariinyeasa.
Aba gideaba naanalli aba huumwa gideaba ea miyeeda, ghana eaweega, ghana malaykajeega, ghana gea ambaliischi, ghana ng'asheega ghamneawa bunu, ghana gea jea ghwahidu, ghana fuga mideawa uurda,
ghana haleanjeeda mida humng'eeda, ghana haleanjeeda mida ng'eanyi, ghana gidawassean may ghoammu gooheellaneasa sea bariinyeega Aseetta mida jeeda Gristo Yeesu was Ng'uttamiideanya.
Asi geargu huumwa aba jeeda Gristo, mearukuni ng'uyyeega; nea eara fughareedeanyu gamuuwwu ng'asheega badaydeanyu aba jeeda Gurorooda Ghaydit,
gideaba geandeawi giiseaneega muuchchi ea sawanadeeda measha aba jeeda guroroodeanyu.
Ak gwachchi aniini geagasayi gideaba gajeamwaashtanaan ak geheellewean Gristo appadahuukka fuga eaduupcheewi bissea buweadeegeasu gil aba emeedeanya.
Saawa fuga Israeeli, nea saawa ea balloojiga gil, was gigheambiitta, ea neajeeda, ea giidaydeayda deaweeda, ea baditta Aseetta ea heelleesiinda;
aba geannyaawa gwanda gheamba ghweaniga, bea emeannyaawa, aba saseeda, aba heannyaawa Gristohi. Aseetta haweawa haleanjeessean gagasa eebadiischeesa ea ghoaw damanda manda muudeanooda. Amin.
Nea mii gideaba niyamwa ng'asheanda Aseetta aba gideaba may ghoaw buuneessean bea Israeeli jeatta Israeeli,
ak ea mii diibiga Abrahaamu sean aba gideaba jeattaannyi gil, “Geagus aba naweeda Isakka abeeda jeattang'u gajeeguurdeaweey.”
Nea mii gideaba saawa mii diibiga sijiila saseeda gea was diibiga Aseetta, saawa diibiga heelleesiinda gea was jeattaannyi.
Aba gideaba ng'asheanda neajeeda niigil, “Gay dahidu damanda uurji nii, nea Saara gajeaninyas balleanda.”
Ak ea meakghusa nii, eara Rebeekka iigweayiit aba siyeanagi was Isakkaayda was ghweandeanya,

earappeadi saawa miyeejiin ak ea miigwasin ng'asheanda miy ghana dea muy, ak abeeda gitta gasa Aseetta aba loottean abeeda geesin, nea mii aba gadiyeeda gil geaghus aba gidaguurdeayda, ak geeyeeshsha,
“Siida haw gaygagadiiyeesa dea mwanang.”
Gawuurji gidaghayi sung'waarda, “Naabwariinyi Yakkobo ak ea naasichchi Esawu.”
Asi gajeeyeanaan? Neada heeda Aseetta gwanda munyinda? Manda!
Aba gideaba gwayeeshsha Muusa, “Gay dabwayda siida eagasayi dabwayda, ak gaydasamsa siida eagasayi dasamsa.”
Asi meakghusa gitta gasa siidean gil ghana badiidaannyi, geaghus aba baydeayda Aseetta.

Aba gideaba ng'ooruutka gwargu appadayda Faraawo gideaba, “Ghayi ghaanung' miinaada appadaydeaba ng'asheanji, ak abeeda ghaahiimneey uurdeanyu, ak abeeda geerukkwiida gheawungeasu aba jeeda ng'eanyiissean.”
Asi iissa ghabwayda siida gasa ghabwayda, nea goomajeek gurorooda siida wassean gasa niny.
Asi gajayeeshshinean aniini, “Ghwasaan anda niny gudugagaseadayyi gidinyeanda? Aba gideaba gajea ng'eaha jea ghamilikghta gitta gasean?”
Ak ang'iing'i siida guwosi ng'eaha jea ghwasha ghuutta Aseettean? Gidasisin ak gwayeeshsha dea sin, “Ghwasaan anda gisinduneani?”
Neada siida sina dahuunatka mandeawana uurda aba heeda sigeeda, ak gageanu mughuusheanda sigeeda ak gwasin dabichcheanjagi miy, ak gwasin nuut dea majeahhaak ghaang'i?
Asi naaha iigasa Aseetta ghoahiimu nyarastaannyi nea ghwanung' eanala uurdaannyi, ak ghamilikghta muuchchi nea ghwarjeang'da aba dabitiida nyarasta sisissa nyaroodean,
ak ghwanung' eanala gitteenna gigheambiittaannyi dabitta baydeayda, ghayi nibay gwasisin ammwadi aba giigheambiittaannyi,
meakghusa fuga Yahuudi ak ghwahit, gaguursa eara fuga Emoojiga.
Aba huumwa gwayi aba jeeda Hoseeya,
“Fukka mawosa fugeasuun
gaydaguura ‘fugeasu,’
nea ninyeeda ghayi meabwariinya
gaydaguura dea abwariinyi.”
“Nea heeda ghayi siyeeshshiina saawa, ‘Moawosi fugeasu’,
gajeeguura ‘balloojiga Aseetta majeek.’”
Eara Isaaya ghwanya ghuutta appadayda Israeeli nea gwayi:
“Nea moonneeda Israeeli earappeadi saang'a ea gwadeenna iseaskweanda basooda, eang'ay gea jea eelealu;”
Aba gideaba Ng'uttamiida gay gwasin ng'asheandaannyi appadayda ng'eanyiida ak gorgweaksa nea gooduumduum ak ghoadayda.
Hean gawuurji gidaramoaranda Isaaya,
“Inyeeda Ng'uttamiida bea lugooda ea mwanung'uneasa diibiga,
ghwanyawa gajeasuwuurjeewi Sodooma ak gowuurjeewi Gomoora.”
Asi gajeayeanaan? Gajeeyeena fuga Emoojiga mwaada geeshta doobiiwnatta ninyas doobiiwnatta, nea ghwanyas doobiiwnatta aba masaweega;
nea fuga Israeeli ang'ng'waay doobiiwnatta ea simmajeek aba deaweeda ea miighoahiit deaweedeedida.
Nea gweaguuni? Gweagu gideaba mwaada geeshta aba masaweega, ghaghus naweetta bea gissin saawaan. Nea gagul lagheaneetta beanya fihiin,
gawuurji gidasung'waarda, “Ng'ulla, ghaayiinyi Sayuuni lagheaneeda beanya fih, lagheaneeda jea ghwanung' goobeedeayi; nea siida mwas niny ea mwajeappwaspwas.”
Fuga eaduupcheewi, gideagasayi muuchchi aba guroroodeanyu iyamwaashchi Aseetta appadahuukka fuga Israeeli ea gideaba abeeda geelealu.
Geamuuwwu appadahuukka nyaawa gideaba gwandeawa badiida aba gassooda Aseetta, amaduw ea meabwadana fughareeda.
Nea isidasheahiidi appadayda doobiiwnatta leabu heeda Aseetta, ak gagasa ghoang'eat danyaawa. abeeda ea modeagana geat doobiiwnatta Aseetta.
Aba gideaba Gristo muudeanooda deaweeda, ak abeeda siida wassean mideawa masaweega abeeda ghwanyas doobiiwnatta.
Muusa ghang'waar gideaba siida sina ng'asheega doabiiw aba deaweeda, gaygoobiideewa nih.
Nea doobiiwnattida sinyassa masaweegean gwayi, adiiduw giyeeni aba jeeda guroroodaang'u, “Gajea ng'eaha gil jea gwadiyeada gawa humng'eeda?” (nii abeeda eannooda Gristo bea ng'eanyi gil)
ghana gideaba “Gay gawa ng'eaha uutta ng'eanyiida?” (Nii gideaba geescheeng'na Gristo uutta ng'eanyiida heeda fuga nimeewa).
Neada gwayiin? Gwayi ng'asheanda eaneekeeweey, ak gabissa gwanda ghuuttaang'u ak gabissa gwanda guroroodaang'u, (nea ng'asheanda ghayi bea masaweega ghayi sirukkwiidi);
aba gideaba, iirgu aba ghuuttaang'u gideaba Yeesu Ng'uttamiida gil, ak gumwasi aba guroroodaang'u gideaba ghayi gooduunna Aseetta jeeda miyeeda, gay lalaana.
Aba gideaba siida iissa ghamwas aba gurorooda ea ghwanyas doobiiwnatta, ak siida gwargu aba ghuutta ea ghwanyas lealeanooda.
Aba gideaba gwayi ng'ooruutka, “Manda siida wassean mwas niny ak ghabwaspwas.”
Aba gideaba manda gidaheeleetta siida Yahuudi ea dea Yunaani; aba gideaba niny Ng'uttamiida buuneessean gil, bissa gwandeawa baruureega appuneessean guuriisa niny.
Aba gideaba, “Siida wassean jea gaguurna gheawunga Ng'uttamiida gay ghwalaalaan.”
Asi gajamusischeesindaan siida mandeawana masaweega? Ak gay ghwamwastaan nea mii ghwayiiy iittaannyi? Ak gay gwayiing'shattaan ii manda siida rukkwiida giijasta?
Ak gay gwarukkwiidaaydaan siida ii miyeechcheakta? Gawuurji gissung'waarda bea gideaba, “Amiyaastaan geeshanga fuga rukkwiida Giijasta miy!”
Iiduw ea moang'ng'waanya buuneessean giijastida miyiin; aba gideaba gwayi Isaaya, “Ng'uttamiida ng'eaha siida mwas iitta siittawji?”
Asi masaweega ging'eettaannyi iing'da gil, nea iing'da gweadu ng'asheanda surukkwiida bea Gristo.
Ak ghanyaashti gichcha, neada saawa ea mii ghwayiiyi? Huumwa gil niyiiy;
“Ghuusiga nyaawa nighayda aba ng'eanyiissean,
nea ng'asheega nyaawa ea nihitta muudeanooda ng'eanyiida.”
Ak ghoanyaashti, neada fuga Israeeli mwanala? Ammwadi gwayi Muusa,
“Gay danung' ashissiina ghaang' fuga mawosa eamwa;
nea eemeeda dasheahi gaydanung' anyareessa.”
Eara Isaaya ghabwadakta ak gwayi,
“Ninyasan fuga ghayi magassean;
neahiimsi geaw fukka moanyaashta iitteanyu.”
Nea aba heeda fuga Israeeli gwayi, “Askwearda sean ghaamiindi geattingeasu aba heeda fuga manda mureeda ea fuga was muranga.”
Asi gay danyaashta, Heappi! Aseetta niheawa buuneedaannyi? Manda! Aba gideaba earaniini geawoschi siida Israeeli, was siyagi aba jeeda jeatta Abrahaamu, was siida dooshta Benjamini.
Aseetta mii ghaheawa fugaaschi ghayi bay ghwanal. Ghana moanali ng'asheega ghayi rugu ng'ooruutka appadayda Eliya, gidaghayi ahaaktaayda fuga Israeeli ammadeeda Aseetta?
“Ng'uttamiida subwar sibangaagu, ak ea sinyarja heeda wagiida edaang'u, ak ea sikghusan aniini nea gabwageaw, ak gagasa eaweegeasu.”
Iiduw ghwasha Aseetta nea gwayeeshshaan? “Neabuussi geaw fii sagalamnyooji ispwa matkunnya aba madeeda Baali.”
Asi gwasnu eara damani bea ghamneaweani gwanda gheaptanga ghayi siloat aba dagheerjeandumeeda.
Abeeda ii dagheerjeandumeeda, abeeda ea maba gadiyeeda sisin; abeeda dagheerjeandumeeda ea mudu ea dagheerjeanduuma gil.
Abeeda ghoawattaan? Fuga Israeeli ghwaraay ghwanyas gidagasa. Nea fukka ghayi loadiin ghwanyas, nea suurja geemajeek,
gawuurji gidaghayi sung'waarda bea gideaba,
“Aseetta ghoadaw gurooruunatka hang'oonyi,
ak eara gheanyanga nyaawa ea moang'wearda nea mayiing'shi iidiga nyaawa,
ea ghoaw askweareani bea ghamneawean.”
Ak gabiissa gwayi Dawdi,
“Measajeega nyaawa gagasa ghoaw ghealooda gheatta ea ghaseeda,
ak ea gadageeda jea ghwaak gil mureandooda aba heanyaawa;
gheanyanga nyaawa sinung' gamisaniidi ea moang'wearda,
ak ginung' gaguumiisachchi mananuunatka nyaawa damanda mammuudeana.”
Asi ghanyaashti, Heapi nidiiy ea goobeedeayi? Manda! Aba gidinyeanda nyaawa iiduw ghwanyas fuga Emoojiga lealeanooda ea ghwashit ghaang fuga Israeeli.
Asi gidinyeanda nyaawa iiniiw baruureega jeeda ng'eanyiida, nea reanyaweega nyaawa ghoaw baruureega aba jeeda Emoojiga suurja, abeeda hidooda badiischeesiinda nyaawa majaahawi!
Asi ghamneawa geebaloolleegwa agoogeeda was Emoojiga. Aba gideaba geewooschi giijasoochcheanda Emoojiga,
gaydaghwar gadiyeedeanyu ak abeeda ghanung' gwashissean ghaang' fugeasu was Yahuudi, ak abeeda gealealu mwaatkwa.
Asi heeheeweega nyaawa ghayi iyeadu gidupcheeda badayda ng'eanyiida, abeeda masitta nyaawa naaha gil ii mii eaweega gil iing'atta miyeeda?
Asi murmurjeanda isiittayda ghoaw haleanjeeda sisabwa geadi was haghweega madeeda iighaydit, gwasnu eara murmurjeanda sean; ak eara hawunnyeanda iighaydit, gwasnu eara damealga.
Nea damealga mwaatkwa iisihirjeaweada, ama ang'iing'eeda was maseytunajeanda dareabeetta, sing'eapsa bugusta nyaawa, ak goobareannyi baruureega geetta sabiibu asi damealga adoaghwarji geat.
Asi iighwari geaw, giipkaadi gideaba mii ang'iing'i gil dea ang'ng'waay hawunnyeanda, hawunnyeanda gil dea ang'ng'waanyi ang'iing'i.
Asi gajeena, “Damealgiga ghayi gealach aba gideaba geegasa eang'eapsean aniini jeedida.”
Asi huumwa. Gealach aba nyootta masaweega nyaawa, nea gimiinaadi aba masaweaga. Adighwari geaw, ghang'wana gibeali.
Aba gideaba ghayi iimwanung'waada Aseetta damealga ghayi bea mwadiin, gwasnu earang'iing'i ghanyea may ghwanung'waadaneey.

Asi nala ng'eeninda ea ng'weaninda Aseetta: ng'weaninda aba heeda fuga abeada, amaduukku ng'eeninda Aseetta aba headaang'u, gagasa gideaba gawosa ng'eeni; masa gidada earang'iing'i gajeelakseey ng'eanyi.
Gwasnu eara fiisu, iyabiida jeeda heeheeweega masaweega, gajeebiikta eang'aapta gichcha, aba gideaba Aseetta gwandeawa uurda jea ghang'aaptaawa gichcha.

Aba gideaba ghayi iisilaknaneey geetta mseeytunajeanda dareabeetta, amahit geang'aaptaneey, aba heeda mawosa heeda ghayi bea mwadi, mida heeda sihisa geetta msabiibu, abeeda ea mayghwaraanya muuchchi damealgiga bea geallaaniin eng'eapsa heeda msabiibajeanda ghayi leabu.
Asi awosa milmili aba ghwarjeedeang'wa, geagasayi anala gili funyaadiin, fuga eaduupcheewi: nihidu hang'ooynatta badahuukka fuga Israeeli, ea ghwahitta monneeda Emoojiga hidu.
Abeeda fuga Israeeli gay ghwalaalaan, gawuurji gidaghayi sung'waarda,
“Gay ghwahidu Lealnoochcheanda jea gwaleabu Sayuuni,
ak gaygooheelli munyinda sea Yakkobo;”
“amaduw nii ea neajeedeanyu gil sea saawa
iyeageandi ring'eega nyaawa.”
Iiduw appadayda Giijasta Miy aniiw weajoodiga Aseetta apadahuukkeagwa; nea aba ng'asheekka bea loodittean eaniiw fuga subwariiy appadahuukka ghweanigaasa.
Haleanjeeda sugu ea guurnooda moammu ghwayamwa.
Gawuurji gidaghayi moosissiindani Aseetta mureeda iiduw ghamneawa anoanyaschi baydeayda aba nyootta nyaawa bea mureeda;
asi ghamneawa niiw fuga manda mureeda ak abeeda aba baydeayda sihhiimneegwa abeeda eara saawa ghwanyas baydeayda.
Aba gideaba Aseetta niidayda buuneessean ghoaw fuga manda mureeda, ak abeeda ghabwayda sean.
Asi gitteenna meanang'oochcheandumeeda ea weaghuumeeda ea fughareeda Aseetta! Nea meammu eesikteawa girgweageadaannyi, nea naweadingaaschi ghanyea meegaseadayyi!
“Aba gideaba gajea ng'eaha siida jea ghwanal gidagasa Ng'uttamiida,
ghana gajea ng'eaha siida was deebaneadaannyi?”
“Ghana gajea ng'eaha gil siida jea aniidaw gida ammwadi,
ak gajeebiikta eattawi?”
Aba gideaba headaannyi ea naweedeaba niny ea niny gwaleabu haleanjeessean. Giigheambiitta gammiisa niny ea ghoaw damanda manda muudeanooda. Amin.
Asi, geamuscheegwa fuga eaduupcheewi aba baydeayda Aseetta, oattayda sasanuukkeagwa ghoaw haleanjeeda majeekcheewi sigadoowanniida, ghaydit bwariiy Aseetta, nea baditteang'wa bea huumwa gil.

Adiiduw gommaseawji giduurji ng'eanyiida, geaghus ghanyi eayameagwa ak geanung' ahuuwa fuga eashish aba fughareengeagwa, ak abeeda ghoanalli muuchchi gidabwariiy Aseetta was ng'asheega miyaas, sumwas biissa ea majeekcheewi.

Aba gideaba dagheerjeandumeeda sugoonan gearukusi giliwassih aba jeedeang'wa ea mang'ulla geaw ea ghwanaawa damanda hit, gidabal gwandeawa gassooda nea gorgweaksa geaw, aba haleanjeeda nea goodeen, gawuurji gidadawda Aseetta giliwassih aba masaweega nea goodeen.
Aba gideaba gawuurji saseeda iissa gwandeawa damealga saang'a nea damealsu ghanyea masna gadiyeanagi,
gwasnu eara aseaseeni saang'aan, geewooschi saseanagi aba jeeda Gristo, ak gaba roobadeeni roochchi sea nuut.
Asi ii nukwa geegoaneasa haleanjeeda heelleat aba dagheerjeandumeeda sigooneasa, asi eegadiyeatta: ea sibaneandumeeda gil, aba gitteenna masaweegaasa;
ii gadiyeeda gil, aba jeeda gadiyeedeanya; ama ii siida anealshi, aba jeeda ginealshoodaannyi;

ea siida reekkwiisa buuneeda gil, aba jeeda reekusiindaannyi; ea siida adayyiida haleanjeeda, aba jeedeesh; ea siida weeda buuneeda mideawa doobiiwnatta; siida sina gadiyeeda baydeayda, biissa gahoosani.
Bariinyeega gagasa gaba huumwa; sit ng'asheanda muy, nea ghoang'ng'waannyi ng'asheega miyaas;
abariinnya geat agooga, aba bariinyeega huumwa bea oorjooga giyeang'wa nea aba mureeda gooshsheedi buuneeda suurja.
Nea adoabealbealli aba badiida, ak goondeawi badiida aba jeeda gurorooda, nea googadiyeesi Ng'utamiida.
Ahoosana aba gitta oararjiin, amilikghta sawanadeeda, amwaasha Aseetta galeagasean.
Oattayda haleanjeeda gasa fuga ghaydidi, awosa fuga innyeani jeesin.
Abadiischeesiina fuga sawaneegwa; abadiischeesiina nea ghanyea adoamwaashti.
Ahoosana sea fuga hoosan, oyyeawda sea fuga ayyeawda.
Gagasa andeawana iitteaba geat agooga; adoaghwarji geat muuchchi aba gassooda ng'asheega hees, agassa ng'asheega manang'i. Adoahuuyi fuga jea ghaghuuda geat fughareeda.
Iisimaneey siida ng'asheanda muy ea aduwaldaawi ng'asheanda muy, asna ng'asheega miyaas aba madeeda buuneeda.
Iiduw aba meatkweedeang'wa abeaha weayda aba heeda buuneessean.

Fuga abwariinyi, adoowalliidi mureandooda aba heedeang'wa, ghang'wana ghoanung'waadi ghawalda nyarasta Aseetta; aba gideaba geang'waar, “Waldeayda mureandooda deanyu, gay dawalda aniini gwargu Ng'uttamiida.”
Manda, “Iibearji weajoochcheandaang'u jalooda, giidaw gichchea ghwaak, amabearji muwooshta, giidawi beega; aba gideaba iisni ng'asheanji abeeda giyiini uhuudaannyi rarayga beasta.”
Adaghwajoarnyi munyinda, gagasa joara munyinda aba miyinda.
Daba siisi sissa mureeda fuga ambaliischi. Aba gideaba manda sugoochcheandumeeda maleapna heeda Aseetta, ak eara giikka midean earaga ghwayiin Aseetta.
Asi gwasnu earaba siida shaang' fuga ambaliischi siisi gang'uchchi sea ng'asheanda guuh Aseetta, nea fuga shaang' gay ghwanyas ghoorjooda.

Aba gideaba sugoodiga iissa ea mwanung' ghabeal fuga miyaas, iissa ghwanung' ghabeal fuga sina ng'asheega munyas. Asi gigasayi amiiwali fuga ahaaghwa ng'eanyiida? Sina ng'asheega miyaas, ak abeeda gay ghaghwarnyi,

aba gideaba niny soomjeanda Aseetta gil appadaydaang'u. Ama iisni ng'asheega munyas, gishageadi, aba gideaba niny meatta bwaanga mwadaagha; aba gideaba niny soomjeanda Aseetta jea ghwalas aba nyarasta siida sina ng'asheega munyas.
Asi ghang'wana gwasin siida mureeda, ak ea adisni aba mulsiinda nyarasta Aseetta akghwahit, sina aba gitta apkaatta uhuudaang'uun.
Aba sareani goottayyiidi gwaadi, aba gideaba fuga ambaliischi fuga gadiyeeda bea Aseetta, nea ghoashng'u aba jeedeaba gadiyeeni.

Oattawa buuneessean haleanjeeda doobiiwsa, siida gwaadi adawa gwaadi, nea siida gujaweeda adawa gujaweeda, siida haguuw gideaba gajeawal gheangda deattaw gheawalmeeda, nea siida haguuw mureeda deattawa mureeda.
Adiiduw gindeawi sileeda siida wassean, anung'waada eaghus bariinyeegeaba geat, aba gideaba siida bwariiy giischewoochcheandaannyi niing'ng'waay deaweeda.

Digheannyeekka ayi, “Adimealuuli, Adinuusi siida, Adijagwadiischi, Adishissi ghaang' gissiida,” ghana gwanda diigheannuut wassean, geekkuuyeasa jeedeaba ng'asheanji, bea gideaba, “Bwariiyda gischewoochcheandaang'u gidubwariiydi geaw.”
Bariinyeega moammu gwassisa gischeewoochcheanda ng'asheanda muy, asi bariinyeega giimajeekta deaweeda gil.
Asi iisinalli gideaba nihitta damanda jea eang'eatng'eadana jeeda ruweanga. Aba gideaba ghamneawa lealeanoodeanya eaneekkeewaneasa muuchchi ea eamawuurji damanda ghayi sumwaseewi;
eaweeda nigeawiit muuchchi, askwearda ea nineekiit. Asi eehista gadiyoojiga misaneeda ak geashshaash dabitta weeshinda;
asi eara aseasa gagasa eabeada fuga mida heedeesh, mii geawunda gheang'da gil ea booktumeeda, mii ng'asheega munyas gil ea hiseadayeandumeeda, mii jaliida gil ea lajoodeaba ghuut.
Ookweala Ng'uttamiida was Yeesu Gristo, nea adoong'ulayi ng'asheega saseeda ghana asna gidagasa.
Siida ng'arng'ar aba masaweega, adeapta, nea adoojaluudayeewi aba fughareadaannyi.
Siida mideawa masaweega ghwaak haleanjeessean nea siida ng'arng'ar ghwaak nyeanyiida.
Siida iiyak gida ea adagafool siitta mwaaga, nea eara siitta mwaagaan ea adagoorgweaksa siitta agiin; aba gideaba niny numwas Aseetta.

Ak guwosi ng'eaha ea argweaksiina soomjeamba siinuut? Aba gideaba aba heeda siidaannyi haw adaw gadiyeeda iissa ghamiinaada ghana ghoabeada. Asi, gajeanung' ghamiinaada, aba gideaba ghoammu Siida haw ghwanung' ghamiinaada.
Siinuut iissa ghwanung' aamiy askwearjeanjagi, ea ghang'al suurja, nea siinuut iing'ula askwearjoojiga sean ghwanung' gawuurji. Asi daba siisi ammajeek fughareadaannyi.

Siida ng'ulla askwearjeanda, iissa gang'ulla aba sinooda mureeda aba heeda Ng'uttamiida. Gwasnu eara siida iyak gida, ghwaak aba sinooda mureeda aba heeda Ng'uttamiida, nea gabadiischeesa Aseetta; nea siida nung'waada, ghwanung'waadawa mureeda aba heeda Ng'uttamiida ak gabadiischeesa Aseetta.
Aba gideaba aba jeedeang'wa manda siida ammu goobiideewa geaw, ak ea manda siida ammu ghami nea gaba geaw.
Aba gideaba iisiippiidi ng'eanyiida, geeppiidi appadayda Ng'uttamiida, amasimeewayi, geemeewayi appadayda Ng'uttamiida; asi, iisiippiidi ng'eanyiida ghana eemeewa, geewoschi fuga Ng'uttamiida.
Aba gideaba Gristo ghayi ghami ammuchchu gabiikta gamajeegiit, ak goombal fuga nimeewa ea gea majeekcheewi.
Ama ang'iing'i, ghwasaan anda giirgweaksi oorjeeda giyeang'wa? Ghana ang'iing'i, anda gufooli oorjeeda giyeang'wa? Aba gideaba gajeamiinaada easasean aba madeeda hoorgeeda girgweageeda Aseetta;
aba gideaba geang'waar,
“Gawuurji gideandeatti, aba girrugu Ng'uttamiida, giliwas gudung'da gajeekula ng'eanyi ammadeedeanyu,
nea giliwas ng'ushapta gaygwaduumsheesa Aseetta.
Asi gwasnu giliwassih aba jeedeanya gaygagu iittaannyi aba madeeda Aseetta.”
Asi adagudu ergweakkiisiina geat, ak ghang'wana siida ea masna gichchea ghabwaay ghana gwaruusa oorjeeda geannyaawa.

Ghaanalli ak ghaabwadi gideaba neasikteawi muuchchi aba heeda Ng'uttamiida was Yeesu gideaba manda gidamideawa ririnyeanda aba simnoadaannyi; amaduw aba heeda siitta daa gida ak ghwanung' ghoaw gilibea ririnyaaniin, aba heedeaba siisi gili gaba ririnyaan.

Iiduw oorjeeda giyeang'wa iisawana ea gagiisan appadayda hamitta iyaagi, abeeda eamudumidana jeeda bariinyeega. Adiiduw gubwari siida darari aba hamittaang'u iyaagi nea siisi ghayi ghami Gristo appadaydaannyi.
Asi alooheedeang'wa adiiduw geerukuna munyinda.
Aba gideaba gheambalmeeda Aseetta mii agiischooda gil ea leeshooda, ada doobiiwnatta gil ea weayda ea hooseaneega aba jeeda Gurorooda Ghaydit;
aba gideaba siida gadiyeesa Gristo aba jeedeaba ng'asheesu siisi goohoosan Aseetta ak ghabwada gideaba siisi ghamwas buuneeda.
Asi iisunu geang'ng'waanyi ng'asheega weayda ea ng'asheega miyaas jea gwadeekneegwa.
Aba iitta hamitta, adiiduw gidattasi gadiyeeda Aseetta. Haleanjeessean aba huumwa amiyaas, ak ea muy aba heeda siida wassean jea ghwanung' ghoabeada suurja aba hamittak;
ghang'wana aamwaaga siida bannyeega ghana ghwali difaayeeda ghana gwasin ng'asheanda wassean jea ghabwaay oorjeeda giyeang'wa.
Masaweekka indeawiin, gagasa mideawana aba jeadaang'u aba madeeda Aseetta; ghang'wana siitta meargweaksiina geaw aba ng'asheandida mwasiin.
Iiduw siida mideawa machmajeega sirgweaksa, iyak, ea mwaaga aba masaweega, nea gidawassean sisin iimeesnina masaweega ea ring'eeda.
Asi gamiiseasa aseaseeda mideawa uurjeenga eaweeda fuga ng'arng'ari, ak ea adeabwariinyi geat aseasa nea geabwaageat;
aba jeedeanya daba siisi ahoosan gischeewoochcheandaannyi aba ng'asheega miyaas ak geemmajeek masaweagaaschi.
Aba gideaba Gristo mwabwariinya geaw; gawuurji gissung'waarda bea gideaba, “Ng'asheega munyas rukuneey fuga ruguun ninyasan aniini.”
Aba gideaba ng'asheega sean ghayi sung'waar aba askwearjoojigeaba mwadiin geang'waar ak abeeda ghoadoabiiweasa, ak aba alooheeda ea gidamajeektaneasa ng'ooruutka abeeda geanyaschi gissirarji.
Nea Aseetta mideawa alooheeda ea giimajeekta gagasa gagooneegwa duupcheeda agooga nea goobwaageat, nea googali geat Gristo Yeesu,
abeeda aba ghuudagi abeeda ghoakghambiichchi Aseetta ea Bwaabwa Ng'uttamiideanya was Yeesu Gristo.
Asi daba siisi deapta nuut, gawuurji gida ghayi deaptaaydaneegwa Gristo, aba gigheambiitta Aseetta.
Aba gideaba geayeeshshiineegwa, Gristo ghoaw soomjeanda aba heeda fuga ghasmeahooda appadayda ng'asheega huumwa bea Aseetta, ak abeeda ghoadaajiit heelleeda ghayi siittaw ghweanigeagwa,
ak abeeda ghoaghamiit fuga Emoojiga Aseetta aba baydeaydaannyi. Gawuurji gissung'waarda,
“Asi gaydaduummiseey aba jeeda Emoojiga,
ak gay dasarmani gheawungaagu;”
ak gebiikta eeyi,
“Ahoosana Emoojiga, sea fugaaschi;”
nea gichcha gwayi,
“Oduumshesiina Ng'uttamiida, Emoojiga sean,
ak goorukusi buuneessean gwaduumsheesa niny;”
nea gichcha gwayi Isaaya,
“Gayghwahidu hawunnyeanda Yeesi,
ak gay ghwahidu goombal Emoojiga,
ak ea siida jea ghaghus Emoojiga gil.”
Asi Aseetta rarooda gagasa ghoannyiideagwa hooseaneega sean ea weayda aba masaweega, ak abeeda aba uurda Gurorooda Ghaydit goppiidi jeeda rarooda.
Asi neasikteawi aniini iitteang'wa, fuga eaduupcheewi, gideaba earagooga goondeawi alooheeda haw, ak ghwanyiideagwa fughareenga sean, ak ghoammuuschi oattoabiiwa geat.
Ak ghamneawa ghaang'waarji nea ghaamwanyiichchi muuchchi nea geapkeaneegwa aba miyeenooda goonan Aseetta,

ak abeeda ghahuuyi siida gadiyeeda bea Gristo Yeesu aba jeeda Emoojiga, ak abeeda geasissi gadiyeeda Giijasta miy bea Aseetta gadiyeeda was ashohoochcheandumeeda ak abeeda ghoaw Emoojiga haleanjeeda sisappa geadi bea ghadooweeda miyaas, iing'atta nea nimmiidu Gurorooda Ghaydit.
Aba jeeda Gristo Yeesu geandeawi gichchea daghwara geaw aba gadiyeedeanyu aba madeeda Aseetta.
Iiduw ea maydaammu dargu ng'asheanda masna Gristo aba gadiyeedeanyu, danyas buuneeda aba heeda Emoojiga, aba ng'asheanda ak gissin,

aba uurda gwadeagooda ea ng'asheega deamdeameadi, aba uurda Gurorooda Ghaydit, nea gwaneayeewa ng'eanyiissean ghang'eada Yerusaleemu ea geeng'oojiga ea ghwahitta Ihiriko ak gearukkwiidi Giijasta miy bea Gristo,
aba jeedeaba gassoodeanyu bea Giijasta miyiin, ea mii aba heeda ghayi surukusa gheawunga Gristo, ak abeeda ea meadeeksheewani uhuuda sindeetta ghayi deas siinuut,
gawuurji gidaghayi sung'waarda bea gideaba,
“Fukka miyeerukusa giijasta miyiin gay ghwadaa niny,
ak gayghwanal fukka ghayi mii ghwayiiyiin.”
Aba sareani geetteellean galeagasean amwaawuni ng'eang'deang'wa.
Duukku ghamneawa iinukwa muttandeawa gheatta gadiyeeda aba ng'eang'i, ak ghaabwadi gideaba nigeawiit dagaseadayyi wunoooda ng'eang'deang'wa gweannyeekka saang'a,
ghaararji dadaheagwa nea ghaang'atti dawa ng'eanyiida Spaniya, abeeda ghaalamwaji bareannyeekkeasu doan dadaheagwa agooga, ak ghaanyaschi weetteang'wa, gilimwanang'.
Amaduw ghamneawa geawi Yerusaleemu dagadiyeesa fuga Ghaydidi.
Aba gideaba gahaguuw fuga Makkedoniya ea gea Akkaaya ghoawaam gujaweeda aba weetta fuga ghaydidi mida hoowa bea Yerusaleemu biissa ea barbariin;

ghabwariiy saawa gideaba gaygwasindunu, ak ea huumwa gil, gwandeawa sileeda appadahuukeaba fiisu; aba gideaba fuga Emoojiga isuguuyi ghawooda abeeda gammiisa gideaba gayghaweat aba haleanjeeda sinyas aba ghawooda.
Iiduw nea naahiichchi gadiyeetta ak ghaadawji saawa gissiwwaam gaydabeawa heedeang'wa ak geawi ng'eanyiida Spaniya;
ak ghaanalli gideaba iyaahidu ng'eang'deang'wa gaydoan nea geawoschi hidaat aba ghawooda Gristo.
Fuga eaduupcheewi, geamuscheegwa aba naweeda Ng'uttamiideanya was Yeesu Gristo ea aba bariinyeega Gurorooda eang'ng'waanya geat ea aniini aba mooshta Aseetta aba madeeda Aseetta appadaydeanyu,
ak geelealnean aba heedeaba fukka mandeawana masaweega mida ng'eanyiida Yuudeeya, ea gadiyeedeanyu eandeawi aba Yerusaleemuun ghamwas fuga ghaydidi mida hoowa,
ak abeeda ghaahidu ng'eadeang'wa nea geahoosannyi aba gidabwariiyda Aseetta ak abeeda geafuufchi sea saawa.
Aseetta mideawa weayda gagasa goobiida headeang'wa oagasean. Amin.
Geagasayi danung'uneagwa hudiyya suguura Foibe, was siida gadiyeesa ganiiseeda mida ng'eanyiida Gengreya,

ak geagasayi gideaba gajadeapta aba gheawunga Ng'uttamiida, gawuurji gidahaguuwda fuga ghaydidi, ak ghoaweachchi aba ng'asheega wassean deeppa gagasa aba heedeang'wa, aba gideaba niny nuweat fuga saang'a ak ghaweadan earaniini.
Aghada Briska ea Akkiila, was fuga sin gadiyeeda sea aniini aba jeeda Gristo Yeesu,
saawa ghayi eahideadi eara ealajaada gheetkweakka nyaawa aba eaweegeasu, ak ea mii aniini gil akghwahit, eara ganiisajeega sean bea Emoojiga ghoaghadeagwa;
oakghada eara ganiiseeda mida jeedeaba gheannyi. Oakghada Epainettoyda abwariinyi, was siida madeeda mwas Gristo aba ng'eanyiida Asiya.
Oakghada Mariyaayda ghayi deawiit muuchchi aba jeedeang'wa.
Oakghada Androniiko sea Yuuniya, was fugeaduupcheewi ghayi siraduudayeewean; biissa analaat aba jeeda giijasoodiga, nea saawa goosheedeawean nalooda Gristo.
Oakghada Ampliyanooyda abwariinyi aba jeeda Ng'uttamiida.
Oakghada Urbano, was siida easnuudayeewi aba jeeda Gristo ea Stakkisiiyda abwariinyi.
Oakghada Appeeleeyda was siida doabiiwaat aba jeeda Gristo. Ak gookeacheewi fuga gheeh Aristobulo.
Oakghada Heeroodiooni was siideaduupcheewi, oakghada fuga gheeh Narkiso, mideayi sea Ng'uttamiida.
Oakghada fukkadiyeeda mida jeeda Ng'uttamiida, was Drifaina ea Drifosa. Oakghada Bersisiyda abwariinyi biissa gagadiyi muuchchi aba heeda Ng'uttamiida.
Oakghada Rufo, was siida gadiyeeda haw bea Ng'uttamiida, ea ghaamwat biissa ea iyya gil.
Oakghada Asinkrito, Flegoni, Herme, Batroba, Herma, sea oorjooga giyeanya mideawa.
Oakghada Filologo ea Yuliya, Nereya, sea huda ghaamwat, ea Olimpa, sea fuga sean ghaydidi mideawa.
Oakghada geat aba samitta ghaydit. Ghoaghadeagwa ganiisajeega sean bea Gristo.
Ofuga eaduupcheewi, geamuscheegwa gideaba ang'ulla fuga eattu jaleadinga ea ng'asheega jea gwaruusa buuneeda, mawoosa giinealshooda ghayi sinnaleagwa; asi ohheelleewana geat.

Aba gideaba fuga sina ng'asheesu magadiyeesiina Ng'uttamiideanya was Gristo, saawa gagadiyeesa jeesinga nyaawa, nea gaba geat aba ng'asheega nyaawa bea ng'uyyeega iissa gwareengani guroruunatka fuga manang'i fughareeni.

Aba gideaba mureedeang'wa ninal buuneessean, ak geahoosannyi appadahuukkeagwa, ak geagasayi gideaba gajahuuwa fuga mideawa weaghuumeeda aba jeeda ng'asheega miyaas, nea ghoahuuyi fuga doobiiweadi aba nga'sheega munyas;
nea Aseetta mideawa weayda gaygabay ghwanung' adattasa Shattaani aba geeshangeagwa. Dagheerjeandumeeda Ng'uttamiideanya was Yeesu Gristo gagasa goobiida jeedeang'wa.
Dimotteoyda was siida gadiyeeda sea aniini ghoaghadeagwa; sea Lukkiyo, ea Yasooni ea Soosipatroyda eaduupcheewi.
Aniineeda was Dertiyo siida ng'waar baroajeanji gil, ghoaghadeagwa aba jeeda Ng'uttamiida.
Gayooyda was siida eabareassi ea ganiiseessean ghoaghadeagwa. Erastooyda was siida adiing'ng'iida lappiya sea Gwarto, ghoaghadeagwa.
Dagheerjeandumeeda Ng'uttamiideanya was Yeesu Gristo gagasa goobiida jeedeang'wa oagasean. Amin.

Asi ghamneawa siitta ammu goomajeegeegwean, aba gitteascheetta sea giijasteanyu miy ea gissurukkwiideayda Yeesu Gristo, ak gwadeaschi sea gidaheachta makcheameetta ghayi funyaat ng'eada deaghayi bea garayiin,
ak geattahaach ghamneawa aba ramooranga sung'waar amaduw ghwanal emoojiga, aba gidaghayi rukutteayda Aseetta manda muudeanooda, ak abeeda gwasin mureeda aba masaweega,
heeda Aseetta mideawa weaghuumeeda gagasa nyasa giigheambiitta damanda manda mudeanooda aba naweeda Yeesu Gristo! Amin.
Baulo, ghayi suguursa aba gidagassiida Aseetta ghoaw giijasoochcheanda Gristo Yeesu, ea oorjeediyya was Sosteene,

Heeda ganiiseeda Aseetta mida Goriinto was fuga ghayi simmiidu aba jeeda Gristo Yeesu, ghayi suguursa ghoaw fuga ghaydidi, sea fuga sean guriisa gheawunga Ng'uttamiideanya was Yeesu Gristo aba heeda wassean. Niny Ng'uttamiida nyaawa gil, ea deanya.
Gagasa andeawana dagheerjeandumeeda ea hooyyoo leabu heeda Aseetta was Ghweandeanya ea heeda Ng'uttamiida was Yeesu Gristo.
Geabadiischeesi Aseetta galeagasean appadahuukkeagwa appadayda dagheerjeandumeeda Aseettaa ghayi sugooneegwa aba jeeda Gristo Yeesu,
ak aba naweadinga sean geepparureegwa aba jeedeaba niny aba weaghuumeeda ea fughareeda sean.
Ak abeeda gawuurji muuwwuunooda Gristo gidamajeekta aba jeedeang'wa,
ak abeeda ea mwashoadeewaneegwa haleanjeeda sugu bea guroorooda, nea ghoammuughu giidaheachta Ng'uttamiideanya was Yeesu Gristo;
niny gaygoomajeegeegwa ea ghwahitta mudeanooda, nea manda ramaseanda aba eaweeda Ng'uttamiideanya was Yeesu Gristo.
Aseetta ea doabiiwaat, was deaghayi gurneegwa ak abeeda gobareannyeewi Balleandaannyi was Yeesu Gristo was Ng'uttamiideanya.

Geamucheegwa fuga eaduupcheewi aba gheawunga Ng'uttamiida was Yeesu Gristo, gideaba abaloolda gilagi oagasean, nea adagwanda dageascheedeang'wa fuurjeeda, ak gidabal goguuyi aba fughareanagi ea girgweageanagi.
Aba gideaba nirukunean fuga Gloe gideaba gwanda jeedeang'wa jaliida, fuga eaduupcheewi.
Asi gideargu nii gil gideaba giliwassih aba heedeang'wa iissa gwayi, “Aniini geabeayi Baulo,” ghana, “Aniini geabeayi Appolo,” ghana, “Aniini geabeayi Geefa,” ghana, “Aniini geabeayi Gristo.”
Heappi neada Gristo gabearshi? Heappi Baulo ghayi geengoor appadahuukkeagwa? Ghana heappi geepaatiisaneegwa aba gheawunga Bauloohi?
Geabadiischeesi Aseetta aba gideaba mii deabaatiisan siida aba ng'eangdeang'wa. geaghus Grispo ea Gayo;
adiiduu gwayi sih ghayi geepaatiisan aba gheawungeasu.
(Hean geabattiisannyi eara fuga gheeh Stefaano. Iing'atta suu ea mwaapkaadi ea neabaatiisanyi sih nuut wassean.)
Aba gideaba Gristo ghayi meajeaknean deabaatiisan, goojeaknean darukkwiida giijasta miy nea meakna bareaynatta weaghuumeeda, ak abeeda ea moawa beehiida Gristo gidamwadaagha.
Aba gideaba ng'asheanda beehiida aba heeda fuga roodeadi leendeeda gil, nea aba heedeanya aseaseeda silealu ea uurda Aseetta.
Aba gideaba geang'waar,
“Gaydanyarja weaghuumeeda fuga weaghoodi,
nea fughareenga fuga mideawa fughareeda gaydaheawa.”
Gwandeenu siida was weaghoochcheanda? Gwandeenu ng'oorshoochcheanda? Gwandeenu siida argweaji bea damani? Neada Aseetta ea mii ghwanung' ghoaw lendeeda weaghuumeeda ng'eanyiida?
Nea, aba weaghuumeeda Aseetta, ghanyea mwanala ng'eanyiida Aseetta aba naweeda weaghuumeeda, gohoosan Aseetta aba naweeda lendeetta bea ng'asheega surukkwiidiin ak abeeda geelealu fukka numwasiin.
Aba gideaba fuga Yahuudi gagaseadayyi gwadeagwajeega, nea fuga Yunaani gagaseadayi weaghuumeeda,
amaduukku aseasa geerukkwiidi Gristoyda ghayi singoor, aba heeda fuga Yahuudi gwaruusa fii nea aba heeda fuga Emoojiga ea lendeeda gil,
nea aba heeda fuga suguura, sean Yahuudi ea Yunaani, Gristo ea uurda Aseetta ea weaghuumeeda Aseetta.
Aba gideaba dasheaynatta Aseetta gaburdeawa muuchchi fughareeda buuneeda, nea ng'arng'aranda Aseetta gwandeawa uurda muuchchi ea ghoadaraam buuneeda.

Asi asikteawana gurnoodeang'wa, fuga eaduupcheewi; aba jeedeang'wa mii weaghoodi fuga saang'a aba ing'ulleegwa buuneeda, mii saang'a gea mideawa uurjeenga, ak ea mii saang'a fuga sijiilsa gealga hees;

iiduu ghwaloat Aseetta ng'asheekka sifool bea jeeda ng'eanyiidean ak ghoabwaaspwaas fuga mideawa fughareenga, ghwaloat Aseetta haleanjeeda ng'arng'ari mida ng'eanyiida ak ghoobwaaspwaas gea mideawa uurjeenga,
Aseetta ghwaloat haleanjeeda ng'arng'ari sifool aba jeeda ng'eanyiida, ea haleanjeeda mandana, ak ghwanung' ghoaw haleanjeeda mwadaagha gea mida,
ak ea manda siida jea ghoammu ghaghwar geaw aba madeeda Aseetta.
Niny gumdooda eaweegeagwa gil aba jeeda Gristo Yeesu, ghayi nung' Aseetta ghoaw weaghuumeedeanya, ea doobiiwnatteanya ea gimmiinnooda, ea lealeanooda;
asi gawuurji gidaghayi sung'waarda, “Siida ammu ghaghwar geaw, daghwara geaw appadayda Ng'uttamiida.”
Hean iyaawunnyi heedeang'wa, fuga eaduupcheewi, mwaawuuni darukuneegwa muuwwuunooda Aseetta aba ghwarjeeda ghana aba weaghuumeeda.
Aba gideaba aniini meagassi danal ng'asheanda wassean aba jeedeang'wa geaghus Yeesu Gristo, dea ghayi singoor.
Nea aniini ghayi gendeayi nea geawoschi ng'arng'ar ea muuwda sea hirbabandeeda;
nea girgweageedeanyu ea giijasteanyu ghanyea maba ng'asheega gurguriischooda bea weaghuumeeda, gagadiiyi Guroorooda aba uurda,
ak abeeda masaweegeagwa ea mabeachchi weaghuumeeda buuneeda, gagasa gwaleabu uurda Aseetta.
Nea jeeda fuga nihittiisa heeda aba masaweega ginaali weaghuumeeda, earappeadi mii weaghuumeedeaba damani ghana dea fuga ambaliischi aba damani, was gea jea gammuudean gil.
Ak geergu makcheameetta ea weaghuumeetta funyaat bea Aseettean, ghayi nung' Aseetta ghoaw digheanda ammwadi aba gigheambiitteanyean.
Ea manda aba jeeda fuga ambaliischi aba damani dea nal ng'asheanji; aba gideaba inyeeda heetta ghwanal, abeeda ea maygongoor Ng'uttamiida ghambiidaat.
gawuurji gissung'waarda,
“Haleanjeeda manda gheang'da nidaa, ghana iitta niyiiy,
ghana ghoapkaat guroorooda siida,
haleanjeeda nigeawiit gwasissin Aseetta appadahuukka fuga bwariiy niny.”
Aseetta niihiimneasa aseasa aba naweeda Guroorooda. Aba gideaba Guroorooda iissa ghwanal haleanjeessean, eara haleanjeeda mida jeeda Aseetta.
Nii gajea ana sihi jea ghwanal fughareemba sih nuut iimeakghusa guroorootta mida jeessiidean? Gwasnu manda siida ammu ghwanal fughareeda Aseetta geaghus Guroorooda Aseetta.
Aseasa meanyasi guroorooda ng'eanyiida, geanyaschi guroorooda leabu heeda Aseetta, ak abeeda geenalli gidagoaneasa Aseetta aba innyeanda jeeda.
Ak geerukkwiidi gili aba ng'asheega maleapna weaghuumeeda anaal fii siida geaghus dea anaal fii Guroorooda, ak gwaroobu humeanda guroorooda aba heeda fuga mideawa Guroorooda.
Siida maba guroorooda mayghwanyas gida jea ghoadaw Guroorooda Aseetta, aba gideaba aba headaannyi lendeeda gil, ak ea mayghwanal aba gideaba geaghus eanal aba jeeda guroorooda.
Siida guroorooda iissa goorgweaksa haleanjeessean, nea niny ghanyea manda siida jea goorgweaksa.
“Aba gideaba, siida nal fughareeda Ng'uttamiida ng'eaha, ak abeeda ghoanaal?” Duukku aseasa gendeawi fughareeda Gristo.
Nea aniini fuga eaduupcheewi mwammuusi deabalooldaneegwa fuga mideawa guroorooda, geaghus awuurjeewana fuga saseeda, nea goowuurjeewi diibiga Gristo.
Aniini ghaabiyeagwa eanooga, meagooneegwa hamitta hang'waay; aba gideaba agooga miyoammuusa; asi eara ghamneawa miyoammuusa,
aba gideaba agooga gudabeaha saseeda. Nea iimida jeedeang'wa lachng'eanyiida ea ng'alealleeda, abeeda mowosi fuga saseeda, nea ghoabeadi fuga geallaani?
Aba gideaba iyayi siyagi, “Aniini geabeayi Baulo,” nea gwayi nuut, “Aniini geabeayi Apoolo,” abeeda agooga ea mowosi buuneeda?
Asi Apoolo ng'eaha? Ama Baulo ng'eaha? Soomjooga ghayi nung amwasa gil, gawuurji gidadawda Ng'uttamiida giliwas sih gwasin.
Aniini ghayi geahisti, ak ghwayiin Appolo beega, nea dea arruudu ea Aseetta.
Siida hista mii gili ghana siida iin beega geaghus Aseetta arudu.
Siida hista ea dea iin beega gooyang'deayyi, amaduu gay gaba siisi nyas gimeardaannyi gawuurji gidaghayi sinda gadiyeeda.
Aba gideaba aseasa geewooschi fuga sin gadiyeeda Aseetta; agooga goowooschi madamnyeanda Aseetta, nea goowooschi gheeda Aseetta.

Aba gitteenna dagheerjeandumeeda goonan Aseetta, ak geawuurjeewi siida geariir haweewa fuga deekshi geasinyi sindeetta, ak gwadeeksheewa siinuut uhuuda. Ak ea daba siisi ng'ula gitteeksheatta aba uhuudeaba sindeedi.
Aba gideaba manda siinuut jea gwasin sindeetta nuut, geaghus diitta ghayi nigeawiit eesiniin, nea Yeesu Gristohi.
Iiduu nea gwadeeksheewa siinuut uhuudeaba sindeedi, iideakta lagheanga meeng'meeng'i, ghana lappiya, ghana lagheanga haw sheayeat, ghana geediga, ghana seenga, ghana nyeega,
abeeda gajeattajiit gadiyeemba giliwas sih; aba gideaba gayghoahiimu Eaweettida, aba gideaba gajeattaajiida beasta, ak abeeda gwasin beasta gadiyeeda ghayi sisin giduurji.
Nea gadiyeeda sin siida wassean nea gwadeeksa uhuudeaba sindeettida gayghaghu abeeda gayghwanyas gimearda.
Nea siida dattasa gadiyeadaannyi, gay ghwaak lugooda, amaduuku niny gajeelealu, gay gawuurji gili mwanmwandaawa jeeda beasta.
Moanali gideaba agooga goowooschi gheeda sibatta Aseetta bea Aseetta, ea gideaba Guroorooda Aseetta gwanda jeedeang'wa?
Siida iinuus gheeda sibatta Aseetta, gay gwanuus Aseetta siisi. Aba gideaba gheeda Aseetta aaghaydit, nea agooga gil.
Siida adagwareengani geaw. Siida idaah geaw, gideaba gwandeawa weaghuumeeda aba jeedeang'wa aba gweannyeeksu adadashahiida ak abeeda ghwanyas weaghuumeeda.
Aba gideaba weaghuumeedeaba ng'eanyiini leendeeda gil aba heeda Aseetta. Aba gideaba geang'waar, “Siida ang'ng'oonyi siida weaghoot aba jeeda milmilanda nyaawa,”
nuut gichcha, “Ng'uttamiida ghwanal fughareenga fuga weaghoodi gideaba mwarachchi gil.”
Asi siida wassean adagagwarsa geaw buuneeda. Aba gideaba haleanjeessean geagwa gil,
ea Bauloohi, ghanea Apooloohi, ghanea Geefaahi, ghanea ng'eanyiida, ghanea eaweega, ghanea miyeeda, ghanea haleanjeeda ghamneawa mida, ghanea gea jea ghwahidu gil, suu geagwa sean;
nea agooga goowooschi fuga Gristo; nea Gristo gaba Aseetta.
Nii gidagasa ghwadaaktaneasa siida gil, gideaba geewooschi soomjooga Gristo ea fuga siitteaga gadiyeeda funyaat bea Aseetta.
Nea gissigasa aba heeda fuga siitteaga gadiyeeda doobiiwnatta gil.
Nea aba heedeanyu nii ea ng'asheanda mwanang' gil gideaba goorgweaksean agooga ghana girgweageeda wassean bea buuneeda. Ak aniini ea mii deargweaksa geaw.
Aba gideaba aniini mwaanali gidawassean appadaydeanyu, ak ghanyea meesiksean. Ng'uttamiida dea jea goorgweakseani.

Asi iissa ea adoorgweaksi ng'asheanda nea miighwahitta damanda nea miighwahidu Ng'uttamiida. Jea ghoabwaay haleanjeeda funyaat mida jeeda misaneeda, ak ghoadahaach ng'asheega mida jeeda guroorooda. Abeeda giliwas sih gay ghwanyas gwarsiinda aba heeda Aseetta.

Ak geamuschi haleanjeani seaniin sea Appolo ak abeeda ghoanyagaadi, fuga eaduupcheewi, ak abeeda ghoanaalaneasa ea moannaawani gitta ghayi sung'waariin, ak abeeda ea mwaghwara geaw sih aba jeedeang'wa aba giduuksiideaba geaw bea siinuut.
Ghwadaah ng'eaha gidawassean sajaadawaat aba jeedeang'wa? Ak gondeawi naaha ghayi moanyasi? Ama ghayi oanyaschi, ghwasaan inyas ghoaghwarji geat ea gawuurji gili megooneegwa?
Asi nihit noolang'uuchchi! Asi nihit noobaruurji! Nea iimeendani ea noahuuyi sugoodiga! Nea appadaydeaba nii ea noombaliischi, ak abeeda geeguuyi gheambalmeeda sea agooga!

Aba gideaba naapkaachchi gideaba Aseetta ghayi gwasneasa aseasa giijasoodiga eahuuwa fuga huydeana sean, ewuurjeewana fuga sirgweaksiina miyeeda; aba gideaba suhuuyi meagheang'da aba ng'eanyiida, ea aba heeda malaykajeega ea heeda buuneeda.

Aseasa geewooschi dasheahi appadayda Gristo, amaduu agooga goondeawi weaghuumeeda appadayda Gristo. Aseasa geewooschi ng'arng'ar, nea agooga goondeawi uurda. Agooga geesinneegwa mureeda, nea aseasa ghanyea meesinneasa mureeda.
Aba damani bea ghamneawean geebearjeewi jalooda ea muwooshta, ak ea mekkwealsheeni muuchchi, geabwareasa, ak ea meendeawani gealga,
geebiissi edeawiida nea geesinnyi gadiyeeda aba geattingaasa. Iisingng'eaweasa geebadiischeesi, iisibwareasa gearjeang'di.
Iisibeasheagwa googasayi duupcheeda; sunung eahuuwa haleanjeeda mwadaagha aba jeeda ng'eanyiida, nea geewooschi haleanjeeda mwadaagha aba haleanjeessean.
Ng'asheesu mwaang'waari nea geegasayi dabwaspwaseegwa, geabaysiini miinda gheang'deang'wa nea geahindaneegwa diibiga abwariinnyi.

Aba gideaba earappeadi ondeawi ginealshoodiga manda moonneeda aba jeeda Gristo, ea moondeawani ghweaniga saang'a. Aba gideaba aniini naahuuyi ghweandeang'wa aba jeeda Gristo Yeesu aba naweeda giijasta miy.
Asi geamuscheegwa, ayeanni geeshteanyu.

Hean ghoaw gideajeakni Dimotteo heedeang'wa, was jeepteanyu abwariinnyi, biissa adoabiiwaat aba jeeda Ng'uttamiida, jea goopkeaneegwa naweadingeasu aba jeeda Gristo, ak gawuurji gideanealshacheatti aba ng'eanyiissean aba jeesinga ganiisajeega sean.
Asi buuneeda mwaatkwa nung'ut ghwarjeeda nea ghaghay gilimaydoan heedeang'wa.
Nea gaydabay doan heedeang'wa iimwas Ng'uttamiida, ak ea mwajeaghu gideaba gaydasikteawa ng'asheega fuga ghwarjeeda gaydasikteawa eara uurjeenga nyaawa.
Aba gideaba sugoochcheandumeeda Aseetta manda jeeda baloolda, gwanda jeeda uurda.
Ghoabwariinyi anneeda? Gaydoan heedeang'wa nea geayeadu bileangida, ghana jea doana bariinyeega ea guroorooda garbabu?
Gwanda iitta huumwa nighayda bea gideaba jeedeang'wa gwanda fuga mideawa searoojiga munyas, ak gabiissa ea muy ea manda earaba jeeda Emoojiga; bea gideaba iissa siida gwalluudayi gatmooda ghwaan.
Ak ghoaghwarji geat! Gwachchi mang'wana gogiisannyi? Siida nisin ng'asheanji oang'ng'aamwana jeedeang'wa.
Nea earappeadi meandani aba saseeda geandi aba guroorooda, ama uurji gileandi, abeeda ea meargu girgweaksiinda

aba gheawunga Ng'uttamiida was Yeesu nang'aatti girgweaksiinda siida sin ng'asheanda muy sunuun. Hean nea ghoabwachchi geat, abeeda eara gurooroodeanyu gaygwanda hiji, sea uurda Ng'uttamiideanya was Yeesu,
ak geattaw Shattaani siisi ak ghwanyas saseadaannyi lasooda, ak abeeda gelealu gurooroadaannyi aba eaweeda Ng'uttamiida was Yeesu.
Ghwaroodeang'wa bwaageat miimiy. Moanali gideaba gidamwanang mwattaw ghoammu ghoamwattawiit murmurjeanda seani?
Asi ageanda mattawandeaba garayi ak abeeda ghoahuuyi murmurjeanda eesh, ak ea huumwa gil miyeammwattawiideegwa. Aba gideaba Gristo, was dayeenda gisilleanda bea basakka, ning'atta giidaydeayda.
Asi esna ghweelmeeda, nea mii dea mattawanda ghayi bea garayi was mattawanda bwada geawunda gheang'da ea munyinda, gagasa gaba mukkatteyda meammwattawiida, nii weeshinda jeeda gil ea huumwa.
Geang'oorneegwa aba barawajeanji itteanyuun, gideaba adooguuyeewi fuga mealuuli;

meayeeshshiineegwa eara hay gideaba adooguuyeewi fuga munyas bea jeedeaba ng'eanyiini, ghana fuga geawwi ghaanyan, ea fuga areedi buuneeda haleanjeeda, ghana fuga bada gidamawosa Aseetta, abeeda gwachchi gajea gideaba gagasa ang'amwana jeeda ng'eanyiida gil.

Ak geang'oorneegwa gideaba adoobareannyeewi siida was oorjeeda suguura dea giyeang'wa, iyaadiiy ghana gwaseeja haleanjeeda, ghana ea siida bada haleanjeeda mawosa Aseetta, ghana ea siida ang'eawi buuneeda gil, ghanea siida boogidi, ghana ea siida areedi buuneeda haleanjeeda, siissunu adoamwaschi eara gideaba gajoombucheewana.
Abeeda gaygwarachchi naaha iyeargweaksi fuga jarooda? Nea ea mii fukka mida jeeda ganiisaan gil gea jea argweaksiina.
Aseetta gaygoorgweaksa fuga mida jarooda. “Ak ghahoan fuga munyas aba jeedeang'wa.”
Ideeppa gwanda jeedeang'wa siida giisan appadayda oorjeeda ghaamwat, ghwadoabiiw gideaba gaygabadaksa gawa ghoahaakta aba madeeda fuga mii doobiiweadi nea ghwanung'waada fuga ghaydidi?
Moanali gideaba fuga ghaydidi gaygoorgweaksa ng'eanyiida? Ama abeeda ng'eanyiida ijeaorgweaksiina agooga, abeeda ea moahiidi iyorgweaksi ng'asheega manang'i?
Moanali gideaba galannya gajeergweaksiina malaykajeega? Asi abeeda ea may ghwaraanya, ng'asheesu bea ghamneaweani!
Asi iyoondeawi girgweaguutka sunu, ghwasaan inyas ghoayiinnyi madeeda fuga meawwala gheanyanga aba jeeda ganiisa?
Geargu ng'asheesu nea geagasayi dabwaspwaseagwa. Heappi gwasin gideaba aba jeedeang'wa manda siida eara siyagi was weaghoochcheanda ammu ghwalach girgweageeda fuga gheannyaawa,
iissa gawa siida ghoahaakta oorjeeda ghaamwat, ea biissa aba madeeda fuga mandeawana masaweega?
Hean gohheakkiidi geat agooga ak ghoaw joorda aba heedeang'wa. Neada ea mwang'wana goosawani aba gidiinyeanji? Neada ea mwang'wana gearreannyi haleanjeadaang'u?
Iiduu earagooga iissa goottinnyi nea goorreedayi haleanjeeda, nea iissa ghoareachchi eara fuga oduupcheewi.

Ghana moanali gideaba fuga mii doobiiweadi maygwahearan sugoochcheandumeeda Aseetta? Adeereenganneegwa; fuga munyas searooji gil, ghanea fuga bada haleanjeeda gidamawosa Aseetta, ghanea fuga mealuuli, ghanea fuga ashiigi suurja,
ghana mareanghooga, ghana fuga geawi ghaanyan, ghana leeyda, ghana fuga giing'weaka, ghana fuga areedi fii haleanjeeda jea gwahearan sugoochcheandumeeda Aseetta.

Nea aba jeedeang'wa ghayi goowooschi fuga sina ng'asheesu. Iiduu ea siihhuuneegwa, ak ea simiineegwa, ak geegooneegwa doobiiwnatta aba gheawunga Ng'uttamiida was Yeesu Gristo, ea aba Guroorooda Aseetteanya.
“Haleanjeessean aba heedeanyu ghwahit,” ak ea mii sean gil gea doabiiw. “Haleanjeessean ghwadoabiiw aba heedeanyu,” ak aniini ea meagassi gideaba gayghoaw soomjeanda gidawassean.
“Hamitta gaba jeeda, nea jeeda gaba hamitta,” ak gaygwanyarja Aseetta duwaaw. Amaduukku saseeda ea maba mealuuleega, gaba Ng'uttamiida, nea Ng'uttamiida gaba saseeda.
Nea Aseetta ghayi gooduudu Ng'uttamiida ak gaygooduunneasa aseasa aba uurdaannyi.
Heappi nea ea moanalli gideaba sasanuukkeagwa damealga Gristohi? Asi gay dageanu damealga Gristo ak ghanung' ghoaw damealga giweakshoochcheanda? Manda!
Ghana moanali gideaba siida guuyi sea giweakshoochcheanda niiw saseanagi sea ninyi? Aba gideaba geang'waar, “Fiisu assiyyeenyean gay ghoaw saseanagi.”
Nea siitta guuyi sea Ng'uttamiidean gaguuyi gurooroonagi sea niny.
Asalda anung'wana heeda mealuuleega. Gilinyoo ea riing'eeda gil sin siida gwanda badayda saseeda; amaduukku siida mealuul gwasin riing'eeda aba saseadaannyi nea gabwageaw.
Ammoanali gideaba sasanuukkeagwa gheeda sibatta Aseetta gil bea Guroorooda Ghaydit mida jeedeang'wa, ghayi gooneegwa Aseetta? Nea sasanuukkeagwa ea mii geagwa gil.
Agooga geashaheagwa. Asi, oakghambiida Aseetta aba sasanuukkeagwa.
Asi aba iitta ng'asheekka ghayi oang'warjiin. Ghang'wana ng'eedeeda aamwasada gatmooda.
Iiduu aba simsimda ea ng'asheega mealuuleega, gilinyoo ea ng'eedeeda gil gagasa gwandeawa gatmoadaannyi, nea giliwas gatmu gagasa gwandeawa siyeadaannyi.
Ng'eedeeda dandeayeatta gatmoadaannyi gittoobiiwusa aba jeeda gheeda, ak gwasnu eara gatmooda aba heeda siyeadaannyi.
Asi gatmooda meabala saseadaannyi, goobal siyeadaannyi; ak gwasnu eara siyeeda meabala saseadaannyi, goobal gatmoadaannyi.

Adooheewachchi geat inyeessa gooneaji damanda, ak abeeda ghoanyaschi gheatta mooshta Aseetta; ak iiduu goobiiksiinnyi gichcha, ak amwanyasa Shattaani gheatta gichchea gwasimdaneegwa imandaneegwa gheadeenda.
Asi geargu ng'asheesu nea geagoonyi gheatta, nea mii digheanda gil.
