Nea gidagwachchi aabwariiydi aniini gideaballi gawuurjeewean buuneessean, amaduu gaba siisi nyas gidaghayi miy sajaada adaw Aseetta, siisi geattaw gili nea niirja geattaw gilnuut.
Ak geayeeshshi fuga mii gageeshshi ea masiinng'weega ghang'wana gwandeawa siida geaw gawuurjeewean aniini.
Amadeappa ghwaraay giingng'ooydeaba geat, ea dageeshshi. Aba gideaba ghang'wana gageeshshi mwasamwa gideaba gayghaghwarda geawunda gheang'da.
Ak gaydarukusa fuga nigeeshshi, ak ea mii aniini Ng'uttamiida gil, gatmooda adagwaheelli sea siyeadaannyi,
(amadeappa gwaheelli, ea deabideada nea gaba geaw, ghana gabiikta gwaneaji sea siyeadaannyi), ea gideaba siyeeda adaghwanung' gatmoadaannyi.

Nea buuneeda suurja gearukusi aniini mii Ng'uttamiida gil gideaba iimida oorjeeda giyeanya wassean mideawa gatmooda mandeawana masaweega, ak ghamwas gideaba gay gwandeayi sea niny adaghwanung' gatmoani.
Nea gatmooda mideawa siyeeda mandeawana masaweega, nea ghamwas gideaba gaygwandeawa Gatmoani, ea adaghwanung'sa heeda siyeadaannyi.

Aba gideaba ng'eedeetta mandeawana masaweegean gajeammiidu appadayda gatmoodaannyi, ak eara gatmootta mandeawana masaweegean gajeammiidu appadayda siyeadaannyi. Ghwanyawa iimasunu diibigeagwa gajeamiimiyaas, amaduuku ghamneawa ea ghaydidi.
Nea fuga nigeennyi mandeawana masaweega igasa ghwadarda, ea dadarda; aba sareani oorjeediyya ea hudiyya ea mii radeadi. Aba gideaba Aseetta gaguurneasa aba hooyyooh.
Gatmooda ginaldiin ang'iing'i ea jea lealni siyeadaang'u? Ng'eedeeda gaynaldaan ang'iing'i ea jea lealni gatmoadaang'u?
Giduurji sean daba siisi abiideatta gidaghayi goondaneey Ng'uttamiida giibinda, ea gidaguursiinda Aseetta. Ak nii ea gidearukkwiidi aba jeeda ganiisajeega sean gil.
Heappi siida iissa geaghus eguursa nea siyaat ghasmeahooda? Asi adagageanda girooraneeda ghasmeahooda. Siida damanda siguursiina mii gawa ghasmeahooda? Asi adagagasa ghasmeahooda.
Beatta ghasmeahooda mii gili ak siida meayaada ghasmeahooda ea mii gili, geaghus ging'ng'ooyda digheanda Aseetta.
Daba siisi abiideatta gidaghayi bea mwadi suguursiinda.
Ang'iing'i ghayi geeguurneey nea guwosi ging'ng'oonyaneeda? Adiiduubayi. Asi iimmuusi gideaba gajabala geaw, ada abeeda ghwahit.
Aba gideaba siida siguursa aba jeeda Ng'uttamiida nea ging'ng'oonyaneeda gil, siisi goobal geaw aba heeda Ng'uttamiida. Gwasnu eara siida suguursa nea goobal geaw niny ging'ng'oonyaneedda Gristo.
Agooga geashaheagwa aba sheayeeda haw; adeahuuyi ging'ng'oonyaneemba sih.
Asi fuga eaduupcheewi, damanda wassean siguursiina siida, gagasa gwandeayi sea Aseetta.
Asi ghamneawa aba fuga miigageeshshi, meandeawani digheanda Ng'uttamiida, geargu aba fughareedeanyu aniineeda nubwaydanaan Ng'uttamiida aba gideaba geawoschi doabiiwaat.
Ghaaghanyi iyeang'ulayi aba sawanadeeni bea ghamneawean ghwahit gideaba siida gaygoobiideatta giduurji bea ghaneawa.
Heappi niratteey geeshshooda? Adigasayi gideaba gajabala geaw. Ang'iing'i giibali geaw mii geeshsheena? Adiiduu gigasayi geeshshooda.
Asi igeeshshi, ea misni riing'eeda, nea eara huda iisighi ea masna riing'eeda. nea fukka geshshiin gayghwanyas sawanaduutkka ng'eanyiida, ak gaydaweasaneegwa gili.
Geayii fugea eaduupcheewi, damanda sigasa nineekkiit muuchchi; ghang'eada ghamneawa ak gagal mwadi fukka mideawa gadeemgean gidabal gobiideatta fuga mandeawana,
nea fuga giisan ea dawuurji gili magiisana, nea fuga hoosan ea dawuurji fuga mahoosana, nea fuga shaah haleanjeeda ea dawuurji fuga mandeawana haleanjeeda,
nea fukka mideawa gadiyeeda aba jeeda ng'eanyiidean ea dawuurji fuga masna gil. Aba gideaba haleanjeeda muunda ng'eanyiida gay ghang'atta.
Geagasayi oppala geat aba deawiitmeeda. Siida mii gageeshshi iissa gwadeawiissa ngasheega Ng'uttamiida, gida jea gohoosanda Ng'uttamiida;
nea siida nigeeshshi iissa gwadeawiit aba ng'asheega muunda ng'eanyiida, was gichchea goohoosanda gatmoadaannyi,

nea gidagasa ea nibearshi. Nea gatmooda meegeenna ghana huda iissa gwadeawiit appadayda Ng'uttamiida, gichchea ghoawaatta siida ghaydit aba saseeda ea guroorooda; nea gatmooda sigeena iissa gwadeawiit appadayda haleanjeeda ng'eanyiida, gichchea gohoosanda siyeadaannyi.

Geargu ng'asheanji ak abeeda ghoanyagaadi, ak ea mii gideaba ghaghuumnyeegwa agooga, geagasayi gideaba gajooppiidana jeeda doobiiwanatta ea naweeda miy ak ghaghu mooshteang'wa mabwaasha aba heeda Ng'uttamiida.

Asi siida idaah gideaba masissiina huda jea ghaghi gidahaguuw, nea geawundaannyi bea gheang'da gwandeawa uurda, ak ea mayghwashiy gidagasa, gidabal gwasin gitta gasean: ghang'wana gageennyi, masna riing'eeda.

Nea siida wassean hang'waanyiit aba jeeda gurooroadaannyi, ak ghanyea mediing'siina nea ghoammu ghoadeal gitta gasean, ak ea nimanya aba jeeda gurooreadaannyi, gideaba gaygwandeawa ghoaw gatmoadaannyi, abeeda ghoadoabiiw.
Nea eara siida adayda hudaannyi ghoadoabiiw; nea dea meaghi ghoadoabiiw muuchchi.
Gatmooda aradaat iduugwanda siyeadaannyi. Amaduu nea nimi siyeadaannyi, ea niibal geaw ak ghoammu ghaghi siida gasa niny, ak geaghus fuga mida jeeda Ng'uttamiida.
Nea aba girgweageedeanyu gaygahoosan ak gang'wana muuchchi inyeeda goobiideada ameaghi. Aba gideaba earaniini iyeang'ulay geandeawi Guroorooda Aseetta.
Asi ghamneawa aba iitta hamichchoojiga siittaw haleanjeeda mawosa Aseetta; geanalli gideaba “Aseasa easasean gendeawi fughareeda.” Fughareeda iissa ghaghwar geaw, nea bariinyeega iissa gwadeegu.
Siida iighay gili nal ng'asheanda, siisi mwanala eara gil eara ghamneawa, mwanalda gidagwachchi haguuw ghwanalda.
Nea siida iibwariiy Aseetta, abeeda siisi ghwanal Aseetta.
Hean aba iitta agitta hamitta siittaw haleanjeeda mawosa aseetta, geanalli gideaba, “Gidamawosa aseetta mayghwashng'u,” ea gideaba manda Aseetta nuut geaghus akkalealla.
Earappeadi mida fuga suguura aseechcheekka, aba humng'eeda ghana ng'eanyiida, aba huumwa gwanda “aseechcheekka” saang'a ea “ng'uttamooji” saang'a,

iiduu aba heedeanya aseasa Aseetta aakkalealla, was Ghweanda, was deaghayi leabu haleanjeessean, ak geepiideewi bwadaydaannyi ak gabiissa gwanda Ng'uttamiinagi, was Yeesu Gristo, ghayi rinna haleanjeessean badaydeaba niny, nea eara aseasa geepiideewi niny.
Eara gwasa, mii sean gil gea mideawa fughareani. Geaghus suuh ng'ay, aba gideaba nineaji haleanjeeda mawosa aseetta, nea fughareenga nyaawa, ng'arng'ari, ea sung'uda ririnnyeanda.
Nea hamitta ghanyea maygagwarseasa aba heeda Aseetta. Iisunung'waadi agitta amwasunyeawaneasa gil, ama siyaaji ea maygooheadeeseasa gil.
Asi ashageada giibali itteang'wa bwaageadiin adiiduu gwaruusa fukka ng'arng'ariin.

Aba gideaba siida idaannyi, ang'iing'eeda mideawa fughareeda, nea gipteadi ak giyeagiischi aba jeeda gheeda sibatta haleanjeeda mawosa Aseetta, neada ea majiiduu gwayeessa jihi, iing'arng'ar fughareedaannyi, ak ghwaak hamitta siittaw maloonghajeega?
Nea aba fughareadaang'u genuus siida ng'arng'ar, was oorjeeda giyeang'wa ghayi meah Gristo appadaydaannyi.
Asi iyoonung gwasin fuga oduupcheewi riing'eeda nea gookkachchi fugheerga nyaawa nea ng'arng'ari, abeeda ea nootiiysi Gristo.
Asi, hamitta ijea ghoaw gichchea ghabwaay oorjeediyya, abeeda ea may guttaak bannyeega, ak abeeda amwabwaanyi oorjeediyya.
Neada aniini meabali geawi? Aniini meawosi giijasoochcheanda? Aniineeda ea mii dadaa Yeesuuyda was Ng'uttamiideanya? Agooga moowosi gadiyeedeanyu aba jeeda Ng'uttamiida?

Aba gideaba iimeawoosi giijasoochcheanda, aba heeda buuneeda suurja, iiduu geawoschi aba heedeang'wa agooga; aba gideaba agooga goowooschi girooraneeda giijasoochcheandumeedeanyu aba jeeda Ng'uttamiida.
Nii gidearukkwiisi fuga sikkiideaweani.
Neada ea madoobiiwseasa gideaba geyeagiischi nea geeleeshi?
Neada ea mammiiseasa gideaba getteayeewi gatmooda, aba jeeda neayeedeanya eewuurjeewana giijasoodiga suurja sea o oorjooga geenyea Ng'uttamiida sea Geefa?
Ghana sughus Barnaba sea aniini was fuga jea gagadiiyi ak ea mwanyasa hamitta?

Nii gajea ana shirikaarajean gil jea gawa ng'uchcheeda aba lappiyeadaannyi niny nea gaba geaw? Nii gajea ng'eaha gil siida jea gwahista msabiibu jea ea may ghwaak haghweagaaschi? Nii gajea ng'eaha gil jea gooheagwiischi ak aamwali eanooga haleanjeeda ahaaghwa?
Heappi ng'asheesu geargu aba gheambalmeeda siida? Neada deaweeda earada marukuna ng'asheesu?
Aba gideaba aba jeeda deaweedeeda Muusa geang'waar gideaba, “Adiradi ghuutta heeyda dattas booga.” Abeeda gajeeyeena Aseetta gang'ula ng'asheega heewga?

Neada niny ea mabaloolana badahuukkaasa? Ng'asheesu geang'waar appadahuukkaasa, aba gideaba siida bwar ng'eanyi iissa gidabal ghabwar ng'eanyi nea ghwarar nea siida las booga ea dalasa nea ghwarar gideaba gayghwanyas booga.
Abeeda aseasa ghayi iisihisi mbeeyooda miyaas bea guroorooda jeesingeagwa, abeeda gajea ng'asheanda haw gil gideaba gealaji haleanjeedeang'wa oanyaschi?
Asi iinyas buuneeda suurja haleanjeeda doabiiw aba heedeang'wa, abeeda amearaanyani aseasa?
Iiduu, ea meagasi aseasa gideaba gajeatoabiiwdunu, iissa geamilikghti haleanjeassean ak ameatteali Giijasta miy bea Gristo.

Moanali gideaba fukka sin gadiyeeda aba gheeda sibatta Aseettean gwanyassa hamitta nyaawa gheeda sibatta Aseetta, nea fuga sin gadiyeeda, aba altaari iissa amwanyasa haleanjeetta sisappa geadi bea lukghumajeegeani?
Gwanu, eara Ng'uttamiida gwargu gideaba fukka rukkwiida Giijasta miyiin gay ghwanyas hamitta nyaawa appadayda Giijasta miy.

Amaduu aniini ghanyea mii dasin aaragi aba ng'asheesu doabiiwiin, ak amwang'waari aba gideaba geagasayi danyas haleanjeani. Aba gideaba ghang'wana ghaameayi mwasamwa gideaba gayghaweedanaan siida ghwaroodeanyu bea geaw.
Earappeadi earukkwiidi Giijasta miyiin manda gichchea daghwara geaw. Aba gideaba sugoonan dasin gadiyeani. Eamuy deanyu imearukkwiidani giijasta miy!
Aba gideaba iyeasinnyi aba gideagassiidi aniini, abeeda geandeawi gimearda; ama iimii gideagassiidi aniini, abeeda gadiyeeni geetteaganean.
Abeada giimeardeanyu annaaha? Ada nihi: gideaba gaydarukkwiida giijasta miy nea meegu gili, ak aamwanung eegu gittoobiiwsean aba rukkwiideayda giijasta miy.
Earappdi eaballi geaw aba heeda buuneessean iin geasinyi geaw ging'ng'oonyaneeda buuneessean, ak abeeda geanyaksi geaw fuga saang'a.

Iissa geawuurjeewi Yahuudi aba heeda fuga Yahuudi, ak abeeda ghaanyaschi fuga Yahuudi; aba heeda fuga deaweeda, iissa geasinyi geaw siida deaweeda, earappeadi meandani jeeda deaweedean, ak abeeda ghaanyaschi fuga ang'ng'waay deaweeda.

Nea fukka manda jeeda deaweedean geasinyi geaw gilimeandani jeeda deaweeda, nea mii gideaba meandeawani deaweeda aba heeda Aseetta gil, nea bih geawoschi siida mideawa deaweeda aba heeda Gristo, ak abeeda ghaanyaschi fukka mandeawana deaweedean.

Aba heeda fuga ng'arng'ari iissa geawoschi ng'arng'ar, ak abeeda ghaanyaschi fuga ng'arng'ari. Geandi damannyoojiga sean aba heeda buuneessean, ak abeeda aba naweadinga sean ghaanyaschi gichchea dalealdeayda buuneeda.
Ak geasinyi haleanjeessean appadayda giijasta miy, ak abeeda geeppareanyi ghawooda sea buuneeda suurja.
Neada ea moanali gideaba fuga galleada iissa gwasalda sean gang'aleallli, nea siida jea ghwanyas shiipka aagi? Asi agalleada ak ghoanyaschi.
Nea siida mida jeeda deangheeda iissa ghwasaja geaw haleanjeessean. Asi iissa gwasindunu ak abeeda ghwanyas shiipka, ak geegalleadi ak abeeda geanyaschi shiipka mayghwadattasa.
Asaha, earaniini mwafwaji mwadaagha nea manda gidabuurbuurji, ak ea meakuli dawuurji siida bwar jeammeeda;
aba sareani geasawannyi saseedeanyu nea geagadiiyi, ak amwahuuwi siida rukkwiisa giijasta buneessuurja, amaduu ghaahuuyi aniini siida jea eaheawa.
Fuga eaduupcheewi, geagasayi anala gideaba, gheambaghwanigaasa ghayi gookkwa shamooghooda sean, ak ghoaghaawa sean basooda,
amang'atta geeppattiisan sean ghoaw fuga Muusa aba jeeda shamooghooda ea jeeda basooda,
ama ng'atta ghwaak sean hamittida bea gurooroodean
ak ghwali sean beekka bea gurooroodean. Aba gideaba ghwaleaydaawa badayda lagheaneeda was guroorooda ghayi aat geeshta, nea lagheaneetta ea Gristohi.
Nea gwanda fuga saang'a aba jeennyaawa magassa Aseetta; ammuchchu gealas uhuuda aba dareapcheeda.
Asi ghamneawa ng'asheesu niiw reekusiinda aba heedeanya, ak abeeda ea meegassi ng'asheega munyas.

Nea adoowoschi fuga bada haleanjeeda mawosa Aseetta, ak goowuurjeewi giduurji fuga mwaatkwa; gawuurji gidaghayi sung'waar bea gideaba, “Buuneeda ghayi gobiitpiit gweagiischi nea gwaleeshi, ama ng'atta ghang'eatng'eat ghwaanghan.”
Nea adeemealuulli ak gewuurjeewi gidasiinda fuga mwaatkwa aba jeennyaawa, ak ghoabeeda fii sagalamnyooji diktam ea samwagu aweachchaanjagi.
Nea adaghanyi eesna Ng'uttamiida, ak geewuurjeewi gidaghayi simda fuga mwaatkwa aba jeannyaawa, ak ghwaak inchipkeega;
nea adoannikghti gidaghayi aniikghta fuga mwaatkwa aba jeannyaawa, ak ghwalas uhuuda habitkwajeega.
Asi ghamneawa, ng'asheesu ghwanyas nea gawuurji reekusiinda, ak geang'waar ghoahiimu gichchea eabeada, aba heeda fuga jeagweadu mudeanooda gweannyeekka.
Asi siida eeshsha geaw giminaadi dang'ulla geaw adiiduu ghoabeeda.

Manda simsimda ninyaseagwa agooga mawosa dea geallaan aba heeda siida. Aseetta doabiiwaat, nea niny ea mayghwanung'waada eesmeegwa ea ghwanaawa uurjeengeagwa, earappeadi jea eesmeegwean gaygwasin naweeda jea aritteawana ak abeeda ghoammuuschi arjeang'da.
Asi fugeasu abwariinnyi, aba sareani anung'waada baditta gidamawosa aseetta.
Geabalooldaneegwa fuga mideawa fughareenga; asi otteemsheesiina agooga ng'asheesu earguun.
Bayooktida bea ghawooda sippareannyi aba ghawoodean, heappi mii giibareannyeeda foojeanda Gristohi? Ama mukkateeyda subwanajaadi mii giibareannyeeda saseeda Gristohi?
Aba gideaba gwanda mukkatteheanagi, nea aseasa geawoschi saang'a ak gewooschi saseanagi, aba gideaba aseasa eesasean geanyaschi banajaneedeaba mukkatteydida assagiin.
Ang'ulla fuga Israeeli; neada ea mii fukka ghayi akk haleanjeeda ghasmeahooda bareannyi sea altaarihi?
Asi gaydayiin? Gaydayi hamitta sighadoawana haleanjeeda mawosa aseetta gili, ghana maloonghajeanda gili?
Manda, geargu gideaba haleanjeetta sisappa geadi adayda fuga mandeawana masaweega ghoadaw meangeenda nea moadawa Aseetta. Ak ea meagassi aniini gideaba gajabareannyeewana meangeenda.
Mwajoammuusa aleayda bayookta Ng'uttamiida ea bayookta meang'eenda. Ak ea mwajoammuusa oppareannyeena measeeda Ng'uttamiida ea measeeda meangeenda.
Ghana sigasayi eang'udana Ng'uttamiida lachng'eanyiida? Neada gendeawi uurda ea eburdeawana ninyi?
“Haleanjeessean ghwahit,” ak ea mii haleanjeessean gil gea jea ghaweat fii, ak ea mii sean gil gea jea gwadeegu.
Siida adagagakkiisa geaw haleanjeeda miyaas, ghang'wana gagasa ghwanyas gischeewoochcheandaannyi gidamiy.
Ayaaga haleanjeessean sikghaas aba heeda sigheahhiideawa bannyeega was jeeda naada nea adoonnyeariidi aba gidamwachmwach fughareedeang'wa.
Aba gideaba, “Ng'eanyiida gaba Ng'uttamiida, sea haleanjeessean mida jeeda.”
Asi iguurneey siida mandeawana masaweega hamitteaba shing'ada ak gigasayi beatta, aga gidawassean sugoonnyi nea adinyaashti ng'asheanda wassean aba gidamwachmwach fughareeda.
(Ama deeppa gwayeeshshineey sih, “Gili geattaydaawa lukghumajeega,” iiduu nea mang'ulleey siida ghwanyawa rukuneey, ea aba gidamwachmwach fughareeda,
geargu gitta mwachmwach fughareadaannyiin, mii geagwa gil, adiiduu giyaagi.) Ghwasaan abeeda inyas gibaldeanyu bea geaw jea goorgweaksa fughareemba siinuut?
Abeeda iyaagi nea geabadiischeesi Aseetta, abeeda ghwasaan inyas geeng'ng'eawwean aba gili naabwachchi Aseettean?
Asi iyooyeagiischi ghana iyooleeshi, ghana iyoosinnyi ng'asheanda wassean, asna sean aba gigheambiitta Aseetta.
Adoanung' goodiiy fuga Yahuudi ghana gea Yunaani ghana ganiiseeda Aseetta,
asi gawuurji gidiissa eagassiidi aniini deahoosan buuneessean aba haleanjeessean easinnyi, ak ea meegassi gideaba gaydanyagaada nea gabwageaw, geagasayi dea buuneessean, ak abeeda geelealu.
Awuurjeewanean aniini, gawuurji gideabeaheatti Gristo.
Asi ghaaghwarjeedwa aba gideaba noapkachchaan aba haleanjeessean ea gideaba noang'ng'waanyi searoojikka ghayi eagoonnyeegwean.
Ak geagasayi anala gideaba giliwas gatmooda ea ng'eedeeda Gristo gil, nea uhuuda gatmooda ea siyeadaannyi, nea uhuuda Gristo ea Aseetta.
Ng'eedeeda wassean moora Aseetta, ghana gwaramoorani ng'asheega nea gwadukuta uhuudaannyi, ghoabwaaspwaas uhuudaannyi,
nea gatmooda wassean mwaash Aseetta ghana gwaramoorani ng'asheega nea madukuta uhuudaannyi masissiina uhuudaannyi mureeda, abeeda gawuurji gili uhuudaannyi sireakghu.

Aba gideaba gatmooda ii madukuta uhuudaannyi, ghang'wana ghwareakghu budeagaaschi; amadeeppa gaba baspaseega gideaba gayghwalach gatmooda buudeagaaschi ghana eareakghu abeeda ghang'wana gwadukuta uhuudaannyi.
Aba gideaba ng'eedeeda mammiisiina gideaba gaygwadukuta uhuudaannyi, aba gideaba niny geegala sea gigheambiitta Aseetta; nea gatmooda ea gigheambiitta ng'eedeeda gil.
(Aba gideaba ng'eedeeda maleapna heeda gatmooda, gwaleabu gatmooda heeda ng'eedeeda.
Nea ng'eedeeda ea meesna appadayda gatmooda, nea gatmooda geesin appadayda ng'eedeeda.)
Nii gidasibaysiina gil gideaba gatmooda gagasa gwandeawa gichchea gwadukuteawa uhuudaannyi, appadahuukka malaykajeega.
(Eara gwasa, aba heeda Ng'uttamiida asi gatmooda mii gili, ii manda ng'eedeeda nea ng'eedeeda ea mii gili ii manda gatmooda,
aba gideaba gatmooda ghayi gwarinna heeda ng'eedeeda gwasnu eara ng'eedeeda ghamneawa gwajiilu gatmooda. Nea haleanjeessean gwaleabu heeda Aseetta.)
Asi asikteawana nea gobwageat; ghwadeabiiwi gideaba ghamwaash gatmooda Aseetta nea madukuta uhuuda?
neada geallaan ea moanaaleagwa gideaba ng'eedeeda ii mideawa buudeega geawwi ghoabwaaspwaas geaw,
Iiduu gatmooda ii mideawa buudeega geawwi gahaguuwsa? Aba gideaba geattaw budeega geawwi gwadukuta saseeda.
Amadeeppa gwanda siida gasa ghang'ut foolayda, ghanyea meanali seareeda nuut ghana eara ganiisajeega Aseetta.
Asi aba goonidi eagoonnyeegwa ng'asheesu bea gichchea ebeedaan, mwaaghwareegwa, aba gideaba iyoabwachchi geat, moobatteeni geat alooheeda, goobatti geat munyinda.
Aba gideaba gidamadeeda, iyoroonnyi nea goowoschi ganiisa, anayiinyi gideaba gwanda jeedeang'wa dardeayda; ak hich ghaamwaschi,
aba gideaba jeedeang'wa ghaghanyi gwanda foolayda ak abeeda fuga sumwas aba heedeang'wean abeeda geanal.
Asi iyoabwachchi geat, ea mwahida gideaba gajayaaga hamitta Ng'uttamiida.
Aba agiischooda, iissa gaba siisi geanda hamittaannyi, nea siyagi gabearji jalooda nea niirja ea boogideat.

Naaha! Neada ea moondeawani gealga jea ayeagiischeewana nea gooleeshi? Ghana ofoolli ganiiseeda Aseetta nea ghoanung ghabeal fuga mandeawana gil? Gaydayeeshshineegwaan? Gaydagwarseegwa aba ng'asheanji? Manda! Maydagwarseegwa.
Aba gideaba ghaanyaschi aba heeda Ng'uttamiida gitta ghamneawa eagoonnyeegwa agoogean, nea Ng'uttamiida was Yeesuun eaweetta jea ealaabwa bwadawiin gageanu mukkatte,
hean, iing'atta badiischeesiinda, ghabwanach, ak gwayi, “Nii saseedeanyu gil ghayi sibeagu appadahuukkeagwa, asindunu aba giipkeatteanyu.”
Gwasnu iing'atta agiischoodeaba shing'ada gageanu bayookta ak gwayi, “Bayoogi neajeedeesh gil aba foojeandeanyu. Asindunu, iinyoo aleesheena, aba giipkeatteanyu.”
Aba gideaba iyoayaaji mukkatteheeni nea ghoaleaydi bayoogi, goorukkwiidi miyeeda Ng'uttamiida ea ghwahitta eaweeda jea ghwahinna.
Nea siida wassean, akk mukkatte ghana ghwalealeada bayookta Ng'uttamiida aba naweeda mwadoabiiwa, abeeda gaygwanyaksa geaw giidinyeanda ak ghang'uda saseeda ririnnyeanda ea foojeanda Ng'uttamiida.
Nea siida ea dasikteawana geaw, ak ghwaak mukkatte ak ghwaleayda bayookta.
Aba gideaba siida wassean akk nea ghwali nea masikteawana ghwaak nea ghwali ghoorjooda saseadaannyi.
Nii gidaghamneawa nung' gang'arng'ariidi fuga saang'a aba jeedeang'wa gil nea gamnyeani, nea mwaatkwa ea nimeewa.
Ama inyeetta ghwanyawa gergweaksi geat huumwa, ghwanyawa ea majeergweakseasa.
Nea iyargweakseasa Ng'uttamiida, geanung' eanyasa mureeda ak abeeda ea mergweakseasa sea fuga muunda ng'eanyiida.
Asi fuga eaduupcheewi, iyoabwachchi geat nea googasayi ayeagiischeena, ommuukkuuni geat,
siida ibearji jalooda, ea deagiischi aba gheannyi, adiiduu gweadu nyeascheedeang'wa girgweaksiinda. Nea ng'asheega suurja iyaawunnyi gaydarukuneegwa.
Fuga eaduupcheewi, asi ghamneawa aba iitta haleanjeeda sugu bea guroorooda, aniini meagassi amoanali.
Ak ghoanalli gideaba damanda ghayi owoseewi fuga mandeawana masaweega, geehutteawweegwa ak ghoabwachchi haleanjeeda mawosa aseetta, ak earagwasa ghaghanyi sihheelleewaneegwa.

Asi geagasayi gideaba anala gideaba manda siida jea gabaloola badayda Gurorooda Aseetta jea gwayi, “Yeesu sumwaashta!” Ak ea manda siida jea gwayi, “Yeesu Ng'uttamiida gil,” geaghus gwargu Gurorooda Ghaydit.
Asi gwaheelli giimmuusta sugu, nea Gurorooda ea agi;
Ak gabiissa gwaheelli sinjeandinga gadiyeeda, nea Ng'uttamiida ea agi;
Iiduu gwaheelli uurda gadiyeeda, nea Aseetta ea akkalealla dea adoabiiw sean appadahuukka buuneessean.
Nea giliwas sih goohiimsa Aseetta Guroroadaannyi aba alooheeda buuneessean.
Aba gideaba siyagi aba Gurorooda geattaw gwarukku weaghuumeeda, nea geattaw nuut gwarukku ng'asheega aba fughareeda aba gidabwariiyda Gurorooda,
nuut geattaw masaweega aba Guroroodida, nea nuut geattaw giimmuusta jea ghoahaabwa buuneeda aba Gurorooda assagiin,

nea nuut geattaw gadiyeeda jea gwasna ng'asheega deamdeameedi, nea nuut geattaw sibaneandumeeda, nea nuut gooheeldooschi gurooruunatka, nuut heeluutka ghuusiga emoojiga, nea nuut geattaw rooppiideayda ghuusiga emoojiga.
Nea gadiyoojusu seaniin gwasin akkalealla aba Gurorootta assakkaleallaan, ak gwalakkiisa giliwassih nea gabwageaw gawuurji gitta gassiida ninyiin.
Gawuurji gitta waseatta agi saseedean ak gabiissa gwandeawa damealga saang'aan, earappeadi damealga saang'aan gaba saseanagi, ak ea giduurji earaba heeda Gristohi.
Nea aba Guroroanagi geppaattiisaneasa aba saseanagi, fuga Yahuudi ghanea fuga Giriikki gili, ea ging'ng'oonyanga gil ghanea fuga abal geat gil, hean geanung' ghwaleayda sean Guroroanagi.
Aba gideaba saseeda mandeawana dameallanjagi gil asaang'a.
Iyayi geeshta, “Aniini meawosi geattinda, ak ea meabeahi saseeda,” nii mii gidamaygabeaheewa saseeda gil.
Ama ayi iitta, “Aniini meawosi gheang'da, ak ea meabeahi saseeda,” nii mii gidamaygabeaheewa saseeda gil.
Abeeda saseessean iihuuw gheang'da, abeeda iing'da gaygwanda yeenu? Amabeeda huuw saseessean iitta, abeeda gwandayeenu joonda gida?
Hean aba giduurji, Aseetta gageanu googuuyi giliwas roabwada mida saseeda, aba giliwas roabwada aba gidagassiida.
Ghwanyawa inyeeda ghoaw roobuutka sean roobwadeanagi, abeeda saseeda gaygwanda yeenu?
Amaduu ghamneawa roobuutka asaang'a, amaduukku saseeda aagi.
Ak ea mayghoammu gheang'da gwayeeshsha geattinda, “Aniini meagasseey,” nea moammu gwayeeshsha uhuuda geeshanga, “Aniini meagasseegwa.”
Abeeda iisiyam, roobuutkiga bea saseeda sideaksa ng'arng'arannyeekkean gea sigasa muuchchi gil,
nea roobuutkiga bea saseeda mahaguuwa mureedean gajeattawa mureeda haw muuchchi, nea roobuutkaasa manda leanga geanung' gwandeawa leanga muuchchi ea ghwanaawda.
Aba gideaba roobuutkaasa mideawa alooheeda magassa gil. Nea Aseetta ghayi gwasin saseeda, ak ghoadaw mureeda muuchchi roobadeetta ashoayiin,
ak abeeda ea dardaawaat saseeda, ak abeeda gang'ula geat roobuutka, gaba roobadeeni ng'ula nuut.
Nea iisawana roobadeanagi, abeeda gwasawana roobuutka sean; nea iisisissa mureeda roobadeanagi, abeeda gahoosan sean.
Asi noahuuyi saseeda Gristo nea gaba siisi was roabadeadaannyi.

Nea Aseetta ea niloat giijasoodiga madeeda aba jeeda ganiisa, deaba iyyeenya sibanga, geaba samwagu ea ginealshoodiga, ea fuga sina ng'asheega deamdeameadi, ea fuga aheabi buuneeda, ea weedanga, ea fuga ambaliischi, ea fuga baloolla ghuusiga emoojiga mwaatkwa.
Neada ea giijasoodiga seani? Neada ea sibanga seani? Neada ea ginealshoodiga seani? Ak gwasna sean ng'asheega deamdeameadi?
Neada ea siittaw sean giheapta fuga miyeani? Neada gabaloolla sea iit muudi? Ak ghoammu sean rooppiideayda ng'asheega?
Asi agassa muuchchi haleanjeeda hees jea eegu. Ak gaydahiimneegwa naweeda miy muuchchi miyadaaha.
Eara dabaloola ghuusiga fuga muunda ng'eanyiida ea dea malaykajeega, nea meandeawani bariinyeega, abeeda anaahuuyi gharinnyeanda ajuuri ea deebajeanda was moonngeanda.
Nea eara dandeawa uurda sibaneandumeeda, ak ghaanalli makcheamuutka sean bea fughareeda, ak geandeawi masaweega sean, ammu goobaleak giijeega, ak ea meandeawani bariinyeega, meawosi gil.
Iyaadaydi haleanjeedeanyu sean eandeawi, ama adaydi saseedeanyu eaghwarda, ak ea meandeawani bariinyeega, ea meanyasi gil.
Bariinyeega iissa ghamilikghta nea innya jih; bariinyeega mandeawana lachng'eanyiida ghana ghwarjeeda;
ak ea maba ghunduufka ghana ghwarjeeda. Bariinyeega ea maska naweadaannyi nea gaba geaw; ak ea mii assas nyaras ghana gwandeawa sichcheeda;
ak ea mahoosanniisiina ng'asheega munyas, iissa gahoosassa ng'asheega doobiiweadi.
Bariinyeega iissa ghamilikghta ng'asheega sean, ak ghamwas ng'asheega sean, ak ghwarar ng'asheega sean ak ghwarjeang'da aba ng'asheega sean.
Bariinyeega manda mudeanooda; nea iimida ramooranga gayghang'atta; gwasnu eara iitta emoojiga, gaygammuudean, ama mida fughareeda gayghang'atta.
Aba gideaba fughareangaasa iissa ea mwahitta nea eara ramoorangaasa ea mwahitta;
Iimuchchu nea ghwahidu gitta hidaadiin, abeeda gayghang'atta gitta mii hidaadiin.
Ghayi nea guttawos jeepta, iissa geabalooldi jeepta, ak geattemsheatti jeepta, ak gwadeenna fughareedeanyu dea jeepta; hean nea geeheedu doaw ng'eedeeda, ghaanung'waadi ng'asheega jeepchcheandumeeda.

Aba gideaba ghamneawa geeng'ulli geat giyooh aba jeeda misaneeda, nea damandida gaygwaroonnyi gheanyangaasa. Asi ghamneawa ghaanalli aba meatkweenagi; damandida gajadanal muuchchi, aba gideaba Aseetta ghwanalan muuchchi.
Asi masaweega ea ghusooda ea bariinyeega, ngasheesu assamwaguun, aba jeedeaba ng'asheesu daahaw muchchi bariinyeega gil.
Anung' ghoaw bariinyeega, gidajea agassa, nea goosinnyi badiida aba haleanjeeda jea eegu bea gurorooda, raanya gideaballi ghoaramwaarji.
Aba gideaba siida baloola iitnuut meabaloola buuneeda goobalool Aseetta; aba gideaba manda siida nal ng'asheagaaschi, niny gwarukku makcheameeda funyaat aba jeeda Gurorooda.
Nea aba meatkweeda niirja, siida ramoorani gobalool buuneeda aba gidiing'nooda nyaawa nea goomajeek ea geandeayda salagheang'da.
Siida baloola iitnuut goomajeek geaw niny, nea siida rukku ramooranga goomajeek ganiisa.

Ak geagasayi aniini gideaba gajabaloolana iit nuut, nea ghwaraanya muuchchi gideaba gajaramoarana. aba gideaba siida ramoorani ahaweewa siida baloola iit nuut, geaghus gwarooppu siinuut, ak abeeda geemmajeek ganiisa.

Ak ghamneawa fuga eaduupcheewi, iyaawunnyi heedeang'wa ak geabaloolli aba iit nuut, abeeda gaydanung' anyagaadaydaan, geaghus darukuneegwa nea ghadahaaji ghana aba fughareeda, ghana daramooran, ghana aba ginealshooda?
Eara haleanjeeda mandeawana gurooruunatka, uurji durumbeatti, ghanea gidondoriida gil, iimwanya nea gwaheelli nyeashta, gajeanaldaan duumda was?
Aba gideaba giguuleanda iinyaa nyeashta meanala, gajeang'eaha siida jea ahidaat aba ng'uchcheeda?
Asi gwasnu earagooga; iyoobalooli iit nuut meanala, gajeang'eaha jea ghwanal gissurgu? Aba gideaba gajuurjeewana siida rukkwiisa ng'asheega jeammeeda.
Asi gwanda iidiga saang'a heelli aba jeeda ng'eanyiida, ak ea manda dea meanala girrugu.
Abeeda iimwanali ginnyah iittida, gaydoaw rabascheanda aba heeda siida balool nea siida balool gayghoaw rabascheanda aba heedeanyu.
Gwasnu earaba heedeang'wa; aba gideaba googasayi muuchchi gideaba gajahuuwa fuga mideawa uurda aba Gurorooda, agassa muuchchi gideaba gajandeawana ak ghoadeaschi ganiisa.
Asi, siida baloola iit nuut ea damwaasha Aseetta eattaw rooppiideayda.
Aba gideaba iyaamwaashchi Aseetta aba iit nuut, ghamwaach guroroodeanyu Aseetta, nea fughareedeanyu ea mandeawana haghweega.
Abeeda gaydasin naaha? Gaydamwaash Aseetta aba gurorooda earada gaydamwaash aba fughareeda, gaydasarman aba gurorooda ak gaydasarman earada aba fughareeda.
Eara gwasa, ang'iing'i iibadiischeesi aba guroorooda, siitta uurji gilimida jaroodean gaygwayeendaan “Amina,” iing'atta badiischeesindaang'u iimwanala gidurgu?
Aba gideaba gwadeeppa badiischeesiina muuchchi, iiduu siida niirja eamaloossiina gil.
Geabadiischeesi Aseetta aba gideaba geabalooli iit nuut ea dadarameagwa oagasean;

amaduu, aba jeeda ganiisa ghabwariinyi gideaba gaydabaloola ng'asha muut aba fughareedeanyu, ak ghanaalli buuneeda suurja, eaghwalabwa hoowa gideaba gaydabaloola ng'asha sagalamnyooji damanamughuush aba iit nuut.
Fuga eaduupcheewi, adoahuuyi diibiga aba fughareengeagwa; ahuuwa diibiga aba ng'asheega munyas, nea aba fughareengeagwa ghoahuuyi fuga hees.
Geang'waar aba jeeda deaweeda gideaba, “Aba ghuusiga fuga baloola iit nuut, ea biissa ghuusiga rabasta gaydeabalool fiisu, ak earagwasa ghanyea maygoleeysean iit, gwargu Ng'uttamiida.”
Asi, iit nuut gwadeagooda gil ak ea maba fuga mideawa masaweega, gaba fuga mandeawana masaweega, nea ramooranga ea maba fuga mideawa masaweega.
Asi iibwat geat ganiiseessean ak gabaloola sean iit nuut, amaduu ghwahidu gah fuga jarooda, ghanea fuga mandeawana masaweega gil, heappi maygwayi goobeayi geasi?
Ama ramoaran sean, amaduu ghwahidu gah siida iiyiin gaygoohiimsa munyindaannyi, nea ng'asheekka sean iiyiin gaygoorgweaksa,
Makcheameeda jeadaannyi gajeanung' ghwadaajiit; ak abeeda gwatkuy, ak gayghabwat Aseetta ak gwargu gideaba aba huumwa Aseetta gwanda jeedeang'wa.
Fuga eaduupcheewi, asi gajeeyeanaan? Iyoobwachchi geat, gaba siisi mideawa duumda, ea ginealshooda, ea gidaheachta, ea iit nuut, ghana rooppunooda ng'asheega.
Siida iibaloola iit nuut, ea dabaloola fii iyyeenya ghanea samwagu gil adaghwanaawa, nea dasinna galannyoojiga gwayamuuttooschi; ak ea darooppuuna siyagi.
Iimanda siichchea gwarooppu, ea daba siisi siinda aba jeeda ganiisa, deabaloola geaw niny ea Aseetta.
Nea sibanga ea dabaloola nea iyyeenya ghanea samwagu, ak ea dasikteawana ng'asheega surgu.
Nea isittaheachsa ng'asheanda siinuut apteada, adasiinda siida ghwanyawa bea madeeda.
Aba gideaba ghoammuuschi oagasean gaba siisi ramoaran, ak abeeda ghwanal sean, nea geemmajeek sean;
nea gurooruunatka sibanga iissa gwasissa gadiyeeda sibanga.
Aba gideaba Aseetta mii Aseetta ang'uuttooschi fii gil, niny gaba hoyyoo. Gawuurji aba jeeda ganiisajeega sean bea fuga ghaydidi.
Nea gadeemga ea dasiinda aba jeesinga ganiisajeega. Aba gideaba manda gheatta jea gabaloola, gagasa gweada geat ng'eanyi, gawuurji ginnyaashta deaweeda.
Ama mida ng'asheanda wassean gasa ghwanal, ea daanyaasha siyeedinga nyaawa aba ghoah. Aba gideaba gaba baspaseega gideaba gaygabalool gatmooda aba jeeda ganiisa.
Heappi! Ng'asheanda Aseetta ghang'eada heedeang'wa ghana hisseegwa agooga nea goabwageadi?
Siida iyeeshsha geaw guwosi sibaneeda gil, ghana ea siida gurorooda, gayghamwas ng'asheesu eang'oorneegwean gideaba gwargu Ng'uttamiida.
Nea siida imwanala ng'asheesu, ea mwajeanaal niny.
Asi fuga eaduupcheewi, asna badiida ak googasayi muuchchi ramooranda ng'asheega, nea adoaheawi fuga baloola iit nuut;
nea goosni ng'asheega sean badiida ea alooheeda.
Asi fuga eaduupcheewi, ghamneawa gaydeapkeanneegwa Giijastida miy ghayi earukuneegwean, ghayi oang'ng'waanyi was dea oamiinaadawi,
amaduu geelealneegwa, aba iyoang'ng'waanyi muuchchi ak geaghus gaba masaweegeagwa mwadaagha.
Aba gideaba geagonnyeegwa giijasta majeek bea huumwa ghayi sigoonan, bea gideaba Gristo ghami aba riing'eagaasa gawuurji ginnyaashta ng'ooruutka,
ea gideaba geebuy, ea gideaba geettuudu eaweetteaba samwagu, aba ginnyaashta ng'ooruutka,
ea gideaba nibussiinnyi sea Geefa, ea biissa ginealangiga attamaniyyeenyean.
Iimuchchu gabussiinnyi sea fuga naawa bughalaji muut aba damwanagi, nea aba jeedeaba fiisu gwanda gea saang'a duugwanda eara ghamneawa, nea mwaatkwa gwanda gea nimeewa.
Iimuchchu gabussiinnyi sea Yakkobo, ea gichcha giijasoodiga sean.
Amaduu aba huydeandeaba sean, geabussinnyeewi aniini, ak geawuurjeewi siida siji nea mii ghwahitta damandaannyi.
Aba gideaba aniini geawoschi mwanang'eawa giijasoodiga, biissa ea mammiissean gideaba gajeeguureewean giijasoochcheanda, aba gideaba ghayi naaghabwaschi ganiiseeda Aseetta.

Iiduu aba dagheerjeandumeeda Aseetta anaahuuyi gideawuurjeewi bea ghamneawa, nea dagheerjeameadaannyi aba heedeanyu ea maba mwadaagha. Aba meatkweeda niirja ghaaraanyi muuchchi aba sinooda gadiyeeda ea dalaabwa hoowa siida wassean aba saawa, nea mii aniini gil, nii gwasin dagheerjeandumeeda Aseetta mida heedeanyu.
Asi ii aniini gil, ghanea fukka, nii gissurukkwiidi gil, ak hean ghoamwaschi.
Asi ghamneawa iinukkwa geerukkwiida gideaba Gristo niduunna miyeeda, anda ak gwayeena fuga mwaatkwa manda duunnooda fuga nimeewa.
Ama manda duunnooda fuga nimeewa, adabeeda Gristo ea mii gwaduudu;
ama Gristo ii mii gwaduudu, abeeda rukkwiideaydeanya bea giijasta gaba mwadaagha ak masaweegeagwa gaba mwadaagha.
Iissa earaseasa geanung' eahuuwa gili sinappiisi Aseetta ng'uyyeega, aba gideaba gemuuwwu gideaba niiduudu Gristo, was dea mii gwaduudu ii huumwa gil gideaba ghami ak ea mii gwaduudu.
Aba gideaba ii meettuttuuna fuga nimeewa, abeeda eara Gristo ea mii gwaduudu.
Ama Gristo iimii gwaduudu, masaweegeagwa gaba mwadaagha, adabeeda ea gudandana jeeda riing'eegeagwa.
Gwasnu abeeda eara fukka sean ghayi meewa aba jeeda Gristohiin ea nirooda.
Aba gideaba aba jeedeaba eaweesu bea ghamneawean isindeawi rarooda aba heeda Gristo, gidabal geabwaydaneasa ea ealaabwana hoowa buuneessean.
Ak aba huumwa Gristo ea nuduunna miyeeda, was haghweega madeeda aba jeeda fuga nimeewa.
Aba gideaba miyeeda ghayi gweadu siida, gwasnu eara duunnooda miyeeda gweadu siida.
Gawuurji ghayi aba Adam gameewa buuneessean, gwasnu earaba heeda Gristo gaygwaduuttu sean.
Ak gaygaba siisi siittuudu aba badiida Aseetta: Nea Gristo ea haghweega madeeda gil, nea damanda jea ghwahinna gayghwaan heeda fuga was gea Gristo.
iing'atta hiji gayghwahidu mudeanooda, damanda jea ghoadawa Aseetta was Bwaabwa gheambalmeeda iing'atta nyarjeawuda sugoochcheandumeeda ea fuga ambaliischi sean ea uurda.
Ak ghanyi goombaliischi ea eaghus ghwayiin weajoodigaaschi sean jeeda baneaguuka geeshangaaschi.
Weajoochcheanda huydean jea eejakta miyeeda gil.
“Aba gideaba Aseetta niyiin haleanjeen jeeda baneaguukka geeshangaaschi.” Haleanjeessean siyiin hing'eadaydaannyi, ak ea daach gideaba numwas siida iin haleanjeessean jeeda baneaguukkaaschi.
Asi iisiyiin haleanjeessea jeeda baneaghuukka geeshangaaschi, abeeda Balleanda gayghwayiin geaw jeeda baneaguukka Aseetta, ak abeeda Aseetta ghoaw haleanjeessean aba hichpa giliwas siida.
Asi ghamneawa gwayeenaan buuneeda isippattiisa aba hoorgeeda fuga nimeewa? Iimuchchu nea meettuunna fuga nimeewa earahay, abeeda buuneeda geppeattanniisa naaha aba hoorgeeda nyaawa?
Abeeda ghwasaan inyas geendi jeeda gidiinyeanda damannyoojiga seani?
Fuga eaduupcheewi, aniini geargu ng'asheesu nea ghaaghwarji geaw appadahuukkeagwa agoogeeda mida jeeda Gristo Yeesu was Ng'uttamiideanyean, iissa genuusan galeagasean!
Gaydanya naaha abeeda iyeabalooldi siida, aniini geang'uchcheewi diyeanga aba Efeesohiin? Aba imaduuttuuna fuga nimeewa, “Asi eyeagiischeena nea geeleeshi, aba gideaba numuji gajeemeewwa.”
Adeereenganneegwa, “Baloolda muy iissa gwanuus searoojiga miyaas.”
Anung' ghwadoabiiw fughareengeagwa, ak ea adagudoosinnyi riing'eeda. Aba gideaba buuneeda mwaatkwa mandeawana fughareeda Aseetta. Geergu ng'asheesu ak abeeda ghoabwaaspwaaschi.
Iiduu gwadeeppa ghoanyaashta sih, “Fuga nimeewa gettuuttaydaan? Ak gayghapka nea gweadu sasanuukka uurjiin?”
Ea siittasha, haleanjeeda ihisti maygwahissa heeda ea eaghus ghanyi ghami.
Nea gidihisti ea mii bookcheanda niheedu, iissa gheang'nyeanda, deeppa gaba nngano ghana gaba booga suurja.
Nea Aseetta ghoadaw saseeda loat nea gilinyoo ea mbeyooda gil iissa ghwanyas saseadaannyi.
Aba gideaba sasanuukka sean mawuurji, amaduu sasanuukka buuneeda gawuurji, nuut gaba diyeanga, nuut gaba dariidakka, nuut gaba ghweayeega.
Ak gwanda sasanuukka humng'eeda ea sasanuukka ng'eanyiida; nea gigheambiitta sasanuukka humng'eeda ea agi, nea gigheambiitta sasanuukka ng'eanyiida ea nuut gil.
Asi gwanda gigheambiidagi bea Aseetta, ak gigheambiit nuut gaba sheeda, nea gigheambiit nuut gaba miinga; aba gideaba ming'weanda gwaheelli sea ming'weanda aba gigheambiitta.
Gwasnu eara duunnooda fuga nimeewa. Gidasihista iissa ghami, nea gisittuudu ea mayghami.
Geehista nea ghasghasaat, ak geettuunna nea gwandeawa gigheambiitta. Geehista ng'arng'aranda, ak gettuudu nea gwandeawa uurda,
Geehista saseeda geallaan, ak gettuudu saseeda gurorooda. Iimida saseeda geallaan, gwanda eara dea gurorooda.
Gawuurji gissung'waarda bea gideaba, “Siida madeeda was Adam ghoaw siida mideawa eaweega,” nea Adamooda huydean ea Gurorooda adawi buuneeda eaweega gil.
Nea dea asheeda giibinda ea mii saseeda guroorooda gil, geaghus saseetta bea geallaaniin amang'atta ghabwat saseeda gurorooda.
Siida madeeda ghayi gwaleabu ng'eanyiida, ak geesna birjeanda; siideaba iyyeenya gwaleabu humnng'eeda.
Gawuurji siitta bea birjeandean, ea giduurji fukka sisna birjeandean gil; gawuurji siitta bea humng'eedean, ea giduurji fukka bea humng'eedean gil.
Ak gawuurji sea gissuwuurjeatti sea siida ghayi sisna sigeedean, gwasnu geewuurjeewi siitta ghayi leabu humng'eedean.
Gearukuneegwa ng'asheesu, fuga eaduupcheewi: saseeda ea foojeanda maygwahearan sugoochcheandumeeda Aseetta, ghana dea jea ghami mayghoammu gwahearan dea mayghami.
Asi ng'ulla gearukuneegwa agooga makcheameeda. Aseasa majeemeewwa sean, ak gajeayameesa eesasean,

aba gheadi nuwaas, aba dukuteayda gheanyanga ea jeaditta, damanda jea ghwanyaasha durumbeatteeda huydean. Aba gideaba gayghwanya durumbeatti, ak gaygwaduuttu fuga nimeewa, ak ea maygudu ghwadaa miyeeda, ak aseasa gajeayameesa.
Aba gideaba saseani meewean gayghanyi gookkwa saseeda mayghami, nea saseeda jea ghami abeeda gookkwa saseeda mayghami.
Abeeda nii iissa ghamiin eaweetta jea gookkwealla saseeda mayghamiin, nea diitta meewean gookkwa dea mayghami, abeeda aba damani gaygwasa ng'asheanda ghayi sung'waar:
“Miyeeda sijoar, ak ea nisa jooriischchooda.”
“Ea miyeeda, jooriischoadaang'u gwanda yeenu?
Ea miyeeda, ng'weanindaang'u gwandayeenu?”
Ng'weaninda miyeeda riing'eeda, nea uurda riing'eeda ea deaweeda gil.
Iiduu gagasa ebadiischeesa Aseetta, dea goona jooriischchooda aba Ng'uttamiideanya was Yeesu Gristo.

Asi fuga eaduupcheewi abwariinnyi, andeawana alooheeda, ak ea adoabealbealli, ak goosinnyi galeagasean gadiyeeda Ng'uttamiida, ak ghoanalli gideaba gadiyeedeang'wa mii mwadaagha gil aba heeda Ng'uttamiida.
Aba iitta gujaweeda jea ghaweat fuga mideawa masaweega ghaydidi, aba gidaghayi earukusiindi ganiisajeega Galattiya, earagooga asindunu.
Eaweetta madeeda aba eawooji ispwa aba jeedeang'wa daba siisi adiing'da gil deenna gidamideawa, ak ea mowweamsheeni iyahiidu.
Damanda jea dahinna, gaydeajeakta fuga jea ageanni ghwaat barawajeanda ea haleanjeeda oattaydi ak ghwaat gujaweedeang'wa ea ghoahiitta Yerusalmeemu.
Nea abeeda idoabiiw gideaba gaydeadeayi aniini, abeeda gaydeadeayi sea saawa.
Asi gaydabareasseegwa agooga iing'atta beatta ng'eanyiida Makkedooniya, aba gideaba geagasayi dasku jeeda ng'eanyiida Makkedooniya,
ak gwadeeppa deabiida heedeang'wa ghana deabiida damanda goorogeeda, ak abeeda ghoammuuschi aweadaan dalamwajaada aba bareannyeekkeasu, aba heeda eagasayi dawa.
Aba gideaba meagassi dagoonneegwa ghamneawa nea ghaang'atti; aba gideaba ghararji deabiida ng'eang'deang'wa gilinuwaas, iimwas Ng'uttamiida.
Ak gayghanyi deabiida ng'eanyiida Efeeso ea ghwahitta damanda ghweelmeeda Bendegoosti,
aba gideaba nijaada gidaghuut muuchchi aba gadiyeedeanyu aba hiji, earappeadi saang'a weajoodiga.
Eaweeda hinna Dimotteo, goong'ulayi goobiida heedeang'wa nea mwabeada, aba gideaba gwasin gadiyeeda Ng'uttamiida gawuurji gideasindi aniini.
Asi adagafool sih niny. Anung' ghwalamwajaada aba bareannyeekkaaschi nea ghabeawa hoyyoo, ak abeeda gabiigu heedeanyu; aba gideaba ghamuughu niny sea fuga eaduupcheewi.
Iiduu aba iitta Appoloyda was oorjeediyya, geamuschi muuchchi gabareasseegwa sea fuga eaduupcheewi, nea niny iinyas gheatta gayghwan.
Oang'ng'wearni, nea ghoamiinaadi muuchchi aba jeeda masaweegeagwa, adarusiitta nea ghoanyaschi uurda.
Ng'asheegeagwa sean iyoosinnyi asna aba bariinyeega.
Asi ghamneawa, fuga eaduupcheewi, agooga ghoanalli gideaba gheah Stefaano fuga madeeda gil asheeda gwayamu geat aba ng'eanyiida Akkayahi, ak ea niidayda geat aba gadiyeesiinda fuga ghaydidi;
geamuscheegwa asissiina mureeda fuga sunu ea heeda siida wassean sin gadiyeeda ea fuga deawiit.
Ak geahoosannyi aba gideaba nihidu geaba Stefaano ea Fotunatto ea Akaiko, aba gideaba fiisu nidukuta seawadeeda ashoay iimoondani agooga;
aba gideaba ninung' ghahawda guroroodeanyu ea guroruunatkeagwa. Asi anala muuchchi fuga sunu.
Ghoaghadeagwa ganiisajeega mida Asiya. Akkila sea Briska, sea ganiiseeda mida jeeda gheannyaawa.
Ghoaghadeagwa fuga siduupcheewi sean. Oakghada geat aba samooda ghaydit.
Aniini Baulo gil, ak geang'oorneegwa giighadi aba geattindeanyu aniini.
Siida wassean mwabwariinya Ng'uttamiida, gagasa eamwaashta. Ng'uttamiideanya ghwaan!
Dagheerjeandumeeda Ng'uttamiida was Yeesu gagasa andeawana.
Gagasa andeawana bariinyeegeasu oagasean aba jeeda Gristo Yeesu. Amin.
Baulo, was giijasoochcheanda Gristo Yeesu aba gidabwariiyda Aseetta, ea Dimotteoyda was orjeediyya.
Heeda ganiiseeda Aseetta mida Goriinto, sea fuga ghaydidi sean mida jeeda ng'eanyiida sean bea Akkaaya:
Gagasa anyasa dagheerjeandumeeda ea weayda leabu heeda Aseetta was Ghweandeanya ea heeda Ng'uttamiida was Yeesu Gristo.
Gagasa eakghambiida Aseetta, Bwaabwa Ng'uttamiideanya was Yeesu Gristo, Bwaabwa mideawa baydeayda, Aseetta geanniida salgheang'da sean,
geanniida salgheang'deanya sean ea sawanadeeda, ak abeeda geammuuschi earaseasa egeandeawana salgheang'da fukka mida jeeda sawanaduutka seaniin, aba salgheang'da geandeawaneasa Aseettean.
Gawuurji gissippareannyeatta muuchchi sawanaduutka Gristo, gwasnu aba naweeda Gristo geeppareannyi muuchchi eara geandeayda salgheang'da.

Iiduw aseasa iisisawaneasa, gweagu geandeayda ogeandeawaneasa salgheang'da, ea lealeanooda; ama sigeandeawaneasa salgheang'da, gweagu geandeayda ogeandi salgheang'da, ak ghoanalli aba damanda oamilikghtaawi nea ghoarjeang'di aba sawanaduutkiga sisawaneasa aseasaan.
Nea gitta sirarji aba heedeang'wean ea majeettumduum; aba gideaba geanalli gitta oppareannyeatti sawanaduutkaasaan, abeeda gajooppareannyeana geandeayda salgheang'deanya.

Aba gideaba aseasa meegassi adasheahiitta, fuga eaduupcheewi, appadayda sawanadeetta sinyaschi aba ng'eanyiida Asiyahiin; aba gideaba aseasa geewoschi hidaat, gearaanyi eamilikghta ak ghang'aaleasa ea ealagaana earaba eaweaga.
Ghwasaan, geaghanyi gili ninyas girgweaksiinda miyeeda; gabaysiina gideaba gayghwanung' eahuuwa fuga huumwa ak ea mii aseasa gil earaba heeda Aseetta aduuttu fuga nimeewa;
niny ghoaghuuhaneasa jeeda washta haw bea miyeeda, ak gaygabiikta ghoaghuheasa; nea aseasa ea sirarji niny gideaba gaygabiikta ghoaghuheasa.
Earagooga aweadeasa aba mooshta Aseetta, ak abeeda gabadiischeesa fuga saang'a appadahuukkaasa aba badiischeesiindida ghayi sugoaneasa aseasa aba sheayda mooshcheenga saang'a aba heeda Aseettean.

Aba gideaba aseasa geaghwari geat ng'asheanji, nea gitta muuwwu fughareengaasaan gil ak ghoaw gissibeadi aba jeeda ng'eanyiida, ak gabiissa ghwaraanya muuchchi aba heedeang'wa, aba ghaydidanda ea baditta Aseetta bea huumwa, nea mii aba weaghumeeda ng'eanyiida gil geaghus aba dagheerjeandumeeda Aseetta.
Ak ea manda ng'asheanda sung'oorneegwa geaghus giikka oammuuschi oassoamwana ak ghoanalliin; ak ghaararji aniini gideaba gajanala ng'asheesu muuchchi,
gawuurji gitta oanaldi gilimwanang' ng'asheega mwaatkwaan, ak abeeda googwareessi appadahuukkaasa gawuurji gichche eebeaheattaneegwa aseasa aba eaweetta Ng'uttamiida was Yeesu.
Iiduw nea ghaanalli ng'asheanji, hean geagasayi doan heedeang'wa ammwadi, ak abeeda ghoanyaschi hooseaneega deabiyyeenya;

ak geegasayi dabareesseegwa nea ghaang'atti dawa Makkedoniya, amang'atta geayammu geaw doan Makkedoniya, ak geabiigu ng'eang'deang'wa ak abeeda ghaanyaschi weetta aba heedeang'wa aba bareannyeekkeasu jea dawa ng'eanyiida Yahuudi.
Neada aniini ghayamyamnyi geawi iyeagasayi dasin ng'asheanji? Neada geasinnyi badiideanyu aniini ak geawuurjeewi siida ng'eanyiida, ak ghwahit iyeayennyi Eah ghana Manda aba damanagi?
Nea aba huumwa aba gidadoabiiwaatta Aseetta, ng'asheandeanya aba heedeang'wa ea mii Eah gil ea Manda.
Aba gideaba Balleanda Aseetta, was Gristo Yeesuun ghayi surukku iittaannyi aba jeedeang'wa, Silwano ea Dimotteo ea aniini, mii Eahi ghana Manda; nea aba jeedeaba niny galeagasean iissa ea Eah gil.
Aba gideaba helleesiinda sean bea Aseetta iissa ghwanyas Eah aba jeadaannyi. Nii gissurukkuuni Amin gil appadaydaannyi, aba gigheambiitta Aseetta.
Ak ea Aseetta gil dea amajeegideasa aba naweeda Gristo, ak ghoaw dea rukuneasa;
nea niny ea siida ghayi arooreasa gil, ak gagoaneasa Guroroodaannyi ak ghwayiin jeesinga guroruunatkaasa ak gawuurji raduutka.
Iiduw geeguursi Aseetta ghoaw mushoochcheandeanyu, ak abeeda iyaawunnyi ea moanyasi sawanadeeda ak ghoaw gissitteelsiinanean hinnooda Goriinto.
Nea mii gideaba geegasayi eeppala masaweegeagwa; geegadiyi sea agooga aba hooseaneegeagwa, aba gideaba ghoomiinaadi muuchchi aba masaweegeagwa.
Asi geatteemsheesi geaw aba fughareedeanyu ak ea meanneegwa wunoodeanyu jea dabareasseegwa sawanadeeda.
Aba gideaba iyaang'udaneegwa giseaneega, abeeda gajeang'eaha siida jea gohoosanan aniini ii mii siitta anung' gagiisaniini?

Ak ghang'waarji gawuurji gideasindi, ak abeeda iyaawunnyi ea measawanani aba heedeaba fukka ghwanyawa jea ghwanung' dahoosaniin. Aba gideaba ghadaayi aba huumwa aba jeedeang'wa oagasean, gideaba hooseaneegeasu gajea hooseaneegeagwa gil oagasean.

Aba gideaba geang'oorneegwa ng'asheesu nea geandeawi sawanadeeda haw ea hang'weaniidooda aba jeeda gurorooda nea geabeayi dabeakka saang'a, nea mii gideaba geagasayi asawanana gili, geagasayi anala bariinyeegeasu eandeawi appadahuukkeagwa gitteenna aba hawunda.
Ama deeppa ea ninung' sih ghwanyas nuut sawanadeeda, ea meagealna heedeanyu aniini, nea aba haleanjeeda mwaatkwa sitteenniida ea adinung' ghang'waaniit aba heedeang'wa oagasean.
Siida sunu ghoahiit ghoorjooda ghayi adaw fuga saang'a;
hean ghang'wana giyami geaw ak gisamsi nea gigeandeawi salgheang'da, ghana gajiiduw ghwajoar giseaneega ng'waan muuchchi.
Ak geamuscheegwa gideaba ohhimsiina nea goommajeekchi bariinyeegeagwa aba headaannyi.
Nii gideang'oorsi barawajeanji gil, gideaba geagasayi dasin danal ea goosissi mureeda ng'asheega sean.
Siida wassean oosamsi, earaniini gaydasamsa. Gidaneasamsi, ama deeppa eaneasamsi gidawassean, nii gweagu badahuukkeagwa aba madeeda Gristo,
adaghwanyas Shattaani gheatta jea ghwanyagaadawa appadahuukkaasa; aba gideaba meewosi dasheahi aba gitta gasean.
Hean nea ghahitti Droa darukkwiida giijasta miy bea Gristo, ghwajaada gidaghuut aba heedeanyu aba heeda Ng'uttamiida;
ak ghanyea moapta ng'eanyi fughareedeanyu aba gideaba mwadaahi orjeediyya was Ditto aba hoowa. Ng'atta geegasayi fuufta appadahuukka nyaawa ak geawi ng'eanyiida Makkedoniya.
Asi badiischeesiinda gammiisa Aseetta, nea ghoadoabiiweasa aba naweeda Gristo aba hooseaneega, ak aba aseasa ghwadarda shearooda ng'andit bea fughareadaannyi aba hiji wassean.
Aba gideaba aseasa geewoschi shearooda ng'andit bea Gristo aba madeeda Aseetta, aba heeda fuga lalaan ea heeda fuga nirooda,
aba hichpa sih shearooda ng'andit gil ng'eada miyeeda ea ghwahitta miyeeda, aba hichpa sih nuut ea shearooda ng'andit ng'eada eaweega ea ghwahitta eaweega. Siida nilang'uuda ng'asheesu ng'eaha?

Aba gideaba aseasa meewuurjeewani buuneeda suurja saang'a, fuga sheahhiida ng'asheanda Aseetta; gagasa ewuurjeewana fuga mideawa doobiiwnatta, was fuga adaw Aseetta gadiyeeda, aba madeeda Aseetta iissa geebaloolli appadayda Gristo.
Asi sing'ng'eachchi giding'noodeaba geat gichcha? Ghana sigasayi gidagassiida buuneeda suurja barawajeega gwarsiinda jea ghapka heedeang'wa, ghana gwaleabu heedeang'wa?
Agooga gowoschi barawajeandeanya bea gwarsiinda, sing'oorsa jeesinga guroruunatkeagwa, biissa analaat nea ghoassoamwa buuneessean;

ak ghoahhiimu gideaba gowoschi barawajeanda leabu heeda Gristo sugoaneasa aseasa, meang'waarana galaamu geang'waara Gurorooda Aseetta majeek, ak ea mii badahuukka lagheanga gil geeng'oorsa badahuukka guroruunatka hang'oonyi bea buuneeda.
Nea geendeawi masaweega aba madeeda Aseetta aba naweeda Gristo.
Mii gideaba geahhiichchi geat aseasa gil aba gipkeatta ng'asheanda wassean gideaba gwaleabu heedeanya aseasa; hidoodeanyu gwaleabu heeda Aseetta,

aba gideaba niny dea nung' eammuusa eahuwa fuga gadiyeesa neajeedeesh, meng'oorsiina jeeda barawajeanda geang'waar aba jeeda Gurorooda; aba gideaba gissung'waar was deaweeda gaygwanuus, nea Gurorooda gagoona eaweega.

Asi ghamneawa deaweedeeda miyeeda, iissa ghafnya geaw jeeda barawajeega lagheanga, ghwaan nea gweadu gigheambiitta ak abeeda ea mang'ulla fuga Israeeli gheamamda Muusa aba gidameang'meang'da, amaduw ghwasuunya aba giduurji,
abeeda deaweedeeda Gurorooda ea majeefurda ak ea majeadeapta aba giigheambiitta hawi?
Nea iimida gigheambiitta jeeda deaweeda jea gweadu girgweaksiinda, abeeda deaweedeeda doobiiwnatta gagasa ghang'atta aba gigheambiitta.
Aba huumwa, appadaydeaba ng'asheesu, gidaghayi mideawa gigheambiitta ea mudugwandeawa gigheambiitta earahay, nea gweagu gigheambiitida adaraamiin.
Nea gitta suunyaan iyeadu gigheambiitta, abeeda gidajea ghwashng'u gaygwandeawa gigheambiitta haw muuchchi.
Ak iinukwa gendeawi rarooda, ng'asheanda uurjunu, ada abeeda gewoschi muranga,
nea mewuurjeewani Muusayda ghayi dukuta gheamamdaannyi ak abeeda ea mwadaaha muuchchi fuga Israeeli mudeanoodeaba gigheambiittida suunyaan.

Iiduw fugheerga nyaawa geanung' gahang'oonyiidi; aba gideaba eara askweareani damanda sissoamwana neajeedeaba garayi, gili sikkwealliisa uhuudean gudugwanda heeda, geaghus egeanda iguuyi siida sea Gristo.
Eah eara askweareani isissoamwa deaweedeeda Muusa geedukuta fugheerga nyaawa;
nea siida iiyamsa geaw Ng'uttamiida hean geegeanda gitta awiimiin.
Asi ghamneawa Ng'uttamiida Gurorooda, nea heeda mida Gurorooda Ng'uttamiida, gwanda giibaldeaba geaw.

Hean aseasa eesasean, aba gheamamda meedukuta, ng'ulla gigheambiitta Ng'uttamiida, siyam gawuurji sea niny ghang'eada gigheambiitta ea gagul gigheambiitta; aba gideaba ng'asheanji gwaleabu heeda Ng'uttamiida was Gurorooda.
Asi aba sareani, iinukwa gendeawi gadiyeeni aba baydeayda Aseetta, ghanyea meabealbeali.

Siheawi ng'asheega baspaseega, ea naweadinga ng'uyyeega; ak geaheawi gideaba gajeesna milmilanda ghana eyyamujeena sea ng'asheanda Aseetta, geaghus aba ng'asheega huumeanda surgu aba eeshpwara ak geaghwarji geat aba giliwas fughareemba sih aba madeeda Aseetta.
Ama deeppa giijasteanya miy afunyaat, ada abeeda geaghus afunyaat aba heedeaba fukka rodeadiin.
Aba sareani aseetteaba ng'eanyiini ninung' gang'oowiidi fughareenga fuga mandeawana masaweega, ak ghaweada deakta weeshinda giijasta miy mideawa gigheambiitta Gristo, nea niny gawuurji sea Aseetta.
Aba gideaba meerukkuuni ng'asheega badahuukkaasa aseasa geerukku gideaba Gristo Yeesu Ng'uttamiida, ea gideaba aseasa geewoschi soomjoogeagwa appadayda Yeesu.
Ak ea Aseetta gil dea ayi, “Nung'waada weeshinda ghoabwaay jeeda misaneeda,” nea niny ghoabwaay jeesinga guroruunatkaasa ak ghoadaw weeshinda fughareeda gigheambiitta Aseetta aba gheamamda Gristo.
Asi aseasa geendeawi gheaseeda aba jeeda haleanjeeda sigeeda, ak ghoahiimu gideaba uuri hawiin gwaleabu heeda Aseetta nea maleapna heedeanya aseasa.
Geesawaneasa aba naweadinga sean, ak ea mwasuunya uurjeangaasa; iissa geehirbabannyi, ak ghanyea meanyeahani;
geesawaneasa, ak ea meenung'useasa heeda; iissa geefutteeweasa ng'eanyi, ak ea meeshshealani;
galeagasean geesareenni badahuukkaasa miyeeda Yeesu, ak abeeda geattahaach eaweega Yeesu aba sasanuukkaasa.
Aba gideaba aseaseeni sindiin iissa geattaydaneasa enuusseasa galeagasean appadayda Yeesu, ak abeeda geattahaach eaweega Yeesu aba sasanuukkaasa jea gameewa.
Abeeda gagadiyi miyeeda aba sasanuukkaasa, nea gagadiyi eaweega aba sasanuukkeagwa.
Amaduw iinukkwa geendeawi gurorootta bea masaweegean geang'waar gideaba, “Ghaamwaschi, ak ghoaw gideabalooli,” earaseasa sumwaschi, ak ghoaw gissibalooli,
nea abeeda geanalli gideaba siida ghayi aduudu Ng'uttamiida was Yeesu, gaygoduunneasa earaseasa sea Yeesu ak ghwayiineasa mwadeadaannyi sea agooga.
Aba gideaba ng'asheega sean gaba badahuukkeagwa nea gidahadaatta dagheerjeandumeeda muuchchi, ghoahaada badiischeesiinda aba heeda fuga saang'a, aba gigheambiitta Aseetta.
Asi majeabealbeala. Earappeadi iissa gawosiidi sasanuunatkkaasa, iiduw guroruunatkaasa iissa gewweshiit giliwas eaweechcha.
Aba gideaba sawanadeedeanya sinyaschi gaba gheadi nuwaas ak gwasinneasa gigheambiitta haw manda gichchea eegala,
aba gideaba meeng'ulli haleanjeeda sidaah geaghus haleanjeetta meadaahaan. Aba gideaba haleanjeeda sidaah ghang'atta, nea haleanjeetta meadaahaan gwandeawa eaweega mammuudeana.

Aba gideaba geanalli beadi udahabeascheanji itteanya bea hiji bea muunda ng'eanyiidean eaweeda sinyarjeawa, gendeawi gheeda leabu heeda Aseetta, gheeda meesnana geattinga, ghaydit manda mudeanooda mida humng'eeda.
Aba huumwa aba hiji iissa geamnyaannyi nea geegasayi muuchchi eshshubeesa gibindida bea humng'eedean,
nea abeeda isishshubeesa gajeadaheasa nea meewosi dawiiri.

Nea damani duu eendana jeedeaba gheawiin, iissa gessiimi aba sawanadeeda; nea meakna gideaba majeekkwealeasa gil, gweagu gideaba gajeekkwealeasa muuchchi, ak abeeda gitta iissa ghamiin abeeda gayghwanukghta eaweega.
Nea siida ghayi sineasa appadaydeaba ng'asheanji ea Aseetta gil, amaduw gagoaneasa Gurorooda uurji raduutka.
Asi gewoschi daruuschi galeagasean; ak geanalli gideaba damani duwea majeekcheewi sasanuukkaasaan geewoschi sheageewa Ng'uttamiida,
aba gideaba geabeawi masaweega, nea meabeani deakta.
Asi edaruusiitta, ak abeeda ghang'wana geesheagiidi saseeda ak geppiidi ghoah sea Ng'uttamiida.
Ada endana ghoah ghana ea meendani, geesinnyi gissippurbuurji ak abeeda geehhoosannyi niny.
Aba gideaba gajeahitta eesasean madeeda hoorgeeda girgweageeda Gristo, ak abeeda gaba siisi nyas gidamiy ghanea gidamuyi, gawuurji gitta ghayi sin aba saseedean.
Asi, geanalli gissiwwaldi gheang'da Ng'uttamiida, iissa geaghurghurji buuneeda; nea gissuwuurjeewi ghwanal Aseetta, ak ghaararji gideaba analaat earaba jeesinga fughareengeagwa.

Ak aseasa ea meegwarseegwa geat gichcha geegasayi gideaba gajaghwara geat agooga appadahuukkaasa, ak abeeda ghoammuuschi ashaaha ng'asheegeaba fukka gwara geat aba madeeda buneedean nea mii aba jeeda guroroodaannyi.
Aba gideaba iinung'uleasa geeska, gweagu badayda Aseetta; ama sindeawi fughareangaasa, gweagu badahuukkeagwa.
Aba gideaba bariinyeega Gristo iissa gwasinneasa uurda aba gideaba aseasa sumwaschi gideaba siyagi ghayi ghami appadahuukka buuneessean; asi abeeda ea nimeewa sean.
Ak ghami appadahuukka buuneessean, ak abeeda fukka majeekcheewiin ea meabiideewana badahuukka nyaawa abeeda goobiideewa dea meah appadahuukka nyaawa amaduw geettuudu.
Ghang'eada ghamneawa, asi aseasa meesissiini siida wassean mureeda aba ng'asheega saseeda; earappeadi aseasa sinalli Gristo gideaba siida gil, amaduw ghamneawa ea mudea gissinaldi.
Nea siida iimida jeeda Gristo, ea niiw siideesh; haleanjeedeaba garayi ning'atta, ng'ulla, nihidu haleanjeedeashish.
Amaduw haleanjeessean gwaleabu heeda Aseetta, ghayi aduupchaneasa aseasa sea niny aba naweeda Gristo, amang'atta gagoaneasa gadiyeeda giduuupcheeda;
nea aba jeeda Gristo gooduupchi geaw Aseetta ng'eanyiida, ak ea mang'ulla gidiinyeanyeekka mida badahuukka nyaawaan ak gagoaneasa giijasta giiduupcheeda.
Asi geewoschi fuga sichcheakta bea Gristo, hean gamusiischooweasa Aseetta. Geemearmearanneegwa appadayda Gristo, ottuupcheewana geat Aseetta.
Appadahuukkaasa geanung' ghoaw niny ring'eeda nea niny ea mwanala ring'eeda, ak abeeda aba niny geahuuyi doobiiwnatta Aseetta.
Nea aseasa iisisinnyi gadiyeeda sea niny, hean geemuscheegwa gideaba adiiduw ghoanyaschi dagheerjeandumeeda Aseetta mwadaagha.
Aba gideaba gwayi,
“Damanda sumwas gealeyseey iit,
ak ghaweachcheey eaweetta lealeanooda.”
Ng'ulla, ghamneawa damanda sumwasi; ng'ulla ghamneawa eaweeda lealeanooda
Meagassi eayiina naweemba siida wassean gichchea gwaruusa, ak abeeda eameedeaksiina gadiyeedeanya munyinda,
nea iisuwuurjeewi soomjooga Aseetta abeeda geaghwarji geat aba naweadinga sean, aba naweetta haw bea milkghteaydean, aba sawanaduutka, hang'ooynachcheekka habitkwajeega,
bayiiga, ghealooniga, gidumduumda, gadiyoojiga, ging'weernooda, jalooda;
ea aba alooheeda, ea fughareeda, ea gihang'ooyda, ea innyeanda jeeda, ea aba Gurorooda Ghaydit, ea bariinyeega huumwa,
aba ng'asheanda huumwa, ea aba uurda Aseetta; ea baditta doabiiw bea ng'uchcheeda mida geattinda dugwa ea geattinda ghaadaam;
aba mureeda ea nyootta mureeda, iisismaneasa ng'asheega munyas ghana eesmaneasa ng'asheega miyaas. Ak geenung' eahuuwa fuga rengani buuneeda nea geerukku huumeanda;
ak geewuurjeewi fuga meanala, nea geanaleasa muuchchi; ak geewuurjeewi fuga meewa nea gung'ulayi geewoschi majeekcheewi; ak geewuurjeewi fuga siyaaga ghoorjooda, ak ea menuussa;
geewuurjeewi fuga giisan, nea ghana gehoosannyi galeagasean; nea geewuurjeewi fuga barbari, nea ghana geepparuurji fuga saang'a; geewuurjeewi fuga mandeawana gil, nea ghana geendeawi haleanjeessean.
Ghuusigaasa sijaachchi aba heedeang'wa, ea fuga Goriinto; nea guroruunatkaasa ea nibareahiidi.
Aseasa meakghumeagwa, agooga ghoaghuumeegwa haleanjeetta oabwariinnyiin.
Aba yamitteaba geaw geabalooldi gili eabaloolli diibiga, oapwargiida guroruunatkeagwa.

Adiiduw ghoang'ng'waanyi geat sea fuga mandeawana masaweega. Aba naweeda mwadoabiiwa, aba gideaba gwanda dupcheemba naaha mida dageascheeda doobiiwnatta ea heheweega? Nuut gichcha gwanda rorochcheemba naaha mida dageascheeda weeshinda ea misaneeda?
Gwanda giyang'deayyeemba naaha dageascheeda Gristo sea Gidamuy? Ghana siida mideawa masaweega neada gaygwandeayeesa naaha sea siida mandeawana masaweega?
Neada gwanda neajeemba naaha dageascheeda gheada sibatta Aseetta sea gidamawosa Aseetta? Aba gideaba aseasa geewoschi gheeda sibatta Aseetta majeek; ak gawuurji ginnyaashta Aseetta nea gwayi,
“Gaydeabiida jeannyaawa, nea gaydaneayeewa jeanyaawa,
ak gaydoaw aniini Aseetta nyaawa,
nea ghoaw saawa fugeasu.
Asi arinnana jeannyaawa,
ak gohhelleewi geat saawa gwargu Ng'uttamiida,
ak ea adoang'ng'waannyi gida mideawa ririnnyeanda;
ak abeeda gaydadeagwa ghoah.
Gaydoaw Bwaabwa aba heedeang'wa,
ak gajahuuwa agooga balloojigeasu ea haweegeasu,
gwargu Ng'uttamiida mideawa uurda.”
Iinukkwa gendeawi hellesiini fugeasu abwariinyi, abeeda ghang'wana geehhuunnyi geat aba ririnnyoojiga sean bea saseeda ea gurorooda nea geemmajeekchi ghaydidanda aba gheawalmeeda Aseetta.
Ajanneasa guroruunatkeagwa, aba gideaba miyeettiiysiina eara sih, ak ea miyeang'ala sih seawshooda, ak ea miyeanyagaada aba hichpa sih.
Aniini mearukuni ng'asheanji aba giirgweaksiindeang'wa, aba gideaba neabay dargu ammwadi gideaba agooga goondi jeeda guroruunatkaasa, iisimewuudayi ghana iisindeayi.
Ak geandeawi muraneandumeeda haw appadahuukkeagwa; ak gaydaghwar geaw muuchchi appadahuukkeagwa; ak ea naanyaschi hawdeayda. Earaba sawanaduutkaasa, aniini geahoosannyi muuchchi.
Nea eara damanda sihittaawi Makkedoniya, ghanyea mwanyasa sasanuukkaasa hawdeayda geanyaschi sawanaduutka aba gheatkweakka sean ak geeng'uchchi appwadaw, nea jih gwanda muuwda.
Nea Aseetta, geanniida salgheang'da fuga giisan, gageanda salgheang'deanya aba hinnooda Ditto,

ak ea meakghusa hinnoadaannyi ghabwada geandeayda salgheang'da gawuurji gidaghayi ogeandeaydi salgheang'daannyi, gawuurji girrukuneasa bea gidoogassiidi, ea gidogiisandi, ea gidogassiidi weetteanyu, ak abeeda geahoosannyi muuchchi.

Aba gideaba earappeadi nanyareascheagwa aba barawajeandeanyu, maydagiisan aba gili (earappeadi neagiisannyi aba giliiin,) aba gideaba ghadaayi gideaba barawajeandida niinyareaseagwa, earappeadi gheadi nuwaasi.

Aba giduurji, neahoosannyi, nea meakna gideaba gogiisannyi agooga, gweagu gideaba geanung' agiisan ea eanung' aduukkuunana; aba gideaba googiisandi fuga bada Aseetta, ak ea mwageagwa lugooda aba badahuukkaasa.
Aba gideaba giseaneega fuga bada Aseetta iissa gweadu dukkuunooda eadu lealeanooda ak ea manda gichchea ghwanung' giisana, nea giiseaneega muunda ng'eanyiida gaygweadu miyeeda.

Asi ang'ulla badiini bea fuga bada Aseettean gaygwanyakneegwa naaha agooga, ak ea gassoomba naaha bea furoodeaba geediin, nii ana nyaras gil, nii hirbabandeemba naaha, bariinyeespa naaha, giidaydeaydeaba geaw bea naaha, ghoorjoomba naaha! Aba gheatkweakka sean noahhiimu geat gideaba mondeawani ramaseamba gil aba ng'asheanji.

Asi earappeadi eang'oorneegwean, mwang'waari appadaydeaba siitta adiiyiin, ak ea maba badaydeaba siitta sittiysean, geebaysiina gideaba bariinyeegeagwa aba heedeanya gajeattajiit aba heedeang'wa aba madeeda Aseetta.
Asi gegeandeawaneasa salgheang'da. Nuut aba geandeayda sigeandeawaneasa salgheang'da geehoosannyi muuchchi aba hooseaneega Ditto, aba gideaba fughareadaannyi noanung'unyi oagasean gafuuf.

Aba gideaba iyaaghwarji geaw aba madeadaannyi aba ng'asheanda wassean appadahuukkeagwa, ea maydabwaspwas; gaygawuurji haleanjeesean surukuneegwa huumwa gil, ak eara ghwaroodeang'wa bea geat ammadeeda Ditto ea niiw huumwa.
Nea guroroadaannyi iissa gwaritta damannyooji sean appadahuukkeagwa, iyapkaat mureedeang'wa bea oagasean, ea muuwda ea boodanda damanda oang'ng'waanyi niny.
Geahoosannyi, aba gideaba geandeawi masaweega muuchchi aba badahuukkeagwa.
Fugeaduupcheewi, geegasayi anala dagheerjeandumeeda Aseetta ghayi sihhiimu aba jeesinga ganiisajeega Makkedoniya,
nea aba jeeda simsimda ng'waan ea sawanadeeda, hean aba hawunda hooseaneega nyaawa ea barbarannyeekka nyaawa raanya ea nibaruur muuchchi nea goobal geat aba meatkweeda nyaawa.
Ak ghoadayda aba gidammuusta, ak gaydamuuwwu, ea ghwanaawda, aba gidagassiida saawa,
gamuseasa muuchchi eattaw gheatta jea gobareannyi gadiyeani bea weetta fuga ghaydidiin,
nea nii ea mii gidasirardi gil, ammwadi ghanyi ghoadaw geat Ng'uttamiida ea biissa aseasa aba gidagassiida Aseetta.
Iiduw geamiinnyi gheang'da Ditto nea geegasayi gawuurji gidaghayi bean ghoang'eatta, gagasa ghoahiit aba jeedeang'wa gadiyeeni mideawa dagheerjeandumeedean.

Ghamneawa iyoang'aldi aba haleanjeessean aba masaweega, ea rukunooda, ea fughareeda, aba jeeda guroroossean, ea aba jeeda bariinyeegeagwa aba heedeanya, asikteawana gideaba ghoang'aldi aba gadiyeeni bea dagheerjeandumeedean.
Asi geargu ng'asheanji nea mii gideaba geagonnyi digheanda, geagasayi asikteawana aba dagheerjeandumeeda buuneeda suurja ak abeeda bariinyeegeagwa earada gaygaba huumwa.
Aba gideaba noanalli dagheerjeandumeeda Ng'uttamiideanya was Yeesu Gristo, earappeadi baruuriin, hean ghabwarbwariit appadahuukkeagwa, ak abeeda aba barbarandaannyi ghoahuuyi baruurji.
Nea appadaydeaba ng'asheanji gadagooneegwa badiida: ghwahit muuchchi ghamneawa aba heedeang'wa gihiitteaba gitta gweayda heetta ng'attaan ak ea meakghusa sinooda gibwadi gassooda,
asi aba gidowosti hidaat aba gidoogassiidi gagasa gweatteayyi sea gidoahhiitti aba jeeda haleanjeeda ondeawi.
Aba gideaba iinyoo gwanda hidooda, abeeda gajeamwas aba gitta mideawa siidean, nea mii aba gitta mandeawaneani.
Aba gideaba mearukuni ng'asheesu ak abeeda ghwanyas fuga mwaatkwa hooseaneega nea ghoanyaschi agooga sawanadeeda,

iiduw aba ng'asheega giiyang'deyyeeda aba haleanjeedeang'wa ghamneawa ondeawi saang'a gagasa ghaweat fukkasa, ak abeeda haleanjeeda saang'a mideawa ghaweadeagwa iyoogasayi, ak abeeda gaygwanda giyang'deayyeeda.
Gawuurji gissung'waarda gideaba, “Siida awaam ea ghwasaang'anyiit maburda gil, nea dea awaam geang'ay mwasunyeawana gil.”
Gagasa eebadiischeesa Aseetta iin jeeda Ditto gassoodida eandeawi aniini aba weetteang'wean.
Aba gideaba niny mwakghusa ging'ng'ooyda ng'asheandeanya, niny abeeda gagasa muuchchi hinnooda heedeang'wa aba uhuudaannyi.
Hean gechcheagu niny sea orjeediyya nigeawiit iitta aba rukkwiideayda Giijasta miy aba jeesinga ganiisajeega seaniin;

ak ameakghusa nii akghwahit, niny ghwaloat ganiisajeega ak geanung' etteayeewana damanda sibeawi eesnanaa gadiyeedeanya bea bariinyeega, aba gigheambiitta Ng'uttamiida ak ghoaw gwadeagooda gitta miy gasa jeesingaasaan.
Ak ea meagassi gideaba gaygwarukuna sih badahuukkaasa ng'asheega munyas appadayda gimmuusta sugu ak gang'ula gisilachchiida haleanjeeda,
nea geeshsheedi ghanyi eapkaada ng'asheega miyaas, nea mii ammadeeda Ng'uttamiida gil akghwahit, earaba madeeda buuneeda.

Hean geechcheagu sea saawa orjeediyya nigeawiit eesimsim ak geadaayi gideaba aahiidaat aba haleanjeesaang'a, ak ghamneawa ea hidaat muuchchi ea ghang'alda appadayda masaweegaaschi adareemshi aba heedeang'wa.

Asi aba iitta Ditto, niny bareannyeandeanyu ak ea siida easnuudayeewi gadiyeeda appadahuukkeagwa gil; nea gabiissa gagasa iitta fuga siduupcheewi, saawa fuga ajeagu ganiisajeega, ak ea gigheambiitta Gristo gil.
Asi oahhiimda aba madeeda ganiisajeega, bariinyeegeagwa ea gissughwardi geat appadahuukkeagwa aba heedeaba fiisu.
Asi ghamneawa ghwaraanya aba heedeanyu gideaba geang'oorneegwa iitta haleanjeeda sisappa geadi jea eattaw fuga ghaydidi,

aba gideaba ghaanalli gidowosti hidaat, ak ghaaghwari geaw appadahuukkeagwa aba heeda fuga Makkedoniya, nea gideaba fuga Akkaya ahidaat ghang'eada nndeara; iiduw gidoogasayi eanimajeek fuga saang'a mwaatkwa.
Iiduw geajeagu fuga eaduupcheewi ak abeeda amoawa ghwaroodeanya bwaageat appadahuukkeagwa gidamwadaagha aba ng'asheanji, ak abeeda gowoschi hidaat, gawuurji gidearukuteaydi jea awuurjeewana;
amaduw nea ghawunnyi nea geadeani fuga Makkedoniya, ak ghaahidu nea mowosi hidaat, gajeappwaspwaseasa, ak abeeda ea mwajeammuusa eerukuna gil appadahuukkeagwa, aba damani sindi jeeda masaweegean.

Hean ghadaayi gideaba ghwadoabiiw rekusiinda fuga eaduupcheewi ak ghwahidu heedeang'wa goshooynanean, ak gabean gwasin gitta sugu ghayi ohelleesiin, ak gagasa ahidaat ak ea mawuurji gissidiing'sa gawuurji gissittaydaawa masooda.
Asi gaydargu ng'asheanji: siida hista gea ng'ay gayghwalach gea ng'ay, nea siida histeawa innyeanda jeeda gayghwalaja innyeanda jeeda.
Daba siisi sinda gadiyeeda gidagassiida aba uhuudaannyi, adagwasin nea magassa ghana eediing'sa, aba gideaba Aseetta ghabwariiy siitta adayyiida haleanjeeda aba jeedeeshiini.
Nea Aseetta ghoammu ghoannyiideagwa ghawooda, ak abeeda gondeawi agooga heluutka haleanjeessean aba galeagasean abeeda ghoannyiideagwa muuchchi aba giliwas gadiya miy.
Gawuurji gissung'waarda bea gideaba,
“Nidaarda, ak ghoadaw fuga barbari;
doobiiwnattaannyi gayghwashng'u damanda manda mudeanooda.”
Nea siida adaw mmbeyooda siida jea gwahista ak ghoaw mukkattee ghoaw hamitta gaygagooneegwa ak gwalakkuuneegwa haleanjeeda ak ghwanung' ghoahaada booga aba doobiiwnatteang'wa,
Gajeenung' abaruura aba naweadinga sean abeeda gwannyeaniidi jeesingeagwa muuchchi, nea aba naweedeanya gayghoadaw Aseetta badiischooda;
aba gideaba gadiyeeni maygabeachchi gideaba gayghaweat fuga ghaydidi aba gidagasa, gayghwanung' gabadiischeesa buuneeda Aseetta muuchchi ea ghwanaawda.
Aba simsimdeaba gadiyeeni, gajoakghambiida Aseetta aba mureedeang'wa aba masooda Giijasta miy bea Gristo, ea appadayda innyeanda jeesingeagwa oattawji saawa ea buuneessean;
nea saawa ghamwaash Aseetta muuchchi appadahuukkeagwa, aba dagheerjeandumeeda naawda mida jeedeang'wa.
Ebadiischeesiina Aseetta aba gidagooneasa meammuusi rukunoodean!
Aniini Baulo, geamuscheegwa nea gabwageaw, aba garbabanda ea ng'eeninda Gristo, nea iissa geawoschi ng'eeni aba gheanyangeagwa, nea iyeawoschi sheageewaneegwa geawoschi daruus!
Asi geamuscheegwa gideaba isindeayi ea mwahiimni dargooda aba gitta amwaschiin ak geahiimsi fuga rar gideaba aseasa geayaachchi geeshta ng'asheega gasa ng'eanyiida.
Earappeadi sindi ng'eanyiidean aseasa meeng'uchcheewani fuga mida ng'eanyiida,
aba gideaba dabitteanya sing'uchcheatti maba saseeda suu gwandeawa uurda Aseetta ak gwanyarja uurda lugooda.
Ak geenyarji fughareenga sean gasa godiing'u geat appadayda fughareeda Aseetta, ak geaghaschi giliwas fughara ak abeeda gwasissa mureeda Gristo,
nea geewoschi hidaat eayaagana ghoorjooda fuga manda mureeda, damanda hida mureedeang'wa.
Ang'ulla haleanjeeda mida madeeda gheanyangeagwa. Siida iirar gideaba gaba Gristo ea dapkaattunu niny gideaba niny siida Gristo, adabeeda earaseasa gewoschi.
Earappeadi aghwarji geaw gilimwanang'iin aba gheambalmeeda sindeawi, ghayi goaneasa Ng'uttamiida ak abeeda gedeekneegwa nea mii gideaba gajeenyarjaneegwa, ghanyea majeappwaspwaasan.
Meagasi eadaah gideaba geagasayi deamuuweagwa aba barawajeega.
Aba gideaba gwayeena, “Barawajeegaaschi eadurmani nea gwandeawa uurda nea saseadaannyi iimida hiji ea ng'arng'ar, nea eara girgweageadaannyi geefool.”
Fuga sunu gagasa ghwanal gideaba ng'asheega surgu aba barawajeanda damanda meandeewani hiji, iissa geesinnyi iimida hiji.

Mii gideaba geegasayi eebadaksiina eahhaadana geat fuga gwara geadi ghana eegalana geat fuga adiing'ng'u geat gil. Hean nea gaba siisi adeena geaw niirja, ak gaba siisi gala geaw niirja, ak ghanyea manda ginnal.
Ak aseasa ea mwajeaghwara geat ea ghwanaawda, geaghus gheadeendida goaneasa Aseettean, nea gideaba gajeammuusa eahinna heedeang'wa gil.
Nea meattaardani geat ea ghwanaawa gheadeendeanya, nea eara gwasa ghanyea miyeahinna heedeang'wa; aba gideaba geewoschi fuga madeeda asheeda ghwahidu heedeang'wa nea geeyeadu Giijasta miy bea Gristo.
Nea mwajeaghwara geat ea ghwanaawa deascheeda aba sawanadeeda buneessuurja gil; abeeda gendeawi rarooda gideaba gaygwaheedu masaweegeagwa gagasa gwaheedu gadiyeedeanya aba jeedeang'wa,
Ak abeeda gajeammuusa erukkwiida giijasta miy aba daroorakka suurja sheageewaneegwa, nea meaghwari geat aba gadiyeeda ning'atta sinooda aba jeemba madamnyeamba sii nuut.
“Neada siida ghwargeaw, ghaghwarageaw Ng'uttamiida.”
Aba gideaba mii siida gwarageawiini gil jea eamwas geaghus siitta jea ghaghwar Ng'uttamiidean.
Gideaballi ghwanyawa ghoamilikghti lendeedeanyu gilimwanang'. Amilikghta sea aniini!
Aba gideaba aniini geashisseegwa ghaang' aba shidoodeaba ghaang' bea Aseetta, aba gideaba neanyearriiseegwa Gristo ak ghaadaydaneegwa awuurjeewana sibeeda miy weesa ng'eedeanagi.
Iiduw ghabealli, gawuurji gidaghayi renganniida ichchibooda Haawa aba milmilandaannyi, gajeehutteawi fughareengeagwa ak ghoanung'waadi doobiiwnatta ea alooheeda Gristo.

Aba gideaba iihidu siinuut ak gwarukuneegwa Yeesu nuut nyoo ea mii dea ghayi sirukuneegwa, ghana oang'ng'waanya guroroonnuut mawosa dea oang'ng'waanyi, ghana iyoamwaschi giijasta miy nuut mawosa dea ghayi oamwaschiiin, abeeda goosissi mureeda gitta.
Aba gideaba ghaaghanyi manda gidashoadeawanaan aba gidamideawa giijasoodiga hees.
Earappeadi aniini eawoschi siida moammu gabalooliin, nii mii gideawuurjeewi aba fughareeda gil; naweadinga sean sinung'unyi ghwadaajiit ng'asheesu aba heedeang'wa aba haleanjeessean.
Heappi aniini neasinnyi ring'eeda iyayaachchi geaw ng'eanyi ak abeeda geakghambiideegwa, aba gideaba ghayi gearukkuneegwa giijasta miy bea Aseetta nea moattaydani gili?
Nareachchi ganiisajeega suuk haleanjeeda nyaawa goonan saawa ak abeeda ghaweachcheegwa.

Nea aniini damanda sindeayeewi nea geegasayi weettean, ghanyea mii dasawan siida wassean, aba gideaba haleanjeeda eagasayi gagoonan fuga eaduupcheewi leabu Makkedoniya. Ak geahelleewi geaw haleanjeessean ak ea measawaneegwa aba gidawassean.
Ak gawuurji gidabiideatta huumeanda Gristo jeedeanyu, ghanyea manda siida jea gwadukutta ghuutteanyu aba ghwaroani bea geawiin aba daroorakka ng'eanyiida Akkaya.
Abwanaaha? Gweagu gideaba mwabwariinyeagwa agooga? Ghwanal Aseetta gideaba ghaabwariinyeagwa!
Nea gideagasayi dasin gaydasin, ak abeeda ghabwaanyi ng'asheegeaba fukka gasa aba jeeda gadiyoojiga nyaawa bea ghwarjeedean gwasinda gadiyeeda gidasisindi aseasa.
Aba gideaba fuga uurji suu giijasoodiga ng'uyyeega, nea iissa gwasin gadiyeeda aba rengaweega, fuga iissa ghwayamgeat ak gwasin geat giijasoodiga Gristo.
Ak ea mayghaham fih ng'eanyi, aba gideaba eara Shattaani iissa ghwayamyam geaw gawuurji malaykajeanda weeshinda.
Adabeeda ea mii ng'asheanda haw gil gideaba eara soomjoagaaschi earaga iissa ghwayam geat ak gawuurji soomjooga doobiiwnatta. Huydeanda nyaawa gaygawuurji sea gadiyoojiga nyaawa.
Asi geargu gichcha gideaba, adaghwanung' siida doaw gili eawoschi dasha; earappeadi oanung' dasunuun, amwastanaan siittasha, ak abeeda earaniini ghaaghwarji geaw gilimwanang'.
(Ng'asheega eargu mearukuni aba gheambalmeeda Ng'uttamiida geawuurjeewi siida dasha, aba jeedeaba ghwarooni bea geaw ararji;
nea fuga saanga iissa ghaghwara geat haleanjeeda ng'eanyiida, ak earaniini gaydaghwar geaw.)
Aba gideaba hooseaneegeagwa ghamilikghta fuga dasheahi, nea agooga gowoschi weaghoodi!
Aba gideaba iissa ghoamilikghti eara siida nung' ahuuwa ging'ng'oonyanga ghana ghwanukghutaneegwa, ghana ghwanyagaadawaneegwa, ghana ghwayiineegwa heettiyeada, ghana ghwalas gheamamuunatkeagwa.
Aba baspaseegeasu, gaydayi, aseasa geewoschi ng'arng'ari aba ng'asheanji!
Nea gidawassean ghwara geaw siida gaydaammu earaniini gaydaghwara geaw, geabalooldi siittasha, earaniini gaydaammu daghwara geaw gitta.
Saawa ea fuga Ebraniyahi? Earaniini geawoschi. Saawa fuga Israeeli? Earaniini geawoschi. Saawa jeatta Abrahaamu? Earaniini geawoschi.

Saawa soomjooga Gristohi? Gharaanyi aniini, geabalooldi siida geeska, biissa gaba gadiyeeda haw, gharaanyi muuchchi aba ghealooniga, bea bayiiga meammu eyiida, nea ghariikghti aba miyeeda galeagasean.
Aba heeda fuga Yahuudi naanyaschi bayiiga niba muut niaanyaschi bayi haradam shoada akkalealla.
Subwaranaan fuga Ruumi ng'aritka niba samwagu; ak ea sufuttewean lagheanga nubwagi. Ak ea ninyar maleambooda niba samwagu; ak geabiidi jeeda basooda eawa ea askweari;

aba bareannyeekkeasu bea galeagasean, iissa gwaramaknean guldeayda ghealooniga iissa geashageadi aba fuga areedi buuneeda haleanjeeda, ak geashageadi aba emeedeanya, ak geashageadi aba Emoojiga, ak geashageadi aba mujiini, ak geashageadi aba dareapcheeda, ak geashageadi aba jeeda basooda, ak geashageadi aba fuga eaduupcheewi bea ng'uyyeega,
aba sawanadeeda ea deawiitmeeda, ea ging'weernooda galeagasean bea eawa, aba jalooda ea muwooshta, iissa ahoaghuut ea meandeawani hamitta, aba jeammeeda ea ng'ayinda hang'weakka.
Ea mabeachchi ng'asheesu, gwanda eara ng'asha suuk appadaydeanyu bea galeagasean, nea machmajooda ng'ullooda ganiisajeega seani.
Ak ea ng'eaha gil siida ng'arng'ar, ak amwang'arng'ariidi aniini? Ak ea ng'eaha siida sinung' ghoabeada, ak amwanyareasi aniini?
Imisean ghwaroodeaba geaw, gaydaghwara geaw haleanjeeda ahiimu ng'arng'arandeanyu.
Aseetta was Bwaabwa Ng'uttamiideanya was Yeesu, ninnyeeda ghayi sibadiischeesa ea ghoaw damanda manda mudeanooda, ghwanal gideaba mearukuni ng'uyyeega.
Abeeda aba hoowa bea Dameskiin sugoochcheanda mida hing'eadayda sugoochcheanda haw bea ng'eanyiida Aretta abeeda gafur mujiineeda Dameski ak abeeda ghoang'ng'waanyan,
ak gearrarang'dawaan sooscheanda ak gessiigan seawadeeda ghamarda, ak ghadaraamnyi geattingaaschi.
Asi gaydaghwar geaw; earappeadi manda gichchea danyagaadawa, ak gajeahhiimnaan nea geattahaach Ng'uttamiida.

Aniini ghaanalli siyagi aba jeeda Gristo nea aba jeemba gweannyeew damanang'wan geayaat ea ehhiitta humng'eedeaba samwagu, ada gwandeawa saseeda ghana ea mandeawana saseeda aniini mwaanali, ghwanal Aseetta.
Ak ghaanalli gideaba siisi geng'ng'ooysa Nyeamus, ada gwandeawa saseeda ghana ea mandeawana saseeda aniini mwaanali, ghwanal Aseetta,
ak gwandeawa haleanjeeda meammu eergu, biissa ea moommu siida rukunooda.
Appadaydeaba siisi gaydaghwar geaw ama duukku badaydeanyu ea mwammuusi daghwar geaw, geaghus appadayda ng'asheega ng'arng'arandeanyu.

Aba gideaba inyeeda ghwanyawa geagasayi daghwar geaw, gwachchi ea maydawos dasha, aba gideaba gaydargu ng'asheega huumwa. Iiduw ghang'ng'waanyi geaw, ak abeeda ea manda siida jea ghoapkaat gil appadaydeanyu ea ghang'al gitteaksa heedeanyu ghana gwayiing'sa heedeanyu.

Ak goheellewean ghwaroodeaba geaw aba seang'ayda dagheerjeandumeeda sittahaach, ak geegoonan aniini halaghweeneeda aba saseeda, giijasoochcheanda Shattaani, ak goodeawiidan, ak goheellewean ghwarjeeda.
Niba samwagu geamuschi Ng'uttamiida appadaydeaba ng'asheanji, ak abeeda ghang'amwanaan;

ak gwayeeshshinean niny, “Dagheerjeandumeedeanyu ghoahiinnyi, aba gideaba uurdeanyu iissa gamajeegiit aba jeeda ng'arng'aranda.” Ak gaydahoosan muuchchi iyaaghwari geaw ng'arng'arandeanyu, ak abeeda gobiida uurda Gristo badaydeanyu.
Appadayda Gristo, asi, naahiichchi aba ng'arng'aranda, ea giing'weakka, ea sawanaduutka, ea ghabasta, ea habitkwajeega; aba gideaba damanda eawosi ng'arng'ar, hean geawoschi majeek.
Nadashahiichchi! Ak ghoanung' agooga dasnu, ak gahaguuwan gideaba gajagwarsean agooga. Aba gideaba meawosi mwanang'eawa giijasoodiga suurja hees, earappeadi meawosi giliin.
Nea gwadeagwajeega giijasoochcheanda huumwa sisin aba jeedeang'wa aba milikghteayda sean, aba gwadeagwajeega ea deamdeamanga ea gadiyoojiga hees.
Iiduw ea nishoadeewaneegwa naaha ea eemowuurjeewani ganiisajeega suurja, geaghus gideaba aniini miidasawaneegwa? Asamsean appadaydeaba ramaseanji!

Nii ghamneawa deaba samwagu nea geawoschi hidaat aba wunooda heedeang'wa. Ak ghanyea maydoaw sareenda, aba gideaba miidagasa haleanjeedeang'wa, ghaaghuschi gassoodeang'wa agooga; aba gideaba mammiissiina diibiga gideaba gaygoodiiwsheesa ghweaniga nyaawa, ea gheamadiga nyaawa, geaghus godiiwsheesa ghweaniga ea gheamadiga diibiga nyaawa.
Nea aba gideahoosandi aniini iyeagadiyeatti nea gegadiyeettanean, appadahuukka guroruunatkeagwa. Asi iyaabwariinyeegwa muuchchi, abeeda gajeabwariinyan gilimwanang'i?
Asi eanung'waada gwasnu, aniini miidasawaneegwa, geawoschi milmil, ak goyeenyi, ghawaamnyeegwa aba ghasooda.
Neada ea mwaanyagaadawaneegwa appadahuukka fuga eajeagu?

Ghayi geareekusi Ditto nea geayeeshshi una, ak geajeagu orjeetta bea giyeanyean sea niny. Neada Ditto ea ninyagaadawaneegwa aba gili? Neada aseasa ea meegadiyeattani Guroroodida? Neada ea meallabwaadani geeshangiga?
Ghoang'ng'wa apkaada gideaba geefurji geat aba heedeang'wa? Nii ammadeeda Aseetta geebaloolli aba jeeda Gristo, nea aba sean gedeegu bariinyeegeagwa, fuga abwariinyi.

Aba gideaba ghaawalli dahidu ak ea moowuurjeewani gideagassiidi dahidu nea goowuurjeewi, ak ea moahiimni nea geewuurjeewi gitta moogassiidaniin; ea gideaba gwadeeppa gwanda jaliida, geawunda gheang'da, ea nyarasta, shidoodeaba ghaang', giheakteayda, soomeanda baloolda, rengaweega ea deakghuyandeeda.

Aniini ghaawalli gideaba gajiiduw iyaawunnyi gichcha gayghwahiing'naan Aseetteanyu aba madeedeang'wa, ak abeeda geagiisannyi appadahuukka fuga saang'a ghayi sin ring'eeda ammwadiin ak ea mii gwaduukkuuna munyinda, ea munyinda, ea hiseadayeandumeeda ghayi sineadayyi.
Nii deaba samwagu gil aba wunooda awunnyi heedeang'wa. Gidinyeanda wassean gayghwadajiit aba ghuusispa mushoodi iyyeenya ghanea samwagu.

Asi geareekusi fukka ghayi sin ring'eeda ammwadiin sea buuneessean, ak ghamneawa geareekusi saawa earea meandani hiji, gawuurji gidaghayi easindi damanda eandeawi hiji aba bareannoodeanyu bea iyyeenya, bea gideaba iyaawunnyi gichcha ea maydaaghu saawa,
iiduw nea gogaseadayi asikteawana gideaba Gristo balool aba jeedeanyu. Niny mii ng'arng'ar aba heedeang'wa, niny gwandeawa uurda aba jeesingeagwa.
Aba gideaba niny ghayi gengoor aba jeeda ng'arng'aranda, ak gobiideewa uurda Aseetta. Nea gewoschi ng'arng'ari appadaydeaba niny, amaduw nea gagadiyeeseegwa gajendeayeena sea niny aba uurda Aseetta,

Asi asawsiina geat agooga, adaaha ea ghoang'ng'waannyi masaweegeagwa. Asma geat, agooga. Ghana moanali agooga gideaba Yeesu Gristo gwanda jeesingeagwa? Geaghus aba huumwa araanya gideaba gajeesmeegwa!
Ak ghaararji gideaba gajanala gideaba aseasa miyearaanya.
Iiduw geamoashchi Aseetta ea moosni ng'asheanda muy, mii gideaba geegasayi eadaheasa gideaba sismeasa gil, geegasayi asna ng'asheanda doabiiw, earappeadi suwuurjeewi aseasa fuga raay.
Aba gideaba meammuusi eesna ng'asheanda wassean yamuuji sea huumeanda, geaghus eesna ng'asheanda was huumeanda.
Aba gideaba geehoosannyi isuwoschi ng'arng'ari ak gondeawi agooga uurda. Gissumwaashchi Aseetta gideaba gagasa amajeegiitta.
