Ghang'waarji barawajeanji nea geawoschi sheageewaneegwa, nea geabaysiini gideaba iyaawunnyi ea mwang'waniidi aba uurdeanyu bea gheambalmeeda ghayi goonan Ng'uttamiida jea dadeekna nea mii dea nyarjeawda.
Aba huuydeanda, abeaha seayu fugeaduupcheewi. Asna naweadingeagwa, ayiinya gideargu, daba siisi mwas nuut, abeaha weayda, ak abeeda Aseetta mideawa bariinyeega ea weayda gaygoobiida heedeang'wa.
Okkatta geat aba samoodeaba geat ghaydit.
Ghoaghadeagwa fuga sean ghaydidi. Dagheerjeandumeeda Ng'uttamiida was Yeesu Gristo, ea bariinyeega Aseetta ea bareannyeeda Gurorooda Ghaydit gagasa andeawana oagasean.
Baulo giijasoochcheanda, nea maleapna heeda buuneeda ghana gwasku naweeda siida, gwasku heeda Yeesu Gristo ea heeda Aseetta was Ghweanda, ak gooduunna niny jeeda miyeeda,
ea oorjooga giyeanya sean eandeawi,
Aba heeda ganiisajeega mida Galattiya:
Gagasa anyasa dagheerjeandumeeda ea hoyyooyda leabu heeda Aseetta was Bwaabwa ea Ng'uttamiideanya was Yeesu Gristo,
nea gabeagu geaw aba ring'eegaasa ak gwalealnaneasa aba jeeda seaygean bea ghamneawa munyasiin, gawurji gidagasiida Aseetta was Ghweanda;
niny gwandeawa gigheambiitta ea ghoow damanda manda mudeanooda. Amin.
Aniini nihamwan ng'eanyi aba gidoobay anung'usiinda heeda dea ghayi guurneegwa aba jeeda dagheerjeandumeeda Gristo ak gooyamsi geat giijasta miy nuut,
mii gideaba gwanda giijasta miy nuut gil, iiduw gwanda fuga mwaatkwa adeawiideegwa nea gagasa ghoaschoorda giijasta miy bea Gristo.
Duukku aseasa ghana malaykajeanda humng'eeda, iirukneegwa giijasta wassean mawasa dea ghayi sirukneegwa, gagasa eamwaashta.
Gawuurji gidagwachchi sibean eerukna, ak eara ghamneawa geergu gichcha, gideaba siida wassean irukuneegwa giijasta mawosa dea ghayi oadeapti, gagasa eamwaashta.
Neada goaghayi gili eagasayi dashiit buuneeda, ghana Aseetta? Ghana eegasayi deahoosan buuneeda? Asi iiduw deahoosani buuneeda, ea maydoaw soomjeanda Gristo.
Oorjoogiyya geagasay gideaba gajanala gideaba giijasta miy ghayi earukwiidi maleapna heeda buuneeda.
Aba gideaba mwaanyasani hichpa sii, ak ea moanalaan sii, gwaleabu naweeda giidaheachta Yeesu Gristo.
Agooga noayiinyi iitta ghayi bea giibindeanyu aba jeeda diineeda fuga Yahuudi gideaba geasawannyi muuchchi fuga Ganiiseeda Aseetta nea geagasayi dalas uhuuda;
ak geandi mwadi aba ng'asheega dineeda Yahuudi ea dadaraam fuga seaygeedeanyu aba jeeda buuneedeanyu, al geabiissi dawos ng'waan aba searoojiga ghweanigaasa.
Hean iiduw nea niloadaan Aseetta nea miyeejiilan, ak gaguurnean aba dagheerjeandumeadaannyi,
ak geanung' ghoahimnaan Balleandaannyi, ak abeeda geerukkwiidi aniini iittaannyi aba jeeda Emoojiga, aniini mwaawunani saseeda ea foojeanda,
ghana dascheang'da dawa Yerusaleemu heeda oorjooga asheedeawean ghoaw giijasoodiga, aniini geawi ng'eanyiida Araabiya; ak geabiigu Dameski.
Ng'atta gweannyeew samwagu, geawi Yerusaleemu dabareessa Gefa, ak geabiidi gheannyi eawooji damwanamuut.
Ak ea manda giijasoocheanji naadaay nuut geaghus Yakkobo oorjeeda gheamatta Ng'uttamiida.
(Nea ng'asheega eang'oorneegwa, aba madeeda Aseetta mii ng'uyyeega gil!)
Iiduw geawi meatkwajeega ng'eanyiida Siriya ea Gilikiya.
Nea abeeda ea mii ghwadaahan aba gheanyanga fuga Ganiisajeega Gristo mida Yudeeya;
Gabeachchi gideaba ghwayiiy iitta gideaba, “Siida ghayi sawaneasa ghamneawa gwarukwiida giijasta miy bea masaweegiga ghayi gasa ghwalas uhuudean.”
Hean geekghambiit Aseetta aba badaydeanyu.
Hean ng'atta gweanyeew damwana ang'wan geabiikti dascheeng'da gichcha dawa Yerusaleemu nea geadeayeewi Barnaba, ak eara Ditto geadeayeewi.

Hean ghascheang'di aba giidaheachta; ak ghayiinnyi madeennyaawa (ak ghayiinnyi aba makcheameeda madeedeaba fukka siiwwal gheanyangean) giijasta miy earukwiidi aba jeeda eemoojiga, amaduw ea mwafwaji ghana dafwach mwadaagha.
Ak eara Dittoyda eadeayeewi earappeadi siida emeeda Yunaani gil, ea miyeeding'sa eaditta ghasmeahooda.
Iiduw appadayda oorjoogiyya bea ng'uyyeega siyeanna makcheameeda, ahuudaan ak ghamwaal giibaldeanya bea geat aba jeeda Gristo Yeesu, ak gagasa ghwaadeasa jeeda soomjeandumeeda,
dukku aseasa eameamwasi itta nyaawa eara gilimwanang, aba gideaba geegasayi goobiida heedeang'wa humeanda gijasta miy.

Nea ng'asheega leabu heeda fuga siiwwal gheanyangean nea geanung' ghoaw giliin (aba heedeanyu mwayamwa gil; aba gideaba Aseetta mashiitta buuneeda) fukka eayeennyi, fuga siiwwal gheanyangean manda gichchea gooheannean aniini;
hean iiduw gwajeeng'u saawa gideaba sugoonan darukkwiida giijasta miy aba heeda fuga meayada ghasmeahooda, gawuurji Betro gwarukkwiida giijasta miy aba heeda fuga siyaat ghasmeahooda
(aba gideaba siitta gadiyi sea Betro aba gadiyeeda ghasmeahoodean gagadiyi eara niny aba heedeanyu appadayda Emoojiga),

iiduw nea ghwanyas dagheerjeandumeeda ghayi sugoonan, Yakkobo ea Geefa ea Yohaana, siiwwal gheanyangean, gagoonan sea Barnaba geattinda dugwa bea weechcheeda, bea gideaba gajeeweaya heeda fuga Emoojiga nea gaweay saawa heeda fuga ghasmeahooda;
ak goopkanneasa gideaba eepkaada fuga barbari, was gitta easawani aba gasooda sinoodean.
Iiduw nea ghwahidu Geefa ng'eanyiida Antiyokkiya, geawoowsi niny aba gideaba niny ghamiinaada nea niidiiyi.

Damandida mii ghapkaana fiisu ng'ay ajeagu Yakobo, abeeda goombuuchchi sea fuga Emoojiga; ama iiduw nea ghapka hean ghwanung'waada gimbuchcheeda ak gabiikta bwadaw ak gooheeli geaw aba gideaba ghwoawal fuga siyat ghasmeahooda.
Ak eara fuga mwaatkwa bea Yahuudi ghwayamgeat sea niny, eara Barnaba iiduw ghwaat geeshta nyaawa aba gimmiinoodeaba geat.

Iiduw nea ghadaayi gideaba fukka madoobiiwsiina giijasta miy bea huumwa, geayeeshshi Gefa aba madeeda buuneessean, “Earappeadi uwosi siida Yahuudi, ak gibiideatti siida Emoojiga nea muwuurjeewani siida Yahuudi, gayding'siindaan siida Emoojiga gideaba gaygobiideatta siida Yahuudi?”
Aseasa, bean eewosa fuga Yahuudi aba jeatta ak ea meewasi fuga Emoojiga bea ring'eega,

nea geanalli gideaba siida majeattaw doobiiwnatta aba sinnooda deaweeda, geaghus aba masaweega Yeesu Gristo, aseasa ghayi geamwaschi Gristo Yeesu ak abeeda geegoaneasa doobiiwnatta aba masaweega Gristo, nea mii aba sinooda deaweeda, aba gideaba aba sinooda deaweeda manda siida jea eattaw doobiiwnatta.
Ak aseasa isigakkiisi geat doobiiwnatta aba madeeda Gristo, geadaa gideaba geebea ring'a, heappi Gristo niiw siida gadiyeeda bea ring'eeda? Manda!
Aba gideaba iyaadeaschi gichcha ng'asheekka ghayi eanyarjiin, ghahiimu gideaba aniineessean geandeawi gidinyeanda.
Aba gideaba aniini aba naweeda deaweeda geameewsi deaweeda, ak abeeda geandeawi Aseetta.

Geengooran sea Gristo, ak geawoschi majeek ak ea mii aniini gil, Gristo eamajeek aba jeedeanyu, ak majeeknatta eandeawi ghamneawa aba saseeda, geandeewi aba masaweega Balleanda Aseetta, dea bwarinyan ak gabeagu eaweegaaschi aba badaydeanyu.
Meagassi daheawa dagheerjeandumeeda Aseetta; ak doobiiwnatta iisinyasa naweeda deaweeda, asi Gristo ghami mwadaagha.
Ea fuga Galattiya dasheahi! Goong'ushooneegwa ng'eaha, Yeesu Gristo geala bwadaw ak geengoor aba eeshpwara aba madeedeabeang'a?
Geagasayi danyaashta ng'asheanjagi, aba heedeang'wa, Heapi ghoanyaschi Gurorooda Ghaydit aba sinooda deaweeda, ghana aba gideaba ghooyiinyi aba masaweega?
Ak gowoschi dasheahhiidunu? Nea ghoang'ng'eachchi ghuutta sea Gurorooda Ghaydit, ak ghamneawa ghoahhiichchi aba saseeda?
Ghoanyaschi sawanadeeda haw sunu mwadaagha? Iimwadaagha gil ea huumwa.
Aseetta goneegwa Gurorooda Ghaydit, ak gwasin ng'asheega deamdeameadi aba jeedeang'wa, gwasin ng'asheesu aba sinooda deaweeda, ghana gideaba ghwayiiy aba masaweega?
Gawuurji gidaghayi, “Mwasta Abrahaamu Aseetta ak geenung' ghoaw doobiiwnatta.”
Asi anala gideaba fuga mideawa masaweega, suuh diibiga Abrahaamu gil.

Gabean gwargu Ng'ooruutka gideaba Aseetta gayghoadaw fuga emoojiga doobiiwnatta aba masaweega, Ak Giijasta Miy gabean gwaruksa Abrahaamu gideaba, “Gayghoadaw Aseetta ghawooda eemoojiga sean appdaydaang'u.”
Nea fukka mideawa masaweegean, gajeattaw ghawooda gawuurji Abrahaamooda mideawa masaweega.
Ak fukka sean sina ng'asheega deaweedean abeeda ea sumwashta; aba gideaba gwayi Ng'ooruutka, “Simwaashta gilinyoo ea sii gil mwaada geeshta ng'asheega sean sung'oorsa jeeda gittaabooda deaweeda.”
Asi ghamneawa adaach gideaba manda siida jea ghoodaw Aseetta doobiiwnatta aba naweeda deaweeda; aba gideaba, “Siittoabiiwaat gayghwanyas gibiinda aba masaweega;”
Ak deaweeda ea mwahinnana masaweega, duukku “Siida sina ng'asheesu gaygoobiida jeedeaba ng'asheesu.”
Gristo goottinnaneasa jeeda mooshteayda deaweeda, aba gideaba niny sumwaashta aba badahuukkaasa aba gideaba gwayi Ng'ooruutka, “Sumwaashta gilinyoo ea sii gil siratta aba uhuuda geetta,”
ak aba jeeda Gristo gayghwanyas Emoojiga ghawooda Abrahaamu, ak abeeda geanyaschi helleesiinda Gurorooda Ghaydit aba masaweega.
Asi iyeagaligeat sea siida, oorjoogiyya: manda siichchea ghoammu gageanda neajeeni, ghana ghoahaat, iining'atta nea sisikteawa.
Asi heelleesiinda ghoadaw Aseetta Abrahaamu ea jeattaannyi. Ak ea mayi, “Ea jeachcheenga,” nea gwargu buuneessean; nea ghana gwargu akkalealla, “Ea jeattaang'u,” nea Gristoohi.

Nii gidanyaashchi: deaweedeeda, ghayi hidu iing'atta gweannyeew bughalaji ang'wan ea diktam ea damanamughuush, ea mwahinna neajeeda aba jeeda gweayda iinisikteawa Aseetta amaduw ghwanung' ghoaw heelleesiinda gidamwadaagha.
Aba gideaba hearaniischooda gweadu deaweeda, ak ea maygweadu heelleesiinda; amaduw ghoadaw Aseetta Abrahaamu aba heelleesiinda.

Abeeda deaweeda ghwasaan? Geegu aba gideaba geesin ng'asheega munyas, ea eeyi bwak ea ghwahidu jeattaannyi ghayi sibean eattaw heelleesiinda; ak ghoaw hawunda malaykajeega aba naweetta bea siida aduuptooschi suurjean.
Asi siida aduuptooschi meaduupchi siyagi ak Aseetta aagi.

Heappi deaweeda gwaheelli sea heelleesiinda Aseetta? Manda aba huumwa; aba gideaba inyeeda geegeanu deaweedeeda ammu ghoadaw buuneeda eaweega, gwachchi buuneeda gayghwanyas doobiiwnatta aba naweeda deaweeda.
Nii nibean gwargu Ng'ooruutka gideaba nijooriischi ring'eeda aba ng'eanyiisean geettaajiitunu aba gideaba fukka mwas Yeesu Gristohiin gayghwanyas heelleesiindida ghayi siruksean aba masaweega.
Damanda ghayi mii ghwahinna masaweega, abeeda geendi jeeda deaweeda, siratteasa ea ghwahidu masaweegiga jea eattaajiidiin.
Aba sareeni deaweeda gawuurji ashoohooda gweanneasa heeda Gristo, ak geenyaschi doobiiwnatta aba masaweega.
Ak daanihinna masaweega deaweeda eamudea ashoohooda gil;
aba gideaba aba jeeda Gristo noowoschi oagasean balloojiga Aseetta, aba naweeda masaweega.
Aba gideaba agoogeeda ghayi sippatttisaneegwa aba naweeda Gristo, aba sareani ea nookwealli Gristo.

Ak biissa ea maheelli siida Yahuudi ea siida Yunaani, ghana siida was ging'ng'oonyaneeda ghana dea abalgeaw. Ea manda ng'eedeeda ghana gatmooda; aba gideaba agooga noowaschi agi aba naweeda Gristo Yeesu.
Asi agooga iyoowoschi fuga Gristo, agooga earada gowoschi jeatta Abrahaamu, aba sareeni hearaniischooda deang'wa gil aba heelleesiindida.
Ak ng'asheanda jea darukuneegwa ea nihi, siida jea gwahearaniischi iiduw ea jeepta gil, amwang'alla ging'ng'oonyaneeda, earappeadi haleanjeesean gaaschi gil;
niny aba damani gwanda geattinga fuga sitteaga gadiyeeda ea fuga furiischi ea ghwahitta damandida ghayi rugu ghwaaniin.
Eara aseasa; ghayi nea geawaschi diibiga geewoschi ging'ng'oonyanga ak geegadiyeesi meang'nyeandeenda ambaliischi aba ng'eanyiida.
Iiduw nea ghwahitta damanda, hean goojeagu Aseetta Balleandaannyi, jiilu gatmooda, aba jeeda deaweeda,
ak goottin fukka mida jeeda naweeda deaweedean, ak geenung' eewosa balloojiga.
Iiduw inoawoschi balloojigaaschi hean goojeagu Aseetta Gurorooda Balleandaannyi jeesingaasa, ayeawda nea gwayeena, “Aba! nea gideaba Bwaabwa gil!”
Asi aba heeda Aseetta muduwosa ging'ng'oonyaneeda muwosi balleanda, ama muwosi balleanda abeeda eamuwoosi siida jea gwahearaniischi.
Ak aba damandida ghayi mii analana Aseettean, abeeda googadiyeesi fuga mawosa aseechcheekka.
nea ghamneawa iinoanalli Aseetta, ghana ghwanaleagwa Aseetta, gajabiiktaydaan bwadaw gichcha jeeda haleanjeeda ng'arng'ari was meangeenda, ak googasayi abiikta jeeda ging'ng'oonyaneandumeeda gichcha?
Agooga gong'ng'oonyayi eawoojiga ea sheega ea damanda ea gweannyeekka!
Aniini ghaabealli aba agooga ghaghanyi gideaba gadiyeeda easinnyi aba badahuukkeagwa niiw mwadaagha.
Oorjoogiyya, geamuscheegwa awuurjeewaneani, aba gideaba aniini geawuurjeewaneegwa. Ea manda gilmuy noosinean;
Ak ghamneawa ghoanalli gideaba aba munyinda saseeda gearukuneegwa giijasta miy dea madeeda;
ak earappeadi amyaannyi ea mii afoolean ghana aheawaan ak ghoadeaptaydanaan malaykajeanda Aseetta, gawurji Gristo Yeesu.
Gwandeenu abeeda ng'wanaweega oyeenniisi geat geendeawi? Aba gideaba geamuwwuneegwa gideaba aba damandida inyeeda ea gilijaaghamwas gil gajallootta gheanyangeagwa ak googoonnyean.
Heappi! Ghamneawa ea neawoschi weajoochcheandeang'wa aba gideaba gearukuneegwa huumeanda?
Fiisu gagasseegwa, ak ea magasseewaneegwa naweeda miy, saawa gagasa gwajapseegwa jarooda, ak abeeda agooga googasayi saawa.
Galagasean amiy gideaba geedeawiissa buuneeda suurja aba ng'asheega miyaas, ea mii gideaba damanda sindeayi gil gabeachchi.
Ea diibigeasu manang'i, geasawani muuchchi aba badahuukeagwa, ea eeyibwak ea ghwadaajiit Gristo aba jeesingeagwa!
Gideaballi gwachchi geendeayi sea agooga ghamneawa ak ghwayamwa seareedeanyu, aba gideaba nung'udan muuwda appadahuukkeagwa.
Asi rukunean, ang'iing'eeda gasa gawa jeeda deaweeda, neada ea niyiinyi deaweeda?
Ghayi geang'waar gideaba Abrahaamu gwandeawa ballooji iyyeenya, agi gaba datmooda was ging'ng'oonyaneeda, niirja gaba gatmooda aabal geaw.
Nea balleanda ging'ng'oonyaneeda geejiilda gideajusu bea saseeda, ak balleanda gatmooda abal geaw geejiila heelleesiinda.
Asi nii giweaghanda gil: gadeemsu neajuut iyyeenya. Akkalealla gwaleabu Gijeeda Sinaayi, ak gwaji diibiga was ging'ng'oonyanga; nea Hagaari.
Aba gideaba Hagaari gawuurji gijeeda Sinayi mida ng'eanyiida Araabiya; ak gwandeawa iitteaba geat sea Yerusaleemooni bea ghamneaweani, aba gideaba gwanda jeeda ging'ng'ooyda sea diibigaaschi.
Ak mujineeda Yerusaleemeeda mida humng'eeda goobal geaw, ak niny ea iyya gil.
Geeng'waar aba jeeda ng'ooruut gideaba,
“Hoosana ang'iing'eeda was sonooda nyajeat majiilla;
ajuura muuchchi nea giyyeawdi ang'iing'eeda ghayi ninyasa sawanadeeda jeatta;
aba gideaba diibiga gatmooda mandeawana siyeeda asaang'a
ea ghang'al gatmooda mideawa siyeeda.”
Ak ghamneawa oorjoogiyya geewuurjeewi Isakka aba gideaba goowoschi diibiga heelleeda.
Ak aba damandida ghayi sijiilda gea eawoojusu bea gealaniin, inyeesa goodeawiit diita ghayi sijiilla Gurorooda, ak eara ghamneawa ea gidurji gil.
Ak gwayiin ng'ooruut? “Gwayi hoana ging'ng'oonyaneeda ea balleandaannyi; aba gideaba balleanda ging'ng'oonyaneeda maygwahearaniischi sea balleanda gatmooda abalgeaw.”
Asi oorjoogiyya, aba sareani aseasa meawasi diibiga ging'ng'oonyaneeda, geawaschi diibiga gatmooda abal geaw.
Aba giibaldeaba geat ninung' Gristo eeppala geat; asi amiinaada nea goomilmiliidayi, ak ea adagudoomwaschi gichcha gideaba gajeerassa gheatkweakkeagwa jokkeeda soomjeandumeeda.
Aniini Baulo gil, ak geayeeshshiineegwa iisiyadeagwa ghasmeahooda abeeda Gristo ea maygwalooseegwa gil.
Ak geamuwwiisi ng'asheanji gichcha gili wassih eayaat ghasmeahooda gammiisa gideaba gayghoang'ng'waay deaweedajeega sean.
Asi silealneegwa aba Gristo, agoogeeda jea egooneegwa doobiiwnatta aba deaweeda; noappeadi ak gooritteawi jeeda dagheerjeandumeeda.
Aba gideaba aba gurorooda aba naweeda masaweega geammuughu gissirarji aba doobiiwnatta.
Aba gideaba siida iimiida jeeda Gristo Yeesu gawa ghasmeahooda ghana ea mawa ghasmeahooda aba headaannyi mii gili, gidahaw masaweega mideawa bariinyeega gil.
Asi agalleadi muuchchi; ak ea ng'eaha weadaneegwa gideaba gajasissiina mureeda huumeanda?
Ghurghuri maleapna heeda siida ghayi guurneegwa.
Hamiireeda mwanang'i gayghwanung' ghaghuut geat murmurjeanda sean.
Aniini ghaaghuschi Ng'uttamiida ea gideaba mwajayamwana mwajadaakta ng'asheega gidadaakti aniini; nea siida adeawiideegwa agooga gayghwanyas girgweaksiindaannyi, siida wassean.
Ak earaniini oorjoogiyya iyearukwiidi ng'asheega ghasmeahooda, abeeda ghwasaan anda gudeesawanan? Abeeda aba hiji russooda beehiida ea sigeanda.
Aniini gideaballi fukka nung' ea mooppidi ng'eanyiin ghwalajaada geat!

Aba gideaba geeguurneegwa anyasa giibaldeaba geat, oorjoogiyya; ak ea adoanung' ghoaw giibaldeang'wa bea geat nyasitta gheatta ng'asheega gasa saseeda, nea aba barinyeega ea daba siisi huuw soomjeamba nuut.
Aba gideaba deaweedajeega sean geemmajeek aba jeemba ng'asheanjagi, “Nea nii gil, bea gideaba, bwariyda gischeewoochchandaang'u gidibwariydi geaw.”
Asi iighanyaadi nea ghoanyeannyeahaadi geat gooshageachchi adagaba siisi ak nuut.
Asi geayeeshshineegwa, Aweayeena aba guroorooda nea ghanyea majaduulni haleanjeeda gasa saseeda.
Aba gideaba saseeda gagasa gitta magassa Guroroodean, ak eara Gurorooda gagasa gitta magassa saseedean; aba gideaba suu gwasheang'nyi ak ea mwajoammuusa asna gidoogasayi.
Ak iyoonung' goobaleegwa Guroorooda maygoobaleegwa deaweeda.
Ak ng'asheega munyas sina saseeda aadaach nea suhu; hiseadayeandumeeda, ririnnyeanda, ng'asheega munyas,
mealuuleega, benetkweandumeeda, furjeeda, jaliida, geawunda gheangda, nyarasta, shidoodeaba ghaang', dardeayda, nabitta ng'uyyeega,

ng'ullooda siida aba gheang'da muy, booktuumeeda, leeshooda, ea ng'asheega uurji suh. Neabean damiin gheang'deang'wa gawuurji gidaghayi eareekusiindi gideaba fuga sina ng'asheega sunu maygaweay jeeda Gheambalmeeda Aseetta.
Ak haghweega Gurorooda ea barinyeega, hooseaneega, hoyyoo, milighteayda, inyeanda jeeda, miyinda, ea doobiiwnatta,
Garbabanda, ging'ng'ooydeaba geaw, appadaydeaba ng'asheesu manda deaweeda.
Fukka was gea Yeesu Gristohiin ningoorda saseeda ea ng'asheagaaschi munyas bwariiy nea gagasa.
Iisippideewi gurorooda gagasa eweaya nea geandeawi gurorooda.
Adeegwaray geat mwadaagha, ak ea adeesadayi geat, nea adeeng'ulli geat gheanyanga munyas.
Oorjoogiyya, iyoadaayi siida nea niibitta jeeda ring'eeda asi agoogeani owoschi fuga guroroodean ootteelni siisi aba gurorooda garbabu. Fura geaw, ang'iing'i adiiduw geesimnyi.
Daba siisi sar sareemba nuut, daba siisi ahiit deaweedeeda Gristo.
Ak siida iiyeeshsha geaw guwosi gil, nea mii gili, adagwareengani geaw.
Ak daba siisi sawsa gadiyeadaannyi nea gabageaw, ak gayghwanyas gichchea ghaghwara geaw niny aba gadiyeadaannyi, nea mii hichpa sii nuut gil.
Aba gideaba gaygaba siisi sar sareandaannyi nea gabageaw.
Siida sinnaal ng'asheanda deabareannyi haleanjeeda miyaas sean siida annealshi.
Adereenganneegwa, Aseetta meereenganna, aba gideaba siida gayghwalach gidawassean ghayi hista.
Aba gideaba siida hista ng'asheega aba saseadannyiin, aba jeeda saseadaannyi gayghwalach munyinda; duukku siitta histeawa guroroodean, aba jeeda gurorooda gayghwalach eaweega manda mudeanooda.
Ak ea adeeburji aba sinooda ng'asheega miyaas aba gideaba gajeelaja iihitta damanda imiyeepra.
Ak damani duu eendeawana gheattean esissiina buuneessean ng'asheega miyaas, ak ghwaraanya fukka mideawa masaweegean.
Ang'ulla ng'oorshooni gidang'waardi nea geaheettu ng'ooruutka ak geang'oorneegwa aba geattindeanyu aniini.
Suu fukka gasa gideaba gayghoahiimu geediin gil jea gwadiing'seegwa eata ghasmeahooda, aba gideaba ea meesawana saawa aba beehiida Gristo.
Ak eara gea siyaat ghasmeahooda, mwaada geeshta deaweeda, saawa gagasa gideaba gajeeyaadeagwa ghasmeahooda, ak ghaghwar geat aba sasanuukkeagwa.

Ak aniini ea adaghwarji geaw aba gidawassean geaghus gigheambiitta beehiida Ng'uttamiideanya was Yeesu Gristo, aba gideaba aba naweani bea beehiidean singoorsa ng'eanyiida heedeanyu, ak aniini singoorsean heeda ng'eanyiida.
Siida eayaat ghasmeahooda ghanea meayaada mii gili, ghana dea miyeayaat ghasmeahooda geegasa ghoaw siideesh.
Hoyyoo ea baydeayda gagasa ghwanyas fukka sean ang'ng'waay deaweedeeni, appadayda Israeeleeda Aseetta.
Gidang'eada ghamneawa adagoodeawiidan sii; aba gideaba aniini geandeawi girooraneeda Yeesu aba saseedeanyu.
Dagheerjeandumeeda Ng'uttamiideanya was Yeesu Gristo gagasa gobiida jeeda gurooruunatkeagwa, oorjoogiyya. Amin.
Baulo, Giijasoochcheanda Gristo Yeesu, aba gidagasiida Aseetta,
Heeda Fukghaydidi biissa ea doobiiweadi aba jeeda Gristo Yeesu.
Gagasa gagooneegwa Aseetta dagheerjeandumeeda ea hoyyoo Aseetta was Ghweandeanya ea Ng'uttamiida was Yeesu Gristo.
Ghawooda daba Aseetta ea Bwaabwa Ng'utaamiideanya was Yeesu Gristo, ghayi goaneasa ghawooda aba jeeda Gristo aba giliwas ghawooda gurorooda aba daroorakka humng'eedean,
iiduw nea ghwaloadeasa nea miyeabwat sindeetta ng'eanyiida, ak geewoschi ghaydidi nea geawoschi fuga meerukunana badahuukka ng'asheega munyas aba madeadaannyi.
Niny ghwaloodeasa aba bariinyeega eahuwa balloojigaaschi aba naweeda Yeesu Gristo, aba gidagasiida niny,
aba duumsheesiinda gigheambiitta dagheerjeandumeeda gooneasa mwadaagha aba naweeda Balleandaannyi bwariiy.
Aba niny geendeawi ghuhooda aba foojeandaannyi, was samsiinda ring'eeda, aba gitteenna dagheerjeandumeadaannyi.
Ak gagooneasa ea ghwanawda.
Aba gideaba nideajiinneasa aba weaghuumeeda sean ea makcheameeda funyaat bea gitta gasean, aba gitta bada appadayda Gristo was gidagasa iihitta damandean,
ak goguuyi haleanjeessean aba niny, haleanjeeda mida humng'eeda ea gea mida badayda ng'eanyiida.
Aba niny, aba gitta gassiida ninyiin was dea ahiit haleanjeessean aba gitta gassiidean,
aseaseeda ghayi sibean earara Gristo amwadi sittoobiiweasa ak geegeanneasa eeppiidana nea geeduumsheesi gigheambiittaannyi.
Ak agooga aba jeedeaba niny noayiinyi ng'asheanda huumwa, nea giijasta miy bea lealeanoodeang'wa, ak ea noamwaschi niny, nea gorooreegwa heelleeda Gurorooda Ghaydit,
ak geasikteawi hearaniischoodeanya ea eeyi bwak ea eanyasa, ak geeduumsheesi giigheambiittaannyi.
Aba nii deaghayi nayiinyi aniini iitta masaweegeagwa aba badayda Ng'uttamiida was Yeesu ea gidoabwariiydi fuga ghaydidi sean,
ea mii danung'waada badiischeesiinda appadahuukkeagwa, inyeessa ghaapkaachcheagwa iyamwashchi Aseetta,
ak abeeda Aseetta Ng'uttamiideanya was Yeesu Gristo, Bwaabwa gigheambiitta, gagasa gagooneegwa gurooroodaannyi bea weaghuumeeda ea dea gidaheechta jea analana niny,
Gheanyanga mida jeesingeagwa gagasa eayyeat, ak ghoanalli rarooda gidaguurdeaydaneegwa giduurji, ea meanang'oochcheandumeadaannyi ea giigheambiitta hearaniischoodaannyi aba heeda fuga ghaydidi,
nea aba gitteanna hawunda uurdaannyi meammu eetteen aba heedeanya was fuga mideawa masaweega, aba gidagadiyeatta uurdaannyi haw
ghayi ahiit aba jeeda Gristo damanda aduunna jeeda miyeeda, ak ghwanung' goopteada aba geattindaannyi bea dugwa aba daroorakka humng'eeda,
hean goombal fuga ambaliischi sean ea gheambalmeeda ea uurda ea sugoochcheandumeeda, ak ghang'attaawa gheawunga sean ghayi sing'at, ak ea mii aba seaygeeni gil eara diitta jea ghwahiduun;
ak ghwayiin haleanjeesean hing'eadayda geeshangaaschi ak ghoadaw hawunda haleanjeessean appadayda ganiisa,
was saseadaannyi, nea hidoadaannyi gil was dea annyiit haleanjeessean aba jeeda haleanjeessean.
Ak gagooneegwa eaweega, nea abeeda ea noomeewayi aba gidinyeannyeekka ea ring'eega,

was gea ghayi oayaachchi geeshta nea goommaseawji seareetta bea ng'eanyiidean, nea ghoayaachchi geeshta sugoochcheanda mideawa uurda humng'eeda, gurorootta ghamneawa sin gadiyeeda aba jeeda balloojiga fuga manda mureedean.

aba suu ghayi earaseasa sippiidi eesasean jeeda haleanjeeda gasa sasanuukkaasa, nea geayaachchi geeshta haleanjeeda gasa saseeda ea uhuuda, nea geebean eewosa diibiga nyarasta, ak geewuurjeewi fuga mwaatkwa.
Nea Aseetta baruur aba baydeayda, aba jeeda bariinyeegaaschi haw aba gidabwariiydaneasa,
earappeadi ghayi simeewayi aba gidinyeannyeekkaasaan, iiduw ghwanung' eduuttuuna sea Gristo, (aba dagheerjeandumeeda silealneegwa),
ak goodunneasa sea niny ak ghwanung eepiitpiida sea niny aba jeeda ng'eanyiida guroorooda, aba jeeda Gristo Yeesu,
nea aba seaygoojiga jea ghwahidu gwadeeppa ghoahiimu meanang'oochcheandumeeda meammu eetteen aba dagheerjeandumeedaannyi aba innyeanda jeeda aba heedeanya aba jeeda Gristo Yeesu.
Aba dagheerjeandumeeda silealneegwa aba naweeda masaweega; ea masna milmilandeang'wa osinnyi, nii gagu Aseetta,
ak ea mii gisin siida, asi gilinyoo ea sih gil adaghaghwar geaw.
Aba gideaba aseasa geawaschi gadiyeadaannyi, gwasinneasa naweeda Gristo Yeesu, aba gadiyoojiga miyaas, ghayi bean gwasin Aseetta ammwadi, gideaba eyaada geeshta.
Asi oapkaada gideaba ghayi agooga goowaschi fuga Emoojiga aba saseeda, ak geegureewaneegwa fuga mii eayaat ghasmeahooda aba gissuguura ghasmeahooda, sisissa saseeda aba geattinda,

oapkaada gideaba eara agooga aba damandida sihheellaneegwa sea Gristo, ak geehheelaneegwa sea emeeda Israeeli, ak goowoschi rabasta neajeeda heelleessiindida, ak ea mondeawani gidoararji nea manda Aseetta jeeda ng'eanyiida.
Ak ghamneawa aba jeeda Gristo Yeesu agoogeeni ghayi owaschi sheagiin ea sinnekkideegwa aba foojeanda Gristo.
Aba gideaba niny hoyyooydeanya, nung' eahuwa easasean agi, ak gwanyarja ghamarda beashooda bea furjeeda,
iiduw nea ghoahiit geandeayda deaweeda aba saseadaannyi aba digheannyeekka ea huumeannyeekka, ak abeeda gwasin siideesh nea gaba geaw ghoaghiisa gea assiyyeenya, ak gwasin hoyyoo,
hean gooduumpcheeweasa easasean Aseetta aba saseanagi aba naweeda beehiida, ak gwaduulu furjeeda.
Ak ghwahidu ak gwarukkwiida hoyyoo aba heedeang'wa agoogeeni sheagiin ea hoyyoo aba heeda fuga neekki;
aba niny aseaseen seaniin simmuuschi eeneekkiisiinana Bwaabwa aba guroroonagi.
Asi ghang'eeda ghamneawa agooga moowoosi rasbasta ghana fuga ng'atta, goowooschi fuga bea ng'eanyiida sea fuga ghaydidi bissa awosa fuga gheeda Aseetta,
sideeksa badayda sindeatta ghayi bea giijasoodiga ea subanga, ak Gristo niny ea lagheaneeda haw washiini,
niny ghwasar gheassean, ak googuuyi ak ghoaw gheessibatta Aseetta ghaydit bea Ng'uttamiida;
aba niny eara agooga geedeekseegwa jeedeaba niny ghoaw heechchea goobiida Aseetta aba jeeda Gurorooda.
Aba sareani aniini Baulo, was siida ghealooniga Gristo Yeesu aba badahuukkeagwa agooga fuga Emoojiga,
ama deeppea noayiinyi iitta sitteaganean bea dagheerjeandumeeda Aseetta ghayi sugoonan appadahuukkeagwa,
gidanung' danalda makcheameeda aba giidaheachta gawuurji gidang'waardi nea ghanuwasichi.
Ak iyoassoomi ng'asheesu ang'waarjiin, abeeda gajajeeng'ni gidaanaldi gili funyaat bea Gristohiin,
ak ea meanung' ghwanal balloojiga buuneeda aba seaygoojiga suurja gawuurji gidaghamneawa sittaheachsiinda giijasoodigaaschi ghaydidi ea sibanga aba naweeda Gurorooda;
nea gideaba, fuga Emoojiga fuga jea gwahearaniischi gil ea aseasa aba hearaniischoonagi, nea gaba saseanagi, nea geeguuyeesi heelleesindaannyi mida jeeda Gristo Yeesu aba naweeda Giijasta Miy.
Appadaydeaba giijasi miyiin geanung' doaw siida gadiyeeda gawuurji gidagoondanean Aseetta dagheerjeandumeeda ghayi sugoonan aniini aba uurda sin gadiyeadaannyi.
Aba aniini, earappeadi eawoschi mwanang'eawa fuga sean ghaydidin, abeeda geegu dagheerjeandumeani, ak gearukkwiiisi fuga Emoojiga meanang'oochcheandumeeda meesikkideawana bea Gristo,
ak ghwanung' ghwadaa buuneeda sean badiida makcheameeda ghayi sufuy aba gweannyeekka aba heeda Aseetta sin haleanjeessean;
ak aba naweeda ganiisa abeeda weaghumeeda Aseetta meammu ettean abeeda ghwanal sugoodiga ea gheambalmeeda aba jeeda daroorakka humng'eeda.
Ng'asheanji gwasin nea gabaysiina gidagassiida maygammudean jeeng'u Gristo Yeesuuyda was Ng'uttamiideanyean,
nea aba niny geendeawi dargooda nea geammuughu beatta aba masaweegaasa aba jeedeaba niny.
Asi geamuscheegwa adagabur iheengeagwa aba sawanaduutkkeasu aba badahuukkeagwa, was giigheambiitteang'wa.
Ak aba sareani geatkunyi aba madeeda Bwaabwa,
was gumdooda gealga sean bea ng'eanyiida ea humng'eeda ak geguushteawa,
hean abeeda aba gitteenna meanang'oocheandumeeda gigheambiittaannyi gwadeeppa gagooneegwa gimajeekta ea uurda aba naweeda Guroroadaannyi aba siideaba jih,
nea goobiida Gristo jeesingeagwa aba naweeda masaweega, ak geng'eapseegwa jeeda barinyeega,
hean abeeda ghwanyas uurda jea goobareannyi sea fuga ghaydidi sean gitteenna baraknatta ea geawunda ea geawunda humng'eeda ea gidayang'da sheaginda jeeda,
nea ghoonalli barinyeega Gristo ng'al fughareenga, ak abeeda geanyiideagwa hidooda sean bea Aseetta.
Asi aba ninnyeeda mideawa uurda gadiyi aba jeesingaasa ghoammu gwasin ng'asheega saang'a ea ghang'al haleanjeeda sumuschi ea gea siipkaachchi,
daba niny gigheambiitta aba jeeda ganiisa aba jeeda Gristo Yeesu ea ghoaw jeachcheenga sean ea ghoaw damanda manda mudeanooda. Amin.
Asi aniini, geawoschi siida ghealooniga appadayda Ng'uttamiida, geamuscheegwa gideaba oattoabiiwa eaweega deeschi sea gurnooda ghayi suguurneegwa,
nea gooyeadayi geat ng'eanyi ak goowooschi garbappi, nea ghoahhang'waannyi nea goomilikkideaysi geat aba barinyeega,
agassa gideaba gajaguyeena aba Gurorooda nea gearadaneagwa hoyyoo.
Saseeda aagi, ea Guroroonagi, gidaghayi siguursiindaneegwa,
Ng'uttamiinagi, masaweega ea agi, giibattiisanda aagi,
Aseetta aagi was Ghweandeanya easassean, ak ghang'attaawa sean ak gagadiiyi aba jeedeaba sean ak gwanda jeeda buuneessean.
Nea dagheerjeandumeeda gaba siisi siittaw aba aseesa aba gitteenna gidaguh Gristo.
Hean geeyi,
“Iiduw nea gwadiyeada ea gawa humng'eeda heeshsheagi godeayi fuga ng'utta,
ak ghoadaw buuneeda haleanjeeda.”
(Aba rukunooni ayi, “Gwadiyeada,” gideabeadaannyi naaha iimiih gideaba earada ghwararang'an ea ghwahidu heeda hiing'aada aba jeeda ng'eanyiida.
Dea ghayi rarang'aan dea earada diyeada gwasheagiit ea ghwalaabwa hoowa humng'eeda seani, ak abeeda ghoannyiit haleanjeesean.)
Hean gageanu mwaatkwa ghoaw giijasoodiga, nea mwaatkwa ghoaw sibanga, nea mwaatkwa ghoaw fuga jea gwarukkwiida giijaasta miy, mwaatkwa ghoaw haghweadoodiga ea ginealshoodiga,
ak ghoadaw fuga ghaydidi uurda jea gwasna gadiyeeda Aseetta ak geemajeek saseeda Gristo,
ea eeyi bwak ea eanyasa masaweega siguuyeesi ea fughareeda Balleanda Aseetta ak geehittiisi heeda eahuwa headiga, aba gideenda gitteenna hidooda Gristo;

aba gideaba adeebiikti gichcha eahuuwa diibiga, ak geejakseasa hoowa ea hoowa, nea ghwadeasa gilinyoo ea jeammeeda bea ginealshooda fughareenga, aba milmilanda buuneeda ea seechmeeda nea geayaachchi naweedinga reengani buuneeda.
Asi, eang'ng'waanya humeanda aba barinyeega nea geeheettu ea eahitta heedeaba niny aba haleanjeesean, ninnyeeda was uhuuda aba jeeda Gristo,

niny googuuyi saseessean ak ghwanung' ghoang'ng'waay geat robuutka, ak ghoadaw gilinyoo ea roobadeeda gil gichchea gwasinda gadiyeadaannyi muuchchi ak aba sareani gwaheedu saseessean nea ghwadeas geaw aba barinyeega.
Asi gearukneegwa ng'asheanji, aba appadayda Ng'uttamiida, gideaba adoappideatti gidabiideatta fuga Emooji, saawa gootteemsheesa ng'asheega mwadaagha mwahida.
ak fughareenga nyaawa ea sunung' gamisaniidi, ak ea sihheelli sea eaweega Aseetta, aba leendeeda mida jeanyaawa nea gwasin hang'ooynachcheeka jeesinga nyaawa;
Iiduw nea nideang'suusi ghoobutta geat jeeda ririnnyeanda ak abeeda gwasin gilinyoo ea ng'asheega munyas gil.
Ak agooga ea mii gissinnaaldaneegwa appadayda Gristohi.
abeeda ghayi iyoayiinyi ak geannaleagwa appadaydaannyi, humeanda mida jeeda Yeesu.
Oappuuda searoojigeagwa bea garayi bea giibinda biissa eamuy aba haleanjeeda sigaseadayyi reengani fih,
asna geat gaweeriidi guroruunatgeagwa ea giitteemshoodeang'wa.
Ak daba siisi mideawa guroroodeesh, sisin gawurji Aseetta aba doobiiwnatta huumwa ea ghaydiidanda.
Asi anung'waada ng'uyyeega, daba siisi abaloola gischeewochcheandaannyi humeanda, aba gideaba aseasa geewoschi fuga weechchi.
Anyareasa ak ea adiidu goosinnyi ring'eeda; ak ea adagamikta nea gudawosa nyareeseadi,
ak eadoottawji meang'nyeandeenda gheatta.
Mareanghweanda danung'waada gwadishta, dang'eada ghuutta gadiyeeda miy aba geattingaaschi, ak ghwanyas gichchea ghoadaw fukka gassean.
Adagwarinna ghuusigeagwa ng'asheega munyas, inyeessa goobalooli gaamiyaas jea ghaweat gilinyoo ea siida gil, ak ghoadaw dagheerjeandumeeda fuga aleeyseegwa iit.
Ak ea adoong'udi gurheamiida Gurorooda Ghaydit bea Aseetta, aba headaannyi sirrooreegwa aba eaweeda ghuhooda.
Asi ageandeana geat ng'asheega sean ng'weani was mukkunooda ea nyarasta ea gijuureanda ea nappooda ng'uyyeega nea gooshsheagiidi geat gea munyas sean,
asi awosa innyeani jeesin aba heedabuuneeda suurja, bayyiida buuneeda, sammiisa geat, gawuurji gidasamsiindaneegwa Aseetta aba jeeda Gristo.
Asi ayaada geeshta Aseetta awuurjeewana diibiga subwariiy.
Ak ghoabeawi bariinyeega, gawuurji gidabwariiydaneasa Gristo ak ghoadayda geaw appadahuukkaasa, ak ghoaw haleanjeeda sisappa geadi bea ghadoweeda ng'andit aba heeda Aseetta.
Nea hiseadayeandumeeda ea ng'asheega munyas sean ghana gassooda ng'asheega munyas adiiduw geyiingsa jeedeang'wa, aba gideaba nii ghwahit aba jeeda fuga ghaydidi.
Ak ea adiiduw geyiing'sa heedeaeng'wa ng'asheega baspaseega ea gea leendeeda ghana nyootta mureeda.

Agooga ghoanalli ng'asheanji gideaba siida hiseada ghana dea sina ng'asheega munyas ghana dea gaseadayyi haleanjeeda ea dea (bada gidamwadaagha ghwanung' ghoaw Aseettaannyi) manda dea jea gwahearan gheambalmeeda Gristo ea Aseetta.
Adagwareenganeegwa sii aba ng'asheega mwadaagha, aba gideaba ng'asheega uurji suh, gayghwahidu nyarasta Aseetta badahuukka balloojiga manda mureeda.
Asi adiiduw goabareanyeewi saawa,
aba gideaba ghayi agooga gowoschi misaneeda, ak ghamneawa gowoschi weeshinda aba jeeda Ng'uttamiida; asi abeada diibiga weeshinda
(aba gideaba haghweeega weeshinda geenyassa jeeda haleanjeessean miyaas ea doobiiwnatta ea huumwa),
nea ghoang'ng'eachchi nalooda gidabwariiy Ng'uttamiida.
Iissa ea adoosinnyi gadiyoojiga manda haghweega bea misaneeda iissa ghang'wana ghoanung'waadi.
Aba gideaba gaba baspaseega ruknooda ng'asheega sisin aba makcheameeda;
nea gidawassean iisunung' ghwadaajiit aba heedeesh abeeda gajeadaah, aba gideaba gidawassean sidaah weeshinda.
Hean ghoaw gidasirukuna ng'asheanji bea gideaba,
“Ng'eada ang'iing'eeda ing'utti ghaat, duunana heeda fuga nimeewa,
ak Gristo gaygagoonnyi weeshinda.”
Ang'ulla muuchchi aba gidoabeadi, adoowuurjeewi fuga manda fughareenga, awuurjeewana gea mida fughareenga,
ak googadiyeatti muuchchi damani ondeawiin aba gideaba askwearjoojusu gea munyas gil.
Aba sareani adoowaschi dasheahi, gagasa anala gideaba Ng'uttamiida gagasa naaha jea asna.
Asi adooboogidayi aba difaayeeda jea gahutteawweegwa; ghang'wana geannyideagwa Gurorooda Ghaydit.
Oppaloolana geat ng'asheega nyiigheega ea duumjeenga guuskuseega ea sarmoojiga guroorooda, asarmasiina Ng'uttamiida nea ghoammiidu daghanuunatkeagwa aba jeesingeagwa sean,
nea goobadischeesi Aseetta was Bwaabwa galagasean aba ng'asheega sean aba gheawunga Ng'uttamiideanya was Yeesu Gristo.
Asinisiina geat mureeda gawuurji gidoosinnisiindi Gristo mureeda.
Gadeemga, asinnisiina siyeenatkeagwa mureeda gawuurji gidoosinnisiindi Ng'uttamiida.
Aba gideaba siyeeda goombal gatmoodaannyi, gawurji gidambalda Gristo ganiisa, nea niny ea lealnoochcheandaannyi gil.
Gawuurji gidasinnisiinda ganiisa Gristo mureeda, asi eara gadeemga dasisiina siyeenatka nyaawa mureeda aba haleanjeesean.
Siyeenatka, abwariinya gadeemgeagwa, gawuurji gidabwariyda Gristo ganiisa ak gabeagu geaw appadaydaannyi,
ak abeeda gabaysiina gimminoadaannyi nea goohuun aba beega ea ng'asheanda.
Abeeda gwanyaksa geaw ganiiseeda ghambiidaat, mandeawana munyinda, ghana ng'asheega munyas sean, ak ea ghaydit biissa ea meerukunana badayda munyinda.
Ak eara headiga gamiisa gideaba gayghabwariiyda gadeemga nyaawa gidabwariyda saseenukka nyaawa. Siida bwariy gatmoodaannyi eara niny ghabwariy geaw.
Aba gideaba manda siida sit saseadaannyi, inyeesa ghoarear nea gookwealsheesa, gawuurji gidahinniida Gristo ganiisa,
aba gideaba aseasa geewaschi roobuutka saseadaannyi.
“Aba seareani ng'eedeeda gaygwanung'sa heeda ghwaan ea ghaamwat ak gwandeayi sea gatmoodaannyi, ak fiisu assiyeenyean gayghoaw saseanagi.”
Makcheameeni funyaadiin ahaw ak aniini geabalooli badayda Gristo ea ganiisa;
ak daba siisi bwariyda gatmoodaannyi saseadaannyi, ak gatmooda ea dasissiina siyeedaannyi mureeda.
Diibiga, asissiina mureeda ghweanigeagwa ea gheamadigeagwa aba naweeda Ng'uttamiida, aba gideaba ng'asheanji ghwadoabiiw.
“Sissiina gweanu mureeda ea geamadu” (diigheanji nii digheanda madeeda gil mideawa heelleeda),
“Ak ginyasi ng'wanooda nea gibiidi gweannyeeka saang'a jeeda ng'eanyiida.”
Ghweaniga, adoonnyareesayi diibigeagwa, oarreara nea ghoanung' ghwanyas mureeda ea ginealshooda Ng'uttamiida.
Soomjooga, asissiina mureeda fugeagwa hees bea ng'eanyiida, aba muuwda nea ghoabwaadannyi, ea doobiiwnatta gurorooda, gawurji giloosissi Gristo;
nea mii gideaba googadiyeesi aba gheanyanga gil akghwahit, gawuurji fuga ahoosan buuneeda, gagasa gawuurji soomjooga Gristo, nea goosinnyi ng'asheega bwariiy Aseetta leabu jih,
asna gadiyeedeang'wa nea goobeayi jeesinga miyaas aba gideaba googadiyeesi Ng'uttamiida mii siida gil,
nea ghoanalli gideaba gidamiy wassean sin siida, gaygabiikta ghwanyas gichcha aba heeda Ng'uttamiida, ea ging'ng'oonyaneeda gil ghanea siida abalgeawi.
Fuga hees, asissiina ng'asheega sunu saawa, nea ghoanung'waadi gimuuwda, nea ghoanalli gideaba dea was siida nyaawa haw ea deang'wa gwanda humng'eeda, ea gideaba headaannyi manda shiitmeeda.
Aba huuydeanda awoosa majeekcheewi aba jeeda Ng'uttamiida ea aba gimmuusta ea uurdaannyi.
Oang'ng'waanya dabitta ng'uchcheeda sean bea Aseetta ak gajoammuusa otteala ng'asheega rengaweega bea meang'nyeandeenda.

Aba gideaba ng'uchcheedeanya maba saseeda ea foojeanda gaba badayda sugoochcheandumeeda ea gheambalmeeda appadayda fuga ambaliischi bea jeedeaba misaneani, appadayda shirikkareeda meangeenda munyas aba jeeda daroorakka humng'eeda.
Asi aba sareani oang'ng'waanya dabitta ng'uchcheeda sean bea Aseetta, ak abeeda gajoammuusa ang'uchcheena damandida bea ng'asheega munyasiin, abeeda iyoahhiichchi ghoamiinaadi.
Asi amiinaada, nea radeadi mananunatkeagwa aba huumeanda, ak gookkwealli nea goodiinyi igeambooda ng'uchcheeda doabiiwaat aba daghanunatkeagwa,
ak gidoogassiidi rukkwiideayda Gijasta Miy bea hoyyooyda anung' gawurji geekka aba geeshangeagwa;
appadaydeaba suu seaniin, oang'waanya igeambooda masaweega, ak abeeda gajoammuusa ahiirjeaweeda geatka sean bea furgweega bea diitta muyiin.
Ak ghoang'ng'waanyi nngoofajeanda hang'way bea lealeenooda, ea bwangeeda Guroorooda was ng'asheega Aseetta.
Amwaasha Aseetta damannyoojiga sean aba jeeda Gurorooda aba mooshta sean bea Aseetta ea baditta. Ak ghoang'ng'wearu nea ghoashng'u aba baditta Aseetta appdahuukka fuga ghaydidi sean,
ak gwasnu earaba heedeanyu, ak abeeda ghammuuschi darukuta iyajaachchi ghuutteanyu ak gearukuti makcheameeda funyaat bea giijasta miy,
Ak aniini geawoschi siida sichcheagu ak geandi ghealooniga; asi amwaasha Aseetta appadaydeanyu dammu darukta giijasta miy ghabeada gidamiisean rukuteayda.

Asi agooga iyoogasayi anala gideawurjeewi ea gideasinnyi, gaygwarukuneegwa Dikikoyda abwariinyi was oorjeediyya ak gabiissa ea siida doabiiwaat gil aba heeda Ng'uttamiida niny gaygwarukuneegwa haleanjeessean.
Ak ea neajeagu niny heedeang'wa appadaydeaba ng'asheesu, ak ghoanalli gissuwuurjeewi, nea goomajeek jeesingeagwa.
Gagasa ghwanyas oorjoogiyya hoyyoo ea bariinyeega ea masaweega leabu heeda Aseetta was Bwaabwa ea Ng'uttamiida was Yeesu Gristo.
Gagasa gagooneegwa Aseetta dagheerjeandumeeda sea Fuga sean bwariiy Ng'uttamiida was Yeesu Gristo, appariinyeega manda mudeanooda.
Baulo ea Dimotteo, was soomjooga Gristo Yeesu, heeda fuga ghaydidi sean mida naweeda Gristo Yeesu, mida ng'eanyiida Filippi, sea jeagiischoodiga Ganiisa sea weedanga Ganiisa.
Gagasa anyasa dagheerjeandumeeda ea hoyyooyda leabu heeda Aseetta was Ghweandeanya ea heeda Ng'uttamiida was Yeesu Gristo.
Aniini inyeesa geabadischeesi Aseetteanyu iyapkaachcheagwa,
inyeesa galeagasean iyaamwaaschi Aseetta, hean ghaamwashchi appadahuukkeagwa aba hooseaneega,
geabadiischoweegwa aba guyeedeang'wa aba giijasta miy siguuyeesi ghang'eada mwadi ea ghoaw ghamneawa.
Ak geasikteawi siitta ang'eat gadiyeeda miy aba jeedeang'wean gayghoahiit aba eaweeda Yeesu Gristo.

Asi ghwadoabiiw aba heedeanyu gideaba gaydahiit suuh appadahuukkeagwa oagasean, aba gideaba neang'ng'ooyseegwa jeedeanyu, aba gideaba gowoschi oagasean fuga eaweechcheewi aba dagheerjeandumeeda, aba jeeda ghealoonigeasu ea aba furooda aba giimajeekta giijasta miy.
Aba gideaba Aseetta muushoochcheandeanyu gil, aba gideagassiidi deatteang'wa oagasean, aba bariinyeekka leabu heeda Gristo Yeesuun.
Nea nii ea mooshteanyu bea Aseetta gideaba gwaheedu bariinyeegeagwa muuchchi aba fughareeda haleanjeeda ea weaghumeeda sean,
hean abeeda goosikteawi gida hidaat, ak ghammiidu nea meerukunana badayda ng'asheega munyas aba eaweeda Gristo,
nea sinnyiideagwa haghweega doobiiwnatta leabu naweeda Yeesu Gristo, aba gigheambiitta nea geduumsheesa Aseetta.
Asi oorjoogiyya geagasayi anala gideaba sawanaduutka sean ghayi anyaschi, iiduw ghwanung' gawa giijasta miy mwadi,
ak ghamneawa ea sinalli aba heeda furiischoodiga sean ea heeda buuneessean gideaba ghealoonigeasu gaba badayda Gristo;
nea oorjooga saang'a bea giyeanya ea sunung' ghamwas Ng'uttamiida aba ghealoonigeasu, ak ea ninyas muraneandumeeda muuchchi ak gwarukwiida ng'asheanda Aseetta nea mwabeala.
Aba huumwa gwanda fuga inyeesa gwarukwiida iitta Gristo aba lajoodeaba ghuut ea foolayda, nea suuk gearukwiida aba gidamiy sigasa.
Iiduw gwarukkwiida aba barinyeega, nea ghoanalli gideaba aniini geayiinan hiji daweat giijasta miy;
nea fuga madeeda gwarukwiida iitta Gristo nea meamajeega, nea marukta aba jeeda eesh, nea ghaghay gideaba gayghoahaat sawanadeedeanyu aba ghealoonigeasu.
Ak ea naaha? Aba giliwas nawa, ea gaba ng'uyyeega, ghanea aba huumwa, Gristo geerukkwiida; ak geahoosannyi appadaydeaba ng'asheanji.
Eah, gaydahoosan. Aba gideaba ghaanalli aba jeeda mooshteang'wa bea Aseetta nea ghaweadeagwa Guroorooda Yeesu Gristo ng'asheesu gayghwayamwa iisittaydanaan,

ak ea gidaararji gil gideaba ghaaghuschi muuchchi ak ea maydabwaspwas earahay, ak geawoschi majeek gawuurji gideabeawoojusu ak ghamneawa gwasnu Gristo gajeesissa mureeda appadaydeanyu, inameayi ghana iduudanda.
Aba heedeanyu giibinda Gristoohi, nea miyeeda ea nyasooda.
Nea iimida eaweega jeeda saseeda, abeeda aba heedeanyu ea haghweega gadiyeeda gil. Nea gitta jea dalloadiin ea mwaanali.
Geaminighisan aba dageascheemba ng'ashiyyeenya. Geagasayi dawa dandeayi sea Gristo, aba gideaba gidang'wana gil.
Amaduw amiy muuchchi iyeabiidi aba saseeda appadahuukkeagwa.
Iyaghuschi suuh, ghaanalli gideaba gaydashng'u sea agooga oagasean, nea gooweayi mwadi nea gohoosannyi aba masaweega,
nea aba jeedeanyu gajanyasa gigheambiitta haw aba jeeda Gristo Yeesu, aba hinnoodeanyu bea heedeang'wa gichcha.

Anung' ghoaw searoojigeang'wa bea eaweega gweatteayyi sea giijasta miy bea Gristo, ama iyaawunnyi dadaheagwa ak ghadayeagwa ghana ea meandani, geagasayi dayiiy appadahuukkeagwa gideaba ghoamiinaadi muuchchi aba jeemba guroroonagi, nea goobeayi fughareanagi nea goong'alealleesi masaweega giijasta miy,

Nea moawwali weajoodigeagwa aba ng'asheanda wassean. Aba gideaba aba heennyaawa suuh gwadeagooda majeek bea nyariida, nea aba heedeang'wa ea gwadeagooda lealeanoodeang'wa, ea gideaba gwaleabu heeda Aseetta.
Aba gideaba agooga geegooneegwa gheatta appadayda Gristo jea agadiyeesiina, ea mabeachchi masaweega gwanda eara gideaba gajeesawaneegwa appadaydaannyi,
ak goondeawi ng'uchcheeda ghayi oodeaksi heedeanyuun, ak gooying'si heedeanyu gideaba geandeawi eara ghamneawean ghoadaayi gideaba guttanda jeeda.
Nea iimida gimajeekta jeeda Gristo, ghana gichchea goomajeek bariinyeega, ghana gidasuguyeesa aba jeeda Gurorooda, ghana iimida bariinyeega ghana baydeayda,
oahhiida hooseaneegeasu nea gobeayi fughareanagi, nea gawuurji bariinyeegeagwa, nea ghoang'ng'waay geat ng'asheegeagwa, nea gobeayi fughareanagi.
Adisni ng'asheanda aba shidoodeaba ghaang' ghana aba ghwarjeeda, sina aba eatteaba geaw bea ng'eanyi nea ginung' ghoaw buuneeda suurja fuga miyaas ea ghang'alleagwa.
Adagaba siisi ng'ula gidagasa niny akghwahit, daba siisi ng'ula gidagasa buneesuurja.
Andeawana ng'asheesu aba jeesingeagwa, ghayi ondeawi aba jeeda Gristo Yeesu,
earappeadi niny ghayi uurji sea Aseetta, ea mwanung' ghoaw gil uurjeatta bea Aseettean ak ghoaw gichchea ghoang'ng'waay.
Ak gwahinda geaw siida mandeawana gil, nea gawuurji sea soomjeanda, ak geeji nea gawuurji buuneeda.
Iiduw nea geadaah nea gawuurji siida, ghwaat geaw ng'eanyi nea gwasin mureeda ea ghwahitta miyeeda, eara miyeeda uhuuda beehiida.
Aba sareani ghoaw gida ading'deawa Aseetta humng'eeda muuchchi ak ghoadaw gheawunga laabwa hoowa gheawunga suurja,
aba gideaba aba gheawunga Yeesu giliwas gudung'uda gaygwatkuy, gea fuga mida humng'eeda ghana gea mida ng'eanyiida, ea gea mida uutta ng'eanyiida,
ak gaygaba siisi rukuna ghuutaannyi gideaba Yeesu Gristo Ng'uttamiida gil, aba gigheambiitta Aseetta was Ghweanda.

Asi fugeasu abwariinyi, aba gideajusu ondeayeatti mureeda galagasean, asi ghamneawa, ea adoosinnyi gideaballi ghwaraanya muuchchi iimeandani hiji, agadiyeesiina lealeanoodeang'wa aba muwda nea ghoabwadannyi;
aba gideaba Aseetta gagadiiyi aba jeesingeagwa, ak gagooneegwa gassooda ea sinooda ng'asheega miyaas gasa niny.
Asna ng'asheega sean nea adagwarinnaneegwa ginikghta ghana sheangnyeeda,

ak ea meerukunana badaydahuukkeagwa ng'asheega munyas nea ghoahuyi fuga manda giidinyeanda, diibiga Aseetta meerukunana badahuukka ng'asheega munyas mida bugusta seaygeeda gwaneadi bea ng'ooweatta, ak ghoayeatti weeshinda, aba jeannyaawa aba jeeda ng'eanyiida,
nea ghoong'ng'waay muuchchi ng'asheanda eaweega, ammuuchchu eaweeda Gristo ghammuuschi daghwar geaw aba gideaba mwaafwaji mwadaagha ghana dagadiyi mwadaagha.
Eara eayiinan uhuuda haleanjeeda sisappa geadi bea ghadooweeda appadayda masaweegeagwa, aniini geahoosannyi nea geang'weelayi sea agoogeeni seaniin.
Gwasnu earagooga ang'weella nea gohoosannnyi sea aniini.
Ak ghaararji aba jeeda Ng'uttamiida was Yeesu gideaba gaydeajeagu Dimotteo gabean ghwahidu heedeang'wa, ak abeeda geegwarsean aba iitteang'wa.
Aniini meandeawani sii nuut uurji niny, bea huumwa nea gwahirbaban aba ng'asheega badahuukkeagwa.
Saawa gaba siisi ng'ula gidabwariiy, nea mii fukka bea Yeesu Gristohiini.
Dimotteo ghamneawa ghwaloat gil aba headaang'u, gawuurji balleanda ea ghwaan niny geaweechcheewi aba gadiyeeda giijasta miy.
Ghaararji gideaba gaydabean deajeagu iyadaayi gichchea gawuurji ng'asheegeasu;
ak ghaamwaschi aba heeda Ng'uttamiida gideaba earaniini gaydabean dahidu.
Geagasayi deajeagu heedeang'wa Epafraditto, was oorjeediyya, easnudayeewi gadiyeeda, was shirikkarajeanda uurjeewean, nea giijasoochcheandeang'wa gil, nea weedaneeda gil aba haleandeanyu eagasayi.
Nea niny abeeda gagasa ghwadaheang'wa oagasean, ak ghang'ut giseaneega aba gideaba noayinyi gideaba niny ghamnyaan.
Aba huumwa ghamnyaan, ea ghwariikghta ghami. Iiduw ghabwayda Aseetta niny, ak ea meakghusa niny, earappadaydeanyu, amaduw ea moawa aba heedeanyu sawanadeeda naawda.
Aniini geagasayi muuchchi deajeagu niny, ak abeeda gohoosannyi aba iyoobiikti adaaha gichcha, ak abeeda ghwasuunya ng'asheegeasu.
Asi adeapta niny aba hooseaneega sean aba naweeda Ng'uttamiida, ak fuga uurji nii gammiisa gideaba gajeattaw mureeda,
aba gideaba gwaramagu ghami aba gadiyeeda Gristo, nea gwaramagu gabeagu eaweegaaschi ak ghoahiit gadiyeedeang'wa aba heedeanyu.
Asi aba huydeanda, oorjooga giyeenya, ahoosana aba jeeda Ng'uttamiida. Ak geang'oorneegwa ng'asheega uurji gikka nea meapri, ak abeeda gaygwaleaneegwa.
Ashageada gudajeega, ashageada fuga gadiyeeda munyas, ashageada fukka iissa ghwalajaada saseedean.
Aba gideaba aseasa geewoschi ghasmeahooda huumwa, gadoowan Aseetta aba gurorooda, ea gheambalmeeda aba jeeda Gristo Yeesu, fuga mwarara ng'asheega saseeda.
Earappeadi eandeawi gichchea darara saseeda. Siida wassean iimideawa gichchea ghwarara saseeda gharaanyi aniini:

Geayadan ghasmeahooda eaweedeaba sis, ak geawoschi siida emeeda Isaraeeli, bea dooshta Benjamin, ak geawoschi siida Ebraniya jih fuga Ebraniya; nea aba ging'ng'ooyda deaweeda geawoschi Farisayajeanda,
ak geasinnyi badiida muuchchi dasawan ganiisa, appadayda doobiiwnatta sinyasa deaweeda majeerukuna badaydeanyu ng'asheega munyas.
Nea haleanjeetta sean ghayi anung' ghoaw gidahuumwa aba heedeanyuun ghamneawa ghanung' gawuurji roodaweega appadayda Gristo.

Aba huumwa ghaanung' ghoaw haleanjeesean gil nirooda aba gitta naawda aba nalooda Gristo Yeesu was Ng'uttamiideanyuun. Appadaydaannyi naanung' gwarooda haleanjeessean, ak ghanung' ghoaw haleanjeeda mwadaagha, ak abeeda ghaanyaschi Gristo

ak geanyasan aba jeadaannyi, ak ea meandeawani doobiiwnatteanyu, mida jeeda deaweeda, geaghus diitta sinyassa naweeda masaweega aba jeeda Gristohiin, doobiiwnattida leabu heeda Aseetta sinyas aba masaweegean;
ak abeeda ghaanalli niny ea uurda duunnoadaannyi, ak geawujeewi niny aba jeeda miyeadaannyi.
Ak abeeda iijea ghoaw ghaanyaschi duunnooda miyeeda.
Ak ea mii gideaba naanyaschi ghana gideaba neawoschi hidaat gil; geamajeekchi badiida danyas ak ghoaw deanyu, aba gideaba ninung' Gristo Yeesu doaw siidaannyi.
Oorjoogiyya, aniini meaguureewani geaw siida ninyas; ak geasinnyi ng'asheanjagi, ghaanung' gwaroossean ng'sheega mida bwadaw ak geamiriikchi beatteaba mwadi heeda mida gittasiyiin mwadiin.
Geamajeekchi beatta dagal heeda gidabuurbuuji jea danyasa gimear jea gwaleabu gurnooda leabu heettiyeada bea Aseetta aba jeeda Gristo Yeesu.
Anung'waada fukka ikkasa nihittiisa heedean gwasnu fughareenga nyaawa; nea aba jeedeang'wa iimida gidagasa eerada gayghoahiimneegwa Aseetta.
Anung' eakghusa ging'ng'ooyda huumeanda aba gitta sinyaschiin.
Oorjoogiyya, oang'ng'waanya searoojigeasu, nea gorroorji fukka abiideatta gidoowuurjeewiin nea googalaneasa.
Aba heeda fuga saang'a, nearukuneegwa ak ghamneawa gearukuneegwa nea ghabuudu dabeakka, anungwaada gawuurji weajoodiga beehiida Gristo.
Mudeanoodeaba fiisu nyariida gil, ak aseetta nyaawa ea jeeda gil, ak ng'asheega aghambiida geat ea gea baspaseega gil, mideawa fughareenga ng'asheega ng'eanyiida.
Aba gideaba aseasa ng'eang'deanya gwanda humng'eeda, ak ghamneawa geammuughu lealnoochcheanda, nea Ng'uttamiida was Yeesu Gristoohi,
jea ghwayam sasanuukkaasa nyeauuriin, ak ghwanung' gawuurji sea saseadaannyi ghambiidaat, aba uurda iissa ghoommu gwasin ghapka haleanjeessean headaannyi.
Asi, orjoogiyya, abwariinyi nea geagasayi, was hooseaneegeasu ea shiipka amiinaada nea goomajeegichchi aba jeeda Ng'uttamiideanyu, fugeasu abwariinyi.
Geamuschi Eudiya ak geamuschi Sintikke gideaba aduupcheena aba jeeda Ng'uttamiida.

Ak geamuscheey earang'iing'i, siideanyu bea huumwa eaduupchcheewi, aniyean weada gadeemsu, aba gideaba gagadiyi sea aniini aba iitta giijasta miy sea Glemeenti sea fugeasu mwaatkwa eaweechcheewi, mida gheawunga nyaawa jeeda gittabooda eaweega.
Ahoosana aba jeeda Ng'uttamiida galagasean; ak geabiikti dayi, Ahoosana.
Anung' ghwanal buuneeda sean milikghteadeang'wa. Ng'uttamiida nineekkiit.
Adootteawiichchi geat aba ng'asheanda wassean, geaghus aba mooshta Aseetta nea ghoamwaschi ghawooda, nea ghoabwachchi Aseetta ak ghwanal Aseetta gidoogasayi wassean.
Nea hoyyooyda Aseetta, adaraam fughareenga sean, gaygafur jeesingeagwa ea fughareengeagwa aba jeeda Gristo Yeesu.

Asi oorjoogiyya gidahuydean jea otteemsheesiina nii, ng'asheega sean was gea huumwa, ea gea mideawa mureeda, ea gea doobiiweadi, ea gea miyaasi, ea gea subwariiyi, ea dagheerjeandumeeda iimida miyinda wassean, ghana giigheambiitta miy wassean, otteemsheesiina ng'asheesu.
Ng'asheega ghayi sinnalleagwa leabu heedeanyu ak ghoong'ng'waanyi nea ghoayinyi nea goodeaksi heedeanyu, asna suuh, ak Aseetta mideawa hoyyoo gaygoobiida heedeang'wa.
Aniini neahoosannyi muuchchi aba jeeda Ng'uttamiida, aba gideaba huydeanda iiduw ea noobiikti otteemsheesiina badaydeanyu, gawuurji gidaghayi otteemsheesiindi gideawuurjeewi ak eamwonyasi gheatta.
Ak ea mii gideaba geargu ng'asheesu nea gwanda gideagasayi, aba gideaba aniini nanalli aba damannyoojiga sean gideawuurjeewi ak ghoahiidan gideandeawi.
Ghaanalli hing'eanooda, ak ghaanalli nyasooda haleanjeeda; aba gheatkweakka sean, sinnaalan lang'uudadeeda ea jalooda, dandeawa haleanjeeda ghanea meandeawani.
Ghammuuschi dasin haleanjeessean aba siitta goonan uurdean.
Ak eanoosinnyi ng'asheanda miy aba damanda sindeayeesi jeeda sawanadeedeanyu.

Nea agooga fuga Filippi, ghoanali gideaba aba damandida bea ging'eatta Giijasta miyiin, damanda ealeapni Makkedoniya, manda ganiiseeda eaweechcheewi aba ng'asheanji bea giidaydeayda ea ging'ng'ooydean geaghus agooga;
ak eara aba damanda eandeewi Desalonikke imiisean gooyeanean haleanjeeda eagasayi ak ea mabeachchi eaweechchanjagi.
Mii gideaba geagasayi haleanjeeda jea agoonean gil; geagasayi haghweega jea ghoahaada aba monneedeang'wa.

Ak ea naanyaschi haleanjeesean, ea ghwanaawda, aba seang'ayda; was gea ghayi eanean Epaforodittoyda leabu heedeang'wa, was haleanjeeda ogoonnyi, was shearooda nagheeda ng'andit, ea haleanjeeda sisapa geadi bea ghadoweeda biissa ghabwariiy Aseetta.
Nea Aseetteanyu gaygagooneegwa haleanjeessean oogasayi aba dagheerjeandumeedaannyi aba gigheambiitta mida jeeda Gristo Yeesu.
Asi eakghambiida Aseetta was Ghweandeanya, ea ghoaw damanda manda mudeanooda. Amin.
Oakghada fuga ghaydidi sean mida jeeda Gristo Yeesu. Ghoaghadeagwa oorjoogiyya eandeawi aba hiji.
Ghoaghadeagwa fuga ghaydidi sean, ghwaraanya gea abiitta gheeh Gaysaari.
Dagheerjeandumeeda Ng'uttamiida was Yeesu Gristo gagasa goobiida jeeda gurooruunatkeagwa.
Baulo was giijasoochcheanda Gristo Yeesu aba gidagasiida Aseetta, ea Dimotteo oorjeeda iyya.
Heeda Aseetta fuga ghaydidi doobiiweadi was oorjoogiyya aba jeeda Gristo Yeesu ida Golosaayi: Gagasa anyasa dagheerjeandumeeda ea hoyyoo jea gwaleabu heeda Aseetta was Ghweandeanya.
Inyeessa galagasean geabadischeesi Aseetta was ghweanda Ng'uttamiideanya Yeesu Gristo, iisumwaashchchi Aseetta appadahuukkeagwa
aba gideaba siyiinyi iitta masaweegeagwa appadayda Gristo Yeesu ea gidoobwariydi fuga sean ghaydidi,
aba gideaba gidoararji jea egooneegwa aba hoowa bea humng'eedean. Aba ng'asheanda noobay ayiinya ammwadi aba jeeda giijasta miy bea huumwaan,

nea nihidu heedeang'wa, ea gidaguulleatta ng'eanyiissean gil, ak gwaji haghweega ak gwaheedu gawurji gidaheetteayda aba heedeang'wa, ghang'eada damanda ghayi oayinyi ak ghoanalli dagheerjeandumeeda Aseetta bea huumwa,
gawuurji gidanaaldaneegwa Epafra was soomjeanda subwariinyi. Niny ea doabiiwaat nea gagadiyeesa Gristo appadahuukkeagwa
ak ea ninung' eanala bariinyeegeagwa aba gurorooda.

Ak aba sareani dea ghayi siyinyi ng'asheesu ea miyeenung'waada mooshta ghawooda appadahuukeagwa, gideaba gagooneegwa Aseetta fughareeda huumwa bea gidagassiida niny ak gagooneegwa weaghumeeda ea nalooda aba jeesingeagwa,
ak abeeda gajoommuusa oppideatta gidagasiida Ng'uttamiida nea goosinnyi gichchea goohoosan, ak gibindeang'wa gaygwaji haghweega aba gadiyoojiga miyaas neagoheettu aba fughareeda Aseetta.
Gagasa gagooneegwa gimusta sean bea uurdaannyi gheambiidaat, jea oammuusa nea ghoammuughu haleanjeesean nea goobeayi hoseaneega,
nea goobadischeesi Bwaabwa nung' eammuusa eanyasa gheatta hearaniischooda sea fugaaschi ghaydidi aba jeeda weeshinda.
Ak niny gwalealnaneasa jeeda uurda misanumeeda ak goobaleegeasa ea ghwadeasa jeeda sugoochcheandumeeda Balleandaannyi bwariiy,
nea aba niny geendeawi lealeanooda nea ea samsiinda ring'eeda.
Nea niny geegala Aseetta miidaachi ak ea duweachcheeda gil aba haleanjeesean;

aba gideaba haleanjeessean geesin appadaydeaba niny, gea mida humng'eeda ea gea mida ng'eanyiida, gea daach ea gea mii daach, ea hoorgajeega sugoodiga gil, ghanea sugoochcheandumeeda ghanea gea ambaliischi ghanea gheambalmeeda suu seaniin gwasin niny nea gwasin appadaydaannyi.
Niny ghayi gabay gwanda madeeda haleanjeessean, nea aba niny ghwanoas geat haleanjeessean.
Nea niny ea uhuuda saseeda gil, nea dea Ganiisa, nea niny ea ging'eetta, ak ea duweachcheeda leabu miyeeda, ak abeeda ghoaw siichchea goosheedeawa haleanjeessean.
Aba niny gammiisa goobiida headaannyi haleanjeeda hidaat bea Aseetta,
nea aba niny gooduupchi geaw haleanjeessean gea mida ng'eanyi ghana gea mida humng'eeda, ak gwasin hoyyoo aba foojeanda weay appadayda beehiidaannyi.
Nea ammwadi agooga ea sihheelleweegwa nea gowoschi munyas fughareen, nea gosinnyi sinaweega munyas,
ak ea niduupchi aba saseadaannyi niny aba miyeadaannyi, ak abeeda ghwanung' ahuuwa fuga ghaydidi meerukunana badahuukka ng'asheega munyas ammwadeadaannyi.

Asi iyoppiidi jeeda masaweega, ak ghoomiinaadi nea noahang'waanyichchi, nea meayameagwa aba heeda giijasta miy oayiinyi, ghayi surukkwiisa haleanjeessean mida hiing'eadayda humng'eeda, nea aniini Baulo geawoschi siidaannyi bea gadiyeeda.
Ak ghamneawa geang'weelayi aba sawanadeeda anyaschi appadahuukkeagwa, nea aba saseedeanyu ghahiichchi giikka shoodaan aba sawanadeeda Gristo appadayda saseadaannyi, nea ea ganiisa,
ak aniini ea sinung' doaw siideaba gadiyeani, gawurji siida siitteaga gadiyeeda Aseetta sigoonan appadahuukkeagwa, ak geasinnyi gadiyeeda Aseetta ak geanal,
nea makcheameani ghayi sifuyiin ghang'eada gweannyeekka ghayi bea garayiin ea jeachcheenga ak ghamneawa ea siitteajiisa fugaaschi ghaydidi.
Aba jeannyaawa ghwaloat Aseetta ak ghwang' ghwanal Emoojiga gitteenna hawunda meanang'oochcheandumeeda ea makcheameeda gheambalmeadaannyi was Gristoyda mida jeedeang'wa, was rarooda gigheambiitta.
Niny geergu aseasa, nea gereekusi giliwas sih nea geannaalji giliwas sih aba weaghuumeeda sean, ak geeyeadu giliwas sih nihissa heeda aba jeeda Gristo.
Nea geasawannyi geaw aba nii, nea geamajeekchi aba uurda sinoodeaba gadiyeeni iin jeedeanyuun.
Geagasayi anala gideadeawiitti appadahuukkeagwa, ea badahuukka fuga mida ng'eanyiida Laodokiya, ea gikka miighwadahaniin,
abeeda geemmajeek guroruunatka nyaawa, nea gaguuyi aba barinyeega, ak ghwanyas meanang'oochcheandumeeda sean bea huumwa, ak ghwanal makcheameetta bea Aseetta was Gristohiin,
nea jeadaannyi ea sufuysa gheaseeda bareaynata uhuuda ea fughareenga.
Geargu nii aba gideaba adiiduw ghoamwaschi gwareenganeegwa siida aba ng'asheega ng'uyyeega.
Earappeadi eawoschi sheagi aba heedeang'wean, geendeayi aba guroorooda, ak geahoosanyi muuchchi aba gideaba neajeeng'u gidamiyda giibindeang'wa ea gidamajeekta masaweegeagwa appadayda Gristo.
Asi agooga ghayi ghoodeapti Gristo Yeesu was Ng'uttamiida, asi oppiidana jeadaannyi,
nea goongooreadi hawungeagwa ak geemmajeegeegwa aba jeadaannyi ak gamajeegiit masaweegeagwa, ak gawuurji gidaghayi siinnaaldaneegwa, nea goobadiisachcheesi.

Asi ashageada adaghaghaseagwa siida ak gahuttaneegwa aba fughareedaannyi bea mwadaagha aba searoojikka bea buneedean, aba haleanjeedeaba garayi bea meangeenda mida jeeda ng'eanyiida nea mii dea Gristoohi.
Aba gideaba headaannyi gwanda hidooda sean bea Aseetta nea goobiida badaydaannyi.
Ak agooga eanoonyaschi eaweega hidaat appadaydeaba niny, nea niny ahaweewa fuga ahaaghwa ng'eanyiida ea gea ambalischi.
Nea appadaydeaba niny earagooga siyaadeagwa ghasmeahooda aba ghasmeahooda meesnana geattinga, nea ghoanung'waadi ng'asheega saseeda aba ghasmeahooda Gristo,
nea geepnyeegwa sea niny aba gibattiisanda, amaduw geettuunneegwa sea niny aba masaweega aba gadiyeeda Aseetta, ghayi aduunna niny jeeda miyeeda.
Hean agooga, goomeewayyi aba riing'eegeagwa ea aba sasanuukkeagwa meayaada ghasmeahooda, iiduw ghoadaw Aseetta eaweega sea niny, ak ea nisamseasa riing'eagaasa sean,
iiduw nea nibuus ng'ooruutka mida badahuukkaasa jea goorgweakseasaan, gageanu ak ghwasach ak goongoorsa uhuuda behiida.
Ak ghoareat fuga mideawa uurda gheambalmeeda dabitta ng'uchcheeda ak geanu ghoaw gichchea eahhiimda aba eeshpwara aba saawa, ak gahoosan appadahuukka nyaawa.
Asi adagoorgweakseegwa siida aba giinyeashteayda gichchea eayaak ghana gichchea eali ghana badayda ghweelmeeda ghana aba ng'ushshiinda sheeda ghana Sabatto,
suu jirooneeda ng'asheega jea ghwahidu; nea gidahuumwa ea Gristo gil.

Asi adaghaweadaneegwa sih gil, aba giimajeekta eatteaba geaw bea ng'eanyi ea ghadoowanda malaykajeega, nea ghamiinaada aba giidaheachchteaba geaw, nea ghaghwar geaw mwadaagha aba fughareadaannyi bea saseeda,
ak ea mwanoasa geat sea uhuuda, nea aba niny ghoang'ng'waay geat saseassean aba roobuutka ea mayiishka, ak gwaheedu aba heennooda leabu heeda Aseetta.
Ama inoomeewudayeewi Gristo aba haleanjeeda ng'eanyiida was meangeenda, ghwasaan anda gooppiideatti gili duu abeaha ng'eanyiida? Ghwasaan inyasghoamwaschi huumeannyeekka nyaawa,
“Adoang'ng'waanyi, ak eadoosamu, nea adoosachchi.”
(Ak ghoahiimu haleanjeeda jea goosha iisigadiyeatta), aba giduurji ginealshooda buuneeda ea gissurukutteayda?

Suu seaniin aba huumwa gawuurji gwadeagooda mideawa weaghuumeeda ak ghoang'eat ghadooweeda aba eatteaba geat bea ng'eanyi aba gidahang'waay gasa saseeda, ak ea marachchi gil ak moammu ghoadeal gitta gasa saseedean.
Asi agooga isittunneegwa sea Gristo, asi agassa haleanjeeda mida humng'eeda hooweanji mida Gristoohiin, niny nipteada aba geattinda dugwa bea Aseetta.
Oppkeatta haleanjeeda mida humng'eeda galagasean, mii gea mida ng'eanyiida gil.
Aba gideaba agooga goomeeway ak eaweegeagwa ea sifuy sea Gristo aba heeda Aseetta.
Iiduw isiittaajiit Gristoyda was eaweegaasa, abeeda eara agooga gajeettaajiideagwa sea niny aba jeeda giigheambiitta.

Asi anung'waada ng'asheega munyas bea munda ng'eanyiida mida saseenuukkeagwa: was hiseadayeandumeeda, ririnnyeanda, geawunda gheang'da muyi, giitteemshooda muy, ea shidoodeaba ghaang', ea ghadoowanda gidamawosa Aseetta.
Appadaydeaba ng'asheesu gayghwahidu ng'weaninda Aseetta.
Ak eara agooga ghayi gooneayeewi jeedeaba ng'asheesu nea gooppiidi jeeda.
Ak ghamneawa ghoanung'waadi ng'asheesu seaniin; nyarasta, ea ng'weaninda, munyinda, ea beeshta, ea ging'weakka aba ghuusigeegwa.
Adoonappiisi geat ng'uyyeega, nea gooyeeshshi geat noasuuchchi searoojigeaba garayi, ea gissisinniida
ak gookkweali searoojiga eashish, sinung' gaweeriidi ak ghoanalli nea geegala ninnyyeeda ghayi bwaat.

Ak aba sareani ea maheelli siida Yunaani ghana dea Yahuudi, dea siyaat ghasmeahooda ea dea miyeayaat ghasmeahooda, bunyeanda, ghana siida mwanala gil, ging'ng'oonyaneeda, ghana dea abal geaw, nea Gristo ea sean gil aba jeeda haleanjeesean.
Asi okkwealsheatta fuga niloat Aseetta, ghaydiidi subwariiy, bea jeesinga bayyiida buuneeda, ea ng'eeninda, eattoodeaba geat bea ng'eanyi, miyinda ea milighteayda,
daba siisi sar sareambwa nuut, nea goosammiisi geat, iimida siida nidiysa nuut, gawurji gidaghayi samsiindaneegwa Ng'uttamiida, ak gwasnu eara agooga asindunu.
Iing'atta suu seaniin gamiiseegwa andeawana barinyeega, aba gideaba gaygooroonnyi haleanjeesean ghoaw gilagi hidaat.
Ak ghoanung' goombalischi hoyyoo Gristo aba jeesingeagwa, aba gideaba agooga geeguurneegwa awasa saseanagi. Nea ghoahuuyi fuga badiischooda.

Anung' goobiida ng'asheanda Gristo jeedeagwa nea gwaheedu, anaala nea gaba siisi reekusa nuut aba weaghumeeda sean, nea goosarmannyi nyiigheega ea sarmoojiga guroorooda nea goobadiischeesi Aseetta aba guroruunatkeagwa.
Nea gilwassean osinyi, aba ng'asheanda ghana sinooda, asna sean aba gheawunga Ng'uttamiida was Yeesu, nea goobadischeesi Aseetta was Gheanda aba naweedeaba niny.
Gadeemga, asissiina siyeenatkeagwa mureeda, nii gidahaguuwsa Ng'uttamiida.
Siyeenatka abwarinya gadeemgeagwa nea adoonyareekiisi.
Diibiga, asisiina ghweanigeagwa ea gheamadigeagwa mureeda aba haleanjeesean, aba gideaba ng'asheanji gidagasiida Ng'uttamiida.
Ghweaniga, adoonnyareesayi diibigeagwa, aba gideaba gajiidu ghwalagaan.

Ging'ng'oonyanga, amwasa ng'asheega sean bea meanang'oodigeagwa bea ng'eanyiida, nea mii aba gheanyanga gil, gawurji fuga sin alooheeda aba heeda buuneeda, asi gamiiseegwa agadiyeena nea eashish guroruunatkeagwa, nea ghoawalli Ng'uttamiida.
Gilwassean osinyi, asna nea goobeayi jeesinga miyaas, gawuurji giloosissi Ng'uttamiida,
Nea ghoanalli gideaba gaygagooneegwa Ng'uttamiida gidageattindeang'wa bea hearaniischooda, ak googadiyeesi Ng'uttamiida was Gristo.
Aba gideaba siida wassean sina ng'asheega munyas gayghwanyas gidageattindaanyi uurji dea sina nea maygwanda shiitmeeda.
Fuga hees asissiina ging'ng'oomnyangeagwa ng'asheega miyaas doobiiweadi, ak ghoanalli gideaba eara agooga gondeawi Siida haw aba humng'eeda.
Oppiidana muuchchi jeeda mooshta Aseetta, nea ghoang'wearu aba ng'asheanji nea goobadischeesi;
ak ghoamwaschi Aseetta appadahuukkaasa, ak goottinneasa Aseetta gidaghuut aba ng'asheanda, ak geerukuti gitta funyaat bea Gristo ghayi siyiissean ghealoonigean,
Ak abeeda ghadaajiichchi, aba gideagassiidi rukunooda.
Abeawana weaghumeeda aba madeeda fuga mwamwasa, nea googadiyeatti muuchchi damanda sugooneegwa.
Asi ng'asheegeagwa gagasa gwandeawa dagheerjeandumeeda galeagasean, nea gwasamu balang'da, ak abeeda ghoanalli gichchea ashaayda ng'asheega buuneessean.
Iitteanyu sean gaygwarukneegwa Dikikko; niny oorjeediyya abwariinyi was siida gadiyeeda doobiiwaat, ak ea soomjeanda eandeawi bea Ng'uttamiida.
Ak ea neajeag'u niny heedeang'wa appadaydeaba ng'asheanji, ak abeeda ghoanalli gissuwuurjeewi ea gideaba gaygoomajeek jeesingeagwa,
niny gaygoodeana Onesimo, oorjeediyya doobiiwaat abwariinyi, nea niny gaba jeedeang'wa. Ak gaygwarukneegwa ng'asheega sean sisin aba hiji.
Ghoadeagwa Aristarkoyda eandeayeesi ghealooniga sea Marko, was oorjeeda hudagheamatta Barnaba, (iittaannyi noanyaschi gideaba iihidu heedeang'wa ghoadeapchi),
Yeesuuyda suguura Yusto. Nea fiisu ea fuga ghasmeahooda gil aba jeeda fugeandeayeesi gadiyeeda sugoochcheandumeeda Aseetta, ea niiw fuga geandewanean salgheang'da.

Epafrayda was siida jeedeang'wa was soomjeanda Gristo Yeesu, ghoaghadeagwa nea goopkeatteegwa galeagasean nea gwasin badiida aba moashtaannyi bea Aseetta, ak ghoamiinaadi nea sumwaseagwa aba haleanjeetta gasa Aseettean.
Aniini geawoschi mushoochcheanda aba gideaba ghadaayi gidadeawiitta appadahuukkeagwa ea gikka mida Laodokiyean ea gikka mida Hierappoliin.
Lukkayda was bwanamwagaanga bissa dabwariiyiin ea Dema ghoaghadeagwa.
Oakgha oorjoogiyya mida Laodokiya ea gea mida Nimfa ea fuga ganiiseeda gheannyi.
Baroajeanji isissoamwa aba heedeang'wa, ghoanung' easoamwa eara aba Ganiisa mida Laodokiya, ama ditta sung'oorsa Laodokiyahiin ghoassoami agooga.
Arukusiina Arkipa, “Gideaba ng'ulla muuchchi gadiyeetta goonnyi Ng'utamiidean sina nea gihiidi.”
Giighadi ghaang'waarji aniini Baulo aba geattindeanyu. Oppkaada gideaba sirattean. Gagasa anyasa dagheerjeandumeeda.
Baulo, ea Silwaano, ea Dimotteo, Heeda ganiiseeda Desaloniikke mida heeda Aseetta was Bwaabwa ea heeda Ng'uttamiida was Yeesu Gristo:
Gagasa anyasa dagheerjeandumeeda ea hoyyoo.
Geabadiischeesi Aseetta galeagasean appadahuukkeagwa oagasean, nea geapkachcheagwa aba jeeda mooshteanya bea Aseetta,
nea ghapkachcheegwa aba madeeda Aseetteanya was Ghweanda, gadiyeedeang'wa bea masaweega ea bariinyeegeagwa gadiiyi ea milikghteaydeang'wa bea rarooda aba jeeda Ng'uttamiideanya was Yeesu Gristo.
Aba gideaba geanalli, fuga eaduupcheewi bwayiiy Aseetta, gideaba niny niloadeagwa;

bea gideaba giijasteanya miy mwahinna heedeang'wa nea geaghus ng'asheanda akghwahit, ghabwada gwandeawa uurda, ea Gurorooda Ghaydit nea geesikteawi muuchchi. Ak ghoanalli siisi sirguun giduurji jea goobiida heedeang'wa, appadahuukkeagwa.
Ak ghoahuuyi fuga adeascheeweasa geat ea geeshta Ng'uttamiida, iing'atta nea noang'ng'waannyi ng'asheanda aba sawanadeeda haw, sea hooseaneega Gurorooda Ghaydit;
hean ghoahuuyi gichchea eegala aba heeda buuneessean mideawa masaweega aba ng'eanyiida Makkedooniya, ea ng'eanyiida Akkaya.

Ea meakghusa gideaba ghwadambiir ng'asheanda Ng'uttamiida aba heedeang'wa aba Makkedoniya ea Akkaya, iiduw masaweegeagwa aba heeda Aseetta ea niwa mwadi aba daroorakka sean, ea eeyi bwak ea eamudeammuusa eerukuna gil.

Aba gideaba saawa nea gaba geat gwarukkwiida iitteanya gidaoadeaptaydaneasa aba jeedeang'wa, ea gidooyamsiindi geat Aseetta nea ghoanung'waadi haleanjeeda mawosa Aseetta ak googadiyeesi dea mideawa eaweega ea Aseetta huumwa,
nea ghoammuughu Balleandaannyi jea gwaleabu humng'eeda, ghayi aduunna miyeeda, nea Yeesu gil, lealnaneasa nyarasta jea ghwahidu.
Aba gideaba fuga eaduupcheewi ghoanalli, gideaba gidasupkaandi heedeang'wa mii mwadaagha gil;
eara gwasa ning'atta sawanadeedeanya nea geappwaaspwaseasa aba Filippi, aba gidoanaldi, hean goomajeegeasa Aseetteanya ak gearukuneegwa giijasta miy bea Aseetta aba madeeda fuga eang'alealleewi.
Aba gideaba gissumuschi maleapna heeda ramaseanda ghana ririnyeanda, ghana eesin aba milmilanda;
gawuurji gidaghayi goondaneasa Aseetta gheatta Giijasta miy, ea gidasurukkwiidi, nea mewuurjeewani fuga ahoosani buuneeda, geewoschi fuga ahoosan Aseetta nal guroruunatkaasa.
Aba gideaba moang'ng'waa eerukuna ng'asheega ghwarooodeaba geat, aba gidoanaldi, ghana shidoodeaba ghaang', nea Aseetta ea muushoochcheanda gil;
nea ghanyea miyeegassa gharbeeda aba heeda buuneeda, ghana heedeang'wa ghana hichpa fii suuk, ghana gwadeeppa ea sigasayi aba gideaba gewoschi giijasoodiga Gristo.
Iissa gewoschi ng'eeni aba jeedeang'wa, gawuurji gidang'ulliida gheamatta diibigaaschi.

Gwasnu earaseasa geaghuscheegwa aba bariinyeega muuchchi, ak gehoosannyi nea meakghusa goonda giijasta miy bea Aseetta akghwahit, gegonnyeegwa eara guroruunatkaasa, aba gideaba nowoschi fugaasa subwariinyi.

Ak ghoapkaachchi gissuburdi ea gissisawaneatti, fuga eaduupcheewi; aba gideaba iissa geegadiyi eawa ea askweari, ak ea meesawani siida wassean aba jeedeang'wa, nea geerukkuneegwa giijasta miy bea Aseetta.
Agooga gowoschi muushoodiga, ak gwasnu eara Aseetta, ea gidaghayditta ea gidadoabiiwatta ak gabiissa ea meeyeatteana ghuut searoojigaasa aba heeda fugeagwa mideawa masaweega;
aba gideaba agooga ghoanalli, gawuurji ghweanda ea diibigaaschi, iissa geamiinnyi gheang'ba giliwas sih nea geemmajeegiideegwa nea gerekuseegwa
ak ghoabeadi gidahaguuwdaneegwa aba madeeda Aseetta, ghayi guurneegwa agooga ak abeeda goweayi jeeda sugoochcheandumeadaannyi ea gigheambiittaannyi.

Nea iissa geebadiischeesi Aseetta galeagasean appadaydeaba ng'asheanji, gideaba deanoang'ng'waanyi ng'asheanda Aseetta ghayi oyiing'si heedeanya, ea moang'ng'waaydani ng'asheanda buuneeda ghoanung' gawuurji ng'asheanda Aseetta, biissa gagadiyi aba jeedeang'wa agoogeeda mideawa masaweega.

Aba gideaba agooga, fuga eaduupcheewi, ahuuwa fuga jea godeascheweawa geat ganiisajeega Aseetta aba jeeda Gristo Yeesu mida ng'eanyiida Yudeeya; aba gideaba noanyaschi sawanadeeda uurji diitta aba heeda fuga ng'eang'deang'wa gawuurji gidasissiinda fuga Yahuudi,
dea ghayi nuus sean Ng'uttamiida was Yeesu ea sibanga, ak gooruuttaneasa jarooda, ak ghoanyareas Aseetta nea ghaheawa buuneessean
nea ghoadealeasa aseasa ea meerukusiini fuga Emoojiga gideaba gajeelealu ak gawuurji gili sinnyiit gideenda ring'eega nyaawa. Iiduw ea nihidu nyarasta Aseetta badahuukka nyaawa aba huydeanda.

Hean nea geegeandeawaneasa heedeang'wa, fuga eaduupcheewi, aba gheadi nuwaas, aba saseeda nea mii aba gurorooda gil, geamilikghti nea geegasayi muuchchi aba gassooda haw bea huumwa deakta gheanyangeagwa;
asi geegasayi eepkaana heedeang'wa aniini Baulo, gichcha ea gichcha ghoadealeasa Shattaani.
Neada raroodeanya ea naaha ghana hooseaneega ghana shiipka jea daghwara geaw aba madeeda Ng'uttamiideanya was Yeesu aba hinnoadaannyi? Neada ea mii agoogea?
Aba gideaba agooga gowoschi gharbeedeanya ea hooseaneagaasa.
Asi aba damanda mudeammuuseewana eamilikghta gichcha, geadaayi ghwahit geanung'waneasa bwadaw ng'eanyiida Atteene nea geabwaageat.
Ng'atta gechcheagu orjeediyya was Dimotteo, was soomjeanda Aseetta bea Giijasta miy bea Gristo, goodiing'u masaweegeagwa ak goomajeegeegwa,
ak siida ea adagwahirbaban aba sawanaduussu, aba gideaba agooga ghoanalli beadi sugooneasa ng'asheanji.
Nea aba damanda sindeayeewi sea agooga geebay erukuneegwa gideaba gajeanyasa sawanadeeda; ak gawuurji gidahittaayda, ak ghoanalli.
Gwasnu earaniini aba damanda muttammuuseawa gichcha milikghteayda, geajeagu siida danal masaweegeagwa, aamwahinna siitta jea gwasmeegwean ak gwasmeegwa, amaduw gaba gadiyeedeanyu mwadaagha.

Hean ghamneawa nea ghwahidu heedeanyu Dimotteoyda leabu heedeang'wa, ak gweanneesa giijasta miy bea masaweegeagwa ea bariinyeegeagwa ak gwargu gideaba ghoapkachcheasa galeagasean, nea googasayi deakteanya, gawuurji gissigassiidi aseasa deakteang'wa agooga,
Fuga eaduupcheewi, abasareani earappeadi sindi jeeda sawanadeedeanya sean ea giseaneega sihawdi isinyaschi iitteang'wa aba naweeda masaweegeagwa;
Aba gideaba ghamneawa gendeawi eaweega, aba iyoaminaadi nea gomajeekchewiidayi aba heeda Ng'uttamiida.
Aba gideaba gajeammuusa eattawdaan Aseetta badiischooda appadahuukkeagwa, aba hooseaneekka sean sindeawiin. appadahuukkeagwa aba madeeda Aseetteanya.
Nea ghoamwaashchi Aseetta muuchchi eawa ea askweari ak abeeda geadaayi gheanyangeagwa nea geesissinnyi ng'asheega ashoay bea masaweegeagwa.
Asi Aseetteanya was Ghweandeanya sea Ng'uttamiideanya was Yeesu gagasa ghoadoabiiw naweedeanya ea eahinna heedeang'wa;
gagasa ghwanung' Ng'uttamiida oahhaadana nea gooppiidi jeeda bariinyeegeaba geat, aba heeda buuneessean, ak gawuurji gissisindi aba heedeang'wa,
ak gomajeek guroruunatkeagwa ea meyeatteeweegwa ghuusi aba ghaydidanda aba madeeda Aseetteanya was Ghweanda, aba damanda jea ghwahinna Ng'uttamiideanya was Yeesu sea fugaaschi sean ghaydidi.

Aba huuydeayda, fuga eaduupcheewi, geemuscheegwa nea geamiinnyi gheang'deang'wa aba jeeda Ng'uttamiida was Yeesu, ak gawuurji gissinnaaldaneagwa aba heedeanya gidanisiindaneegwa oppiideatta nea gohhoosannyi Aseetta, ak gawuurji gidoosindi agooga, ak gagasa agooga asna muuchchi ea ghwanaawa.
Nea ghoanalli gideaba ana ng'asha gil ghayi sugoonnyeegwa leabu heeda Ng'uttamiida was Yeesu.
Aba gideaba ng'asheesu gea bwariiy Aseetta gil was gimmiinnoodeang'wa, ak gohhelleewi geat hiseadayeandumeeda;
ak ea daba siisi nal gichchea ghagheanda niny gatmooda aba ghaydidanda ea mureeda,
nea mii aba geawunda gheang'da muyi, ak gowuurjeewi fuga Emoojiga mwanala Aseetta;

ak ea manda siida adiiy, ghana godiiysa oorjeeda ghaamwat aba ng'asheanji, aba gideaba Ng'uttamiida dea jea ghawalda mureandoodeaba haleanjeeni seaniini, gawuurji gissibeani eamiinda gheang'deang'wa aba mureeda.
Aba gideaba Aseetta maguurneasa eppiidana jeeda ririnnyeanda was ng'asheega munyas, gagasa eppiidana jeeda ghaydidanda.
Nea siida heawa ng'asheesu, ea mwaheawa siida ghaheawa Aseetta, goneegwa agooga Guroroodaannyi Ghaydit.
Aba iitta bariinyeega oorjooga giyeanya moogassi gideaba gaygang'oorneegwa sii, aba gideaba agooga ninaleagwa Aseetta bariinyeegeaba geat;
ak aba huumwa ghoabwariinyi oorjookkiyeanya sean mida ng'eanyiida Makkedoniya ayda. Asi geemucheegwa fuga eaduupcheewi, gideaba asna ea ghwanaawa nii muuchchi,
nea geagasayi goobiitpiit nea ghwasiinda, ak gang'ula ng'asheegeagwa, ak googadiyi aba geatting'eagwa, gawuurji gissurukuteaydi;
ak abeeda gajanyasa mureeda aba heeda fuga emoojiga, ak ea adooghuschi buuneeda aba haleanjeeda.
Fuga eaduupcheewi asi aseasa meegassi amoanali gil, aba iitteaba fukka nimeewean, ak abeeda ea mogiisandani fuga mandeawana rarooda.
Ghang'eada dea sumwaseewi gideaba Yeesu ghami ak gwaduudu gichcha, earagwasa, aba naweeda Yeesu, gaygweadu Aseetta sea niny fukka nililiin.

Aba nii geerukuneegwa aba ng'asheanda Ng'uttamiida, bea gideaba aseaseeda suwoschi majeekcheewi, sunung'waneasa heeda ea ghwahidu damanda jea ghwahinna Ng'uttamiidean, majeshsheedeawana fukka ghayi nilil aba jeeda miyeedean.

Aba gideaba Ng'uttamiida gaygwashuubean niny nea gwaleabu humng'eeda ea shookcheanda haw mideawa digheanda, ea nyeashta malaykajeanda haw, sea nyeashta durumbeatteeda Aseetta. Ak abeeda fukka ghayi meewwiisa jeeda Gristohiin gajeshsheeda ettuuttu;

hean abeeda aseaseeda suwoschi majeekcheewiin, suhuuydeannyiin, gajeassealdaneasa sea saawa aba jeeda shamoghuutka, ak geadeapti Ng'uttamiida aba heettiyeada; ak abeeda gajendeawana Ng'uttamiida galeagasean.
Asi ageandeawana geat salgheang'da aba ng'asheesu.
Fuga eaduupcheewi, aba ng'asheega iitta damanda ghana eaweetta jea gawas, moogassi gideaba gaydang'oorneegwa.
Aba gideaba agooga ghoanalli beadi eaweetta Ng'uttamiida gayghwaanda gidawunniida mareanghweanda eawa.
Hean iyayi buuneeda, “Gebeayi weayda nea gebeayi seayu,” deagheatta ghwahidu nyariida badahuukka nyaawa gawuurji gidanyassiida gatmooda lajooda aba jeatta jeepta, ak ea manda gichchea gamulsiinda.
Ak ea moondani jeeda misaneeda, fuga eaduupcheewi, ea ghwanung' eaweettida ghahameegwa ng'eanyi gawuurji mareanghweanda.
Aba gideaba agooga oagasean noahuuyi balloojiga weeshinda, ea balloojiga askweari; aseasa mebeahi eaweeda ghana misaneeda.
Asi adeelilli ruweanga, ea ewuurjeewana buuneeda mwaatkwa, asi eang'ng'weerna, nea geetteennyi.
Aba gideaba fuga rooji gwarooji eawa, nea eara fuga boogidi iissa gaboogidi eawa.

Duukku, aseasa deesuwooseewi fuga askwearda, gagasa endeawana gheadeenda, nea geediinyi daghanuunatkaasa igeambooda masaweega ea bariinyeega, nea nngoofanjeandeanya bea gharinyeanda gagasa eanung' ghoaw rarooda jea gweadu lealeanooda.
Nea Aseetta ghayi masneasa ak abeeda ghwalas uhuudeanya, gagasa eanyasa lealeanooda appadayda Ng'uttamiideanya was Yeesu Gristo,
dea ghayi meah appadahuukkaasa aba ising'eatng'eachchi ghana eella abeeda geendeayi sea niny.
Asi daba siisi amajeek nuut ak ea daba siisi adiing'u nuut gageawiit, gawuurji gidoosindi.
Fuga eaduupcheewi, geemuscheegwa gideaba, asissiina mureeda fuga sin gadiyeeda aba jeedeang'wa ak gabiissa gwanda madeedeang'wa aba jeeda Ng'uttamiida nea geewwoowseegwa,
asissiina mureeda nea ghoawwalli gheang'da aba bariinyeega aba gadiyoojiga nyaawa. Gagasa abeaha weayda nea gobeayi geat.
Ak geemuscheegwa, fuga eaduupcheewi, owwoowsiina gheanyanga fuga ghaleehooda, ommajeega fuga giyoonnyi, aweada fuga ng'arng'ari, ak gimilikghti sea buuneessean.
Ang'ulla siida wassean adaghwawaldaawa ng'asheanda muy dea muy, iissa ghoayaachchi geeshta ng'asheanda miy galeagaseab, agooga nea goobeayi geat ea biissa aba heeda buuneessean.
Ahoosana galeagasean,
amwaasha Aseetta damannyoojiga sean,
abadiischeena aba giliwas gil; aba gideaba nii gidabwariiyda Aseetta aba heedeang'wa aba jeeda Gristo Yeesu.
Adoottealli Gurorooda,
adofoolli ramooranga,
asimsima haleanjeessean; ak ghoang'ng'waanyi ng'asheanda miy,
ohhelleewana geat munyinda wassean.

Gagasa ghoammiidu Aseetta mideawa weayda sasanuukkeagwa sean, nea gaba geaw; ak gagasa gahamiyaasiit gamiyeasiidi guroruunatkeagwa ea jeesingeagwa ak geemmajeek nea meerukunana badayda ng'asheega munyas aba damanda hinnooda Ng'uttamiideanya was Yeesu Gristo.
Ninyeeda guurneegwa adoabiiwaat, ak gayghoammiineegwa.
Fuga eaduupcheewi, amusiischoaweasa.
Oakghada fuga siduupcheewi sean aba samooda ghaydit.
Geamuscheegwa appadayda Ng'uttamiida, ossomassiina fuga eaduupcheewi sean barawajeanji.
Gagasa anyasa dagheerjeandumeeda Ng'uttamiideanya was Yeesu Gristo oogasean.
Baulo ea Silwano, ea Dimotteo, ea ganiiseeda Desaloniikke mida jeeda Aseetta was Bwaabwa sea Ng'uttamiideanya was Yeesu Gristo.
Gagasa anyasa dagheerjeandumeeda ea weayda leabu heeda Aseetta was Ghweanda, sea heeda Ng'uttamiida was Yeesu Gristo.

Aseasa gammiiseasa ebadiischeesiina galeagasean appadahuukkeagwa, fuga eaduupcheewi, ak ea gittoobiiwsiinda gil, aba gideaba masaweegeagwa niheedu muuchchi, nea bariinyeega gilwas sih aba jeedeang'wa aba hichpa nuut ea niihaada.
Amaduw earaseasa ea sugwareesi appadahuukkeagwa aba jeesinga ganiisajeega Aseetta aba milikghteaydeang'wa ea masaweega ondeawi aba ghabasteang'wa sean sea sawanaduutka oamilikghti.
Nii gwadeagooda girgweageeda huumwa bea Aseetta, ak abeeda geanung' ahuuwa fuga miisa gheambalmeeda Aseetta, was dea ghamneawa sisawasseegwa,
hean aba huumwa Aseetta gayghawaldawa sawanadeeda aba heedeaba fukka sawaneegwean,
ak gagooneegwa fuufta sea aseasa agoogeeda sisawan, damanda jea eattahaaja Ng'uttamiida was Yeesu jea gwaleabu humng'eeda sea malaykajeegaaschi mideawa uurjeenga beasta yeat,
nea ghawalda mureandooda masissiina mureeda giijasta miy bea Ng'uttamiideanya was Yeesu.
Ak gaygwasawana aba ghoorjooda nyariida manda mudeanooda ak geegeandeawa madeeda Ng'uttamiida ea heeda gigheambiitaannyi mideawa uurda,
eaweetta jea ghwahinna eakghambiit aba jeeda fugaaschi ghaydidi, ak ghahamng'eanyi buuneessean ghayi mwas ninyiin, aba gideaba muwwuunoodeanya geamwas aba heedeang'wa.
