Appadaydeaba ng'asheanji, iissa geamwaashchi Aseetta galeagasean appadahuukkeagwa, gideaba gagasa ghwanung' Aseetteanya gahaguuweegwa guurunoadaannyi, ak ghoahiit gilinyoo aamiy gasa ea gadiyeeda masaweega aba uurdaannyi,
abeeda gwanda gharbeeda gheawunga Ng'uttamiideanya was Yeesu aba jeesingeagwa, nea agooga geakghambiideagwa aba jeadaannyi aba dagheerjeandumeeda Aseetteanya ea Ng'uttamiida was Yeesu Gristo.
Asi ghamneawa aba iitta hinnooda Ng'uttamiideanya was Yeesu Gristo ea bassiinda jea eabwada geat ak gendeawi niny, geemuscheegwa, fuga eaduupcheewi,
ak ea adagabay gwaduumduum fughareengeagwa ghana adeawiida, aba gurorooda ghana ng'asheanda, ghana aba barawajeanda sighay gwaleabu heedeanya, ahiimu gideaba eaweeda Ng'uttamiida nihidu.
Asi adagwareenganneegwa sih aba gidawassean; aba gideaba eaweettida mayghwahidu, ea ghanyi gooshoohu mwadi heheeweega, ak abeeda geattahaach siitta was roodaneeda, was balleanda roodaweegean,

diida heewachchiin ak goodiing'ng'u geaw appadayda giliwassean sugurriideawa aseetta ghana gilinyoo eebada, ea eeyi bwak ea gageanu horgeadaannyi aba jeeda gheeda sibatta Aseetta, ak ghoahiimu geaw gideaba niny Aseetta.
Moapkaadi damanda ghayi sindeayeewi sea agooga nearukuneegwa ng'asheesu?
Ak ghamneawa ghoanalli gidadeal niny, abeeda geattahaach aba damandaannyi.
Aba gideaba makcheameetta bea heheweega deaweedean ghamneawa gagadiiyi; ak ghamneawa gwanda siida adeal, gaygwasindunu ea eeghus ea sigeanda aba jeennaweeda.
Abeeda diitta mandeawana deaweedean gajeattahaach, ak abeeda gaygwanuus Ng'uttamiida was Yeesu aba aroosta ghuuttaannyi ak gwanyarja niny aba deaktaannyi ea hinnoadaannyi.
Aba hinnooda dea mandeawana deaweeda aba gadiyeeda Shattaani gaygwandeawa uurda sean nea gwandeawa gwadeagwajeega ea deamdeamanga,
ea ng'uyyeega sean munyas aba heeda fuga jea gameewa, aba gideaba saawa mwamwasa bariinyeega, ak abeeda ghwanyas lealeanooda.
Ghoaw gidanung'waadawa Aseetta gobiideewa jeeda uurda roodaweega, ak ghwanung' ghamwas ng'uyyeega,
ak abeeda gergweaksa sean giikka mwamwasa huumeandean ak goohoosan geat aba jeeda ng'asheega munyasiin.

Iiduw gammiiseasa aseasa gideaba gajeebadiischeesiina Aseetta galeagasean appadahuukkeagwa, fuga eaduupcheewi bwariiy Ng'uttamiida, aba gideaba ghayi nibay ghwaloadeagwa Aseetta ghang'eada mwadi ak ghoanyaschi lealeanooda, aba gimmiinooda jea ghoammiinneegwa Gurorooda, ak ghoamwaschi huumeanda.
Aba nii ghayi guurnaneegwa aba naweeda giijasteanya miy, ak abeeda ghoanyaschi gigheambiitta Ng'uttamiideanya was Yeesu Gristo.
Asi, fuga eaduupcheewi, amiinaada nea gommajeekchi geat, ak ghoang'ng'waanyi ng'asheekka ghayi sinnalleagwean, gaba ng'asheega ghana gaba barawajeanda.

Nea abeeda Ng'uttamiideanya was Yeesu Gristo niny, ea Aseetta was Ghweandeanya, ghayi bwariinyeasa ak gageandeawaneasa salgheang'da ea ghoaw eaweega mammuudeana ea gidamiy sirarji aba jeeda dagheerjeandumeeda,
ak gageandeawa guroruunatkeagwa salgheang'da, nea gomajeegideegwa aba giliwas gadiyeeda miy ea ng'asheanda.
Asi huydeanda fuga eaduupcheewi, amwaasha Aseetta appadahuukkaasa, ak abeeda gawa ng'asheanda Ng'uttamiida mwadi aba hooseaneega, gawuurji giduurji aba heedeang'wa,
ak gelealnaneasa heeda fuga mii dobiiweadi, munyas; aba gideaba mii sean gil gea mideawa masaweega.
Iiduw Ng'uttamiida ea doabiiwaat; jea gomajeegideegwa nea ghoahaghwaneegwa aba diitta muyiin.
Amaduw earaseasa ea sughuschi Ng'uttamiida appadahuukkeagwa, nea gideaba goosinnyi ng'asheega ghayi surukuneegwa, ea gideaba gajasna ng'asheega sugoonnyeegwa aba digheanda.
Gagasa ghoadoabiiw Ng'uttamiida guroruunatkeagwa ak ghoanyaschi bariinyeega Aseetta, nea ghoamilikghti aba Gristo.

Fuga eaduupcheewi, geegoonnyeegwa digheanda, aba gheawunga Ng'uttamiida was Yeesu Gristo, ohhelleewana geat oorjeedagiyeang'wa wassean bea ghaleahu nea masna ng'asheega ghayi sing'ng'waanyaan heedeanya.
Ak ghoanalli agooga gidamiisiindaneegwa gideaba gajootteascheewana geat, ak ea meebeahi ghaleahu damanda sindeayeewi sea agooga,

nea ghanyea miyeayaaga mukkatteeheemba siida wassean nea meashaahi, geaghus aba sawanadeeda ea deawiitmeeda nea geesinnyi gadiyeeda eawa ea askweari, ak abeeda ea meesawani siida wassean aba jeedeang'wa.
Nea meakna gideaba meendeawani uurda gil, geebaysiini gideaba geegasayi ghoaw searoojigaasa gichchea agalana ak gotteascheewi.
Aba gideaba earaba damandida ghayi sindeayeewiin, gegoonnyeegwa digheanji, “Gideaba siida iimagassa gwasin gadiyeeda abeeda ea adagweagiischi.”
Aba gideaba siyiinyi gwanda jeedeang'wa fuga ghaleehooda, iissa ghasa geat ng'asheega buuneeda, nea goodeawiit buuneeda suurja.
Asi ghamneawa gajeattawa fiisu digheanda nea geamiinnyi gheang'da aba naweeda Ng'uttamiida was Yeesu Gristo dasna gadiyoojiga nyaawa nea ghwasiinda ak ghwanyas hamitta nyaawa jea ghwaak.
Asi fuga eaduupcheewi, adoalagaannyi aba sinooda ng'asheega miyaas.
Ama deeppa gwanda siida wassean heawa gwasissa mureeda ng'asheandeanya surgu aba jeedeaba barawajeanji, abeeda orroora siisi, nea adiiduw goppaloolli, ak abeeda ghabwaspwas.
Ak ea doanung' ghoaw weajoochcheanda, areekusiinda gheang'da oorjeeda giyeang'wa.
Asi ghamneawa gagasa gagooneegwa weayda Ng'uttamiida ninyeeda mideawa weayda galeagasean aba naweadinga sean. Gagasa gobiida Ng'uttamiida heedeang'wa oagasean.
Aniini, Baulo, ghang'waarji giighadi aba geattindeanyu. Nii girooraneeda gil aba giliwas barawajeandeanyu; nii gideang'oorriidi.
Gagasa anyasa dagheerjeandumeeda Ng'uttamiideanya was Yeesu Gristo oagasean.
Aniini Baulo geawoschi gijasoocheanda Yeesu Gristo aba digheanda Aseetta was lealnoocheandeanya ea Yeesu Gristoyda was ghusoodeanya.
Ea Dimotteo balleandeanyu bea huumwa aba naweeda masaweega. Nyasa dagheerjeandumeeda ea baydeayda ea hoyyooyda leabu heeda Aseetta was Bwaabwa ea Yeesu Gristo was Ng'uttamiideanya.
Damanda ghayi eaweewi Makkedoniya geamuscheeyi gideaba abiidana Efeso. Ak eara ghamneawa geamuscheey aba gideaba gwanda fiisu anaal ginealshooda ng'uyyeega aghuuma fiisu.
Ak ea adagang'ulla ng'asheega ghwasildeanga ea iitooda gheambaghweaniga mamudeana jea gweadu sheangnyeeda ak ea mwalooda gil nea mii gheambalmeeda Aseetta mida jeeda masaweega, asi sindunu.
Gidasibaysiina digheanji ea bariinyeega leabu jeedeesh ea ng'asheega rinna ghuuta miy gil ea masaweega manda gimitunoodabwageaw.
Buneesuurja iimwanyasa naweeda miy ak gwayamsa geat ng'asheega mwadaagha,
Saawa gagasa gideaba gayghoaw ginealshoodiga deaweedeeda, ak ea mwanala ng'asheeka baloolean, nea eara ng'asheega baloola nea goomajeeksea ghanyeamwanala.
Ak geanalli gideaba deaweeda amiy, siida i gadiyeatta aba naweeda hit,

gagasa eanala ng'asheanji gideaba deaweeda mamiisiina siida doobiiwaat, gamiisa fuga munyas, ea gea mwada geeshta deaweeda, ea fuga mwamwasa Aseetta, ea fuga ring'eega, ea gea sina ng'asheega munyas, ea fuga mabatta Aseetta, ea fuga bara ghweaniga nyaawa, ea inyeesa bara gheamadiga nyaawa, ea fuga nuusa buuneeda,

ea fuga mealuuli, ea ng'eedeeda mealuuli sea niirja, ghana fuga jagwadi suurja, ea gea ng'uyeega, ea fuga akka habeawooda ng'uyeega, ea imiida ng'asheanda wassean maweapchi sea ginealshooda bea huumwaani.
Ak gineashooni ea diitta ghayi sigoonan darukwiida Gijasta Miy bea badayda gigheambiita Aseetta diitta mideawa ghawoodean.
Aniini geabadischeesi Yeesu Gristoyda was Ng'uttamiideanya goonan uurda aba gideaba ghwadaa geawoschi doobiiwaat, ak ghwayiinan jeeda gadiyeedaanyi.
Abeeda aniini ghayi amwali nyeesa geanyareesay buuneeda nea geang'eaway, nea geasawanyi ak ghanyaschi baydeayda aba gideaba geasinyi ng'asheesu aba leendeeda, aba gideaba meandeawani masaweega.
Ak ghanyaschi muuchi dagheerjeandumeeda Ng'uttamiideanya, ea masaweega ea barinyeega mida jeeda Gristo Yeesu.
Ng'asheanji huumwa gil, ak gamiisa masooda muuchi gideaba Gristo Yeesu ghwahidu munda ng'eanyiida gwalealu fuga ring'eega, ak siida madeeda aba jeedeaba fiisu ea aniini.

Ak aba seareeni ea naanyaschi baydeada aba gideaba aniineani bea madeedean, ghoadaajiit Yeesu Gristo milightaydaanyi sean, aba heedeanyu, nea ghaahuyi siida iiduw jea etteaschi ak aba heeda fuga jea ghamwas ak ghwanyas eaweega manda mudeanooda.
Mureeda ea gheambiida daba sugoocheanda eaweega manda mudeanooda was dea maygamutmudan, ak ea midachi ninyi Aseetta gil ak ghwahit ea ghwoow eaweega manda mudeanooda. Amin.
Ea balleandeanyu Dimotteo, geagoonyeey digheanji ghoow gidiwshooda appadayda ng'asheega was ramooranga ghayi ashoohu appadaydang'u, ak appadaydeaba suuh gung'uchi muuchi ng'ucheedida.
Ak guhuwi siida masaweega bissa amiy fughara aba gideaba gwanda fuga ninung'waada miyinda fughareeda, hea ghwadatas masaweega nyaawa.
Aba jeedeaba fiisu gwanda geaba Himenayo ea Iskanda, ak fiisu eaneasachsi Shattaan aba gideaba gideaba eannaal ak ea mong'eawa Aseetta.
Gidamadeeda jea deamajeek geagasayi musiischooda ea baditta Aseetta ea mooshta ghawooda nea goobadischeesi, ak ng'asheesu geesin appadahuuka buneasean.
Amooriisiina sugoodiga ghawooda ea fuga hees sean mideawa gheambalmeeda, ak geanyaschi gibinda siippiit ng'eanyi ea hoyyooyda, ak geabwachchi Aseetta nea geepiidi naweeda miy.
Ng'asheanji amiy, ak ea mwasaati aba madeeda Aseetta was lealnoocheandeanya,
nea gasa gideaba gay ghwalolon buuneesseaniin, ak ghwanal gitta was humeandean.
Aba gideaba Aseetta aagi, ak eara dea aaduupchi buuneeda ea Aseetta aagi, ninyi siida was Gristo Yeesu;
nini gabeagu eaweegaaschi nea gabwageaw ak ghoaw siida jea goottin buuneessean, ak gajeemuuwwu aba damandaanyi.
Ak aniini appadaydeaba nii geayiinan doow gijasoocheanda ak gearukwiidi giijasta nea ghawaschi gineashoocheanda fuga eemoojiga danal masaweega ea huumeanda. (geargu huumwa mearukni ng'uyeega).

Asi geagasayi gwandeawa headiga geattinga miyaas, biissa ea manyareessa, biisa ea masheangdooschi. Abeeda headiga sunu ea dagatgada geattinga nyaawa googeal humng'eeda galeagasean damanda mooshta ghawooda.

Ak gwasnu eara gadeemga ea dasna suulga aba eagweega miyaas, ak gwandeawa mureeda miy gheedeenda ak ea adagwasin suulga aba buudeega sireedi ghana lagheanga meangmeangi ea boshcheanda, ghana eagweega hees sheayat.
Ak suulga nyaawa gidabal ea gibinda nyaawa miy gil aba gideaba nii gidamiisa gadeemga awali Aseetta.
Gatmooda gamiisa gideaba gayghwasinda aba damani gassa nalooda gidean, nea ghamwas aba naweadinga sean.
Aniini measiksiini gatmooda goonealshi ghana gideaba gaygoombali ng'eedeeda, gamiisa gideaba gayghwasiinda.
Aba gideaba siida sisin bea madeeda Adam gil, ak gabassa Hawa.
Ak Adam ea miyerengani geereengani gatmooda muuchi ak ghwabitta jeeda ramaseanda.
Ak gay ghwalalaan aba jeetaanyi iimajeegiit appadayda masaweega ea bariinyeega ea giminooda ea jeeda mida gheadeenda.
Ng'asheanji huumwa gil gideaba siida jea ghoaw siida haw jea ghoahaaghwa fuga ganiisa gagasa gadiyeeda miy.

Siida haw bea ganiisa gamiisa gideaba ea meerukna gidamuy appadaydaanyi ng'eedeeda mideawa gatmoonagi, mideawa gheadeenda biissa gwandeawa weaghumeeda, siida aroottooschi haleanjeeda, deapiida buuneeda, naal goonealshi,
Mii siida boogidi gil, mii siida bara buuneeda, ak ea garbabu, mii siida gheangnyachi gil, ak ea mii siida bwariiy lapiya,
ak ea siida ammu goobal gheanyi muuchi nea ghwanung gaba diibigaaschi mureeda.
(aba gideaba siida mwaammu goombal gheanyi gay ghwamustaan ghoahaaghwa Ganiseeda Aseetta?)
Ak ea adaghoaw siida duughwalalaan askwearjoojusu neekiin, ak ghaghwargeaw ak goobeedeaysa jeeda girgweaksiinda gawurji gidasihinda Shataan.
Ak gamiisa gideaba gamuuwwuuna badaydaanyi fuga manda jeeda Ganiisa ng'asheega miyaas, aba gideaba adeergu ng'asheega munyas appadaydaanyi ak ghoabitta jeeda gadageeda Shataan.

Weedanga fuga Ganiisa eara saawa gamiisa gideaba ea fuga miyaas searooji ak ea mii fuga yamiisachchi ng'asha, ak ea mii fuga leeha difaayeeda ak ea fuga bwariiy lapiyeeda leabu naweeda mwadaabiiwa gil.
Ak saawa gamiisa gideaba goomajeek masaweega aba jeeda miy.
Fiisu gidamadeeda ghang'wana ghanyi eadaa ea jea ghoammu gadiyeani i manda gilsidaa muyi abeeda geenung wasin gadiyeani bea weedangean.
Eara gadeemga nyaawa gamiisa ea fuga miyaas searooji gil, mii fuga nappiisa buuneeda ng'uyeega, ak gamiisa ea fuga mideawa gheadeenda gil, nea doobiiweadi aba haleanjeesean.
Weedanga Ganiisa gamiisa gideaba gaygaba ng'eedeeni bea gatmoonagi, nea ghoanaal muuchchi diibiga nyaawa naweeda miy, ak ghoomu goobal gealga nyaawa.
Aba gideaba fuga sin muuchchi gadiyeeda weedanga Ganiisa gajeewal gheangda, ak gay gooleeysiit Buuneeda ak ea may ghoawal gil aba masaweega nyaawa mida jeeda Gristo Yeesu.
Geang'oorneey baruwajeanji nea geabaday hinnooda heedaang'u eawoojusu duwaawiin.
Ama deeppa dashingda ginali gidamiisa gibinda fuga gheeda Aseetta was Ganiiseeda Aseetta majeek, wa sindeetta ea Lagheaneeda akar gheeda bea huumwa.

Ak ea huumwa gil gideaba makcheameeda baditta Aseetta ahaw. Aseetta geetaajiiti aba saseeda Ak doobiiwnataanyi ghoohiimu Guroorooda Ak ghwadaa giijasoochcheanda humng'eeda Ak geerukwiida iitaanyi aba jeeda emoojiga, Ak geamwas aba jeeda ng'eanyiida, Ak geeyaat humng'eeda heeda ghambiidaat.
Asi ng'asheanji gabean gwargu Gurorooda Ghaydit nea ghwadaajiit bea gideaba damanda huydean gwanda fuga jea gooheelli geat masaweega, ak gooleeysiit fuga ng'uyyeega ea ginealshooda Shattaani.
Aba ng'uyyeega fuga ammiittu geat, hean ghaghwarda jeesinga nyaawa saawa nea gaba geat.
Inyeessa ghoadeal buuneeda geeshshooda, ea agitta hamichchoojiga nea hamichchoojusu ghayi ghabwat Aseetta ak ghwanung' ghwadeattaawa badiischooda fuga mideawa masaweega naal humeanji.
Aba gideaba haleanjeesean sin Aseetta amiyaas, nea manda dea jea eeheawa, dea jea eeheawa, gamiisa gideaba gajedeaptaawa badiischooda.
Aba gideaba haleanjeeni siminna ng'asheanda Aseetta ea mwooshta ghawooda.
Apkeasiina oorjoogiga ng'asheesu, ak gaywoosa siida gadiyeeda miy bea Gristo Yeesu, naal ng'asheega masaweega, ea ginealshooda miiy ghayi iyaadi geeshta.
Asi heawana deanghoochka munyas bea gweargwa mwaloada giliin. Ak ang'iing'i giinaali geaw baditta Aseetta.

Aba gideaba deangheeda nung ghwanyas saseeda uurda ghwahit gilmwanang', ak baditta Aseetta ghwahit aba haleanjeesean, aba gideaba gindeawi heelleeda eaweegeaba ghamneawa ea diitta iiduw jea ghwahiduun.
Ng'asheanji huumwa gil ak gammiisa gideaba gajeemwas.
Aba gideaba ghoaw gidaghamna adeawiideasa ea gidasigadiyeatti muuchchi appadaydeaba gili. aba gideaba aseasa geeghuschi Aseetta majeek was lealnoochcheanda buuneessean, ghwaraanya gea mwas niny.
Ng'asheesu rukuta nea ginaali.
Adiidu gafool sii gheareemanandumeedaang'u, ak guwoosi siida jea eegala aba heeda fuga mideawa masaweega, aba jeeda baloolda ea giibinda sea bariinyeega ea masaweega ea alooheeda.
Damani jea doonaan, milmiliida aba giissoomanda nea gireekusi buuneeda nea ginaali.
Adinung'waadi gadiyeetta immuusi mida jeedaang'uuni, sigoonyi aba ramooraneedean, ak ghwayiin gweargwa geattinga nyaawa uhuudaang'u.
Ateemsheesiina ng'asheesu muuchi, ak giibiidi jeeda nea giing'ng'ooysi aba gideaba gay ghwadaajiit giibindaang'u aba heeda buuneessean.
Ghamwada saseedaang'u ea ginealshoadaang'u. Abiidana jeedeaba ng'asheesu aba gideaba iisini ng'asheanji gajaghuhageaw ea fukka alleeyseey iidiin.
Adiwoowsi gweargweeda, reekusiina gawurji ghweanda, ak eara gheareemanga gawurji oorjooga giyeang'wa,
gadeemga woosi gawuurji geamadu, gadeemga manang'i gawuurji haweega giyeang'wa aba alooheeda sean.
Sissiina mureeda masinng'weega was masinung'weega huumwa.

Ak masinung'weanda iimideawa diibiga ghana diibigaabwa gaaschi, gidamadeeda diibisu gagasa ghwanal gidamiisa saawa bea ng'ullooda fuga nyaawa, nea gang'ula fuga jiilu aba gideaba ng'asheanji aamiy aba madeeda Aseetta.
Nea dea was masinung'weanda huumwa, sinung'wa heeda nea gaba geaw, niih ghusoadaanyi niidaw Aseetta ak niny goomajeek mooshta ghawooda ea baditta Aseetta eawa ea askweari.
Nea masinung'weanda moammu ghoong'ng'waay geaw aba ng'asheega munyas nii niimi eara eeng'ula nea gudea majeek.
Ng'asheesu rukkuta aiduw abeeda adaghoaw habearga.
Gili was sii mwaghamwada fugaaschi was fugaabwa gheanyi niheawa masaweega, ak gamunyiiti ea ghang'al siida mandeawana masaweega.
Masinung'weanda adeang'waar ea gaba gweanyeewi laadam nea abeeda siyeadaanyi ghayi aagi.

Ak easumwowuna badaydaanyi ng'asheega miyaas bea gireerda diibiga, ak ea nideapta rabasta nea niihuun gishanga fuga ghaydidi ak ea niweat fuga mida jeeda sawanadeeda, ak ea nisin muuchi ng'asheega miyaas.
Ak masinung'weega was gadeemga duea manang'i adung'waari gheawunga nyaawa aba gideaba iiraanya geawunda gheangda bea saseeda gay gwanungsa heeda naweeda Gristo ak gaweay gheenda.
Abeeda saawa gajeergweaksa aba gideaba ninung'wa heeda masaweega nyaawa bea madeeda.

Nea gicha ea meaghusa nii, ghwanaal geat ghaleehooda ak gwaneaydooschi aba gealga ak ea mii ghaleehooda gil gabeachi, inyeesa goong'uuchi buuneeda nea gwasikideawa ng'asheega nea gabaloola ng'asheega mamiisiina saawa.
Asi aniini geagasayi masinung'weega was gadeemga manang'i eegeena, ak gwaji diibiga ak goombal gealga nyaawa, aba gideaba eamwanyasa weajoocheanda gheata habearga appadahuukka nyaawa.
Aba gideaba gwanda mwaatkwa gea niyamgeat ak ghwaat geeshta Shataan.
Gatmooda mideawa masaweega imideawa masinung'weega aba gheanyi daweada ninyi nea gabwageaw masinung'weegiga, aba gideaba adaghoaw sareenda Ganiisa, Ganiisa gay ghaweati masinung'weegiga bea huumwa.
Gweargwa sin gadiyeenyaawa nea ghwoamiidu gamiisa eattaw mureeda muuchchi ghwaraanya gikka deawiitti aba rukwiideayda ng'asheega Aseetta nea goonealshiin.
Aba gideaba gwayi ng'ooruutka, “Adiradi ghuutta deeda gadiiyi.” Ak gwayi gicha, “Siida gadiiyi gahaguuwsa gidageattindaannyi.”
Adimwasi giheakteayda badayda gweargweeda ea ingsiina gisiihaaktaawa ghuusispa fii iyeenya ghana samwagu.
Fukka sina ring'eedean awoowsiina aba madeeda buuneessean, ak abeeda ghabeal suurja.
Ngasheanji gearukneey aba madeeda Aseetta ea madeeda Gristo Yeesu ea madeeda gijasoodiga humng'eeda siloat, sina ng'asheesu nea adilamwaji girgweaksiinda, nea adisini ng'asheanda aba shiitmeeda.
Adilamachsi inda geattinga uhuuda siida nea adung'udi geaw ring'eega buuneessuurja. Ak gishageadi geaw ak gimmiidu.
Gidang'eada ghamneawa adileahayi beega ak ghwahiti, leaha difaayeeni ng'ay aba agidi bea jeadaang'uuni ea geyoonung'weakka biikkiiseey galagasean.
Ring'ega buuneeda mwaatkwa adaach ak ea nisheeda gaweay heeda girgweaksiinda nea suuk ring'eega nyaawa gaygweadu geeshta.
Ak aba sareani sinooda ng'asheega miyaas aadaachi ak eara giikka miidaajiin ea mwajeamu eafuyi.
Soomjooga sean gammiisa gideaba gay ghwaadaw meanang'oodiga nyaawa mureeda aba gideaba meang'eawwa gheawunga Aseetta ea ginealshoodeanya.

Ak soomjoogiga was meanang'oodiga nyaawa fuga masaweegean adagafool aba gideaba oorjookkeennyaawa ghang'wana gagadiyeesa muuchchi aba gideaba suu weat soomjooga aba gadiyeeda nyaawaan niiw fuga masaweega ak ghabwariiy. Ng'asheesu anaala nea gireekusi.
Siida wassean iyanaal fughara nuut nea mwamwasa ng'asheega mideawa eaweega Ng'uttamiideanya was Yeesu Gristo, ghana ginealshooda samgeat sea baditta Aseetta,

nii nung'ut ghwarjeeda ak ea manda gil nal, ak gaba geeska gittemshooda badayda ginyeeshteayda ng'asheega ea galleadayda ng'asheega nea aba jeedeaba suu gwarinna ng'ullooda siida aba gheangda muy, jalliida ea ging'weaka ea meannyooda muy bea siida,
ea sheangnyeeda fuga nidatasa fughareenga nyaawa nea mandeawana humeanda ak ghaghay gili meanang'oocheandumeeda gil.
Nea baditta Aseetta ea rearnatta meanang'oochcheandumeeda haw gil.
Aba geaba geepkaanyi badayda ng'eanyiida nea meeyeani gil, ak gajeebiikta nea meayaadi gil.
Ak iisindeawi gichea eayaaga ea hang'weaka gajeerearniitta.
Ak fukka gasa meanang'oocheandumeedean gay ghwahitta jeeda simsimda ea jeeda gadageeda ea jeeda ng'asheega munyas mabwa gil bea leendeeda nung ghwahitta buuneeda jeeda roodaweega.
Aba gideaba gumdooda ng'asheega munyas sean gweadu bariinyeega lappiya, ak buuneeda mwaatkwa ea ninungwaada masaweega aba bariinyeesu bea lappiyaan ea gwasawan jeesinga nyaawa.
Asi ang'iingi siida Aseetta, ang'aamwana geaw ng'asheesu ak giyaadi geeshta doobiiwnata, ea baditta Aseetta ea masaweega ea barinyeega milighteayda ea garbabanda.
Ng'uchcheena muuchchi ng'uchcheedida bea masaweegean, ang'ng'waanya eaweegiga manda mudeanooda ghayi suguurnaneeyiin, ak gimuuwwu muuwwunooda miy aba madeeda muushoodiga saang'a.
Ng'asheanji gearukuneey aba madeeda Aseetta diitta adaw haleanjeesean eaweegean, ea madeeda Gristo Yeesuda ghayi muwwu muwnoodaanyi miy aba madeeda Bondiyo Bilatto,
bea gideaba ang'waanya digheanji aba doobiiwnata nea manda habearga, ea ghwahidu hinnooda Ng'uttamiideanya was Yeesu Gristo.
Aba gideaba iihiitta damandaanyi gay ghwadaajiinyi Aseetta niny geekghambiit ak goombalischi nea gabwageaw sugoocheanda sugoodiga Ng'uttamiida ng'uttang'oojiga,
ninyi nea gaba geaw mwayghami ak gwanda jeeda weeshinda majeeneekiisa ak ea manda siida nidaah ak ea manda siida ammu ghwadaa. Mureeda ea uurda daanyi gil ea ghoaw eaweega manda mudeanooda! Amin.

Fuga ghamneawa was meanang'oodiga appadayda ng'eanyiida rukusiina gideaba adagagwara geat nea ghaghus meanang'oocheandumeani jea goosheani, gagasa ghaghus Aseetta goona haleanjeesean saang'a, ak geegadiyeati aba hoosaneega.
Dasna ng'asheega miyaas ak ghoaw meanang'oodiga aba sinooda gaamiyaas, ak ghoadayda haleanjeenyaawa nea gabareanyi sea buneesuurja aba jeeda miy,
nea goodiiwsa geat haleanjeeda ghoaw sindeatta miy aba damanda jea ghooni ak ghwanyas eaweega was gea huumwa.
Ea Dimotteo, fura muuchi diitta ghayi siteaganeeyiin ak ang'aamwana geaw ng'asheega mwaloada gil, mawoosa gea diiniin ea sheangnyeeda fughareeda suguura, “Fughareeda ng'uyyeega.”
Ak gwanda fuga suuk aba muwwunoodeaba ng'asheesu ea niramwas masaweega. Gagasa anyasa dagheerjeandumeeda!
Aniini Baulo ghawooschi gijasoocheanda Gristo Yeesu aba gidagasiida Aseetta appadayda heelleeda eaweega mida jeeda Gristo Yeesu,
Ea Dimotteo balleandeanyu abwariinyi. Dagheerjeandumeeda dahinna headaang'u, ea baydeayda ea hoyyoo leabu heeda Aseetta was Bwaabwa ea heeda Gristoyda was Ng'uttamiideanya.
Geabadischeesi Aseetta eabadayi aba guroorooda miy ghan'geada damandida bea gweargweasuun inyeesa ghaapkaacheeyi galaagasean aba jeeda mooshteanyu bea ghawooda eawa ea askweari.
Ak geagasayi muuchchi deaktaang'u, iyaapkaachi dabeakkaagu ak abeeda ghaanyaschi hooseaneega.
Iyaapkaachi masaweega indeawi manda gimminnoodeaba geaw ghayi bean gwandeawa ghamageamadu suguura Loisi, ea geamadu wa Eunike ak ghanali gideaba eara ang'iing'i gindeawi.
Ak aba seareeni geapkeaneey gideaba aseawsiina ghwaahaada giimuusta goonyi Aseetta mida jeedang'u aba damanda ghayi ayiini geattingeasu uhuudaang'uuni.
Aba gideaba Aseetta magooneasa guroorooda giyoonda, gagooneasa dea uurda bea barinyeega ea jeeda mideawa deascheeda.

Adibwaspwasi aba muwunooda badayda Ng'uttamiideanya ak eara aniineani eandi ghealooniga appadaydaanyiin adibaspasseeweani, asi milighteaysiina ng'asheega munyasiin sea aniini appadayda Giijasta Miy aba uurda Aseetta.

dea ghayi lealneasa ak gaguurneasa aba guurnooda ghaydit nea nii ea mabaysiina aba gissisinyi aseasa ak nii gabaysa ninyi ea dagheerjeandumeedaanyi. Dagheerjeandumeani geegooneasa aba naweeda Gristo Yeesu nea miyeebwat ng'eanyiida.
Ak ghamneawa dagheerjeandumeani geataajiit aba hinnooda lealnoocheandeanya was Gristo Yeesu Ninyi nijoar miyeeda, ak ghwadaajiiti eaweega mayghwadatasa aba giijasta miy,
appadaydeaba ng'asheesu geayiinan doaw ginealshoocheanda ea gijasoocheanda darukwiida giijasta miy.

Ak aniini ghaanyaschi sawanadeeda appadaydeaba ng'asheesu ak geawoschi hidaat aba gideaba ghaanali ninyi dea amwaschi ak ghaanali gideaba ghwoamu gafur giita ghayi goonaniini bwak ea ghwahitta damandida.
Ang'ng'waanya gidahiimu ng'asheega mideawa eaweega ghayi iyiing'si heedeanyu, aba masaweega ea bariinyeega mida jeeda Gristo Yeesu.
Fura diita miy ghayi siteaganeeyiin aba naweeda Gurorooda Ghaydit mida jeedeanyean.
Ang'iing'i ginali gidaghayi nungsiindanean heeda fuga ng'eanyiida Asiya eara geaba gwanda jeeda eara geaba Figelo ea Hermogene.
Gagasa ghwoadaw Ng'uttamiida baydeada fukghea Onesiforo aba gideaba inyeesa imiighoaw gil goomajeegan nea mwabwaspwasa aba ghealoonigeasu.
Inyeesha iihidu hiji bea Ruumiin gagasean muuchi ea ghwanyasan.
Ang'iing'i ginali muuchi gidaghayi deawiitta aba ngeanyiida Efeso appadaydeanyu. Gagasa ghweadaw Ng'uttamiida eaweedida.
Asi agn'iing'i balleandeanyu, darusiida aba jeetagheerjeandumeeda mida jeeda Gristo Yeesu.
Ak ng'asheega ghayi iyiingsi heedeanyu aba madeeda muushoodiga saang'a iina ng'asheega geatinga fuga doobiiweadi jea ghoamu ghwanal suurja.
Eppareannyeena sawanadeeda sea aniini, gawuurji shirikarajeanda doobiiwaat bea Gristo Yeesu.
Shirikarajeanda mida jeeda ng'ucheeda maygwadeawiit aba haleajeeda munda ng'eanyiida aba gideaba gaygoohoosan shirkarajeandaanyi haw.
Eara siida igalleada aba jeeteangheeda mwajeataw shiipka imagaleada muuchchi.
Siida barooda siin gadiyeeda hang'waay gamiisa gideaba gayghwanyas haghweega madeeda.
Ateemsheesiina muuchi ng'asheesu sean earuguun, aba gideaba gaygagoonyi Ng'uttamiida fughareeda appadayda ng'asheega sean.
Appkaada Yeesu Gristo, dea ghayi duunna miyeeda, bea dooshta Dawdi, gawuurji gidanyashta Giijasteanyu.
Aniini geesawanan appadaydeaba Giijasi miyiin, ea eeyaadan ghealooniga dawurji siida siin ng'asheega munyas, ak ng'asheega Aseetta ea mwajeerat.
Ak aba sareani geamilikteaysi ng'asheega sean aba badayda fuga loat Aseetta, gideaba eara saawa ghwanyas lealeanooda mida jeeda Gristo Yeesu ea giigheambiitta ea eaweega manda mudeanooda.
Ng'asheanji gamiisa masaweega. Gideaba “Aba gideaba isiimeewuday sea ninyi gajeepiidana sea ninyi.
Nea isimilikghiti, gajeembalischeena sea ninyi, Nea isiheawu ninyi, ninyi earada gay ghwaheawaneasa.
Nea aseasa imeawasi doobiiweadi, ninyi doobiiwnattaanyi ea maygoosha. Aba gideaba ninyi mwayghaheawa geaw.”
Apkeasiina fugaagu ng'asheesu nea gireekusi aba madeeda Aseetta gideaba ghwoabuut ng'asheega galleadayda gea mwalooda gil nung' gwarooda fuga aleeysiiti.
Milmiliida eadaanyi gideaba nimwasnyi Aseetta, siida gadiyeeda mwabwaspwasa aba gadiyeedaanyi, ak ginaali ng'asheanda huumwa aba gidamisiinda.
Ang'aamwana geaw ng'asheega mwaloada gil, mawoosa gea diiniin gikka mwamwasa fuga Aseetteani, aba gideaba fuga sunu gayghwabitta jeeda ng'asheega munyas.
Ak ng'asheanda nyaawa gaygageawiit iitta ea gawuurji udamusuura. Aba jeedeaba suuk gwanda geaba Himenayo ea Filetto.
Nea saawa ea ninung'waada naweeta bea humeandean nea geebaloola gideaba duunooda goolla ghwahidu, ea ghwayam masaweega buuneeda mwaatkwa.

Ak sindeetta ghayi inni Aseetta ea nimiinaada nea majeek, nea uhuudaanyi geengoorsa ng'asheesu, “Ng'uttamiida ghwanal gea was gaaschi.” Ak gicha gilinyoo gwarukku gheawunga Ng'uttamiida adanung'waada ng'asheega munyas.
Aba jeeda gheeda haw manda dabita gharinga meangmeang'i ea dabitta gharinga ak ea mabeachi suu, gwanda eara gea geediga ea gea sigeeda suuk gwanda gea mureeda suuk ea mandeawana.

Ak siida iamiidu geaw ak gooheelli geaw ng'asheesu munyasiin ninyi abeeda gayghoaw dabicheanda siihuun ak ghwanyas mureeda haguuwsa Ng'uttamiida ak sinoodaanyi geebaysiina gwasin gadiyoojiga sean miyaas.

Asi mang'wana ng'asheega munyas bea gheareemaneandumeeda wa geawunda gheang'da, aada geeshta ng'asheega doobiiwnata ea masaweega ea bariinyeega ea hoyyoo sea fuga sean guurriisa Ng'uttamiida aba jeeda miy.
Asi heawana sheang'nyeeda leendeeda manda jeeda fughareeda, ak ginali gideaba sheang'nyeeni gaygwaji jaliida.
Ak ea mamiisiina siida gadiyeeda Ng'uttamiida gaba jalliida, gamiisa gideaba gajeagarbabu aba heeda buuneessean, bissa nala gooneashi ak gamilikiida ng'asheega.
Aba damandida rekkusiina fuga mwamwasa ng'asheegaashciin, gamiisa ea garbabu aba gideaba ideapa gwasa gwadeapa ghwaadaw Aseetta fiisu duukuunooda ak ghwanal humeanda.
Ak gabiiksa fughareenga nyaawa, ak gwaritteawa jeeda gadageeda Shattan ghayi ang'waay saawa ak gwasin gidagasiida Shattan.
Ak ginali ng'asheanji gideaba eawoojiga huydean gay gwanda washta.

Aba gideaba buuneeda gaygaba nii bwariiy geaw, ak gaygaba siisi bwariiy lappiya, gaba nii ghwargeaw ea gea weashweashta ea gea ging'weakka ea fuga mwamwasa ng'asheega jilnoodiga nyaawa ea gea mandeawana badischooda ea gea miimiyaas.
fuga magasa fukgheanyaawa ea gea magasa gidupcheeda ea gea naba ng'uyyeega ea gea mwamu ghwadeal geat ea gea ng'weani ea gea mwabariinya ng'asheega miyaas,
ea gea leapageatbwadaw ea fuga hang'oonyi iheen, ea gea gwarageat, ea gea bwariy mittagheasta muunda ng'eanyiida nea mwasamwa ghabwariiy Aseetta.
Inyeesa gawuurji gili bada Aseetta ak ghaheawa uurdaanyi ang'aamwana geaw fiisu.

Aba gideaba aba jeedeaba suu gwanda headiga ama inyeesa gaweay jeesinga gealga buuneeda ak gageanda nea ghwasareanda gadeemga dasheahi mideawa sareenda ring'eeda nea gagis mittagheasta muunda ng'eanyiida.
Gadeemsu inyeesa gagasa nalooda ng'asheega galagasean ak eamwamu eara hay nalooda humeanda.
Nii gawuurji gidaghayi heawaatta geaba Yaane ea Yambure ng'asheega Muusa ak eara fiisu ghaheawa humeandida ak suu ea fuga nidatasa fughareenga nyaawa gil, ak ea siheawa aba ng'asheega masaweega.
Ak ea mayghang'atta mwaadi muuchchi aba gideaba leendeenyaawa gayghwadaajiiti aba heeda buuneessean, gawuurji gittajiitta leendeedeaba fiisu.
Ak ang'iing'i ea niyaadi geeshta ginealshoodeanyu ea gideabadiiniidi ea gideagasiidi ea masaweega ea milighteayda,

ea bariinyeega ea milighteada ea sawanaduutkeasu bea ng'asheega ghayi anyaschi aba ng'eanyiida Andogiya nea Igunio ea Listra, bea haleanoojiga sawanaduutka ea milighteaysi ak gwalealneani Ng'uttamiida aba suuh seaniin.
Huumwa gil siida wassean iigasa giibinda ea baditta Gristo Yeesu gayghwanyas sawanadeeda.
Ak fuga munyasearooji ea gea ng'uyyeega gayghang'atta mwadi ak ghwaranya buuneeda nea eara saawa geereengani.
Asi ang'iing'i abiidana jeeda ng'asheega ghayi sinaalnyi nea geesikteawean aba gideaba ginali gideaba geabeang'a guil gea ghayi anaalanyi.
Aba gideaba ghang'eada jeepcheandumeeda ninali ng'ooruutka ghaydidi jea ghwanung nyasa weaghuumeeda ea nyasa lealeanooda aba naweeda Gristo Yeesu aba masaweega.
Giliwas ng'ooruut mideawa Yeammeeda Aseetta ghwahit aba ginealshooda ea rekkusinda buuneeda aba gidinyeannyeekka nyaawa ea gidoobiiwda nea ghwanyas ghoorjooda doobiiwaat.
Abeeda aahidaat siida gadiyeeda Aseetta nea sinung ghwahit ak gwasin giliwas gadiyeeda miy.
Gearukuneey ng'asheesu aba madeeda Aseetta ea madeeda Gristo Yeesu ditta jea goorgweaksa fuga majeekjeew ea gea nimeewean aba gidaheachtaanyi ea aba gheambalmeadaannyi,
rukwiida giijasta wosa hidaat (damanda miseey ea damanda mamiiseey), awoowsiina ajuursiina nea gireekusi aba milighteayda sean ea ginealshooda.

Aba gideaba gayghwahidu damanda jea eaheawa ginealshooda mideawa eaweega ak ghwaat geeshta naweeda gidagasiida saawa ak gwanyaksa geat gimughuscheekka ginealshoodiga aba gideaba gwandeawa idiga jea gwasikkiideawa ng'asheega.
Ak gaygoodiilda geat ea mwayiinya ng'asheega was gea huumwa ak gwayamsa geat deanghoochka ng'uyyeega,
Asi ang'iing'i mideawana gheadeenda aba haleanjeessean, milighteaysiina gea munyas sina gadiyeeda rukwiideayda giijasta miy ahiida gadiyeedaang'u nea gidoobiiw.
Aba gideaba aniini ghamneawa gajeetaydanaan doow gujaweeda ak ea nihiitta damanda jea dameawa.
Neang'uchchi ng'uchcheeda miy, neang'uucheewi, ak ea nahiichi ng'weega, ak masaweega ea neafurji,

ama ng'atta suu geegoonan shiipka aba doobiiwnatta dea iiduw eaweetta jea gagoonan Nguttamiida nea niny ea dea doobiiwaat girgweaga ak ea mii aniini gil akghwahit eara fukka sean gasa gidaheachtannyiin.
Sina badiida ak gihidu heedeanyu nea gilamwajaani.
Aba gideaba Dema ghabwariiy haleanjeeda munda ng'eanyiida ak ghang'eat gwanungsean heeda ak gawa Desalonikke, ak Greske gawa ng'eanyiida Galattiya, nea Diitto gawa ng'eanyiida Dalmattiya.
Lukka geandeayeesi hiji nea gabageaw. Gasa Marko ak giideani aba gideaba ninyi gayghaweadan aba gadiyeedeanyu.
Ak Digikko ea neajeakti gawa Efeeso.
Iihidu giyeadu hang'deanyu gul ng'eanyi ghayi eanungsi heeda Garpo bea ng'eanyiida Droa, ea gittaabwajeegiga ghwaraanya gikka sisna muchgean.
Isganda diitta was gidang'oocheandean nisinean ng'asheega munyas saang'a gayghawalda Ng'uttamiida gawuurji gidasinda niny.
Ak gishageadi siisi, aba gideaba ghaheawa muuchchi ng'asheegaasa.
Damanda ghayi sirgweaksinanean bea madeedean manda eara siyagi wea meatkweedeanyu ghaweadan, hean gwanung'sean heeda sean ak geamuschi gideaba gidinyeanji adeeyiin badahuuka nyaawa!
Ak ea niminaadawa Ng'uttamiida meatkweedeanyu ak gagoonan uurda aba gideaba gagasa ninyi darukwiida giijasta miy, ea ghwayiiy emoojiga sean, ak ghalalaani ghuutta ng'adiida.
Ak gaygwalealneani Ng'uttamiida aba ng'asheanda wassean muy, ak gayghaghamwadan ea dahitta gheambalmeedanyi bea humng'eeda. Gigheambiita daanyi gil ea ghwoaw eaweega manda mudeanooda. Amin.
Agatta Briska ea Agila, ea fukka mida ghee Onesiforon.
Erasto gahuydean aba ng'eanyiida Gorinto. Drofimo geanungsi Miletto aba gideaba ghamnyaan.
Sina badiida hinni damanda miighwahinna goroogeeda. Googateey geaba Eubulo ea Bude ea Liino ea Glaudiyo ea oorjooga sean.
Gagasa ghwoahaaghwa guroroadaang'u Ng'uttamiida. Gagasa anyasa dagheerjeandumeeda.
Baulo, soomjeanda Aseetta ea biissa giijasoochcheanda Yeesu Gristo, ak ghaanung' gawa mwadi masaweega fuga loat Aseetta ea fughareeda humeanda mideawa miyinda,
Aba jeeda rarooda eaweega manda mudeanooda, aba heeda Aseetta moammu gwanaba ng'uyyeega, sibean eheelleesa gweannyeekka goolla ghang'tta
iiduw nea ghwahitta damanda ghoadaajiit ng'ashaandaannyi ghayi sitteaganean aniini aba girrukuteayda lealnoochcheandeanya was Aseetta;
Heeda Ditto jeepteanyu bea huumwa aba naweeda masaweega sippareannyi. Gagasa nyasa dagheerjeandumeeda ea hoyyooyda leabu heeda Aseetta was Bwaabwa ea heeda Gristo Yeesu was lealnoochcheandeanya.
Nii gideanung'usiinaneey ng'eanyiida Grettehi ak abeda gisni gadiyeetta shoadaan, nea giyiini gweargwa giliwas mujiinajean gawuurji gidaghayi earukuneey, siida iimeyeatteena ghuut.
Iideappa siida ea miyeerukuna badayda ng'asheega munyas nea siyeeda gatmoodassagi gil, nea diibigaaschi gwandeawa masaweega miyeergweaksiina deambilaneandumeeda ghana nyootta mureeda.

Nea jeagiischoochcheanda ganiisa, was siida sitteaga gadiyeeda Aseetta, gammiisa ea meerukunana badaydaannyi ng'asheega munyas; ak gagasa ea maba ghwarja ghanea mii assas nyaras ak ea mii leeyeanda ghana gwajala ghana gwashissa ghaang' haleanjeeda mwahida,
gamiisa ea siida innya jihi, ak gwandeawa bariinyeega haleanjeeda miyaas, nea goodeeneaeda geaw, ak ea doabiiwaat, nea ghaydit, nea ghoang'ng'waay geaw;
nea ghoang'ng'waay muuchchi ng'asheanda gawuurji gissinnaalda, ak abeeda ghoammu ghoadayda ng'asheega gichchea eabeeda aba ginealshooda huumwa nea ghwajoar fukka heawaan.
Aba gideaba gwanda fuga saang'a manda mureeda, mideawa ng'asheega mwalooda gil, nea gwareengani buuneeda, nea ghwaranya gikka siyaat ghasmeahoodean,
gidabal gearat ghuusiga nyaawa aba gideaba fiisu inyeesa gahutteawi buuneeda aba ginealshooda ak ghwanyas haleanjeeda aba ginealshooda mwadaagha.
Nea siyagi aba jeannyaawa, ea sibaneeda nyaawa gil, ak gwayi, “Fuga Grette gaba ng'uyya galeagasean, ak ea diyeanga munyasi, ak gaba ghaleahu nea deewwi.”
Muwwunoani huumwa gil. Asi awoowsiina saawa nea ging'waniidi, ak abeeda gamajeegiit aba jeeda masaweega,
nea adagooleeysiit gununoonga fuga Yahuudi ea ng'asheega rugu buuneeda heawa humeandean.
Aba heeda fuga miyaas haleanjeessean amiyaas, nea gea munyas ea gea mandeawana masaweega aba heannyaawa manda gidamuy; fughareenga nyaawa ea gitteemshooda nyaawa ea munyas.
Iissa gwargu gideaba geanalli Aseetta, nea iissa ghwashaang' aba sinaweega nyaawa, nea gwandeawa sichcheeda, ak ea mandeawana mureeda, mammiisiina sinooda gadiyeeda miy.
Asi ang'iing'i anaala ng'asheega miisa ginealshooda huumwa.
Fuga hees gagasa gwandeawa gheadeenda, miina gheanyanga buuneeda, mideawa fughareenga, mideawa masaweega huumwa, mideawa bariinyeega huumwa ea majeeknatta.
Ak eara gadeemga woosi gamiisa ea fuga sinniisa geat mureeda gil, nea adagwanaba ng'uyyeega, ghana leeyeanda, gamiisa gideaba gaygoonealli ng'asheega miyaas,
ak gayghoanaal gadeemga manang'i gichchea, ghabwariiy siyeenatka ea diibiga nyaawa,
nea gwandeawa fughareeda, ak ea miyaas, nea goobiida gealga nyaawa, nea innya jih, nea gwasisa siyeenatka nyaawa mureeda, aba gideaba ea meeng'ng'eawa ng'asheega Aseetta.
Ak gireekusi eara gheareemanga gwandeawa gheadeenda.
Ahiimda geaw aba mureeda sean eadaa ormeeda gadiyoojiga miyaas, nea aba ginealshoodaang'u gihiimu seareeda miy, ea gideeneadayda,
nea ng'asheega sirgu bea huumwa ea meeyeatteena ghuussi, ak abeeda siitta heawaan ghabwaspwas, aba ng'asheanda muy jea gwarukuna badahuukkaasa.
Ging'ng'oonyanga gamiisa gideaba gaygwasiisa meanang'oodiga nyaawa mureeda, nea gahaguwsa aba halanjeesean, ak adagwasheaha ng'asheega,
ak ea adagwajagwadiisachchi, gahaguuw gideaba gayghoahiimu dobiiwnatta huumwa, ak abeeda aba haleanjeessean ghwanyas ginealshooda Aseetta was lealnoochcheandeanya.
Aba gideaba dagheerjeandumeeda Aseetta lealu buuneessean sittaajiiti,
ak ghoanaaleasa eeheawana ng'asheega maba diini ea geawunda gheang'da, mideawa gheadeenda, ea doobiiwnatta, ea eaweeda miyaas sea Aseetta aba jeedeaba ng'eanyiini,
nea geammuughu ghusooda mideawa ghawooda ea gidaheachta gigheambitta Aseetta haw ea lealnoochcheandeanya was Yeesu Gristo,
nea niny ghoadayda geaw appadahuukkaasa ak ghaweadaneasa ng'asheega munyas sean ak ghoammiidu fuga jea ghoaw gaaschi nea gamilmiliidi aba sinooda ng'asheega miyaas.
Ruksiina buuneeda ng'asheesu, reeksiina nea giiwoowsi aba gheambalmeeda indeawi sean. Ak ea adiidu gafoolnyi siida.
Apkeassiina saawa gweada geat ng'eanyi aba heeda fuga ahaaghwa ng'eanyiida ea gea mideawa gheambalmeeda, ak gwasissa mureeda, nea hidaat aba gilinyoo ea gadiyeeda miy gil,
adagoong'eawi siida wassean, amulsiina jaliida, ahuuwa emoojiga miyaas, nea ghoahiimu garbabanda sean aba heeda buuneessean.

Aba gideaba ghayi ammwadi geewoschi dasheahi, ak ea meendeawani mureeda ak geewoschi roodanga, ea ging'ng'oonyanga aba miyeenooda muunda ng'eanyiida, nea geeppiidi jeeda ng'asheega munyas, ea lajoodeaba ghuut, nea ghwasteagwa buuneeda nea goostayi geat agooga;
Ak miyinda ea bariinyeega Aseetta was lealnoochcheandeanya geattajiit,
hean gwalealneasa, ea meabaysiinana sinaweagaasa doobiiweadi sisinnyi aseasa niny gwalealneasa ak geejilneasa niba iyyeenya ak ghwanung' eahuuwa fuga eashish aba Gurorooda Ghaydit,
nea gagoaneasa nea gooheedu aba naweeda Yeesu Gristoyda was lealnoochcheandeanya,
ak abeeda gegoaneasa doobiiwnatta aba dagheerjeandumeedaannyi ak geararji hearanda eaweega manda muudeanooda.
Ng'asheanji earguun huumwa gil.
Ak geagasayi rukta ng'asheesu nea giimajeegi, aba gideaba fukka mwas Aseettean goobiida jeeda sinooda ng'asheega miyaas; nea suuh ea miyaas nea ghwadoabiiw aba heeda buuneeda.
Ak giing'aami geaw ng'asheega jaleadinga, ea ng'asheega suroaproabwaada, ea foolayda ea sheang'nyeeda appadayda deaweeda, aba gideaba mayghwaloat gil ak ea mwahida.
Asi siida foolayda iinireekusi dea madeeda ghana deabiyyeenya, adagudismi eara gil,
ak ginali gideaba siida uurji nii niramwas, aba gideaba gwasin ring'eeda, ea niirgweaksa geaw.
Iiduw iyeajeagu heedaang'u Attema ea Digiko, abeeda gisni badiida hinni heedeanyu ng'eanyiida Nigopoli, aba gideaba neabaday gideaba gaydeaksa hoowa meahooda.
Sina badiida aba bareannyeekka Seena, was diinagiida ea Appolo aba buweanooda nyaawa; ng'ulla adaghoashoanya gil.
Ak eara fugaasa saawa gamiisa gideaba ghoanaal geat gibinda jeeda sinooda ng'asheega miyaas, ak gwasissin ng'asheega gasa ealamwach sinooda, ak ea mawosa gea manda haghweega.
Ghoaghannyi fuga sean eandeawi. Aghada gikka bwariinyeasa aba naweeda masaweegean.
Gagasa anyasa dagheerjeandumeeda oagasean.
Baulo siida ghealooniga appadayda Gristo Yeesu, ea Dimotteo oorjeeda giyeanya, heeda Filimooneeda was siideanya subwariinyi suweechcheewi aba gadiyeeda
ea Afiyayda was huda giyeanya, ea heeda Argibo was shirikkarajeanda Gristo suweechcheewi bea ganiiseeda mida jeedeaba gheang'u:
Gagasa anyasa dagheerjeandumeeda ea hoyyoo leabu heeda Aseetta was ghweandeanya ea heeda Ng'uttamiida was Yeesu Gristo.
Geabadischeesi Aseetteanyu galeagasean iyapkachcheey nea ghamwaashchi Aseetta,
aba gideaba nayiinyi bariinyeegaagu ea masaweega indeawi appadayda Ng'uttamiida was Yeesu ea heeda fuga ghaydidi sean,
ak ghamwaashchi Aseetta aba masaweagaagu suguuyeesi nyagu fughareeda miy bea haleanjeessean ikkaasa aba jeeda Gristo.
Aba gideaba naanyaschi hooseaneega muuchchi ea hawdeayda aba bariinyeegaagu oorjeediyya, aba gideaba guroruunatka fuga ghaydidi nihawda appadaydaang'u.
Aba gideaba earapeadi eawoschi muraneeda hidaat aba naweeda Gristo ak geerukneey sina gidasigasa,
iiduw appadayda bariinyeega geamuscheey gideaba, aniini Baulo, was siida siichcheagu ak ghamneawa geawoschi siida ghealooniga appadayda Gristo Yeesu,
Geamuscheey appadayda jeepteanyu was Onesimo, nea nahuuyi ghwaan aba damanda eandeewi ghealooniga,
(Ghanyi niny mwaloada aba headaannyi gil, ak ghamneawa gwalooseey gil agooga ea aniini).
Geajeagu gabiigu headaang'u, aba gideaba niny guroroodeanyu.
Gaydahoosan aniini iyabiida heedeanyu ak ghaweadan aba meatkweedeang'wa damani eandeawi ghealooniga appadayda giijasta miyiin,
ak geagasayi ea measni gil nea mimwasi ak abeeda ea mediing'seey aloaheadaang'u geaghus aba gidigassiidi.
Nii ghaghanyi ghoaw gidasihhelleewaneey aba gheadi nuwasiin, ak iiduw goobiiksiinyi gichcha ak goopiidi hijagi damanda manda muudeanooda.

niny mudugawuurji ging'ng'oonyaneeda, niny ning'al ging'ng'oonyaneeda, niny gawuurji oorjeediyya abwariinyi, raanya aba heedeanyu ak gaygawuurjiin muuchchi aba headaang'u, aba saseeda ea heeda Ng'ttamiida.
Asi iiyoanung' doaw siida oguuyeewi, deaptaayda niny gidagwachchi jea deaptaaydanaan aniini.
Ama ideeppeanidiiyseey aba gidawassean, ghana gwandeawa sileadaang'u wassean, abeeda ging'oornean sileeni.
Aniini Baulo ang'warji ng'asheesu aba geattindeanyu, gaydawalu aniini, Mearukuni ak gindeawi sileedeanyu aba jeeda Gristo.
Asaha, oorjeediyya, sinnean ng'asheega miyaas ak ghaanyagaadi appadayda Ng'uttamiida, ak gihoosani guroroodeanyu aba naweeda Gristo.
Ghamwaaschi aba mureadaang'u, ak geang'oorneey ang'iing'i nea ghaanalli gideaba gaysina ng'asheesu ea ghwanaawa gea earukuneey.
Asi aba damani, asna ghooriida rabasta jea deabiida, aba gideaba ghaararji aba mooshteang'wa bea Aseetta gajanyasaan.
Ghoaghannyi Epafrayda eandeayeesi ghealooniga aba jeeda Gristo Yeesu,
ea Marko ea Aristakko ea Deema ea Lukka was fuga easnuudayeewi gadiyeeda.
Dagheerjeandumeeda Ng'uttamiida was Yeesu Gristo gagasa goobiida jeeda guroruunatkeagwa.
Aseetta ghayi gobalool ghwaanigaasa aba ghuusiga sibanga aba naweadinga saang'a ea damannyoojiga saang'a;
amaduw aba mudeanoodeaba askwearjoojusu goobalooleasa aseasa aba naweeda Balleanda, ghayi loat ghoaw siida jea gwahearan haleanjeessean, ak aba niny gwasin ng'eanyiida appadaydeaba niny.

Aba gideaba niny ghoahiimu weeshinda gigheambiitta Aseetta nea gwandeawa girooraneeda ea seareedaannyi, ak ghwasar ng'eanyiida aba ng'asheandaannyi mideawa uurda. Iing'atta nea nisin gimmiinooda ring'eeda, hean gopteada aba meatkweeda geattinda dugwa bea Aseetta was Ng'uttamiida aba hoowa bea dadaliiliin,
Ak ea sunung' gwaheedu ea ghoadaraam malaykajeega aba gideaba gheawunga ninyas ahaweewa ea ghang'al gaanyaawa.
Neada Aseetta ea niyeeshsha ana malaykajean,
“Ang'iing'i nuwosi Balleandeanyu,
askwareani neajiilleey?”
Ghana gichcha,
“Aniini gaydoaw aba headaannyi ghweanda,
ak gayghoaw aba heedeanyu balleanda?”
Ak gichcha, iyeadu duweachcheadaannyi badayda ng'eanyiida, gwayeeshsha,
“Nung'waada ghaghadoawan niny malaykajeega sean bea Aseetta.”
Gwayi aba heeda malaykajeega,
“Gwasin ng'eaha meang'eega malaykajeega,
nea ghwanung' ghoaw soomjoogaaschi ng'ushapta beasta.”
Ak gwayi appadayda Balleanda,
“Horgeadaang'u, Ea Aseetta gaba eaweega manda muudeanooda,
sugoochcheandumeeda doobiiw sugoochcheameeda gheambalmeedaang'u.
Gibwariinyi doobiiwnatta ak gisti fuga mandeawana deaweeda;
asi Aseetta, was Aseettaang'u nimwaarnyi
aba nagheeda hooseaneega ea ng'ala bareandaang'u.”
Ak,
“Guwosi, Ng'uttamiida, ghayi sin ng'eanyiida aba mwadi,
nea humng'eeda ea gadiyeeda geattingaagu gil;
suu gaygameewa, nea ang'iing'i gajabiidana;
ak gaygawoosiidi sean ea gawuurji hang'da,
gawuurji hang'weakka gajeammughuushghuush,
ak gajeayam.
Nea ang'iing'i guwuurjeewi gideawoojusu,
nea gweannyeakkaaschi ea maygammuudean.”
Ak ea niyeeshsha ana malaykajean,
“Apteada aba meatkweeda geattindeanyu bea dugwa,
ea dayiin weajoodigaagu
ghoaw hoorgeeda geeshangaagu?”
Neada malaykajeega gadiiyi ghayi sichcheagu gagadiiyeesa, appadahuukka fuga jea ghwanyas lealeanoodeani?
Asi gammiiseasa gideaba gajeeng'ulla muuchchi ng'asheega ghayi siyiinyi, ghana esheagiidana.
Aba gideaba giijasta ghayi rugu malaykajeega gaba huumwa nea giliwas ramaseanda ghana nyootta mureeda ghwanyas waldeayda doabiiw,
aseasa gajeammuusa eemuldaan imeduuppi lealeanooda haw deenu? Aba gideaba ghayi nibay gwayi Ng'uttamiida ammwadi, ak gagoaneasa fukghayi iiy niny,
nea Aseetta gamuuwwu aba gwadeagwajeega ea ng'asheega haloodi ea deamdeamanga saang'a, ea gidaguh Gurorooda Ghaydit ak gwalakkuuneasa aba gidagassiida niny.
Aba gideaba Aseetta moadawa malaykajeega ng'eanyiida jea ghwahidu, was dea sibalooli.
Iiduw ea sittaajiit aba hich gideaba,
“Siida neada ea naaha gil ea apkaada
ghana balleanda siida, ea eeyi bwak ea ng'uulla?
Ginung' ghoaw siida mwanang' aba gheadi nuwaas ea ghwalaabwa hoowa malaykajeega,
ak gishshuubi shiipka gigheambiitta ea mureeda,
ak ghwayiin haleanjeessean hing'eadayda geeshangaaschi.”
Hean nea niyiin haleanjeessean hing'eadayda baneaguukka geeshangaaschi ak gagadiyeesa niny, ea manung'usiina gil bwadaw aba heeda ahaaghwa. Eara gwasa, miyeadaaha haleanjeessean nea gagadiyeesa niny.

Iiduw geedaayi Yeesu, dea aba gheadi nuwaas geanung' ghamwanng'iit ea ghwalaabwa hoowa malaykajeega, nea siyiin uhuuda gigheambiitta ea mureeda aba sawanadeeda ea miyeeda, ak abeeda aba dagheerjeandumeeda Aseetta abeeda gwasamu miyeeda aba giliwas sih.

Aba gideaba ghwahit aba headaannyi, niny ea aba heeda dea ghayi abiideewa haleanjeessean, ak gweadu balloojiga sean heeda gigheambiitta ak ghoaw gidamadeeda jea gagadiyeatta bea lealeanoodean aba sawanadeeda.
Aba gideaba dea ammiidu ea gea simmiidu gwaleabu sean hijagi. Ak ghoaw gidamwabwaspwasana iguureewaneegwa fuga eaduupcheewi,
nea gwayi,
“Gaydarukusa gheawungaagu fuga eaduupcheewi,
appugusta fuga bwat geat gaydaduumseey.”
Nea gichcha,
“Gaydayiin masaweegeasu heeda Aseetta.”
Nea gichcha,
“Aniini geandi hiji, ak ea nigoonan Aseetta diibiga.”
Gwasnu eara diibiga gaguuyi saseeda ea foojeanda, gwasnu eara niny gwandeawa saseeda uurji nii, ak aba naweeda miyeeda abeeda ghwadattas diitta mideawa uurda miyeedean, nea meang'nyeandeenda,
abeeda gwalealu fukka sean mida jeeda gheawalmeeda miyeedean goobiida jeeda eaweega geawwi bea soomjeandumeeda.
Ak ea daach gideaba mwaweada malaykajeega niny ghaweat jeatta Abrahaamu.

Asi gajeenung' gawuurji sea fuga duupchi aba gheatkweakka sean, ak abeeda ghoaw siida bayyiida buuneeda ea dea doabiiwaat was ashoohoochcheanda haw bea gadiyeeda Aseetta, ak gaygohuun ring'eeda buuneeda.
Aba gideaba niny ghayi gwasawana nea geesimsim, niny ghoammu ghaweat fukka sisimsimiin.
Asi fuga eaduupcheewi ghaydidi, siguuyeesi guurnooda humng'eeda, asikteawana Yeesu, was giijasoochcheanda ea ashoohoochcheanda haw masaweagaasa.
Niny adoabiiwaat aba heeda dea ghayi ajeagu niny, gawuurji gidawoseatta Muusa doabiiwaat aba jeeda gheeda Aseetta.
Eara Yeesu ea sinung' ghoaw dea doabiiwaat muuchchi biissa aghambiidaat ea ghang'al Muusa ak gawuurji siida deas gheeda gwandeawa mureeda ea ghang'al gheeda.
(Aba gideaba giliwas gheeda gwanda siida deas, nea dea deas haleanjeessean ea Aseetta.)
Nea Muusa ea doabiiwaat aba haleanjeessean mida jeeda gheeda Aseetta nea gawuurji soomjeanda, ak gamuuwwu haleanjeeda jea eergu galannya,
nea Gristo ea doabiiwaat aba jeeda gheeda Aseetta nea gawuurji balleanda. Ak geewoschi gheannyi ising'ng'waanyi muuchchi gitta sisikteawiin nea geaghwarji gitta sirarjiin.
Asi, gawuurji gitta rugu Gurorooda Ghaydidiin, nea gwayi,
“Askwearean, iyoayiinyi ghuuttaannyi,
ea adoahhang'waanyi guroruunatkeagwa awuurjeewana fuga nittambiilan,
aba eaweetta simsimda aba jeeda dareapcheeda,
damanda simanean ghweanigeagwa
ak ghwadaa gadiyoojigeasu aba gweannyeew haradam.
Asi iiduw ghoanyareasan seaygeedida,
nea gwayi, ‘Iissa gwarooda galeagasean aba jeesinga guroruunatka nyaawa;
ak ghanyea mwanala naweadingeasu.’
Gawuurji gidayaakti habeawooda aba nyarasteanyu,
‘Ghanyea maygaweay heeda jea dafuufa.’”
Ang'ulla, fuga eaduupcheewi, adiiduw gobiida jeedeang'wa munyinda ea gurorooda mandeawana masaweega, jea ghwanung' ooppeada ea asheagiidana Aseetta mideawa eaweega.
Daba siisi amajeek nuut galeagasean, aba hiji duueeguura “ghamneawean,” ak ea manda jeedeang'wa siida jea ghoahang'waay aba reengaweega ring'eeda.
Aba gideaba geguuyeesi Gristo, iisibeachcheewi gideaba geang'ng'waanyi muuchchi gitta sisikteawi ammwadiin ea gagul muudeanooda,
Iiduw ea siyi,
“Askweareani, iyooyiinyi,
ea adoahhang'waanyi guroruunatkeagwa awuurjeewana fuga nittambiilan.”
Geabeang'a gil fuga iiy ak ghwattambiilan? Neada ea mii fukghayi leabu Misri nea ghoahaghwiidaan Muusahi?
Ak ea akkeega gil fuga anyareas gweannyeew haradam? Neada ea moanyareasa fukghayi sin ring'eeda, abeedeaysa muscheekka nyaawa dareapcheeda?
Ak ea akkeega gil fuga aksa habeawooda gideaba maygaweay heeda fuuftaannyi, neada ea mii fukka ghayi masissiina mureedeani?
Hean geadaayi gideaba mayghoammu gaweay jeeda aba nyootta masaweega.
Asi helleesiinda beatta jeeda giibindaannyi gwanda heeda, ak gidabal geabealli ak ea mwaramwasa sih aba jeedeang'wa ak geergweaksiina gideaba mwanyasa.
Aba gideaba giijasta miy ghwahittaayda heedeanya gidahittaayda heannyaawa; nea iitta nyas ghanyea maloossiina gil, aba gideaba mwanyasa masaweega aba jeeda fuga iiy.
Aba gideaba aseaseeda ghayi numwas gaygaweay jeedeaba fuuftida, gawuurji gidanyaashta niny,
“Gawuurji gidayaakti habeawooda aba nyarasteanyu,
‘Ghanyea maygaweay jeeda fuufteanyu,’”
earappeadi niisha gadiyoojigaaschi ghang'eada dea ghayi subwada sindeetta ng'eanyiida.
Aba gideaba gwanda heeda rugu iitta eaweetteaba ispwa nea gwayi, “Ak gafuuf Aseetta eaweetteaba ispwa aba gadiyoojigaaschi sean.”
Nea gabiikta gwayi aba hiji,
“Maygaweay jeeda fuufteanyu.”
Asi earagwasa gideaba gwanda fuga jea gaweay jeeda, nea fukka ghayi asheeda ghoang'ng'waay giijasta miyiin ghwaraay gaweay jeeda aba nyootta mureeda,
gichcha gagasa eaweechcha nuut, “Askweareani” nea gwarukuna ghuutta Dawdi iimuchchu nea ning'atta damanda haw, aba ng'asheega ning'atta giideascheeda,
“Askweareani, iyooyiinyi ghuuttaannyi,
ea adoahhang'waanyi guroruunatkeagwa.”
Inyeeda ghayi Yoshuwa aniidaw saawa fuufta, abeeda gwachchi Aseetta ea maygabaloola eaweechcha nuut.
Asi, sighus fuufta eaweetta sabatto aba heeda fuga Aseetta;
aba gideaba siida weah jeeda fuufta Aseetta earada gayghwanung'waada gadiyeadaannyi gawuurji gidanung'waadayda Aseetta gadiyeadaannyi.
Asi egagasa gimiriikta beatta jeedeaba fuufidi, ak abeeda ea manda siida jea ghoabeadaayda gidada aba nyootta mureeda.

Aba gideaba ng'asheanda Aseetta ea majeek ak gagadiyi ak gwandeawa eaweega, ak gwandeawa uurda, ak ea ng'aniip ea ghang'al bwaangeeda ng'aniip meadajeega sean, iissa ghang'ut ak goheelli fughareeda ea gurorooda, ea robuutka ea gudadeeda, ak ghoammu gwasikteawa fughareenga ea gidabwariiy gurorooda.
Ak ammadeadaannyi ea manda gidaghayi sisin jea afunyaat, amaduw adaach haleanjeessean ea dawiiri nea daach aba madeeda gheanyangaaschi nea dea jea gorgweakseasa.
Ghang'eada damandida geendeawi ashoohoochcheanda haw ambal sean ghayi sik bugusta humng'eeda, nea Yeesu, Balleanda Aseetta, asi eangn'ng'waanya muuchchi gitta sumwaschiin.
Aba gideaba meendeawani ashoohoochcheanda haw moammu ghabwayda ng'arng'arannyeakkaasa, gendeawi dea sisissa mureeda sean ak gesimsimda gidaghayi sisimsimdaneasa, amaduw ea miigwasin ring'eeda.
Asi gagasa eneekkiida aba gissirarji eapkaana heeda hoorgeeda ghambiidaat bea dagheerjeandumeeda, ak abeeda geanyaschi baydeayda ak geanyaschi dagheerjeandumeeda jea ghaweat fih damanda sigasseewa.

Aba gideaba gilinyoo ea ashoohoochcheanda haw siloat aba jeeda buuneeda gealoat gwasin gadiyeeda aba hoorgeeda buuneeda aba giduupcheeda sea Aseetta, ak ghoadayda haleanjeeda ea haleanjeeda lukghumajeega appadayda ring'eeda.
Nea ghoammu gwandeayi sea fuga mwanala gissin ea gea sadeadi, aba gideaba niny gaburda ng'arng'aranda.
Appadaydeaba ng'asheesu niny sirat ghoadayda lukghumajeega appadayda ring'eagaaschi ak ghoadayda eara gea buuneeda.
Ea manda siida ammu gwanyaksa geaw mureani, geaghus gaguursa Aseetta, gawuurji gidaguursiinda Haruuni.
Gwasnu eara Gristo mii godiing'u geaw ak geanung' ghoaw ashoohoochcheanda haw, niny ghwaloat dea ghayi eeshsha niny,
“Ang'iing'i guwosi Balleandeanyu,
askweareani neajiilleey;”
ak gawuurji ginnyaashta aba hich nuut,
“Ang'iing'i guwosi ashoohoochcheanda manda mudeanooda
uurji Melkisedeki.”

Aba askwearjoojikka bea saseadaannyiin ghamwaash Yeesu Aseetta nea gang'ula humng'eeda ak ghabwat Aseetta, nea goyyeawda aba ghuutta haw ea dabeakka, nea gogeal heeda siida ammu ghoaghuuha niny miyeeda, ak geayiiy aba gidawalda gheang'da Aseetta.
Earappeadi was Balleanda, ghwanal mureeda aba gitta ghayi sawaniin;
amaduw nea siimmajeek ghoaw ging'eetta lealeanooda mamudeana aba heeda buuneessean sissa niny mureeda,
ak ghwaloat Aseetta ghoaw ashoohoochcheanda haw uurji Melkisedeki.
Appdaydeaba nii geendeawi ng'asheega saang'a jea eerukuna hang'waay rukunooda, earappeadi mwang'ada iidigeagwa.

Earappeadi aba damani miisa awosa ginealshoodigean, gammiiseegwa gideaba gajanyasa sii nuut jea ghoanaleegwa gichcha ng'asheega majeekcheewi bea madeeda bea Aseetta. Googasayi eanooga, mii hamitta hang'waay gil;
aba gideaba siida ghus eanooga mwanala gil aba ng'asheega doabiiw, aba gideaba niny jeepta.
Hamitta hang'waay gaba fuga nihittiisa heeda, nea giikka mideawa fughareengean ea sinnaal sinooda gichchea goheelleatta ng'asheega miyaas ea gea munyas.

Asi aseasa eweaya mwadi eanung'waada ng'asheekka ghayi bea garayi bea ginealshooda Gristohiin nea gehittiisi heeda, ak ea adagudeesinnyi sindeetta duukkuunooda aba gadiyoojiga nimeewa ak geendeawi masaweega aba heeda Aseetta,
aba iitta gimmiinnooda, ea iitta iinda geattinga iheenga buuneeda, iitta dunnooda miyeeda, ea girgweageeda maygamuudean.
Nea ng'asheesu gajeesna iimwas Aseetta.
Ak ahang'waay gideaba gaynung' gwaduukkuuna fukka ghayi nidaah weeshinda ammwadiin, fukghayi siittaw gimearda Gurorooda Ghaydit,
ak ea nisamu aloheeda ng'asheanda Aseetta ea dea uurda gweannyeekka jea ghwahidu,
amaduw ghwayam geaw nea nittambiilan, nea abeeda ea ningoor Balleanda Aseetta aba gidagassiida saawa ak gong'ng'ooysa humng'eeda aba foolda.
Aba gideaba ng'eanyiida roobassa roopta galeagasean, ak goruudu nyeega miisa fukghayi barsean, ak ghwanyas ghawooda aba heeda Aseetta.
Ama jih halaghweenga ea ng'obeeshta, ea marachchi gil ea gwariikghta eamwaashta; nea mudeanoadaannyi ea ghwardeayda.
Asi earappeadi sibalooldunuun, aba badahuukkeagwa, fuga abwariinyi, geanalli muuchchi ng'asheega miyaas bea lealeanooda.
Aba gideaba Aseetta mandeawana ghwanooda ea ghoanaawa ghaang' gadiyoojigeagwa ea bariinyeega ghayi oahhiimu appadaydaannyi aba gadiyeesiinda fuga ghaydidi, duu asna eara ghamneawa.
Ak geegasayi giliwas sih aba jeedeang'wa dahiimna doobiiwnatta uurji diitta ak ghwanal huumeanda ea girrar ea ghwahitta huydeanda,
ak abeeda ea mwang'udeagwa ghaleehooda, ak gowoschi fuga jea goomaseaw geat fukka aba naweeda masaweega ea milikghteayda ak gohearannyi gidaghayi sihelleesa.
Aba gideaba damanda sina Aseetta helleesiinda sea Abrahaamu, nea abeeda ea manda siida haw jea gweaksa habeawooda, gweaksa geaw habeawooda,
nea gwayi, “Aba huumwa gaydagoonnyi ghawooda ak ghahaachcheey.”
Gwasnu eara Abrahaamu, aba riyeeng'deayda, ghwanyas helleesiinda.
Buuneeda aba huumwa iissa gweaksa habeawooda siida haweewa saawa, nea aba mudeanooda sheang'nyeadinga nyaawa sean agitta habeawooda ea mudeanooda baloolda.
Hean nea gagasa Aseetta muuchchi gohiimsa fuga jea gwahearan helleesiindida ea gidamayghwayamwaatta seareeda aba gidagasa, hean gomajeek ng'asheagaaschi aba habeawooda,

asi aba jeemba haleanji iyyeenya moammu ghwayamwa, nea aba jeedeaba suu ea moammu gwargu Aseetta ng'uyyeega, aseaseeda mang'aw gasa heechchea gamng'awusa abeeda ghwanyas gimajeekta ak ghwanyas rarooda ghayi siyiin madeedeanya.
Geendeawi ng'asheanji nea gwargu huumwa ak gawuurji alooheeda jea ghaweat gisimeanda, ghusooda iissa gawa heeda ghaydit laabwa hoowa hang'da subwaasha gheeda,
heeda weah Yeesu nea gawuurji siida galleada aba hoorgeedeanya, ak ea niiw ashoohoochcheanda haw manda mudeanooda nea gawuurji Melkisedeki.
Nea abeeda Melkisedeki, was sugoochcheanda Saleemu, was ashoohoochcheanda Aseetta haw bea humng'eeda, gwaronnyi sea Abrahaamu nea gwaleabu nuseadayda sugoodiga ak ghoadaw niny ghawooda;

nea Abrahaamu ghoadaw niny gida aba gilattamwanamughuush aba jeeda haleanjeessean. Niny duweachcheeda, aba isuroobu gheawungaaschi, sugoochcheanda doobiiwnatta, ak gabiissa ea sugoochcheanda Saleemu, ak ea sugoochcheanda hoyyoo.
Niny manda ghwaan ghana ghaamwat ghana rooproobanga, ak ea manda ging'eetta askwearjoojigaaschi ghana huydeanda eaweagaaschi, gawuurji sea Balleanda Aseetta nea ashoohoochcheanda manda mudeanooda.
Asi daaha hawundaannyi gitteenna! Abrahaamooda was gheamba ghweanigaasa ghoadaw niny gilagi aba jeeda gilattamanamughuush bea easanga.

Nea eara diibiga Laawi ghayi nyas ashohoochcheandumeedean, gwandeawa digheanda aba deaweeda jea gageandeawa heeda buuneeda haleanjeeda aba gilattamanamughuush, nea heeda fuga siduupcheewi, nea eara suu ea jeatta Abrahaamu.
Nea siisi maba roproobang'suun ghoawaam haleanjeeda aba gilattamanamughuush aba heeda Abrahaamu ak ghoadaw ghawooda ninnyeeda mideawa helleesiinda.
Ak ghanyea mesheang'nyeesiina gideaba dea mwanang' nibadischeesa dea haw.
Aba hiji gageanda haleanjeeda aba gilattamanamughuush aba heeda fuga jea gameewa; nea aba hiji gwanda dea sumuuwwu gideaba eamajeek.
Nea ghoammu sih gwayi Laawi ninyeeda ghayi awaam haleanjeeda aba gilattamanamughuush, ghoadayda haleanjeeda aba gilattamanamughuush aba naweeda Abrahaamu,
aba gideaba abeeda niny miyeeji damanda ronnyeewa niny sea Melkisedeki.

Asi doobiiwnatta iisinyas aba heeda ashoohoochcheandumeeda Laawi (hean aba nii ghwanyas buuneeda deaweeda,) abeeda gudeegasa ashoohoochcheannuut jea ghang'eat uurji Melkisedeki, ea ghang'al dea surgu uurji Haruuni?
Aba gideaba iimida yamitta aba ashoohoochcheandumeeda, abeeda ghwahit gideaba gajeayam eara deaweeda.
Nea siida was dea surukuna ng'asheesuun gaba eamwa nuut, manda dea nisin gadiyeeda aba heeda wagiida.
Hean adaach gideaba Ng'uttamiideanya gwaleabu jeatta Yuuda, iiduw aba gidaguyeatta sea emeetta ghanyea marukuna gil Muusa appadayda ashoohoodiga.
Iiduw ghwadajiit muuchchi ng'asheesu aba iirudu ashoohoochcheanda nuut nea gawuurji sea Melkisedeki,
amaduw ghoaw ashoohoochcheanda, nea mii aba naweeda deaweedeeda gasa saseeda gil aba jeatta geaghus aba uurda eaweega mayghwadattasa.
Aba gideaba gemmuuwwuuna badaydaannyi nea geeyi,
“Ang'iing'i guwosi ashoohoochcheanda manda mudeanooda,
nea gawuurji Melkisedeki.”
Aba meatkweanagi, digheanda ghayi bea madeeda sisach aba ng'arng'arandaannyi ak ea marachchi gil
(aba gideaba deaweeda manda gissin ak gamajeegiit); aba meatkweanagi, ea sugu gidamiy sirarji, aba nii ea sineekkiissi Aseetta.
Ak ea masa nea manda habeawooda.
Nea fukka ghayi bea mwadi huuw ashoohoodigean ghwanyas hoorgajeega nyaawa nea mwaaga habeawooda, ama duukku nii geattawa habeawooda,
“Nguttamiida niyaak habeawooda
ak ea mayghwayam fughareadaannyi,
‘Ang'iing'i guwosi ashoohoochcheanda manda mudeanooda.’”
Ng'asheanji aba huumwa ghwanung' ghoaw Yeesu neajeeda adareamshi.
Ashoohoodiga madeeda ghayi asaang'a isiyiida, aba gideaba ghayi ghaweada miyeeda giibinda hoorgajeega nyaawa;
nea niny ghoang'ng'waay ashoohoochcheandumeadaannyi nea gomajeek, aba gideaba niny gayghwashng'u damanda mamuudeana.
Nea giduurji sean ghoammu aba damannyoojiga sean gwalealu fukka neekkiissa Aseetta aba ninyiin, nea niny gwanda galeagasean nea goduupchi saawa.
Asi ghwahit gideaba gajeendeawana ashoohoochcheanda haw uurji nii, ghaydit, meerukunana badayda ng'asheega munyas nyah siirja, sihheelli sea fuga ring'eega, sittiing'da ea ghwalaabwa hoow humng'eeda.
Niny manda gidagasa, mawuurji ashoohoodikka heesiin, iissa ghoadayda lukghumajeega galeagasean, iissa ghanyi ghoadayda appadayda ring'eegaaschi niny amaduw ghoadayda geaw.

Aba huumwa deaweeda iissa gageanu fuga ng'arng'ari ak ghwanung' ghoaw ashoohoodiga hees, nea ng'asheanda habeawooda, eadu geeshta deaweeda, ghwaloat Balleanda ghayi bean ahidaat damanda manda mudeanooda.
Asi ghamneawa huumeanda surgu nihi: geendeawi ashoohoochcheanda haw uurjunu, siida apteada aba meatkweeda geattinda dugwa bea hoorgeeda sugoochcheandumeeda Aseetta was Ng'uttamiida aba humng'eeda,
niny siida gadiiy aba heeda ghaydit gil ea heeda maheemajeandida bea huumwaan ghayi masna siida gwasin Ng'uttamiidean.
Aba gideaba giliwas ashoohoochcheanda haw iissa gealoat ghoadayda haleanjeeda ea lukghumajeega; nea eara ashoohoochcheanda gammiisa gideaba gaygwandeawa gichchea ghoadayda.
Inyeeda gwachchi gwanda badayda ng'eanyiida, ea mayghoaw ashoohoochcheanda eara hay, nea gwanda ashoohoodiga adayyiida haleanjeeda aba ginnyaashta deaweeda.

Gwasin gida uurji diitta was jirooneeda haleanjeeda ghaydidi mida humng'eedean; aba gideaba damanda ramagu gwasin Muusa maheemajeanda, ghoadoabiiw Aseetta, nea gwayeeshsha, “Sikteawana gideaba gisni haleanjeessean gawuurji gidaghayi sihhimdaayda aba uhuuda gijeeda.”
Asi aba nii, Gristo ninyas gadiyeeda adareamshi muuchchi adaraam dea waas gawuurji neajeeda goduupchi muuchchi, ak ea niiw deaweeda aba helleesiinda huumwa.
Ama inyeeda neajeetta bea madeedean ea manda sirjeeda, gwachchi ea maygwanda gassoodeaba diita bea iyyeenyean.
Aba gideaba ninyas ramaseanda aba heannyaawa aba heeda eneewa:
“Gwanda askwearjoojiga jea ghwahidu gwargu Ng'uttamiida,
ak gaydang'eat neajeedeesh sea gheeh Israeeli
ea gheeh Yuuda;
ak ea mawuurji neajeeda ghayi itteanyu sea ghweaniga nyaawa
aba eaweeda ghayi ang'ng'waanyi saawa geattinda
ak gearutteawi jeeda ng'eanyiida Misri;
aba gideaba mudugoobiida jeeda neajeedeanyu,
ak ea mududaduuba saawa aba ginnyaa Ng'uttamiida.
Nii neajeeda jea dasissa gheeh Israeeli
iing'atta askwearjoojikka, aba ginnyaa Ng'uttamiida:
Gaydayiin deaweedajeegeasu iheenga nyaawa,
ak ghang'waarji aba jeesinga guroruunatka nyaawa,
ak gaydoaw Aseetta nyaawa,
ak gayghoaw fugeasu.
Ea manda siida jea ghoanaal dea mideawa
ghana giliwas sih ea oorjeeda ghaamwat, nea gwayeeshsha, ‘Nala Ng'uttamiida,’
aba gideaba gayghwanalan sean,
ghang'eada dea mwanang'eawa saawa ea gagul dea haweewa sean.
Aba gideaba gaydawas ng'eeni aba gidinnyeannyeekka nyaawa,
ak ea maydapkaat ring'eega nyaawa earahay.”
Aba rukunooda neajeedeesh ea nunung' ghawaasiit dea madeeda. Nea dea nuwaasiit ea niriikghta gammuudean.
Asi ghamneawa eara neajeeda madeeda gwandeawa digheanda gichchea eabwatta Aseetta ea heeda ghaydit aba hiji bea ng'eanyiidean.
Aba gideaba iissa geesin maheemajeanda dea madeeda nea dea siyiina gheaboonyaneeda ea measa ea mukkatteeydida bea gihimnoodean; geguura Heeda Ghaydit.
Badaydeaba hang'deaba iyyeenya bea heashooda gwanda mahemajeanda was heeda Ghaydit muuchchi,

nea gwandeawa heeda wagiida eyda meang'meang' mideawa shearooda ng'andit ea sandakkwajeanda mida jeeda neajeeda nea sikkwealsa meadajeega sean aba lagheanga meeng'meeng'i nea gwandeawa bayookta meang'meang' mida hamitta suguura maana, ea bileangida Haruuni aruudu damealga, ea measeeda neajeeda;
nea uhuuda gwanda malaykajeega mideawa gigheambiitta nea gojiroon hoorgeeda ng'eeninda. Nea appadahuukkeaba haleanjeeni ea meammuusi eerukuna muuchchi nea gekkingiinayi.
Hean giding'ding'deaydeaba ng'asheesu ea sisin, iissa gaweay ashoohoodiga galeagasean jeeda maheemajeanda madeeda ak gwasin gadiyoojiga nyaawa bea mooshta ghawooda;
nea deaba iyyeenya iissa gawa ashoohoochcheanda haw nea gaba geaw, iissa gawa nibwagi aba jeeda gweayda, nea ghwaat foojeanda adayda appadaydaannyi ea dea gidinyeannyeekka buuneeda.
Nea aba nii ghoahiimu Gurorooda Ghaydit gideaba naweeda jea ghoahutta fii heeda ghaydit miyeajaat aba hiji duu ghamiinaadawa maheemajeanda madeedean
(nea geanung' gawuurji sea damani bea ghamneawean.) Nea aba badiini, haleanjeeda siittayda ea gea lukghumajeega iissa geattayda moammu goomajeek fughareeda siida mwaash Aseetta,
ak iissa gabeachchi hamitta ea leeshooda sea gihushshooda, was deaweedajeega saseeda ghayi sugu ea ghwahitta damanda jea ebiikta eesna gichcha.
Iimuchchu nea ghwahidu Gristoyda was ashoohoochcheanda haw bea haleanjeeda miyaas jea ghwahidu, hean aba naweeda udahabeascheanda haw majeek (meesnana geattinga, nea maba badaydeaba ng'eanyiin)
iissa gawa nibwagi Heeda Ghaydit, nea mwaada foojeanda nooga ea gea muhooga niny ghwaat foojeandaannyi, ak gwasin lealeanooda manda mudeanooda.
Aba gideaba siida mideawa ring'eeda isippuunna foojeanda nooga ea gea heewga ea deareeda haghweanda iyammiidu nea ghoammu goohuun saseeda,

abeeda gayghwaranyattaan muuchchi foojeanda Gristo, dea aba Gurorooda manda mudeanooda ghoadaw geaw Aseetta nea meerukunana badaydaannyi gidamuy, gayghoammiidu fughareengeagwa aba gadiyoojiga nimeewa ak gagadiyeesa Aseetta majeek.

Asi niny dea aduuptooschi buuneeda aba neajeedeesh gil, ak abeeda fukka suguursean ghwanyas helleesiinda hearaniischooda manda mudeanooda, hean gapnu miyeeda jea gwalealna saawa jeeda ramaseannyeekka aba neajeeda ghayi bea madeeda.
Nea heeda mida hearaniischooda, abeeda miyeeda siida ghayi sin gayghang'eat ghuutta.
Aba gideaba hearaniischooda iissa gamajeegiit iihidu miyeeda, amaduw ea manda uurda aba damanda duu eamajeek dea ghayi sin.
Hean eara neajeeda madeeda ea mamajeegiida iimanda foojeanda.

Nea gilinyoo ea digheanda gil mida jeeda deaweedeeda nurukusa Muusa buuneeda, gageanu foojeanda muhooga ea gea nooga, ea beega ea budeega areeri bea gisilga ea hisoppo, ak geappuunna sean gittabu ea buuneessean,
nea gwayeeshsha, “Suu foojeanda neajeeda gil ghayi rukuneey Aseetta.”
Ak aba naweani ghoabuunna foojeanda maheemajeanda sea haleanjeessean sigadiydooscheatta damanda baditta Aseetta.
Aba huumwa, aba jeeda deaweeda gwaramagu eammiinna haleanjeessean foojeanda, ak iimeahhiida foojeanda ea manda samsiinda ring'eega.
Ak ghwadoabiiw gideaba haleanjeeda uurji gea humng'eeda gideaba geammiidu aba naweani, nea haleanjeeda humng'eeda geammiinna lukghumajeega miyaas mawuurji suu.

Aba gideaba Gristo nuwa jeeda, mii gideaba gawa heeda ghaydit sisna geattinga gil, niny gawuurji sea diitta bea huumwaan, niny gawa humng'eeda huumwa, ak ghamneawa ghwahidu nea gawuurji Aseetta appadahuukkaasa.
Ak ea mii gideaba iissa gayghoadayda geaw galeagasean, gawuurji ashoohoochcheanda haw iissa gawa Heeda Ghaydit nibwagi aba jeeda gweayda nea mwaada foojeandaannyi;

aba sareani gwachchi gaygabiikkiida jeeda sawanateeda ghang'eada dea ghayi sisna sindeetta ng'eanyiida. Ak aba nii, ghwahidu nibwagi aba mudeanooda damanda ak gageanda ring'eeda aba gidaydeaydeaba geaw ghoaw lukghumeadaannyi.
Hean gawuurji gidaghayi siittawuda siida miyeeda nibwagi, amang'atta ghwahidu girgweaksiinda,

gwasnu eara Gristo, niny ghayi geattayda nibwagi ak gageanda ring'eega fuga saang'a, gayghwahidu deaba iyyeenya, ak ea mayghwahidu appadayda ring'eeda niny gayghwaan gwalealu fukka amuukku niny muuchchiin.
Nea deaweeda ii jirooneeda ng'asheega miyaas jea gwahidu, ak ea mii ormeeda huumwa bea haleanjeetta, ea mayghoaw, aba lukghumeedida duu ettayyiida aba gilakkweayiin, ak ghoammiidu fukka nekkiissean.
Earagwasa, gwachchi ea majea nunung'waada gidaydeayda? Ak abeeda fuga moora isimmiidu nibwagi, ea mudugwandeawa gipkeatta ring'eeda.
Nea aba lukghumeani iissa ghwanung' eapkaat ring'eeda aba gilakkweay.
Aba gideaba maygwasa gideaba gaygageanda ring'eega foojeanda jiirgwa ea gea nooga.
Earagwasa, damanda hinna Gristo jeeda ng'eanyiida, gwayi,
“Lukghumeeda ea haleanjeeda sisappa geadi bea ghadooweeda ghanyea migassi,
nea saseeda ea nisinnean aniini;
aba lukghumajeega sughwarda ea haleanjeeda sisappa geadi aba ring'eeda ghanyea mihoosassiini.
Ak geayeennyi, ‘Ean naawunnyi dasin gidigasayi, Ea Aseetta,
gawuurji gisung'waarda appadaydeanyu aba jeeda gittaabu.’”

Damanda eneewa aba heettiyeada, “Ak ghanyea miigassa ghana bwariinya lukghumajeega ea haleanjeeda sughwarda sisappa geadi ea haleanjeeda sisappa geadi bea ring'eeda” (suu geattayda aba naweeda deaweeda),
ak gabiikta ghoahaat nea gwayi, “Ea, Naawunnyi dasin gidigasayi.” Niny gwanyarja dea madeeda ak abeeda ghoang'eat deabiyyeenya.
Ak abeeda aba gitta gasean abeeda gajeammiinneasa aba naweeda haleanjeeda sisappa geadi was saseeda Yeesu Gristo nibwagi ak ea majeebiikta.
Nea iissa ghamiinaada ashoohoochcheanda galeagasean damanda gadiyeadaannyi, ak imisean ghoadayda lukghumajeegiga bea galeagasean, moammu gageanda ring'eegean.
Nea Gristo iyadayda nibwagi lukghumeeda aba ring'eega, hean goopteada aba meatkweeda geattinda dugwa bea Aseetta,
hean ghoamuughu ea eayiin weajoodigaaschi ghoaw hoorgeeda geeshangaaschi.
Nea aba giidaydeawagi bea haleanjeeda sisappa geadiin ea ninung' ghwahit fukka sean simmiiduun aba damannyoojiga sean.
Ak gamuuwwuneasa Gurorooda Ghaydit nea gwayi,
“Nii neajeeda jea dasissa saawa
iing'atta askwearjoojikka, aba girrugu Ng'uttamiida:
Gaydayiin diigheannyeekkeasu jeesinga guroruunatka nyaawa,
ak geang'oorsi jeesinga fughareenga nyaawa,”
Ak gabiikta ghoahaat gideaba,
“Mayguttabiikta daapkaat ring'eega nyaawa ea ng'asheega munyas sina earahay.”
Heeda mida samsiindeaba ng'asheesu, ea maygudu gabiikta giidaydeayda haleanjeeda sisappa geadi appadayda ring'eeda.
Asi, fuga eaduupcheewi, dea sumwasi beatta heeda Ghaydit aba foojeanda Yeesu,
aba naweeda eesh mideawa eaweega janneasa aba naweeda ghamarda beashooda, nea appadayda saseadaannyi gil,
amaduw nea gendeawi ashoohoochcheanda haw haweewa gheeda Aseetta,

ghang'wana geneekkiissi nea geebeayi guroruunatka huumwa nea geesikteawi muuchchi masaweega, nea geappuunna guroruunatkaasa aloheeda ak geang'ami ng'asheega munyas ak gehhuun sasanuukkaasa aba beega miyaas.
Gagasa eang'ng'waanya muuchchi duukkuunooda sirarji nea mwabealbeala, aba gideaba siida rugu nea gohelleesi ea doabiiwaat;
ak geanalli gichchea eanung' gabarinnyiida geat buuneeda ea gadiyoojiga miyaas,
nea adeanung'waadi badoodeaba geat, ak geesinnyi seareeda fuga mwaatkwa, gidabal gaba siisi amajeek nuut, nea aba sean ghoadaayi gideaba Eaweettida girgweaksiinda nineekkiit.
Nea iisisinnyi ring'eeda aba baysiinda nea sinyaschi fughareeda huumeanda, abeeda eamaygwanda lukghumeeda appadayda ring'eega,
nea gwanda furdeayda girgweaksiinda jea ghoabeal buuneeda, ea beasta ng'waan jea ghwaak fuga was weajoodiga.
Nea siida fool deaweedeeda Muusa iissa ghami nea meabwayda aba ghuusisba muushoodi iyyeenya ghanea samwagu gil.

Abeeda iing'ulayi gajeamuydaan girgweaksiinda jea ghwanyas fuga ghasghas Balleanda Aseetta, nea ghabwara ririnnyeanda foojeanda neajeenda ghayi simmiinna, nea ghoanyareas Gurorooda dagheerjeandumeeda?
Aba gideaba geanalli aseasa siida ayi, “Mureandooda deanyu, gaydawalda aniini.” Nea gwayi gichcha, “Ng'uttamiida gaygoorgweaksa fugaaschi.”
Nii gidahaloat gil gideaba gajabeedeaysiina geattinga Aseetta mideawa eaweega.
Asi apkaada askwearjoojiga ghayi bea mwadi damanda sippwaanyaneey, hean ghoarjeang'di ng'uchcheeda ng'waan ea sawanadeeda,
nea hich iissa geng'ng'ewweegwa nea geesawaneegwa, nea hich gokkuuyi geadi sea fukka sisma ng'asheesuun.

Aba gideaba nondeawi baydeayda appadahuukka fuga mida ghealooniga, ak ghoamwaschi nea gohoosannyi aba gireetta haleanjeedeang'wa, nea ghoanalli gideaba agooga gondeawi haleanjeeda miyaas jea ghwashng'u.
Asi adiiduw goojakti gidoararji, mideawa gimearda haw.
Asi gagasa andeawana riyeeng'deayda, ak abeeda goosinnyi gidagasa Aseetta ak ghoanyaschi gitta sihelleesean.
“Asi gudughwashoada gheadi nuwaas,
ak abeeda dea jea ghwahidu gayghwahidu ak ea mayghwashing'da;
nea siideanyu doabiiwaat gaygoobiideawa masaweega,
ak iiraay ak gabiikta bwadaw,
ghanyea maygahoosan guroroodeanyu aba niny.”
Ak aseasa ea mebeahi jeedeaba fukka biikta bwadaw ak gealas uhuudean, geebeayi gea mideawa masaweega nea gafur guroruunatka nyaawa.
Asi ghamneawa masaweega goomajeek haleanjeeda sirar, ak gwargu iitta haleanjeeda meadaaha.
Appadaydeaba nii ea ninyas gweargwa ghaydidanda huumwa.
Aba masaweega geanalli gideaba ng'eanyiida geesin aba ng'asheanda Aseetta, ak eara haleanjeeda sidaa eameesnana haleanjeeda meadaaha.

Aba masaweega Abeeli ghoadaw Aseetta lukghumeeda ea ghang'al Gain, ak aba nii geattaw doobiiwnatta, hean ghoaw Aseetta mushoochcheanda iimwas haleanjeedaannyi bea gimearda; ak ghami, ak aba masaweagaaschi ea gudugabalool.
Nea aba masaweega geettiing'da Enokki humng'eeda ak abeeda eamwadaaha miyeeda; ak ea meanyasa, aba gideaba niyaat Aseetta. Asi heeda miyeayaada abeeda easurukuna badayda gideaba niihoosan Aseetta.
Nea iimanda masaweega ahang'waay gideaba gajahoosana niny. Aba gideaba siida wassean jea gwaneekkiissa Aseetta gagasa ghwanal gideaba niny gwanda ak gomeari fukka gaseadayyi ninyiin.

Nea aba masaweega Nuuhu damanda rekusiina Aseetta aba iitta ng'asheega meedaaha, ghwayiiy ak gwasin maleambooda haw jea ghaweada fugeaba gheannyi; ak aba nii gorgweaksa ng'eanyiida ak ghoaw siida jea gwahearan doobiiwnatta sinyassa masaweega.
Aba masaweega gwasin mureeda Abrahaamu damanda suguursiina ak gawa ng'eanyiida jea ghwanyasa hearaniischooda; ak gawa, nea mwanala eara heeda gal.
Aba masaweega goobiida ng'eanyiida helleesiinda, aba jeeda ng'eanyiida buuneeda, ak goobiida jeesinga maheemajeega sea Isakka ea Yakkobo, gwahearaniischi sea niny aba heelleesiindida.
Aba gideaba gang'ula mwadi ghwadaa mujiineeda mideawa sindeetta, nea siida deas ea dea sin ea Aseetta gil.
Aba masaweega eara Saara ghwanyas uurda jea gagweayiida, earappeadi ninaawuda gweannyeakkaaschiin, nea ghwanung' ghoaw niny siida doabiiwaat mideawa helleesiinda.
Iiduw aba hichpa siyagi miy nea gawuurji gilinimi, ak geeji jeatta saang'a deenna miinga humng'eeda ak gwadeenna iseaskweanda ghuutta basooda.

Fiisu seaniin gameewwiisa jeeda masaweega, ak ea miighwanyas gidaghayi sihelleesa, ak geaghus gideaba ghwadaa nea sheagi ak ghwadeapta, ak ghwanal gideaba saawa rabasta gil ea fuga mang'aw appadayda ng'eanyiida.
Aba gideaba fuga rukku ng'asheesu ghoahiimu muuchchi gideaba saawa gagaseadayyi ng'eanyiida jea goobiida.
Nea abeeda iyapkaat ng'eanyiitta leabuun, ghwanyawa gwandeawa seawadeeda biikteayda.
Asi ghamneawa aba giduurji, gagaseadayyi ng'eanyiida miy, nea diitta bea humng'eedeani. Hean Aseetta ea moammu ghabwaspwas aba gideaba geguura Aseetta nyaawa, aba gideaba nisissa saawa mujiini.
Abrahaamu aba masaweega, eaweetta sisimsima, ghoadayda Isakka, nea ninnyeeda ghayi nyas helleesiinda hean gagasa ghoadayda balleandaannyi was haghasheeda,
nea abeeda geeyi appadaydeaba niny, “Aba Isakka gajeeguurdeaweey diibiga jeachcheengaagu.”
Ak ghwanal gideaba Aseetta ghoammu gooduunna buuneeda jeeda miyeeda; hean gwargu nea ghoawaaghan, ak iiduw gabiikta ghwanyas.
Nea aba masaweega gamus Isakka ghawooda jea ghwahidu appadayda Yakkobo ea Esaau.
Nea aba masaweega damanda meawa Yakkobo, gabadiischeesa giliwas ballean bea Yoseefu, ak gabuy uhuuda damanda moasha ghawooda nea gwadiiwa geaw bileangidaannyi.
Aba masaweega Yoseefu, aba mudeanooda eaweagaaschi gwargu ng'eayda fuga Israeeli ak ghoadayda iitta gichchea eebuyda.
Aba masaweega, Muusa damanda sijiila, ghafuy ghwaan ea ghaamwat sheah samwagu, aba gideaba ghwadaa saawa gideaba aamiy; ak ea moawala digheanda sugoochcheanda.
Aba masaweega Muusa, damanda hissiina heeda, ghaheawa eeguura balleanda hudeaba Faraao,
ak ghwaloat gideaba gaygaweechchi sawanadeeda sea fuga Aseetta ak ea moasaamwa hooseaneega jeeda ring'eeda.
Ak ghwanung' ghoaw ging'weakka ea sawanadeeda Gristo meanang'oochcheandumeeda haw mawuurji maghasuukka sittiing'da bea ng'eanyiida Misri, aba gideaba ghoamuughu gimearda.
Aba masaweega ghabeawa ng'eanyiida Misri, nea moawala nyarasta sugoochcheanda; ak ghwarjeang'da nea gawuurji siida daa Aseetta meadaaha.
Aba masaweega ghoang'ng'waay Basakka ak geeppuunna foojeanda, ak abeeda iihidu Gitta nuusa duweachchajeega ea moammu ghwasat saawa.
Aba masaweega ghoaghaawa buuneeda Basoodareara gawuurji gili sik ng'eanyiida ghajaam; nea fuga Misri, iigala sinooda gawuurji gissinda saawa, ghwaak beega.
Aba masaweega ghoabeada ghamarda Yeriikko damanda neaweesiina saawa eawooji ispwa.
Aba masaweega Rahaabooda aweaksheeda ghanyea mameewuudayi fukghayi manda mureeda, aba gideaba ghwadeapta fuga buwa gheang'da.
Abeeda gaydargu naaha? Aba gideaba madeayi damanda aba rukunooda iitta Gidion, Barakka, Samson, Jeefta, ea dea Dawdi ea dea Samweeli ea Sibanga,
nea aba naweeda masaweega ghwajoar daroorakka, ak ghwanung' eesin gittoabiiw, ak ghwanyas heelleesiinda, ak ghwarat ghuusiga ng'annyeekka,
ak gwanuus beasta ng'waan, ak gamng'awa madeeda bwaanga, nea ghwanyas uurda aba jeeda ng'arng'aranda, ak gwandeawa uurda aba jeeda ng'uchcheeda, ak ghwanung' gamng'aw lugooda emoojiga.
Ghwanyas gadeemga fuga nyaawa duunna miyeeda. Mwaatkwa geesawan, nea ghaheawa ghamwas siksiinda, ak abeeda gwaduuttu gichcha ak ghwanyas eaweega miyaas.
Mwaatkwa gwasawana aba shikkooda ea bayiiga, nea ghabwada geeratta munyaloalajeega aba ghealooniga.
Geefutta lagheanga, ak geabwaash nibiyyeenya, ak genuuseada aba bwaanga; ak gwaneayi nea gookkwa eagweega gisilga ea gea nooga, ak ea barbari, nea geesawan, nea geesma ng'asheega munyas,
nea ng'eanyiida ea magassa fiisu, ak gwaneayeewa eeshtearajeaga ea gijeega, ea jeesinga bearuutka ea gwaleadinga jeeda ng'eanyiida.
Nea suuseaniin, earappeadi sisim aba masaweega nyaawaan, ghanyea mwanyasa gidaghayi siheelleesa,
iiduw nea nibada Aseetta gidamiy appadahuukkaasa, iiduw isihelleewi ghanyea maygamajeekcheewiidi.
Asi, dea nineaweesiinaneasa shamooghooda haw bea muushoodiga, gagasa easaja giliwas sareenda, ea ring'eeda nekkiisseasa muuchchi ak ghwanung' eesalda nea geemmiriikchi ng'weega siyiin madeedeanya,

nea geeng'ulayi Yeesuuyda asheeda was dea amajeek masaweagaasa, was dea aba hooseaneega siyiin madeadaannyi ghoahang'waay aba beehiida, ak gafool baspaseega, ak goopteada aba meatkweeda geattinda dugwa bea hoorgeeda gheambalmeeda Aseetta.
Asi ng'ulla dea ahang'waay appadayda fuga ring'eega ea fuurjeeda appadaydaannyi, ak abeeda ea moahuuwi fuga bur ghana gea giyoonnyi.
Aba ng'uchcheedeang'wa sea ring'eeda miyoahhang'waanya ea eeyi bwak ea oahhiida foojeandeang'wa.
Ak ea niroosseegwa ng'asheega ghayi rukuneegwa nea gwahindaneegwa balloojiga?
“Balleandeanyu, adiiduw gung'ulayi nea giibudeayani lasooda lasnyi Ng'uttamiida,
ghana gabur iheengeagwa iilaseegwa niny.
Aba gideaba Ng'uttamiida iissa ghwalas siitta bwariiyiin,
ak ghwalas giliwas ballean mwas niny.”
Geaghus mureeda ak abeeda ghoahhang'waanyi. Aseetta ghwanung' ahuuwa balloojiga; gaygwanda ana ballean jea ea maygwasissa mureeda ghwaan?
Isunung'waadaneegwa nea mealaseagwa, ak gowuurji sean, nea goguuyi sean, abeeda gowoschi diibiga sishuwaanda mowosi balloojiga.

Murdeedeaba ng'asheesu, geendeawi ghwaanigaasa bea ng'eanyiida jea ghwalaseasa ak geesissi saawa mureeda. Abeeda ea mammiisseasa muuchchi gideaba gajeettuuksiina geat Bwaabwa guroruunatka ak geanyaschi eaweega?
Aba gideaba saawa ghwalaseasa aba gheadi nuwaas aba gidamiisiinda saawa ak ghwalaseasa ak geemiyeesiidayi, ak abeeda geeguuyi ghaydidandaannyi.
Aba gheadi nuwaas bayiiga sean iisung'ula ang'waan mawuurji gissubwariiy; ammuuchchu gwaji haghweega eadu hoyyoo bea doobiiwnatta aba heeda fuga sibean eannaal ng'asheesu.
Asi agatkada geattingeagwa abittu ak goommajeekchi gutng'weakka ng'arng'ari,
ak ghoattoabiiwji naweadinga jea ghwala geeshangeagwa, nea abeeda gidamideawa badeeda ea meegeandeawana heeda roobuutka gagasa eahhaap.
Gagasa gimiriikta hoyyoo aba heeda buuneessean, aba ghaydidanda nea manda siida jea ghwadaa Ng'uttamiida iimandeawana.
