Ang'ulla adaghanyi siisi mwanyasa dagheerjeandumeeda Aseetta; ak ea manda hawunnyeanda ng'weaninda ama rudu gweadu jaliida, nea aba nii ghang'ut fuga saang'a ririnnyeanda;
nea adagwanda siida sina ng'asheega munyas ghana dea meawalla gheang'da Aseetta uurji Esawu, ghayi shaayda hawundaannyi doobiiwsa aba agiischooda assagi.
Nea ghoanalli gideaba iiduw nea gagasa gwahearan ghawooda, geefool, aba gideaba mwanyasa gheatta duukuunooda, earappeadi gasa nea gobuuttu dabeakka.
Aba gideaba agooga miyapkaani heeda gidasiimmu eawaas, was ng'ushapta beasta, ea misaneeda, ea giiseaneega, ea shaarara,
ea nyeashta duruumbeatti, ea ghuutta siida ama nyaah ghwanung' ghabeal fuga iiy ak ghwanung' ea magassa gabiikta ghwayiiy giijasi nea geerukusa saawa.
Ak ea mayghoammu aba ng'asheekka surukusean, “Nea eara diyeayda iisat gijeeda, gajeefutta lagheanga.”
Huumwa, nea hoowa ghang'uda fii muuwda nea heeda ayi Muusa, “Aniini ghaabwaadannyi aba muuwda.”
Ak ea noapkaannyi Giijeeda Sayuuni ea mujiineeda Aseetta majeek, Yerusaleemooda humng'eeda, ea heeda malaykajeega saang'a, bwat geat aba ghweelmeeda,
ea heeda fuga bwat geat was gea sishsheeda eeji sung'oorsa gheawunga nyaawa humng'eeda, nea dea laja girgweaguutka ea Aseetta buuneessean i, ea heeda guroruunatka fuga doobiiweadi geemiyaas,
ea heeda Yeesu, was siida aduuptooschi buuneeda bea neajeedeesh, ea dea foojeanda sippuunna jea gwanyagu haleanjeeda miyaas ng'al foojeanda Habeeli.

Asi ang'ulla adiiduw ghoaheawi ninnyeeda balool. Aba gideaba inyeeda saawa ea mamng'awa damanda heaweawa ninnyeeda reekusa saawa aba jeeda ng'eanyiida, abeeda gajeemng'awdaan iisiheawi ninnyeeda rekuseasa aba humng'eeda.
Hean ghwanung' nyeashtaannyi gwaduumduum ng'eanyiida; ak ghamneawa ea niheelleesa gideaba, “Ak gaydabiikta gichcha deaduumduum nea mwajeaghus ng'eanyiida gaydeaduumduum eara humng'eeda.”
Ng'asheanji bea gideaba, “Gaydabiikta gichchean,” ghoahiimu geandeayda gissittuumduum, was gidaghayi sisin, ak abeeda geappuut gitta meammu eettuumduumiin.
Asi eahuuwa fuga mideawa badiischooda aba nyasooda sugoochcheandumeeda majeettuumduum, ak geattawji Aseetta ghadoowanda huumwa, aba mureeda ea mooshta ghawooda.
aba gideaba Aseetteanya beasta nyarja haleanjeesseani.
Bariinyeega oorjoogiyya gagasa eamaduuleana.
Adiiduw ginung'waadi gideaba gajahiimsiina rabasta innyeanda jeeda aba gideaba gwanda fuga mwaatkwa niing'aatta malaykajeega nea mwanala.
Oapkaada fuga Mida ghealooniga, ak goowuurjeewi giloondeayeesi ghealooniga sea saawa. Oapkaada fukka sisawaniin, aba gideaba earagooga goondeawi sasanuukka.
Geeshshooda dasissiina mureeda buuneessean, nea eara bulaliida gagasa ea mandeawana ririnnyeanda; aba gideaba Aseetta gaygoorgweaksa fuga munyas ea gea mealuuli.
Ak giheelleewi eaweagaagu bariinyeega lappiya, ak gagasa ghoahiinnyi gidindeawi aba gideaba gwayi, “Aniini manda gichchea daraay ghana danung'useey heeda.”
Hean abeeda gajeammuusa erukuna nea geesikteawi gideaba,
“Ng'uttamiida weedannyeandeanyu gil,
ak aniini ea maydaawal ng'eang'i;
siida gaygwasmanean naaha?”
Oapkaada fuga ahaaghwaneagwa, fukka rukuneegwa ng'asheanda Aseettean; asikteawana gichchea ghabwat geeshta eaweega nyaawa, ak googali masaweega nyaawa.
Yeesu Gristo gawuurji gideaba heetta ea ghamneawa ea gagul damanda manda mudeanooda.

Adiiduw ghoayaachchi geeshta ng'asheega saang'a ea ginealshajeega hidu; aba gideaba ghwahit geemmajeek gurorooda aba dagheerjeandumeeda, nea mii aba hamichchoojiga gil, ak ea mwanyagaada aba gidaat geeshta.
Ak geendeawi heeda wagiida nea fukka gadiiyi aba jeeda maheemajeandean ea madoobiiwsiina gideaba gayghwaak.
Aba gideaba sasanuukka diyeanga sihhiida foojeannyeekka nyaawa ak ghwaat ashoohoochcheanda haw heeda ghaydit ghoaw lukghumeeda appadayda ring'eedean geaghwarda aba jarooda murdeeda gambiini.
Eara Yeesu gwasawana aba madeettooshta ak abeeda ghoammiidu buuneeda aba foojeandaannyi.
Asi eweaya mwadi heeda mida aba jarooda was murdeeda gambiini, ak geeguuyeesi baspaseagaaschi ghayi ahang'waay.
Aba gideaba aba hiji meendeawani mujiineeda jea ghwashng'u, aseasa geegasayi mujiineeda jea ghwahidu.
Asi aba niny eegala mwadi nea geattaydi lukghumeeda dumsheesiinda Aseetta, nea haghweega ghuutta gil gea mwas gheawungaaschi.
Adoofoolli sinooda ng'asheega miyaas nea gooppareannyi haleanjeeda oondeawi, aba gideaba lukghumeeda sunu goohoosan Aseetta.

Asissiina mureeda fuga ahaghwaneegwa nea googadiyeesi; aba gideaba saawa gang'ula guroruunatkeagwa, nea gawuurji siida jea godayyii ng'asheega. Asi saawa gagasa gwasin ng'asheesu nea gahoosan, nea adagagiisan, aba gideaba ng'asheega sunu maygwarachchi gil aba heedeang'wa.
Amwaasha Aseetta ghawooda appadahuukkaasa, aba gideaba geesikteawi gideaba geendeawi fughareeda miy, nea geegasayi eesna haleanjeessean aba mureeda.
Ak geamuscheegwa muuchchi aba jeedeanyu asna ng'asheanji ak abeeda geebay eetteelnean heedeang'wa.
Asi ghamneawa Aseetta mideawa hoyyoo biikta gweadu gichcha Ng'uttamiideanya was Yeesu aba jeeda miyeeda, jeagiischoochcheanda haw bea gisilga, aba foojeanda neajeeda manda muudeanooda,

gagasa gagooneegwa haleanjeessean miyaas ak abeeda goosinnyi gidagasa, nea gagadiiyi aba jeedeang'wa gidagasa niny aba gheanyangaaschi aba naweeda Yeesu Gristo; nea giigheambiitta ea daannyi damanda manda muudeanooda. Amin.
Geamuscheegwa, fuga eaduupcheewi, oang'ng'waanya ng'asheandeanyu jea goomajeegeegwa, aba gideaba ng'asheesu geang'oorneegwa nea ghanuwaaschi.
Gagasa anala gideaba oorjeeda giyeanya was Dimotteo siittin aba ghealooniga, ak abeeda gaydabay dahidu heedeang'wa iibay ghwahidu.
Aghada fugeagwa hees ea fuga ghaydidi sean. Fukka leabu ng'eanyiida Ittalyaan ghoaghadeagwa.
Gagasa anyasa oagasean dagheerjeandumeeda. Amin.
Yakkobo, was soomjeanda Aseetta ea dea Ng'uttamiida was Yeesu Gristo,
Heeda emoojiga attamaniyyeenya dardaawaat:
Seayu.
Anung' ghoaw haleanjeessean hooseaneega, fuga eaduupcheewi, aba isisimsimeegwa aba gilakkil,
nea ghoanalli gideaba simooda masaweegeagwa gaygwanyakneegwa milikghteayda.
Nea alooheeda gagasa gweadu gadiyeeda majeek nea gowoschi, hidaat nea mwashoadeeweegwa gil.
Asi siida wassean mida jeedeang'wa isuunyeewa weaghumeeda, ea damwaash Aseetta, adawi buuneessean haleanjeeda aba innyeanda jeeda, nea maygwareekusa ak gajeattaw.
Ak gagasa gamus aba masaweega, nea mamwachmwaja gil, aba gideaba siida machmajiischi gawuurji laweachkweeda basooda aat jeammeeda nea geyyuuk.
Nea siida machmajiischi, nea mabwagi nea moapta ng'eanyi aba jeeda naweadingaaschi sean, adaghwarar gideaba gayghwanyas gil aba heeda Ng'uttamiida.
Anung'waada oorjeeda giyeanya mwanang' ghaghwar geaw aba jeeda hooseaneagaaschi,
nea meanang'oochcheanda ea sihiing'u, aba gideaba gawuurji deakghweeda seenga gayghang'atta.
Aba gideaba aseetta iissa gorearu nea gweadu beasta, ak ghoaghajaam seenga; ak ghoabit deakghweadaannyi, ak goosha aloheeda. Gwasnu eara meanang'oochcheanda gayghaghajaamiit aba naweadingaaschi.
Ng'wanaweagaaschi siida riyeeng'da iisimsim, aba gideaba iing'atta nea nijoar simsimda gayghwanyas shiipka eaweega mammuudeana ghayi bay gwahelleesa Aseetta fukka bwariiy ninyiin.
Asi adagwayi siida isisimsim, “Aniini gwasimsiman Aseetta;” aba gideaba Aseetta moammu gwasimsim gidamuy ak eara niny ea maygwasimsim siida;
hean giliwas sih iissa geesimsim damanda sigassa nea geaghurghur aba gitta gasean.
Hean gitta gasa siidean iigweayiit gweadu ring'eeda; ama iiduw nea nirir ring'eetta gweadu miyeeda.
Adereenganneegwa, fuga eaduupcheewi abwariinyi.
Gilinyoo eahhaakta miy ea gilinyoo eattayda hidaat gwaleabu heettiyeada, ak ghwararang'aana heeda Bwaabwa weeshinda nea headaannyi ea manda yammoodeaba geaw ghana jironeeda yamitteaba geaw.
Aba gidabwariiyda niny gwajiileasa aseasa aba ng'asheanda huumwa ak gewuurjeewi haghweega madeeda aba jeeda haleanjeedaannyi ghayi sin.
Hean nea ghoanalli ng'asheesu, fuga eaduupcheewi abwariinyi. Asi daba siisi wassean lamajeesa iing'da ng'asheanda, nea goojiileesa baloolda, ak ea miiassas nyaras,
aba gideaba nyarasta siida maygwasin doobiiwnatta Aseetta.
Asi oshsheagiidana geat ririnnyeanda ea gassooda hawunda muy ak ghoang'ng'waanyi aba garbabanda ng'asheandida, ammu gwaleabu guroruunatkeagwean.
Nea gagasa ahuuwa fuga sina ng'asheanda, adoobeachcheewi iing'da akghwahit, nea goreenganayi geat.
Nea siida ibeachchi iing'da ng'asheanda akghwahit, nea ghanyea masna, siisi abeeda gawuurji siida ng'ulla gheamamdaannyi aba jeeda giyoo;
aba gideaba gang'ula geaw amang'atta gawa heechchea gawa ama deagheatta ea nuroossa giduurji.
Nea siida ng'ula deaweedeeda hidaat, jea gweadu giibaldeaba geaw, ak ghwashng'u, adaghoaw siida iing'shi ramasoot gagasa ea siida sina gadiyeeda gil, siisi aba sinoadaannyi bea gadiyeeda.
Siida iyeeshsha geaw gideaba gwandeawa diini, nea mwarada ng'ushaptaannyi, nea gwareengani guroroadaannyi, diineedeaba siisi marachchi gil.

Diineeda miy manda ririnnyeanda aba madeeda Aseetta was Ghweandean nii gil: bareassiinda bananga gil ea masiinung'weega aba jeeda sawanaduutka nyaawa, nea gufri geaw aba ng'asheega munyas bea muunda ng'eanyiida.
Fuga eaduupcheewi, adiiduw ghoahhiimu shiitmeeda nea ghoong'ng'waanyi masaweega Ng'uttamiideanya was Yeesu Gristo, Ng'uttamiida gigheambiita.
Aba gideaba iiwuh siida mideawa ghuniida lagheanga meeng'meeng'i ea hang'weakka miyaas jeedeang'wa nea noabwachchi geat, eara siida bwarbwar biissa gaba hang'weakka beareadi,

amaduw goosissi mureeda siitta akkwa hang'weakka miyaasiin ak goyeeshshi, “Apteada ang'iing'i aba hiji,” ak giyeeshshi siitta bwarbwariin, “Miinaada ang'iing'i aba hoowa,” ghana, “Apteada aba hiji bea geeshangeasuun,”
abeeda miyoashiida buuneeda aba jeedeang'wa. Ak ghoahuuyi fuga ajiili girgweaguutka munyas fugheeri?

Oalleaydiit fuga eaduupcheewi abwariinyi. Heappi Aseetta ghayi mii ghwaloat fuga barbari bea muunda ng'eanyiida ak ghwanung' gabaruura masaweega nea gwahearan sugochcheandumeeda ghayi helleesa fuga bwariiyi?
Nea agooga ea nojakteaysi mureeda siida bwarbwar. Neada meanang'oodiga ea madiing'siineegwa ng'eanyi agooga, nea gongireegwa ea ghwadeagwa madeeda girgweageeda?
Nea marukunana ng'asheega munyas gheawungiga miyaas ghayi sugoneegwean?
Hean iyoosinnyi deaweedeedida bea sugoodigean gawuurji ginnyaashta ng'oruutka nea gwayi, “Bwariiyda giischewoochcheandaang'u gidubwariiydi geaw,” abeeda goosinnyi ng'asheanda miy.
Iiduw iyoashiichchi buuneeda goosinnyi ring'eeda, ak gaygorgweakseegwa deaweeda ak ghoahuuyi fuga adiiy.
Nea siida wassean iyang'ng'waay deaweedajeega sean amaduw gwaruusa ng'asheanjagi nidiiy appadahuukkeaba sean.
Aba gideaba siida ghayi ayi, “Adimealuuli,” ghabwada gwayi, “Adinuusi siida.” Earappeadi mii gamealuul ak ea ninuus siida, abeeda ea nihuuwi siida nuus deaweeda.
Asi arukuni ak goosinnyi nea gowuurjeewi fuga jea ergweaksiina deaweedeeda jea gweadu giibaldeaba geat.
Aba gideaba girgweaksiinda mayghabwayda siida mandeawana baydeayda; asi baydeayda iissa ghwajoar girgweageeda.
Fuga eaduupcheewi, gayghwaloat naaha, iyayi siida geandeawi masaweega ak ea mandeawana gadiyeeda? Masaweekka ikkaaschiin gayghoammu gwalealu?
Iideeppa adawiish oorjeeda giyeang'wa ghanea huda giyeang'wa gil ak ea mandeawana gichchea ghwaak bea galeagasean,
ak gwayeeshsha siyagi aba jeedeang'wa saawa, “Aweayeena nea gobeayi weayda ak gojooyi beasta ak golang'uuchchi,” nea moattawi haleanjeeda gasa saseeda, gayghwaloat naaha?
Asi gwasnu eara masaweega nea gaba geaw iimandeawana gadiyoojiga aanimi.
Ak gaygwayi siyagi, “Ang'iing'i gindeawi masaweega ak geandeawi aniini gadiyoojiga.” Ahiimnaan masaweegaagu mandeawana gadiyoojiga, ak gaydaahiimneey masaweegeasu aba gadiyoojigeasu.
Ang'iing'i gumwasi gideaba Aseetta aagi; gidoabiiwi. Eara meangeenda ghamwas nea ghabwaadani.
Ak gigasayi eahhiimneeyi ang'iing'eeda was siida marachchi gil, gideaba masaweega iimandeawana gadiyeeda ea maygwaji?
Ghweandeanya was Abrahaamu meattawa doobiiwnatta aba gadiyoojiga, aba damanda adaydaawa balleandaannyi was Isakka iina uhuuda heeda wagiida ehi?
Midaahi beadi masaweega ghayi sin adeayi sea gadiyoojigaaschi, ea gideaba masaweekka geemmajeek aba naweetta bea gadiyoojigean,
iiduw gwasa ng'oruutka nea gwayi, “Abrahaamu ghayi ghamwas Aseetta, ak geattaw niny doobiiwnatta,” ak geguura siittuupchi Aseetta.
Moadaahi beadi siida sughus eattaw doobiiwnatta aba gadiyoojiga nea meakghusa masaweega akghwahit.
Gwasnu eara Rahaabootta hiseadean eara niny meattawa doobiiwnatta aba gadiyoojiga damanda deabwa rabasta ak goruutta jarooda aba nawa nuudi?
Aba gideaba gawuurji saseeda iimanda gurorooda animi, gwasnu eara masaweega iimandeawana gadiyeeda animi.
Fuga eaduupcheewi, adoohuuyi ginealshoodiga saang'a aba gideaba ghoanalli beadi aseaseeni anealshiin jea eanyasa girgweaksiinda haw ea ghwanaawda.
Aba gideaba aseasa eesasean iissa gearamwaschi gasaang'a, ama deeppa ea mwaramwasta siida wassean aba ng'asheega rugu abeeda siisi adoabiiwaat, ak ghoammu ghwarat eara saseadaannyi sean.
Iissa isiyiinnyi ghealooniga ghuusiga faraasi ak abeeda gwasinneasa mureeda, abeeda geeppalli sasanuukka nyaawa sean.
Ang'ulla maleambajeega hees ea gwadeenachcha naaha iissa ghwaat jeammeeda ng'waan, iissa geasaja gidamwanang' muuchchi sumwanmwana ak gogeal siida mwanmwan heeda wassean gasa gawa.
Asi ng'ushapta gidamwanang' gil ak iissa ghaghwar geaw appadayda haleanjeeda hees. Dareabeetta earea haw iissa ghwaak beasta mwanang'!

Ak ng'ushapta ea beasta. Nea ng'ushapta ea gidamiidoabiiwaat gil aba jeeda fugaasa, iissa ghang'uda saseessean ririnnyeanda, iissa gong'eessa beasta haleanjeedeaba garayi, ak ghoang'eat jeeda beasta hang'weaniidooda.
Aba gideaba gilinyoo ea heluutka diyeanga gil ea dea dariidakka, ea dea diyeanga badiinna ng'eanyi ea dea haleanjeeda mida jeeda basooda, geammu eefur, ak ea nigeawiit buuneeda ghoahaaghwa.
Ak ghanyea manda siida ammu ghoahaaghwa ng'ushapta, was munyinda mwahawda, ak ghwannyiit furooda eattu miyeeda.
Aba nii geebadiischeesi Ng'uttamiida was Ghweandeanya, nea aba nii iissa geamoashti buuneeda, ghayi sisin ea eegala Aseetta.
Aba ghuuttida assagiin iissa gwarinna ghawooda ea mooshteada. Fuga eaduupcheewi, ng'asheesu mwahida gideaba gaygwasnu.
Gheang'deenda assakkaleallaan ghoammu gwarinna beega innya ea beega ng'weani?
Fuga eaduupcheewi, heappi shabogheechcheanda, ghoammu gwaji gulageechcheanda, ghana sabiibu ghoammu gwaji shabogheetta? Asi gwasnu eara gheang'deenda moammu goruudu beega mattawi ea gea innya.
Nii ng'eaha aba jeedeang'wa mideawa weaghumeeda ea fughareeda? Aba giibindaannyi miy dahiimna gadiyoojigaaschi aba garbabanda ea weaghumeeda.
Nea iyondeawi lajoodeaba ghuut ng'waan ea gassooda shidoodeaba ghaang' aba jeeda guroruunatkeagwa, adoaghwarji geat ak ghoahuuyi ng'uyyeega aba heeda huumeanda.
Abeeda weaghumeeni ea maleapna heettiyeada, nii gaba badayda ng'eanyiida, ak ea maba gurorooda, ak gaba meang'nyeandeenda.
Aba gideaba heeda mida lachng'eanyiida ea gassooda shidoodeaba ghaang', gaygwanda mittagheasta ea giliwas ng'ashaan muy nyoo eesna.

Duukku weaghumeeda leabu heettiyeada gidamadeeda aamiy, nuut gaba weayda, ak ea garbabu, nea iissa goleeysiit ng'asheega buuneeda, nea gwandeawa haghweega miyaas, ak ea mayamiisachchi ghana gwareengani buuneeda.
Nea haghweega doobiiwnatta geehisa jeeda weayda nea gwahisa fuga sina weayda.
Gweaduuni ng'uchcheeda, ak gweaduuni bearjeeda aba jeedeagwa? Mii ng'asheekka bea geawunda gheang'da ng'uchchi aba sasanuukkeagweani?
Iissa googasayi haleanjeeda ak ea mondeawani gil; gonuuschi buuneeda. Goolachchi ghuut haleanjeeda ak ea mwajanyasa; iissa gobearji nea goong'uchchi. Mondeawani, aba gideaba moomusi.
Eara amusa ghanyea mwajanyasa, aba gideaba gommunyiichchi musooda, ak abeeda goosni gitta ogasayiin.
Fuga mii doobiiweadi! Moanali gideaba idupcheewi geaw ng'eanyiida ea nihuuwi weajoochcheanda Aseetta? Asi siida wassean gasa goduupchi geaw ng'eanyiida abeeda ea nisin geaw weajoochcheanda Aseetta
Ghana oaghanyi gilirugu ng'oruutka mwadaagha nea gwayi, “Gurorooni abiitta jeedeanyean iissa gagasseasa nea ghwalajaneasa ghuudi?”
Amaduw gagoaneasa dagheerjeandumeeda naawda; nea gwayi, “Aseetta iissa ghaheawa fuga adiing'ng'u geat, ak iissa ghoadaw dagheerjeandumeeda fuga eada geat ng'eanyi.”
Asi asissiina Aseetta mureeda. Oattealla Meang'nyeandeenda, ak gaygamng'aw.
Aneekkissiina Aseetta ak gaygwaneekkiseegwa agooga. Oammiinni geattingeagwa, ea fuga ring'eega, oammiinni guroruunatkeagwa, ea fuga mabwagi.
Agiisana nea gonnyahuushshi nea goyyeawdi. Reargeagwa gagasa ghwayamwa ghoaw ginyahushshooda, nea ghoaw hooseaneegeagwa giseaneega.
Ayaada geat ng'eanyi aba madeeda Ng'uttamiida, ak gaygagatkadeegwa.

Fuga eaduupcheewi adoobeerayi geat. Siida beash oorjeeda geannyaawa ghana goorgweaksa oorjeeda geannyaawa, ghabeash deaweeda nea gorkgweaksa deaweeda. Nea irgweaksi deaweeda abeeda ea muwosi siida sina deaweeda abeeda ea nuhuuwi siida laja girgweaguutka.
Gwanda siyagi goona deaweeda nea goorgweakkiisa, ak ghoammu gwalealu ghana gwanuus. Ak guwosi ng'eaha inyas girgweaksi gischewoochcheandaang'u?
Asi apkaani ghamneawa, agoogeeda oyeenayi, “Askweareani ghana numuji gajeeweaya jeedeaba mujineeni ea mujineeni ak geeppiidi gweayda nea geekkeakshi ak goheadeeseasa haleanjeeda,”
amaduw ea moanali gichchea gapnu numuji. Eaweegeagwa naaha gil? Aba gideaba agooga gowoschi arooshta sidaah aba gheadi nuwaas amang'atta ghwaaroat.
Damanda ghwanyawa jea ayeenana, “Iibwariiy Ng'uttamiida, gajeewosa majeekcheewi ak geesinnyi gili ea gili.”
Ak gwasnu nukkwa ghoaghwarji geat aba ghwarjeedeang'wa. Nea ghwarjeeni sean sunuun eamuy.
Asi siida nal gidadoabiiw sinooda ak ea masna, aba heedaannyi niiw ring'eeda.
Asi ghamneawa meanang'oodiga, oyyeawda nea gokkuulli aba sawanadeeda jea gwahisseegwa.
Meanang'oochcheandumeedeang'wa nimealu, nea hang'weakkeagwa aniyaak ng'weerajeega.

Lagheangeagwa meeng'meeng'i ea lappiyeedeang'wa ning'ut girgweatka, nea girgweatka nyaawa gaygamuuwwu ng'asheega badahuukkeagwa ak gayghwaak sasanuukkeagwa gawuurji beasta. Gowweamsi haleanjeeda heeda ottiiwshachcheewi aba eawoojiga huydean.
Ang'ulla, gidageattinda fuga gadiyeeda lach madameegeagwa, ghayi oaweachchi aba milimilanda, oyyeawda; nea shookka fuga lach ea nihitta iidiga Ng'uttamiida bea lugooda.
Agooga noppiidi jeeda ng'eanyiida nea goomnyeennyi nea gohoosannyi; ak ea noanung' gwariisha guroruunatkeagwa aba eaweetta jea ghwahinna nuusta.
Agooga norgweaksi, ak gonuuschi siida doabiiwaat; nea niny ghanyea miighoadealeagwa.

Asi fuga eaduupcheewi, amilikghta ea ghwahitta damanda jea ghwahinna Ng'uttamiida. Ang'ulla, siida bwar ng'eanyi iissa gafurda haghweega ng'eanyiida bea sheayeeda haw, iissa ghamilikghta ea ghanyi ghwanyas roopta madeeda ea dea huydean.
Eara agooga amilikghta. Ommajeega guroruunatkeagwa, aba gideaba hinnooda Ng'uttamiida nineekkiit.
Fuga eaduupcheewi, adonnikkiisi geat, aba gideaba gajiiduw gergweakseegwa; ang'ulla siida laja girgweaguutka ghamiinaada aba gidaghuudajeega.
Aba gideaba gichchea agalana was sawanadeeda ea milikghteayda, fuga eaduupcheewi, oapkaada sibanga ghayi rugu ng'asheega aba gheawunga Ng'uttamiida.
Ang'ulla, geguuri fiisu fuga mideawa ng'wanaweega aba gideaba ghamilikghta. Ak ea noayiinyi iitta milikghteayda Ayuubu, ak ea noadaayi gidabaysiina Ng'uttamiida gwandeawa baydeayda nea garbabu.

Fuga eaduupcheewi, aba haleanjeessean, adiiduw giyaagi habeawooda, aba humng'eeda ghana aba ng'eanyiida, ghana aba habeawooda wassean, iyoyeennyi eah gagasa ghoaw eah, nea iyoyeennyi manda gagasa ghoaw manda, ak abeeda ea moppedeaysiini jeeda girgweaksiinda.
Siida ghaheang'wa nubussa sawanadeeda? Gagasa ghamwaasch Aseetta. Gwandeawa hooseaneega wasseani? Ea dasarmana duumda duumsheesiinda.
Aba jeedeang'wa gwanda siida miyaani? Daguursiina gweargwa ganiisa, ak abeeda ghamwaash Aseetta appadaydaannyi, ak ghoamwaara nagheeda aba gheawunga Ng'uttamiida;
nea mooshta Aseetta aba masaweega gaygwalealu siida miyaan, ak gaygagatkat Ng'uttamiida; amadeeppa ea nisin ring'eega, abeeda gajeesamsa.
Daba siisi duukkuuna ring'eemba nuut, nea gaba siisi mwaash Aseetta appadayba nuut, ak abeeda geahhaabeagwa. Siida doabiiwaat imwaash Aseetta gwandeawa uurda haw sin gadiyeeda.
Eliya niny siida gil mideawa searoojiga uurji sea gaasa, ak ghamwaash Aseetta muuchchi amwaroabwana roopta, ak ea maroabwana roopta gweannyeew samwagu ea shealah.
Gabiikta gichcha ak ghamwaash Aseetta ak ghwaroabwan, ak gwaji ng'eanyiida haghweagaaschi.
Fuga eaduupcheewi, siida wassean aba jeedeang'wa ineeyi ea gwasheagiida huumeanda ak godeelu sih nuut gabiigu,
abeeda ea danala gideaba siida adeelu siida ring'eeda ea gwarinna jeeda ramaseanda naweadaannyi gaygwalealna guroroadaannyi miyeeda ak gaygwadukuta seang'ayda ring'eega.
Betro, giijasoochcheanda Yeesu Gristo, fuga was mang'aweannyeekka ak ea Dardawaat aba ng'eanyiida Bonto, ea Galattiya, ea Gabadokiya, ea Asiya, ea Bittiniya,
ghayi siloat ak goojeakta Aseetta was Bwaabwa ak ghoammiidu Gurorooda aba mureeda appadayda Yeesu Gristo nea geappuunna foojeandaannyi:
Gagasa elakkuuneegwa dagheerjeandumeeda ea weayda.

Badiischeesiinda gaba Aseetta was Bwaabwa Ng'uttamiideanya Yeesu Gristo! Aba baydeaydaannyi haw sibiikta eejiileasa gichcha ak gagoaneasa eaweega eashish sirarji aba naweeda duunnooda Yeesu Gristo aba jeeda miyeeda,
ak geanyaschi hearanda may ghwadattasa, mandeawana ririnnyeanda, nea mayghwasis, sighamwat aba humng'eeda appadahuukkeagwa,
ak aba uurda Aseetta geefreegwa aba naweeda masaweega aba lealeanooda hidaat jea eattaajiit damanda huydean.
Aba nii gohoosannyi, earappeadi ghamneawa jea anyasa sawanaduutka saang'a gheadi nuwaas,

ak abeeda aba simsimda masaweegeagwa miyaas ng'al lagheanga meangmeang'i jea gwarooda, earappeadi iissa geesim aba beasta, ak abeeda geadaah gideaba gwandeawa dumsiinda ea gharbeeda ea mureeda aba gidaheachta Yeesu Gristo.
Earappeadi miyadaaha ninyiin ghoabwariinyi; ak earappeadi ghamneawa miyadaaha ninyiin noamwaschi niny ak gohoosannyi aba ng'weellooda ea gigheambiitta meammu eergu.
Gawuurji huuydeanda masaweegeagwa abeeda gajanyasa lealeanooda guroruunatkeagwa.
Sibanga ghayi ramoaran dagheerjeandumeeda jea ghoaw deang'wa gagaseadayyi nea goonyearriida iitteaba lealeanoani;
goonyearriida siida was ghana damanda ahiimu Gurorooda Gristo mida jeannyaawa damanda rukuna sawanadeeda Gristo ea gigheambiitta jea imuchchu ghwahidu.

Hean geettaheachsa saawa gideaba magadiyeesiina badahuukka nyaawa, appadahuukka haleanjeeda ghamneawa rukuneegwa fukghayi rukuneegwa giijasta miy aba naweeda Gurorooda Ghaydit siichcheagu leabu humng'eedean, ng'asheesu ghayi gagaseadayi malaykajeega ghwadaa.
Asi ommajeega fughareengeagwa, adeeneada ng'asheega, nung' gwaheedu gidirari appadayda dagheerjeandumeeda jea ghwahidu heedeang'wa aba damanda siittahaaja Yeesu Gristo.
Awuurjeewana diibiga mideawa mureeda, ak adagudoobiiksi jeeda ng'asheegeagwa munyas bea mwadi bea leendeedeang'wa,
asi deaghayi guurneegwa aaghaydit, earagooga awosa ghaydidi aba giibindeang'wa sean;
aba gideaba gway ng'ooruutka, “Gajawasa ghaydidi aba gideaba aniini geawooschi ghaydit.”
Agooga iyoomwashchi awuurjeewana Bwaabwa jea goorgweaksa giliwas sii nea manda shiitmeeda aba giduurji sinaweagaaschi, asi abeawana muuwda damandeang'wa oowosi mang'aweannyeekka.
Agooga ghoanalli gideaba leendeedeagwa meawalda aba haleanjeeda ghayi ohearannyi aba ghweanigeagwa, nea mii aba haleanjeeda jea ghwadattassa gil uurji lappiya ghana lagheanga meangmeang'i,
geesna foojeanda haw sheayeat bea Gristo, uurji sea dayeenda gisilleanda manda siirjeeda ghana badeeda.
Niny ghayi geebean ealoat nea miyeabwada sindeetta ng'eanyiida, ak geattaajiit aba huuydeandeaba askwearjoojusu appadahuukkeagwa.
Nea appadaydaannyi gondeawi rarooda aba heeda Aseetta, ghayi aduunna niny jeeda miyeeda, ak ghoadaw giigheambiitta, ak eara masaweegeagwa ea raroodeang'wa gwanda heeda Aseetta.
Nea ghoammiidu jeesingeagwa aba mureedeang'wa aba heeda huumeanda aba bariinyeega huumwa aba heeda oorjoogiyya, abariinnya geat huumwa aba jeeda gurorooda.
Agooga meejiileegwa niba iyyeenya, aba mbeeyooda jea goosha geejiilneegwa aba diitta maygooshean, aba ng'asheanda Aseetta mideawa eaweega biissa gwanda;
Aba gideaba
“Saseessean gawuurji nyeega,
Nea gharbeadaannyi sean gawuurji deakghweeda seenga.
Iissa seenga ghaghajaamiit ak ghoabit deakghweadaannyi,
ak ng'asheanda Ng'uttamiida gayghwashng'u ea ghoaw damanda manda muudeanooda.”
Ak ng'asheanji ea Giijasta Miy surukuneegwa gil.
Asi ageandeawana geat munyinda sean ea milmilanda sean ea nyootta doobiiwnatta ea shidoodeaba ghaang' ea beeshta sean.
Gawuurji diibiga manang'i siji ghamneawa, agassa eanooga miyaas bea gurorooda, ak abeeda goohissiini heeda lealeanooda;
ak ea noosamu gideaba Ng'uttamiida gwandeawa alooheeda.
Beenni headaannyi, ninyeeda was lagheaneeda mideawa eaweega, ghayi heawa buuneeda ak aba heeda Aseetta ea siloat ak gaba sheayeeda haw;

ak goowuurjeewi lagheanga mideawa eaweega, ak geadeaseagwa awosa gheeda gurorooda, ak ghoaw ashoohoochcheandumeeda ghaydit, jea ghoadayda haleanjeeda gurorooda sisappa geadi bea ghadoweeda was gea jea ghamwas Aseetta aba naweeda Yeesu Gristo.
Geang'waar aba jeeda ng'ooruutka gideaba:
“Ng'ulla, ghayiinyi uhuuda Sayuuni lagheaneeda, lagheaneeda washiini, siloat, haw sheayeat,
ak gilinyoo ghamwas niny ea mwajeapwaaspwaas.”
Asi agoogeeda mideawa masawaweega, gaba sheayeeda haw, nea aba heeda fuga mwamwasaan,
“Lagheaneeda fool fuga deekshi
aniiw lagheaneeda haw washiini.”
Nea
“Lagheaneeda jea gwaruusa buuneeda,
lagheaneeda jea ghwanung' goobeedeayi;”
ak goobeedeayi aba gideaba masissiina mureeda ng'asheanda, was gissunung' gaweay gwasin.

Nea agooga goowoschi emeeda siloat, ashoohoochcheandumeeda ambaliischi, emeeda ghaydidi, was fuga Aseetta, ak abeeda goorukkwiidi sinaweagaaschi deamdeameadi was dea guurneegwa arinnana jeeda misaneeda ak gooweayi jeeda weeshindaannyi haw.
Ammadeeda ghayi moowosi buuneeda ak ghamneawa eanoowoschi fuga Aseetta; ammwadi ghayi miyanyasa baydeayda ak ghamneawa eanoanyaschi baydeayda.
Fugabwariinyi, geamuscheegwa nea goowuurjeewi rabasta ea fuga mang'aw mulsa haleanjeeda gasa saseeda ng'uchchi sea guroruunatkeagwa.

Andeawana searoojiga miyaas aba jeeda Emoojiga, aba gideaba iisinapsa badahuukkeang'wa ng'uyyeega gideaba goosinnyi ng'asheega munyas, hean iing'ula sinaweegeagwa miyaas ghoaghaambiit Aseetta eaweeda jea ghwahinna.
Sissiina Ng'uttamiida gadiyeeda aba madeeda buuneeda earea heeda sugoochcheanda haw ambaliischi gil,
ghanea heeda sugoochcheanda haw sichcheagu ak ghwaaga ghoorjooda fuga sina ng'asheega munyasiini ak gwaduumsheesa fukka sina ng'asheega doabiiwiin.
Aba gideaba nii gidagassiida Aseetta gil, gideaba aba sunooda ng'asheega miyaas abeeda geanung' ghwasiinda leendeeda fuga dasheahi.
Oppiideatta fuga abal geat, ak ea mogadiyeattani gibaldeaba geat aba funyooda ng'asheega munyas, asi oppiideatta soomjooga Aseetta.
Asissiina mureeda buuneessean. Abwariinnya fugeagwa. Owwala gheang'da Aseetta. Ottawa sugoochcheanda haw mureeda.
Soomjooga, asissiina fugeagwa hees mureeda aba mureeda sean, ea gea miyaas eara heeda fuga jooriischi,
Aba gideaba iissa siida geesikteawa iyapkaat Aseetta, nea ghamilikghta sawanadeeda nea geesawan nea mwadoabiiwa.
Aba gideaba gajea alooheemba naaha iyoosinnyi gidamuy nea geabwar nea ghoajeang'di, abeeda noanyaschi alooheeda aba madeeda Aseetta?
Nea aba nii easuguurnaneegwa, aba gideaba eara Gristo gwasawana appadahuukkeang'wa, ak gagooneegwa gichchea agalana, gideaba gajayaada geeshtaannyi.
Niny mii gwasin ring'eeda; ak eara ng'asheanda milmilanda ea miiyeeyiing'sa ghuuytaannyi.
Niny ghayi iisiing'ng'eawi ea miighoodeelda ging'weakka; nea eara iisawana ea miigoomuuw sih; ghaghus ninyeeda laja girgweageeda nea ghoadoabiiw.
Niny ghwasar ring'eagaasa aba saseadaannyi aba uhuuda geetta, ak abeeda geemeewayi aba ring'eeda, ak geewoschi majeekcheewi aba doabiiwnatta, aba deanneaduutkaaschi ea siihabeasa.
Aba gideaba ghayi nooroottidi gisilga, ak ghamneawa ea noobiiksi Jeagiischoochcheanda was dea fur guroruunatkeagwa.
Asi eara agooga gadeemga, asissiina siyeendingeagwa mureeda, aba gideaba, iimiida gea masissiina mureeda ng'asheega, geeksu nea manda ng'asheanda geaghus searoojiga gadeemga nyaawa,
iing'ula mureedeang'wa ea searoojiga miyaas.
Suulgeagwa adagabeachchi suulgeapwadaw bea giireetta buudeega ea giishuupta haleanjeeda meang'meang'i ea giishuupta hang'weakka miyaas,
gammiisa gawos siida funyaat aba gurorooda bea suulga mayghwadattasa ak gabiissa ea ng'eeni nea siindeawoot guroaru, nea aba madeeda Aseetta ea haw sheayeat.
Nii gidasinniida gadeemga rar Aseetta gil ak gwasin suulga nyaawa nea gwasissa siyeendiga nyaawa mureeda,
ak gawuurji gidaghayi sissiinda Saara mureeda Abrahaamu, ak gaguura niny ng'uttamiida. Ak ghamneawa goowoschi diibigaaschi iyoosinnyi ng'asheega doabiiw nea moanung' ghoabealeagwa gil.

Ak gwasnu eara agooga siyeendiga, anala gichchea andeayeena sea gadeemgeagwa aba fughareeda, nea ghoottawji gatmooda mureeda, aba gideaba niny siida mandeawana uurda gil, aba gideaba saawa ea agooga gajahearana dagheerjeandumeeda eaweega, ak abeeda ameateala mooshteang'wa bea Asseetta.
Ng'asheanda huydean nii gil, awoosa gilagi, ak goobayiidi geat nea ghoabwariiydi geat oorjoospwa ghaamwadagi, nea goowoschi ng'eeni ak gooyeadayi geat ng'eanyi.
Adowalliideawi ng'asheanda muy dea muy ghana ging'weakka ea ging'weakka; ghang'wana gidawi ghawooda, aba gideaba geeguurneey appadaydeaba ng'asheanji, ak abeeda ginyasi ghawooda.
Aba gideaba
“Gili was sih bwariiy eaweega
ak gwadaa askwearjoojiga miyaas,
dadeala ng'ushaptaannyi adagwargu ng'asheanda muy
ak eara ghuuttaannyi adagwargu milmilanda;
ak ea danung'waada ng'asheega munyas ak gwasin gea doabiiw;
ak ea dagassa weayda, ak ghwaat geeshta muuchchi,
aba gideaba gheanyanga Ng'uttamiida gang'ula fuga doabiiweadi,
nea iidigaaschi ea jaadaat ghwayiiy mooshta Aseetta.
Ak gheamamda Ng'uttamiida gwanda badayda fuga sina ng'asheega munyas.”
Ak ghamneawa gaygwasawaneegwa ng'eaha iyoomilmiliidayi aba sinooda ng'asheega doobiiweadi?
Eara gwasa asawanana appadayda doabiiwnatta, gajeegooneegwa ghawooda. Adoawalli saawa, nea adaghang'udeegwa muuwda,

aba jeesinga guroruunatkeagwa asissiina Gristo mureeda gawuurji Ng'uttamiida. Nea galagasean gowoschi hideadi nea goofurji giliwas sih guurneegwa aba rarooda mida jeedeagwean, ak goosinnyi aba garbabanda ea mureeda;
nea ghoanung' gamiyeasiidi fughareengeagwa, ak abeeda isippwaspwaseagwa, abeeda fukka ang'eawwi alooheedeang'wa aba jeeda Gristoohiin abeeda geanung' ghabwaspwas,
aba gideaba ghang'wana sawanadeeda inyasi aba sinooda ng'asheega miyaas iigidagassiida Aseetta gil, mwasamwa sinooda ng'asheega munyas.

Aba gideaba Gristo eara niny ghami nibwagi appadayda ring'eeda, ninnyeeda doabiiwaat appadayda gea mii doobiiweadi, aba gideaba gweanneassa heeda Aseetta ak geenuus saseadaannyi nea guroroodaannyi geettuudu;
Ak iiduw gawa ak gwaruksa giijasta fukka mida ghealoonigean,
suu ammwadi masna mureeda, aba damanda milikghtaawa Aseetta ak gafurda aba damanda Nuuhu, damanda sisna bearakcheanda, nea abeeda fuga ng'ay assis gwaleala aba jeeda beega.
Gibattiisanda deaschi sea ng'asheesu ghamneawa gwalealneegwa, nea mii gideaba gageandeawa saseeda ririnnyeanda gil geemus Aseetta aba fughareeda miy, aba duunnooda Yeesu Gristo,
nea niny eanuwa humng'eeda ak gwanda meatkweeda geattinda dugwa bea Aseetta, sea malaykajeega, ea gheambalmeeda, ea uurda ak gagadiyeesa niny.
Asi aba gideaba Gristo ghwanyas sawanadeeda saseadaannyi, eara agooga oang'ng'waanya dabitta ng'uchcheeda bea gassoodida, aba gideaba ninnyeeda sisawan saseeda niny ninung'waada ring'eeda,
nea heessunung' abiideewa siida badayda ng'eanyiida aba ng'asheega gasa saseeda nea mii gidagassiida Aseetta gil.

Anung'waada damanda heeda ning'atta ghwahit aba sinooda ng'asheega gaseadayyi fuga Emoojiga, giibinda sihiseada, geawunda gheangda, booktuumeeda, sinooda ghweelmeeda, ghweelmeeda difaayeeda, ea baditta gidamawosa Aseetta,
ak ghahamng'eanyi saawa iidaa gideaba moguyeesiini jeedeaba ng'asheesu bea roodaweegean, amang'atta ghoabwaaspwaseagwa;
ak gayghoadayda iitta gidaniibideatta aba madeeda siitta jea goorgweaksa giikka duugwandachchiin ea giikka nimeewean.
Nii gissurukkwiideaysa giijasta miy gil earaba heeda fuga nimeewa, eappeadi sirgweaksa aba saseedean gawuurji buuneeda, abeeda gaygoobiideewa gurorooda gawuurji Aseetta.
Ak muudeanooda haleanjeessean ea nineekiit, asi amilmiliitta ak ghoang'wearu aba baditta Aseetta.
Appadaydeaba suu seaniin asna badiida muuchchi ak ghoabwariinyi geat, aba gideaba bariinyeega gwadukta ring'eega saang'a.
Adeepiida geat nea ghoanung'waadi sichcheeda aba jeedeang'wa.
Aba gideaba niba siisi nyasta gissiittaw mwadaagha daba siisi gadiyeatta sea nuut, nea goowuurjeewi fuga miyaas sitteaga gadiyeeda healli bea dagheerjeandumeeda Aseetta:

siida wassean balool, gawuurji dea rukku ng'asheega Aseetta; nea dea wassean sin gadiyeeda, dawuurji dea sin gadiyeeda aba uurda adaw Aseetta; ak abeeda aba haleanjeessean geakghaambiit Aseetta aba naweeda Yeesu Gristo. Gigheambiitta gammiisa niny ea gheambalmeeda ea ghoaw damanda manda muudeanooda. Amin.
Fuga abwariinnyi, adaghahameagwa ng'eanyi aba habeawooda ea sawanadeeda jea ghwahidu badahuukkeagwa ak goomajeegeegwean, ak gawuurji gili busseegwa ng'asheandeesh.
Asi ahoosana aba gideaba nooppareanyi sawanaduutka Gristo, ak abeeda earagooga gohoosannyi nea goong'weelayi damanda jea eattahaaja gigheambiittaannyi.
Iisiyeattaneagwa ghuut aba gheawunga Gristo ea ng'wanaweegeagwa gil aba gideaba gurorooda gigheambiitta bea Aseetta gwanda badaydeang'wa.
Nea aba jeedeang'wa ea adagwasawaneatta siida dea nuusa buuneeda, ghana mareanghweanda, ghana dea sina ng'asheega munyas, ghana dea ng'waanjih;
ama deeppa gwasawana sih aba gideaba siida Gristo gil, asi adaghabwaspwas, nea aba jeedeaba gheawungiga bea Gristohiin ea daghambiida Aseetta.
Asi nihitta damanda jea eang'eada girgweaksiinda fuga gheeda Aseetta, ak iisiing'eada heedeanya, abeeda huydeanda nyaawa gaygawuurjiin deaba fukka mwamwasa giijasta miy bea Aseettean?
Nea
“Siida doabiiwaat iiramwagaan aba nyasooda lealeanooda,
abeeda fuga meawalla gheang'da Aseetta ea fuga ring'eega gajeedeaksa yeenu?”
Asi fukka sawana aba gidagassiida Aseettean ghoadoabiiw aba giidaydeayda jeesinga nyaawa heeda Deabwat haleanjeessean biissea doabiiwaat.
Geamuschi gweargwa mida ng'eang'deang'wa, eara aniini geawoschi gweargweeda geawujeeweegwa, ak geawoschi muuwshoochcheanda sawanadeeda Gristo, ak geendeayeesi giigheambiitta jea iiduw eattaajiit.

Oahaaghwana mughusheanda fuga Aseetta ghayi siiteaganeegwa, nea goomiineadaysi, nea meediingseegwa, asna aba gidoogassiidi nea adoosinnyi aba gideaba googasayi lappiyeeda baspaseega, asi asna nea goommajeekchi,
nea adoowuurjeewi fuga ambaliischi aba heedeaba fukka mida hiing'eadaydeang'wean gidabal ghoahuunyi gichchea eegala aba mughusheandida.
Iiduw nea geattajiit Jeagiischoochcheanda haw, gajanyasa shiipka giikka mayghaghajaamiit bea gigheambiittean.

Gwasnu earagooga gheareemanga asissiina gweargwa mureeda. Okkweala geat, oagassean, nea gaba siisi sissa nuut mureeda, aba gideaba, “Aseetta iissa ghaheawa fuga ghwarjeeda, ak ghoadaw dagheerjeandumeeda fuga eada geat ng'eanyi.”
Asi ayiina geat hiing'eadayda geattinda Aseetta hoauur, ak iihitta damanda abeeda goodiing'neegwa.
Ak ghoattawji niny sawanaduutkeagwa sean, aba gideaba niny gwadeawiissa muuchchi ng'asheegeagwa.
Andeawana gheadeenda nea ghoang'ng'wearu. Aba gideaba weajoochcheandeang'wa was meang'nyeandeenda gawuurji ng'adiida ak gwanyeara daghatta, nea gwaneay gagasa siida jea ghwanukghuta.
Ak ghoaheawi niny, awasa majeek aba masaweega, nea ghoonalli gideaba sawanadeeda ghwanyas fukghaheanya mida muunda ng'eanyiida.

Iiduw nea ghang'atta sawanadeedida gilimwanang', hean Aseetta mideawa dagheerjeandumeeda sean, ghayi guurneegwa apkaani jeeda gigheambiiittaannyi manda muudeanooda aba jeeda Gristo, gaygoodeelu niny, ak goomajeegideegwa.
Headaannyi gagasa gwanda gheambalmeeda damanda manda muudeanooda. Amin.

Geang'oorneegwa barawajeanji nea ghaweadan Silwaano, niny ghaadaayi oorjeediyya doabiiwaat gil, ak geang'ayiichchi ng'asheesu bea reekusiindean nea geargu gideaba nii dagheerjeandumeeda huumwa gil bea Aseetta; amiinaada appadaydeaba nii nea gowoschi majeekcheewi.
Ganiiseeda mida Babelooni, ghayi siloat eara ninyiin, ghoaghadeagwa; ak gwasnu eara balleandeanyu was Marko.
Ookkatta geat nea goosamayi geat aba bariinyeega.
Gagasa anyasa weayda oagassean mida jeeda Gristoohiin.
Simon Betro gil, soomjeanda ea giijasoochcheanda Yeesu Gristo, heeda fukka ninyas masaweega uurjeewaneasean, aba doobiiwnata Aseetteanya, ea lealnoochcheanda was Yeesu Gristo.
Gagasa anyasa dagheerjeandumeeda nea gehheaseegwa weayda jea anala Aseetta ea Yeesu Ng'uttamiideanya.
Aba gidawaseetta Aseetta ea uurdaannyi gagooneasa easassean haleanjeeda miisa eaweega ea gea maduuppa aseetta, aba naweetta bea fughareadaannyiin ghayi guurneasa jeeda gheambalmeadaannyi miy,

nea niny ea nigooneasa heelleedaannyi haw biissa gaba sheayeeda haw ak abeeda aba nii ghoammuuschi amng'awana munyinda mida jeeda ng'eanyiida aba gitta gasa saseedean, ak ghoahuuyi fuga sin ng'asheega Aseetta.
Aba sareani asna badiida ak ghoahhaadi masaweegeagwa aloheeda, ak ghoabwadi aloheeda fughareeda,
ea fughareeda ak ghoayiinnyi ging'ng'ooydeaba geat, ging'ng'ooydeaba geat, abwadana doobiiwnatta, ghoabwadi doobiiwnatta aloheeda,
nea aloheeda ghoabwadi bariinyeega oorjooga giyeang'wa, ghoabwadi bariinyeega oorjooga giyeang'wa bariinyeega.
Aba gideaba ng'asheesu iyoondeawi sean, gayghwanung' ea moobeahi ghaleehu, nea moawa fuga mandeawana haghweega, aba nalooda Ng'uttamiideanya was Yeesu Gristo.
Aba gideaba siida mandeawana ng'asheesu ang'oaw, aba gideaba mayghwadaah haleanjeeda mida hoosheagiin, ak ea niroosa gidaghayi simiteayda ring'eegaaschi bea garayi.
Asi fuga eaduupcheewi, ahoosana nea goomilmiliidayi aba guurnoodeang'wa ea gisiloattaneagwa, aba gideaba iyoosinnyi ng'asheesu ea majoappeeda;
ak gajanyasa muuchchi beatta jeeda sugoochcheandumeeda manda muudeanooda bea Ng'uttamiideanya ea lealnoochcheandeanya was Yeesu Gristo.
Nea iissa geagasayi galeagasean deapkeanneegwa ng'asheesu, earappeadi oanalli ak geemajeek jeeda huumeanda ondeawiin.
Iyeang'ulayi ghwadeabiiw, aba hiji duudandean, daheadeagwa agooga iyeapkeanneegwa,
hean ghaanalli gideaba nineekkiit damanda jea dameawa, aba gidahiimdeayda Ng'uttamiideanya was Yeesu Gristo.
Ak gaydasikteawa gideaba iihidu beatteanyu abeeda gajoammuusa gipkeatteaba ng'asheesu damanda wassean.
Aba gideaba meayaadi geeshta ghwasiildeanga sisna milmilinda damanda sinung' anala uurda ea hinnooda Ng'uttamiideanya was Yeesu Gristo, geewoschi muushoodiga daa aba gheanyanga uurdaannyi.
Nea aba damanda nyasa mureeda ea gigheambiitta aba heeda Aseetta was Bwaabwa ak ghwanya ghuutta leabu heeda dea mideawa uurda gigheambiitta, “Nii Balleandeanyu abwariinnyi, ahoosanana muuchchi,”
Geayiinyi ghuutta leabu humng'eeda, aba gideaba geendeawi niny aba uhuuda giijeeda ghaydit.

Ak geendeawi muuchchi ng'asheanda siramoaran ak ghoaw huumwa. Ak gisni muuchchi nea gisikteawi ng'asheesu nea gawuurji gheaboonyaneeda yeat aba heeda misana, ea ghaghar gayeew ea gorearu ming'weanda muchchuunooda aba jeesinga guroruunatkeagwa.
Gidamadeeda anyooghanyi anala ng'asheanji, gideaba manda ramooraneeda aba jeeda ng'ooruutka gidaroopteayda siida aba uhuudaannyi,
aba gideaba manda ramooraneeda oang'ng'wa gwaleabu uurda siida, buuneeda ghwaat Gurorooda Ghaydit ak gwargu ng'asheega leabu heeda Aseetta.

Ng'atta gwarina jeeda buuneeda sibanga ng'uyyeega earappeadi jea gwanda giinealshoodiga ng'uyyeega aba jeedeang'wa, fuga jea gweadu ginealshooda nyariida aba makcheameeda, ak ghwashaang' Siida haw ghayi shaang' saawa, ak gweassa geat nyariida.
Nea fuga saang'a gayghwaat geeshta hiseadayeandumeeda nyaawa, nea appadahuukka nyaawa gayghwadaajiit naweeda huumeanda.

Nea aba shidooda nyaawa bea ghaang' gaygoheadeesa haleanjeeda appadahuukkeagwa aba ng'asheega ng'uyyeega; ghang'eada garayi girgweageeda nyaawa ghanyea maygafuuf, nea nyariida nyaawa ghanyea maygwalil.
Aseetta ghayi iimwanung'waada malaykajeega adiiy, hean gwahisa jeeda maloonghajeega ak ghwayiin jeesinga shoomeanga misana earassa ea ghwahitta eaweeda girgweaksiinda;
niny ghayi iimwanung'waada ng'eanyiida ghayi bea garayi ak ghoaghu Nuuhu, was siida doabiiwaatt, sea fii iispwa, damanda eanna roopta gittunuwaas badayda ng'eanyiida fuga mabatta Aseetta;
nea iiyam mujiinajeega Sodooma ea Gomoora, ak ghwanung' ghoaw deareeda ak ghwaaga ghorjooda saawa ak gwanuseada nea ghwanung' ghoaw gichchea eegala aba heeda fuga mabatta Aseettean;
iing'atta nea gwalealu Luttuyda doabiiwaat, gagiisan muuchchi aba hiseadayeandumeeda fuga munyas.
Hean ghwadaa naaha siitta doabiiwaadiin ak ghwayiiy naaha damanda mideewa jeannyaawa, iissa geannyareas aba jeadaannyi doabiiwaat galeaga sean aba sinaweega nyaawa maweeda.
Asi Ng'uttamiida ghwanal gichchea gwalealdeayda fuga awali gheangda Aseetta aba jeeda simsimda, nea ghwayiin fuga mii doabiiweadi ghoammuughu ghealooda ea ghwahitta eaweeda girgweaksiinda,
nea ghwaraanya giikka aat geeshta ng'asheega gasa saseeda aba gassooda ng'asheega munyasiin nea gafool gheambalmeedean. Daruuschi mideawa uurjeenga meawalla ging'weakka haleanjeeda gheambiideadi,
nea eara malaykajeega earappeadi hees ak ea majeekcheewiin, ghanyea mii goong'eawi girgweageeda appadahuukka nyaawa aba madeeda Ng'uttamiida.
Nea suu, gawuurji diyeanga manda fughareenga, diyeanga nal haleanjeessean, ghayi sijiilsa gideaba gajeang ng'waay ak genuus, ang'eawi haleanjeeda mwanala, ak gajealas uhuuda aba nyariida sea saawa,

ak gwasawana aba gidiinyeanda aba gidinyeanda nyaawa. Ak ghwanung' ghoaw miyeenooda leeshooda askwearda. Asi gwandeawa washta ea agitta badayda, gwaleeshi nea gwareengani geat, aba jeeda ghweelmeeda nyaawa bea leeshooda sea agooga.
gheanyanga nyaawa ghwannyiit hiseadayeandumeeda, ak ea malang'uutta aba ring'eeda. Iissa gwareengani jeesinga ng'arng'ari. Ak gwandeawa gurooruunatka sinnaal shidoodeaba ghaang'. Diibiga sumwaashta!
Gwanung'usa heeda naweeda doabiiwaat, ak gwarooda; ak ghwaat naweeda Balaamu was balleanda Beori, ghayi bwariiy nyasooda gidageattinda muy aba naweeda mwadoabiiwa,
ak niny geewoowsa aba giidiinyeandaannyi; digeeda manda ghuutta baloolda siida ak ghoadeal geeska sibaneeda.
Fiisu gawuurji gheanyanga eenda manda beega, ak gawuurji gichcha dung'usta ghuutta jeameeda, ak giibinda nyaawa ea siyiin heeda misana muuchchi.
Aba gideaba iissa gwargu ng'asheega hees bea ghwarjeeda, aba haleanjeeda gasa saseeda aba munyinda iissa gwareengani buuneeda mang'awa heeda fuga abiida jeeda ramaseanda.

inyeesa gwaheelleesa sea buuneeda gideaba gay ghwanyas giibaldeaba geat, nea ghana saawa ea ging'ng'oonyanga sina ng'asheega munyas gil; aba gideaba gidajoar siida, abeeda gayghoaw ging'ng'oonyaneedeaba gidida.

Aba gideaba, fukka iniibuut ririnnyeanda muunda ng'eanyiida, aba gideaba ninal N'guttamiideanya ea lealnoochcheanda was Yeesu Gristo, iighas gichcha ng'asheega ak geajoar, abeeda huydeanda eaweega nyaawa gaygamunyiit ea ghwanaawa diitta bea madeedean.
Aba gideaba ghang'wana gwachi ea mwanala naweetta doabiiwaatiin mwasamwa gideaba ghwanal ak iiduw ghwanung'wa heeda diigheandida ghaydit siitawiin sawaan.

Ak saawa gawuurji sea ng'asheanda surukuta aba ghwasiildeanga ghayi bea huumwa, bea gideaba, “Gudeeda nibiiksa geeseegaaschi, ak nuut gichcha geeyeeshsha, ukkurmeeda sihhuun nibiikta goobeerbeershi aba jeeda sheang'ng'weeda.”
Nii ghamneawa barawajeandeaba iyyeenya gil eang'oorneegwean oorjooga abwariinyi, nea aba jeedeaba suu duwaawiin ea neapkeanneegwa ak gagatkat fughareengeagwa miyaas;
ak ghoopkaachi ng'asheega ghayi rugu sibanga ghaydidi ea diigheandida bea Ng'uttamiida ea lealnoochcheanda aba naweeda giijasoodigeagwa.
Gidamadeeda geagasayi anala ng'asheanji bea gideaba damanda huydean gay ghapka fuga bwariiy shikkooda nea gay gwashikeagwa, nea ghwaat geeshta gidagasa sasanuukka nyaawa

nea gwayi, “Gwandeanu gissiheelleatta ghayi bea hinnoadaanyi? Aba gideaba ghang'eada damandida iimeewa gheambaghwaanigaasa, goobiideatta haleanjeessean gideawoojusu ghang'eada deaghayi subwada ng'eanyiida.”
Nea iissa gafool mwadaagha ng'asheanji bea huumwaan bea gideaba aba ng'asheanda Aseetta, ghayi geesin humng'eeda, ak gwardu ng'eanyiida aba jeeda beega aba naweeda beega,
nea abada ng'eanyiida ghayi mida geanung' ghwaak beega ak goosha.
Nea aba ng'asheandida ea sunung' ghoamuughu humng'eeda ghamneawa mida ea ng'eanyiida beasta, geattiiw ea ghwahitta eaweeda girgweaksiinda ea dea nyariida fuga munyas.

Asi adofoolli ng'asheanji assagi bea huumwaan, oorjoogeasu abwariinyi, bea gideaba aba heeda Ng'uttamiida eaweechchanjagi gawuurji sea gweannyeew sagalama, nea gweannyeew sagalama gawuurji eaweechchanjagi.

Asi Ng'uttamiida mii lambeech aba heelleesiindaannyi gawuurji girarda mwaatkwa gideaba alambeech, niny iissa ghamilightaneagwa, nea magassa gideaba gayghwaroat sih, niny gagasa gideaba gayghwanyas sean dukkunooda.

Nea eaweeda Ng'uttamiida gay ghwahitaayda mareanghweanda, aba eaweettida gay ghwaroat humng'eeda aba nyeashta haw, nea haleanjeeda sean ghayi bea mwadi gayghwanyar aba jeeda beasta, nea ng'eanyiida ea gadiyoojigaaschi mideawa gajeaghwarda goosha.
Hean iinukwa gajeattaarda haleanjeessean, gammiisa gideaba gajawosa fuga uurjiin aba jeeda eaweega ea ghaydidanda ea munyinda,
ng'atta ghoammuughu nea ghoanung' ghwalamwajaan hinnooda askwearjeanda Aseetta, aba gideaba humng'eeda gajeayyeat ak geenyarja, ak haleanjeeda gayghwanyar aba beasta!
Nea aba heelleedaannyi geammuughu humng'eedeesh ea ng'eanyiideesh mida jeeda doabiiwnatta.
Asi, oorjooga abwariinyi, iinukkwa ghoammuughu ng'asheesu, ommajeega ghwahidu niny nea manda badahuukkeagwa gidamuy ghana eerukuna badahuukkeagwa gidamuy, geaghus weayda.
Ak agooga ghwaanali gideaba gidamilighteayda Ng'uttamiideanya gay gwasmaneegwa lealeanooda, ak eara oorjeeda giyeanya subwariiy was Baulo gang'oorneegwa aba weaghuumeetta siitaw ninyiin,

hean nea gabaloola ng'asheesu gawuurji gissinda aba jeeda barawajeagaaschi sean. Gwanda haleanjeeda hang'oonyi aba jeannyaawa jea eanal, nea dea dasha ea dea moopta ng'eanyi iissa ghwayam ghoaw nyariida, gawuurji gidanyaashta ng'ooruutka suuk.
Asi fugeasu aabwariinyi, iyoobean anala ng'asheesu ammwadi, asi afrageat, adaghwaadaneegwa ghaat giidiinyeannyeekkeaba fiisu, ak ghoanung'wi heeda giibindeang'wa majeek.
Ahissiina heeda aba dagheerjeanduumeeda, ea nalooda Ng'uttamiideanya ea lealnoochcheanda was Yeesu Gristo. Headaannyi gwanda gharbeeda ghamneawa ea ghoaw eaweega manda muudeanooda. Amin.
Gitta ghayi ng'eat ammwadi ghayi siyiinyi, akkeadaayi aba gheanyangaasa, ak geedaayi nea geang'ng'waanyi aba geattingaasaan, was ng'asheanda eaweegean,
nea eaweega geanung' ghwadaajiit, akkeadaayi, ak geemuuwwu, ak geerukuneegwa eaweega manda mudeanooda mida heeda Bwaabwa ak geanung' ghwadaajiit aba heedeanya,
gitta ghayi sidaayi ak geayiinyiin geerukuneegwa earagooga ak abeeda geebareannyi sea aseasa; nea bareannyeedeanya gwanda heeda Bwaabwa ea heeda Balleandaannyi was Yeesu Gristo.
Ak geeng'oorneegwa ng'asheesu ak abeeda ghwahit hooseaneegaasa.
Nii ng'asheanda ghayi siyiing'si headaannyi gil ak geerukuneegwa, gideaba Aseetta weeshinda gil ak jeadaannyi ea manda misaneeda earahay.
Isiyeennyi geebareannyeewi niny nea geneayeewi jeeda misaneeda, geanapchi ng'uyyeega nea meeppiidani naweeda humeanda;
nea isineayeewi jeeda weeshinda, gawuurji gidamideatta niny jeeda weeshinda abeeda easibareannyi aseasa, ak foojeanda Yeesuuyda was Balleandaannyi gaygoohuun ring'eegaasa sean.
Isiyeeshshi geat meendeawani ring'eeda, gereenganayi geat, nea ea manda humeanda jeedeanya.
Nea isidukkuni ring'eagaasa, niny awaam nea doabiiwaat, ak gaygwasamsa ring'eagaasa, ak gohuuneasa aba haleanjeessean mwadoabiiwa.
Isiyeshshi geat miyesna ring'eeda, geanung' gaba niny ng'uyya, nea ng'asheandaannyi ea manda jeedeanya.
Diibigeasu manang'i, geang'ooneegwa ng'asheesu ak abeeda ea moosni riing'eeda; ama mida siida nisin riing'eeda, abeeda gendeawi siida ghuutteanya aba heeda Bwaabwa nea Yeesu Gristoyda doabiiwaat gil;
nea niny ea siida jea ghoadayda leadeeda riing'eagaasa, ak ea meakghusa gaasa akghwahit eara riing'eega muunda ng'eanyiissean.
Appdaydeaba nii abeeda geanalli gideaba geanalli niny, ising'ng'waanyi digheannyeekkaaschi.
Nea dea eena, “Ghaanalli ning” nea gafool digheannyeekkaaschi gabang'uyya, ak eara humeanda eamanda jeadaannyi;
nea siida ang'ng'waay ng'asheandaannyi, aba jeedeaba niny bariinyeega huumwa bea Aseetta nideay. Aba jeedeaba nii geanalli gideaba geendi jeadaannyi:
siida eena gwanda jeedeaba niny gammiisa gideaba gayghabeada gidabeada niny.
Fuga abwariinnyi, meang'oorneegwa digheandeesh, nii digheanda ghayi bea garayi ghayi oayiinyi ammwadiin gil; digheandeaba waas ng'asheanda ghayi oayiinyi.
Ak geang'oorneey digheandeesh bea huumwa aba jeadaannyi ea jeedeang'wa, aba gideaba misaneeda ning'atta ak ea niiboong'u weeshinda huumwa.
Siida eena geandi jeeda weeshinda, nea ghwasit oorjeeda ghaamwat gwanda jeeda misaneeda eara ghamneawa.
Nea siida bwariiy oorjeeda ghaamwat, siisi gwanda jeeda weeshinda, nea aba jeadaannyi eamanda ng'asheanda jeagweadu russooda.
Nea siida sit oorjeeda ghaamwat gwanda jeeda misaneeda ak gwaneayeewa jeeda misaneeda ak ea mwanala heeda gal, aba gideaba nidukuta gheanyangaaschi misaneeda.
Geang'oorneegwa agooga, diibiga manang'i, aba gideaba sisamsa riing'eegeagwa, appadaydaannyi.

Geang'oorneegwa agoogaa, ghweaniga, aba gideaba nonalli ninnyeeda ghayi bean ghang'eada ging'eetta. Geang'oorneegwa agooga, gheareemanga, aba gideaba noajoarji diitta muyiin. Geang'oorneegwa agooga, diibiga aba gideaba nonalli Ghweanda.

Neang'oorneegwa agooga ghweaniga, aba gideaba nonalli ninnyeeda ghayi bean ghang'eada ging'eetta. Neang'oorneegwa agooga gheareemanga, aba gideaba gondeawi uurda, nea goobiida ng'asheanda Aseetta jeedeang'wa, ak ea noattaraamnyi diitta muyiin.
Adoabwariinyi ng'eanyiida ea haleanjeeda mida muunda ng'eanyiida. Aba gideaba siida bwariiy ng'eanyiida, bariinyeekka bea Ghweandeen ea maygwanda jeadaannyi.
Aba gideaba haleanjeessean mida muunda ng'eanyiida, was haleanjeeda gasa saseeda ea haleanjeeda gasa gheanyanga ea ghwarjeeda eaweega, suu maleapna heeda Ghweanda, gwaleabu heeda ng'eanyiida.
Ak ng'eanyiida gayghang'atta sea ng'asheagaaschi bea geawunda gheang'da; nea deasina gidagassiida Aseetta gaygoobiida ea ghoaw damanda manda mudeanooda.

Diibiga, nii damanda huydeani; gawuurji gidaghayi oayiing'di bea gideaba gayghwahidu weajoochcheanda Gristo, ak eara ghamneawa ea goolla ghapka gea saang'a was weajoodiga Gristo; hean ghoaw gidasinali gideaba damanda huydeani.

Nea saawa ghabeawa heedeanya, ak ea maba meatkweedeanya; aba gideaba inyeeda gaba meatkweedeanya, gwachchi gaygoobiida heedeanya; hean ghang'eatng'eat gwaritta jarooda, ak ghwadaajiit gideaba maba sean meatkweedeanya.
Ak agooga ea nimwareagwa dea ghaydit, ak ghoanalli oagasean.
Geang'oorneegwa nea meakna gideaba moanali humeanda gil, gweagu gideaba ghoanalli, ak ginali gideaba manda ng'uyyeega jea gwaleabu jeeda huumeanda.
Gaba ng'eaha ng'uyya geaghus dea shaang' gideaba Yeesu mii Gristo gil. Nii weajoochcheanda Gristohi, dea shaang' Bwaabwa ea Balleanda.
Manda siida jea ghwashaang' Balleanda akkwandeawa Ghweanda. Dea mwas Balleanda gwandeawa eara Ghweanda.
Anung'waada ng'asheega ghayi oayiinyi ammwadi goobiida jeesingeagwa. Asi iyabiida jeesingeagwa ng'asheega ghayi oayiinyi ammwadi, abeeda gajooppiidana jeeda Balleanda ea jeeda Ghweanda.
Nea nii ea heelleeda ghayi rukuneasa gil, nea ea eaweega manda mudeanooda.
Geang'oorneegwa ng'asheesu appadayda fukka gasa gwareenganneegwea;

nea gimearda ghayi oanyaschi aba headaannyiin gwanda jeesingeagwa, ak ghanyea moogassi ghoanaleagwa sih; aba gideaba gimeardida ghoanaaleagwa haleanjeessean, ak ea huumwa, ak ea manda ng'uyyeega, gawuurji gidaghayi anaaldaneegwa, oppiidana jeadaannyi.
Asi ghamneawa diibiga manang'i, oppiidana jeadaannyi, aba gideaba ihidu abeeda geaghuschi ak ea meebiiktani bwadaw aba baspaseega aba hinnoadaannyi.
Iyoanalli gideaba niny ea doabiiwaat, abeeda ghoanalli gideaba siida sina ng'asheega doobiiweadi gwajiilu niny.
Ang'ulla nii bariinyeega uurjiin gil gooneasa Ghweanda, bea gideaba egureewaneasa diibiga Aseetta, ak ea gidasuwuurjeewi gil. Ak abeeda ghoaw gidamwanalaneasa ng'eanyiida ak ea mwanala niny.
Oorjooga abwariinnyi, asi ghamneawa suwoschi diibiga Aseetta; ak ea miighwadaajiit gichchea ewuurjeewana, ak geanalli gideaba ihidu gajeewuurjeewana niny, aba gideaba gajeadaaha giduurji.
Nea giliwas sih rar niny iissa ghoammiidu geaw gawuurji gidamiyda niny.
Siida wassean sina riing'eeda gwandeawa ramaseanda aba deaweeda; aba gideaba riing'eeda ramaseanda deaweeda gil.
Nea ghoanalli gideaba niny ghwaan gageanda riing'eega, nea niny jeadaannyi ea manda riing'eeda.
Manda siida mida jeadaannyi ak gwasin riing'eeda; ak ea manda siida sina riing'eeda jea ea nidaa niny ghana ghwanal niny.
Diibiga manang'i, adagwareenganneegwa sih; siida sina ng'asheega doobiiweadi gwandeawa doobiiwnatta, gawuurji gidamideayeatta doobiiwnatta.

Siida sina riing'eeda gaba meang'nyeandeenda; aba gideaba meang'nyeandeenda ghayi gollagabean gwasna riing'eeda. Gissibaysiina wunooda Balleanda Aseetta geattaajiit ghwadattas gadiyeeda meang'nyeandeenda.
Manda siida jiilu Aseetta ak gwasna riing'eeda; aba gideaba seareeda Aseetta gwanda jeadaannyi, ak ea maygwasin riing'eeda aba gideaba gwajiilu Aseetta.

Aba nii abeeda gajeadaah gideaba diibiga Aseetta akkeega gil, ak ea akkeega gil diibiga meang'nyeandeenda, aba gideaba dea masinna ng'asheega doobiiweadi maba Aseetta, ghana dea mwabwariinya oorjeeda ghaamwat.
Aba gideaba nii giijasta ghayi oobean ayiinya ammwadi gil, gideaba abwariinnya geat,
ak ea adoowuurjeewi Gain ghayi was siida muy ak gwanuus oorjeeda ghaamwat. Ak ghwasaan inyas gwanuus? Gweagu sinaweagaaschi munyas nea oorjeeda ghaamwat ea doabiiwaat.
Oorjoogiyya, adaghahameagwa ng'eanyi, aba gideaba ghwasteagwa ng'eanyiida.
Aseasa geanalli gideaba sisuuchchi miyeeda ak geeweayi jeeda eaweega, aba gideaba geabwariinyi fuga suduupcheewi. Nea damwabwariinya goobiida jeeda miyeeda.
Giliwas sih nyooghwasit oorjeeda ghaamwat abeeda gwanuusa buuneeda, ak agooga gonalli gideaba siida nuusa buuneeda mandeawana eaweega manda mudeanooda aba jeadaannyi.
Aba nii sinalli bariinyeega, aba gideaba niny gabeagu eaweagaaschi appadahuukkaasa; asi gammiiseasa earaseasa eebeakna eaweagaasa appadahuukka oorjoogiyya.
Nea siida iimideawa haleanjeeda ng'eanyiida ak ghwadaa oorjeeda ghaamwat nea gwanda gidagasa, ak ghaweada gida aba jeadaannyi, abeeda bariinyeega Aseetta gwandeattaan jeadaannyi?
Diibiga manang'i, adeabwariinyi aba gadiyeeda ghana baloolda gagasa eabwariinya aba sinooda ea huumeanda.
Aba nii gajeanala gideaba geebeayi huumeanda, ak geesikteawi aba jeesingaasa aba madeadaannyi
iyargweakseasa jeesingaasa; aba gideaba Aseetta ahaweawa jeesingaasa, ak ghwanal haleanjeessean.
Fuga abwariinnyi, iimeargweakseasa gurooruunatkaasa, abeeda gendeawi gissirarji aba madeeda Aseetta;
ak iissa geenyaschi gidasumuschi, aba gideaba geang'ng'waanyi digheannyeekkaaschi nea geesinnyi gidabwariiy niny.
Nea nii ea digheandaannyi gil, gideaba ea mwasa gheawunga Balleandaannyi wa Yeesu Gristo nea geebariinyayi geat, gawuurji gidagoondaneasa.
Buuneessean ang'ng'waay digheannyeakkaaschi goobiitta jeadaannyi, nea goobiida niny jeannyaawa. Aba sareani abeeda geanalli gideaba goobiida jeedeanya, aba Gurorooda ghayi goaneasa.
Fuga abwariinnyi, adoamwaschi giliwas gurorooda, iissa ghoonyoo asma guroruunatsu ak ghoadaayi ea gaba Aseetta; aba gideaba nihidu jeeda ng'eanyiida sibanga saang'a bea ng'uyyeega.
Aba nii abeeda gajanala Gurorooda Aseetta: gurorooda mwas gideaba Yeesu Gristo nuwu nea ghwaana saseeda gaba Aseetta,
nea guroorooda wassean mwamwasa Yeesu maba Aseetta. Nii gurorooda daheawa Gristohi, was deaghayi oayiinyi gideaba gayghwahidu, ak ghamneawa ea nigeawiit ghwahidu jeeda ng'eanyiida.
Diibiga manang'i, agooga goobeayi Aseetta, ak ea noajoarji saawa; aba gideaba dea mida jeedeang'wa ahaweawa dea mida jeeda ng'eanyiida.
Suu gaba ng'eanyiida, ak gabaloola ng'asheega ng'eanyiida, ak goleeysiit ng'eanyiida saawa.
Aseasa geebeayi Aseetta. Siida nal Aseetta gaygoleeyseasa iit, nea deamaba Aseetta ea maygoleeyseasa iit. Ak aba seareani gajeanala gurorooda huumwa ea gurorooda ramaseanda.
Oroogeasu abwariinnyi, ebariinya geat aba gideaba bariinyeega gwaleabu heeda Aseetta, ak giliwas sih mideawa bariinyeega gwajiilu Aseetta, ak ghwanal Aseetta.
Nea siida mandeawana bariinyeega ea miighwanal Aseetta aba gideaba Aseetta bariinyeega gil.
Aba seareani bariinyeega Aseetta geattajiit aba jeedeanya, gideaba Aseetta goojeagu Balleandaannyi was haghasheeda badayda ng'eanyiida, ak abeeda geanyaschi eaweega appadaydaannyi.
Nea nii ea bariinyeega, mii gideaba geabwariinyi aseesa Aseetta ghabwariinyeasa niny ak goojeagu Balleandaannyi ghoaw dea adayda leadeeda riing'eegaasa.
Fugaabwariinnyi, iinukkwa ghabwariiyduneasa Aseetta, gammiisa gideaba gajeebariinya geat.
Manda siida nidaa Aseetta; isubwariinyayi geat, abeeda Aseetta goobiida jeedeanya, ak bariinyeagaaschi ea niihit aba jeedeanya.
Abaa seareani geanalli gideaba geeppiidi jeadaannyi, ak eara niny gwanda jeedeanya, aba gideaba nugoaneasa Guroroadaannyi.
Ak aseasa asidaayi nea simuuwu gideaba Bwaabwa nijeagu Balleandaannyi ghoaw lealnoochcheanda ng'eanyiida.
Giliwas sih mwas gideaba Yeesu Balleanda Aseetta gil, abeeda Aseetta goobiida jeadaannyi nea goobiida niny jeeda Aseetta.
Aseasa geanalli ak geamwaschi Aseetta appadahuukkaasa. Aseetta bariinyeega gil, ak siida abiida jeeda bariinyeega, goobiida jeeda Aseetta, ak goobiida Aseetta jeadaannyi.
Aba jeedeaba bariinyeesu sihhiit aba heedeanya, ak geamwaschi aba eaweeda girgweaksiinda, aba gideaba giduurjeatta niny ea gissuwuurjeatti gil aba badaydeaba ng'eanyiini.
Aba jeeda bariinyeega manda muuwda, ak bariinyeega huumwa gaygageanda muuwda. Aba gideaba muuwda gwandeawa ghoorjooda, ak siida mideawa muuwda ea mii hidaat aba bariinyeega.
Aseasa geabwariinyi, aba gideaba goosheeda niny ghabwariinyeasa.
Siida iyayi, “Ghabwariinnyi Aseetta,” nea ghwasit oorjeeda ghaamwat, abeeda siisi gabang'uyya; aba gideaba siida mwabwariinya oorjeeda ghaamwat nidaa, moammu ghabwariiy Aseetta miighwadaah.
Ak digheanji gagooneasa niny gideaba siida bwariiy Aseetta, dabwariinya eara oorjeeda ghaamwat.
Siida wassean mwas gideaba Yeesu niny Gristo gil siisi jeepta Aseetta, siida wassean bwariiy ghwaan ea ghaamwat ghabwariiy jeepta.
Aba seareani geanalli gideaba geabwariinyi diibiga Aseetta, isubwariinyi Aseetta nea geang'ng'waanyi digheannyeekkaschi.
Aba gideaba nii bariinyeega Aseetta, nea gideaba geesissi mureeda digheannyeakkaaschi. Nea digheannyeakkaaschi ea miidurumani.
Aba gideaba gissijiila Aseetta iissa ghwajoar ng'eanyiida; nea nii ea jooriischchooda joar ng'eanyiida gil, nea masaweagaasa.
Anneeda dea joar ng'eanyiida geaghus iimii dea was gideaba Yeesu Balleanda Aseetta?
Nii deaghayi wuna beega gil ea foojeanda, Yeesu Gristo, ak ea meakghusa beega akghwahit ghoana beega ea foojeanda.
Ak Gurorooda ea deamuuwwu gil, aba gideaba Gurorooda huumeanda gil.
Gwanda mushoodi samwagu, Gurorooda gil, ea beega ea foojeanda; assuh assamwaguun ghamwas geat.
Iisumwaschi muuwwuunoona buuneeda, abeeda muuwwuunoona Aseetta aahaw muuchchi; aba gideaba nii muuwwuunoona Aseetta gil gideaba nimuwwu iitta Balleandaannyi.
Siida mwas Balleanda Aseetta gwandeawa muuwwuunoadaannyi aba jeadaannyi. Nea deamwamwasa Aseetta ghwanung' gaba ng'uyya, aba gideaba mwamwasa muuwwuunoona Aseetta appadayda Balleandaannyi.
Ak nea nii ea muuwwuunooda gil, bea gideaba, Aseetta gagoaneasa eaweega manda mudeanooda, ak eaweesu gwanda jeeda Balleandaannyi.
Siida mideawa Balleanda gwandeawa eaweega; nea dea mandeawana Balleanda Aseetta ea mandeawana eaweega.
Geang'oorneegwa ng'asheesu agoogeeni mwas gheawunga Balleanda Aseettean, ak abeeda ghoanalli gideaba goondeawi eaweega manda mudeanooda.
Annih ea gidaararji gil aba headaannyi, gideaba iisumuschi gil aba gidagassiida niny gayghwayiinyeasa.
Ak isinalli gideaba gayghwayiinyeasa aba giliwas sean sumwaashchi, geanalli gideaba gajeanyasa haleanjeetta sigasayiin.

Siida wassean idaa oorjeeda ghaamwat nea gwasin riing'eeda maba miyeeda, abeeda damwaasha ghawooda, ak gayghoadaw Aseetta eaweega appadahuukkeaba suu sina riing'eega maba miyeedean. Gwanda riing'eeda was dea miyeeda; meayeeni gayghamwaash Aseetta appadaydeaba nii.
Gidawassean mwadoabiiwa riing'eeda gil, ak gwanda riing'eeda mawosa dea miyeeda.
Geanalli gideaba giliwas Balleanda Aseetta maygwasin riing'eeda, ak Balleanda Aseetta gaygafurgeaw, ak eara diitta muyiin ea mayghwasat.
Aseasa geanalli gideaba geebeayi Aseetta, ak ng'eanyiissean goombal diitta muyiin.

Ak aseasa geanalli gideaba Balleanda Aseetta goolla ghwahidu, ak gagoaneasa fughareeda eanala ninnyeeda was huumwa; ak aseasa geendi jeadaannyi ninnyeeda was huumwa, aba jeeda Balleandaannyi was Yeesu Gristo. Nii dea was Aseetta huumwa gil, ea eaweega manda mudeanooda.
Diibiga manang'i, afrageat aba duguuga sinung' ghoaw aseechcheekka.
Gweargweeda, ea gheamatta siloat sea diibigaaschi, abwariinyi aba huumwa, ea meaghusaan aniini eara fuga sean nal huumeanda,
appadaydeaba huumeanji mida jeedeanyean, gaygoobiida jeedeanya damanda manda mudeanooda:
Dagheerjeandumeeda, ea baydeada, ea hoyyoo gajeendeawana, nea gaygwaleabu heeda Aseetta was Bwaabwa ea heeda Yeesu Gristoyda was Balleanda Ghweanda, aba huumeanda ea bariinyeega.
Geahoosannyi muuchchi iyadaayi diibigaagu mwaatkwa nea ghwaat naweeda huumeanda gawuurji gidaghayi goondaneasa Ghweanda.
Ak ghamneawa, geamuscheey gheamatta, mii gideaba geang'oorneey digheanda eesh gil, digheanji deaghayi sibean endeawana ammwadiin gil, bea gideaba ebariinnya geadi.
Ak bariinyeega ea nihi, gideaba eweaya nea geayaachchi geeshta digheannyeekkaaschi; ak nii ea digheanda, gawuurji gidaghayi oayiing'di ammwadi gideaba oppiidana jeeda bariinyeega.
Aba gideaba nirinna badayda ng'eanyiida fuga saang'a bea ng'uyyeega, gea mwamwasa gideaba Yeesu Gristo ghwahittayda siida; anni ea diitta bea ng'uyyeegeani, ak ea dea mwamwasa Gristo gil.
Ang'ulla sasanuukkeagwa, adoohutteawayi geanoosinnyi, ak ghoanyaschi gimearda hidaat.
Siida wassean weah mwadi nea moang'ng'waanya ginealshooda Gristo mandeawana Aseetta; dea abiida jeeda ginealshooda gwandeawa sean Bwaabwa ea Balleanda.
Siida ihidu heedeang'wa nea meanna ginealshooni, abeeda ea adideapti aba gheang'u nea adiigeachcheewi;
aba gideaba siida ageachchi siisi gabareannyi gadiyoojigaaschi munyas.

Earagwasa geandeawi ng'asheega saang'a eagasayi dang'oorneey, ghang'wana ea mwang'waari aba galaamu ea gardaasajeanda, ghaararji gideaba gaydoan dadaanyi ak geabaloolleey nea geeng'ulayi geat, ak abeeda gamajeegiit hooseaneagaasa.
Gagoonyi seayooda diibiga huda geamadu siloat.
Gweargweeda, heeda Gaayooyda abwariinyi, eabiissi dabwariiy aba huumwa.
Siida abwariinyi, ghamwaashchi Aseetta gideaba ghwadoabiiw ng'asheegaagu sean ak guwosi majeek; ak ghaanalli gideaba guroroadaang'u eamajeek.
Ak geahoosannyi muuchchi iihidu fuga eaduupcheewi mwaatkwa ak gamuuwwu masaweagaagu bea huumwa aba jeeda eaweagaagu, ak ea huumwa gil giyaadi geeshta huumeanda.
Ea meandeawani hooseaneega haw ng'al nii, gideaba ghayiinyi gideaba diibigeasu ghwaat geeshta huumeanda.
Siida abwariinyi, nii gisni ng'asheanda doabiiw gideaba gisissi oorjookkiyeang'wa gadiyeeda, raanya gea was rabasta,
was fuga muuwwu bariinyeagaagu aba madeeda ganiisa. Gajadoabiiwa iinung' gaweay bareannyeekka haguuw gadiyeeda Aseetta.
Aba gideaba saawa gaweay appadaydaannyi ak ea moang'ng'waanya gil aba heeda fuga emoojiga.
Asi gammiiseasa gideaba eadeapta fuga uurji suu, ak geawoschi fukkadiyeeda bea huumwa.
Gwanda ng'asheega neang'oorsi fuga Ganiisa; nea Deotarifeyda, inyeessa bwariiy gawa mwadiin mwamwasa gheambalmeedeanyu.

Asi iyaawunnyi, gaydeadu iitta gissin, aba gideaba iissa goojuur nea gwarukuna badaydeanyu ng'asheega munyas. Ea mabeachchi suu, ghaheawa niny ghwadeapta fuga eaduupcheewi, ak ghoaghuum eara fukka gasa ghwadeapta saawaan ak gooruutteawa jeeda ganiisa.
Fugeabwariinyi, adoogali sinooda ng'asheega munyas, anala geaw alooheeda. Siida sina alooheeda siisi gaba Aseetta; ak dea sina ng'asheega munyas ea mii ghwadaa Aseetta.
Demetrio nimuuwwu fuga saang'a ng'asheega badaydaannyi, ak eara huumeanda gamuuwwu; ak earaniini geamuuwwu, ak ginali gideaba muuwwuunoodeanyu huumwa gil.
Gwachchi geandeawi ng'asheega saang'a jea dang'oorneey, ak ea meagassi dang'waar aba galaamu ea wiino;
ak ghaararji gideaba gaydabay dadaanyi, ak abeeda gajeebaloola nea geeng'ulayi geat.
Beaha hoyyoo. Ghoaghannyi fuga siroroochcheewi. Aghada fuga siroroochcheewi, ea giliwas sii bea saawa.
Yuuda, soomjeanda Yeesu Gristo was oorjeeda geennyea Yakkobo,
Heeda fuga suguursa, abwariinyi aba jeeda Aseetta was Bwaabwa ak geettiiwsa Yeesu Gristo:
Gagasa elakkuneegwa baydeayda, ea hoyyoo, nea gegooneegwa bariinyeega.

Fuga abwariinyi, geagasayi muuchchi dang'oorneegwa iitta lealeanoodeanya bea geallaan, ak ghadaayi ghwahit gideaba geang'oorneegwa nea geamuscheegwa ak geeng'allealleesi masaweega ghayi sugu nibwagi ak ea majeebiikta siittaw fuga ghaydidi.

Aba gideaba gheatta ninyas fuga mwaatkwa gaseadayyi aba makcheameeda ghang'eada garayi ak geegwalu aba girgweaksiinda, fuga maba aseetta hutteawi dagheerjeandumeeda Aseetteanya ak ghoabuutta jeeda hiseadayeandumeeda nea ghwashaang' Siideanya haw assakkalealla was Ng'uttamiida, Yeesu Gristo.

Asi ghamneawa geegaasayi deapkeaneegwa, earappeadi siirukuneegwa muuchchi nibwagi ak ea maygudeebiikta, gideaba dea ghayi lealna buuneeda jeeda ng'eanyiida Misri, imuchchu ghwalas uhuudeaba fukka mwamwasaan.

Nea malaykajeega mang'ulla muuchchi hoorgajeega nyaawa ak ghang'amwa heeda eajusu abiitta ea nirattiisa niny jeeda munyaloalajeega maygammuudean aba jeeda misaneeda ea ghwahitta eaweetta haw bea girgweaksiindean;

gawuurji Sodooma ea Gomoora ea mujiinajeega neekkeewa, fukka abeeda gwasna ng'asheega munyas gawuurji gidaghayi sin fukka nea geayaat geeshta ng'asheega saseeda nea geegala ak ghwanyas girgweaksiinda beasta manda muudeanooda.
Ak eara fiisu aba jeeda girgweatka nyaawa ghang'uda saseenuuka nyaawa ririnyeanda, ak ghaheawa gheambalmeeda ak geeng'ng'eawi haleanjeeda gheambiideadi.

Nea Mikkaeleeda was malaykajeanda haw, gang'alealii sea meang'nyeandeenda, nea gwasheang'nyeesa saseeda Muusa, mii gabadaksa rukunooda ging'weakka appadayda girgweageeda mida badaydaannyi, geaghus gideaba gwayeeshsha, “Gagasa goowoowseey Ng'uttamiida.”
Nea fiisu goong'eawi haleanjeeda mwanala, nea aba haleanjeetta nal amwadiin iissa gwasin gawuurji diyeanga manda fughareenga, gajeelas uhuuda.
Dashageeda saawa! Aba gideaba ghwaat geeshta naweeda Gaini, ak ghwanung'waada geat ghwanyas ng'asheega munyas bea Balaamu, ak goosha aba gidaghayi heawatta Goora.

Suu geeyeatta ghuussi aba ghweelmajeegeagwa, aba damanda leeshoodeang'wa iyoabwachchi geat, nea iissa goong'ulayi geat; shamooghuutka manda beega, nea iissa ghwaat jeammeeda; geediga manda haghweega doomeelda shing'da, nimeewa deabiyyeenya, ak gealoatta;
laweajajeega hees bea basooda, jakkiisa humng'eeda furghooda aba baspaseega nyaawa; miinga neayi nea heeda hiing'aada gwanda misaneeda haw sittiiw ea ghwahitta damanda manda muudeanooda.
Appadaydeaba suu Enokki aba seaygeedeaba ispwa ng'eada Adamu gayghwaramoaran, nea gwayi, “Ng'ulla, Ng'uttamiida ghwaan nea goodeana malaykajeagaaschi meammu eyiida, gwanuuseada aba girgweaksiinda,

ak goorgweaksa buuneessean, ak ghoadaw gidinyeanda buuneessean meawalla Aseetta, aba searoojiga nyaawa sean maba Aseetta ghayi nisin aba gitta magassiida Aseettean, ea aba haleanjeeda ng'weani rukku siida ring'eeda meawalla Aseetta appadaydaannyi”.
Fiisu inyeessa ghoaniikgh, fuga mideawa sichcheeda, inyeessa ghwaat geeshta ng'asheega nyaawa gasa, fuga hees ghuussi gwara geat, reengani buuneeda ak ghwanyas gheatta gidagasa.
Asi agooga fugeasu abwariinyi, oapkaada, ng'asheega ghayi bay gwargu giijasoodiga Ng'uttamiideanya was Yeesu Gristo;
nea gwayeeshshiineegwa, “Eaweeda huydean gaygwanda fuga inyeessa jea gwajuuga buuneeda, nea ghwaat geeshta gassooda ng'asheega nyaawa meawwalleawana Aseetta”.
Suu fuga inyeessa ghwanung' ghwaan dardeayda gil, fuga ng'eanyiida, mandeawana Guroorooda.
Nea agooga, fuga abwariinyi, amajeegiitta appadayda masaweegeagwa ghaydidi muuchchi; nea ghoamwaashchi Aseetta aba Gurorooda Ghaydit;
afrageat aba jeeda bariinyeega Aseetta; nea ghoammughu baydeayda Ng'uttamiideanya was Yeesu Gristo, ea ghwahitta eaweega manda muudeanooda.
Anung' ghamwas mwaatkwa, gea mideawa machmajeega;
alealni mwaatkwa, nea ghoassealdaawi jeeda beasta, nea mwaatkwa goobayyiidi aba muuwda, nea ghoasichchi eara hang'da sung'uda ririnyeanda saseeda.
Asi ghamneawa aba heeda ninnyeeda ammu ghwanung' eamooppeadani ak ghwaadeagwa nea meeyeatteweegwa ghuussi aba madeeda gigheambiittaannyi aba hooseaneega,

heeda Aseetta bwageaw, lealnoochcheandeanya aba naweeda Yeesu Gristoyda was Ng'uttamiideanya, daba gigheambiitta niny, ea hawunda, ea sugoochcheandumeeda, ea gheambalmeeda, dea ghayi ng'eada garayi, ea ghoaw ghamneawa, ea ghoaw damanda manda muudeanooda. Amin.

Nii giidaheachta Yeesu Gristo gil, ghayi adaw Aseetta niny gohiimsa soomjoagaaschi ng'asheega jea gabay ghwahidu; ak ghwanung' eanal aba gijeakteayda malaykajeandaannyi gaweesa soomjeandaannyi was Yohaana,
amaduw gamuuwwu Yohaana iitta ng'asheanda Aseetta ea muwwunooda iitta Yeesu Gristo, ea iitta haleanjeessean ghayi daa.
Ghang'wana siida assoamwa aba ghuutta haw ng'asheega was ramoorangeasu, ak ghang'wana fukka iiyiin, ea dea ang'ng'waay ng'asheega sung'oorsa jeedean; aba gideaba damanda nineekiit.
Yohaana heeda ganiisajeega assispwa mida Asiya:
Gagasa anyasa dagheerjeandumeeda ea hoyyooyda leabu heeda dea mida ea dea bean gwanda dea jea ghwahidu, leabu heeda guroruunat ispwa mida madeeda hoorgeadaannyi bea sugoochcheandumeeda,
biissa gwaleabu heeda Yeesu Gristoyda was muushoochcheanda doabiiwaat, was duweachcheeda fuga nimeewa, ak goombal sugoodiga mida ng'eanyiida.
Heedeaba ninnyeeda bwariinyeasa ak gottineasa ehelleewana ring'eegaasa aba foojeandaannyi
ak gagoaneasa sugoochcheandumeeda, ak geahuuyi ashoohoodiga aba heeda Aseettannyi ea Ghweanda, giigheambiitta daannyi ea sugoochcheandumeeda ea ghoaw damanda manda mudeanooda. Amin.
Ng'ulla, ghwaan nea godeana shamooghuutka, ak gayghwadaa niny giliwas gheang'da, ea giliwas sii ghayi ng'ut niny; ea emoojiga sean bea ng'eanyiida gaygaguuttu heareagaaschi. Asaha. Amin.
“Aniini geawoschi Alfa ea Omeega,” dea madeeda ea dea huydean, aba ginnyaa Ng'uttamiida was Aseetta, dea mida ea dea bean gwanda ea dea jea ghwahidu, was Aseetta mideawa uurda.

Aniini geawoschi Yohaana, oorjeeda giyeang'wa deaghayi oppareannyeewi sawanadeeda ea sugoochcheandumeeda ea milikghteayda nea ghoahhangng'waanyi, nea gwanda ng'eanyiida neaweesa beega suguura Batmo appadayda ng'asheanda Aseetta ea muwuunooda ng'asheega Yeesu.
Muchchu geandi jeeda Gurorooda eaweeda Ng'uttamiida, hean ghayiinyi nyeashta haw appadaydeanya, nyaashta giguuleanda nea gwayi,
“Ngoorsiina haleanjeeda idaahi jeeda gittaabu ak giyeassi ganiisajeega assispwa, dea Efeeso ea Smirna ea Bergamo ea Diyattira, ea Sardi ea Filadelfiya ea Laodekkiya.”
Hean ghayamnyi geaw dadaah nyeashttida abaloolaniin, hean ghaadaayi gheaboonyan ispwa meang'meang'i mida deageaw,
ak ghaadaayi aba dang'adgeaba hoorgajeegiga siida uurji balleanda siida, nea nishuup hang'da gulng'eanyi, ak ea nirassa daghattaannyi inyeashta sisna lagheanga meang'meang'i;
uhuudaannyi ea budeagaaschi ea eashish ea ghawaar gea gisilleanda eesh, ea eashish ea ghawaar gapkeanda; nea gheanyangaaschi ghawaar ng'ushapta beasta,
ak geeshangaaschi gawuurji gharinnyeanda mur sisiy muuchchi ea gawuurji gilisihhuuna duwayda beasta, nea fuydaannyi ghwanyaashta dea beega saang'a;
ak ghoang'ng'waanya miin ispwa aba geattindaannyi bea dugwa, ak gwarinna ghuuttaannyi bwangeeda shidaat meadajeega sean, ak gheamamdaannyi gawuurji aseetta dagu muuchchi.

Iiduw nea ghaadaayi niny, geabeedeasi geshangaaschi ea dawuurji siida nimi. Hean ghwayiin geattidaannyi bea dugwa uhuudeanyu nea gwayi, “Adibeali, Aniini geawoschi dea madeeda ea dea huydean ea dea majeek;
ghayi ghameayi, ak ging'ulayi geawoschi majeek; ghayi ghaameayi, asi ng'ulla geawoschi majeek damanda manda mudeanooda, ak geandeawi gissiittinna gidaghuutta Miyeeda ea Gheeda maloonghajeega.
Asi ng'waara haleanjeeni idaahiin, ea gea ghamneawa mida, ea gea iiduw jea gabassa iing'atta suh.

Makcheameedeaba miingiga as ispwa ideaksi geattindeanyu bea dugean, ea hoorgajeekka as ispwa meang'meang'iin, miingiga as ispwaan, malaykajeega ganisajeekka as ispwaani ak eara hoorgajeekka as ispwa meang'meang'iin ea ganiisajeekka assispwaan gil.
“Heeda malaykajeanda ganiiseeda Efeeso ng'waara, ‘Ng'asheega ninyeeda mideawa miinga assispwa aba geattindaannyi bea dugwa nea gwaneayeewa dageascheeda hoorgaji ispwa bea gheaboonyanga meeng'meeng'i.

Aniini ghaanalli gadiyoojigaagu, ea sawanadeadaang'u ea milikghteaydaang'u nea giihang'waanyi, ea gidamiimmuustani milikghta fuga munyas iissa ginyoo ghanyi sima fukka guura geat giijasoodiga nea mawosean, ak gidaahi gideaba gaba ng'uyya;
ak ghaanalli gihang'ooydaang'u nea gimilikghti nea gidiing'di gheawungeasu, ak ghanyea mii bura.
Ak geandeawi ng'ashaan appadaydaang'u, bea gideaba ninung'wi heeda bariinyeegaagu bea mwadi.

Asi apkaada gidabwaanyi, ak giduukkuuni ak gibiiksi gadiyoojiga ghayi isni bea madeeda. Ak imisni, gaydahidu headaang'u, ak gaydageanda hoorgeeda gheaboonyaneedaang'u aba heeda mida, ea eaghus duukkuunana.
Ak gindeawi ng'asheanji gideaba gisti gadiyoojiga fuga Nikolayi, ak eara aniini ghaasichi.
Gilinyoo googar iitta, dayiinya ng'asheanji rukusa Gurorooda ganiisajeegean. Nea dea jooriischi gaydanung' ghwaak haghweega geetta eaweega, mida jeeda madamnyeanda mwanang' bea Aseettean.’”
“Heeda malaykajeanda ganiiseeda Smirna ng'waara, ‘Ng'asheega madeeda ea dea huydean, was dea ghayi meah ak gabiikta gamajeegiit.

Ghaanalli sawanadeadaang'u ea barbarandaang'u, (ak guwosi meanang'oochcheanda), ak ghaanalli eara ging'weakeaba fiisu eena geewochi fuga Yahuudi nea mawosean, nea saawa ea ghooriida sinnealshachcheewa bea Shattaani.

Asi adiiwali ng'asheega jea nyasa was sawanadeeda. Ng'ulla, meang'nyeandeenda niriikghta gwahisa buuneeda mwaatkwa mida jeedeang'wa ghealooniga, ak abeeda gesimsimeegwa, ak aba jeemba askweajooji damanamughuush gajanyasa sawanadeeda. Wosa doabiiwaat ea hitta miyeeda, ak gaydagoonnyi shiipka mideawa eaweega.’”
“Siida agar iitta, dayiinya ng'asheanji rukusa Gurorooda ganiisajeegean. Nea dea jooriischi ea mayghwanyas sawanadeeda miyeedeaba iyyeenya.”
“Heeda malaykajeanda ganiiseeda Bergamo ng'waara: ‘Suu ng'asheega dea mideawa bwaangeeda ng'aniip meadajeega duwaawi.’

“Ghaanalli heediibiitti, heeda mida hoorgeeda gheambalmeeda Shattaani gil; ak ang'iing'i ea ning'waanyi muuchchi gheawungeasu, ak ea mii heawana masaweegeasu eara damandida bea Antiippa was muuwshoocheandeanyuun, was siideanyu doabiiwaat, sinuuksa bugusteang'wa, was heeda abiitta Shattaaniin.

Ak geandeawi ng'asheesu ng'ay appadaydaang'u: gideaba gindeawi fiisu ng'ay aba hoowa aat geeshta ginealshooda Balaamu, niny ghayi ghoanaal Balakki ak gwaruusa balloojiga Israeeli ak ghwanung' ghwaak hamichchoojiga siyaat lukghumajeega siittaw haleanjeeda mawosa Aseetta ea biissa mealuleega.
Ak eara ang'iing'i gindeawi fuga aat geeshta ginealshooda fuga Nikkoolayi.
Asi duukkuunana. Nea iimiduukkuunani, gaydahidu headaang'u nea ghalamwajaannyi ak gaydang'uchchi saawa aba bwaangeeda leabu ghuutteanyu.

“Gilinyoo googar iitta, dayiinya ng'asheanji rukusa Gurorooda ganiisajeegean. Nea siida jooriischi gaydaadaw hamitta suguura maana ghayi sifuy ak gaydaadaw lagheaneedeesh, ak badaydeaba lagheanean geeng'oorsa gheawunga eashish, mwanala siih geaghus siitta ang'ng'waayiin.”
“Heeda malaykajeanda ganiiseeda Diyattira ng'waara: ‘Ng'asheega Balleanda Aseetta, bea gheanyanga oar ng'ushapta beasta, ak geeshangaaschi gawuurji lagheaneeda mur sisiy muuchchi.’
Ghaanalli gadiyoojigaagu, ea bariinyeegaagu ea masaweegaagu ea gidigadiyeatti ea milikghteaydaang'u nea giihang'waanyi, ak gichcha gadiyoojigaagu huydean ghangal gea ghayi bea madeeda.

Ak geandeawi ng'ashaan appadaydaang'u, bea gideaba ang'iing'i gimilikghti gatmoodida suguura Yesebeeliin, guura geaw sibaneeda ak ghoareatta soomjoogeasu ak ghoanaal mealuuleega nea ghwaak haleanjeeda siyaat lukdhumajeega siittaw gidamawosa Aseettean.
Ak ea naadawji gheatta gwaduukkuuna, ak ghaheawa duukkuunooda mealuuleegaaschi.
Ng'ulla, gaydayiin gatmoodida muunda aba miyeanda, nea fukka jea gamealuul sea ninyiin gaydadaw sawanadeeda haw, ea eaghus gwaduukkuuna ng'asheega sina;

ak gaydabwar diibigaaschi gameewa. Ak gayghwanal ganiisajeega sean gideaba aniini geawoschi siida sikkiideawa fughareenga ea guroruunatka, ak gaba siisi adawji aba jeedeang'wa gitteaschi sea gadiyoojigeagwa.”

“Nea fuga mida jeedeang'wa aba ng'eanyiida Diyattira, was fuga moang'ng'waanya ginealshooniin, fuga mwanala gidaguura buuneeda mwaatkwa haleanjeeda sheagi jih bea Shattaani, aba heedeang'wa gaydayi, mwaydayiin badahuukkeagwa sareenda nuut;
ghusa ging'ng'ooyda gidindeawi, ea dahidu.
Nea siida jooriischi ak ghoang'ng'waay gadiyoojigeasu ea ghwahitta huydeanda, gaydanung' goombal fuga emoojiga,
ak gayghoohaaghwiida saawa bileangida gharinnyeanda, gawuurji gidiissa ghwanyarda haleanjeeda sisna sigeeda ak ghoaw banajanga, gwasnu earaniini naanyaschi uurda leabu heeda Bwaabwa;
ak gaydaadaw ming'weandida bea muchchuunoodean.
Gilinyoo googar iitta, dayiinya ng'asheanji rukusa Gurorooda ganiisajeegean.”

“Heeda malaykajeanda ganiiseeda Sardi ng'waara: ‘Suh ng'asheega ninyeeda mideawa guroruunat ispwa bea Aseetta ea miinga assispwaan gil.’ ‘Ghaanalli gadiyoojigaagu; gideaba gindeawi gheawunga majeeknatta, nea nimeawi.
Ang'wearni, ak gimajeegi ng'asheega shoada jea gweadu miyeeda, aba gideaba mii dadeaksa gadiyoojigaagu alooheeda aba madeeda Aseetteanyu.
Asi apkaada gidaghayi inyasi ea gidaghayi iyiinyi; asi ang'ng'waanya gidida, ak giduukkuuni. Ak iming'wearni gaydahittaayda mareanghweanda, ak ea mwaynala damanda jea dahinna headaang'u.
Ak gindeawi gheawung'su ng'ay aba ng'eanyiida Sardi, fuga miighang'uda hang'weakka nyaawa ririnyeanda; ak gaydeadeayddooschi saawa nea sishshuubeasa hang'weakka eeshish, aba gideaba gammiisa.’

“Nea siida jooriischi gajeekwealsa hang'weakka eeshish, ak ea maydeabuus ghawungaaschi aba jeeda gittaabwajeanda eaweega; ak gaydamwas gheawungaaschi aba madeeda Bwaabwa, ea madeeda malaykajeagaaschi.
Gilinyoo googar iitta, dayiinya ng'asheanji rukusa Gurorooda ganiisajeegean.”

“Heeda malaykajeanda ganiiseeda Filadeelfiya ng'waara: ‘Suh ng'asheega siida ghaydit gil assakkalealla, bea huumwa, mideawa gissiittinna gidaghuutta sugoochcheandumeeda Dawdi, siida amattin ea manda siida ammu ghwarat, siida amarat ea manda siida jea goottin.’

“Aniini ghaanalli gadiyoojigaagu. Ng'ulla, aniini naayiinnyi madeadaang'u gidaghuutta jaadaat, moammu sih ghwarat; aniini ghaanalli gideaba gindeawi uuri mwanang', ea gideaba ging'ng'waannyi ng'asheandeanyu ak ea mii shaang'a gheawungeasu.

Ng'ulla, gaydanung' ghoaw fukka was gheeda sinnealshachcheewa bea Shattaani eena geawoschi Yahuudi nea mawosa ak gwanaba ng'uyyeegean, ng'ulla, gaydanung' ghapka ak gwatkuy aba madeeda geeshangaagu, ak ghwanal gideaba ghaabwariinyeay.

Aba gideaba ning'ng'waannyi ng'asheandeanyu bea milikghteayda nea gihang'waanyi, ak aniini gaydafurnyi, nea giritti aba damanda simsimda jea gwahissa ng'eanyiisean, ak gwasimsim fuga mida badayda ng'eanyiida.
Gaydahidu nea ghaalamwajaannyi; ang'ng'waanya muuchchi gidindeawi, ak ea mooreannyi sih shiipkaagu.

“Siida joorischi gaydanung' ghoaw daraneeda aba jeeda gheeda sibatta Aseetteanyu; ak ea mayghanyi gwaritteawa jeeni, ak gaydang'oorsa badaydaannyi gheawunga Aseetteanyu, ea gheawunga mujineeda Aseetteanyu, nea Yerusaleemooda eeshi, rarang'aana humng'eeda heeda Aseetteanyu, ea gheawungeasu giikka eashishiin.
Gilinyoo googar iitta, ea dayiinya ng'asheesu rukusa Gurorooda ganiisajeegean.”
“Heeda malaykajeanda ganiseeda Laodekkiya ng'waara: ‘Ng'asheega siida was Amin, was siida doabiiwaat was mushoochcheanda huumwa, was ging'eetta haleanjeessean sin Aseetta.’
