“Aniini ghaanalli gadiyoojigaagu: gideaba muwosi garbabu nea muwosi gharaat. Ghang'wana guwosi garbabu ghana wosa gharaat!
Asi, aba gideaba guwosi shang'shang', nea muwosi garbabu ghana wosa gharaat, gaydang'udaneey ak giritteawi ghuutteanyu.

Aba gideaba giyeeni aniini geawoschi meanang'oochcheanda ak ea neabaruurji, ak ea meagassi gil; ak ang'iing'i ea minali gideaba mindeawani uurda, nea guwosi bwarbwar, ak giwosi ng'oaw, nea guwosi dawiish.

Ak gaydayeeshshiineey, shaaha aba heedeanyu lagheanga meeng'meeng'i siihuuna beasta, ak abeeda gaywosa meanang'oochcheanda, nea giikwealli hang'weakka eashish, ak ea meadaaha baspaseega dawiishnattaang'u, ak gaynyasa meajooda jea eashana gheanyangaagu ak abeeda gingweardi.
Fukkeanji abwariinyiin, inyeessa geawoowsi nea ghabwarji; asi milmiliida ak giduukkuuni.
Ng'ulla, ghaamiinaadi aba gidaghuut nea geagulgulli; siida jea ghwayiiny ghuutteanyu ak ghwajaat gidaghuut gaydoan headaannyi ak geambuuchcheewi, nea eara niny goombuuchcheewean.
“Siida jooriischi gaydanung' goopteada nea geendeayi aba uhuuda hoorgeedeanyu bea gheambalmeeda, gawuurji gideajooriischeatti ak geapteadi sea Bwaabwa aba uhuuda hoorgeedaannyi bea gheambalmeeda.
Gilinyoo googar iitta, dayiinya ng'asheanji rukusa Gurorooda ganiisajeegean.”

Iing'atta ng'asheesu ghang'weardi, ama deagheatta gwanda humng'eeda gidaghuutta jaadaat. Hean ghuutta gwachchi ayiinyi bea madeedean goobaloolan nea ghwanyaashta giguuleanda, nea gwayi, “Beenni hiji, ak gaydahiimneey gichchea ghwahidu iing'atta ng'asheesu.”
Deagheatta geandi jeeda Gurorooda, hean ghamiinaada hoorgeeda gheambalmeeda aba humng'eeda, nea goopteada siida aba uhuudeaba hoorgeetta bea gheambalmeedean!
Nea siida apteadawa uhuuda iisung'ula ghawaar lagheaneda mur ea dea dughwaang, nea hoorgeetta bea gheambalmeedean gwaneaweesa gidaghuweang'da sheagiitka ama sung'ula ea nyawiish.

Ak gwaneaweesa hoorgeedida bea gheambalmeedean hoorgaji diktam ea ang'wan bea gheambalmeeda, ak ghaadaayi gwearu diktam ea ang'wan, aba uhuudeaba hoorgajeegiga bea gheambalmeedean nea goobiitbiit, nea siikwealsa hang'weakka eashish, nea iheenga nyaawa gwanda shiipka lagheanga meeng'meeng'i.

Nea heeda hoorgeeda gheambalmeeda iissa gwarinna dadamandeeda, nea ghuusiga ea nyeashta gighweeendandeeda, nea madeeda hoorgeeda gheambalmeeda ghwayeat gheaboonyan ispwa bea beasta, nea guroruunat ispwa bea Aseetta;

nea madeeda hoorgeeda gheambalmeeda gawuurji gili mida basooda daliil oar giyooh, nea ghameameang'. Nea gwaneaweesa hoorgeeda gheambalmeeda, aba meadajeega sean bea hoorgeeda gheambalmeeda, gwanda diyean ang'wan majeekcheewi, hean ghwanyiit gheanyanga mwadi ea bwadaw:

diyeayda madeeda majeek gawuurji ng'adiida, nea diyeaydeaba iyyeenya majeek gawuurji heeyda, diyeaydeaba samwagu majeek gwandeawa gheamamda uurji dea siida, nea diyeaydeaba ang'wan majeek gawuurji rabearda ng'eatta.
Nea diyeanga assang'wan majeekcheewiin, gaba nii bea meang'i lah, hean ghoang'wearu gang'ula meadajeega ea jih, nea askweari ea eawa ghanyea mii ghwanung'waada sarmeeda,
“Dea Ghaydit, dea ghaydit, dea ghaydit, Ng'uttamiida was Aseetta Haw uuri,
niny dea mida ea dea bean gwanda ea dea jea ghwahidu.”
Ak ghoadaw diyeanga majeekcheewiin giigheambiitta ea mureeda ea badiischooda ninyeeda apteada aba uhuuda hoorgeeda gheambalmeeda maygoosha, damanda manda muudeanooda,

inyeessa gwearsu was diktam ea ang'waniin goobeedeaysa madeeda siitta apteada aba uhuudeaba hoorgeetta bea gheambalmeedean ak ghaghadoawan ninnyeeda majeek eaghoaw damanda manda muudeanooda; nea gwajaksa shiipka nyaawa madeeda hoorgeetta bea gheambalmeedean, nea gwasarman,
“Ng'uttamiideanya was Aseetta gammiiseey ang'iing'i gigheambiitta ea mureeda ea uurda,
aba gideaba ghayi gisni haleanjeessean,
nea aba gidigassiidi gisni ak goobiida.”
Hean geadeaksi geattinda dugwa bea siitta apteada aba uhuuda hoorgeeda gheambalmeedean gittaabooda sung'waar jeeda ea badayda, nea siirroor aba giirooran ispwa;
ghaadaayi malayakajeanda mideawa uurda nea gwarukkwiida ng'asheega aba ghuutta haw, nea gwayi, “Gammiisa ng'eaha gideaba gaygoottin gittaabu ak gwanyarjeaweeda giiroorangaaschi?”
Ak ea manda siida aba humng'eeda ghana ng'eanyiida ghana uutta ng'eanyiida ammu goottin gittaabu ghana goong'weersa jeeda,
hean geayyeawdi muuchchi aba gideaba meadaaha siida miisa giittindeaba gittaaaboani, ghana gong'weersa jeeda.
Ak gwayeeshshean siyagi aba jeedeaba gweargiga, “Adiyyeawdi; daaha, ng'adiida emeeda Yuuda, was Hawunyeanda Dawdi, niny nijooriischi, ak gaygoottin gittaabu, ea giiroorangaaschi as ispwa.”

Hean ghaadaayi aba dageascheeda hoorgeetta bea gheambalmeedean ea diyeangiga majeekcheewi assang'waniin ea bugusteaba gweargiga, ghamiinaada Dayeenda Gisilleanda, nea gawuurji gili silach gheatta, nea gaba gujaw ispwa ea gheanyan ispwa, nea Guroruunat ispwa bea Aseetta gil sichcheakta gaweay ng'eanyiissean;
hean gawa ak gageanda gittaabu aba geattinda dugwa bea siitta apteada aba uhuuda hoorgeeda gheambalmeedean.

Hean nea gageanu gittaabu ghoabeada diyeangiga assang'wan majeekcheewiin sea gweargiga attiktam ea ang'waniin aba madeeda Dayeenda Gisilleanda, ak gaba nii ang'ng'waay gidondooriida, ea gweeriida sisna lagheanga meeng'meeng'i nea ghwannyiit hideeda ng'andit, was mooshta Aseetta bea fuga ghaydidi;
hean gwasarman sarmeedeesh, nea gwayi,
“Gammiiseey ang'iing'i geannooda gittaabu ak giittin giiroorangaaschi,
aba gideaba ghayi gealach ghaattaang'u nea aba foojandaang'u giidaydi leadeeda buuneeda aba heeda Aseetta
aba giliwas eamwa ea iitta ea buuneeda ea ng'eanyiida,
ak ginung' ghwanyas sugoochcheandumeeda ea ashoohoodiga aba heeda Aseetteanya,
nea saawa gaygoombal ng'eanyiida.”
Deagheatta ghang'weardi, ak ghayiinyi aba murdeeda hoorgeeda gheambalmeeda ea dea diyeangiga majeekchewiin ea dea gweargwa ghuusiga malaykajeega saang'a meammu eyiida,
nea geeyi aba ghuutta haw, “Gammiisa Dayeenda Gisilleanda ghayi silach gheatta, ghwanyas uurda ea meanang'oochcheandumeeda ea weaghumeeda ea hawunda ea mureeda ea gigheambiitta ea ghawooda!”

Ak gilinyoo gwanda humng'eeda ea badayda ng'eanyiida ea uutta ng'eanyiida ea jeeda basooda, ea haleanjeessean mida jeadaannyi, gwayi, “Ghawooda ea mureeda ea gigheambiitta ea giimuusta gwandeawa ninyeeda apteada aba uhuuda hoorgeeda gheambalmeeda ea Dayeenda Gisilleanda ea ghoaw damanda manda muudeanooda!”
Ak gwayi diyeangiga assang'wan majeekcheewiin, “Amin!” ak gobeedeayi gweargwa ak ghaghadoawan.

Ng'atta ghaadaayi aba hoowa Dayeenda Gisilleanda nea goottin giirooraneanagi aba jeedeaba gikka as ispwaan, ak ghaayiinyi aba jeedeaba diyeangiga assang'wan majeekcheewiin nea gwayi, aba nyeashta haw uurji gighweendandeeda, “Beenni!”
Hean ghadaayi, asi ng'ulla faraseedeesh, nea gwanda badaydaannyi siida mideawa ghuweang'da; hean geattaw shiipka, ak gwaritta ak gwajooriischi nea ghwajoar.
Iiduw nea goottin girooraneedeaba iyyeenya ghaayiinyi ghuutteaba diyeaydida bea iyyeenya majeegiin nea gwayi, “Beenni!”
Hean gwardu faraasajeanda nuut, nea areara muuchchi; nea siidida mida badaydean geenung'u gageanda weayda aba badayda ng'eanyiida, ak gwanuusa geat buuneeda; ak niny geattaw bwangeeda haw.

Iiduw nea goottin giirooraneedeaba samwagu, ghaayiinyi ghuutteaba diyeaydida bea samwaguun majeegiin nea gwayi, “Beenni!” Hean ghaadaayi, ak geang'ulayi faraasajeanda duw, nea siida mida badayda gwandeawa gidasigalla haleanjeeda aba geattindaannyi;

ghaayiinyi giduurji nyeashta aba bugusteaba diyeangiga majeekcheewi asang'waniin, nea gwayi, “Gweeriida nngano nea gogween iyyeenya sishaaha dinarajanjagi, ea gweeriida riighu bea nnganooyda suguura shayiiri sishaaha dinaari; ak ea adidattasi, nagheeda ea difaayi!”
Iiduw nea goottin giirooraneedeaba ang'wan, ghaayiinyi ghuutteaba diyeaydida majeek bea ang'waniin nea gwayi, “Beenni!”

Hean ghaadaayi, ak geang'ulayi, faraseeda mur, nea siida mida badayda ea Miyeeda gil, nea goodeayi Gheeda maloonghajeega; ak geattaw uurda appadayda ng'eanyiida hiji mwanang', ak gwanuus aba bwaanga ea geejeeda ea dauni ea diyeanga ng'weani bea ng'eanyiida.
Iiduw nea goottin giirooraneedeaba muut, hean ghaadaayi aba jeeda heeda wagiida guroruunatka fukghayi silajada gheatkweakka appadayda Ng'asheanda Aseetta, ak gamuuwwu ng'asheesu;

goojuur aba ghuuttahaw nea geeyi, “Ea Ng'uttamiida ambaliischi, ghaydit bea huumwa, gajeeyi bwak ea ghoaw eeju nea miyargweaksiina ak giwaldi foojeandeanya appadahuukka fuga mida badayda ng'eanyiida?”
Ak gaba nii siittaw hang'deesh geaw nea geeyeeshsha anyoo ghanyi afuufa ea gameaji gageawiit, ea gwadeayi monneeda bareanda nyaawa was soomjooga ea fuga duupchi jea enuusta gidaghayi sinuusta saawa.
Iiduw nea ghwajaat giirooraneedeaba lah, ghaadaayi, ak geang'ulayi sawooda haw bea ng'eanyiida; ak gwattuudu gheang'da Aseetta ea gawuurji hang'weakka sisna guniya, nea eara sheeda ghawaar foojeanda,
nea miinga humng'eeda gang'adeesa badayda ng'eanyiida gawuurji gidiissa gojiroonda shabongheechcheanda haghweagaaschi damanda gooroogeeda nea gooyuuk jeammeeda;
hean genung'u ghwaroat humng'eeda ea gawuurji gittaabooda sumughut, nea gilwas giija ea ng'eanyiida neaweesa beega gajeanung' ghang'amwa heeda mida.

Nea sugoodiga badayda ng'eanyiida ea fuga hees, ea shirikkaarajeega hees ea meanang'oodiga ea gea mideawa uurjeenga, ea gilwas sih, soomjeanda, ea dea abal geaw, hean gafuysageat jeesinga gwaleadinga ea dageascheeda lagheanga gijeega,

hean gaguursa gijeega ea lagheanga nea gwayeeshsha, “Oppeedeayseasa ak ghoafunyeasa aba madeedeaba gheanyangeaba siitta apteada aba uhuuda hoorgeeda gheambalmeedean, ea aba nyarasta Dayeenda gisilleanda;
aba gideaba eaweetta haw bea nyarasta nyaawa nihidu, ak ea ng'eaha gil jea ghoammu ghamiinaada aba madeeda?”

Iing'atta suu ghaadaayi malaykaji ang'wan nea ghamiinaada aba murdajeega assang'wan bea ng'eanyiida, nea ghwadeal jeammeeda leabu murdajeega assang'wan bea ng'eanyiida, aba gideaba ea mwaghuunna jeammeeda appadayda ng'eanyiida, ghana aba jeeda basooda ghana ghaghuut geetta wassean.

Ghadaayi malaykajeanda nuut nea gwascheang'na heeda arearuuna aseetta, nea gwandeawa giirooraneeda Aseetta majeek, hean gaguurda aba ghuutta haw ak gaguursa malaykajeegiga assang'wan ghayi siittaw uurda jea gwasawana ng'eanyiida ea basoodean,
nea gwayeeshsha, “Adoosawannyi ng'eanyiida ghana basooda ghana geediga, ea eaghus ea siyiinnyi girooraneeda gheamanuunakka soomjooga Aseetteanya.”
Ghaayiinyi monneeda fuga sirroor, fii sagalamnyooji bughala ea haradam ea ang'wan sirroor, aba giliwas eamwa aba jeeda balloojiga Israeeli,
gea emeeda Yuuda gerroor fii sagalamnyooji damaniyyeenya, gea emeeda Ruben sagalamnyooji damaniyyeenya, gea emeeda Gaadi sagalamnyooji damaniyyeenya,
gea emeeda Asheeri sagalamnyooji damaniyyeenya, gea emeeda Naftali sagalamnyooji damaniyyeenya, gea emeeda Manaase sagalamnyooji damaniyyeenya,
gea emeeda Simon sagalamnyooji damaniyyeenya, gea emeeda Laawi sagalamnyooji damaniyyeenya, gea emeeda Isakkaari sagalamnyooji damaniyyeenya,
gea emeeda Sabulooni sagalamnyooji damaniyyeenya, gea emeeda Yooseefu sagalamnyooji damaniyyeenya, gea emeeda Beenjamin sagalamnyooji damaniyyeenya sirroor.

Iing'atta ng'asheesu ghaang'weardi, ak ging'ulayi, ghaadaayi, emeeda saang'a manda siida ammu gwayiida, fuga leabu giliwas daroar ea emoojiga sean ea buuneeda ea iitta nea ghamiinaada aba madeedeaba hoorgeetta bea gheambalmeedean, ea madeeda Dayeenda Gisilleanda, nea gookkwa hang'weakka eashish, nea ghoang'ng'waay damealga milayga aba geattinga nyaawa,
nea goyeawda aba ghuutta haw nea geeyi, “Lealeanooda gaba Aseetteanya apteada aba uhuuda hoorgeeda gheambalmeeda, ea heeda Dayeenda Gisilleanda!”

Abeeda malaykajeega sean ghamiinaada aba murdajeega sean bea hoorgeetta bea gheambalmeedean ea dea gweargwa, ea deaba diyeangiga majeekcheewi asang'waniin, ak goobeedeayi ak ghabwada jeesinga ng'eanyi aba madeedeaba hoorgeetta bea gheambalmeedean ak ghaghadoawan Aseetta
nea gwayi, “Amin! Ghawooda ea gigheambiitta ea weaghuumeeda ea badiischooda ea mureeda ea uurda ea hawunda daba Aseetteanya ea ghoaw damanda manda muudeanooda! Amin.”
Hean gwayeeshshean gweargweenagi, “Fiisu akkeega, akkwa hang'weakka eashish gulng'eanyiin, nea fiisu gwaleabu yeenu?”

Geayeeshshi niny, “Siida mureeda, ginali ang'iing'i.” Hean gwayeeshshean, “Suu fuga leabu jeedeaba sawanadeetta hawiini; ak eanihuun hang'weakka nyaawa geawwi ea ghwanung' gaweeriidi aba foojeanda Dayeenda Gisilleanda.
Ak gwanda madeeda hoorgeeda gheambalmeeda Aseetta,
nea gagadiiyeesa askweari ea eawa aba jeedeaba gheannyi sibatta Aseetta;
ak ninyeeda apteada aba uhuuda hoorgeeda gheambalmeeda gaygookkwa saawa aba gideaba gwanda hiji.
Ak ea maygudu ghwadaa jalooda, ghana ghwaak muwoash gichcha;
ak ea mayghwaak daknooda saawa, ghana gilwas daknooda ng'waan.
Aba gideaba Dayeeneanji bea Gisilleanda mida bugusta hoorgeeda gheambalmeedean gayghoaw jeagiischoochcheanda nyaawa,
ak gaygoodoobiiwseegwa gheang'deenda mida beega mideawa eaweega;
ak Aseetta gaygoobuus dabeakka sean mida gheanyanga nyaawa.”
Iiduw nea goottin Dayeenda Gisilleanda giirooraneedeaba ispwa, hean gwayi humng'eeda saw gheadi nuwaas.
Ak ghaadaayi malaykajeandeaba ispwa nea ghamiinaada aba madeeda Aseetta, ak geattaw saawa durumbeataji ispwa.

Hean ghwahidu malaykajeanda nuut ak ghamiinaada heeda wagiida, nea gwandeawa dabichcheanda sisna lagheanga meeng'meeng'i simmikkisiinda, ak geattaw hideeda ng'andit saang'a ak googuuyi sea mwoshta Aseetta bea fuga sean ghaydidi appadayda heeda wagiida eyda sisna lagheanga meeng'meeng'i mida madeeda hoorgeeda gheambalmeeda;
ng'atta gwadiyeada aroosteaba hideetta ng'andidiin sea mooshta Aseetta bea fuga ghaydidiin aba geattinda malaykajeanda ea ghwahitta madeeda Aseetta.

Iiduw gageanu malaykajeanda dabichcheandida ak ghoannyiit beasta leabu heeda wagiida, ak gwajaksa badayda ng'eanyiida; hean ghwanya nyeashta ea gighweandandeeda humng'eeda, ea nyeashta nea ghoabwaay dadamandeeda, ea sawooda ng'eanyiida.
Ng'atta gwasissin geaw malaykajeandeaba ispwa mideawa durumbeattaji ispwa nea gagasa ghaghuut.

Hean goguul malaykajeanda madeeda, ak ghwahidu roopta lagheanga ea beasta, nea gaguuyi foojeanda, ak goobissa badayda ng'eanyiida; hean ghwaak ng'eanyiida beasta ea eappuut hiji mwanang', ak ghwaak beasta geediga ea ghoabuut suung'ay, nea eara nyeega nyawiiri sean ghwaak beasta.
Ghaghuut malaykajeandeaba iyyeenya durumbeatteadaannyi, hean geejaksa jeeda basooda giduurji giijeeda haw, nea ghwayeada beasta;
nea basooda heeda haw ghoaw foojeanda, nea diyeanga heeda haw majeekcheewi mida gameewa aba jeeda basooda, nea maleambajeega hees genyarjeaweada heeda haw.
Ghaghuut malaykajeandeaba samwagu durumbeatteadaannyi, ak ghang'adaana humng'eeda ming'weanda haw, nea ghwayeatta gheaboong'nyeanda, ak goobissa eeniga heeda haw ea gheanyanga eninga mideawa beega.
Ak gheawungeaba ming'weandida geguura Ng'weaninda, nea beega heessaang'a gang'weaniidi, ak gameewa fuga saang'a appadaydeaba beesu, aba gideaba sinung' gang'weaniidi.

Ghaghuut malaykajeandeaba ang'wan durumbeatteadaannyi, ak geawwiim gheang'da aseetta heeda haw, ak eara gheang'da sheeda geawwiim heeda haw, ak eara gheanyanga miinga geawwiim heeda haw, ak abeeda uurda nyaawa abwaanya geanung' gamisaniit heeda haw; nea askwearjeanda heeda haw ea madakna, ak gwasnu eara eaweeda heeda haw.

Hean ghaang'weardi, ak ghaadaayi rabearda ajuur muuchchi, nea ghang'eatta aba bugusta humng'eeda, nea gwayi, “Ashageada, ashageada, dashageada fuga mida badayda ng'eanyiida, damanda jea ghwanyaasha giguleanda nuut nea niriikghta goguul malaykajeega assamwaguun!”
Hean goguul malaykajeandeaba muut durumbeatteadaannyi, ak ghaadaayi ming'weanda ng'adaana humng'eeda ak goobissa badayda ng'eanyiida, ak geattaw gidajea goottina ghuutta shoomanda mammuudeana;

goottin shoomanda mammuudeana, hean gwarinna aroosta jeedeaba shoomandida, nea gawuurji aroosta duwayda haw, ak ghwanung' gamsaniiti gheang'da aseetta ea humng'eeda aba aroostida bea jeeda shoomandean.
Gwarinna jeedeaba aroostida deashamga ak ghapka badayda ng'eanyiida, hean geattaw uurda uurji dea mideawa udagilbajeega ng'eanyiida;
ak geeyeeshsha adoosawannyi nyeega mida ng'eanyiida ghana gilwassean nyawiish, ghana giliwas geetta geaghus fukka mandeawana giirooraneeda Aseetta aba gheamanuunatka nyaawaan;
geattaw gheatta jea gwasawana saawa sheah muut, ak ea mii gideaba gaygwanuuseada saawa gil, ak sawanadeeda nyaawa gawuurji siida ghanya Udagilba, iighanya siida.
Ak eawoojikka gaygagasa buuneeda miyeeda ak ea mayghwanyas; ak gaygagasa miyeeda, ak gaygamng'aw miyeeda aba madeannyaawa.

Ak sinoodeaba deashamsu gawuurji farasajeega, nea hidaat aba ng'uchcheeda; nea iheenga nyaawa gwanda duguuga uurji shiipka sisna lagheanga meeng'meeng'i; ak gheamanuunaka nyaawa gawuurji gheamanuunaka buuneeda,
nea buudeega nyaawa gawuurji buudeega gadeemga, nea geeshatka nyaawa gawuurji geeshatka ng'adiida;
ak daghanuunatka nyaawa gwadiiy igeambooda injilga uurji gharinnyeanda, nea ghuusiga dabiniga nyaawa gawuurji ghuutta muttukajeega, ea farasajeega saang'a weay ng'uchcheeda nea ghwalamwajaada.
Nea gwandeawa shoomng'eega uurji udagilbajeega, ak gaba halaghweenga, ak uurjeenga nyaawa jea gwasawana buuneeda sheemuut gwanda shoomng'eega nyaawa.

Ak gwandeawa sugoochcheanda ambal saawa was malaykajeanda shoomanda mammuudeana, ak gheawungaaschi aba iitta fuga Ebraniya geguura Abadooni, nea aba ghuutta Yunaani geeguura Appoliyoni. (nea gideaba habitkweeda).
Asi halootta madeeda ning'atta; ng'ulla, gayghwahidu haloochcheew iyyeenya.
Hean ghaghuut malaykajeandeaba lah durumbeatteadaannyi, ak ghaayiinyi ghuutta nyaasha jeedeaba gujakkiga assang'wan bea heeda wagiida eyda meang'meang' mida madeeda Aseettean,
nea gwayeeshsha malaykajeandeaba lah mideawa durumbeattiin, “Siksiina malaykajeekka asang'wan sirassa jeedeenda haw suguura Furatiin.”
Hean geesiksa malaykajeekka assan'gwaniin, ghayi sikghuum ea ghwahitta damandideaniin, ea eaweedida ea sheeda, ea gweayda, ak gwanuus buuneeda heeda haw.
Ak monneeda shirikkareeda mida badayda farasajeega ea sagalamnyooji diktam niba sagalamnyoojiga saang'a meammu eyiida; ghaayiinyi monneeda nyaawa.

Nea nii ea gidadaakti farasajeega gil aba gidasihhiimnaan; fuga mida badahuukka gwadiiy igeamboonda oar beasta nea ghabwada oomnatta ea gikkayda, nea iheenga farasajeega gawuurji sea iheenga ng'annyeekka, ak gwarinna ghuusiga nyaawa beasta ea aroosta ea giikkayda.
Aba nii gwanuus buuneeda heeda haw aba dawni, ea aba beasta ea aroosta ea gikkayda rinna ghuusiga nyaawa.
Aba gideaba uurdeaba farasajeesu gwanda ghuusiga nyaawa ea shoomng'eega nyaawa; aba gideaba shoomng'eega nyaawa gawuurji ichchipkeega, nea gwandeawa iheenga, nea inyeessa gaganyeattiida.

Nea buuneeda mwaatukwa, mwabwara dawni, ghanyea maduukkuunana aba gadiyoojiga nyaawa sin aba geattinga nyaawa ghana ghwanung'waada ghadoowanda meangeenda ea haleanjeeda mawosa Aseetta sisna lagheanga meang'meang'i ea shiliingajeega ea lagheanga areeri ea lagheaneeda ea geetta, nyooea moammu ghoang'wearda ghana ghwayiiy ghana gaweelweel;
ak ea maduukkuuna nuusta nyaawa bea buuneeda, ghana beeneetkuumeeda nyaawa, ghana munyasnachcheekka nyaawa ghana gwadishta nyaawa.

Ng'atta ghaadaayi malaykajeanda nuut mideawa uurda nea ghwararang'aana humng'eeda, nea sikwealsa shamooghooda, nea uhuudaannyi gwanda gidaghuweang'da sheagitka, nea gheamamdaannyi ghawaar aseetta, nea geeshangaaschi gawuurji daranajeega beasta.
Nea gwandeawa gittaabooda mwanang' giittineat aba geattindaannyi. Ak ghoallaabwa geashtaannyi bea geattinda dugwa jeeda basooda, nea geashtaannyi ghaadaam ghoallaabwa badayda ng'eanyiida.
Nea gooyeawda aba ghuutta haw, nea ghwanyaashta daghatta dea ng'adiida; iiduw nea gooyeawda, ghwanya ghuusigeaba gighweendaannyeekiga assispwaan.

Ng'atta nyeashteaba gighweendannyeekiga assispwaan, abeeda ea neagasayi dang'waar, hean ghaayiinyi ghuutta leabu humng'eeda nea gwayi, “Aroora ng'asheesu rugu gighweendannyeekiga assispwaan, ak ea ading'waari.”
Nea malaykajeandida gwachchi adayiin ghamiinaada aba jeeda basooda ea badayda ng'eanyiidean ghamiinda geattindaannyi bea dugwa googeal humng'eeda,

ghwaak habeawooda aba ninnyeeda majeek ea ghoaw damanda manda mudeanooda, ninnyeeda bwat humng'eeda ea haleanjeeda mida jeeda, ea ng'eanyiida ea haleanjeeda mida jeeda, ea basooda ea haleanjeeda mida jeeda, ak ea maygudugwanda shing'deayda,
geaghus aba askwearjoojiga jea ghaghuuda durumbeatti malaykajeandeaba ispwa, abeeda makcheameeda Aseetta aba heeda soomjoagaaschi was sibanga gaygamajeegiit.

Hean gabiikta goobaloolan ghuuttida gwachchi ayiinyi leabu humng'eedean nea gwayi, “Una, ak gigeandi gittaabootta giittineat mida geattindeaba malaykajeandida miinaada appadayda basooda ea badayda ng'eanyiidean.”
Geaweesi malaykajeandida ak geayeeshshi goona gittaaboani mwanang'iin; ak gwayeeshiineen, “Geanda, ak giyaagi; ak gayghang'waaniit aba jeadaang'u, nea aba ghuuttaang'u gajea inyaanda maleeda.”
Geageandi gittaabooda mwanang' aba geattinda malaykajeanda ak ghaayaaji; ak ea inyaanda maleeda aba ghuutteanyu, hean iyaahiichchi agitta ghang'waaniit aba jeedeanyu.
Geyeeshinean, “Gammiiseey rukuta gichcha ramooranga appadayda fuga saang'a ea emoojiga ea iitta ea sugoodiga.”
Ng'atta gegoonan ng'archeanda uurji bileangida sitteenniida, ak gwayeeshshean, “Ng'eada ak gideeni gheeda sibatta Aseetta ea heeda wagiida ea fuga mida jeeda gadoowani Aseetta,
ak ea adiideeni bugharjeanda mida bwadaw bea Aseetta; dakta bwadaw, aba gideeda siittaw daroorakka, ak gayghwadattas mujiineeda ghaydit sheeh haradam ea iyyeenya.
Ak gaydaadaw Muuwshoodigeasu assiyyeenya uurda ak ghwaramwaar eawooji sagalam ea bughalaji iyyeenya ea laadam, nea siikwealsa guniyajeega.”
Suu geedikka assiyyeenya suguura masaytunajeegean gil, ea hoorgajeekka bea gheaboonyanga assiyyeenya miinaada aba madeeda Ng'uttamiida ng'eanyiidean.
Nea siida iigasa gwasawan saawa, gwariinna beasta ghuusiga nyaawa ak ghwaak weajoodiga nyaawa. Ak ghoammu ghwayam beega ghoaw foojeanda, nea iigasa gayghwalas ng'eanyiida aba gilwas lasita.

Saawa gwandeawa uurda jea ghwarada humng'eeda, ak ea mwaroabwana damanda ramwaarana, ak gwandeawa uurda appadayda beega ak ghwayam ghoaw foojeanda, ak ghwalas ng'eanyiida aba giliwas dawni, aba gidagassiida.
Iiduw nea niihiit muuwnooda nyaawa, gaygang'uchchi diyeaydida leabu jeeshoomanda mammudeanean sea saawa, ak gayghwajoar ak gwanuus saawa,
nea muscheekka nyaawa gaygwalil aba ghuutta naweeda mujiineetta hawiin, nea geegala Sodooma ghana Miisri, was heeda ghayi singoorsa Ng'uttamiida nyaawa.
Aba eawooji samwagu ea gil gang'ula headiga buuneeda ea emoojiga ea iitta ea daroorakka gumgeenga nyaawa ak ghaheawa gideaba gajeebuy.

Nea fuga mida badayda ng'eanyiida gaygahoosan appadahuukka nyaawa nea gang'weela ak saawa gweattiisa geat haleanjeeda sippareannyi, aba gideaba sibang'su assiyyeenyean gwasawan fukka mida badayda ng'eanyiidean.

Iing'atta eawooji samwangu eagil hean ghwahidu gisimeanda eaweega leabu heeda Aseetta ak gawa jeannyaawa, hean ghang'eatng'eat ghamiinaada aba geeshanga nyaawa, hean ghang'ut fukka daahiin muuwda haw.
Geeyiy nyeashta haw leabu humng'eeda nea gwayeeshsha saawa, “Apkaani hiji!” Gwadiyeada humng'eeda nea ghabeawa jeeshshamooghooda, nea gang'ula weajoodiga nyaawa.

Nea aba damandida abeeda gwanda sawooda haw bea ng'eanyiida, ak ghoabeada mwaatkweanagi mwanang' bea mujiin; ak gameewa fii sagalamnyooji ispwa aba sawoodida bea ng'eanyiidean, ak ghang'ut muuwda geesippuut, ak ghoaghaambiit Aseetta humng'eeda.
Ning'atta shageatteaba iyyeenya; ng'ulla, niriikghta ghwahidu shageatteaba samwangu.

Ghaghuut durumbeatteadaannyi malaykajeandeaba ispwa, ak ghwanya ghuusiga ajuur aba humng'eeda, nea geeyi, “Sugoochcheandumeeda ng'eanyiida goolla ghoaw sugoochcheandumeeda Ng'uttamiideanya ea dea Gristoydaannyi, ak gaygoombaliischi ea ghoaw damanda manda muudeanooda.”
Ak gwearguga attiktam ea ang'wan abiitbiida hoorgajeega nyaawa bea gheambalmeedean ammadeeda Aseettean goobeedeayi ak ghabwada jeesinga ng'eanyi nea ghamwaash Aseetta,
nea gwayeenna,
“Geebadiischooweey ang'iing'i, Ng'uttamiida was Aseetta mideawa uurda, gindi nea gibean midana,
aba gideaba nigeandi uurdaang'u haw ak giimbaliischi.
Ak gwanyareesi emoojiga, ak ghwahidu nyarastaang'u,
nea ghwahidu damanda jea ergweaksiina fuga nimeewa,
nea geammwaar soomjoogaagu was sibanga ea gea ghaydidi,
ea fukka awali gheawungaaguun, was gea manang'i ea gea hees,
ak geedatas suu datas ng'eanyiidean.”

Ng'atta geettin Gheeda sibatta Aseetta mida humng'eeda, ak geadaah sandakwajeanda digheanda aba jeedeaba gheannyi sibatta Aseetta; abeeda gwanda dadamandeeda, ea nyeashta, ea gighweendandeeda humng'eeda, ea sawooda ng'eanyiida, ea roopta haw muuchchi bea lagheanga.
Ng'atta geadaa gwadeagooda haw aba humng'eeda was gatmooda siikwealsa aseetta, nea gwanda jeeda baneaguukka geeshangaaschi sheeda, nea uhuudaannyi gwanda shiipka miinga attamaniyyeenya;
niny abeeda ea bungaroocheanda gil, ak goyeawda aba lajooda jeatta, ak gwasawana aba jeatta.
Ng'atta geadaah gwadeagooda nuut aba humng'eeda, ng'ulla, hararjooda haw areara, mideawa iheen ispwa ea gujaw damwanamughuush, nea iheenga nyaawa gaba nii mideawa shiip ispwa.

Nea shoomng'eandaannyi goongir miinga humng'eeda heeda haw, ak gwahisa badayda ng'eanyiida. Hean ghamiinaada ichchiboodida aba madeeda gatmoodida riikghta gwaji jeeptean, ak abeeda ghwanukghuta jeaptaannyi damanda jiila;
hean gwaji jeepta was balleanda, ak gayghwaahaaghwa emoojiga sean aba bileangida gharinyeanda, ak jeeptaannyi geettiing'da ea gawa heeda Aseetta ea heeda hoorgeadaannyi bea gheambalmeeda,
iiduw gamng'aw gatmoodida gawa dareapcheeda, nea nisissa Aseetta heechcheagoobiida, ak geerrear ak goobiida hoowa eawooji sagalama ea bughalaji iyyeenya ea laadam.
Ng'atta ghang'eat ng'uchcheeda aba humng'eeda, gang'uchi Mikaeeli ea malaykajeagaaschi sea hararjootta; ak gang'uchi ichchibooda sea saawa ea malaykajeegaaschi,
iiduw geajoar ak ea mudugwanda heechcheagoobida aba humng'eeda.

Ak geejaksa ng'eanyi hararjootta haw was ichchiboodeaba garayiin, suguura Meang'nyeandeenda ea Shattaani, was dea reengani ng'eanyiisseaniin, ak geejagu badayda ng'eanyiida, ak eara malaykajeagaaschi geehisu ghapka ng'eanyi sea niny.

Ak ghaayiinyi nyeashta haw nyaasha humng'eeda nea gwayi, “Ghamneawa lealeanooda ea uurda ea Sugoochcheandumeeda Aseetteanya ea gheambalmeeda Gristoydaanyi nihidu, aba gideaba sijaksa ng'eanyi dea aheakkiida fuga siduupcheewi, ninyeeda aheakkiida aba madeeda Aseetteanya askweari ea eawa.
Ak ghwajoar aba foojeanda Dayeenda Gisilleanda, ea aba ng'asheanda muwuunnooda nyaawa, ak ea mwabwariinya eaweega nyaawa eara gaweayi miyeeda.

Asi ang'weella, Ea humng'eeda, ea agoogeeni ondijeedean! Asi agooga ashageada, Ea ng'eanyiida ea basooda, aba gideaba meang'nyeandeenda nirarang'aan ghwahidu heedeang'wa nea gaba nyarasta haw aba gideaba ghwanal gwandeawa gheadi nuwaas!”
Iiduw nea ghwadaa ichchiboodida gideaba sijaksa badayda ng'eanyiida, hean ghwaat geeshteaba gatmoodida jiih jeepta was balleandean.
Ng'atta geattaw gatmoodida meang'i iyyeenya bea rabearda haw ak ghang'eatta gawa dareapcheeda sheageewa ichchiboodida, ak gawa heeda jea gweagiischi gheadi nuwaas, sheeh haradam ea iyyeenya.
Hean gwarinna ghuutteaba ichchiboodida beega uurji gea enda, appadayda gatmootta, ak ghwanung' ghwaat guldeayda.
Iiduw ghaweat ng'eanyiida gatmooda, ak ghwajaat ng'eanyiida ghuuttaannyi ak ghwanukghta eendida rinna ghuutta ichchiboodean.

Hean gwanyareeksa ichchibooda gatmoodida, ak ghang'eat gawa ghoang'eat ng'uchcheeda sea jeatta siipuut bea gatmoodean, sea fukka ang'ng'waay digheanyeekka Aseetta nea gammuuwu iitta Yeesuun. Ak ghamiinaada appadayda iseaskweanda basooda.
Hean ghaminaada ichchibooda aba ghuutta basooda.

Hean ghaadaayi diyeayda nea ghwadambiir aba jeeda basooda, nea gwandeawa gujaw damwanamughuush ea iheen ispwa, ak gwanda shiip damwanamughuush uhuuda gujakkaaschi ak gwandeawa gheawunga ging'weakka aba iheenga gujakkaaschi.

Nea diyeaydida adaayiin gawuurji mariirda, nea geeshangaaschi gawuurji idamooda, ak ghuuttaannyi gawuurji ghuutta ng'adiida. Ak ghoadaw hararjooda diyeayda uurdaannyi ea hoorgeadaannyi bea sugoochcheandumeeda ea gheambalmeeda haw.
Ghaadaayi uhuunagi aba iheengaaschi gawuurji gili mideawa dearjooda miyeeda, nea deanneandeadaannyi bea miyeeda ea nihaap, ak ghwaat geashta diyeayda ng'eanyiissean aba muuwuda.

Hean ghaghadoowan buuneeda ichchiboodida, aba gideaba niidaw gheambalmeadaannyi diyeayda, hean ghaghadoowan diyeaydida nea gwayi, “Gawuurji ng'eaha diyeayda, ak gayghoammu ng'eaha gang'uchi sea niny?”
Ak geattaw diyeayda ghuutta jea gabaloola ng'asheega hees bea ging'weakka, ak geattaw gheambalmeeda jea gwasna gadiyeadaannyi sheeh haradam ea iyyeenya;
hean ghwajaat ghuuttaannyi gong'eawi Aseetta, nea gong'eawi eara gheawungaaschi ea heeda abiitta, nea gea abiitta humng'eeda.
Ak geesiksa gang'uchi sea fuga ghaydidi ak ghwajoar. Ak geattaw gheambalmeeda appadayda gilinyoo ea emoochean gil ea buuneeda ea iitta ea emoojiga,

nea haleanjeessean mida muunda ng'eanyiida gayghaghadoawan niny, giliwas sih miyeeng'oorsa gheawungaaschi jeeda gittaabooda eaweega bea Dayeenda Gisilleanda ghayi sinuus nea miyeebwat sindeetta ng'eanyiida.
Gilinyoo gwandeawa iitta dayiinya:
Siida wassean iijea gawa ghealooniga,
gaygawa ghealooniga;
siida wassean iilach gheatteaba niirja aba bwaanga,
eara niny gajealach gheatta aba bwaanga.
Nii heeda mida gihang'ooyda ea doobiiwnatta fuga ghaydidi.
Hean ghaadaayi diyeayda nuut siyeeng'u nea gwaleabu badayda ng'eanyiida; nea gwandeawa gujaw iyyeenya nea gawuurji Dayeenda Gisilleanda ak gabaloolda ichchibooda.
Ak gagadiyeatta gheambalmeedeaba diyeaydida bea madeedean iisidaah, ak ghwanung' ghoaghadoawan ng'eanyiida ea fuga mida jeeda diyeaydida bea madeedean, nea dearjoadaannyi bea miyeeda ea nihaap.
Ak gwasin gwadeagwajeega hees, nea iissa ghwanung' ghwararang'aana beasta humng'eeda ak ghwahidu ng'eanyi madeeda buneeeda;
nea aba gwadeagwajeega siittaw gwasin aba madeeda diyeaydean, hean gwareengani fukka mida ng'eanyiidean, ak ghwanung' gwasin giduurji diyeayda silasa bwaanga ak ea gudugwanda;
ak geanung' gaguusa jeammeeda gidida uurji diyeaydean ak abeeda ghoammu gidida uurji diyeaydean gabalool, ak ghwanung' ealajaada gheatkweakka fuga mwaghadoawana gitta uurji diyeaydean.
Hit gageanu sean fuga manang'i ea gea hees, fuga sean was meanang'oodiga ea gea barbari, sean fuga abal geat ea ging'ng'oonyanga, ak geayiin giirooranga geattinda dugwa ghana gheamamuunatka,
ak abeeda ea siida jea ghoammu ghwasha gil ghana ghwashaayda, geaghus gwandeawa giirooraneedida was gheawungeaba diyeaydideaniin, ghana moonneeda gheawungaaschi.
Ak nii geeguura weaghumeeda: ninyeeda mideawa fughareeda jea ghwanal ea dayiitta moonneedeaba diyeanyi, nea nii ea gidittiida buuneeda, nea moonneadaannyi ea bughalaji lah ea laadam ea lah.

Ng'atta ghaang'weardi, ak ghadaayi gwanda uhuuda Giijeeda Sayuun Dayeenda Gisilleanda nea ghamiinaada, nea gwandeayi sea niny fii sagalamnyooji bughala ea haradam ea ang'wan nea gwandeawa gheawungaaschi ea gheawunga Ghwaan nea sung'oorsa gheamamuunatka nyaawa.

Ak ghaayiinyi nyeashta nyaasha humng'eeda uurji nyeashta beega saang'a ak gawuurji nyeashta gighweendandeeda haw; ak nyeashi ayiinyiin gawuurji nyeashta fuga gidondoorajeega las gidondoorajeega nyaawa,

nea gwasarman duumdeesh aba madeeda hoorgeeda gheambalmeeda ea madeedeaba diyeangiga assang'wan majeekcheewiin ea madeeda gweargwa. Ak ea manda siida ammu ghoanal geaw duumdida, geaghus fukka as sagalama ea haradam ea ang'wan ghayi sikghu appadayda ng'eanyiidean.

Suu gea mii ghang'uda geat ririnyeanda aba gadeemga, aba gideaba ea ghaydidi; nea suu ea gea eadageeshta Dayeenda Gisilleanda gil aba hiji wea sean; assuh ea sikghu aba jeeda buuneeda nea gawuurji haghweega madeeda aba heeda Aseetta ea Dayeenda Gisilleanda,
ak ghuusiga nyaawa ea manda ng'uyyeega, aba gideaba gwannya gilimuy.

Hean ghaadaayi malaykajeanda nuut nea ghang'eatta aba bugusta humng'eeda, nea gwandeawa giijasta miy manda muudeanooda jea gwarukwiisa fuga mida muunda ng'eanyiida, ea giliwas eamwa ea emeeda ea iitta ea buuneeda;

ak gwayi aba ghuutta haw, “Oawwala Aseetta nea ghoattawji niny gigheambiitta, aba gideaba damanda girgweageadaannyi nihidu; aghadoawana niny deabwat humng'eeda ea ng'eanyiida, ea basooda ea gheanyanga eenda.”
Gweadu geeshta malaykajeanda nuut bea iyyeenya, nea gwayi, “Niibeadi, Niibeadi Babeleeda haw, aba gideaba ginung' ghwali emoojiga sean difaayeeda gitta igasayi muyiin.”
Gweadu geeshta nyaawa malaykajeanda nuut bea samwagu, nea gwayi aba ghuutta haw, “Giliwassean ighadoawan diyeanyi ea gissirattiida, ak ghwanyas giirooraneeda aba gheamamdaannyi ghana geattindaannyi,

eara niny gayghwali difaayeeda nyarasta Aseetta, sisin nea meekkuuyi gil aba jeeda bayookta nyarastaannyi, anniny gajeesawan aba beasta ea giikkayda aba madeeda malaykajeega ghaydidi, ea madeeda Dayeenda Gisilleanda.

Ak gwadiyeada aroosta sawanadeeda nyaawa eaghoaw gweannyeekka manda muudeanooda; ak ea mayghwanyas fuufta, askweari ghana eawa, nea fuga ghadoawan diyeanyi gil ea gissirattiida, ea giliwas siida wassean mideawa giirooraneeda gheawungaaschi.”
Hiji heeda mida gihang'ooyda fuga ghaydidi gil, nea fuga ang'ng'waay digheanyeekka Aseetta gil ea masaweega Yeesu.

Hean ghaayiinyi ghuutta nyaasha humng'eeda nea gwayi, “Ng'waara ng'asheesu: Ghang'wana siida meah ghamneawa meewsa heeda Ng'uttamiida. Ghang'wana huumwa, gwayi Gurorooda, ak gafuuf iing'atta gadiyeeda nyaawa, aba gideaba sinaweega nyaawa ghwaat geeshta!”

Hean ghang'weardi ak ghaadaayi shamooghooda eesh, nea uhuudeaba shamooghooni goopteada siida uurji balleanda siida, nea uhuudaannyi gwanda shiipka lagheanga meeng'meeng'i, nea gwanda geattindaannyi barda ng'aniip.

Gwarinna jeeda gheeda sibatta Aseetta malaykajeanda nuut, ak gaguurda aba ghuutta haw, gaguursa siitta apteada aba uhuudeaba shamooghoodean, “Adealda bardaang'u, ak guwi laja, aba gideaba booga ng'eanyiida niheas.”
Hean siitta apteada appadayda shamooghoodean gwajaksa bardaannyi badayda ng'eanyiida, ak gealach ng'eanyiida.
Ng'atta gwarinna malaykajeanda nuut jeeda gheeda sibatta Aseetta mida humng'eeda, anniny gwandeawa barda ng'aniip.

Ak gwarinna malaykajeanda nuut heeda wagiida, nea dea burdeawa uurda beasta gil, ak gaguursa dea mideawa bardida ng'aniibiin aba ghuutta haw nea gwayeeshsha, “Geanni bardida ittaang'u ng'aniibiin ak gibinni dayeega msabiibooda ng'eanyiida, aba gideaba haghweagaaschi niheas.”
Hean gwajaksa malaykajeandida bardaannyi badayda ng'eanyiida ak gaptu msabiibooda badayda ng'eanyiida, ak gwajaksa sabiibu jeeda shoomanda haw simurriisa difaayeeda nyarasta Aseetta;

ng'atta geadattas gitta muura difaayiin aba jarooda heeda mawosa mujiini, hean gwarinna foojeanda jeedeaba gitta muura difaayiin, ea gageawiit ea gooyang'da ghealooda faraasi, ea gooyang'da gilomittaji bughalaji iyyeenya ea seedam ea damwallah.
Hean ghaadaayi gwadeagooda nuut aba humng'eeda, nea ahaw ak daamdaamwaat, malaykaji ispwa mideawa sawanaduut ispwa was gea huydean, aba gideaba appadaydeaba suuh niduulean nyarasta Aseetta.

Ghaadaayi giduurji basooda giyoo guuyi beasta, ak fukka joar diyeayda ea gissirattiidean ea monneeda gheawungaaschi, nea ghamiinaada aba murdeeda basoodida bea giyoohiin, nea gwandeawa gidondoorajeega Aseetta aba geattinga nyaawa.
Ak gwasarman duumda Muusa, was soomjeanda Aseetta, ea duumda Dayeenda Gisilleanda, nea geeyi,
“Gadiyoojigaagu isinayi ea hees nea deamdeameadi,
Ea Ng'uttamiida was Aseetta Hoauur!
Naweadingaagu doobiiwnatta gil ea huumwa,
Ea Sugoocheanda gweannyeekka sean!
Ngeaha gil deamoawalnyi ak ghoaghaambiit gheawungaagu, Ea Ng'uttamiida?
Aba gideaba ang'iing'i guwasi ghaydit nea gibwageaw.
Aba gideaba gayghapka emoojiga sean ak ghaghadoawannyi,
aba gideaba girgweageadaang'u siittaajiit.”
Ng'atta ng'asheesu ghang'weardi ak ghaadaayi gheeda sibatta Aseetta bea maheemajeanda bea muuwunooda mida humng'eeda nea nijaada,
ak gwarinna jeeda gheeda sibatta Aseetta malaykaji ispwa nea gwandeawa sawanaduut ispwa, nea gookkwa hang'weakka miyaas meeng'meeng'i, nea daghanuunatka nyaawa ea sirat aba ghealooda meang'meang'.

Hean gageanu akkalealla aba jeedeaba diyeangiga assang'wan majeekcheewiin ak ghoadaw malaykajeekka assispwaan gweeraji ispwa sisna lagheanga meeng'meeng'i nea ghwanyiit nyarasta Aseetta majeek ea ghoaw damanda manda muudeanooda;

ng'atta geannyiit gheeda sibatta Aseetta aroosta leabu heeda gigheambiitta Aseetta ea dea leabu uurdaannyi, ak ea manda eara siyagi ammu gawa jeeda gheeda sibatta Aseetta ea eaghus ghwahit sawanaduutkiga assispwa bea malaykajeekka assispwaan.

Hean ghaayiinyi ghuutta haw nyaasha jeeda gheeda sibatta Aseetta nea gwayeeshsha malaykajeekka assispwaan, “Aweayeena ak ghoahhiidi gweerajeekka as ispwa bea nyarasta Aseetta mida badayda ng'eanyiidean.”

Gawa malaykajeanda madeeda ak ghoahiida gweeriidaannyi aba badayda ng'eanyiida, hean ghoaptu deanneaduuktka munyas bea ririnnyeanda mideawa giirooraneedeaba diyeadideani ak ghaghadoawan gitta sirattiida ninyiin.
Nea malaykajeandida bea iyyeenyean goohiisa gweeriidaannyi jeeda basooda, ak ghwayamwa gawuurji foojeanda siida meah, hean gameewa haleanjeesean mideawa eaweega mida jeeda basooda.
Gohiida malaykajeandida bea samwaguun gweeriidaannyi jeeda eeniga ea gheanyanga beega, ak ghoaw foojeanda.
Ak ghaayiinyi malaykajeanda ambal beega nea gwayi,
“Ang'iing'i guwosi doabiiwaat aba girgweaguutkaagu,
ang'iing'eeda indi nea ghayi gindi, Ea Dea assagi Ghaydit.
Aba gideaba buuneeda niihiida foojeanda fuga ghaydidi ea gea Sibanga,
ak anidawi saawa foojeanda ghwali.
Ak ea gidamiisa!”
Ak ghaayiinyi heeda wagiida nea gooyeawda, nea gwayi,
“Huumwa gil Ng'uttamiida was Aseetta mideawa uurda,
girgweaguutkaagu huumwa gil nea ghwadoabiiw!”
Gohiisa malaykajeandida bea ang'waniin gweeriidaannyi badayda aseetta, ak geenung' ghaghwarda buuneeda aba beasta;
ak geaghwarda buuneeda aba beasta ng'waan, ak ghamwaashta saawa gheawunga Aseetta mideawa uurda appadaydeaba sawanaduussu, ak ea madauukkuunana ak ghoadaw niny gigheambiitta.

Gohiisa malaykajeandida bea muudiin gweeriidaannyi badayda hoorgeeda gheambalmeedeaba diyeaydida, ak geenung' gamsaniit sugoochcheandumeadaannyi; hean ghwanyeannyea buuneeda ng'ushapkeakka nyaawa aba silalga
ak ghamwaashta Aseetta humng'eeda aba sawanaduutka nyaawa ea deanneaduutka nyaawa, ak ea maduukkuunana sinaweega nyaawa.
Gohiisa malaykajeandida bea lahiin gweeriidaannyi jeeda eenda haw suguura Efrattiin, hean ghwajaam beagaaschi, ak geesissin naweeda sugoodiga leabu heeda ghayeawa.
Ng'atta ghaadaayi, ng'asheega rinna ghuutta ichchibooda ea ghuutta diyeayda ea gea ghuusiga sibanga ng'uyyeega, ea guroruunat samwagu munyas uurji udagheambagajeamajeega;

suu guroruunatka meangeenda gil, sina gwadeagwajeega, inyeessa gwaritta ak gaweesa sugoodiga mida gigheawda bea ng'eanyiissean, ak ghoamughuush saawa aba ng'uchcheedida aba eaweetta haw bea Aseetta Hoauuriin.
“Asi, gaydoanda mareanghweanda! Ghang'wana siida majeek, nea ghaghamwat hang'weakaaschi ak ea mawa nea dawiish ak geadaa baspaseagaaschi!”
Ak goomuguushsa saawa hiji suguura aba ghuutta Ebraniya Armagedooni.
Gohiisa malaykajeandida bea ispwaan gweeriidaannyi humng'eeda, ak gwarinna nyeashta haw jeeda gheeda sibatta Aseetta, heeda hoorgeeda gheambalmeeda, nea gwayi, “Nigeawiit gwasa!”

Hean gwardu dadamandeeda, ea nyeashta, ea gighweendandeeda, ea sawooda haw bea ng'eanyiida dea eara heeda ghayi miigwardu dea uurji nii dea niibiideewa buuneeda badayda ng'eanyiida, aba gideaba sawooni bea ng'eanyiidean ahaw.
Hean gwaheelli mujiineetta hawiin niba samwagu, ak ghoabeada mujiinajeega emoojiga, ak ghwaapkaat Aseetta Babelooneetta hawiin, ak geattaw gweeriida difaayeeda nyarastaannyi.
Gilinyoo ea ng'eanyiida neaweesa beega gaygamng'aw, ak ea manda giijeega jea gudeadaah;

hean gang'adeesa buuneeda roopta haw bea lagheanga durmani muuchchi, ak goobitpissa buuneeda nea gwaleabu humng'eeda, ea eeyi bwak ea ghamwaashta buuneeda Aseetta aba sawanadeeda nyas aba lagheanga, ak ghoabeal fih sawanadeedida.
Hean ghwahidu malaykajeanjagi bea jeedeaba giikka assispwa mideawa gweeraji ispwaan ak gwayeeshinean, “Beenni, gaydaahiimneey girgweaksiinda hiseadayda haw abiitta badayda beega saang'aan,
nea nihiseada sea sugoodiga badayda ng'eanyiida, ak gea mida badayda ng'eanyiida ea niboogit aba difaayeeda hiseadayeandumeadaannyi.”

Hean ghwaadan aba jeeda Gurorooda ea dawa dareapcheeda, ak ghaadaayi gatmooda nea goopteada aba badayda diyeayda areara nea ghwannyiit saseeda gheawunga ging'weakka, nea gwandeawa iheen ispwa ea gujaw damwanamughuush.

Ak gatmoodida ea niikwa hang'da oomu ea dea areara, nea siittaamdaamwa lagheanga meeng'meeng'i ea gea haw sheayeat ea sageekka, ak gwanda geattindaannyi bayookta mida lagheanga meeng'meeng'i biissa ghwanyiit ng'asheega munyas ea ririnyeanda hiseadayeandumeadaannyi;
ak gheamamdaannyi geeng'oorsa gheawunga makcheameeda, “Babelooneeda haw, gheamatta fuga hiseada bea ng'asheega munyas bea ng'eanyiida.”
Ghaadaayi gatmoodida, nea niboogit aba foojeanda fuga ghaydidi sea foojeanda sinuus appadayda Yeesu.
Hean nea ghaadaayi gatmoodida ghahamwan ng'eanyi gidahaw.
Hean gwayeeshinean malaykajeanda, “Ghwasaan anda gihami ng'eanyi? Gaydarukuneey makcheameedeaba gatmoani, ea dea diyeayda mideawa iheen ispwa ea gujaw damwanamughuush aat gatmooniin.

Diyeaydideani idaahiin abeeda gwanda, ak ea mandana, ak gaygwadiyeanna uutta shoomanda mammudeana ak gawa heeda ng'asheega munyas. Ak fuga mida badayda ng'eanyiida miyeeng'oorsa gheawunga nyaawa jeeda gittaabooda eaweega dea sibwada sindeetta ng'eanyiida, gayghahamng'eanyi idaa diyeaydida. Aba gideaba gwanda, ak ea mandana ak gayghwahidu.
Ak nii geeguura heeda fughareeda mida weaghuumeeda: iheengiga as ispwaan gijeaga as ispwa apteadawa gatmoani gil;
ak gwanda eara sugoodi ispwa, nea muut aba jeannyaawa ea niibeada, akkalleala gwanda, ak niirja ea miighwahidu, nea iihidu gayghwashng'u gilinuwaas.
Nea diyeaydida mida ak ea mandanean, niny deaba sissi ak niny gaba jeedeaba giikka assispwaan, ak niny gawa jeeda ng'asheega munyas.

Ak gujakkiga attamwanamughuush idaahiin ea sugoodiga attamwanamughuush gil, was gea miighoang'ng'waay uurda sugochcheandumeeda, ak ea ninyas gheambalmeeda gawuurji sugoodiga aba aseadeanagi, sea diyeayda.
Saawa gaba fughareanagi ak saawa ghoadaw diyeaydida uurda nyaawa ea gheambalmeeda;

ak suu gaygang'uchi sea Dayeenda Gisilleanda, ak gayghwajoar Dayeenda Gisilleanda saawa, aba gideaba niny Ng'uttamiida ng'uttamoojiga gil ea Sugoochcheanda sugoodiga, ak suu mideawa ninyiin ea gea geguursa gea suloat ea gea doobiiweadi.”
Hean gwayeeshshinean, “Beegigeani idaahiin, bea heeda apteadawa hiseadaydideaniin, ada buuneeda gil ea emoojiga ea iidiga.
Ak gujakkiga attamwanamughuushi idaahiin, ea diyeaydida ak gayghwasit hiseadaydida ak gajeenung' ghang'ut salgheang'da nea dawiish, ak gajeeyaak banyeagaaschi ak gajeenung' gamurjan aba beasta,
aba gideaba Aseetta niyiin guroruunatka nyaawa ak ghwasareanda gidagasiida nea gaba fughareanagi ak ghoadaw diyeaydida uurda sugoochcheandumeeda nyaawa, ea gwasa ng'asheega Aseetta.
Ak gatmoodida idaahiin ea mujiineetta hawiin gil mideawa gimbaliischooda appadayda sugoodiga badayda ng'eanyiideani.”
Iing'atta suu ghaadaayi malaykajeanda nuut nea ghwararang'aana humng'eeda, nea gwandeawa gheambalmeeda haw; ak ghoabwaay ng'eanyiida gigheambiittaannyi.
Hean gaguurda aba nyeashta haw nea gwayi,
“Niibeadi, niibeadi Babelooneeda haw!
Niwosi heeda jea goobiida meang'ngeenda,
ak ea heeda abiitta gilinyoo ea gurorooda muyi,
ea heeda abiitta gilinyoo ea dariideanda muyi;
aba gideaba emoojiga sean nili difaayeeda ng'asheagaaschi munyas gaseadayyi,
ak eara sugoodiga ng'eanyiida nihiseada sea niny,
nea fuga ageakshi bea ng'eanyiida ea ninyas meanang'oochcheandumeeda aba uurda hiseadayeandumeadaannyi.”
Hean ghayiinyi ghuutta nuut nyaasha humng'eeda nea gwayi,
“Aritteawana headaannyi, fugeasu,
adooguuyeewi ring'eedaannyi,
adiiduw ghoanyaschi sawanaduutkaaschi;
aba gideaba ring'eadaannyi sijip ea ghwahitta humng'eeda,
ak eanipkaat ng'asheagaaschi munyas Aseetta.
Oattawa siida gidagoneegwa niny,
ak ghoattawji niny niba iyyeenya aba sinaweagaaschi;
Okkuuyeena nibiyyeenya aba badaydeaba niny aba jeeda bayookta aguuyeesa niny.
Aba gidaghambiitta geaw niny nea gwanda jeeda hiseadayeandumeeda,
ottawa niny gheadeendida was sawanadeeda ea giiseaneegean.
Aba gideaba gwayi niny aba jeadaannyi, ‘Neapteadi sugoochcheanda was gatmooda
nea meawosi masinung'weanda, ak ea maydadaa giiseaneega,’
aba gideaba sawanaduutkaaschi gayghwahidu eaweechanjagi,
miyeeda ea giiseaneega ea jalooda,
nea niny gajeenung' ghwaak beasta;
aba gideaba Ng'uttamiida was Aseetta gwandeawa uurda ak gaygoorgweaksa niny.”
Nea sugoodiga ng'eanyiida, hiseada abeeda gwahiseada sea niny, gaygooyeawda nea gaguuttu heareega appadaydeaba niny iidaa aroosta beasta sighwardaawa niny;
ak gayghamiinaada nea sheagi, aba muwda sawanadeadaannyi, nea gwayi,
“Eamuy daannyi! eamuy daannyi! mujiineetta hawiin,
mujiineeda Babelooni mideawa uurda!
Aba gideaba jeemba aseadeenagi gayghwahidu girgweaksiindaang'u.”
Ak fuga ageakshachi bea ng'eanyiida gaygooyeawda nea gaguut heareega appadaydaannyi aba gideaba manda siida jea gutghwasha haleanjeannyaawa,

haleanjeeda sisna lagheanga meeng'meeng'i, ea lappiya, ea lagheanga hees sheayeat ea sageekka, ea hang'weakka miyaas bumbuni, gea oomng'i ea gea buudeega ea gea areeri, ea geetta hideeda, ea gilinyoo ea dabichcheanda sisna gujaweeda gil, ea gilinyoo ea dabichcheanda geetta haw sheayeat gil, ea dea gharinyeanda areara, ea gharinyeanda ea lagheanga suguura marumaru,

ea geetta ng'andit suguura mdalasiini, ea geediga ng'andidi siyiina jeeda nyeanyiida, ea hideeda ng'andit, ea nagheeda ng'andit, hideeda ng'andit bea dumbeecheanda, ea difaayi, ea nagheeda, ea dearanga miyaas bea ngano, ea dugwa ea gisilga, ea farasajeega, ea muttukwajeega, ea ging'ng'oonyanga, nea guroruunatka buuneeda.
“Haghweega bwariiy jeadaang'u ninung'useey heeda,
ea hamichchoojigaagu ibwariinyi ea haleanjeeda miyeenooda nirooda aba headaang'u, ak ea maygudu ebiikta gichcha eanyas!”
Ak fuga ageakshachchi aba haleanjeeni, ghayi nyasa meanang'oochcheanduumeeda headaannyi, gayghamiinaada nea sheagi, aba muuwda sawanadeadaannyi, hean gooyeawda nea gaguuttu heareega aba ghuutta haw,
“Dashageada, dashageada, mujiineetta hawiin
siikwealsa hang'da bumbun miyiin, ea hang'weakka omng'i ea gea areeriin,
nea geetaamdaam aba lagheanga meeng'meeng'i, ea lagheanga sheayeeda haw, ea sageekka!
Aba jeemba aseadeanagi haleanjeeni seaniin sihista.”
Ak fuga sean ambal maleambajeega ea fuga weay bareanyeekka aba maleambooda ea gearnoodiga maleambooda ea fuga ageakshi aba jeeda basooda, hean ghamiinaada nea sheagi
gooyeawda iidaa aroosta beasta sighwardaawa niny,
“Ana mujiinajaan gil uurji mujiineani hawiin?”
Hean gwajaksa iheenga nyaawa birjeanda, ak gooyeawda nea gagiisan, hean gooyeawda nea gwayi,
“Dashageada, dashageada, mujiineetta hawiin
nea gea mideawa maleambajeega hees aba jeeda basooda ghwanyas baruureega aba meanang'oochcheandumeadaannyi!
Ak aba jeemba aseadeanagi ea sijakta.
Ahoosana appadaydaannyi, Ea humng'eeda,
Ea fuga ghaydidi ea giijasoodiga ea sibanga,
aba gideaba Aseetta nugoneegwa girgweaksiinda appadaydaannyi!”
Hean gagatgat malaykajeanjagi mideawa uurda, lagheaneeda uurji lagheaneeda haw bea ng'ealdeayda ak gwajaksa jeeda basooda, nea gwayi,
“Asi gajeejakseey ng'eanyi Babelooneetta was mujiineeda hawiin aba nyarasta,
ak ea maygudeebiikta eadaah;
ak eara ghuusiga fuga mideawa gidondoorajeega ea gea sarman, ea gea seawiir ea gea aguul,
ea maygudu eebiikta eeyiing'sa jeadaang'u earahay;
ghana siida geariir aba giliwas gearinda
maygudu eanyasa jeadaang'u earahay;
ghana ghuutta lagheaneeda ng'ealshi
maygudu eyiing'sa jeadaang'u earahay;
ak eara weeshinda gheaboong'nyeanda
ea maygudu gabiikta ghoabwaay aba jeadaang'u earahay;
ak eara ghuutta siida geeshshi ea dea gatmooda sighi
maygudu ebiikta eyiing'sa jeadaang'u earahay;
aba gideaba fiisu ikaagu ageakshiin ghayi saawa fuga hees bea ng'eanyiida gil,
ak emoojiga sean easireengani aba beneetkweandumeadaang'u.
Nea jeadaannyi geenyasa foojeanda sibanga ea gea fuga ghaydidi,
ea gea fuga ghayi sinuus appadayda ng'eanyiida.”
Ng'atta ng'asheesu ghaayiinyi ghuutta haw uurji dea emeeda saang'a aba humng'eeda, nea gwayi, “Haleeluuya! Lealeanooda ea giigheambiitta ea uurda gaba Aseetteanya,

aba gideaba girgweageadaannyi dea huumwa gil nea doabiiwaat; aba gideaba nirgweaksa hiseadaydida hawiin ghayi datas ng'eanyiida aba hiseadayeandumeandaannyiin, ak ea niwalda appadaydaannyi foojeanda soomjoogaaschi.”
Geebiikta gichcha echchuur nea geeyi, “Haleluuya! Aroosta leabu heedeaba gatmoodida gwadiyeada ea ghoaw damanda manda muudeanooda.”
Nea gweargiga at diktam ea ang'waniin sea diyeangiga assang'wan majeekcheewiin goobeedeayi ak ghoaghadoawan Aseetta apteada appadayda hoorgeeda gheambalmeeda nea gwayi, “Amin. Haleluuya!”

Hean gwarinna ghuutta nyaasha jeedeaba hoorgeetta bea gheambalmeedean nea gwayi, “Edumsheesiina Aseetteanya, agoogeani sean owaschi soomjoagaaschiin, agoogeeni owalli gheang'daanyiin, was gea manang'i ea gea hees.”
Hean ghaayiinyi ghuutta uurji dea emeetuw, ak ghwanyaashta ghuutta beega saang'a ak gabiissa ghwanyaashta dea gighweandandeeda haw nea gwayi,
“Haleluuya! Aba gideaba Ng'uttamiida was Aseetteanya Hoauur nimbaliischi.
Asi ehoosana nea geeng'weelayi nea geattawji gigheambiitta, aba gideaba geeshshooda Dayeenda Gisilleanda nihidu, ak eara gatmoadaannyi ea nisissin geaw ea ghwahit;
ak ea sikwealsa hang'weakka miyaas bumbuni, meang'meang' nea miyaas,” aba gideaba hang'weakka miyaas sinaweega doabiiw bea fuga ghaydidi gil.
Hean gwayeeshshean malaykajeanda, “Ng'waara ng'asheesu: Ghang'wana fukka suguursa hamitta geshshooda Dayeenda Gisilleandean.” Ak gwayeeshshinean, “Suu ng'asheega huumwa bea Aseetta.”

Ak geabeedeaysi madeeda geeshangaaschi ak ghaaghadoowannyi niny hean gwayeeshshinean, “Adiiduw gisni ng'asheesu! Aniini geawoschi soomjeanda sea ang'iing'i sea fuga iduupcheewi mideawa muuwunooda Yeesu. Ghadoawana Aseetta.” Aba gideaba muuwunooda Yeesu gurorooda sibaneandumeeda.
Hean ghaadaayi nea ghwajaada humng'eeda, ak ghaadaayi, faraseedeesh! Nea gwanda badaydaannyi siida suguura Doobiiwnatta ea Huumwa, ak niny aba doobiiwnatta goorgweaksa nea gwasin ng'uchcheeda.
Ak gheanyangaaschi gawuurji ngu'shapta beasta, ak uhuudaannyi gwanda shiipka saang'a; ak gheawunga sung'waar mwanala eara sih geaghus niny.
Ak niny ea sikwealsa hang'da sing'uda foojeanda, ak gheawungaaschi geeguura Ng'asheanda Aseetta.
Nea ghwaat geeshta Lugooda humng'eeda, nea gookkwa hang'weakka bumbuni, eashis nea miyaas, ak ghwaat geeshta farasajeega eeshish.

Ak gwarinna bwaangeeda ng'aniip ghuuttaannyi jea ghabwara emoojiga, ak gayghoahaaghwiida saawa bileangida gharinyeanda; nea niny ghoallapta ng'eanyi shoomanda difaayeeda bea nyarasta haw bea Aseetta Hoauur.
Ak badayda hang'daannyi ea gibeestaannyi geeng'oorsa, gheawunga Sugoochcheanda sugoodiga ea Ng'uttamiida ng'uttamoojiga.

Hean ghaadaayi malaykajeanda nea ghamiinaada aba badayda aseetta, nea goojuur aba ghuutta haw nea gwayeeshsha dariidakka ng'eatng'eatta aba bugusta humng'eeda, “Apkaani, abwada geat aba ghweelmeeda haw bea Aseetta,

ak ghoayaaji sasanuukka sugoodiga, ea sasanuukka shirikkaarajeega hees, ea sasanuukka fuga mideawa uurjeenga, ea sasanuukka farasajeega ea gea fuga ding'da, ea sasanuukka buuneessean, sea siida abal geaw ea ging'ng'oonyaneeda, dea mwanang' ea dea haw.”
Hean ghaadaayi diyeayda ea sugoodiga ng'eanyiida ea shirikkaarajeega nyaawa nea ghabwat geat nea gagasa gang'uchchi sea siitta apteada aba badayda farasin sea shirikkaareadaannyi.

Hean geang'ng'waay diyeaydida, sea sibaneeda ng'uyyeega ghayi sina gwadeagwajeega ammadeadaannyi, ak gwareengani fukkeanji ghayi ning'ng'waay giirooraneedeaba diyeaydida ea fukka ghadoawan gidasirattiida ninyiin. Hean geejaksa suu assiyyeenyean jeeda basooda beasta nea majeekcheewi ak ghwaak beasta ea giikkayda.
Ak giikka sippuudiin geenuseadawa bwaangeedeaba siitta apteada aba badayda faraasiin, aba bwaangeeda rinna ghuuttaannyi; hean gwalang'u dariidakka sean aba banyeega nyaawa.
Hean ghaadaayi malaykajeanda nea ghwararang'aana humng'eeda, nea ghoang'ng'waanya geadi gidasiittinna shoomanda mammuudeana ea munyaloalajeanda haw.
Ak ghoang'ng'waay ichchibooda was ichchiboodida bea garayiin was meang'nyeandeenda ea Shattaani, ak ghwarada gweanyeew sagalama,

ak gwajaksa niny jeeda shoomanda, hean gwadukuta ak ghwayiin giroraneeda badaydaannyi, aba gideaba maygabiikta gichcha gwareengani emoojiga, ea ghang'atta gweannyeew sagalama. Amang'atta hiji gajeettin gilinuwaas.

Hean ghaadaayi hoorgajeega gheambalmeeda, nea goobiitbiida badahuukka fuga jea goorgweach. Ak ghaadaayi guroruunatka fuga ghayi silajaada gheatkweaka aba badayda muwunnooda Yeesu ea appadayda ng'asheanda Aseetta, ea giikka ghayi mii ghaghadoawan diyeaydideaniin ghana gitta sirattiidean nea miighwanyas giroraneadaannyi aba gheamamuuunatka nyaawa, ghana geattinga nyaawa. Ak gwaduuttu, ak goombaliischi sea Gristo gweannyeew sagalam.
Ak muscheekkiga siippuudiin ea mabiikta gwaduuttu ea ghang'atta gweannyeew sagalam. Nii duunooda madeeda gil.

Ghang'wana nea ghaydit siida mida jeeda duunnooda madeeda! Appadahuukkeaba fiisu miyeedeaba iyyeenya manda uurda ak gayghoaw ashoohoodiga Aseetta ea gea Gristo, ak gaygoombaliischi sea niny gweannyeew sagalam.
Ak iyasha gweannyeew sagalama, gajeettin Shattaani gwarinna ghealoonigaaschi
ak gayghwahidu ak gwareengani emoojiga mida murdajeega assang'wan bea ng'eanyiida, ak ea, Googu gil ea Magoogu, ak ghoawaam saawa aba ng'uchcheeda; nea monneeda nyaawa gwadeenna iseaskweanda basooda.
Hean ghwascheang'da gaweay badayda ng'eanyiida ak geneaweesa gealga fuga ghaydidi ea mujiineetta subwariiyiin; hean ghwararang'aan beasta leabu humng'eeda ak ghwaak saawa,
ak geejaksa meang'nyeandida reengani saawaan jeeda basooda beasta ea giikkayda heeda mida diyeaydida ea sibaneeda ng'uyyeega, ak gajeesawan askweari ea eawa ea ghoaw damanda manda muudeanooda.
Hean ghaadaayi hoorgeeda haw eesh bea gheambalmeeda ea siida apteadawa uhuuda; nea madeadaannyi gamng'aw ng'eanyiida ea humng'eeda, ak ea meadaaha heeda jea goobiida.

Hean ghaadaayi fuga nimeewa, gea hees ea gea manang'i, nea ghamiinaada aba madeeda hoorgeeda gheambalmeeda, hean geettin gittaabwajeega. Ak geettin gittaabwajeanda nuut, nea gittaabooda eaweega gil. Ak geergweaksa fukka nimeewean aba ng'asheega sing'oorsa jeedeaba gittaabajeekka, giduurji gidaghayi nisin.
Gooruudu basooda fuga nimeewa mida jeadaannyi, ak gooruudu miyeeda ea Gheeda maloonghajeega fuga nimeewa mida jeadaannyi, ak geergweaksiina sean gidaghayi nisin.
Hean geejaksa miyeeda ea Gheeda maloonghajeega jeedeaba basoodida bea beastean. Nea nii ea miyeedeaba iyyeenya gil, basooni bea beastean;
Ak gilwas sih iimiyeeng'oorsa gheawungaaschi jeeda gittaabooda eaweega, hean geejaksa jeedeaba basoodida bea beastean.
Hean ghaadaayi humng'eeda eesh ea ng'eanyiida eesh; aba gideaba humng'eeda madeeda ea ng'eanyiida madeeda goolla ghang'atta, ak basooda ea mudugwanda.
Ak ghaadaayi mujiineeda ghaydit, was Yerusaleemooda eesh, nea ghwararang'aana humng'eeda heeda Aseetta, nea hidaat gawuurji sibeeda siittaamdaam aba siyeeda;

hean ghaayiinyi ghuutta haw nyaasha heeda hoorgeedida bea gheambalmeedean nea gwayi, “Ng'ulla, giibinda Aseetta gwandeayi sea buuneeda. Ak gaygwasin giibindaannyi sea saawa, ak gayghoaw fugaaschi ak Aseetta niny gaygwandeayi sea saawa;
ak gaygoobuus giliwas dabeakka aba gheanyanga nyaawa, ak ea maygudu gwanda miyeeda, ghana giiseaneega ghana shookka ghana sawanadeeda, maygutgwanda aba gideaba, ng'asheega madeeda goolla ghang'atta.”

Ng'atta gwayi siitta apteada aba badayda hoorgeeda gheambalmeedean, “Ng'ulla, gaydanung'u gaweeriidi haleanjeessean.” Ak gwayi gichcha, “Ng'waara ng'asheesu, aba gideaba ng'asheesu doobiiwanatta gil ak ea huumwa.”
Ak gwayeeshinean, “Nisa! Gideaba Aniini geawoschi Alfa ea Omeega, ging'eetta ea huydeanda. Siida bearji muwoosh gaydaadaw mwadaagha beega leabu gheang'deenda mideawa eaweega.
Nea dea jooriischi gaygwahearan haleanjeeni, ak gaydoaw Aseettaannyi nea niny gayghoaw balleandeanyu.

Ak gea giyoonnyi, ea gea mandeawana masaweega, ea gea ririnnyeanda, ea gea nuusa buuneeda, ea gea hiseada, ea beeneediga, ea gea gadoowani gida mawosa aseetta, ea gea naba ng'uyyeega sean, heennyaawa jeeda basooda yeada beasta gil ea giikkayda, nea nii ea miyeedeaba iyyeenya.”

Hean ghwahidu malaykajeanjagi bea jeedeaba giikka as ispwaan nea gwandeawa gweeraji ispwa nyiit sawanaduut ispwa huydean ak goobaloolan, nea gwayi, “Beenni hiji, ak gaydaahiimneeyi sibeeda, was gatmooda Dayeenda Gisilleanda.”
Hit ghwaadan aba Gurorooda ea ghoahiitanaan giijeeda haw, geaw, ak ghoahiimnaan mujineeda ghaydit was Yerusaleemu nea ghwararang'aana humng'eeda heeda Aseetta,
nea gwandeawa giigheambiitta Aseetta, ak weeshindaannyi gawuurji lagheaneeda haw sheayeat, gawurji lagheaneeda mur, ak ea miyaas nea ghameang'meang',

abeeda gwanda ghamarda haw, geaw, mideawa ghuusi damaniyyeenya, ak gidaghuudajeesu gwanda malaykaji damaniyyeenya, nea gidaghuudajeesu ea sing'oorsa gheawunga emooji damaniyyeenya was balloojiga Israeeli;
meatkweeda ghayeawa gwanda gidaghuudaji samwagu, wilooda ng'eanyiida ghayeawa gwanda gidaghuudaji samwagu, wilooda ng'eanyiida biyeara gidaghuudaji samwagu, heeda biyeara gwanda gidaghuudaji samwagu.
Ak ghamarda mujiini abeeda gwandeawa sindeechcheewi damaniyyeenya, ak badaydeaba sindeechcheekkiga gwanda gheawun damaniyyeenya bea giijasoodikka attamaniyyeeenya bea Dayeenda Gisilleandean.
Nea siitta abaloolaniin abeeda gwandeawa bileangida sisna lagheanga meeng'meeng'i, jea goodeena mujiineedida ea gidaghuudajeegaaschi ea ghamarda.

Nea mujiinean gooyang'deayyi meadajeega sean, nea geawundaannyi gooyang'deayyi sea baraknatta; ak goodean mujiini aba bileangidaannyi, gilomittaji sagalamnyooji iyyeenya ea bughalaji ang'wan; nea geawunda ea baraknatta ea geawunda gal humng'eeda gooyang'deayyi.
Hean goodeen eara ghamardaannyi, ak ghwanyas geattin bughala ea haradam ea ang'wan aba gidadeeniida buuneeda nea diitta ea malaykajeanda gil.
Ak ghamardida geadeasa lagheang'su murjeewi, ak mujiineedida geesna lagheanga meeng'meeng'i miyaas nea ghawaar giyoo.
Nea sindeechcheekka ghamarda mujiini abeeda siittaamdaamwa aba giliwas laghaana haw sheayeat; dea madeeda ea mur, deabiyyeenya gameaji ea oomu, deaba samwagu ea ng'oreadi, deaba ang'wan ea nyawiish,

nea deaba muut ea bwaash, nea deaba lah aareara, nea deaba ispwa gameaji anyawiish, nea deaba sis ea booshcheanda, nea deaba shageash ghawaar booreega, nea deaba damanamughuush gameaji ghawaar booreega, deaba damwanagi ea dughwaang, deaba damaniyyeenya ea oomu.

Ak gidaghuudajeekka attamaniyyeenyean gwanda sageek damaniyyeenya, gilinyoo ea gidaghuut gil gwanda sageeyeanjagi, nea naweeda mujiini ea lagheanga meeng'meeng'i miyaas sing'ng'weerdaawa uurji giyoohi.
Ak ea mwaadaahi, gheeda sibatta Aseetta aba mujiini, aba gideaba gheennyaawa sibatta Aseetta Ng'uttamiida was Aseetta Hoauur ea Dayeenda Gisilleanda.
Ak mujiineedida ea magassa gideaba gayghoobwaay aseetta ghana sheeda, aba gideaba giigheambiitta Aseetta weeshindaannyi, ak gheaboong'nyeandaannyi ea Dayeenda Gisilleanda gil.
Aba gideaba weeshindaannyi gaygwaneayeewa emoojiga jeeda; ak sugoodiga ng'eanyiida gaygweadu giigheambiitta nyaawa jeadaannyi,
ak gidaghuudajeegaaschi ea mwajearat askweari earahay, aba gideaba jeani manda eaweeda;
ak saawa gaygweadu jeannyaawa giigheambiitta ea mureeda emoojiga.
Nea jeadaannyi ghanyea maygawa gidamuy, ghana deasina ng'asheega munyas ghana gea ng'uyyeega, geaghus giikka sing'oorsa jeeda gittaabooda eaweega bea Dayeenda Gisilleandean.
Hean ghoahiimnaan enda beega mideawa eaweega, nea eesh ea ghameang'meang', nea ghwadalalaana hoorgeeda Aseetta ea dea Dayeenda Gisilleanda,

nea bugusta naweadinga mujiini, earada, meatkwajeega sean bea enda, abeeda gwanda geetta eaweega, mideawa haghweega heeluut damaniyyeenya, nea inyeessa gooruudu haghweagaaschi gilashsheah; nea seengeaba geedi gaba giheapta emoojiga.
Ak ea maygutgwanda gilinyoo ea moshteayda gil, nea hoorgeeda gheambalmeeda bea Aseetta ea dea Dayeenda Gisilleanda gaygwanda jeadaannyi, nea soomjoogaaschi gayghoaghadoawan niny,
ak gayghwadaa gheamamdaannyi, nea gheawungaaschi gaygwanda gheamanunatka nyaawa.

Ak ea maygutgwanda eaweeda; nea magasa weeshinda gheaboong'nyeanda ghana aseetta aba gideaba Ng'uttamiida was Aseetta gayghoaw weeshinda nyaawa, saawa gaygoombaliischi ea ghoaw damanda manda muudeanooda.

Hean gwayeeshshinean, “Ng'asheesu ghwadoabiiw ak ea huumwa gil. Nea Ng'uttamiida, was Aseetta bea guroruunatka sibanga, abeeda gaygoojeagu malaykajeandaannyi goohiimsa soomjoagaaschi ng'asheega jea gabean ghwahidu.
Ak ging'ulayi, gaydahidu nea ghaalamwajaannyi.” Ghang'wana siida ang'ng'waay ng'asheega siramoaran aba jeedeaba gittaaboani.
Aniini Yohaana ghaayiinyi nea ghaadaayi ng'asheesu. Damandida ayiinyi nea ghaadaayiin, hean geabeedeaysi ng'eanyi ak ghaghadoawannyi aba madeeda malaykajeanda ahiimnaan ng'asheesuun;
hean gwayeeshshinean, “Adiiduw gisni gitta! Aniini geawoschi soomjeanda sea ang'iing'i sea fuga siduupcheewi was sibanga, ea fukka ang'ng'waay ng'asheegeaba gittaaboaniin. Aghadoawana Aseetta.”
Ak gwayeeshshean, “Adiiroori ng'asheega siramoaran bea gittaaboaniin, aba gideaba damanda nineekkiit.
Siida sina ng'asheega munyas daraanya sinooda ng'asheega munyas, dea mideawa ririnyeanda daraanya ririnyeanda, dea doabiiwaat daraanya doobiiwnatta, dea ghaydit ea daraanya ghaydidanda.
Ng'ulla, ghaawunnyi nea ghaalamwajaanyi, nea geayeadu gichchea daadaw siida, ak ghaadawji giliwas sii giduurji gidaghayi sin.
Aniini geawoschi Alfa ea Omeega, dea madeeda gil ea dea huydean, was dea ging'eetta ea dea huydean.”
Ghang'wana fuga ahuun hang'weakka nyaawa, ak gwandeawa doobiiwnatta jea gaweesiina geetta eaweega ak gaweay jeeda mujiini aba gidaghuudajeagaaschi.
Hoowa bea jaroodean gwanda gudajeega ea beneediga ea fuga hiseada ea fuga nuusa buuneeda ea fuga ghadoawani gidamwawosa aseetta, ea gilinyoo ghabwariiy ng'uyyeega nea gwasin.
“Aniini Yeesu, neajeagu malaykajeandeanyu headaang'u nea gweadu muwwunooni heeda ganisajeega. Aniini geawaschi hawunnyeanda ea jeatta Dawdi, was ming'weandida aboong'u bea muchchuunoodean.”
Ak gwayi Gurorooda ea Sibeeda, “Beenni.” Nea siida ing'shi dayi “Beenni.” Ak doani siida bearji muwooshta, nea dea gasa ea dageanda beega eaweega nea manda sheayeeda.
Geereekusi giliwas sii iiyi ramoorangeaba gittaaboani: giliwas sii iyahaat, gaygoheassa Aseetta sawanaduussu surgu aba jeedeaba gittaaboani,

ak giliwas sii igeanda gili aba jeeda ng'asheega siramoar bea gittaaboaniin, gaygageanda Aseetta headaannyi aba jeeda geettida bea eaweegean ea aba jeeda mujiineetta ghaydidiin, surgu ng'asheagaaschi aba jeedeaba gittaaboani.
Nea siida muuwwu ng'asheesu gwayi, “Asi aba huumwa ghaawunnyi nea ghaalamwajaanyi.” Amin. Beenni, Ng'uttamiida was Yeesu!
Gagasa anyasa dagheerjeandumeeda Ng'uttamiida was Yeesu agoogeeni sean owoschi ghaydidiini. Amin.
